i never stayed at this hostel, hostelworld payment site crashed while i was paying, and i never got the confirmation e-mail. however, the staff at this hostel was so kind to cancel my reservation over the phone. i recommend the hostel, not hostelworld.com

it was fantastic experience for first time experiencing hostels. all the staff were awesome and friendly. a lots of event and tours. it's good place to meet people around the world also. clean, good atmosphere, good staff, great location, and so economic. bty breakfast included and for dinner or lunch you can buy your own and cook. thanks
clean, helpful staff, good location.
nice and helpful staff, the breakfast was good, the tours nice and fun.

the hostel was great. they had a lot of things to do together and events. the place was in a good location for everything i wanted to do and the staff was super helpful answering any questions. the place needs a big clean in the rooms. the shower area needed some work and there was an oder in some rooms. over all the place was great and those two things didn't affect my stay but there is room for improvement.

some staff members were a bit cold and rude others were really nice. very noisy, they don't enforce quiet hours which have signs everywhere from 11pm-8am so if you want somewhere you can sleep this isn't it, if you want somewhere you can party every night this is probably more your thing. overall comfortable stay, nice breakfast and generally friendly staff, just need to get that balance right with noise restriction as many other fantastic and lively hostels i've stayed at have.

friendly staff and fairly good facility. your basic hostel with lockers, lounge, and daily breakfast. they had daily sign up sheets for trips to the amusement park, beach, pub crawls and so on. my only complaint would be the location. the hostel itself is central however hollywood itself was not a place i would spend much time.
lockers aren't big enough for suitcases, so luggage is not able to be locked away. super clean and awesome breakfast!
not entirely at the fault of the hostel,  but we were desperate to get out. the staff were not too helpful and the private room we had was the bare minimum in quality.

facility wise this was the best hostel i stayed at in the usa. plenty of room in the dorms, everything was clean and free breakfast was great. hostel activities were good and in a central location for la.

i can wholeheartedly say that not many hotels or airbnb's that i've stayed at prior to this hostel made me sad to leave. this was my first time travelling solo in a hostel and i have no regrets and i will from now on always stay at hostels. usa hostels hollywood was amazing, filled with vibrant people and staff with lots of activities provided and free breakfast and clean rooms which provide an ideal scenario for making friends. the staff were amazing, just want to say thanks again!   chin x x
really nice hostel, hollywood is a rough area but felt safe in the hostel. have stayed here once before and it was lovely to be back

third time at usah hollywood, always a pleasure. a lot of the staff members are still there from 3 years ago and it seems like they love their job. bed was good as usual, breakfast good as usual and overall a great stay as usual. number one place to stay in los angeles. thanks again guys.

has good facilities and were very accommodating of my early arrival. some good free activities also. did overcharge me but we worked it out. was also my first experience of a mixed dorm which turned out to be one female (me) and five guys, which didn't feel very mixed! close to the metro and views of the hollywood sign from the common room.
i would definitely recommend staying at this hostel cause it's super close to everything and the staff is friendly!  the rooms are nice and you meet a lot of nice people!
staff could have been more informative. dorm was unclean and very unfriendly which ruined my hollywood experience.
great staff, great people staying in the hostel, good extras such as walking a tours and shuttles to santa monica
staffs are kind and its location is perfect~
good staff and location  easy to meet people and have fun!  terrace to chill out amd drink!

one of the cleanest hostels i've ever stayed in. every morning there are staff cleaning all the rooms and common areas. the location is fantastic - just off hollywood blvd. walking distance to chinese theatre and runyon canon. short uber to downtown la too. the breakfast was average, could have been more. they have baggage storage free of charge with no time limits. head boards for extra privacy in rooms. free to change linen/towels whenever you like which was great and they had a laundry.
really enjoyed my stay the staff where so friendly and helpful i would stay again. clean and tidy. in a great location. great atmosphere and very fun and friendly.

a very nice hostel right off hollywood boulevard. for it's location, the hostel is very clean and nicely decorated. simplel but good. the kitchen is fully stoked and the atmosphere was really cool, too. i've only stayed for 3 nights but would recommend the hostel to anyone who wants to be right in the middle of the hollywood madness.
wonderful hostel, great staff, super clean, many activities

staff were ok, but generally kept to themselves and were unapproachable. facilities are clean and a a great value for your money. feels very safe and secure considering it's just off the busy hollywood boulevard. love that the hostel offered lots of free activities (walking tours, shuttle busses, bbq's). do these activities if you're trying to meet people! overall good hostel.
it was pretty awesome staying in usa hostels hollywood! i may choose it again when i visit la next time
great staff and clean facilities. will definitely come back.

a great hostel right in the middle of hollywood. the facilities were always clean and the free breakfast never ran out.  the large kitchen makes it a lot easier for travelers on a budget.  the staff were helpful and have plenty of local knowledge.
great location and awesome activities!

good hostel, great location just walking distance from the strip and nightlife. didn't do many of the activities but the hostel put on a comedy night for free and it was pretty good. beds/rooms/bathrooms were all fine, beer pong table sucked but the upstairs common room is good for pres and comfy couches. no dramas staying here.
i"ll be back definitely!

i really like staying at this hostel, but the last couple times i've stayed here, there has been a problem with quiet hours not being observed. on my last visit there was a fight that broke out at insane-o-clock in the morning. in the middle of the week. and that was one of two that happened during my last stay there.     that being said, it's still going to be one of the first places i consider when i go to hollywood. but i really hope that the issues with quiet hours are addressed.
pretty sweet hostel, good location just off hollywood boulevard. 10mins from universal studios, cab ride away from santa monica.   everyone is really nice and chill 👍🏼

gosh i love this place amazing atmosphere located right off the hollywood blvd, the most fun place to be in los angeles.    i have made some great friends whom i would love and cherish for many ages to come    hostel staff if you're seeing this please send my regards to fraser and alvi the fun staff in entire hostel  and to another staffer whom we met during pub crawl (sorry forgot your name) we had so much drunk talk that day :)    thank you  - crazy indian
location was great, if you like hollywood blvd, which we didn't. however the security etc was awesome and the staff were great.     the group activities here were a real standout.

the hostel is in a great place for metro/ connections/walking. it's clean and for the most part, the staff are helpful. only two out of all i dealt with were clearly not putting effort into their jobs.     the only con for me was noise. at the weekends, the hotel or neighbourhood is loud till around 4am. having arrived after a long flight on a saturday, it was frustrating. the rest of the week was better but there were people coming in at all hours who didn't seem to respect the quiet rule.

this is an awesome hostel smack in the middle of the famous hollywood neighbourhood. beds were good. wifi was good. you had a lot of choice for breakfast (and good coffee!). they had activities going.   there just was this great vibe.   next time in la, i'll definitely come back to this hostel!
good location for all hollywood attraction including theme parks, and a really nice hostel.

had an amazing time here, came back a second time a couple weeks later. made some great friends and loved the atmosphere. staff were great, especially louis and fraser who made an already great time even more fun. tours and bar crawls are affordable and unique. location is great, la is huge so anyone who's not happy with being next to hollywood boulevard is just plain picky. had a great time, thanks a lot :)
staff were helpful,  had a good time, met some nice people.would recommend to friends,a place to stay.
awesome place, would go back in a heartbeat!
it's ok for couple of nights. not that much to do near location.

great hostel and great location. staff are friendly and helpful. room size is good and clean. if on the car park side of the hostel you will need ear plugs as you can hear the music from clubs on hollywood blvd.

i was in the very first room, which is right next to the door (which slams every time it shuts, no hydraulics to let it shut softly), across from the kitchen, and right underneath stairs to the second floor. it was extremely loud all night as quiet hours were definitely not observed or enforced by staff. this hostel was worth it for me only for the convenience to the pantages theatre which is less than a 10 minute walk away, and the only reason i went to la was to see a show at the pantages.
great hostel in great location. definitely stay here.

first time staying at a hostel and i must say i was pleasantly surprised. aside from being extremely clean-conscious  (all they do is clean!) they were humble, friendly and willing to go above and beyond. example: i'm a non meat eater and one night they had a free bbq for guests. i asked if they had veggie burgers and they declined. a few days later one of the staff told me they'd gone out and got veggie burgers for the next bbq. really?! talk about excellent customer service! pleasant stay.

greatest hostel i've ever stayed in :)! the staff are awesome major points to fraser and jack - you guys are wonderful. the room / bathroom were clean and tidy, bed comfy and the atmosphere was fantastic. free brekky is awesome and the events the hostel have on are super fun. my only downside was friday and saturday night the outside noise from clubs near by was pretty noisy but with a set of earplugs its fine. will definitely stay here again 10/10
good atmosphere out on the patio to meet fellow travellers! liked all the organised trips , some free ! good breakfast  especially cook your own pancakes !
if you are looking for a very social, clean and safe hostel this is a great choice! had such a great time staying here, met so many awesome people. really good vibes, plus very safe and clean!
all you can ask for in a hostel.
the best hostel i've ever been in usa.
awesome place to stay. our dorm (mixed 8) had its own bathroom facilities. activities on every day. free breakfast (which includes pancakes) everyone was very friendly.
great stay
definitely right in the middle of hollywood, decent place. i'd stay again.
best hostel i have stayed in
v good and sociable atmosphere in a good location. staff very helpful and friendly.

if you get given room 104, ask for another room, no, demand it. right opposite the kitchen, and next to the 'front door' to access the rooms.. very, very, very, very hard to sleep with people talking and it eching plus the horrid buzzzzzz of the door being open (and slammed). awful sleep and very very average mattresses
take more care of your staff! ;) otherwise, rock on!

adequate facility for the area. good staff and good vibes during my stay. location is fine but some might find it seedy at times. breakfast is a big plus, as were the sleeping arangements (enclosed bed heads for privacy). l.a doesnt really have a centre but this would make for a good base to see the hollywood side of things and the hills, (griffith park/runyon canyon) metro train isnt too far either, which would make easy connections to santa monica and downtown. would stay again

rooms are nice and beds have there own light and power point. location is good however hollywood isn't really a clean place. staff were great minus one who i witnessed yelling at a customer. most of the activities they put on got cancelled because of low numbers. but overall not a bad place if you're after a comfy bed for cheap price.

although the overall cleanliness of the hostel was great, the small things such as the lack of fitted sheets, minimal options for breakfast, the staff being about average, its definitely one of the best hostels i've stayed at. the location is superb.
loved this place. super easy going. very accommodating.

great place! good outdoor area for meeting other people and the hostel put on some great events (bar crawl/hollywood sign walking tour etc). good location for getting around la (near universal, not too far from santa monica/venice, and obviously great location for hollywood).
very nice place
comfy beds and clean linen, breakfast was not massive but fine and all the staff were helpful. i would stay again

i don't like the fact that we check in at 2pm, but we have to check out at 10am. that is very inconvenient. my flight was not due until way after 10am. it's basically throwing us out into the street. if the facility is open 24 hours a day, we should be able to check out at 11 pm or 12midnight, because technically that would complete a day, and get our money's worth. and the breakfast selection, i didn't see any eggs and bacon.

guy who runs the bar crawls was very poor. refused to even start the bar crawl on the friday and saturday because there "weren't enough girls in the group so we wouldn't get in" all of the group then went off together without him and managed to get in everywhere. i can only guess he couldn't be bothered. get rid. other than that. great hostel!
great place in a great location. staff was super friendly and the other tendants were friendly and respectful.

great service, and we were able to book and print our tickets for universal studios there! no parking, but they are upfront about this on their website and we found parking easily nearby. very friendly and helpful staff. found it a bit noisy, but we were trying to sleep at slightly odd hours after a long haul flight, there were no noise issues at night.

wonderful location/staff, very colorful and well maintained hostel.   has numbers of activities travelers can enjoy, pancake breakfast, common area(patio&lounge) was roomie and isolated from rooms-so good for late night chatting.   only one bathroom per room-even for 8ppl dorm was the only perk(have 1 extra toilet& 1 toilet/shower in lounge)   but i'll still definitely stay here again when i visit la next time.   thank you all!! love you xoxk

definitely one of the better hostels i've stayed at - comfty beds, nice bathrooms, a good selection at breakfast and the vast majority of the staff were friendly and helpful. one thing i would say though is that some of the activities felt like a bit of a money-grab at times. i genuinely don't know where the money went and if it did cost that much to put the activity on, it shouldn't do.

breakfast here is really good and the staff works hard to keep everything clean and tidy. so if you want a very clean and nice hostel this would be good for you. however there are comparable hostels out there for better prices.

awesome hostel, would recommend to anyone, would 100% stay again, traveled alone in the beginning of october and didn't think there would be a lot of solo travellers cause travel season was over but i met loads of other solo travellers and had a great time.

one of the best hostels i ever stayed.  it has a lot of (friendly) staff, so the hostel is always real clean. i f you want to stay in hollywood the location is perfect, they also offer loads of activities and freebies every day. the breakfast was a big surprise for a hostel, beds where comfortable with free linens, towels and big bathroom and shower on every room. i'm not sure if it was the date (october) but i was travelling by myself as most people in the hostel so it was easy to make friends.
it was a good location and the rooms were very clean. the bottom bunk was a bit cramped but did the job. staff were friendly and the airport shuttle convenient.

i really enjoyed my stay but it is right next to nightclubs and on saturday night it gets extremely loud, i had just arrived on a long haul flight only to get little sleep from the noise. however its so close to everything which during the day is a bonus that overrides a lot of that negative.  i'd also like to point out that activities are run based on having enough people, which means things can be cancelled even if you want to do it. not a major thing but was a minor annoyance for me.

the hostel was really clean, the beds were comfortable, the building was safe and secure. the hostel had things to do: events and such, which is helpful if you like those things. staff was helpful as well. the breakfast in the morning was healthy. i had a nice time :)

amazing! i've been hostelling throughout europe with others but never had so many activities and free things to do before. this is great especially as i'd just arrived from australia and was a lone traveller. met lots of great people in the common areas and staff were always able to help. only downside was that it was super hot when i was there but nothing they could do about the weather. thanks again!
was a good place to stay, close to the main locations im hollywood. staff were helpful. room was a bit tiny but the bed was really comfortable.
everyone was really lovely, i felt very welcomed. the downstairs outside part was great to meet people and socialise
solid hostel. decent location for hollywood and good amenities. free bbq monday was an unexpected treat.
awesome experience!
i can characterize my stay in this hostel as simply "wow"!

great hostel. the patio area is the reason this hostel is so great as its perfect for meeting other people. activities several times each week some free some paid for. only downside is that my room was at the back next to the car park and people would park in there and play music all night. my room had air con but believe some of the rooms don't have this.
perfect hostel!!
great hostel. safe place, good activities and tours and the location was right on the main strip. would definitely recommend.

i had a lovely one night stay in this hostel! the pancakes are amazing for breakfast, the rooms are nice and spacious, just the bathroom was a little messy (but that was due to the other people staying in the room). they had a nice socialising area with sofas and a tv, but as i was only there for one night and a solo traveller i didn't use it as much. there's many activities on offer so definitely do one if you can! the club crawl is very fun. would stay here again if i come back to la!

absolutely loved the west hollywood location. everyone was super fun and nice and the outdoor patio was perfect for gatherings and chilling. the wi-fi was great and the free breakfast was quite a bit. i was surprised at the pancakes and fresh fruit for breakfast.

the staff were all largely helpful.  the lockers had outlets inside to power electronic devices.  the bunk beds also were of higher quality, allowing for electronics to be plugged in and a sense of privacy.
i like this place which located in hollywood but the room in not that good. anyway it was convenient.
this was the first time i have stayed at a hostile,it was very nice and the location and price were grate .
best place to stay when in hollywood.
great hostel would highly recommend

location is great if you want to be close to hollywood, staff working out the back were awesome, front desk staff were ok. beds comfy, like plugs and light and the little bit of privacy each bed has. bathrooms in each room are great. rooms could be cleaner.

too highly rated for what it is. location of the hostel isnt to far away from everything approx 5min walk. staff at desk in the morning were ok need to work on customer service skill, the young guy that works in the kitchen area was a great help. free breakfast, overall cleanliness was good. theres lockers in the room to store valuables. hostel has a common area where you can byo alcohol and run an event everyday such as tours & pub crawls.
this is a really good hostel for the average traveller. it&#39;s location to hollywood blvd is ideal and is also in walking distance to melrose ave. great hostel and would definitely reccommend
only stayed in this hostel for 2 nights but i didn&#39;t want to leave! such a great atmosphere and all the staff were really friendly! would definitely reccomend this hostel.
nice place , i stay only one day but , all is correct in general
second time i stayed here and can't fault it! staff are super friendly and helpful. 10/10! can't wait to come back.

they organise really cool activities to bind people together, got a huge ass karaokee room and the staff are sooo chill and helpful. free drinks :d everything is so organised and well furnished, the rooms are really secure, they basically give you a token and they'll only unlock for you when they see it haha the location is within walking distance to the boulevard, you'll enjoy anywyas :d
i ve been to three usa hostels (la, sf and san diego). i am a fun!  some of the best beds from all the hostels i have tried so far. good facilities and friendly staff, mainly volunteers travellers.
it&#39;s an incredible hostel filled with activities for people and a staff that is friendly as times. overall if i go to san francisco or back los angeles you have my reservaton
great place to stay, we also stayed in their san fran hostel, also amazing. a great place to stay, and right on hollywood blvd.

this hostel was a bit pricey, but it seems to be the case all over la. the rooms were clean and the staff friendly. free breakfast was a nice perk, although the room was a bit small for the number of people in there so finding a place to sit and eat was challenging during peak hours. honestly didn't spend a ton of time in the hostel outside of sleeping and breakfast, so it met my needs just fine.

greatly located within hollywood, but i was there during weekdays so nightlife was not really there. they clean the floors and rooms everyday which is nice, facilities is not a new building, but it's relatively clean (washrooms as well). the hike organized by the hostel is quite nice. if i were to stay in hollywood again, i'd stay there again. i would recommend it if you go to hollywood

this hostel was the most amazing experience of california! a few minutes away from the metro, anything you need if right on your doorstep! the staff and the visitors combined made the experience the best! right on hollywood blvd. and it was so sociable!! would return here 100%
great hostel with lots of activities available. great location just off hollywood blvd. free breakfast was excellent. good atmosphere. clean and secure.
would recommend the comedy show on thursdays and sundays

a little bit expensive for what you're getting - this is pretty much your bog standard hostel. great party atmosphere with good events and tours arranged. location was alright but sometimes i felt a little uneasy walking home alone at night! clean, large rooms and a nice outdoor seating area!

though i wouldn&#39;t necessarily recommend staying in hollywood, if you are then this is a good base. right off hollywood and sunset blvds. hostel runs activities every day though they may be considered a little overpriced, the guides are friendly and well informed however. staff seem to constantly be in and out of rooms which can be a tad frustrating but all are friendly and extremely happy to help. i recommend getting to breakfast early as supplies deplete quickly.

first hostel i stayed in the us and not too bad, but definitely not great. the front desk people are pretty friendly and helpful in directing us to certain locations. i was given a list of places i can go along with how to get there. there are also daily activities you can sign up for, but you have to do it quickly for the spots tend to fill up quickly. a lot of people come and go for the hostels in the us are a bit more expensive than other countries. overall ok, bathroom a bit dirty. but 怎么办？

usa hostels was my first stop on my trip! staff were super polite and helpful, my dorm was clean and the mattress was so comfortable after a long haul flight! hostel is central to absolutely everything in hollywood.
good location in hollywood. clean and organised. lots of activities. some staff great others unhelpful. lots of rules.

i&#39;ve been travelling for over a year, and this is hands down one of the best hostels i have stayed in. i was originally meant to stay for 2 nights and ended up extending to stay in california for 8 days. the hostel was super clean, safe and in a pretty great location. it had an outside smoking/sun area which was really social. the hostel ran pretty awesome trips every day which included pub crawls, beach shuttles, hikes to the hollywood sign... 10 out of 10. breakfast alright - its free.
perfectly acceptable,  though it seems to think very highly of itself.  they do not honour the deposits made on this website so you will be charged extra if you book here.

this hostel is great. they&#39;re in a good location and the staff were very friendly but the airconditioning in my room didn&#39;t work which was annoying. it was very hot and uncomfortable to sleep in. other than that though it was fun place to stay.
very comfortable and clean hostel,great place to stay for budget accommodation.

traditional style hostel, en-suite bedrooms with small metal bunk beds.     poor sound insulation, you will hear loud music, people shouting, smashing glass in the evening. in the morning, you&#39;ll hear cleaning machinery, vehicles, etc. in general, this hostel needs a major upgrade. thin curtains, street lamp can shine through.     towel had yellow grey stains on, bathrooms can be cleaner.    outdoor area was full of people smoking too.    good things? its in a great location and good activities!

this hostel is super close to everything, just off hollywood blvd (a little noisy at night when the clubs are still pumping and the jet lag is setting in - but definitely not a deal breaker!). the activities they run at a small fee are fab and fun! the rooms are so clean and the ensuite in each room is the best! they also have a privacy screen near your head on the bunks with a powerpoint and light attached which i think is a bloody good idea! will definitely be back if i'm ever in the area!
the place is nicely located but i was unimpressed with the common bathrooms as there&#39;s no privacy when someone uses the toilet. also no air conditioning.
nice place!
great place

really great hostel. right round the corner from hollywood boulevard. spacious, clean rooms and bathrooms. really good security. especially enjoyed the activities they put on, i did the griffith park hike which was fab and the beach shuttle. noisy roommates but that can&#39;t be helped.
good hostel and great if you want to stay right in hollywood.

staff was great. room, beddings, toilet and shower room were clean. overflowing free coffee and tea 24x7. staff were so accommodating especially matt who was very helpful with my luggage. great cx. i will surely stay again in this hostel in my next visit to hollywood.

this hostel okay. after reading multiple reviews, i decided to choose this one. the location is great for the nightlife, with tons of clubs within walking distance. breakfast was decent and the atmosphere was fun. only issue i had was on my last night. a guy who wasn&#39;t a guest was starting problems and we almost fought he claimed he worked there but come to find out he was just a friend of an employee. he threatened to jump me everyday for the remainder of my stay. thank god it was my last night

overall the hostel was clean and well equipped for travellers of all kinds. my boyfriend and i stayed in a private room which was nice but rather small for two people. the hostel definitely attracts young travellers rather than those who would prefer a quieter hostel. the staff were friendly however they were very noisy, particularly in the mornings, and the amount of staff working there was a bit overwhelming at times.

amazed at how clean this place was. 6 person dorm ensuite was cleaner than my bathroom at home. great vibe, good location, great staff and great activities. couldn&#39;t fault the place.  can get warm in the rooms at night but we are talking about july. would stay again and again.

the hostel is in a good location in the heart of hollywood just off hollywood blvd. as with anywhere in la expect a 40min uber to anywhere else (beaches etc). the hostel is kept clean and tidy and has regular events which are good for socialising, the only thing i would say is there needs to be a few more toilets.    overall a very good hostel!

i was travelling on my own and as a girl i was pretty apprehensive about staying in hollywood but was glad i stayed here :)    the hostel is just off the main street so is busy at all times. just be careful not to be walking at night especially if you are on your own. only down side was that a few homeless people came into the outside patio looking for ciggarettes etc.     the group activities were amazing. met so so many people on the pub crawl and stayed frienly with them throught my stay.
great location hostel, clean rooms, great staff and free pancakes ! couldn&#39;t really ask for more

overall it was a great stay. the location is great, it&#39;s right off hollywood blvd so all the main spots at hollywood are walking distance. they organize daily events both during the day and evening, which is great for getting to know fellow travellors. only minor issue had was where a day trip was fully booked, however a staff member advised the day before to still turn up but i was met with a slightly rude shutdown on the day which wasn&#39;t great.

hostel was in a great location, only a short walk to hollywood blvd. lots of activities and events which was awesome and really helped the atmosphere. the free breakfast was cool. sometimes it took a while to be seen at the front desk due to the number of people but the staff were mainly helpful and friendly. hostel was clean but the sheets and towel i was given were stained and this made them feel unclean. overall, pretty good.

best place i have ever stayed at. loved every second i was there! the staff were the best and made me laugh constantly. friendly, inclusive and fun. this was the start of a 5 week trip and i didn&#39;t want to leave!!! thanks do much for an amazing experience...will never forget it xxx
first time staying in a hostel ever. friendly staff & great people made some new freinds!

lots of cheap tours available to any guest - did the hollywood sign hike with matt and he was super informative! the hostel was very clean, in a safe area and super nice staff! free breakfast and wifi made life super easy whilst traveling and the hostel is in a central location which means ubers are easyyyy! best hostel!!!

this was my first time staying in a hostel. i had conducted my own research before i made the decision to stay in this hostel and well i wasn't disappointed. it worked out to be a lot better than i thought and i am glad i made the right decision. the staff were very helpful, and were very accomodating. honestly i do not have any complaints. the only suggestion i would make is, if the hostel would make an investment into an air conditioner as it would help keep the place cool when it gets hot.

everything is good. i love this hostel and surely will come back and stay here again if i come to la again. location is really close to hollywood walk of fame and they prepare some free activities that unfortunately i cannot join because of my full schedules. just one thing , that one of the employee ask me for money when i want to keep my luggage in the storage early in the morning while i know usually keeping your luggage in the storage will be free of charge.

before i going there, i viewed the comments on the website, which said it was a fantastic place to live. however, i didn&#39;t have a pleasant time there. i lived in a room of 8 people and almost lost my sleep all the night because my roommates returned back after 12pm and someone snored annoyingly at late night. besides, the breakfast was not as good as the hostel i lived before. i would not recommend this place to my friends any more.
great hostel!!!

i only stayed here for 2 separate nights but thoroughly enjoyed my time. the staff were excellent and very helpful! the events looked great- although i didnt get a chance to do any of these. very clean and loved the shelf with power point and light for each bunk.
great location, fun and enthusiastic staff, great activities, and generally a clean and well-functioning hostel.
good location and staff were friendly. free breakfast is a bonus! however dorm and bathroom were messy and shower was a little dirty. other than that it was a good stay.

i really liked this hostel. one of the best hostels i've ever been! staff is great and atmosphere is awesome too. i met some great people there! also, location is right on hollywood boulevard. highly recommended!!
good central hollywood location with very friendly staff and a number of activities each day. good beds and the lockers with a plug inside were particularly handy.
very nice property. cool outside area. there was a heat wave when i was there and the room was way too hot.

this hostel is in a really great location in hollywood. it feels safe and the atmosphere is great. there was a friendly buzz about the place which made it easy to meet people and there seemed to be a lot of organised events for people staying there.

the rooms were nice, and the privacy screen with personal electrical points was appreciated. location - unsafe and unclean. we were hassled on the street at all times of day, and even with a group we felt very unsafe.  once you left the hostel everything smelled like a toilet. our biggest gripe was that the reception staff were incredibly unhelpful and disinterested - especially shelby, who we unfortunately dealt with multiple times. breakfast was pathetic. would not stay there again.

my boyfriend and i stayed in a six bed mixed dorm with ensuite. the rooms are a great set up with own light and screening. staff were very helpful for tips around town and travel options. hollywood location was not our cup of tea but very handy to explore there and other areas as so close to red metro line. thanks.
staff are amazing! pub crawl was brilliant and such a great location.
only stayed for one night. it was good enough not to stay the whole day. it&#39;s kinda packed. no elevator which sucked because i had a huge bag. breakfast was ok.
it was a good experience, good breakfast...they organise pub crawls, trips to hollywood etc...i will recommend it!!

good hostel. positive aspects: good outdoors lounge area, good staff, good indoors lounge area upstairs, good security, good location in hollywood. negative aspects: poor breakfast; the mattress is not so comfortable (seems air-filled), the beds have a grid at the end, so tall people (i am 6.2 tall) have to sleep shrunken as they can&#39;t leave their feet outside the bed.
very nice hostel, i felt safe, i had a locker with a powerpoint in it. friendly staff and excellent location
good atmosphere. however the staff was unfriendly and rude. not being so informative. butter in the kitchen ran out all the time.
everything about my stay was outstanding, but there water smells like metal

when we first got there, the street appeared quiet and we weren&#39;t sure how safe the area was. once we walk up hollywood blvd to the chinese theatre, it&#39;s all very lively. hostel had excellent security both at the main entrance and dorms -  lockers provided with plug points for secure charging - all you have to bring is a med-sized lock. everything was well thought-out. disappointing part: they decided not to run a free shuttle without telling us, even though they already had us listed down
cleanliness was exceptional. staff always very helpful. really need to find room for a bar somewhere! overall, a pretty cool place

this hostel is right in the heart of hollywood (albeit not the nicest location) and is close to all the main attractions. rooms and kitchen were always clean. breakfast was pretty poor the first two mornings (just toast or diy pancakes) but we worked out on mornings 3 and 4 that you have to get there before 9am to get fruit and porridge. most of the staff were really nice and helpful. they have at least 3 fun and affordable activities each day. pretty expensive for output - but that&#39;s hollywood!
best hostel experience i ever had
this hostel was one of my favourite hostels i&#39;ve stayed in they have a lot of activities you can do during the day and at night and a very friendly team
hostel is located in the heart of hollywood. very good atmosphere. but bed sheets and linens very not so clean...
really cool place! fun staff and friendly people

stayed for two nights in a 6 bed female dorm. the room was really nice, i had no issues with the accommodation. everything was clean and tidy, the lockers for your storage were a good size. location was awesome we could walk to most attractions or it was only a short bus trip away. staff were wonderful, very helpful. i would stay there again no worries at all.
my first time staying in a hostel. i was amazed by how this hostel organized. some of the stuff is not very nice but some of them are awesome. i loved the activities and the rides they offer.

my overall experience at the hostel has been positive. liked the group hostel activities, which added to the positive experience. the fact that there was no male only dorm rooms were a bit strange, and would have preferred it to the mixed dorm. beds were nice and firm, with clean linen, however i would recommend that it be fastened more to the walls, as the top bunk was unsteady (would shake) if bottom person moves even slightly.
stay in business and keep up the good work!

amazing hostel! staff are super friendly! the tours they offer are great! really good areas to chill inside and out. if your room isn't ready yet or you have to check out earlier than you plan on leaving la  then you can go and nap in the upstairs lounge where there are showers tvs etc. breakfast is also so nice - good range to choose from ! definitely head to down town at night if you're over 21!

stayed one night. roommates were respectful of rest times. i wasn&#39;t use to sounds of people around me and woke up startled once.  after i got the free wifi to stream sleep music over my iphone i didn&#39;t wake up startled again. perfectly wonderful staff and fellow travelers.  loved the breakfast with fresh fruit.  juice machine didn&#39;t work, but overall everything was as expected.    i see why it wins awards!
i have no words to describe the awesomeness of this place. i think i even felt like home. definitely at a whole other level 💯👌🏼

talented and helpful staff! amazing free breakfast. handy check out day luggage storage. you'll meet some fab new friends and have loads of fun. just make sure you budget for it and keep your wits about you round town. fab hostel 8/10.
perfect place, and i&#39;ve usually always stayed in hotels! best way to meet new people and make new friends! loved it

had an amazing stay here, met some great friends & even though i was in la to catch up with my own friends and had planned on being out of the hostel a lot, i ended up having such a good time with people in the hostel & made some of the best memories just chilling outside in the garden area. staff are super friendly, helpful & get really involved with the guests. i would say, however, compared to so many other hostels i&#39;ve stayed in.... this really is quite expensive. totally worth it though.
more disappointed with hollywood itself than the hostel
great hostel day trips, very spacious rooms , friendly staff and perfect location. would highly recommend
great lay out with the patio area being at the entrance. very inviting atmosphere

totally worth it! i&#39;ve met the best people on my californian trip so far and i recommend to anyone to visit this place. the front porch with the sofas are one of the best assets that this hostel can offer and you can have a good time with your new friends until early in the morning. the staff people were very kind and generous. i&#39;ve stayed for 4 nights and i would have probably gone for one more if i knew.
the staff was amazing, location was perfect, secure & affordable.

good:  . excellent location  . easy transportation from lax airport (by taking the lax2hw shuttle)  . well planned beds with a good privacy  . clean  . helpful staff  . good breakfast  . daily activities for guests    bad:  . small kitchen, always crowd for the breakfast  . small front patio, and always full for smokers (a hell!)  . very small lockers, do not fit even a small backpack    about the city of los angeles/hollywood:  . drugs are legalized there. drug smokers are everywhere! is the decadence/chao
great vibes and awesome location. they always have something to do if you've got nothing planned.
fantastic stay. very friendly staff and lots to do. really enjoyed the free comedy night. rooms are tidy and beds are comfortable.
first time in la and the experience at this hostel was incredible. great facility being run by great people. i would one 100% recommend it. i know i&#39;ll be coming back the next time i&#39;m in la
i just stayed one night and it was a monday night so it was very quiet, but is easy to meet people.
staff were great. room mates not so much. nothing the hostel can do about that though.

decent hostel. not the best, not the worst.    pros:   -hearty american breakfast provided (i made a lot of pancakes)  -clean rooms  -centrally located: a short walk to the metro or bus and an easy uber ride to lacma, griffith observatory and santa monica.     cons:  - being in the middle of hollywood's business area, it's seedy, grimy and tacky. not a cool place to hang. dead at night.  -the vibe of the guests wasn't great. the people i met weren't fun or interesting. this was a key low point.
very nice hostel

decent hostel but not much atmosphere, the evening meal and walking tour were cancelled while i was there and the friday night bar crawl started an hour late by which time jet lag had caught up with me.  no bar at the hostel.  beds are comfortable and give you some privacy.
although i checked in almost midnight, front desk was accommodating. location is excellent. just few walks and you're at the beginning of the walk of fame.  highly recommend

i normally stay at another hostel when i&#39;m in la but it was booked out so i booked this one. stayed in a 6 bed female dorm with ensuite for 1 night and had a very pleasant stay!    everything was super clean, staff were friendly and it was in such a central location. shame i could not stay for longer...would definitely come back again!

my main complaint about this hostel is the lack of storage space in the rooms. i was in a 6 bed shared dorm and there was nowhere to store my clothes. the room felt crampt too and in my opinion should have only had four beds in it. the outdoor space was nice and the bar area was fun. the staff are very friendly and helpful too. as for the location if you want to be in hollywood it&#39;s perfect. i just didn&#39;t like hollywood.

usa hostel was a really good choice for me as it was located in a great spot right in hollywood. there were lots of cool places to go visit and eat nearby.  atmosphere was also great, i went prior to coachella and there were lots of people going there too. also the rest of travellers and staff were really cool people and i ended up making some cool friends in there.    if i were to go to los angeles again, i&#39;d definitely go back to this hostel.
amazing hostel!

i had a private room that was really small for what i paid for...which was almost usd400 for about 3 nights...didn&#39;t have much going on during the day and the kitchen was always a mess and stunk really bad due to people cooking and burning their food.

my stay was great. very clean and hospitable hostel. central location to everything in hollywood. only improvement could be the late checkout, i paid the extra fee for a late checkout only to find that it's  only an extra half an hour past the checkout time!

the location is awesome. approximately 5 minutes from the main place in hollywood.  the breakfast is good for me because we can make fresh crepes.  the personal is nice but don&#39;t provide a lot of informations about what we can do in los angeles .. it&#39;s a shame  the hostel organize severals events during the week and i appreciated it.
i would definitely stay here again.  10/10
a good place to stay
the place was great.  staff were very friendly.  rooms were clean too.. except that sometimes the people staying make it a bit messy with bags and clothes lying around.
an amazing place to stay would recommend it to anyone :)

hostel had lots of activities (both day and night) to encourage people to interact and meet other travellers. there were two nice places to relax in the hostel - the lounge and  the outdoor area.  the juice at breakfast was sensational. :)  on check in you are given a really detailed map of the area including instructions on how to get to all of las major attractions.  laura at reception was super helpful, even with things that she didn&#39;t need to be - like what insurance to get for our hire car.
absolutely loved this hostel. prime location near hollywood boulevard. the staff were amazing and very friendly and outgoing. would definitely recommend
awesome hostel. great location.

this place apart from being technically at very high stardards, really stroke me as the best experience in my life as a whole. from the beginning of my stay till the end i made it to know amazing people there including the staff who became an essential part of the greatest adventure in california. not to mention all these amenities offered by the hostel itself that bring you everything you need to jump right into the action from your arrival and all during your stay. totally recommended.
thats all good but the shower is bad, no pressure... and the breakfast was not so good but the hostel is really good
pretty small small lounge  nice kitchen  good security  not many bathrooms amazing staff
good breakfast, surprising perks like free washing by powder and towel, nice clean secure hostel with lots of good staff.
one of coolest place to stay. lot of inspiration from the travellers.
i really liked their breakfast.
my only complain is that one night some girls made a lot of noise about 3 am. it is a nice place.
security measures are a hassle. the mood isn&#39;t fun-loving.
great! no complaints.
there should be an ice machine somewhere, or a freezer where we could get ice.   roommate courtesies should be pointed out more upon check in.  very helpful and responsive staff

location was the best part of this place. the patio common area was a nice touch. the private room is small (the bed is wall to wall) just so you know. shampoo/conditioner is provided which is good and also the laundry is convenient.
good hostel, good location, good people.
great services; they organize pub crawls, tours in hollywood / beverly hills and provide a van to some locations (beach, six flags magis mountain).
great stay. can&#39;t fault them for anything. staff were great, really helpful and socialable. tours were perfect!!! the place was well run, clean and secure. everything was perfect

this is a brilliant hostel with awesome fun staff, you meet a good crowd here, it's easy to get to from the metro and within walking distance of the sights in hollywood, the hostel is great , just hollywood isn't so special and seems to be very dodgy at night. brilliant hostel though

great place - but corporate and no real backpacker feel as it&#39;s basically just a cheap hotel now, but the staff make up for it with friendly service, also the breakfast is great and the tours and activities they organise are fun.

the hostels location is just south the hollywood. easy to get around. they also offer good programs like stand-up comedy.   the room was clean. only disappointment was that i forgot my passport in the room,  but the hostel did not write an email even with this important docoument. i looked at my next destination for a whole evening for it. however, they sent it to me for free which was very nice.
simply the best hostel i ever stayed,   i like everything about it!
some of the staff were cool, a lad from england-newcastle/sunderland, the woman manager, maria & the mexican guy & 2 lads from england, surrey - they were sound. great location!

great stay, very handy location, beside hollywood boulevard and close to the metro.  i joined the hostel&#39;s free walk to the canyon, which was the highlight of my stay.  breakfast is very good and what a clever idea to have a socket for charging inside each locker.  i never saw that before.  only downside (not the hostel&#39;s fault) were my roommates, who were very inconsiderate.  insane amount of luggage constantly occupying all floor space, lights on until 2 a.m. and bathroom never avalailable....
its a real shame that you do not have yogurts for breakfast anymore as i was really looking forward to that. so i must say after staying there 3 times now the breakfast was a bit of a let down.

great hostel, great atmosphere, loads of organised trips and activities, great night outs, great wifi, laundry & staff were friendly and helpful and if i&#39;m back in hollywood i would definitely stay here again.

bunk is comfortable with an outlet, light and cover. location was central for where i was going (west hollywood, franklin village, griffin park, echo park, north hollywood, silver lake were all short lyft rides away). it was nice to have a bathroom in the dorm room.

staff are so helpful that solo traveler like me finds the quality so important and valuable! the hostel maybe not in the best area that would make you totally safe but still just 30 secs walk to the walk of fame and a few blocks away from chinese theater!
great hostel!!!
my 3rd stay. will always come back when i&#39;m in la. safe, clean, great people, best beds of any hostel i&#39;ve stated in because of privacy.

i need to say if you want hostel near everything and a staff that will help you in whatever way they can then stay here you won&#39;t be sorry. the people you will meet there will make the hostel so much better i met so many great people there. when i go back to hollywood i will stay there again.
clean room  secure  nice outdoor area, events organised by hostel  located between two train stations 10 min walk     only downside is price
if you're young and want to have fun/party/ meet people from all over the world you won't be disappointed
best hostel ever!!!    so much activities and staff are super friendly and helpful. clean clean clean! free breakfast is decent too. super secure

had never stayed in a hostel in the us before...it's not glamorous, but the place is nice, it's clean, there's a communal kitchen, and it's right in downtown la near taxi, metro, and buses. i stayed in a private room, beds were totally fine and the place was clean. very happy.
why was the sign tour like 7$ too much?
very good and clean hostel, great staff, and the limo party they have is really awesome. highly recommended.
the people were awesome. la in general was very difficult to get around.

a really great hostel. the staff were amazing - especially laura and louie - who would do anything to help with such minimal fuss. the activities they put on were great and made my time at the hostel so enjoyable. free breakfast, free wifi, what more could e ask for for? definitely the best hostel i have stayed at in the usa.
a very good hostel. clean, great beds with individual lamps and outlets. decent breakfast.

arrived at 1:20am, was checked in promptly but when we got to our room we couldn't find our beds because people had put all there stuff on them which was annoying. free breakfast was a nice touch. great location and really friendly and helpful staff! you get lockers for your things and reception control who enters based on if they have a key which is good.

the rationale for the atmosphere rating is that the room was pretty quiet from about 11:00 pm until about 2:00 am on the night of my stay (a wednesday), until someone started blasting music directly outside our windows. the music lasted at least 20-30 minutes, and even after closing the windows we weren't insulated from the noise. i would expect such an incident on a weekend night, but was surprised it happened on a weekday and that the room was so poorly insulated.
this hostel was fine - clean and functional, but nothing special.
amazing hostel with a super cheap bar and the best comedy night ever! i have been to paid comedy events and didn't laugh as hard as i did at their free comedy night!

the kitchen to have breakfast it's a bit small so it can be crowded during morning and difficult to find a place to seat.   the location it's very good but that hollywood area it's not so nice, regardless of this i've been there twice and it's very easy to go to different places en la from there.   last time the shower didn't work very well and it ended up full of water with soap and someone's hair, so  i was not able to take a shower because of this but first hour someone was cleaning.
the facilities, being a hostel, we're excellent. the culture and community was amazing.
great hostel, very clean and good facilities. only shame was that there wasn't many people involved in the activities!

i wasn’t hit with a the usual high energy/diversity found in hostels. free comedy show upstairs was hilarious; bonus for $1 beers & $2 shots. friendly staff though not too talkative. hands down the cleanest hostel i've ever stayed in. breakfast was below continental, but there was free pancake batter. location is as expected, but i’d recommend staying closer to the beach. overall an average stay, not too much character or depth to the hostel – ironically a perfect representation of hollywood.
see below

overall, a good hostel, we did not like the location as much. found it hard to get around if you did not have a car. rooms are clean but not the nicest. nothing serious to complain about but would most likely recommend a hostel nearer the things we had planned to do.
best hostel in l.a.!!!
great location right off the strip. walked to the runyon canyon, and did nice hike. the breakfast was pancakes, toast, oranges and bananas. rooms are cleaned every morning.

staff are very friendly and knowledgable. the location is perfect, close to the main attractions. the price was a little high for a dorm style room. however, its value for money with the free breakfast and free activities/shuttle provided. the facilities were excellent, especially the lounge room, outside area and super fast wi fi!
great hostel, the staff there made it very comfortable and were willing to help as much as they could

brilliant hostel, great location just off hollywood blvd. they run daily and nightly activities so it's easy to socialize. facilities are always clean and staff are really helpful. already planning my trip back here.

absolutely lovely staff (jamie in particular, personally helping me multiple times), great location, super clean, never seemed to have enough towels for the amount of people, we had to share one for our time there. breakfast is super good (as its free) and offers fresh fruit and other lovely things.
staff are rude especially volunteers and guy running the bar crawl. volunteers did not know how to clean rooms.

the hostel was in a really central location between two metro stations and a short stroll to chinese theatre. the hostel was as a hostel normally is- with a couple of added bonuses- the breakfast was a great touch and lots of charging facilities. the lockers provided added room security and it seemed to have something for everyone. slight negatives would be that the towels and linen looked far from clean i.e pretty stained from prior use and some staff members far from warm upon arrival.
loved it. very friendly visitors and staff. liked the pancakes a lot 8)

one of the best hostels i've stayed at.the location is fantastic and the staff were friendly and helpful.the free breakfast and coffee and tea were also great bonuses.and the free wifi worked pretty well.  this is how a hostel should be run.

good location in hollywood. they offer nice programs - such as free shuttle to six flags park , pub crawling and comedy show. the breakfast is average, it&#39;s totally up to you how well you cook your pancake by yourself xd

i'm so happy i chose to stay at this hostel. the location was perfect and the staff were amazing! sooo helpful and friendly which was really reassuring as i'd travelled 13 hours from the uk to stay in la. the other travellers were amazing and i was so grateful to be able to meet some of them and i've definitely made a few friends for life. i cannot fault this hostel and i would 110% stay here again!
its the best hostel ever!good value for money
everything was good, expect that the kitchen is very small.
it was all good.mostly the hostel employees was awesome and very helpful.thank you so much for everything.hope see you guys soon again miss you already ;) thanks again
friendly staff, the hostel run activities are a good way to meet people.
great time there, wish my room didn't smell the way it did but hey i can't control people feet. other than that staff real friendly have the place running well with activities to take part in.
really enjoyed my stay, cheers!

for that price i was expecting more. we had to wash the dishes after breakfast. and there was only toast and some fruits. no cheese or something like that. i was quite disappointed with the breakfast. and the kitchen is too small for all the guest. but the staff is friendly and it was great that every room has its own bathroom. so you almost never have to wait.
all is good but only the atmosphere needs little shake up i think

really incredible stay. the woman at the desk, jamie, was absolutely wonderful! so helpful, kind and understanding!  the whole atmosphere of the place was really friendly, they continually helped me even after i had checked out.   i couldn't be more grateful to everyone that worked there.
super friendly staff & great location in hollywood. i mistakenly thought this hostel is near the amtrak station but the $80 taxi ride from the airport  was worth it to get to see hollywood.
good location, right next to hollywood blvd.     only stayed one night but appeared to be clean and secure.
one word: amazing. totally worth the money, super clean and all the facilities you could wish for. i met amazing people and the staff was awesome!
the staff was very friendly and helpful. made many friends during my stay. location was excellent also.
good hostel in the heart of hollywood!

great location, extra friendly and helpful staff. they put on a lot of activities during the day and nigh - a great atmosphere within the hostel. would 100% recommend to anyone coming to la or hollywood
everything was great! they do have top notch security, thus anybody just can't stumble in. i really had a good time!
it was one of the best hostels i have ever stayed in. clean, great staff, great location, tons of activities provided.   thank you!
great staff, location, atmosphere & worthwhile daily activities.  three years ago, i had a very enjoyable stay as well.
great location, helpful staff, awesome outdoor patio spot.

i've stayed here quite a few times, but i am unsure whether i will do so again in the near future. the last couple times i have found things got pretty noisy during what we're supposed to be their "quiet hours."   still, apart from that i had a very good time, and would recommend them in a heartbeat...along with a very good pair of earplugs.
solid facilities, great location, glad i picked it.
everithing was very clean. the hostel staff was amazing friendly and helpful with everything.  the activities they offer are nice to meet new people and do/see great suff.
awesome staff, amazing location, great activities! this is the best hostel i've stayed at. highly recommend it!
one of good point of this hostel is they provide lots of activities for guests
it is a little bit expensive for a hostel but everything other than price was really good (except some noisy roommates :))
very good hostel, good atmosphere and night life. facilities are decent. the only problem was the bunks are low and the guy above me masterbated which at 430 am is weird.
great staff, great activities every day. heaps of solo travelers as well so easy to meet people
great and helpful staff
good location
fantastic place! always busy, staff very friendly and happy to help with anything. will definitely be coming back!
you cant go wrong with this hostels. great location. awesome patio outside with palm trees, couches and music.  i loved it. very clean also and lots of activities around.
great people and great location! would recommend to anyone :)

great hostel & staff. located in hollywood it's close to both hollywood & vine + hollywood & highland metro stations which are handy for travelling to universal city/downtown. the hostel has shuttles to santa monica, magic mountain and tours around la which are awesome & a great way to meet people. wifi was kinda spotty/slow, but rooms and bathrooms were always clean & travelling in autumn/fall the rooms were never too hot. overall would definitely recommend, met heaps of great people there.
great place to stay. perfect location and 99% of the travelers there are pretty cool.
the staff make this hostel. special mention to michael for making the perfect batch of popcorn. also a shout out to ethan and pete for entertaining us at breakfast
i recommend this hostel!! it's one of the cleanest hostels i was ever been.   the customers are very friendly and the location was perfect. we enjoyed our trip in la.   thanks very much!
great location, friendly staff. nice lounge area and facilities. slightly letdown by the noise during my stay, some of the beds are squeaky and the shower had no pressure. overall great value though!

great facilities and very comfortable rooms. they had great events on including bbq's and tours. i did the hollywood sign walking tour which was very cheap and a great way to meet new people. everything was well organized and the staff were very helpful. i had a great time here and i would love to stay here again. would highly recommend!

this hostel is the perfect place for la location, areas to chill outside, and the staff couldn't be more helpful, gave us directions and maps and advice even for our route to the next hostel, thank you so much

well simply a great hostel, they really know what they are doing....great atmosphere, they know how to entertain their guess and thy  offer new and different things every day great for solo travelers or groups

great hostel. very informative and helpful. all the staff were accomondating and made an effort to assist you. if only you could choose your roommates. there is no age restrictions so if your sharing with older people they will be up at the crack of dawn and wake you up! staying on the weekend there is a fair bit of noise in the neighbourhood so make sure you have your earplugs. i thought it was a very well run hostel and would stay again.
great hostel atmosphere easy to meet other backpackers. knowledgeable and friendly staff. good location and hostel activities are superb. would definitely stay again.
had a great time here, there are plenty of activities run by the hostel to get involved in. very clean and very safe!

i have stayed at this hostel before and had no issues and this is why i decided to stay again. however this time, in our bathroom someone blocked up our toliet. for 3 days none of cleaners did anything about it, i know one of the girls said something about it and nothing was done and then i went down and asked if i could use a toliet cause ours is broken and they showed me to another toliet but did nothing about ours. it started to smell.
40刀一晚的价格对于床位费是太贵了。不过好在附加的东西比较多，比如每天都有一些免费的活动，比如免费去海边等，偶尔免费的午餐晚餐，虽然比较简陋但是毕竟是免费提供。位置靠中国剧院比较远，但是去各处都交通方便。不过有件事情必须提醒，一定要确认入住人及预订渠道。我的朋友在booking上预订的，离店后被booking以未入住为由收取一晚的费用。我认为这是店员的失职。

i can't praise this hostel enough, it is hands down the best hostel i have stayed in the usa. every member of staff i dealt with were both so friendly and professional. in addition the facilities were first class - whoever thought to have plug sockets in each individual locker is an absolute genius!
amazing people, staff, very nice laid-back vibe, great location, had an amazing time!

really a nice place to spend a couple of fun days in hollywood. almost every day another atrraction like hiking tours, comedy club or pub crawls were on offer. bbq's and beer pong plays took place as well in the nice frontyard of the hostel.  you can just sit there from breakfast time until the middle of the night and get to know new friendly people from all over the world. the staff is very nice and helpful and the atmosphere is really good. i was totally happy there!

staff was wonderful!  many travelers i have read online, speak about the lack of a/c or fans, but if you're fortunate to be next to a window..why complain? i enjoyed the free bbqs and the non-expensive events that the hostel puts together.  the beverage vending machine doesn't give back change, the common room with the tvs is great, however, both tvs are set to same channel so you can't watch different programs.  overall i had a great time with usa-hostels hollywood!
good location, and good opportunities to do things with the hostel which was great.
really really great hostel!  clean, great breakfast included, the staff were very friendly and helpful, easy to do anything and everything here. and in the best location in the middle of hollywood!

was greeted with a chaotic reception desk followed by a barrage of unusually stringent policies and rules. reception also not particularly helpful with advice/insight into the city. other than that, a decent short stay.

free, bbq,free ride to beach, free comedy night, free returns to six flags,, more expensive than other hostels,but you get it all back and more.good atmosphere on front lounge area, overal great experience.
fantastic hostel. centrally located. met some amazing folks here. very much a social/party hostel with good activities and cool staff too.
well organized, clean. a little on the expensive side, but this is hollywood. plenty of places to mingle with other visitors, which i did. had a great time, thanks!

we felt overall the hostel was nice although the staff weren't particularly friendly. there was only one nice guy but he had just started and the other staff were rolling their eyes and very impatient with him when he asked for help. didn't create a great atmosphere for us as guests.

it has a great location right next to the hollywood blvd. it looks pretty nice from the outside and patio as well as the inside of the building. the beds have sockets, which is a great service, and the bathrooms were pretty clean. not many hostels have events, but the hostel has several events everyday, some of which requires some payment if not much.

staff was amazing. atmosphere was fantastic, lots of people with cool vibes. the only suggestion i would make is to setup a/c in the rooms, it was incredibly hot and you have to struggle to get a decent sleep.
comfortable beds,with a good amount of privacy when sleeping/reading.location excellent,decent breakfast.
dope hostel. helpful staff and always activities going on. met some amazing people here

this was my 4th stay here.it could easily serve as a model or template of what a hostel should be.the location is very convenient , just off hollywood boulevard and the centre of the action in l.a. the staff are friendly, helpful and professional.the dorms are exceptionally well designed , with power points, reading lights and privacy screens at each bed and power points inside the large lockers.big front patio with lots of seating to relax outside in the reliably balmy l.a. weather

i've stayed in over a dozen hostels now and i'd say this one is a solid b+.  great hostel to meet travelers as there's a front porch area with couches and there's a bar open at night on the 2nd floor (although i wish someone told me this...i didn't figure this out until my last night lol)   free towels, easy check-in. the staff was a little "meh" honestly. they were friendly but just like i said..."meh".  the rooms are hot, the other reviewers are not wrong here. rooms are spacious though!

friendly, helpful staff, very clean rooms and spotlessly clean ensuites. excellent wifi and access to power supplies which these days is a necessity, not a bonus! activities and shuttles organised for you....and a very generous breakfast included in the price. highly recommend!
fun hostel!
staff were excellent and the place was very clean. my only complaint is the sound of delivery trucks next door waking me up every morning at 4 or 5.

the good: breakfast was great   the bad: staff is not a problem solver; some of them aren’t friendly at all. check in time is very late 2:00 pm and check out time very early. 10 am. other hostels check out times is 11 a.m. or 12p.m. and check ins at 1:00  the worst: no air con, fans didn't do anything. sleeping here is impossible because rooms are ridiculously hot.  the best: location  conclusion: overpriced. i will never go back there.
love this hostel but not la

i stayed here for a week and i have to say i was very pleasantly surprised. a lot of people complaining about no ac. yes it was hot but not that bad. the staff were great - some unfair and unprofessional at times but otherwise very helpful. beds were comfortable, no issues with wifi, but i knew a few people who did. security is tight but not during the day, homeless able to enter. price a little high for a hostel but i can't complain as i have met some amazing people and would 100% return here

good hostel, great atmosphere!! easy to meet new people. rooms were good, although ac couldn't hurt (hot!). hollywood isn't that interesting, but it's a safe area. bathrooms were a bit dirty. breakfast was awesome!!
nice hostel. clean toilets, confortable beds, corteous staff.
really helpful and nice staff. close to everything in hollywood and they arrange trips and tours with good value for money.
enjoyed my stay at this hostel. the security was excellent and it was maybe the cleanest hostel i have ever been in ! would highly recommend to anyone coming to la to stay here
very good. thank you very much. gerald jones.
really good hostel just off hollywood blvd. helpful staff. too hot in the rooms with no air con.
is a great place, good activities planned and excelent location.

easy to meet people here and plenty of activities provided inc a few all you can eat bbqs. a good base location wise, right i the centre of hollywood. staff all pretty friendly and common areas are good places to chill out or hang out and party.
this is a well managed hostel, nothing negative about it to say, please keep up the good reputation. good job to you!
just one word.. wow!!!!
probably the best hostel in la. i have no complaints. i would stay here again.

hostel was pretty cool. good security measures. no air con in most rooms kinda sucked :-( free breakfast was a bonus :-) comedy night was super awkward. the tours are good for if you don't know how to get there yourself.
no air con, fans didn't do anything so it was ridiculously hot, slept on top of sheets.
i had a great stay at usa hostel hollywood, staff was friendly and helpful!  lot of activities every day and very good location!

the staff were very friendly and seemed to really do their utmost to ensure the guests (including myself) were situated with their visit in la. the hostel was very clean; the bathroom layout was great since the shower was set in another room. the amenities had advantages since there were convenient resources for accessing and storing snacks and the provision of lots of power outlets was very helpful. the security was also great with the multiple lock systems in place. i'd stay again if i return.
great service. staff were very helpful and gave lots of advices about things to do in the city.

great staff who spoke perfect english with good knowledge of the area! good location, and atmosphere. hostel offers plenty of activities both at night and during the day! great place to meet people so would recommend for those travelling alone!
perfect, no problems, clean. very hip and plenty of fun common areas. would recommend!
the daily activities are well organised and a great opportunity to get to know new people. the location is super close to the walk of fame and some nice bars/restaurants
good location. many activities. friendly staff.
loved our stay here, great location and lots to do with the hostel or on our own, staff were great. only downside was the dorms got really warm but it is la in summertime :)

thanks so much for making my la stay amazing! all the activities organised by the hostel were excellent, shown around by people who really knew the area and knew their stuff. the bar crawl was a particular highlight! really appreciated being able to use the hostel facilities the day of check out - check out is 10am but my flight wasn't until later on that evening. staff were all so friendly and super helpful at all times. couldn't have asked for anything more! :)
awesome staff!

i liked that i was able to use the kitchen and lounge after i'd checked out and was waiting for my shuttle. the breakfast was also really good. i wasn't a fan of hollywood blvd that much as there wasn't much for me to do other than souvenir shop (lots of bars but i'm underage). tours were good fun, always ran in the middle of the day for some reason (very hot).   overs all i'm glad i stayed here and would stay again if i was over 21 and in a group.
good place to meet other travellers,  lots of activities organised by the hostel,  very helpful staff

the hostel is located in the middle of hollywood street .. the staff are most helpful and amazing . love the daily tour they schedule , it allows one to build and know your room mates and fellow people..
the breakast ia terrible! no air condition. summer day and/or night in this hostel is impossible.

the loveliest thing about this hostel is that the staff all seem to be travellers themselves, so it adds an extra homely element. the beds all have 'privacy compartments' with a panel containing plugs and a shelf. when you're sharing rooms this small feature is very welcomed. you can really relax. breakfast is fresh and varied, maybe the best of all la hostels and i stayed in four while in la.
brilliant staff, always happy to help with any query (i had a lot).

the location and the hostel itself was great. it was annoying to show the card every time but it ensured only people who were staying there to enter the building. i just wish the rooms had air conditioning as the fan on the roof was not enough to keep the room cool during the hot summer month of july/august and the shower did not have a warm setting. my room had only a hot or cold setting.

a great hostel, i travelled to many different hostels in america this summer and this hostel was the best i stayed in. the room was spacious and clean. i loved the design of the beds having a metal surrounding that created almost a den for you and you could charge your belongings. this hostel offered great activities for free or a small charge. i would highly recommend this hostel.

i loved the sign up tour oportunities and shuttles to go and the bbq during my stay! the only thing that i didnt like was that the fan in the room turned off when we turned the lights off so it was very uncomfortable to sleep...i wish the roo s has ac!!!
checkout at 10am is too early. needs to be changed to 11am. staff weren't always friendly.

absolutely loved my stay at usa hostels hollywood! the facilities were great, the atmosphere was great and there were plenty of activities on offer. the rooms had their own bathroom (which were cleaned very thoroughly) and lockers were a suitable size to put valuables in. the staff were friendly and professional!
i had a fantastic stay. the staff were lovely, as we're all the guests. the room was clean and the bed was comfortable.
mote shower and toilet facilities would be good, especially at this price.

good hostel but not for the people (not staff) i mean, people in the hostel are likely to enjoy parties and it is fine with me. it is their business but after the party, they took shower at 1 am or noon... everything is really great. place, kind staff, facilities.. but if you want stay in a tranquil place or a quiet hostel, i do not want to recommend this hostel. that is th only deficit this hostel has.
i like to much this hostel!
this hostel had a very good location and had very clean and well designed rooms with loads of charging points and private bunk beds. we enjoyed our stay here!

fantastic location!! only bad thing about this hostel is lack of toilets!! what a joke, had to wait for about an hour due to everyone showering. went to try and use the 3 only other communal toilets all taken for the whole time. apart from this it was a fantastic hostel.
i didn't like the atmosphere, which in fairness was mainly dictated by the guests staying at the time, but could have been better with more social events.

this hostel is great value for money situated about 45 minutes outside of the national park.    there is a sauna and spa which is perfect after a days hiking. the home made food and bar was also spot on!    altogether a great hostel and great value for money.
lockers could have been bigger, and not all rooms had aircon. other than that it was great

as a single traveller this place allowed for full participation in meals, tours, meeting people, being safe! this place was amazing! the dude overnight was amazing, let me in when my shuttle dropped me off at 3am, checked me in and gave me everything i needed. the security door process is awesome. felt super secure. plenty of food places around and super central to all the fun! would certainly recommend to everyone! thanks guys!
a decent hostel with friendly staff and good facilities. if you're looking to go to hollywood it's relatively close, however the area immediately surrounding the hostel is quite trashy.
great location and great outdoor area.
:-) it is just awesome.
