awesome hostel in hollywood area. everything are great except that you have to be checked out by 10 am, which is too early for most of us.
lack of air on made the room unbearable to sleep in, worst night sleep in any hostel j have stayed in. homeless in street and outside bedroom was bothersome
really wish i stayed there for longer, great place both staff and other residents friendly and fun
very good location. the hostel offers plenty of free tours and cheap tours for us. most of the staffs are very sociable and friendly.
great! best hostel i've ever stayed in.

breakfast choices were good, steady supply of fruit and milk. layout cramped at peak hour. a more  user friendly system for doing dishes to  avoid waiting in a line because with checkout time being at 10 am i was really rushing and waiting 10 min to do my dishes made it stressful as i was told in no uncertain terms i'd be charged another  $10 if i was late checking out. lots of travelers arrive late at night and 10 am is too earlier to checkout. every other hostel  has 11 am  checkout .
some staff were not friendly at all.

although the location was good, the general atmosphere of the place was undesirable for me. when i first entered the hostel, the smell of weed and alcohol immediately hit me in the face. i disliked that. that was why i shifted out after the 1st night. although some of the staff was friendly, there were a few of them (one particular male staff) who saw my friends and i struggling with our suitcases but did not bother to assist us with them when we had to move them up/down to our rooms.
there are too many people smoking weed and partying within or just outside the building. the fpushing system is weak as it is not able to flush a lot of things.
great stay! good atmosphere and a lot of activities going on if you wish to par-take.   clean hostel with good vibes!
great location. decent price. decent facilities. security needs a bit of work

this was the first hostel i stayed at on my trip around california, and made such a good impression that i stayed at other usa hostels in san francisco and san diego. great place, great atmosphere and activities, helpful and friendly staff. i felt safe and welcome and had a awesome time here. highly recommended!

the beds were the comfiest i've stayed in, the staff was helpful and i loved the make your own pancake breakfast station! the map provided with food and attraction ideas was very helpful and very  appreciated.
wish the shower water is faster .. and more forceful.
a lot of fun awesome staff and people, great value for money!
hostel staff were helpful, it was clean and comfortable and had different activities every night. good place to meet people. facilities were great.

good location next to hollywood boulevard. no parking for the hostel but we managed to get an ok deal from the lot across the street as we paid for 4 days up front - be prepared to haggle though. the room was comfortable and had an en suite. wifi was good. would recommend if you're in la and on a budget.
very clean, great staff.    though not located in a very safe neighborhood, the hostel itself makes travelers feel very safe staying there

loved my stay at this hostel. met loads of people. all staff i came across were all friendly and always cleaning the hostel. good facilities available (especially walking tours are good), brilliant location for hollywood/ beverly hills. will definitely be back next time i'm visiting la.

very good hostel. excellent cost/quality relationship. staff was super nice and helpful. bed clothing and towels were not 100% clean but nothing too serious. as regards security, the neighborhood maybe a little bit dangerous during nights and during the day i came across with several crazy people in the nearby area asking for money and being aggressive if you don't give them anything. except for that, the rest was really good.
for the money you pay, this hostel is excellent. great free breakfast every morning with bread, oats and pancakes!  they also do daily tours that you can join to see the best of la during your visit.
amazing hostel in a great location. really cool staff that will help you to get arround.
excellent!!!!! best hostel in la!

the pros to this hostel are the cleanliness and security.    the negatives are the expensive price you pay for noisy dorm rooms.   the staff member that checked me out of the hostel booked my airport shuttle for a random day, despite chatting to me about where i was going that night in detail. i was waiting by the door with my bags for 50 minutes before asking what was happening. his incompetence meant a mad rush across hollywood, paying for an alternative shuttle and almost missing my flight.
it's a very good hostel with a good atmosphere,but you've to share the bathroom with 7 other people.

i am not a fan of chain hostels, they feel a little bit impersonal and too much like a hotel, it's a bit difficult to make friends if you are traveling alone. that being said, it's in a fantastic location, facilities are great (best bed ever), breakfast is awesome and the whole hostel it's very clean and comfortable.

if you just want a place to crash and are not a light sleeper then this is the hostel for you. i was in a room with 7 other girls, so sleeping could be hard. everyone has different schedules and you have to wait for your time to use the bathroom/shower. personally, my experience wasn't really bad. the first night was terrible because one of my roommates snored like a drunk truck driver--no offense. i guess it's up to luck if you're put in a room with nice, considerate people then you'll be fine.

the hostel dorm room wasn't cleaned properly; i stayed for 5 nights and they never mentioned anything about changing sheets or getting a new towels. ( i packed my own towels.) the other other guests made the experience memorable and the breakfast was good (except for being rudely rushed out exactly at 10:30a.m.) the pancakes were a nice touch. the british staff member that lead the hike to the hollywood sign (matt, i believe) was really friendly and helpful. :-)

we was very please with your staff, any questions we gave them they had an answer, we real enjoyed staying at the hostel. only one question, over the pasted 20 years l have travelled the world staying always at hostels, because of the joy and fun when you meet over people full of information on there travels with information, but today with everyone has a moble phone they just stare at the mobile all the time even when they are eating there meals!! how sad is that!! no one talks to each other!!
great hostel, very helpful staff. i would definitely stay here again. the outdoor patio is great!

when i arrived in the morning i was given the impression of 'what the fuk do you want?" from the desk staff which wasnt the nicest way to start my stay. the other breakfast staff and guides for the rest of the trip where a little nicer though. also... the us postal service just outside our window unloading at 3am in the morning super loudly made it nigh impossible to get any sleep.
it is a great hostel, well located, clean, the staff is good and they have lots of activities. the only problem is that it is the most expensive hostel in hollywood.

great locations and facilities. perfect place to explore hollywood and they appeared to offer free transport to the coast which is essential as public transport can be tricky in la. the only downside was an incredibly rude asian american girl on the front desk. she wasn't rude to us, but was completely condescending to her colleague right in front of us and also to our friend who wanted to leave us a message at the front desk- which apparently is 'impossible'. apart from that great stay.
the best place to stay at if you want a taste of hollywood. definitely going back again!
best in the us
great! would stay here again
great hostel

really lovely staff, great location just off hollywood blvd. people from all over the world come here and you hear so many stories from different walks of life. great social atmosphere. brilliant for first timers to hostels!
plugs and privacy pannels were excellent. i strongly recommend the hostel tour to the hollywood sign. it was great. good place to stay if you want to see hollywood.
top hostel, it's got everything you need and the staff are super friendly
one of my best hostels!! staffs are helpfull and kind!! excellents activities!
top hostel in la from the ones i've been to. really modern and well kept, very clean, almost gives you a feeling of a hotel. met a lot of cool people there, made some good friends. highly recommend

it's a good hostel, have a lot of facilities wifi, dry hair, it's pretty clean and have many activities for explore the city. beds have a strange sheet made with plastic, it makes you sweat and the show (even when is clean) is miserable!! the location is not that good, hollywood is just full of homeless people.

the facilities was adequate, and the security was rigorous -- you had to show your key every time to be buzzed in. there were 6 people in our room and an en suite bathroom and toilet. the turnover seemed high, with people moving in and out every night. i didn't take part in the activities, so i can't comment on that. this place is alright if you just need to crash for a couple of nights.

very social hostel--great common area to hang out and meet people. lots of events organized to get out and do things with people. bunks were great with outlets and a shelf. the bathrooms are in each room separately, which sometimes meant for waiting while somebody else was using--there were two other bathrooms that were useable though. overall a great experience.
very clean. attentive staff and plenty of them. facilities were excellent. a perfect place to base yourself in la. they had thought of everything.

great customer service, excellent facilities, 30 seconds walk to hollywood blvd, comfy mattress and an amazing variety of things for the free breakfast, really couldn't fault it! would definitely recommend anyone to stay here!
i've stayed with all 3 of the usa hostels and love them all. always very clean and great activities organised! will recommend for sure!
definitely a good hostel. good location, nice atmosphere. hollywood is maybe not the best place to stay in la, but if you want to stay there, visit this hostel.

very good hostel - goes the extra mile compared to a lot of hostels. daily activities ranging from walking tours to all you can eat bbqs. good atmosphere as well, location is good for hollywood, less than 10min walk to the metro.   one minor issue i found was that reception was always very busy and took a while to check in/get info etc as a result
the hostel was nice and had everything i needed, it did lack personality due to its large size though.

right in the middle of hollywood. really cool outdoor space with lounges to chill, relax and drink. they had free comedy and dinners some nights too and offer daily activities and tours. perfect if you want to stay in hollywood.

this hostel was not what we expected at all. the staff were unprofessional and you feel like they don't want you there. no rules and it was noisy all day and all night long..   we booked this hostel because we had such a great stay at usa hostel in san francisco. well, this was a bad experience, especially when it's so expensive. ain't coming back!

really good hostel and just off the strip! everything was very clean, efficient and in working order. rooms were just a tad pricey but i enjoyed the extras like the comedy night and the bar hopping (not sure what i had to pay for though)

this is a great hostel. i travelled solo and stayed in this hostel - met loads of new people, friendly atmosphere, great day trips organised by the hostel e.g. six flags theme park, free breakfast! la is massive so location will always be an issue at some point if you want to see more than hollywood. would definitely stay here again.
9/10 would bang again.
was a good choice for a place to start. many friendly people. nice to check out hollywood. everything is nearby. even the subway. very friendly and helpful staff.
really nice place, very clean with great facilities. quite expensive, might stop me from staying again, but great for a few nights.

one of the most disgusting hostels i have stayed at. one of the staff members was stoned 24/7 and messed up several of my bookings i had made. my dorm room smelt. good facilities but they really need to clean up their act. would not recommend staying at this hostel. i won't be back.

the location is perfect if you want to be right at the walk of fame but otherwise this is not a very fancy or clean area. the hostel offers lots of free stuff (walking tours to hollywood sign, shuttle to the beach) but this is often first come, first served. still the breakfast was fantastic (hot chocolate and butter/chocolate/jam spreading was missing). i loved the cleanliness of the hostel. the room is as dirty as your room mates are. minus: no checking in before 11am even if room is ready.

pretty cool hostel. very clean and organized. the atmosphere was lacking. people didn't seem like they wanted to meet anyone. staff were friendly but could have encouraged more hostel comraderie. perfect if you want to explore hollywood tourist attractions.

very clean and safe. it's very well located, just near all the touristic places of hollywood and close to the subway. good facilities, and good staff... that said, i have to say it's expensive. more expensive than other hostels around it. you pay for what you get. if you are not in a very tight budget, i think it's worthy. the breakfast was nice in general, but other spreads apart from butter (for example, peanut butter) would have been nice. i really liked the raisins & cinnamon point!

the location is perfect, right off hollywood boulevard, everything is in walking distance! very secure, friendly staff, great offers on tours, shuttles and pub crawls.... only thing that would be great is if the hostel had deals with the close by parking garages, fees are very high and almost doubled the cost of our stay...
honestly one of the best hostels ever!
quality back packers. everything you want is there. staff very helpful with transport and tourist attractions.
some unwanted hairs on my bed but other than that, great place! breakfast was a dinky but you can't ask for much at $40 a night. great place!
great location and great staff. but didn't like the atmosphere at all. would not come back because of that

front desk staffs are really kind. i arrived in la in the morning after riding night bus. so i need to rinse my hair, and the staffs allow to wash myself before check-in. because of that, i spent nice time in la. beds in dormitory are nice. beds have wall not to be seen, and also have personal lights. the location is good to go hollywood and universial studio. but at night, it can be little dangerous because little far from crowded hollywood avenue.

great hostel, great place to meet people from all over the world! the only thing is that american hostels are quite expensive and booking a hotel sometimes might be cheaper. however, i can only recommend it. they also offer a programme for the day, which is a great thing!
really nice and new hostel. offer many activities for day and night.

the place is situated in the best location that you can find in los angeles only one block of the fame hall in hollywood. if you want to go from the airport you need to take the flyway shuttle for only 8 usd.

the location is right in hollywood, awesome except that the window of my room and bathroom peered onto a parking lot where bums would hangout.  my biggest qualm is the en-suite bathrooms, people leave it messy, you have to wait to use it if someone else is in there, and hurry if someone is waiting.  perfect for meeting people. the outdoor lounge creates a social environment and i was up until 5am both nights of my stay chatting with people from around the world.  an unforgettable, awesome time!

i really enjoyed my stay at usa hostels hollywood. the facilities were excellent and i really loved that there was all-you-can-eat pasta the night i was there. i only stayed for one night and thought that was much easier than finding my own dinner. the location was close to hollywood boulevard but in general i felt a little unsafe in the whole area around, nothing to do with the hostel though. overall really enjoyed my stay and would recommend.

i was given a sheet with a big yellow stain in the middle and although the staff member changed it he did so with a sour look on his face, as if it were my fault. the rest of the staff are all very rude and disinterested, save for a couple. one bathroom per 8 bed is very limited. the tours and activities that are offered are ridiculously overpriced as are the beds themselves. not a bad place overral but if you want friendlier staff and better value then look elsewhere.
awesome hostel, totally recommended!
i would like to see more breakfast options such as more fruits, cereals with milk and frozen waffles.

cleaner than some hotels i've stayed in, and feels really spacious and bright. the staff are amazing and super friendly (minus one rude, miserable girl) big rooms, comfy beds, this hostel is great! close to walk of fame, oscars theatre, chinese theatre, hollywood blvd. the only negative is the small kitchen but that can't be helped. plus you can eat out on the patio if you can't get a seat inside. hike to runyan canyon is well worth it the views are stunning! would 100% recommend this place!
awesome experience, would definitely recommend!
a decent enough hostel, it's clean and has a good location but didn't think it's worth '$41 a night in an 8 bed dorm.
great hostel. noisy but confortable and friendly staff

what a great hostel! one of the best i have stayed at. breakfast was excellent, the rooms were really great. loved the full sized lockers with outlets... genius! and the privacy screens on the beds were great too, but they block the fan and no air conditioning is hard to adjust to. the staff were really nice, and helpful. the hostel was super clean, i saw them moving furniture to clean behind it every single day, i don't even do that at my house! i would stay again any time!

i am traveling from georgia to california. i did not want to spend an arm and a leg on a hotel, so a friend suggested i try staying at a hostel. upon arrival i am asked to show my passport- considering i came from ga i didn't have one. i was almost refused a place to stay because i was not traveling from abroad. i was allotted a bed for one night only and had to find another place for the duration of my trip.
place was clean and secure, however the staff were unfriendly and unhelpful.

the staff at check-in seemed high. they didn't really know what was going on in reference to our booking through hostelworld. they claimed the hostelworld reservation didn't go through and that this had never happened before. then after 30 minutes, they managed to get me and my 2 friends in the same room.   otherwise, hostel was great. clean, quiet, great location and free morning breakfast.

aging hostel but it was decent.  room smelt very musty so we had to open the windows and turn on the fan.  appreciated the power outlets and light at every bed, and also the power outlet in the lockers!  good location for hollywood but be aware that it gets very noisy at night especially on fridays as there are loads of party animals in the area.  hostel is located next to a parking lot so there were loads of people, making car noises and what not.  had to compromise and close some windows...

you pay for what you get, its more expensive than other options but its clean, secure, good area, breakfeast is more than decent, power points, lights and privacy at each bed, cleaned daily. lots of activities. defs stay here again
i liked it so much i didn't want to leave!! in fact, i haven't. i now work there :)

the hostel is conveniently located, just a short walk from hollywood boulevard. the place is very secure, has a huge amount of staff and is extremely clean. the beds have quite some privacy, even for bunks. the downside is that the place is quite noisy, also from sounds outside. breakfast is included, with fresh pancakes. also, lots of tours are organized and airport transport at good prices. would stay again.

very nice and modern hostel, very clean, central to most places in hollywood! rooms spacious and nice, comfy bedsn everyone was friend however i thought that the staff were very rude at times and very abrupt.

i definitely recommend this hostel if you're doing anything in hollywood. i walked to runyan canyon park for great hiking, chinese theatre, pantages theatre, and it's really close to the red line which i took to and from union station and universal studios. and it's near bus 222 that i took to warner brothers studios. and the beds were amazingly comfortable! my room was 2 girls and 4 guys, everyone was super respectful. the pans for making pancakes were warped. . . big deal lol

this is in a great location, right next to hollywood bvld. beds are comfy and staff are friendly and helpful for the most part but do not know everything so check on maps/internet if you want to go places. also while i was there the internet was not working which was frustrating!    however if you're looking for a decent, good value for money hostel and are relying on public transport in la this hostel does the job well.
very clean, well organised, good location, good atmosphere and funny pub crawl. i would stay there again.
i stayed here last year and its still a really great hostel to stay at if your in la! the breakfast options have changed though since :( no more yoghurt and banana

i've stayed at quite a few hostels and this is by far the best one! a very good location and i felt safe in the neighbourhood and at the hostel. the staff knows a lot when it comes to good hikes, which bus to take or nice places to eat.
great location, friendly staff, loved the individual lights and powerpoints for each bed. free breakfast was excellent as we're the nightly dinners for $7. would recommend staying here.

really awesome place to be. hostel arranges loads of free walks or tour sign ups, discount attraction tickets. staff so helpful with all questions. easy to meet people in the social areas, and the beds are super comfy. would definitely stay again if ever in la. 10/10! thanks!
nothing bad to say about this hostel. a lot of staff and pricy, but location is good.
location is everything, and it doesn't hurt that the rooms were tidy and the free breakfast in the morning was awesome too, will definitely recommend them to friends.

perfect when you only have one day in hollywood and want to see star avenue, universal studios etc. staff knowledgeable. great location. clean. fun but also very easy to get sleep. limo party was great. it's the perfect combination of being able to chill, to party or to sight see. slept very well very comfy beds. shuttle pick up to the airport. i can honestly say this was just the perfect place for that small time i had to see star avenue, hollywood blvd and the vip day trip to universal studios

great location - right in between hollywood blvd and sunset blvd. easy walk to lots of great places to eat as well.  rooms were clean, as was the bathroom.   great shuttle that runs between here and the hi at santa monica, or the airport, or other locations, which saved lugging our stuff around on the public buses. made life a lot easier!
good place just a bit pricey i checked in at 4 45 am because the train stopped running at 12 and they gave me no discount

this hostel was really good place to enjoy hollywood mood! so many traveler and young people stay here, so u can feel vibrant energy. price is also reasonable but hostel offer u breakfast, towel, entertainment, etc. if i visit la again, probably i'm gonna stay this hostel.

location is good, ten minutes walk to the subway. although it is a bit far away from the beach, there's free shuttle. the staff were always nice and helpful except the one that helped me checking in. great activities for meeting people. patio bbq is cool. met some awesome friends here!
great atmosphere for socializing, meeting new people and winding down. loved the comedy show upstairs. front desk was helpful in recommending places to go, things to see, and restaurants to eat at.
great location, friendly staff, central location, lot of organized activities, good breakfast. i would recommend to friends.

the staff was not helpful at all, everybody is a bit rude and this scheme of asking for your card every time you enter is really annoying. additionally, it was very expensive for what we got. the rooms are very small. last, all these signs trying to tell you how to behave made me feel in a boarding school

besides it´s amazing kitchen, this hostel serves a poor variety of food for breakfast. comfortable beds and awsome shower. the decoration is modern and they offer a lot of tours around the city, some for free. the staff is very helpfull and everything is pristine. it would be almost perfect if wifi worked better.

good security. have to pass through checks at two separate doors to get in. if you rent a car there is a parking lot you have to pay for across the street ($20/day but you may be able to get a discount if you pay for a few days or week at a time). walking distance to main attractions on hollywood blvd. across the street from the lgbt center. walking distance to enterprise rental cars. free breakfast. i didn't have the breakfast but someone said there are pancakes. hot water lasts in the showers.

it was a very friendly environment and the staff were very helpful and engaging. the location was fantastic as it was close to major attractions and other places were easily accessible via public transport. i had a very comfortable nights sleep throughout my stay and was very pleased with the security and cleanliness of the facilities.
great location in terms of its proximity hollywood boulevard but hollywood itself is a bit boring with not much happening. otherwise no complaints!

we had the worst snorer in our room! i got no sleep for 3 nights, also when we arrived the room and bathroom were pretty dirty and smelly..breakfast is very average. good activities planned though which is really convenient and the hostel hopper bus is awesome!

this is hostel is the best i have stayed at by far. their breakfast options and all you can eat dinners make your trip so much easier as you don't have to worry about spending so much money on food. the tours are well put together at affordable prices and delivered in such a great way. i really enjoyed staying here and would be back again in a heart beat!

really great! here for 2 nights. lovely staff, always helpful and friendly. right off hollywood blvd. close to universal studios on the metro. rooms good. with lockers. bathroom in room. very comfortable and relaxed.
great location, staff are fantastic!  very helpful and pleasant to be around.  breakfast was good.  i never got to do some of the activities they offered but they sounded great!  top job guys!
i wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.  this hostel is towards the higher end on price but worth every penny!

the hostel locates in a perfect place, very near to the hollywood walk of fame and the subway station as well. the staff are very friendly and helpful. i'd like to live here when i travel to la again.

i personally wouldn't stay in hollywood again but if that's what you want then this hostel is in a great spot. the only issue was that it was next to a carpark and there were often sketchy people hanging around the area.  this hostel was heaps of fun and was filled with australians!

location is great for hollywood but la is very spread out so no location is ideal. definitely not easy without a car even though the hostel is close to two train stations.  security was great  staff were friendly and helpful and there were plenty of activities run by the hostel.

i had a fantastic time staying at this hostel - the activities are great and i met some really nice people. it is a bit far from the beach, but i think that is because the beach is in the wrong place - not the hostel! parking is expensive, more like $20/night than the $12 advertised on the website. perhaps do a deal with one of the local lots? staff were good, though perhaps a little too laid back occasionally. breakfast might need a bit of attention (as ever!).
amazing hostel and staff! definitly a good place to meet people and party if it's what you're looking for! i'll be back !
only stayed for one night but was a pleasure experience.
the ambiance was so calm on the front outdoor patio. lighting was state of the art. a hollywood calm.

great place. beds were great, daily activities were fun, location was amazing, staff were okkk, breakfast was sooooo good and showers were perfect. highly highly recommend this place and all the usa hostels. they are worth every penny.
well located, and had everything you need supplied.

great place, our toilet kept over flowing, it's says turn off water and tell reception and i did but i don't think the chick wanted to get her hands dirty so she said we had to do it- not sure what would if happened if we made it worse i would of thought as a worker she would sort something like that out..some staff had attitude problems but i think maybe that's what happens if people staying there get employed,too cool to actually work n say hi to guests coz they are a guest, the rest was great
excellent location just off the walk of fame and near most attractions.  staff helpful and friendly.  lots of trips available, happy to stay here again :)

no location in la is excellent because it's so spread out but the hostel was right off the walk of fame.. lots near by and close to public transport. only things to complain about was whilst i appreciate the security if the staff just saw me walk out the door when i try to go back in 30seconds later they could just buzz me in not make me dig out my key card again, bit over the top... tryin for use the washing machines was hard too when the staff were always using them for tea towels etc...
one of the best hostels in the us! i love the vibe! perfect for flashpackers and budget travellers! awesome kitchen. nice interiors. laundry service sucks. breakfast is great. rooms are very nice.
great location, nice lounge outside
amazing staff especially tara and mellie

nice hostel. i felt safe staying here, it was relatively clean and the staff was nice. superb location just by the hollywood boulevard. would recommend if you are used to hostel environments and are looking for a chill, simple place to stay!
good location with helpful staff, themed nights and tours were a bonus and i will probably stay here again if i am in the area.
had a great time,  really good location and lots to do at the hostel during the nights. would definitely come back
i've stayed at this hostel a couple of times and it just keeps getting better!

i'm a oc native and i only stayed here one night because i got off work late and i missed the last train home. the atmosphere at the hostal reminded me of that of my european trips... the location was perfect to enjoy the rest night at the hollywood strip!

rooms were big, clean. great location, just off the strip and close to public transport though you can here a bit of noise from the strip at nights. staff were great. i would definitely stay here again.

i loved this hostel! the staff were super friendly, helpful and hilarious which made the stay really awesome. plus the kitchen facilities were great and they set up the luggage room really well - only staff members can go in and you have to present your bag number. this made me feel secure that no one would go through my stuff (lost a lock in my travels). cheers!

this hostel is great, location is perfect with everything you need on your door step! close to bus stops and subway too if you decide to go to the beach or any other activities located further away. activities put on by the hostel are also worth the money.. cheaper than on the street! breakfast is greay you can refuel for the day! only thing i would suggest is bringing earplugs.. you can't escape the snorers!!!
it's a minute walk from hollywood boulevard! it has a very nice terrasse outside where you can hang out and take a few drinks. there's a nice kitchen to hang out too, and the rooms are okay.
best hostel i have ever stay at!

i feel very sorry for submit late,i come back to my country, the time differences is horrible! have to say this is the best choice in la, very lucky to be here,and the shuttle bus is very convenient by the way,thanks a lot!

it was the best hostel i have never stayed in. the staff were great and the atmosphere and location was brilliant. i highly recommend it to anybody who wants to stay within central hollywood. i had a wonderful time!
clean, friendly hostel in a really good location right in hollywood boulevard and does great breakfast...what more can you want from a hostel?!
the staff is very helpful and they have answers to all your questions :) well organized,shuttles,bbq's,pub crowls etc.location is good,not even a minute to hollywood blvd. very clean and nice people!

best hostel i ever stayed! i'd highly recommend it. the only cons, was at the guy who checked me in, the gay one, i'm not homophobic because i'm a gay guy myself, the way the rules of the hostels were said sounded a bit condescending.

nothing really to fault about this hostel - a really high standard. location was good, right on hollywood blvd and close to a lot of main tourist attractions. staff were good and always happy to help. you wouldn't regret staying here.

a gorgeous hostel with friendly staff! it's also right off of hollywood blvd.   i had a great time here and all of the facilities were in great condition. they also have loads of walking tours and events to keep you busy! a great free breakfast and they even have flavoured coffee syrups!!

great location just off the hollywood strip. 5 minutes to the walk of fame and the metro station which will take you to universal studios. great kitchen and general store only 5 minutes away. lots of free or cheap activities. i stayed for 2 nights and preferred santa monica but if you want to stay in the thick of things this is your place. pretty expensive for a hostel but i would consider it value

the dinner at night are bit pricy 7$ for only pasta and also  the  tours to berverlly hill a bit pricy because done by public transport and did not inclue the return fair      over all nice  placeto stays

i highly recommend here. a little bit far from the metro station(5~10minutes on foot, 5 blocks away from the station) but its just located in the heart of the hollywood and quite near to the universal studio. there are homeless people on the street but the security here is very good, staffs are really kind, facilities are much more than i expected. and you can reserve a shuttle to santa monica beach, disney land, or universal studio, etc with reasonable price.

one guy on night reception duty just wasn't doing his job. around 11pm, our group had to buzz ourselves in, having waited for about 10mins to be let in. he suddenly ran down the stairs and swore at us for doing that. 10 minutes later, i saw him swinging his keys, casually hanging around the luggage storage area, again not at reception. another group of boys buzzed themselves in and he bolted down the corridor to have another power trip with them. really unprofessional.
all i can say is everytime i have stayed at this hostel, i've had the time if my life and the staff are beyond brilliant.

great sofa area at the front to meet people and discuss the previous nights bar crawl. although the area doesn't seem safe (which some reviews said) there's enough people around at all times and it wasn't an issue.

excellent hostel, great activities planned and organised by really good staff! it was also the cleanest and best run hostel i've been to in a long time. only thing it misses to make it the best is the most important thing.... a bar (or simply to sell beer!)

no air conditioning and poor ventilation with inappropriate supply of fans, makes this place pretty unbearable in the hotter weather.     the common area outside is a bit weird and dark and the people hanging around are typically pretty ghetto. they also source a lot of their staff as free labour (for allowing them to stay for free), so this results in staff not always being professional or knowledgeable.     $56/night for this is terrible value.

very professionally run hostel, with excellent security. location good, 20 minute walk from metro station, which will take  you everywhere. breakfast was average, could maybe do with a wider  selection. pillows very lumpy. beach shuttle  not as advertised... only ran once a week, that we could see and only took the  first 15 people with their name on the list.
very close to the metro stations, which is a great thing, if you don't decide to drive a car! very close to hollywood!

expensive but worth it for the location. the dorm rooms are big however no aircon makes them extremely hot in the evening.. although there was a heatwave in la whilst i was there, the single noisy fan in the corner tries to make up for this but just moves the warm air around.    other than that, excellent staff, great laundry facilities and good security with security gates and lockers.

most of the staff were really friendly and accommodating.  the great atmosphere over a game of beer pong was great and the pub crawls and tours that are offered are all of good value and a great way to meet others staying.  really good friendly atmosphere with good breakfast and close to all that hollywood and la has to offer.

awesome hostel! so much fun. met some awesome people :) the only thing that sucked.... was i got my car towed at 230 am.... and had to go get it at the impound lot... hahaa. but i suppose that was my own fault, just be careful on parking if you do have a rental vehicle or anything :)
only not so clean area of the hostel was the dishes and dishracks in kitchen. evwything else was great. nice breakfast, free coffee, goodnsecurity, comfy beds....thanks

best hostel ever, everyone in the room got on so well and we all had plenty to drink!  beer pong was funny, great to sit outside and chill with everyone.  johnny on reception is a legend, keeps the place going!  big thanks, amazing atmosphere here.

coming from a party hostel where everyone  wanted to make friends, including the staff, compared to that hostel this hostel lacked atmosphere, but i guess that is because its a whole different target market, needless to say though, the fact that you got so much for your money and the prime location really does make up for it. i liked the fact that you held things like luau parties for guests to get to know each other, it was just less enforced than in previous hostels that ive stayed in.
was an amazing stay, amazing staff and they knew how to entertain their customers.

great location, locked front door at all times and very social. nearly all times of the day there will be other travellers hanging out at the front and at night the drinking and partying starts! literally 20 seconds from hollywood blvd.

staff has high fluctuation, 2/3 seem to be new... because they have a program that u can stay for free if u work for hostel... so they have a lot of people there, but its not always sure which one is doing what

i just stayed for one night, so maybe the activities these are awesome but i didn't explore.  good: nice staff to give you all the suggestion even discount for uber. laundry available even though it maybe fully occupied for sometimes. very good location, very close to the hollywood street.  bad: people living there are not nice, they seldom talk or say hello. the room is small with 6 males and luggage is easily be a mess. only one bathroom and restroom for 6, not enough.

the hostel had good communal areas where you could sit and drink meeting other people. it also hosted many events, such as pubcrawls, comedy nights, etc which gave the hostel a good atmosphere. in addition, there were shuttle buses organized for almost every day of the week to go to a chosen location (sometimes free),  the dorm beds come with a privacy cover and shelf with a power point and light which was really handy. the staff were very helpful and friendly.
great location and helpful staff.

loved it, stayed in many hostels this was the best, such high security, really strict with who comes in and out and organisation really good for trips and hikes, so easy to make friends if you join in activities. loves that meals were cooked for everyone to eat togther so you can meet people there too. come here if you wanna make 100 friends and love drinking. fit staff too 🙊
free breakfast, kitchen with a huge fridge, hollywood ;-)   i would stay here again.
i had a great stay, nothing more to say :)

the hostel itself is great but i didn't like the atmosphere. not a good place to make friends, it seems people there are more worried to look fancy and stare their cellphones on the nice sofas there than socialize.

great hostel, loads of activities organised each day, cheap and well coordinated. they offer free accommodation if you're there for three weeks or more willing to work for them. good food selection at breakfast. tony and matt were legends.
an enjoyable experience overall. right in hollywood and tons of fantastic day and night activities to participate in.
the hostel is good, but outside every night is very noisy.  breakfast not so good.
this hostel was absolutely amazing! the best hostel i have ever stayed at!  i have not been bribed or anything as such, i am being very honest here. it was great!
my friends and i lived in there and have a good time with other friends from different countries. nice hotel and we will choose again..

my stay was awesome and many thanks to the helpful, friendly, funny and amazin staff! and especially thanks to johnny, steven, luis, matt, tony and michael! they are awesome and made my stay a wonderful experience that i won't forget!!

this hostel had one of the best atmospheres from my entire trip in the us, everyone was keen to meet people, socialise and have a few drinks. rooms were pretty spacious. good social area outside. hollywood wasn't the greatest part of town imho, but if i was to head back there for some reason, i'd stay in the usa hostels.

best hostel i#ve ever seen!   it's clean, in a great location (one step out of the door and you're on the hollywood blvd), close to a metro stattion, awesome stuff that halps you with everything and amazing offers!
the place is very nice, and the best of all are those vans and the tours you offer.
there was no wifi in rooms, and so the lobby had people only using wifi, and not social people during the day.
the best hostel in town for sure!
super awesome atmosphere, everyone was really friendly and it was easy to meet people.
great location and staff...recommended!
good one!
cool place to live!
lovely clean hostel with very helpful staff! great location and plenty of additional activities organised that u can participate in during day and night.
nice hostel with lots going on, friendly staff and people. good atmosphere and decent location.
great staff, great atmosphere. i had a great stay here - would recommend it to anyone.

they are amazing. .on daily basis they have very nice activities n the morning and n the night.. u shouldn't miss these activities. . they made my vacation. . i really enjoyed staying there.. and i will stay n there sf hostel as well. . they are the best

the outdoor patio was awesome, a good place to hang out and relax during the day and cool place to meet people during the evening. great bbq organized by the hostel, awesome pubcrawl on friday night!   the hostel is next to many bars and nightclubs, so the nightlife was great. during the daytime however i'd suggest you leave for venice beach, santa monica, bc downtown hollywood had, imo, notg interesting to see. also some weirdos outside the hostel but very safe in the hostel!
everything was just great! keep up the good work!

extremely clean with very courteous staff. location is ideal for hollywood, which is actually a very nice place. ssecurity is awesome and i love the outdoor lounge. lots of activities and excursions. so many things to see and do within the general area. only one bathroom, or so i thought. turns out there were also halway bathrooms that i wasn't aware of.
great hostel and very centrally located to the hollywood attractions. the staff are really friendly and helpful!
the hostel itself is quite good, but the location whilst convenient is right next to hollywood boulevard which is a bit grotty.    good breakfast facilities.

this hostel is very close to walk of fame. typical usa hostel, with a kitchen and a hang out room. i personally dont like staying in hollywood which is why i wont stay here but thats not the hostels fault. hostel has standard beds and is clean.
all staff very friendly and helpful.  would help if kitchen was bigger. breakfast time always very crowded.

i enjoyed my stay. i had a negative experience with the shuttle recommended by the hostel. there were events organized by the hostel but not as many as i would expect because they market themselves as a party hostel. could have more nighttime events.

the hollywood district is not safe. but the hostel is excellent. it refreshes my impression of the idea "hostel".  the only one thing which was considered inconvenient is that the hole in the toilet seat is too small for males.
i think it's the best you can find in the middle of hollywood. breakfast is very good, location is perfect, staff is amazing. i will certainly stay there when i go back to la.

nice hostel. didn't have "proof of onward travel" since i drove there from instate. they were nice enough to let it go but said i couldn't extend my reservation. so in the case an emergency happens and you have to extend your stay, maybe bring your work schedule for proof if you're from instate?

absolutely fantastic! the staff were super friendly (except for one dude on kitchen duties :/ ), it's small but very very cozy and pretty, making convo was really easy. excellent crowd and activities, a lil out of the way but close to the metro. recommend!!!
i live location

staff were very friendly and helpful at all times no matter what you asked! rooms were clean and great atmosphere throughout the whole hostel! in a great location walking distance to most tourist attractions and public transport. only thing is there are quite a lot of homeless in this area but cause no trouble!
i had some doubts about the cleanliness of my sheets when they gave it to me
second time i've stayed here, just as good as the first. good shuttle service on offer to la tourist destinations too

i definitely recommend this hostel. the outside area is very nice to hang out and meet people. also, usa hostels encourage drinking and parties....which is great from my pov. if you are traveling through california, check out the usa hostel in sf as well.

i dont think it value for 50usd per night, they put me on the 1st floor down to the hall way last dorm, it was right beside to a parking lot and was a staurday night, around 3am they were the loudest music play by car and people drink and shoutting, around 4am we heared drunk people kicking and talking loud over and 6am the trush truck was on cleaning about 30min super loud as well, i didnt had sleep that night and worst was needed to catch a flight at the second day, not recommened.
staff were the highlight of this hostel, it is super close to hollywood attractions but doesn't have fanstastic baras/food close by.
staff were extremely helpful and friendly and the place as a whole was clean and very welcoming. would 100% stay here again.

really great place - definitely out best hostel so far. the people at reception were really helpful and there is a really fun atmosphere here but most importantly the breakfast is amazing - those pancakes and worth the money alone !
staff were very friendly and helpful. they showed you around and explained everything when you first arrive which was great.
i had my hair straightener stolen from the bathroom i assume by the cleaners cause i was in a room full of boys and i doubt they would have wanted it
i had a great time staying, staff were helpful and there was a range of extra activities available.
nice hostel, would stay there again. i have to mention the staff are outstanding, they were very helpful
great staff that encouraged more of a party atmosphere out in the front seating area. good location, very close to hollywood blvd without being too loud.
great hostel!
fantastic hostel ticked every box not a single thing i can think of to tell you that isn't great!
the hostel was great, very neat, clean, fun, and with very good facilities.
you are awesome guys =d

i loved it here!  i'm a really shy quiet person but i managed to meet and make friends here.   also shout out to the reception blonde with a (british accent i believe) works in the mornings. really took care of the guys in our room after an incident with someone who had too much to drink.    i will most likely be staying here or over at podshare when i visit la
great hostel, great location, plenty of activities free or low cost, free breakfast, rooms are great, some power points in lockers are also great
my stay at the hostel for a night was perfect

i have mixed feelings about this place. the location is awesome and the front patio is a great hangout spot. it is also nice that there is a bathroom inside the dorm. however, i booked for 2 people but they put us in separate rooms. the apathetic front desk staff member, jaimie kept repeating that they sometimes can't put groups together... sorry but 2 people doesn't count as a group! i wouldn't say she was rude but just cold/uncaring. luckily, another staff noted to give us $10 for the mistake

if you want to meet people in a nice athmosphere next to the hollywood boulevard,  this is exactly the right place to do. i had a wonderful time. thanks to all the nice staff, who always tried to find a solution for every problem or question.
very friendly helpful staff, room was lovely clean and spacious. decent sized lockers, well located hostel. enjoyed my stay!

i don't have anything negative to say about this place. met some amazing people on the patio and through the hostel's very well organized events. was easy to get around as it's close to two metro stations and has great connections with the hostel hopper. friendly staff, but louie was the most memorable because he'd hang out with the guests on the patio and make sure everyone was having a good time on the pub crawl.

this hostel is a great location for people wanting to visit the hollywood area. they offer numerous tours/shuttles (some are free), and $7 all-you-can-eat dinners. the rooms are a good size, with a clean en suite bathrooms. the night-lights and power sockets for each bed are great. some staff were friendly and welcoming, others were not and seemed to have an attitude.
felt just like home away from home. $7 all you can eat dinner some nights is amazing :) lovely staff always happy to help.
good location, good vibe and helpful staff. the best thing was the privacy pods on the beds with a power point, light and little shelf. all hostels should have these. would stay here again.

loved my stay at this hostel! greatly recommended. rooms were clean, each bed had it's own socket and night light.  bathroom was clean as well. the kitchen was ok, breakfast in the morning could include milk. patio in the front had a very good ambiance and very great for socializing.     would stay there again!

great hostel. incredibly easy to meet people and make new friends. the walking tours are great as are the pub crawls and the shuttle buses to other places. bit of a dodgy area of a night time but besides that, i loved it. would definitely stay there again.

the location simply cannot be beat. it's just off of hollywood blvd. i also loved the privacy pods with the little light, shelf, and outlets. the upstairs hangout room was underutilized; not sure why. the free breakfast was great! make sure you sign up early for the shuttle to venice beach, i had to take a different shuttle which wasn't free but still a pretty good deal. i saw the people who worked at the hostel constantly cleaning the place which was nice. i'd stay here again!

got yelled at by staff. like full on actually yelled at. they told us breakfast was served at 6 and i had to leave for the airport at 6.20 however they didn't have breakfast yet. i asked the guy who was setting it up if maybe he could just grab me a bagel or something and he went off at me. he was humiliating and unnecessary and just unacceptable.  was also not impressed by the cleanliness since we were baking pancakes out of the sam's pan for hours with batter that wasn't cooled. tour was bad
first hostel visit ever in the states. i liked it a lot. staff could have told us that there were extra bathrooms and not only the ones in the room. other than that i was happy with my stay.
all pub crows around de world are free, in this hostel we have to pay 15 dolars, does no make sense...  but in general, this hostel is good.

the hollywood boulevard is a little bit sketchy but we were ok. there is a parking lot across the street, we paid 50$ for 3 night. hostel has all equipped kitchen, ensuite room was really nice. according to my reservation i remembered that the tax was included in the room price but when we checked in. it was not :(  also the receptions in european hostels are a bit more friendlier.
great hostel. highly recommended. the social atmosphere is fantastic.
compared with other hostels, the breakfast is not that good.

i love this hostel, i met a lot of people there... the rooms are pretty comfortable... great security... the staff is not as friendly as the hostel, but you can handle with that.... they have a shuttle service from hostel to lax for 16 usd... i'll stay here again on my next la visit.

the excellent breakfast gets you started. plenty of entertaining activities while indoors.   central location is perfect for exploring l.a. (not just the tourist attractions but the real los angeles.)  safe...frequent law enforcemt patrols & close proximity of police station, the security team keep the large homeless population at bay & brazen panhandlers in check.  front desk personnel are either very friendly or very unfriendly.  la is known for 100 degree days but there is no air conditioning

the usa hostel in hollywood is not as good as their one in san fran. excellent location, good staff, but no real indoor area conducive to hanging around and meeting people (tv is always on). there is an outdoor area but this gets way too hot. the rooms at night also get pretty stuffy. good wifi, decent kitchen & free continental breakfast provided. also a great pub crawl put on by the hostel and the area is fantastic for the night life! the night shift worker needs to calm down slightly.
some of the staff proved to be unhappy and unreasonable at times.
usa hostel is a nice hostel with a very good location , staff is really helpful , would love to go back and stay
i like very much this hostel for the location and atmosphere
cool common aria out side. best standard of all hostels i stayed in usa florida/ los angeles.  (that doesn't take much)
글쎄요... 여러가지 행사를 많이하는건 좋은것 같아요. 무료투어 행사도 진행하고.. 근데 전체적으로 시간도 안지키고... 너무 늦게까지 술마시는 사람이 많은데다 시끄러움
i pad works quite slowly.
all good. all roubd.
awesome!!!
the hostel was ok but the area was really bad. it's very close by to the walk of fame but this is it! nothing to do in this area! it's 1,5 hours away from the beach and the nice areas!

if you wanna have fun in la, this is the hostel that you are looking for! excellent atmosphere. the staff is super nice and very organized. normally i don't like pub crawl kinda parties but the one that they offer was so much fun. their branch in san francisco was also awesome. these guys really know how to run a hostel. do not even hesitate a sec to book them, go head!!
we met a lot of great people and the staff was great too

los angeles is a very big city, it would be difficult to be very well-located, since everything is spread off. the hostel is near hollywood boulevard, but far from everything else. the little courtyard is great, i'd like every hostel has one like this! that is the best place to meet people.

hostel is right off the walk of fame, from where you can see the hollywood sign. there are pan handlers and homeless people around, but safe enough. walls were a bit thin and someone was doing wheelies in the neighbouring parking lot the first night. however everything else was very good, including the free tours.
this hostel is in a really good area of hollywood, staff are very nice and really helpful, there is good areas to meet people.
an all-round great experience. clean and fun. most of the staff were great, except one had a negative attitude.
great hostel- free unlimited pancakes, just off hollywood blvd, incredibly helpful staff, very safe and secure! take quarters if you want to use the laundry facilities.

hostel is right in the middle of hollywood and has a great mix of people. the check in process is brilliant with a private escort taking you to your room and explaining all the features. wifi is brilliant and the power outlet in the beds (and lockers) is great. it is fairly pricey however this is la.
not the cheapest hostel but by far the best facilities i have ever experienced :) great helpful staff too
excellent attention to details in the design of the dorms;very convenient location;friendly,courteous, helpful staff; awesome outdoor patio . my 3rd stay here and will be back. .
thoroughly enjoyed the experience. kim (the blond female) was awesome in making sure my stay was comfortable. a very nice lady. mellie was great also! this is a good hostel at a great location.
very clean hostel!

1 bathroom for 8 people is not enough. nice outdoor area. next to hollywood boulevard, which has not so much going on, really, so i wouldn't want to stay in that area for more than a day or two. most people working there seemed over worked, but i find that is the case in other usa hostels as well. they helped you out and answered your questions though. ok for a couple of nights.

my experience in this hostel was fantastic. the usa hostel branch is the best i've stayed in so far. i've met so many good people, nice location, safe and clean. no free parking, but you can park your car across the street for a discouny if you tell you're staying at usa hostels.

the hostel is clean, safe, plays music during the day, but dont expect to meet interesting people there.  la is hard city to get.. so you will meet typical  tourists. the types ones that dont travel alone, too cool for school.the front desk staff , that blond girl..american one.. likes to play cool, but was very mean, when i asked her if i could print a paper for free, she said once yes.. but i didnt hear and second time i asked she said i told u yes.. very mean voice.

the hostel is in a good location, pretty much off the walk of game and a short walk to the chinese theatre. loved the privacy screens on the beds and free brekkie is always a bonus. would come back again.

asked at the reception how to get to the hollywood sign, got: "here's a citymap, info is all on the back!" he seriously refused to explain it to me... very bad and unprofessional customer service! thx johnny
for sure one of the best hostel i have ever been! yes it was quite expensive but considering you are in hollywood blv  is not  justified???
best hostel i have every stayed in!!
i liked the free hikes and shuttle to venice beach.
though didn't speed long time in the hostel, but the stuffs are so kind to help me. great yard to relax and meet new friends.

the staff are amazing. super friendly, very knowledgeable. one night our group had a shady character follow us all of the street and the bloke behind the desk looked after it all and hearded 10 drunks up stairs no worries the beds are some of the best i have had, they have a metal hide away style thing that has some powerpoint's etc - awesome idea. i'm 6"3 and still managed to squeeze ok too.  nightly events are sick, the meals and everything.  best hostel i have been too
good hostel, but hollywood was not my favorite place to stay.

generally, the hostel is very good. it is very clean, and the general environment is very friendly. i like the breakfast, which is very convenient and save you a lot of trouble. i also like the kitchen, so that i can cook my own foods with all the cookers and dishes provided. i like the bed and the lockers too, because they provide several plugs for charging electronic devices. though it is a bit more expensive than other hostels, it is worth the money.
the staff were very helpful with recommending places for me to visit. i had a great time and will consider staying here next time i go on a trip in california!

location great & activities provided by the hostel on a budget were a bonus. the 2 that i went on were with staff who had knowledge of the area and enthusiasm! however, at reception the staff were hit and miss. generally you had to wait for them to finish their conversation before they acknowledged you. the additional shower (though there is no block, just the odd one) was really dirty and uninviting. the rooms were ok but 6 girls & 1 shower means an additional shower block is necessary!
great hostel , really comfy stay...and a bunch of really great friendly staff
amazing hostel. so clean. very safe. the staff was incredible too. highly recommend this place! a bit expensive for a hostel, but you definitely get what you pay for.

it was my first time travelling on my own and this hostel has a nice outdoor area, where you can hang out and meet  people. beside that there is a lot of social activities. the rooms are clean, the staff friendly, delicious breakfast. perfect!
very good hostel, highly recommended.
very good hostel, good dorm room, clean, well equipped and quiet. good staff and ideally located in the heart of hollywood. i recommend it.
very clean, well organized and in a good location. local restaurants and cafés are great. delicious smoothies down hollywood blvd at juices fountain.

a very social, safe and fun hostel. its so close to everything in hollywood, and the staff have great advice to negotiate public transport etc to get around la. my only regret i wish i stayed longer! i loved the idea for all the walking groups, night dinners and i loved how social this place was. the rooms are really spacious and i love the fact you have your own powerpoint and light in your bed. highly recommend this place
10/10--all areas !!
great staff, great atmosphere,  great location.  i've stayed in all three locations and this one is definitely the best

more expensive than other hostels i've stayed at, but good overall!! there were lots of organised activities like $6 all you can eat barbeque and tours and things, great outdoor space and good atmosphere! also beds are good with a light, shelf, and powerpoint for each bunk, and lockers in the rooms too.

excellent stay, my favourite hostel in the states. great atmosphere, easy to meet people and have a good night. lots of activities during the day and the staff are very helpful. very secure and in a really good location being so close to hollywood. would happily stay here again, thanks for a good stay.

great hostel in a great location. regular activities organised and a decent breakfast. staff were always cheerful and up for a chat. only problem we had was our dorm shower wouldn't drain properly so showers had to be quick and we would have to wait a while for the next person. will definitely stay again.
great location if you want to see hollywood and other central sites. quite a noisy gruby area but that's hollywood i guess! no complaints about the hostel. breakfast was great!

not that there's much to do to fix it, but every sound: footsteps doors whispers in halls or courtyard every sound carries into the rooms and makes it almost impossible to fall or stay asleep, even with earplugs.  i've stayed in hi and other hostels all over the world, this is the worst acoustically. that is too bad because of the location and staff both are exceptional. just had to say it.

as per my review of usa hostels san francisco, if big corporates pour lots of money into a hostel it ends up looking something like this. big, well planned, standardised procedures, etc. if that's your thing then this place is perfect for you - if you are looking for somewhere with "character" then this probably isn't right for you.
seriously good hostel in a great location, staff are amazing and make you feel more than welcome , especially the aussie!! fantastic socialising area out front 5*

unfortunately i checked out two days early due to uncleaness and uncomfort. the rooms had bad odor, the location is horrible, the kitchen and breakfast was a bit filty and un-spacious. aside from the money convinced, hopefully these concerns are resulted for the next guest.
great hostel and easy to meet people.

pretty good location. it's near all the weird dudes who dress up. i met batman and he spat on me. i tried to climb the fence to the place next door but the barbed wire cut me lol. the hostel is actually expensive though. you can make your own la experience at home by just emptying your garbage bin in your living room and inviting that crazy guy who always yells at you when you walk past his house over. how does he even have a house? is that a government program? i'm going to google it.
very nice hostel, confortable, wifi ok . sweet garden !!!
staff are awesome, and really helpful
location  and facilities

this was a nice, clean, hostel. great location-- couple blocks away from the train. there was a bar/club crawl on the night i arrive which i enjoyed, even though i'm not a club-loving person. it felt like i was the only american there but it was fun. the dining area was really small and so i ate at the bar/lounge/gaming area upstairs (i got angry looks from the staff who were cleaning the area at 8am). no matter, i just basically needed a place to store my bag and sleep during the night.

great location - close to runyon canyon, walk of fame, hollywood blvd and shopping. also very close to subway stations, buses and hop on-hop off bus stops. hostel has good facilities and i felt safe. staff at front desk are friendly and helpful and are happy to organise airport transfers, certain tours and shuttles on your behalf. would stay here again.
great hostel. staff are friendly and helpful. location is close to everything.
can't imagine staying anywhere else. if you want to be in hollywood, this place is the best.
really clean and well looked after hostel. would stay again. great atmosphere.

amazing hostel, would recommend to anyone wanting an up beat hostel in hollywood! plenty of activities going on every day and lots of places to socialize and meet new people. would defiantly stay here again!
very busy hostel, great for party atmosphere.  probably go somewhere else for a more chilled out vibe.
best hostel i've stayed at! different activities every day, great staff, close to everything, fun vibes. 100% recommend
i had a lovely stay at usa hostels!! security was very good and the staff were absolutely exceptional!!! i had a lovely stay, thank you :)
very near hollywood walk of fame...location is superb!

a few good things: breakfast is incredibly generous and good, the whole hostel is very clean! however, i did not really enjoy my stay there. the staff can be helpful but not friendly at all.. usually i go to hostel because of the friendly and curious people working there, and i haven't had any interaction with them, not even a "good morning"... that's sad. also it is incredibly noisy during the night (bars and usps). it is quite expensive for what it is, not a great experience.
this is a very big hostel. everything is clean, nice room, nice common lounge. but i wanted better breakfast.

a pretty large hostel and it feels like it (ie not very personal), but otherwise it was still quite social. australians dominated the clientele.    everything was clean and the beds were comfy, the breakfast was a bit lacking.

a very nice clean hostel. lots of activities to sign up for in the day and night. (comedy show... so bad it was good!)  the lounge bar is open every night even when empty but it wasn't too noisy past midnight and the kitchen was open all night for quietness.  the privacy boards on the bunks were good but at the same time make people more isolated so good and bad.  a very good location.  90% of people there were australians because it's their summer holidays in our winter i guess!
fairly good place located right on the hollywood boulevard (which is not a big pro). great facilities, organized activities, friendly atmosphere. generally good.
it is between two subway station, a very convenice place.  restaurants, bars are nearby.

this place was average. processed, carby breakfast, a ridiculous number of rules and signs, uncomfortable and cheap bedding, and best of all you are paying through the nose for it! i was only here as a transfer to the airport and to get some shopping in, and thankfully did not stay long - on the upside, it is clean, safe and the staff were very cheerful.

although i wasn't a huge fan of hollywood, this hostel allows excellent access and organizes many tours daily. it is super clean and very secure at night with no visitors allowed inside. the bar can get lively and the outdoor seating area is excellent for relaxing in the day or having beeeers at night.

it was a pleasant stay at usa hostels hollywood! i was stayed in the 6-mixed bedroom:  - the room was very clean with real bed, blanket, bed linens and a fan.  - the bathroom was very clean with free fresh towels and hot shower.  - the shared kitchen was big enough with free breads, oatmeals, fresh fruits and hot beverages.    the location was also great! it just blocks away from the metro train station and bus stops. i'll definitely be back to stay in usa hostels hollywood, highly recommended!
bathtub was full of hair, mattress wasn't clean, the door lock broken on the last day
staff is super cool, a place worth staying.
despite some of the smelly, unhygienic, weird people that were put in the same mixed-dorm room with me, i had an overall pleasant stay.

great location and fabulous choice of breakfast. extremely convenient. rules about quiet hours and cleanliness need to be upheld however and personal space in the room needs to be respected. wonderful staff who were happy to help.
i loved staying here! i think that it is a great base to explore the city and it was a great place to just hang out if you didn't want to go out! i would definitely stay here again!
great location just off hollywood blvd. and easy to find. staff were very helpful. good deals in the bar.
one of the best hostels i've ever stayed in. the usa hostels chain is brilliant and i would definitely use them again!

i´ve been staying in hostels for many years and it is the first time i get such rude staff as i got at usa hostel la.  location is ok, but the hostel is not good.  long waits to use the bathroom, pub crawl sucks, staff don´t give a sh**t about you.    i would not recommend this hostel
awesome hostel! great location and atmosphere.
stuff were sooo kind! we can spentgreat time. but unfortunately my roommate was little bit noisy.

great stay at the hostel. ideally placed just a short walk from hollywood blvd. plenty of activities taking place at the hostel everyday and the staff are extremely helpful.  shared bathroom is cleaned everyday. take the red bus tour which takes you to the best places to see in los angeles.

without doubt the best hostel i've stayed in in 3 years of travelling.. security was top notch, location was central, rooms and bathrooms were super clean, loved the privacy of the bunks! staff were friendly and informative! absolute 100% 😀
dorm room and bathroom both needed cleaning. facilities were minimal and not enough for the size of the hostel -e.g. there was no room for breakfast even though we tried several times.
very warm welcome and helpfull staff. thank you.
great hostel, very sociable.
great location, excellent activities, lovely staff. stay here!

the security is one of the best of all the hostels where i've stayed. you have to show your room card key whenever you pass past the lobby and there are lockers with outlets inside (but you have to bring your own padlock). concerning location, it is right next to the walk of fame and it has three parking lots nearby. however, there is only one bathroom with shower per dormitory of 8 and no communal facilities (which is clearly not enough!) and the cleaning should be done more often.

excellent hostel. organised activities every day, clean place, professional staff and whole hostel organisation, nice breakfast, power chords right next to every pillow and in locker box, privacy for everyone even in 8 bed dorm, advanced security. 5 minutes from metro station and 1 minute from holywood boulevard. what else to wish.
give information about the pariking!!!

it does get hot in the dorm rooms but love the free wifi and if your from australia take a tube of vegimite you will need it for all they had was jam and butter for the bagels and toast for the free brekkie in the morning which was pretty epic
lyn and myself had a great time loved everything about the place highly recommend very clean love it.

great place to meet people of all ages, always something going on to explore more of la and the many nearby bars. only negative is the metal lockers which make too much noise when people check out early. if you're a fan the movie point break, check out the point break live show in the bar directly down the road on santa monica blvd.

stayed here for a couple of days in the beginning of november.  check in processes was quick and explained throuroughly.  rooms are clean as are the ensuites. staff always had time to help give you directions or sightseeing tips.  and whenever is extended my stay they always tried to keep me in the same room.   met some really nice people in the patio/smoking area.   one thing i wish i'd done was go on one of the sightseeing trips they arrange for people staying.   highly recommended!!

this hostel had a lot going on. events everyday, as well as being pretty much in the heart of hollywood. a 2 minutes walk to hollywood boulevard... very good on security - you had to show your key-card to be buzzed into the hostel proper. great range of items very close by, and the staff were always happy to help!

i really enjoyed my stay at this hostel. all the activities they organise make it a sociable place and great for solo travellers. the kitchen is one of the best i've ever seen in a hostel and the breakfast was good too. it's great for hollywood boulevard but at night this area looks a bit rough - i never saw or heard of any actual trouble, but it's not as glam as it sounds! still, if you want to stay in hollywood this is probably  the best value you'll get.

we had a great experience at usa hostels hollywood. we did not spend much time at the hostel other than to sleep and have breakfast, but it seemed to have a great ambiance and offered tours and activities at a reasonable cost. it was clean and the staff were friendly and helpful. also, it had a great breakfast included in the cost per night. i would definitely recommend staying here :)
it is a good hostel.
i stayed in 8-bed room, everything was great !   but if you're tall i recommend you to take the upper bed. the lower one was too short, i can't even sit on it properly (i'm 180 cm)

very secure hostel. i was only in transit through la but the staff where extremely helpful and the hostel organises plenty of activities to do every single day. the location is very central to hollywood blvd which is a good and and a bad thing depending on the type of trip you are after. the hostel itself however is a fun and safe environment to make friends and enjoy la.

friendly staff. free wifi. current adapter next to the bed and plenty in the common areas, lockers inside the room. many activities organized by the hostel. central location close to many attractions. breakfast included. big kitchen. nice patio to chill out or wait. cheap beer in the bar. nice lounge to read or watch tv. it's like the perfect hostel.
thanks to kim for being a supportive staff member!

great location, friendly staff, and an excellent value for the money. it can be a little noisy at times at night - due to it's proximity to clubs and bars. if you're a light sleeper bring a pair earplugs for sleeping

very good hostel! location is perfect. the bunkers have individual lights and power sockets. there were also sockets inside the lockers. good breakfast and nice common area for meeting people. the front door is open all the time, so non-guests can freely access the patio. beggers actually entered the hostel twice during my stay. but the dorms entrance is closed, so it was not an issue. staff promptly requested them to leave.
i really like the  privacy in the dorms. the screens were an excellent idea. overall a good and clean hostel. friendly staff as well.
cool bar and courtyard areas for hanging out. events planned for most days and evenings. 1 minute walk from hollywood boulevard!

staff were friendly and helpful.  location is centrally located in la, easy to get to other places in the city.  bed was comfortable, room was spacious, locker was handy.  great value for the money.  thanks for a good time.
it was a nice atmosphere, the people who worked there were very nice and helpful. we have no complaints about our stay

this hostel is the best hostel that i ever have been! everything is just perfect and the staff is really friendly! because of my last stay i always book my hostels in usa hostels if there is any space.

everything was fantastic. the beds were comfortable, the atmosphere was great and as a solo traveller i met lots of great people. the staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. perfect location too!

probably the best hostel experience i've had. the free breakfast was so great, the staff were amazing and so incredibly helpful, the place was clean and in a great location! the daily activities are so awesome especially when you're travelling alone - makes it really easy to meet other travellers.

outdoor area was great! i was travelling alone and met loads of people just by being sat outside. some staff were friendlier than others. really annoying the way the kitchen closes in the middle of the day but i guess they have to clean it at some stage.
fantastic staff, events, and facilities.

the best hostel i've ever been. this was the third hostel on my stay in la and usa hostel was cleraly the best!  very-very nice staff, good location, clean the rooms on every day, very good kitchen with a lot of breakfast (pencake, bread, jam, fruits, oat and free coffee and tee every day), etc.  on this price this is the realy best hostel in la.
great location, great vibe, great price!
