very nice, clean hostel in a good location. they organize special events every nice which is a perfect way to get to know fellow travelers. big plus - bathroom in the rooms and veeeerrryyy comfortable beds :)

love love loved this place! couldn't ask for a better location! outdoor lounge area was a great place to meet people & organise trips. heaps of activities on offer from the hostel! would recommend it 100%
great in every way highly recommended !
beds were kind of bad and crinkled like plastic. however the lounge area was great and the dinner wasn't bad. lots of activities provided.

hostel has a very good location and for me that was a big plus. rooms are big and clean, the only thing i didn't like was staff. they werent communicating that much with they guests and the atmosphere was bad. all in all good value for money
great staff, always willing to help or even have a chat. the hostel has=d a great atmosphere, everyone mingled and there were lots of organised activities to encourage meeting new people.
hostel was very modern, staff were all helpful and ran many walking tours, trips/pub crawls etc. kitchen was really large
only 1 toaster can be use ( the other is out of order), if you want 1 toast , you have to wait 10 minute, if you want another, wait another 10,  only 3 oven can make pancake
love love loved this hostel. very social front patio made it such a great stay, we met so many people!

my stay in this hostel was great, the kitchen is awesome (big, clean, and well equipped) and the hostel tours were amazing! one day, there was a free shuttle to the beach offered, but also the pub crawl was a lot of fun and i also did a tour to the gryffith park - the park is nicely designed and has a perfect view on los angeles and the hollywood sign and the observatory was an interesting place, too!
great location near all the hollywood landmarks. gave great printed info about how to get to all the best la attractions. breakfast was awesome. lots of organised events to join
great hostel. everything was very clean. the staff were nice en very helpful and they organized all kinds of activities for the guests. i would definitly come back.
clean.. freindly... fun.. 1 fantastic hostel!

excellent atmosphere!  i met several people and had a lot of fun in hollywood.  i would recommend adjusting your "no beverages in the room" rule.  it's just not very realistic.  maybe a, "clean up after yourself if you make a mess, we're not your mom" rule could supplement.  saw that one at the bulldog hostel in amsterdam.  overall, great stay.    -evan
realy clean, great patio to hang out outside, in the heart of hollywood. organized program by the staff.  i highly recommend it.

i only stayed here for one night but it was awesome. the staff were very friendly and helpful, someone even helped me take my bags to my room. super clean and modern, power point in lockers and next to all beds. privacy pod beds. would definitely stay here again, hostel offers activities everyday, bbqs pasta nights etc. just off hollywood blvd! a
great hostel, super friendly vibe.
great concept, friendly staff, great atmosphere and an excellent location!
great location and breakfast. the room is clean. it is near to the hollywood, really convienent to shopping and sightseeing.
a little loud in the night~

great hostel for people  who travel on their own. lots of opportunities to meet nice people. clean and very safe environment. breakfast could be a bit better but just make your own pancakes. just do the pub tour. it's lots of fun.
nice hostel next to the walk of fame. awesome place to stay outside and meet other traveller. nice breakfast and helpful staff. but don't go on the bar crawling.
a fantastic hostel right near public transport. a fun atmosphere for solo and couple travellers. best place to stay if you want to explore la.
perfect... best localization.

i  cannot complain about anything. hotel is so close to hollywood, so you do not have to travel far to see some sightseeing, there are guided trips waiting for you (absolutely great), hostel bar, cosy patio....staff was very friendly, nice and helpful, cleaning the place all the time! i really appreciated pancakes in the morning and clean kitchen all the time. comfortable beds, bathroom in your room (not outside)...the best thing-shuttle service to the airport, love it!
very good hostel, staff was nice and polite, room where clean, deffinatly worth the money

amazing hostel in every way! i met lots of other travelers and the activities that the hostel arranged were awesome too! staff is so helpful and really nice. i don't have any complaints and would recommend this place:)
great atmosphere for meeting people especially the pub crawl!

this is my second time staying here.  last time i was here 5 years ago and it has gotten an upgrade in furniture and beds.  no more eggs for breakfast, but pancakes are easy to make, make sure you spray pam.  this is definitely a hostel where people stay up late, so it's great if you like nightlife and want some people to hang around.

had a great time staying at this hostel! it's in the perfect location just off hollywood blvd, close to public transport links making it easy to get to from union station.  the selection provided for breakfast was great too, however get down early to grab a seat!  beds were comfortable, room wasn't too hot and the staff were very helpful. they even help with your luggage as they bring you too your room. i would definitely recommend/stay at this hostel again.
great location - just off hollywood boulevard. possibility to book tickets for the main attractions  at the front desk. very helpful staff

close to the underground metro and bus routes? check  safe? check.  clean showers and toilets? check  free breakfast ? check (although it only consists of toast and fruit, it's better than nothing).  good for socialising? check! the patio at the entrance is fantastic for a few beers in the evening and sharing your story with fellow travellers.

nice an clean hostel at a good location. the patio was perfect to meet people. the only thing was that the restrooms are a bit old but ok.  there was also one guy, i think hispanic, who was not really kind.
great atmosfear, friendly and helpful staff, and definitely a very good place for young people who wants to meet new people and have fun!

i stayed in hollywood for a short trip with a friend. we are from colorado so it was awesome to meet an abundance of people from other countries. everyone was so kind including staff! exceeded my expectations! if you want to stay in hollywood for a reasonable price and meet wonderful people stay here!

suits your needs. they have information and facilities you require. like shuttle to airport or beach for reasonable prices. breakfast is awesome. luggage storage available if you arrive early/leave late. only problem i had was the location of things within the hostel wasn't explained on arrival i.e where the lounge or bathrooms were. staff otherwise very helpful. lockers available in room and close to metro.
i'd recommend this hostel to everyone. a great, friendly atmosphere and such a handy location too. could've easily stayed longer.

great facilities, friendly staff. personally i didn't like the hollywood area much. this hostel had everything you need although i think it is very expensive for a hostel. breakfast room was far too crowded and food wasn't refilled often enough so found there was nothing to eat. good modern hostel but found atmosphere slightly lacking, not sure why. think it attracts a very young crowd perhaps.
very good hostel, a little bit expensive, but it wasorth it.
everything was great!!!!!!
very clean, great staff and good location. i totally enjoyed my stay and would definitely come back.

hostel atmosphere was excellent, a very social environment. location was good a little bit further up the holly wood blvd, but just fine. activities organized helped promote the social atmosphere even more. facilities were clean, although veryhumid in the rooms. however, all in all, good hostel to stay in.
the best thing is the plugs and lights in the bed, it's the most convenient thing i've ever seen in a hostel.

very accessible location as it is situated just off the boulevard. the staff here are extremely helpful and friendly. the hostel has great kitchen facilities and a large storage area for both fresh and frozen food. the hostel also offers walking / sightseeing tours as well as day trips to both santa monica and venice beaches all are reasonably priced.

this is a very clean and fresh hostel in the perfect location for hollywood and the hollywood walk of fame! the hostel has a great kitchen, fast wifi connection, laundry facilities, lounge area and offers tours, pub crawls and shuttle services to santa monica. the biggest disappoint about this hostel is that isn't doesn't have any air conditioning making it impossible to sleep in summer especially on the top bunk!! i wouldn't recommend thus hostel however if you are after a party atmosphere.

very nice hostel, just one metro stop from universal studios. very clean, good lockers - just bring an extra large padlock, fast free wifi, helpful staff, free towel use and complementary soaps, nice common rooms, good kitchen.... everything you need!

it was a really nice hostel. the staff were lovely and the room had good air conditioning, which was a bonus! there was a good atmosphere in the hostel and they organised trips and nights out, which was awesome.
great hostel in a fantastic location, with friendly staff that will help you find your way around this huge city. the hostel also offers great activities which are amazing value for money.

this was a really good hostel since i was travelling alone. its' proximity to most of the important landmarks in hollywood made it easy to venture out and explore. the staff also organised lots of activities (pub crawls, a limo ride, hikes and plenty of all-you-can-eat dinners) which made it easier to see the place and meet people. i would recommend this hostel to people travelling to la.
the best hostel i've ever been to. it is not super quite but it is a hostel and i made a lot of friends in 4 days.

the rooms are very confortable an very well furnished, position is great and the hostel organised lot of activities at very cheap prices, such as limousine ride through hollywood, free bus for santa monica/ venice beach etc...
the comedy show that they put in is really good
it's probably the best hostel i stayed so far. i really enjoyed the people, atmosphere and my time there !
everything was awesome!  one thing you can have in mind is a watermachine for the guest so they can fill there waterbottles for free.
nice place to stay.
can't tell you enough how satisfied i am. keep up the good work. i'll make sure to tell everybody about you guys! :)
perfect.... great location, great staff, great sercices, great advices and spots...
very nice hotel, close to the walk of fame and nice cafes and bars.
nice clean and secure hostel. rooms can get quite hot as there is no ac just a ceiling fan
great location very close to hollywood, well placed for bars and exploring downtown hollywood, universal studios, ucla, getty center etc.    biggest party hostel seen on the west coast

majority of staff were incredible. one (slim, ginger/brown hair) was really sinical and critical of any of our actions & seemed to judge, hence the slightly decreased rating.    so clean.     incredible atmosphere - the events really truely made the stay.     great trip thanks

very young crowd. busy and noisy. if you're aiming for a young crowd and the nightlife then it's great! great location for seeing hollywood and most of l.a too. recommended for the above purposes. not so much if you wanted a quiet trip or if you're older.

best hostel in a 2 years round the world trip.   one stupid stuff, he wanted me and my gf through out, be course i was having her room key in my poked, when we went for lunch, she was just wearing a skirt and couldn't carry her key.

great location if staying in hollywood. ok rooms, but very hot and little air in our room. the screens with the beds very great though, gave you a little bit of privacy, also loved all the power outlets, with each bed and in the lockers.   bathroom with hot shower, only thing it could be a few more common bathrooms/showers cause, only 1 for 8 people was  a bit scarce. otherwise great place, love the bar with beerpongtable, all the activities you could join, free shuttles and the patio outside.

definitely one of the nicest hostels i've stayed at. came to la for a short visit while looking for a more permanent residence and the hostel was fantastic.  great location on the walk of fame and super close to the chinese theater and highland/hollywood metro station.  the staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, and made the entire hostel feel safe and secure by maintaining the front entrance.  had a wonderful stay here and would stay here again without question.

an above avareage hostel, but more expensive compared to what you would normally pay in almost all other cities. offers a lot of additionals services that a traveler who wants to get to know los angeles and meet some people at the same time needs. it is located next to hollywood boulevard. dorm bed were ok and wi-fi work well. making pancakes in the morning is great, again nutella was missing, apparently not very popular in the us ;-).  i would go there again and i do recommend this hostel.

i had a great time staying at the hostel and everyone that i met was friendly and helpful. from checking in and being shown to my room, everyone was happy to help and made me feel welcome. i especially enjoyed beer pong in the evening to get people involved together! the shuttle down to the beaches are great value for money and having the freephone number to use to arrange pick up was an added bonus too - thank you!
only one complaint. there is not a filtered water fountain. please ...
an exellent hostel! like a hotel, but less expensive. would return!
great hostel just like the one in san fransisco! has everything you need and has a great atmosphere to it.
i had a great time, lil expensive but it worth it, great location right by the stars and the hollywood sign!!

really great hostel! i highly recommend staying here if you are a solo traveller. lots of organized trips and activities and everyone is social and fun. i will stay here again when im back in la for sure!!
i was surprised at how clean and well managed this hostel was. great place with great staff. complimentary breakfast everyday. very nice hostel.
more girls only rooms would be appreciated. also more hooks or things to hang towels on in the bathrooms.

i recommend this hostel to everyone! it´s really good, toilets inside the rooms, lots of activities to join, staff always ready to help us! except one thing i got disappointed with: the advanced rental cars recommendation they did. i got problems renting a car in this store and i think they don´t deserve any recommendation from anywhere.

i have no bad comments and in fact on my next trip to los angeles, i will go also to san francisco as well and book for the 2 hostels in each city. thanks ! i enjoy my stay at the hostels hollywood. and also i really like the staff people, they were very helpful and they're doing a great job.... all of them !

i can give everything two thumbs up. i slept like a baby. my friends and i only stayed two nights and were barely in the hostel, but we're planning on coming back just to be there. everyone is so laid back and everyone in my (6 female) room seemed to trust each other that we just left our stuff out. i also noticed they were hiring, and if i lived in la i would definitely take that offer up. but i'm gonna have to check out their san diego location to see if they're hiring there as well. ;)

banging hostel, loved every minute of it. very well organized and easy to find as the bus dropped me right outside! fantastic location and awesome common room area. good staff with cookies and rides to the beech.

the location was a bit of a problem, but thats because of la, everything is soooo far in that city. so at least the hotel was near subway and main bus stops.  do the pub crawl, ive met some nice people in there and had a lot of fun.  you need to pay to use the computer.  its an expensive hostel, but all of them in la are, so whatever....i am not a really fun of la
rooms need to be cleaned much more regularly, and staff should be much more welcoming.
good hostel. good vibe. lisa on front desk was a great help, thanks!
thanks to all and "special thanks and congrats to the english guys" -louie and matt bros, and the blond one (i don´t remember his name)!   regards from argentina!

ups :)  - very clean  - facilities up top  - staff, very friendly and helpful  - literally everthing you need is in or just outside the hostel.  - clubs, diners, and universal studios just around the corner    downs :(  - a bit noisy for early sleepers  - one night won't make any friends
great facilities, the terrace and bar upstairs were incredible ! great atmosphere and very well designed and modern place
very good! really good! best hostel i've been to in the us, and i've been in many! if you're going to hollywood, go here! / daniel thomas
enjoyed my time here, first night was a bar crawl. bar area was good and lively.

if you love hollywood, this is your place to stay! super clean, the most awesome staff, who are also willing to help you. great outdoor patio and many interesting activities are organised daily. not the closest place to the beach, but that's the only minor thing.
great staff, great location, best hostel i stayed in la.
great breakfast, quiet and helpful staff
like the privacy of the bunks with its own light etc, and the breakfast is really good too!

exceptionally clean, excellent security, selection of organised activities nights and days-some free :) and cheap organised meals :) free breakfast is a good variety and choice-sets you up for the day :) staff very helpful people :) stayed there twice this year and in 2008 and would definitely stay there again :) just be aware it's between 2 metro stations if you have a lot of stuff it can be a difficult walk and compared to other hostels in the area it is pricey but worth it :) xx

can not fault this hostel one little bit!!! the staff are totally amazing. harrison is a little gem!!! the $6 all you can eat bbq is a totally great way of filling up and meeting fellow peeps in the courtyard. if ya bored try a little beer pong upstairs. free breakfast and wifi... yes please and a very good location. keep up the good work

arrived early on my flight from australia and they were more than happy to store my bags until check in time. rooms were clean and beds very comfortable! centrally located just off hollywood blvd so in walking distance to a lot of attractions. activities organised by the hostel are great as well. would definitely stay here again!

10/10. great staff, great people, great services, great kitchen, great laundry, great activities. its no wonder they win hostal of the year every time. i even had an issue with my iphone and had it fixed within 3 hrs based on their recommendations. i wanted a place to work peacefully and they recommended an excellent cafe. love it!

this was my first night ever in a hostel, and i had an excellent experience.  the facilities were very nice, the staff were all very helpful and pleasant, and i loved hanging out on the front patio and meeting the other travelers.  very highly recomended.

one of the best hostels to stay at. it's not cheap, but it is top quality! really appreciated the location, the staff and the activities. the front patio makes it easy to meet people. would highly recommend anytime.
great hostel right next to hollywood blvd.
great place and viber, west hollywood itself isn't great, but the hostel is. some staff members weren't very friendly. they had a great breakfast in the morning, and lots of activities to do!
i loved everything about the hostel

staff really helpful and friendly. the outside patio is a great way to meet people. the hostel puts on lots of things to do for each day of the week, which is a good way to meet people, especially for me as a solo traveler.  the place is clean and secure which is great. the lockers having power points is a great idea - didn't have to sit waiting for my phone or camera to charge! would stay here again if i am ever back in la,
i really enjoyed staying here - there are plenty of activities planned every day and the staff are really helpful. the beds feel private even with 6 people to a room.

great hostel. excellent location, awesome bar and common area, clean and friendly staff. highly recommend if you want to stay in hollywood.  everyday and night something going on.  overall best hostel i've stayed at.
the place and staff were great, the only downside was that you have to pay and buy codes to use the computers, and breakfast has a pretty poor selection.
i came to this hostel for the second time. location is great. a lot of activities offered.
i stayed there for 7 days on 3 different times during one vacation. it is a great place especially for the amazing trips they make.
awesome hostel!!!!
had an amazing time!  it's always a plus when u can participate in activities organised by the hostel.
relatively new and clean facilities. kitchen and laundry closes by 11pm. running activities everyday which is cool, some are free.

cool place to stay in a cool city!! the staff is great, very friendly and helpful. the breakfast is quite good, and the dorm rooms are pretty big. usa hostel hollywood is definitely a nice place to stay and you meet lots of interesting people! :)

hostel is great for the social traveler, whether solo or in a group, has all the facilities, a great outdoor common area, generally something organised by the hostel everyday, very clean, small downs - little disorganized with some of their offered activities, no air conditioning in the dorm rooms, and wifi was a bit inconsistent, all being said, one of the most enjoyable hostels i have ever stayed in, would definitely go back
very nice hostel, good security, staff and facilities. very sociably place and easy to meet people. shame that hollywood itself is an awful place, but thats not the hostels fault!

very lovely and helpful staffs. the location is perfect. the only thing i dont like about it is the air-conditioner system. there's no air-con in the dorm, so it's really hot whenever we get back to the dorm after a long day.

i had an awesome time there, i met so many people from all over the work and the patio is the best place to talk with them. the tours from the hostel are good too. the breakfast was not the best, i missed cheese and ham, but u can buy that if u want. i had a great time thee.  if you wanna see hollywood, stay at this hostel and you will have a great stay!
extremely expensive for what it has to offer.
staff where fantastic
no complaints very well organised and run operation :)
fun staff. location ok but a bit far from the walk of fame entertainment district (walking distance ok). hardy was especially nice ! cool activities going on everyday.
roma were spacious and clean- but did not like that anyone could get though the front door into the hostel sitting area..

this hostel is fantastically located, packed with friendly and helpful staff, and with excellent facilities. the location is not just convenient for tacky hollywood tourist stuff, but walking or short bus distances from the likes of cinefamily, the ucb theatre and nerdmelt, as well as nightclubs. buses go from hollywood boulevard and sunset boulevard to most places in la, and the train is close by too. the included breakfast is incredible value, with a variety of foods in all you can eat supply.

great hostel with friendly and helpful staff and lots of tours/things to do. nice bar on second floor and neat dorms with power outlets near each bed. would definitely recommend this to other travelers. would absolutely stay here again if i decide to visit la again.

this hostel has so many optional activities i didn't get time to be bored. the staff are so friendly and helpful, the facilities  are great, the privacy pods on the bunks are great. i met and got to know so many people including the staff. played my first game of beerpong! overall, this has to be the best hostel i have ever stayed at.

the location is pretty good. you can walk to some famous views. but it is not suit for someone who need a tight sleep. when i was there, there is a party outside until 2 o'clock, and the worst part is there are two guy chatting outside our room in 4.am. for a long time. it is horrible.  but others are good.

i stayed in two different hostels,usahostels in los angeles,and international hostel in san francisco.i prefer usahostels.1.you will have a instruction sheet of your  language,so you know everything.2.you bed is good,have a private space for you.3.you can charge the battery on you bed.4.there are some tour,you can join it.in a word,it´s a wonderful hostel satisfied all your needs.

the hostel is excellent! its all you can wait for a hostel! location cleanliness facilities. locker are big enough to put your huge backpack. you can leave your cellphone inside charging, you can sleep at any hour cause they got something for the light not to bother. a little night light near the bed, tea and coffe 24hs. good breakfast, music at night .... one of the best hostels i stayed in.
great stay. in the neighbourhood of the lane of fame. please look after my name  tom (not inported person).  staff of usa hostel is great.
very nice hostel, super secure. had lots of fun in the bars, and the staff made it easy to organise tours. only downfall is that it was pretttttty pricey just to stay in a party hostel.

great hostel highley reccomend! centre of hollywood boulevard, walking distance to walk of fame, runyon canyon and the main hollywood strip. free shuttles to hollywood sign and beaches. social orientated - pub crawls, day trips, hostel bbq etc. the rooms are clean and colourful, lockers available, ensuite bathroom, each bed has its own light & power plug, wifi internet works great in the rooms. staff were helpful. breakfast included. no complaints to be made!
great hostel !

only a two minute walk from the sights of hollywood and loads of places to eat. the staff were really helpful and helped my book onward travel. the bar area was awesome and the en-suite rooms were cleaned every day. daily activities and pub crawls to sign up for and free breakfast which was really good! one of the best hostels i've stayed in, and i've been traveling for a year. definitely recommended.
it was a great  vacation. it was first time to stay in hostel. this hostel made a good memories for staying in hostel.  they are kind. and the activity is good! i'd love to stay there.
it's place with good location, nice staff and clean rooms. just 10 mins walk from china theatre etc and definitely a good place to stay. i would definitely stay if i visit la again.

i woke up slightly later and i was chased out by the staff when i'm having my breakfast halfway bcoz they close the kitchen @ 10.30am. i find that they could have give some flexibility. laundry room only available after 1pm. they say that they have to clean their bedsheet. and we can't clean after 9pm or 10pm i think. i find this ridiculous. we are youth, we travel late night n want to do some laundry before we leave in the morning. both timing can't match. room carpetted, nt clean.

this place was awesome! the staff were so friendly and helpful. i had medicine that needed to be safely stored in a fridge and they were able to do this for me. lockers and power docks everywhere in rooms meant i always had a phone and camera ready to go. the vibe is very cool. lots of cool young things ready for a party any night of the week (staff included - which i love).
really fun atmosphere, great for making friends and finding the best places to go.
good idea to provide power sockets in the lockers!

staff were friendly and knew a lot about things to do in the area. lots of activities were organised so it was easy to meet people when traveling alone. the privacy pods for each bunk were a great idea and meant you don't wake up staring at a stranger. highly recommended for single female travellers.

i really enjoyed my stay at the usa hostels hollywood. the hollwood area is very nice, there were activities organized daily, it was easy to mingle with people, clean and comfortable.  i would definitely come back to this hostel.
it was overall a very enjoyable stay, close to everything a tourist would want and need!
the staff weren't always polite compared to the other usa hostels i stayed in san francisco
really  nice  place...  can't  complain  about  anything...
really helpful staff. i love that the toilet was always really clean and they have a lot of activities for the guests.

it is a great hostel, just too expensive for a backpacker on a world tour. 40 usd is just too much for a hostel no matter the service or location that's why i changed the hostel. otherwise they do everything right. especially the common area outside is very cozy and for example the power points for every bed is something that many any other hostel doesn't offer.
loud at night time. party hostel. not one for a quiet night!

great hostel, right in between sunset blvd and hollywood blvd which is a key location.  the rooms are great with their own washrooms, although a bit humid air conditioning would be excellent instead of a fan. breakfast was great and so were the free hotdogs on fridays. the value for money for this hostel is great and the atmosphere is cool with a great front patio to chill and meet people. pub crawls were really good also.
great locotion, great staff!

a very nice hostel right near hollywood boulevard. we had lots of trouble with inconsiderate room mates but that's not the hostels fault. moved us to a different room which was much appreciated. the female receptionist was a bit miserable but the guy with the glasses was very helpful and extremely polite! activities arranged were very good and reasonably priced. if you are looking for a party hostel at the weekends this is the place, if not sleep may be an issue for you!
great location, helpful friendly staff that couldn't do enough for you, clean and a safe place to stay

i like the building and the interior very much. the backyard is sensational. the location is not too close to the attractions but the neighbourhood is nice. it would be nicer if they have kitchen for guests like other hostels do. but it's good that the cafe opens until midnight. it's a shame they don't have 24 hours check-in policy, as my flight was delayed and was forced to find another accomodation in the middle of the night.

best hostel i've stayed in so far in my life. friendly staff and multiple daily tours/activities. huge patio by the front to chill and meet new people. 2 power sockets by the headboard for everyone and another 2 more in each locker for secure charging of electronics. the additional panel at the side of the head also shields stray light from reaching the eyes to ensure a perfect sleep. cheap all you can eat dinners costing $6 from spaghetti to cheeseburgers. large laundry room as well.
everything is so good at usa hostel hollywood! i will definitely choose it again!
great hostel, great atmosphere and plenty of events to keep the sole traveller feeling connected.
the room was so smelling and the breakfast was poor.
one of the best hostels i've ever stayed in. can't wait to come back

was a nice place to have a stay in los angeles. the area around the hostel was not as expected a very nice area. haven't really expected to see the end of the hollywood walk of fame in a ghetto. hostel was nice, each room has own facilities, machines for washing/drying, free breakfast and dinner for small fee. cleaning service comes in from time to time to block your facility from 8 a.m. to 9 a.m., i really disliked that. they have a bar with music, but the music is definitely to loud in there.

great hostel. extremely friendly and supportive manner. kindly organised the shuttle bus and gave myself and friend some handy tips and information. there could of been more variety for breakfast. sometimes when i would go to breakfast there wasn't much to choose from, eg enough toast spreads.

this was my first time staying at a hostel and i truly had a wonderful experience. they have free tours going on almost every day, $6 all you can eat dinners, they host pub crawls, free beach shuttle, and everyone staying at the hostel was great too. it was just a truly wonderful experience for me in every way.

the place is ok, staff is nice, location is good, but it's literally impossible to sleep in this place at night. when i stayed there, asian people woke up at 6 am and started making noises and rumagging around their luggage as if it was 9 am. at night, drunk teenagers came back from nightclubs at 3 am and started up love scenes with complete strangers at the door of our room, shouting their names from behind closed doors or leaving the door open. also, one of our bags disappeared into thin air.
i really enjoyed staying at usa hostels in beverilly hills.  the staff were awesome and the environment was great.
very nice hostel, great atmosphere, i was travelking alone and the first night i went out with a group of people and had a great time.

the staff are very friendly and the location is very nice, close to hollywood blvd. the wifi is also very fast, which made me so happy. one thing is that the sheets are not as clean as i thought, but i can understand; this is a hostel not a five-star hotel after all.
best hostel i've stayed in for sure!

great location and a great vibe, usa hostels la was probably the best hostel i stayed in whilst traveling through the usa. rooms (bunk beds) are large enough with large (and clean) ensuite bathroom facilities. kitchen area and common areas are also large and have a great vibe. staff were awesome as well. definately stay at this hostel if you want to socialise. i had a blast here and will be back!
second stay in this hostel but just for one night this time. clean, secure, great location, nice staff, good breakfast (it will be perfect with yogurt and free milk).

great hostel! the staff is super friendly and helpful, the rooms are nice and the bathrooms very clean! we only stayed one night, but there are plenty of activities you can enjoy while being at this hostel! this place would be perfect for someone arriving in the city while looking for a more permanent places. it's also a good place of you are staying a little bit longer to enjoy the trips they offer. we will definitely come back!
was a total new experience for me. staff amazing and the activities they offer are awesome

really good hostel. dont miss their breakfast buffet, toast, fruits, tea, coffee and diy pancake!!  if you come later, you wont have fruits! so eat early!    nice location, right on hollywood.    a lot of activities organized by them. definitely worth to join!    there is a japanese restaurant near it, really nice.    staff is very helpful anf friendly.

very clean, good atmosphere if there a good crowd in the common room. plenty of drinking games if you want to party but plenty of space to chill out. staff are very friendly and helpful! cheap drinks in the hostel bar are good aswell!
excellent hostel, friendly staff, great activities and always clean.

awesome hostel. the staff was very friendly and super helpful. they organize many free activities and cheap communal meals ($6 for all you can eat), which was great. we had pancake batter for breakfast, how awesome is that! dorms are clean with brand new mattresses. neighbourhood is very central, close to main attractions and is pretty safe.
slammin' good time
a great place to stay, only a street away from holllywood boulevard. the staff are really friendly and helpful and the place was very clean. definitely a place i would stay at again!
ok, though the guests didn't seem as friendly as i had hoped. bed was ok, and it was nice having a bathroom in each dorm room. breakfast was ok--not the best, not the worst.
just stayed 2 nights. good atmosphere, breakfast and location. it's clean.
charisma is a excellent staff. i really appreciated her hospitality.
a little bit far from metro, yet very closed to walk of fame nd kodak theatre
everything is perfect!
good location just off hollywood blvd. they offer tours, hikes, all sorts of trips.  beds have metal "walls" to give you some privacy. you also have a bed light and outlets right by your bed.
the big problem was the neighborhood: a club and a parking - both make noise during the night like car alarm, music, drunk people close to the window.

very good place to stay while your in hollywood. staff is very helpful and the rooms are pretty nice. i stayed in a 8-bed-dorm and it was very big. that was nice. breakfast is good and location is great, only one minute from hollywood boulevard.
2nd stay at this hostel, and once again a great experience! friendly and helpful staff, clean, safe, perfect location, and some great activities to get people to mingle.
i really enjoyed my stay and the staff were super amazing and friendly. i would go back again and recommend it!

i have stayed here before, the staff were very friendly and welcoming but this time the staff are a little clicky and there are no group events on to get people gathered. beds not made before arrival and staff not enthusiasts and welcoming.  definitely not a place to stay if you want to have a group feeling.

i have been travelling for two months now and have stated at a number of hostels across australia and the us and this was definitely top. i was made to feel welcome by the staff, they couldn't do more, personal touches like arranging daily activities were good. very clean also. would def stay again and would recommend to all.

really enjoyed my stay at usa hostels hollywood! i stayed in a 6-bed female dorm with ensuite and it was awesome- bathroom was always clean, as was the room (that might be because us girls were tidy, though). the staff were friendly and happy to answer any questions asked and the nightly "all you can eat for $6" meals were great. would definitely stay here again!

the hostel is in the middle of hollywood, and across the road from a great little mexican place. the hostel staff were very friendly, put on regular tours (we did the walking tour and it was a great way to see la and to meet people), and the outdoor lounges were always being used. we met great people and had a great time! for our last night we changed to a private room and were amazed to find that it was more like a hotel room! our own ensuite and air con and tv!
outstanding in every way.
great atmosphere, friendly staff, lots of communal activities and awesome location. one bathroom per dorm room is my only complaint about this place.
in a good location, have tour to go hiking and free shuttle bus to go beach
the hostel is very good but i don t know why the people that goes there are not very friendly!! that is the opinion of several people.

this is not a quiet hostel. i had never visited hollywood and had no idea what to expect, but being awoken by post office workers next door at 4am slamming truck cargo around until 7am was not fun. great place, if you're into the club

this is a great hostel. we had a great time here. we enjoyed some of their weekly events. the place was very clean. lockers had power sockets in them so you could charge things while your out/asleep, which we thought was a great idea! kitchen was good with really nice free coffee all day and a good free breakfast. unfortunately, we got the room right next to the front door and kitchen, so we found it difficult to sleep as it was very noisy, but other rooms may not have this problem.

really great on just about every level. among central hollywood hostels, banana bungalow wins in the "character" department, but now that i've found usa hostels hollywood i never intend to stay at b.b. again.

i can't fault this hostel is any way. the location in hollywood is great, the staff are lovely, breakfast was decent, security is high, it's clean, modern, has a bar and a nice patio out the front where meeting people seems to be easier than the shyest person could possibly imagine! and all this equates to an amazing atmosphere! if you're looking for a hostel near hollywood, definitely stay here!!
a++ great staff!!!!
loved it, couldn't ask for more. really efficiently run hostel. all the 'extras' that you want as a backpacker are included. lots of activities.
i was quite impressed overall.
great hostel with fun people. we only stayed one night on our way to coachella, but we caught a really fun pub crawl. clean and great for making friends. highly recommended!

this hostel is in general awesome. nice staff , very helpful all the time. tiny kitchen but it's ok, we can manage cooking chinese food there .  clean bathroom which is very important to me - personally. :)     it is a good deal except for noise from the bar just next to the hostel. i heard noise around 1-2 am and police siren also.

we stayed here last year and had a great time so we made sure to come back this year too! the staff are amazing, the location is amazing, the facilities are amazing. it was always clean and there was always an activity running that you could partake in. the only scary thing during this stay was that 2 hostel goers were robbed of money, passport and belongings so that put a little damper on things. i would still come back in a heartbeat though!

quite simply the best hostel that i've ever stayed in anywhere in the world. everything is there, the staff are amazing, it's super easy to meet people if you're travelling alone, and trips, outings and pub crawls help you see everything. everything that the solo traveler would ever need, right there, and done really very well. fun bar upstairs with cheap beer, beer pong, and stuff going on. good breakfast and bbq/pasta nights.
it is a bit smelly n noisy, noisy is fine but they can definitely improve on the sapcing and smell stuff.

free breakfast is epic-best there is! and location is not too bad-fantastic for area but between 2 metro stations so can be annoying if you have lots of stuff! security is amazing no concerns what so ever and the free bus to the beach was great too :) find it a little expensive for a hostel but you get what you pay for and it makes up for the price with the activities, peace of mind security and small dorms of 6 people with en suite bathroom. very helpful people on the main desk too :) thanks!

amazing staff! super friendly and always there to help out. the free breakfast in the morning was a great addition, and just the basics you need to get going.  great that the hostel organised nights out, and also day activities. would definitely recommend this hostel and would also come back!
good hostel at a very nice place but it is a bit expensive

hey! this hostel is the best! i have been there for 2 days, and then i decided to stay one more!  the staff is really cool, the location is awesome, and there is a great atmosphere. really clean rooms and bathrooms also!  thanks a lot. this is my first hostel review, because this hostel is the one that really deserves it!!

good place to stay if you want to be in hollywood. friendly staff, decent kitchen, free wifi and lots of tours and activities on offer. however could do with a communal bathroom or two, as waiting for a shower in the morning was a bit of a pain. would stay again.
perfect location and staff, and a lot of fun things going on!
would rather they spend more money on cleaner sheets and less lumpy pillows. other than that 10/10.   a+++ will lodge again.
very well ran and clean hostel with great features. only problem is it is very noisy at night so don't stay if you want to sleep!

overall the hostel is great. great dorm, kitchen and location. there only suggestion i would like to give is please provide  a carpet in front of bathroom in each dorm so that there will be less"dirty wet footprint" created around the room. .

eventhough its located just a few dozens meters from hollywood blv, the schrader blv itself feels a bit dodgy. its 10mins walk to metro. staff at reception are very kind and informative, but since there are many people staying, cant spend that much time talking to you; but they allow you to print a few pages for free! wifi is free as well. you can have pancakes for breakfast. hostel organizes a lot of trips around la. my room, 8-dorm/4bunkbeds was so-so-spacious, with lockers and personal socket
it was very nice to stay there but very loud after 11 pm!!!

as an avid traveller who has stayed in 20+ hostels i have to say, i was impressed! the staff are extremely helpful, helping me by printing off maps, telling me the best things to do and even helping me find a place to stay in san francisco! there is loads of activities on such as free hikes, cheap bar and the location was only two blocks away from the subway, making it really easy to get around- this is honestly the best hostel i have ever stayed in!
great location, clean, good breakfast and nice staff. best place to stay in hollywood!!

very good hostel. not the safest location in hollywood, but when going out at night there's always a massive group so it's not really unsafe. they offer so many activities including hikes to runyon canyon and buses to santa monica which makes being a tourist around la much easier as it's hard to get around without a car. beautiful, safe, comfortable and secure rooms and a fun bar area with cheap drinks and fun staff for night fun.
nice hostel with a perfect location between walk of fame and sunset blvd. showers are in the room and they have a party room. can recommend it.
incredibly nice staff and the free breakfast, no. beds/room and great internet connection made it a great value for money.

very nice hostel and perfect for staying in hollywood and la. they have a very nice bar where they offer cheap drinks. also the hostel organizes lots of activities - very easy to meet other travellers.
the staff is very kind.i want to use it next time

i love that this hostel  is located right next to hollywood boulevard, walking distance to everythnig. the staff was hit or miss for me, some were very helpful and cordial, some looked bored and a bit rude.  the hostel is quite noisy, even at 1 or 2 am. the rooms in the back are definetely quieter. however, it's kept clean, facilities are decent, beds are actually quite comfortable, individual lights and plugs are great and the breakfast is pretty nice for a hostel. i would recommend it.
everything good for me.  i think that i was able to stay at the best place by my first los angeles stay.
best hostel we've stayed in!!

the private room was in the worst location, you pay a lot for a private room and you don't expect it to be situated next to the bar and stairs. good hostel but dumb room locations. so hard to get any sleep.
everything is excellent

some staff were a lot more surly than at other hostels i've stayed at. tours and excursions almost every day are a plus, and they turn the lounge into a bar in the evening. lockers with power points are a plus. not exactly a stand-out hostel, but it's functional.
i loved the staff they looked after my needs very well, i also got very drunk there and they looked after me! the limo cruise was awesome!! :d     so many activites. xxx well done

stayed here for one night at the end of my trip and was really impressed, about 100m from hollywood blvd which has heaps of bars, clubs, food and tourist attractions. theres a cool outdoor area you can drink and eat and they had a free bbq . decent sized rooms and a great atmosphere.   free pancakes in the morning as well!
best, most well thought-out hostel i've ever stayed in.
excellent, for sure!
there are no bathrooms outside the rooms. it is not pleasant to share a bathroom with 7+ people and not having an option outside the room.

great location!  we stayed at the banana bungalow first and moved to this hostel because they had a cheap bus transfer to their hostel in san fran but when we got there they told us they no longer do the bus. which was a bit annoying and messed up our plans a little. the staff were really friendly and breakfast was good. however i thought there was a better party atmosphere at banana bungalow.
well located, very helpful staff. my dorm was close to the lounge which had music to 1am every night so found it noisy.

good hostel. main complaint is the lack of soundproofing - the walls are paper thin, don't expect to get a great nights sleep. but the location is great if you want to be in the centre of the tourist hub, and the staff are friendly. the privacy screen on the bed, outlet and light right at the bed, and outlet inside the locker are fantastic (don't forget to bring your lock). clean washrooms and comfortable beds.

stayed here twice during our two month trip. facilities are fantastic, comfy beds, awesome breakfast, great bar and close to everything you need (buses, metro etc). the thing that really made it for us though were the staff - incredibly helpful and knowledgeable about the area and if they didn't know something would go out of their way to find out. also, they remembered us from our first stay so it was like coming home!
it was really nice to stay there

good hostel, good location, amazing atmosphere for meeting people, drinking, etc.    cons: the room and bathroom were not so clean as the rest of the hostel. i think it should get cleaned everyday. other thing was that the laundry room was opened just from 1pm to 9pm, which is a very complicated time to be at the hostel if you want to go to a lot of places. specially in la that`s so huge and where takes so long to go to one place to another.

without doubt the best hostel i've ever stayed, the atmosphere is so good, the hostel staff are all so friendly, a lot of activities are arranged, the location is so good, just on the walk of fame with metro station nearby, and the bed is comfortable and also with free breakfast.

one of the cleanest hostels i've stayed in. great atmosphere and facilities, with a lot of activities. a great place to party and meet people, but where you can also rest if you want to. best breakfast i've ever had in a hostel/motel/hotel in the states.

the location is fantastic and the staff is super nice. the breakfast is awsome and you have pancackes! the cleanliness could be improved. they don't have towels (you have to rent them!), that never happened to me before in a hostel. they organise cool activities and have free shuttles to santa monica. it's a bit noisy on weekends.definitely not recommended for shy travelers.
perfect....
party hostel with its own bar, live muscians, beer pong, bbq's everynight, 40m off hollywood blvd, its a shame this hostel isn't somewhere more interesting than hollywood
excellent facilities in a very goog location. it's quite a big hostel...

what a fantastic hostel!! great location. very clean, great facilities, great tour offers, and absolutely brilliant staff. they are very helpful and very friendly. i will definately be recommending this joint to all my friends who travel through la

matt was very knowledgable on the hollywood sign tour. louis was excellent on service and charisma was very good on info i needed. all the u.s.a hostal staff where excellent hosts and i recommend this hostel for 2013 in los angeles.
great hotel very friendly staff
heaps of fun at this hostel...activities every day including  beer pong, pub crawls, tours and local musicians performing. met fantastic people here. the hostel made my experience in la great!!!
best hostel i've ever stayed till now!

they have a room right next to the front door where they buzz people in, it's right next to the stairs where people are stomping and running up and down, and opposite the kitchen. do not get it if you want to sleep between 2am - 8am.     also, doesn't seem like the bathrooms were cleaned often.
the private rooms are really too small and not so confortable, expecially if you pay a price similar to some hotels.

i thought the security was excellent, staff told you from the start that everyone had to hold their keys up before being allowed into the hostel. this made you feel secure, that none of the homeless would be allowed to stray into the hostel. the staff were friendly, and some more knowledgeable than others, but if they didn't know they would point you into the right direction. some times they could have given a little more advice to other customers.
great hotel friendly staff
just the best hostel i've ever seen, or stayed at. top notch place with a great staff.
the hostel's good, but the area is quite sketchy.

this hostel is right in the middle of hollywood. how much you enjoy your stay will be effected by what that means to you. i found hollywood pretty gross but the hostel itself is perfectly fine. pretty big party culture which i enjoyed but was hard to avoid. facilities are nice and each room gets it's own bathroom which is real good.  good hostel, no complaints.
good staff, good value, good breakfast, nice hostel to stay just 5 min walk from hollywood boulevard and from one metro station to universal studio!!!

i stayed in this hostel five years ago and it was much better then. smaller bar now and ridiculous noise issues. while we were there i was woken up by a fistfight right outside our room. no control was attempted of noise levels after 12pm. no sleep and regimented  (read rude)staff who cared little for the quality of peoples experience with the hostel.

it´s a good hostel, very safe, breakfast included, helpful staff and informations. offered tours are good ideas but not unfortunately not very good quality. it´s a big hostel, for that a bit impersonal and almost too strictly organized. but over all good value.

this hostel was sweet. very secure and very well organised. there was one night where a bunch of people came back drunk and woke everyone up - i didn't care though, that's just what happens at hostels. some other (older) people got pretty upset though. loved it though. seriously.
staff was not friendly. my entire check out process happened without the staff speaking to me. very clean and safe!
wish i could stay there for 10 days in may , but i think they have a time limit

good value for money with a decent breakfast included in the price. secure hostel and the rooms, with a key card required for access to both, 1 large locker included felt a little flimsy though. a decent location with public transport quite near by, good if you want to see the tourist sights in hollywood. nice and clean, staff offer assistance when asked. overall i am happy with the accommodation.

nice breakfast. good location. lots of activities on offer. bunks not so sturdy - a lot of movement when someone rolls over. good wifi. laundry soap provided for decently priced washing facilities. nice staff

location in hollywood is great. the bus to santa monica was really handy and the staff all very nice. we had to pay for the pubcrawl (not sure where that money went), but it was fun nontheless. all you can eat bbq was great. a bit exxy, but a nice place to stay.

had a great stay here. very clean, comfortable dorms, a bar with cheap drinks if you want to stay in and very close to the heart of tourist hollywood. staff were helpful with tours and other inquires. i would definitely recommend staying here.
my only negative comment is that the wifi is unreliable.

a few too many rules and a lack of character that you want from a hostel. less focused on meeting other travelers and having fun and more importance on clean, tidy modern facilities. resembled more of a school camp. would reccommend if you want a comfortable, quiet stay to break up the usual non-stop hostel life, but not if you want to party.

good: everything is just good!! really nice breakfast, great staff, the beds are so comfortable!!, they have a lot of activities everyday, the hostel is super safe.    to improve: the wi-fi conection is the worse i ever use in a hostel and also people from the staff walked in for "room check"or "bed inspection" and didnt even knock the door and you could be naked (i was in a female dorm and was a guy who walked in)
ok place to stay. nice breakfast.
wifi is really poor.
great bar, dorms are good with ensuites.. just a minute from the star walks..

without a doubt the best hostel i've stayed so far! superclean, good location, great beds with privacy board, bedlight and power outlet, good and free breakfast, fun activities such as pubcrawls, free walking tours and free beach shuttles. staff is amazing, so much fun and extremely helpful, staff even hangs out there when not working, that shows how much they love their jobs! only thing that could be better is the wifi reception in some of the rooms. other than that, absolutely incredibly fun!
the location is scary, but inside is fine

a lot of good tours arranged!  it was pretty noisy in the morning. and whoever talking in the hallway can be heard inside the room. i was woke up by the steps from upstairs.  bathroom in the room were good but in a 6 bedroom it gets demanding at times.

i was here over christmas and had a wonderful time. the staff are friendly and go out of their way to be helpful. there are lots of activities, an excellent free breakfast and cheap food each evening.   my room was spacious and i likes the personal light and privacy board. there are lockers with power points inside- genius.

location was great. right off hollywood blvd. walking distance to clubs, bars, and theaters. metro is only a few blocks away as well. driving is close to 101 holldwood fwy. parking is a bit challenging but certainly feasible. they had a comedy show sunday night that was pretty cool.

the free breakfast was amazing, those pancakes mmmmmmmm.  each bed having it's own power outlet and privacy screen is a very good idea, and also having the power outlet in the lockers is so handy!  the 'all you can eat' nights are cheap and tasty, hamburger and hotdog night is the best!  i'd stay here again for sure!!

this hostel is located footsteps from hollywood boulevard, metro station, tourist sights, bars and awesome food. security is great nobody without a swipe card can get in, awesome activities that enable you to meet people, free bbq nights, super friendly and informative staff..definitely recommend staying here if you're in la!
the staff were friendly and accommodating. the pantry was complete. also, you get to have free breakfast everyday.

this was a nice and clean hostel. met some friendly people. not a lot of people seemed to join the tours and activities provided by the hostel at the time so it wasn't lively enough when i was there. the location is perfect in hollywood. close to all the tourist attractions in hollywood area.

jamie and melie with just amazing hosts. they made my experience so much better with their tips as well as just fun to talk too. they help everyone with all sorts of requests like parking in good spots, how to do the laundry, how to make pancakes, chatting when having a drink, putting names on guest lists in hostels, etc. they are so much fun thank you for being the best hostel i have ever stayed in. cheers, dran from australia
one of the best hostels i have lived in so far. staff are so nice, and the location is perfect.

the place is awesome! i highly recommend it! location is just nearby hollywood with convinient transit. the staff, they re just superb!! everyone is friendly and helpful. basically you can ask them everything n they will find the answer for you! i appreciate their help! the room is clean too. there is only one thing. since its shared dorm, so not everybody is quiet and disciplined (yup!), so if u re a light sleeper, u d better bring a earbug or simply buy one at the vending machine at the place

staff cleaning your room everyday. clean and goo kitchen. staff is very helpfull. lobby is so cool with ping-pong-beer, bar and tv's. good place to meet people and make friends. they have a lot of cheaper tours(everyday there is a different tour..bervelly hills walking tour, hollywood sign, pub crawl, 6 flags, free shuttle to santa monica beach), discount in nightlifes.

typical big hostel, treat you like a number. i had to ask specifically for a towel, they wouldn't print my boarding pass for me, even when i offered to paid. individual tables made it hard for a solo traveler to meet people.  bbq was 90% bun and 10% meat and salad.     basically a big, cost cutting corporation with the thinnest toilet paper i'd ever seen, inedible free pancakes, and free coffee so terrible nobody drank it coupled with a 10am check out!! def. wont be staying here again.

had a really great stay here!! the hostel offered so many cheap or free activities!! every day was filled with activities and we could've even used an extra few days!! rooms were very good, power points in lockers and next to beds were great! very friendly staff, and delicious $6 bbq for dinner!! great place to stay, and area of the location is pretty good. thanks for our stay!! :)
good hostel. free wifi and rooms were nice. plenty of tours to join.

the staff were very helpful and the hostel had lots of activities to do each day. the breakfast was excellent and very good value. prepared leaflets and map was very clear. perhaps there could have been a free shuttle to another place in la as opposed to just venice and santa monica beaches, as the buses are very slow and time consuming? the bar inside the hostel was playing music very loudly one night and a staff member frequenting the bar refused to acknowledge it or turn it down.

a very nice place to stay and enjoy the life of hollywood. the staff is very friendly and they very aware of the needs and particularities of hostel visitors. i would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to save some money from accommodation and spend it to the night life.

the staff were friendly, the hostel was average, i liked that they had laundry facilities and that they organised things for you to do while in town. i was only here for one night at the end of my stay in l.a but the time i spent there was decent.

the hostel is perfectly located, with access to virtually anything one could desire. the rooms are well-designed for space and economy, considering there are up to 8 beds in them and the beds include unexpected innovations like individual enclosed lamps for convenience & privacy. the staff appeared to be overworked; they dutifully attended to tasks but with just professional politeness and without enthusiasm.

the location is good. easy to get to from the airport. pretty safe and exciting area. rooms were big and clean. beds a bit noisy. bar was ok - a bit quite. the hostel had atmosphere - pub crawl was ok. free shuttle to santa monica was awesome. beverley hills tour was ok - $12 is a bit expensive. staff were helpful and friendly. wifi was ok - not easy to stay connected. computer access was good - so was printing at reception. would stay again if ever in la.
a wonderful place to stay if you visit l.a . as soon as i go to l.a i stay in this hostel, good location, friendly staff members,  just a good place to stay
clean and great

i love the outlets inside the lockers and at the side of each bed. to be honest, there are outlets everywhere. you always can keep your devices charged. the staff is great and there are really fun activities everyday. i like the location, near the walk of fame and the subway station, although the neighbourhood didn't look that safe. the breakfast is poor, there are few bathrooms and the dorms are too small for that amount of people, but i will consider staying there again next time.
this hotel is clean and near to the train station . receptionist there is helpful.
very close to everything. friendly staff , great facility's & very helpful & safe. would recommend it to anyone

this was such a cool and quirky hostel. it's in a great location right near hollywood blvd and the star walk of fame. they offer tours to the hills, the beach, beverly hills and lots more.     i had a great time staying here and met some really cool people.    would definitely stay here again!!

the hostel was set out perfectly for people who wanted to interact. there was a really nice outdoor courtyard and an indoor bar and general party area. the hostel put on lots of things to do both day and night which was perfect for us. great staff and great hostel, would definitely stay again it's just a shame it's in la

this hostel takes a lot of pride in their service, facilities and security.  they have thought of everything.   the rooms, with power-points to recharge phones and cameras in both lockers and right by your bed are fantastic.  they offer a lot of great tours and group activities.

this hostel was alright, it was really close to everything in hollywood. easy to meet other travelers. clean. there were lots of fun activities, but most cost money. a few more free/cheaper ones would be good.    my main issue was that i was given the worst room possible. it was right across from the kitchen, which means you're not sleeping past 8am. and the hostel was pretty empty yet they packed that room full, i have no idea why they couldn't spread us out more. otherwise good though.

the best hostel i have been until now!  frendly staff, good mattress (don't squeak), locker with outlet, light and outlet by the bed, good breakfast included, usualy cheap dinner availabel.    it's easy to meet new pepople in the common rooms and the bar.    i will defenitly come back if i visit la again.

great hostel! for something located directly off hollywood blvd, for that price, i honestly wasn't expecting much, so i was very pleasantly surprised as it turned out to be one of the nicest hostels i've stayed in! spacious dorms, nice clean bathrooms, and it's nice that wifi was included - most hostels i've stayed at charge an extra fee. wifi was slightly unreliable though, occasionally dropping the connection, but quite decent overall.
great hostel, staff were awesome, good mix of travellers and they were really helpful
usa hostels in san fran & hollywood are defiantly you best option friendly staff great locations highły recommend both of them.   rian (ireland)
that guy roberto that shows people around was real cute/sweet. a+

i allready stayed 2 times in that hostel. its my favorite hostel and i would go back everytime! and believe me i stayed in many hostels all over the world!  if you are looking for party this is the right place. they also offer a free shuttle to venice beach and many other benefits like limo tour, pup crawl for little money and walking tours for free.  it is very clean and the staff is very friendly... good breakfast too!
friendly staff and great atmosphere, lots of activities on offer and kitchen is great to cook your own meals!!

it is an excellent place because you are just in hollywood. it is very good located. in addition, the rooms are pretty clean all the time, they clean every day, that is perfect. besides i do like share the restrooms with the less amount of people possible and i did it in this hostel, one restroom in each dorm room, so i just have to share with maximum 6 persons including myself.
good hostel, in a bit of a dodgy area tho, but that's hollywood. security of hostel good and good bar for drinking
great staff and a friendly environment
awesome hostel! best i've stayed at in the usa.  super secure and great staff lots of activities and an excellent location.   would stay here next i'm in la, highly recommended!
awesome hostel with even their own comedians...and especially the bev. hills tour is recommended!

the hostel is very good located, breakfast included in the price, very clean, they have a lot of activities offered for a good price. the location is appropriate for single travelers, groups or couples. one of the best hostels i was.

if you want to stay in the heart of hollywood and share lots of beer with some friendly fellow travellers, you must come here. the upstairs bar and front courtyard are generally pumping. there is a group of local guys who will try to sneak in but they always get caught and asked to leave. the dorm rooms are fitted out well and bathrooms are clean. most of the staff are friendly and helpful but there are a couple of staff who could really do with a job not involving customers.

i'm traveling by my self so i was a little scare of not meet people, in my first night i went to the limo ride, it was so much fun and the guy was aweosome !!! my stay there was great... i met a lot of people, it's in the hearth of hollywood so you can walk everywhere, there are organized tours at day and night time, free breakfast!!! i have been in hostels around the world and i can say i would love to come back!!!

i've stayed in probably 30+ hostels throughout europe, canada, and the usa.  this is one of the best hostels i've ever stayed in.  great rooms, beds, amenities, location, staff, breakfast/dinner.. keep doing what you're doing :)

although i always saw the staff cleaning, almost all the time in every place as if staged, the pillow and mattresses have disgusting yellow and brown stains. you pass out clean linens? hard to believe since the beds are so nasty. otherwise the locations  was nice and the security was top notch. the location is good although far from downtown.
great location in hollywood. nice breakfast with diy pancakes. free shuttle to the beach also a nice inclusion. very clean rooms with private pod style bunks.

brilliant hostel. great tours run by hostel, super helpful staff. i'm not a huge fan of hollywood area but useful to get around la. rooms are spacious and the bunk pods are so handy. great for privacy and plenty of ports for charging electronics.

absolutely great atmosphere and met heaps of people!! loved the lounge area, lots of fun! and the fact you could drink around the hostel, alot of other ones i went to they wouldn't even let you drink. was a great environment! staff were really helpful and friendly!
nice place with location and connection to city and town
the place was fantastic, great atmosphere but don't expect a full night's sleep.

upon arrival we were placed in a room under maintenance and small, but i contacted the reception and they found another room right away. close to the walk of fame and there were plently of activitives organized by the hostel throughout the week
pretty solid hostel, they organise plenty of things for people to do. location is ok, no such thing as a good location in la, overall clean, fun, and secure hostel.
the best!!!
nothing to be complained. perfect place to stay in la.

the privacy shields in the rooms are fantastic, power outlets in lockers, plenty of planned activities and advice on local entertainment. clean, friendly, helpful staff, great location! can't beat it :)

close to shopping, food & lots of major sites in hollywood. breakfast was outstanding! banana pancakes & oranges started every day off great! free beach shuttle every few days was nice, though it filled up quickly.   staff could have been more helpful, but most were nice enough. rooms were cleaned daily and ensuite bathroom in the dorm was nice to have.   if arriving at lax book super shuttle in advance. they wouldn't take us without a reservation because it was offseason & the cab was over $50.
possibily the best hostel in around hollywood... :)

hey guys, great hostel and great location but the guest mail draw should have a lock methinks.  it'd make sense if you told people not to have important mail sent to the hostel but i did ring ahead and was assured it was fine.  in my case it ended up fine but only through complete coincidence.  otherwise i had a great stay :)
great staff, great location.  hard to get much closer to the centre of the hollywood action.  would stay there again.
usa hostels was a great hostel to stay at. it's located right in the middle of hollywood, staff are friendly & helpful, great areas to hang out in. and they organise events almost everyday.

it seemed a nice hostel, but i had a lot of troubles there. first, i joined a tour to hollywood sign and it was quite unnecessary to join. if you have a car, i definitely recommend you to go by car. there was an arrogant guide with us. although the tour was of 7 people, he left 2 of us behind while taking pictures. second, although i talked to someone at front desk about my early departure, since he did not take a record, i could not get my money back for it. finally dorm room was so hot!

hostel's staff and all the activities make amazing atmosphere. for people who travel like me by themself it perfect place to meet new people. only thing is location , to get to a beach you need more less 1,5 hour. although definitelly recomend this hostel .
bed bugs!!! stay away .....
great hostel. very big and easy to meet travelers from all parts of the world. great common areas, very clean. if going to la recommend highly

really much better than i expected. last time i stayed in a hostel it was dirty and noisy. not the case here! i really appreciated the privacy screens on the beds and power outlets in locker. brilliant idea! the staff were not only welcoming but very informative. not sure that blasting music in the bar was such a great idea, the minute the bar opened. a playlist that starts out mellow and builds up the party atmosphere wld feel less like management is trying to make everyone go outside
hard beds you need to buy a dishwasher dishes not washed in extremely hot water are unsanitary.people there are way too loud couldnt sleep.overpriced.
great hostel well run and good fun. highly recommended

best hostel in hollywood!! love the funky happy atmosphere! the location of the hostel is pretty good, it's near to the walk of fame. the diy pancakes breakfast is so enjoyable! a lot of activities provided thru the whole week. the room is clean and provide individual light and electricity plug for each bunk beds. in additional, the shuttle bus to san francisco pick up point just in front of the hostel! it's so much convenient for us.
overall a great hostel. loved free pancakes in the mornings but need pans without metal handles. really like ensuite bathrooms in the dorms. staff were really friendly.

best dorm room ive stayed in so far. had electricity points and charging facilities for every bed in our 6 bed dorm. good bar upstairs. good walking tour at beverley hills, very excentric chap who ran it. great location! definitely recommended.

nice hostel. rooms a good size.  need to have more activities, esp free ones. need more shuttles going to santa monica than what they have already.  room 104 is in the worst place!!! so noisy from all the people coming in the front door/hanging in the kitchen/coming down stairs. was woken up a lot with noise from people tramping up and down the stairs from the lounge and talking really loudly during 'quiet time (it was about 1am) in the kitchen. crc the security door - it squeaks really loudly

absolutely loved this place! staff are great - very friendly and helpful! rooms are clean. there is always something to do here and the activities provided are great! they really try to ensure that their visitors have a great time.
this place really feel lika home. good vibe, great activities and the location is really good. next time i'll go to hollywood, i'm staying here!

perfect location, staff is organizing a lot of events like barbecue, walks - and you should not miss one of their pub club crawls (nice location).  rooms are very clean, everything felt well organized, very good location.  and of course they have a very good beer pong table in their bar.

i really did feel good there.  too bad i had to zoom off so fast.  the company i received was great, and i really needed to relax.  also, i felt fine going to check out some art openings in that area and returning late.  freedom was wonderful.  bar atmosphere was light and joyful.  the large tv to check out some late night comedy was fun.    thanks  from addine

i had a really great time. staff friendly. cleanliness, secruity and location excellent!  you walk out the door and can see the hollywood blvd with all the stars (-:  i loved the free pancakes for breakfast and also the daily "things to do":   free shuttle bus, beverly hills walking tour with adam, free comedy night, ...  free internet for checking emails - awesome.  i was travelling a year in australia before so stayed in lots of different hostels before - the usa hollywood hostel is the best.
great hostel, nice staff, decent tours and very clean. thanks!
very helpful staff, good price, clean room.
everything was great.
outstanding
great time with really helpful staff, close to heaps of things!
only stayed there for one night, but seemed to be a really great hostel. very good: you can't come in until you show your key.

maybe the most organized hostel i've ever been to, and i've been to a few. they have events every day, cheap beer at the bar and is steps away from hollywood walk of fame. also it's very clean and full of good people, don't let those pictures get you down.

great hostel if you are by yourself. they have activities across fr om the receptionist that you can sign up for each day of the week. stay here but never ever stay in santa monica hostel cuz they are against alcohol even though they post about beer crawls, an lil mellow drunk girl ready to pass out in bed will be kicked out and arrested. they have a great drinking area in this hollywood hostelbs and nice fun partying. limo ride to for bar crawls too. comfortable beds too :)

loved the unlimited pancake breakfast, good kitchen, great staff and good location. what more could you want? maybe aircon, it gets pretty hot in there and with the windows open you hear the revellers and homeless people occasionally (especially on a friday and saturday) but
niec！the location is perfect,this is the best hostel i ever lived expect the  rental is a little expensive.
6 bedded female room is better than 8 bedded female room because there is only one shared bathroom.

just few steps to the walk of fame. the staff are warm and friendly. in addition, i love the small kitchen. in one word, it's an awwwwesome hostel. btw, cash is cheaper than card..they will not tell you that.
its easy place. near of metro and hollywood. there are nights clubs near. the hostel is organized.

the hostel is in a great location next to all the clubs in hollywood, but i'd recommend brining ear plugs as it was pretty noisy on the nights that i needed an early night... definitely recommend this place though

great hostel - good atmosphere in the beer pong room.  only critique would be the excess security levels with the card system - i understand you guys dont want outside people sneaking into the hostel, but if you have just handed me the entry card and then i walk 2 metres to the door i would imagine there is no need to ask to see it again - but besides this it was really a nice place to stay
such a great place to stay. great activities offered. i found it a really easy place to hang out at and feel comfortable. would highly recommend to anyone. fantastic location!!!!
great staff. many activities to do :)
we loved our stay. the staff were so helpful, atmosphere was great, hostel was clean and well serviced. we loved it!
