staff were extremely friendly and knowledgeable. great hostel to meet people especially if you are traveling solo.

i stayed here for two nights. the staff is amazing, very helpful and full of life. they are always running different activities as well as offering food at very reasonable prices. the kitchen is fully equipped but a bit small for the number of guests. the rooms and restrooms are very clean and they provide sheets and towels at no cost. i number of guests per restroom might be a little off but i didn't really have to wait to long anytime i needed it. great experience!

i only had one night here, but i really liked it. location is great, in the middle of hollywood lots of cafes, shops around. beds are comfy and the private screen is great, shower was excellent, bathroom clean. they have a nice patio outside the hostel and a little "bar" area as well. lots of activities every day, so good to meet new people if you are traveling by yourself. the staff was very nice too. music in the common areas is a bit loud during the day tho.
basically, i think the hotel is good , location, cleanliness, security...  paper currency must be prepared , because the coin is refused and there are visa machine fee if you pay by visa.
decent hostel, good location, but again a little pricey...
the location is really good, near by the metrolink station,  but the rooms are too hot to sleep, i couldn't sleep all night!!!!

very good hostel! the staff is really nice, the activities planned are really good, the shared environments (patio, lounge and kitchen) are really clean and comfortable. no wonder why so many people were trying to check-in on that weekend...

really clean, an amazing kitchen area, good activities and very secure. location is great just between hollywood and sunset blvd. i was with friends, but i can see it as being good for single travelers too as there are a bunch of activities to do to meet the other guests.

one of the best hostels i stayed at in america. staff were really good and friendly. the common room upstairs in the evening was a very easy way to make friends as its a very sociable hostel with backpackers, not people living there. the hostel puts on good activities as well.

this place is great to stay at, the dorms are clean and tidy, the power points in the lockers and near the bunks are great. the breakfast is good (you can cook your own pancakes) and they have dinner every night for $6. the staff are great, really helpful. they do good tours, the one in beverly hills was very interesting. this is a very social hostel and the staff are good about letting you play drinking games in the patio. would definitely stay here again.
the breakfast and all-you-can-eat are so good!

overall had a fine stay.  i think lower occupancy rooms would have made stay better.  with 6 people coordinating bathroom use it was very inefficient.  the rooms got quite hot and the ceiling was not always adequate off cooling down the room.  the lounge and activities were good.  breakfast was great.  i think a fresh coat of paint especially to the exterior would dramatically improve the appearance.  staff were very helpful

easily one nicest hostel i've stayed at. it's a small place so it was super easy to make friends and feel at home. bobby, one of the managers runs a weekly snorkel trip where you get to swim with wild seas!! it was crazy memorable!!! such a sweeeeeet place :) an ideal hostel.
it's nice and convenient
i had the best time there, the staff were super friendly and were fun to have a drink or two with! the atmosphere is great, you know you'll always have a blast.
great place to stay. probably the best hostel i have stayed at and been to quite a few throughout australia and europe.

i just got back from l.a. and i had an amazing time there! it was my first trip by myself and i'm very picky, so i was a little worried about how clean and secure a hostel would be. anyway, i was very happy about the service. very clean room and bathroom, free towels, nice covers.. and there are lots of activities that the hostel offers, which is an easy way to make friends. i loved l.a. too, incredible city! very busy place and  really hot.
highly recommended for the student traveller! fantastic location and very friendly and helpful staff! :)
beds are so uncomfortable.

this hostel was great...idea of a personal light is great...however, raising the bottom bunks up so high makes it hard to sit on the bed without hitting your head on the bunk above, makes you hunch over to sit. security is great...they make you show the key before buzzing you through the door. breakfast was great too, make your own pancakes.

the hostel is very good. its ideal for single travelers as they arrange activities for every day.    only downside, no air on in rooms though you won't notice it except in peak of summer.    the other was hollywood in general is not as clean as you'd think but that's beyond their control.    overall recommend it. plenty of power plugs to recharge your devices, wifi pretty good, had good laundry facilities easily get to train/metro.

the second i arrived i was greeted with the wonderful friendly staff. the rooms are great. the room i stayed in was to the rear of the hostel and i had no noise complaints at all, even with two clubs next door. if you are a light sleeper be warned because the bass coming from the clubs could be disruptive. if you are concerned with security there are lockers to keep your things in, i didnt make use of the lockers however.  the kitchen is well equipped. everything was just amazing!
i enjoyed my stay very much

we only stayed one night at this hostel, but i was impressed by the clean modern room & the comfortable beds. we did not use the breakfast room, but it did look nice as i passed by in the morning. i also noticed many sign-up sheets for sightseeing trips & tours offered by the hostel, including a beach shuttle, all for cheap prices and some of them even free! if i had stayed longer i definitely would have taken advantage of these. the location is also ideal! stay here, you won't be disappointed.

usa hotels hollywood was a great place to stay.  extremely clean, very secure with large lockers and two power points inside the lockers and friendly staff.  there were also a number of activities run by the hostel and a fully equipped kitchen.  wireless was not always stable but a fantastic location and overall, a good place to stay.  definitely recommended.
a very clean hostel rightin the centre of all the attractions! perfect location.
i really liked it, one of the best ones i've stayed so far!

i think the everyday activites must be done as doubles in mornings and evenings because there will be a very big waiting list for those who signed up late and the wouldnt have the chance to do it.  the kitchen closes so early for me i guess because i like to have snacks after midnights but it is already closed  in pub crawls places must be picked carrefuly because i signed for one supposed to reach a club but when we reached a place without even a dance floor so i had to walk tomthe hostel !!

very impressed with this hostel! i had looked at others around the same location but decided to pay that bit extra for this one and it was definitely worth it! very clean and very secure, the 'privacy pods' are a fantastic idea and the free shuttle buses that were offered were much appreciated, as were the 'all-you-can-eat' bbqs and breakfast. i would definitely stay here again!
really good service. quality breakfast, spacious and functional kitchen and awesome lounge area. too bad hollywood is ghetto.
brilliant hostel. extremely friendly and helpfull staff
good thank you
friendly welcoming and well organized hostel. pancakes to be self made proposed for breakfast was nice!

the staff were particularly great - i left a small electronic device in my hostel room and they were more than happy to locate it and then arrange for it to be posted to me!  generally quite comfortable otherwise - the privacy pods very useful. a larger variety of breakfast foods would have been nicer.
the facilities and location are great..... but the staff are not very helpfull at all and quiet unfriendly....its a shame!

great hostel! i particularly liked the "privacy pod" with two power outlets, lamp and shelf and the all-you-can-eat make-it-yourself pancake breakfast. excellent location, very close to the main attractions at hollywood. free towel and bed linen. security is great, you must show your key to the desk staff to get in, also there are power outlets inside the lockers. would definitely stay there again.

loved this hostel. everyone was very friendly and the staff and roommates were awesome. only slight issue...the guy that was showing our new roommates to our room never knocked before he came in. we would've appreciated that. but overall, we loved it here

i stay an overnight here for flight transfer only. but the bed is well equiped as there are bed headlight, charge plugs around each bed and a small platform to put your watch, mobile etc, excellent!  also you can make your own pancake for breakfast and jam, bread & drinks are served by yourself, not bad. and it is close to a disco and maybe i arrive on a sat night, everyone is in mood of partying. generally its quite good!  especially there is a hostel private post box for postal, great!

i will always go to usa hostels first in la. it was one of the best i have stayed in my 15ish countries that i have visited and i will certainly been trying the others in the us when i visit.  thanks for a great, secure and reliable stay.
good to live and have fun.. though i felt the room is a little bit hot and dark.. but the location is really good!
great location and staff, but because of the location it is quite busy and can be noisy as there is a nightclub two doors down

it is good, but compared with usa hostel in san diego, i prefer the latter. actually, i think the room is a little bit small.... i feel a little bit disappointed when i first enter in(it's my first hostel experience in my life).. but it is really fun to meet a lot of people there.. everyone is friendly!
awesome hostel!! very nice staff, very clean and excellent location in la. would definitely stay here again :)
very nice kitchen and good breakfast, clean rooms with plugs inside the lockers and ensuite bathrooms, room key check before entering. the staff at the reception was unfriendly though.

the hostel is situated in a excellent location, on hollywood boulevard! there's air conditioning and bathroom in the room. the staff was great, friendly, helpful and nice!!! spacious and functional kitchen, good breakfast, tea and coffee always available, at any time!!!! many activities and events organized by the hostel!!! definitely recommended!!!!!
good friendly hostel with very knowledgeable staff.

it was a nice hostel but rooms had no air con which was terrible. good location in hollywood but pretty expensive for what you get. a drinking water filter would be good. don't bother looking for a party here if you're under 21.
it's kinda cool.. cool people. very very stricked on showing your key, which can get a but annoying but i guess they gotta do it..apart from that i enjoyed my stay
this hostel was hilarious, it was super kool!! i loved my stay here. you want to stay by the beach when in la and its 5mins away. staff are great rooms and fine, kitchen is great. stay here!!

all in all this hostel was just ok, nothing better. i personally didn't really like the vibe that was created by some of the people who stayed there, but that is not the fault of the hostel. decent location, probably would look elsewhere next time i am in la.
very tasty pancake dow!
it's convenient but really noisy because of the nearby clubs. anyway, it's good.
a pretty nicely set up and run hostel. easy to meet people either upstairs or at the front courtyard. kitchen is nice too and the free breakfast is pretty good. right near the hollywood sites.

when i arrived, a staff member (who's name i have forgotten but he is from mexico) showed me the facilities, carried my suitcase up the stairs and showed me my room. i much appreciated how friendly and helpful he was as i arrived late and tired.
i enjoyed the time i stayed in the hostel. i made some friends there and traveled together with the tours in this hostel. it was a very good experience.
excellent hostel, would definetly go back.
good location. pretty good set up with bar upstairs and front courtyard. pretty good rooms, great kitchen, and easy to meet people!

the rooms were fantastic - i loved the privacy pods! it definitely didn't feel like your standard hostel. the staff were very helpful and always offered useful information and advice about where to go and how to get there. loved the breakfast too - what a great idea to have pancakes!
it was a very active hostel as in there were heaps of tours offered and is great if you want to experience the party scene in la.
highly recommended, best location, great fun, awesome people, super friendly staff, wickid bar... definitely staying there again - from aussies abroad
very central to everything but if you're a light sleeper then better to know there's a club next door in the car park and you might have trouble getting to sleep. i didn't mind too much.
great place:)
wifi isnt in all the hostel place, just in some parts/rooms... :(

an all round great place to stay, with excellent facilities, very friendly and helpful staff who know alot about the city. the extra tours and events the hostel put on are great fun. and its in a near perfect location. the hostel is full of young travellers and has a lively atmosphere, its a good way to meet other travellers.
the location is great, close to everything. it's clean and quite. bottom line, i would recommend it to friends.
nice hostel, clean and good people staying there! good location!   the wifi signal was a mess  staff not very nice
amazing location, friendly and helpful staff. amazing hotel style breakfast!! best place to be in

i loved this hostel! upon arrival the staff were very friendly, we were shown to our room and then the facilties that they have. they offered a range of day and night activties which were very good! the staff got involved with everything and socialised well with everyone. the location is walking distance from hollywood boulevard and easy access to buses and the subway!  overall i really enjoyed my stay and this hostel and would recommend it if people are looking for a lively atomsphere!
it is near hollywood ave.
very good hostel.
the best hostel in hollywood/la by far!

a good hostel.  i'd have preferred to have had better wi-fi, and a staff member didn't try the common solution of reseting the router when i suggested it, which usually improves connectivity.    if i have any issue, though, it's that the commons area doesn't encourage much socializing.  tables are small, giving a cramped atmosphere where big groups of people can't really converse and make new friends.    it doesn't help that it costs twice as much to stay here as it does at otherr nice hostels.

hostel is in a dodge area of hollywood- during the day followed back to hostel, have never been asked for money so often  i would stay elsewhere in la say santa monica and spend half a day in hollywood to one day and then leave    once in the hostel it was nice
great place and the most awesome staff! loved the reception cookies :p

i have definitely enjoyed my stay at usa hostels in hollywood. it was located just next to the walk of fame area with nice pubs and shops nearby. if i am ever in hollywood again, i would definitely stay here and i would also recommend it to friends. i have been traveling in australia for a year and have stayed at over 30+ hostels and this one gets it right! lots of things to do and cheap deals organized by the hostel kept you moving and exploring. the 4th of july bbq was also amazing! very clean

this is one of the best hostels i have ever stayed in and i have stayed in a lot! not only is it clean, with comfortable beds and lots of power points, it has an awesome vibe. the courtyard is the perfect place to hang out after a long day sight seeing and make some great new friends. the hostel events and "all you can eat" dinners are excellent value and so much fun! do the limo tour! i love usa hostels!!

really enjoyed my stay here, clean with good facilities and always something going on.  free trips to hollywood sign and the beach and much more!  only downside was my room faced a nightclub which was incredibly loud until about 2am so don't expect much sleep
bob was an awesome tour guide on the pub crawls and a good laugh!
i had a very good experience in the place. it is in close proximity to the main attractions
the lounge is a great place to hang out at the end of the day.

the staff is extremely helpful- whatever you need. making friends is very easy. beds are very comfy and the privacy pods make sleeping a pleasure. the cleaning personal did a fantastic job every morning, considering the mess we guys left every morning. but now the most important thing:  the location is perfect, all attractions are just around the corner. furthermore the guys offer a free beach shuttle or beverly hills tours. and bbq is yummy.
nice hostel. no complaints.
it is a great hostel in a great location, will definitely stay again!!
loved this hostel wish i could have stayed longer than 1 night, but it was one awesome night!
i hope there should be free provision of hot boiled water in the kitchen....
by far the best hostel for partying and having a great time loved all the people here everyone was so helpful i will be back this place was awesome!

i have enjoyed my stay with usa hostel hollywood great position staff a all very helpful  especially   joesph  on the desk very helpful and also entertainment man  brendon he puts on some fun nights   thanks   doreen fair
really a nice place, feels like a hotel!
overall great place to stay!
awesome hostel, clean, and friendly staff!! will recommend !
it's one of the big hostel chain. you can rely on the service, facility. they have better character than ny one.
amazing hostel with a friendly staff and good atmosphere : )

i was in a room near the door that leads to the dorm area.  for security, everyone needs to be buzzed into the dorm.  this was incessant and made it difficult to sleep.  there was extremely loud talking/arguing going on all night which wasn't policed effectively and kept me up . that was the biggest problem. the floor in my dorm was very noisy  and made a huge crash whenever someone jumped off their bunk. do not stay here.  i left after one night.  just awful.

in a very good area of hollywood. walking distance to the chinese theatre.   hostel is clean and my room had their own bathroom. rooms were big which is a bonus, breakgfast is also included, plus they have a nice outdoor area
the best hostel i've ever been

best hostel i have stayed in. great location, take advantage of the activities and see the sights, staff is really helpful and know the area and where to go to.  a few drinks in the bar are a great place to kick off the night.
some of the staff members weren't friendly and looked like they're were doing a favor by answering a question. but the girls that worked at the bar were really cool.

a friend and i had a fun stay over memorial day weekend in one of the six-bed mixed dorms. we booked at the last minute and were pleased by how convenient the location was to many of the major sites and train stations in hollywood. staff were welcome upon arrival and helpful when planning activities around the city. i would recommend this hostel to others looking for budget-friendly accommodations!
great hostel, only now realising how good it was now that we are staying at another hostel in san fran
the rooms were such a great size and the privacy screens with the shelf, light and plugs were awesome!

great hostel just off the strip, helpful staff, good facilities, breakfast was good, and all you can eat meals for dinner (cheap meal). daily activities and nights at the pub inside. good atmosphere. they need to get rid fo the comic night as it was terrible.

great location.  the staff was really helpful and knowledgable.    the free breakfast was great, it included pancakes and fresh fruit, oatmeal, toast. deffinately good for your money.  the hostel was very clean and modern. i would love to stay here again.

loved this hostel! would stay there again in a heartbeat. the location is good, close to the strip if that's what you're after,  the staff were very helpful, atmosphere was great! made it so easy to meet other travellers, the hostel puts on lots of activities! walking tours, pub crawls etc. breakfast was pretty decent. my favorite thing though about this hostel is that every bed had its own nightlight, shelf and power point!
great location, friendly staff and great to have organised activities. great hostel for meeting people if you're a solo traveller
it was great you should expand to other states like florida och new jersey, it would be great to have you in new york or miami. i would definitely work for you guys if yu ever need personal. :)
the best hostel i have ever stayed in, clean excellent facilities, friendly and helpful staff and in such a great location. perfect for any hosteller.
great place to stay! loved how each bed has a light and power outlets
cool beds with own outlets and light. own bathroom in each room. many guided tours. breakfast was not as good as i wished.

great hostel, though not in the best area (hollywood itself is dirty, not very very nice, and very far from the beach, downtown or bh).   they are pretty tight on their security access to the dorms area, not so much to the patio.   lots of fun activities planned that you can sign up for for very little money and a good chance to meet people if you are introverted as me and travelling on your own.   they have free breakfast (make your own pancakes and toast) and everynight dinner partys for $6.
it is a clean mid-size hostel in the heart of hollywood. breakfast is kinda simple...i'd add at least free milk+cereal. stuff were excellent.
loved it!

awesome hostel in a great spot, about 5 mins walk to the chinese theatre in hollywood. the staff were all super nice and helpful. they do bbq dinners and cheap drinks in the bar, definitely value for money! would definitely stay here again!

jaime at the front desk was excellent, as was johnny, other female receptionists didn't want to be there in the slightest. breakfasts were excellent, as was security and location. only two out of five washing machines were working which made life a little tedious and internet reception in the rooms would drop out constantly. great hostel in general, clean, tidy, secure... all in all a good place to stay in la.

usa hostels hollywood has a great location near hollywood sights and public transportation (metro red line). it's a very nice hostel except that there are too many too strict rules, e.g. only water is allowed in dorms, no other food/drinks.
everything is very good !
great hostel, friendly staff and great organised activities.. including limo rides, pub crawls, trips to themeparks!

2nd time i have stayed at this hostel - there is always something happening, good walking tours, beach shuttle buses etc. kitchen is really great, free breakfast, cheap dinners every night in the hostel.

i had a great stay at usa hostels hollywood.  great pancake breakfast, short stroll to the walk of fame and the hostel offers plenty of add on features like walking tours, pub crawls and upstairs there is a chill out area and bar... includes beer pong and fuseball!  great stay! great hostel!

the location and the staff of the hostel are great, if you want to have a party every night and meet other travellers go there. however it felt a bit like a kindergarden with all the rules to obey.. no drinks and food in the rooms, no sleeping bag in the room and you don't even get it back for packing up your stuff, whats that all about..  overall stay was nice though, thanks to the very friendly staff!
i was so impressed by the facilities this hostel offers ..the atmosphire was amazing and the staff were friendly and helpful
tacky and unsafe location. lack of community.

awesome place to stay and well situated near the hollywood boulevard. only problems were that the wifi does not reach the end of the hostel so some rooms may not have access and also noise levels being higher than i would've preferred. guess that's dependant on your luck : when you stay and who you stay with. overall a pleasant experience though!

i've stayed in tons of hostels around the world and i'd have to say that this is one of the best. awesome staff, rad activities and a sweet bar with live music and comedy you guys really knock it out of the park. ill be back next time i'm in town for sure.
would definately stay there again!

das beste hostel, in dem ich jeh war!!! das fuehstueck war fantastisch und die mitarbeiter unbeschreiblich nett und hilfsbereit. ich hatte nur drei tage in los angeles und dank den angeboten des hostels und der hilfe der mitarbeiter wurden diese drei tage unvergesslich! das hostel war immer super sauber (kueche, bad...) und ich habe mich sehr sicher gefuehlt. der preis ist zwar hoch, aber es ist auf jeden fall wert, ein paar dollar mehr zu bezahlen.
thank you guys for making me feel so welcome.  it was so much fun to hang out with you.  whenever anybody of you wants to come to austria, feel free to pop by ;)

great hostel, rooms are spacious and clean and beds have privacy screens, lights, power points.  lockers all have power points as well.  free breakfast is great and kitchen is well equipped.  loads of activities, plenty of opportunity to meet people, see la and party.  one of my favourites.

this is one of the best hostels i've ever been to. the staff are really helpful and friendly and the daily tours are great value. a big thanks to bob who took us on the "pub crawl". it was really awesome.
really great hostel - right in hollywood, good facilities, big kitchen, lounge, things to do, laundry room, really well organised.
rude staff.

it is situated in hollywood with just a 10 min walk to the chinese theatre, madam tussaud's and ripley's believe it or not. they have a kitchen facility where every morning the staff at the hostel prepares batter for pancakes and so you could prepare yourself a yummy breakfast of pancakes with syrup in less than 5 mins. they also provide fresh fruits, cereals and coffee.  it is very clean and hygienic and the staff is extremely friendly. the hostel had a very lively atmosphere.

the hostel is in a great location and is clean and well looked after.  atmosphere with other travellers was great.  the staff however where very strict with the security and at times were rude even to their own guests.  this definitely needs improvement.

usa hostels are some of the best in the states..also stayed at usa in san fran not booked through hostelworld so i cant review it but also amazing. heaps of events to get everyone to meet and make friends. clean. loads of security.
nice place in a kind of crippy neighborhood. a lot of homeless and drunk people walking on the street.   but it is still a good place do stay.
great hostel in the perfect location. all very clean with huge lockers. awesome activities, free pancakes for breakfast and free wifi. had a fab time!
the location is very good. it is close to the hollywood and bus stops. a lot of dining places and cafe are around. the staff are very friendly and helpful.

really good hostel in the heart of hollywood. good bar in the lounge,great for meetting people if you are travelling alone. lots of avtivities and tours as well, which are low cost or free, so all in all a good hostel.
amazing hostel that i could not recommend highly enough. awesome staff, great activities and location. all the rooms were clean and well furnished. would definitely go back.
of all the hostels i stayed in this was easily the best.
everything about the hostel is great, they exceeded my expectations. the staff is awesome and the location is great too.
really good hostel. had no issues for the stay. multiple activites organised like shuttle bus to beaches, walking tour, pub crawl etc. staff were awesome in answering questions too.

loved the atmosphere and the people staying and working at the hostel mede me feel right at home. the aim of the hostel seems to be to make sure everyone has a great time there and meet great people which i certianly did. room was a bit stuffy but i had a few drinks so slept right through!

this was by far one of the best hostel experiences i've had so far.  this place is cleaner than most fancy hotels i've stayed in, the location is excellent and it offers daily cheap (and tasty) food... oh, and the staff is just amazing. would definitely come back!
it was an ok hostel. was caught by surprise at the cost of parking...but i should have looked closer. i felt rather unsafe going back and forth from the parking after hours though.
is  nice place, staff is great and friendly, but i really prefer small hostels when is easier to the guest to become close.
i enjoyed my stay at usa the free breakfest was amazing, just like the hostel.

very good hostel, just next to hollywood boulevard, the kodak theatre, and the chinese theatre. very clean, cool staff members. only deffect : the breakfast. no milk nor orange juice, and the choice was quite poor.

very well organised hostel with great facilities and lots of activities. easy enough to meet people, and everyone enjoyed the breakfast. located in hollywood, easy walk to train station, but a long way from the beach if that's what you are looking for. the surrounding area felt a little seedy at night, but it's not to far to great places.

the hostel was acceptable enough, albiet rather expensive given the quality of accommodation and facilities - the rooms were tiny and the lack of secure luggage space was a bit worrying. i've backpacked around australia where i've received much better backpacker accommodation for a similar price (for about $40 you get a single room and the facilities are much newer, with flat screen tvs, large lounges, pool t). maybe this is how it is in la, who knows but i wouldn't say i was terribly impressed.

worst hostel i have ever stayed in!!! (and ive been around teh world) the staff were the most unhelpful people i have ever met. we arrived really late and didnt have us dollars on us and they wouldnt even hold our bags while we went to an atm! we asked lots of questions about different places and some of the responses were 'i dont know' 'ring them yourselves!' also the place has so many rules that its worse than high school. would not reccomend it at all.
the staff was very rude to me, and to many others. they wouldn't help you with directions and facilitating your move arounds.  it wasn't entirely clean, the wifi connection sucked!!!!
would definitly come back, because fun its garanteed and people are very nice!

the hostel have party every day until 4 am, it is very difficult to slep there, hollywood isnt a safe place for woman, who travel allon. the staff the hostel aren't helpful and the most are umpolide. i dont recomend stay here, only if you like the party. the shuttel service just bring you to the beach you have to como back by bus, that take more 2 hours. the hostel is far to the airport, it is better you stay in the downtown..
wonderful! so many great daily activities organised by the hostel.
comfortable beds, very secure. nice to have bathroom in the room and a light with every bed. staff was ok. did no think the hostel had a lot of character.
great location, free wifi, cool social events and big lockers in every room. i would stay there again.
excellent hostel great staff,great location could not ask for more,comedy night is a great touch!!!

a nice, bigger hostel in hollywood. rooms are clean, bathroom was one of the nicest i ve seen so far in hostels. the area is not the best, but thats just hollywood. a lor going on in the neighbourhood at night.

the staffs were great and the maps and information sheet provided were really helpful!! pancakes in the morning were great too. the only complain i have is that my bed wasn't made when i arrived. it was like i had to get into a messy bed that someone had just gotten out minutes earlier. felt kinda yucky...

i gave this hostel full marks this time.  i've stayed at this hostel before and i enjoyed it, i liked the staff, but i had major problems with the wireless internet on my previous visit just like everyone else at that time.  it seems they have got it right now and there were no problems with it at all this time.  rock on, guys.  "cat" is my fave.  she totally looks out for me.  but they all do.  they work hard at this hostel and you get that feeling that everyone cares about the place.
loved the fact it was so close to hollywood walk of fame, so easy to get round with public transport. also liked the hostel meals for $6 saves cooking.
staff should be a bit more friendly

if your looking at this hostel cause youve stayed in one of the other usahostels and loved them, look down the road to banana bungalow right now! i constantly felt like i was being ripped off at usa, they charge for all the pub crawls, no one ever offered me a free beer like in other usa hostels and the parties were none existent. some staff were amazing and others rude, didnt like their security system. if you want to go to the bath room and someones in yours already, theres no where else to go

i love the staff and the organization of the events, but the cleanliness was not ok...a lot of things around the room floor...i know that the staff didn't put that there, but they didn't remove either...most of the time the room was very...i mean very hot!!! not ok with that!
amazing location!  very friendly environment and great value for your money.

excellent location! staff are nice and helpful and helped us to book a shuttle back to the airport even though it was less than 24hrs before the booking time. the rooms on the left can hear the music that comes from the club across the carpark but its not too bad. the power points in the lockers are great and the showers had good water pressure. would definately stay here again :)

good location right near the heart of hollywood. staff were a bit hit and miss. some were fantastic others were a little less friendly. security was a bit on the crazy side of over the top but at least you were safe and secure. i have recommended this hostel to friends. quite good without being fantastic.

visited during an aussie breeding season this is another stellar addition to the usa hostels range though it needs to play catch up with san francisco!    good staff, always on hand in the communal facilities...the kitchen/dining area in particular seemed their favoured place to play hooky from work and lament management. also the excellent laundry facilities ($2.50 for wash+dry) never failed to contain 2 staff members hitting on each other, i always wondered why they close it off at lunch time...

this was my first experience in a hostel (female, traveling solo). usa hostels hollywood was great! i would recommend to anyone. the rooms were a little hot at night (january) and it's located right next to the post office (which loads up their big trucks at about 6am..loudly) but honestly, it wasn't that bad at all. location fantastic, easy access to metro. security was excellent, and very clean. people were awesome. the hostel organizes lots of activities and opportunity to be social.
one of the best hostels i've stayed in.

every good thing they say about this place is true from the great staff to a location that can't be beat.  they are tough on security which gives that extra comfort level.  however, i only gave an average score for facility because (although the facility itself is fine) the wi-fi is useless everywhere in the building except for a spot where everyone crams together near the soda machines.  this was bad.  internet communication are extremely important for travelers. wi-fi signals are easy to fix.

great staff and a great location if you are keen on checking out hollywood. not such a good location if you are interested in checking out venice beach and santa monica as they are about a 2 hour bus ride away. i would stay again.
a lot of tours,great
usa hostels hollywood is great, i don't have any complains.

i have stayed in some of the best hotels and motels across the country including hyatt etc. this, however was the best in terms of total package. the location was excellent right in between hollywood boulvard and the sunset strip, the staff were very friendly and knowledgeable, making it easy to get around. great way to meet people and the tours and facilities were excellent. very impressed

i stayed previously in usa hostels san francisco (same chain) and i really liked it, so i though the one in la must have same standards of quality, but definitely not. the staff was not that helpful( the asian girl in the front desk not friendly at all),when i arrived there they gave me sheets which supposed to be clean but guess what  they were full of hair and dirty, so i went back to the front desk and ask for new ones, luckily this time were clean.the location was good.

what i love most about this hostel is that they have several in-house acitivites that urge people to interact as well as head out together. that's very important for people who're travelling alone and are looking for travel buddies.
this is an exellent place. impecably clean. excellent location. friendly staff. i very highly recommend it.

it's a fantastic place to make friends, have fun and a great base from which to see la.  every night dinner is available for around $6,  fun events go on in the lounge and tours are available every day to see something of interest in la. clean, great staff, safe and secure. i'd stay at usa hollywood every time.

really good place to be if you want to see hollywood...in la you stay where you wanna go, so hollywood is a must, and this place has you sorted. pancake breakfast and the cheap dinners are great. some more vegetarian options and morning coffee would make this place even more amazing.
so friendly staff and great location. on jan. 6th,2011,i saw lucy liu ! that night, the tv show "southland" was shooting on that street ,10 meters from this hostel!

excellent overall hostel, awesome free/cheap tours. helpful staff and top location. each shared dorm has a single shower/toilet which is ok but awkward when 4 people need to shower at once. really good vibe, a beer pong table and cheap beers - what more do you want?
i love it!!
best but also most expensive hostel i have ever stayed.
hostel is was sweet - met some great people...
2nd visit in as many years. owners always improving the standard of living at usa hostels. most impressed!
it's really a nice place to stay, staff are very friendly and funny, i am very happy i made a right choose

a nice hostel, right on hollywood blvd so there's heaps of stuff to do there. the people i met there were cool, some of the staff weren't that friendly and seemed to think because you had the piece of paper they gave you upon arrival, you would automatically know everything about the place and not have to ask them any questions...but anyway other than that its an awesome place to stay in la.
not cheap, but everything is clean and nice!!!

the cubby beds were amazing, the lockers were massive and had plug sockets in them :) -awesome. the security is pretty good (in terms of who can get inside the hostel). the communal areas were heaps of fun and they even have a beer pong table which def brings travellers together :) staff were really nice esp johnny, he's lovely :) would definitely stay here again and would recommend to anyone :)

a well located hostel that lacked a bit in atmosphere, but i was still able to meet other travellers there. they provide activities, but 2 were cancelled while i was there. the bar upstairs gets going a bit after dinner and they have cheap drinks, beer pong, comfy couches and tvs. the beds in the dorms are quite good as they have a little privacy wall, shelf, light and power socket. they also have decent lockers in the rooms but you need to provide your own (big) lock. our room was noisy.

the hostel was pretty expensive, but i feel that hostels are generally more expensive in the us than in europe. the staff was welcoming and everything was clean. we were told not to leave any valuables in the room unlocked but there were no locks provided. we were told to that we could buy one at the front desk and then they were out of locks and it was christmas and we couldn't buy any. honestly, either you provide locks or you have enough to sell.

usa hostels are definitely the best in the us. very friendly staff, they offer day trips around la. hollywood at night can be dangerous but with a few steps from the hostel you have stars under your feet!
good vibe and character, and location is pretty good. maybe a bit more choice for breakfast would be nice but very happy with the hostel
good, clean hostel.

i really enjoyed staying at usa hostels hollywood. the place was very clean and friendly, albeit slightly disorganised, but it had everything you need in a hostel, same as its san franscisco counterpart! the airport shuttle was very good also. the location was as good as can be expected in los angeles, which is a complete pain to get around.

friendly place and nice staff. the privacy corners on the beds were great. ensuite bathroom shared between 8 girls meant some long waits for the shower, but it was clean. pancakes basic but yummy. a bunch of aussie dickheads spent most of one night drunkenly shouting and running up and down the hallways; staff tried to tell them to keep it down after about 2am with little success - not exactly their fault, but in some other hostels i reckon they'd have been kicked out. still, good times.
i can't think that it was n excellent stay
very good hostel, one of the staff was unfriendly, everybody else was nice.
i like your hotel
everything except location was excellent by hostel standards and social atmosphere was fantastic! location was not perfect but the hollywood area is an interesting part of la

staff were really helpful and nice, location is perfect for the hollywood tours. only slight negative is that they play music till 11pm sometimes but they always turn off. i would definitely stay again.
staff is awesome!! too many guys in the hostel when i came lol .otherwise quite good.

a group of 3 of us stayed here for 2 nights in mixed 6 bed room.   pros: freek breakfast that includes unlimited pancakes, coffee & tea, good wifi connection throughout hostel, very close to hollywood sights, showers in room good, communal area with bar is awesome & has some cheap drinks, friendly helpful staff that had a lot of knowledge.  cons: kitchen shutting for cleaning right after breakfast finishes us a bit inconvenient.  this is party hostel, would recommend staying here, will stay again
it s a amazing hostel with a great vibe and  awesome staff. so helpful!! i'll def come  again.

overall the stay was fabulous! amazing location, always things to do, great communal areas and nice privacy in the room. the staff were so incredibly helpful and made me feel very welcome!! the only thing i'd stay is don't go on the walking tour, i felt it to be a waste of time! have a great stay!!
great hostel, very clean and safe. staff were not very helpfull though..

great hostel. amenities were very sufficient. kitchen was large to accommodate all guests. only problem we had was the cancellation of the beach shuttle bus however staff provided adequate information on how to get to the beach.
great place to stay, although not for long as hollywood can get old.
at first, it was hard to find here, but finally we found out the location of this hostel is wonderful. staffs were all very friendly and there was a party upstairs ;) also, here is very clean :)

i had a brilliant time at this hostel and made loads of new friends thanks to the lively and social environment. i loved all the trips and activities that were planned and the kitchen (with free tea and coffee) and the privacy pods were an added bonus! a lovely place to stay :)
had a great time. the staff were friendly and very helpful. i would definitely stay again when in la.

great hostel, staff were fantastic, the bar girls jamie and mellie went out of there way to make sure everyone was having a good time. especially great full for there care of my sick friend. can only say good things
its a very good hostel. i dont really know if there are better places to stay at in la, cause everything is very spread out. but good showers, beds , and you can definitively have fun.

this place was perfectly situated between two of the most popular streets in la. the staff were awesome, the atmosphere was fantastic, the bar was great, the tours were great. they are a well organised and knowledgable hostel and will go above and beyond to help you out. would definitely stay again, so much fun!
i had an amazing time, great location, very clean, fun, and the staff were great. special thanks to kim and kat :).

i've stayed at more than a few hostels over the years, and this is equal best in my book. quite simply; friendly helpful staff, very clean rooms and amenities, comfortable beds, hot water, wifi, great activities, a great social atmosphere and free breakfast! what more can you ask for!

great organisation. i asked for a silent room, it's far from the lounge, so i slept well all 3 nights. everyone in my room respect the others, so no noise after 11pm, we keep clean our room...  i really apreciate that we can have good wifi everywhere. every morning i wake up with the good smells of pancake...  we could share our travel experiences with others, there is excelent atmosphere
a+ hostel. really enjoyed staying here....staff were friendly, met new people and also the hostel provided many activities.

there was a girl that was on staff that was really rude to me and my friend, she needs to seriously reconsider her attitude towards guests and she also over charged us when we left a few bags in the bag store (charged us for four days when we were only leaving them for three, then argued with us when we asked why she was charging so much)
the facility is very conventient and the staff is so nice. but the wifi is not easy to get the ip.

i had a great time. the staff were very friendly and helpful. the lively and fun nature of the hostel  attracted likewise guests so the days were great fun, meeting new people and hanging out. great job guys keep it up.

i had a fabulous stay - met great people - i would definitely stay there again!  in close proximity to a variety of key bus lines and the train.  right near trader joe's grocery store.    rooms are clean, the staff is so helpful and friendly.  thanks for creating such a great space!
awesome! helpful staff, great location near hollywood boulevard and great bundled walking tours combine for an outstanding experience =) don't think any other hotels have the same vibe and liveliness

this is a great hostel for people traveling on their own or groups interested in meeting other people because the hostel activities (limo tour, hollywood sign tour, walking tours, pub crawls, etc) are well attended and reasonably well promoted within the hostel.
mellie was awesome behind the bar, and kevin was the man behind the bbq. well done by both!!
nice hostel + friendly staff and nice visits organised by the hostel. a two minute walk from main hollywood and thus close-by to public transport.

great hostel, big enough to offer heaps of activities and tours everyday aswell as good pubcrawls and night life. about 100m away from hollywood boulevard. the only downside is la´s terrible public transport system but this cant be atributed to the hostel. great hostel. recommended.  internet is expenisive but lots of computers provided

nice spaghetti dinner & bbq nights for $6.  the privacy screens around each bunk are great!  they have a light & power outlets, plus a little shelf.  very convenient.  :-)  the staff are fabulous, especially the evening shift.  the place feels like a university dorm.  security is very tight as you have to show your room key every time you enter.  bed is quite comfy!  only major complaint is no quiet area to lounge.  lounge turns into bar and patio is for smoker's and is cold this time of year.
everyone was so nice and helpful! i really enjoyed my stay! i will be back in november 2012! thanks!
i had to cancel and they didn't charge the expected refund fee. great service.
the hostel was ok. took an 8-sharing mixed dorm and it wasn't crammed or uncomfortable at all. staff weren't very friendly though except for the receptionists. otherwise, it was good but not great.
too crowded and bad breakfast...a little expensive for the service...but it was a lot better compared to most hostels in la..so it was ok
staff super friendly and helpful, place was really clean and felt really safe place to be, just wish there was soap in the bathrooms!

great hostel! the usa hostels chain to supplies what backpackers need - the "privacy pod" consisting of a barrier, shelf, personal light, power points plus power points in the lockers are awesome & makes it feel homely! the security is great as you have to show your card to get in. the hostel arranges lots of activities to do. rooms are spacious & clean. toilets & showers are clean. staff are very friendly & helpful. the only mild concern was the annoying loud music in the hallway late at night!
fairly good hostel... no complaints.. staff weren't overly friendly but the location is good and there's pancakes you make yourself for breakfast every morning which are delicious!!!

the location is very near to hollywood  boulevard but without a car you can forget los angeles. to long distances to much time in bus. john is the very best of the staff memebers he really helps you, some of the ladies had no plan about public transportation and were to lazy to check in the computer. kitchen and room are very clean they take really care about this, but met no good people and l.a. is so boring, sorry.
a very nice hostel.

wifi was really not good and consistently slow or not able to load pages. in the end  had to buy a pass to use the hostels pcs (pricey). hostel is located well to see hollywood and staff very helpful. the hostel organises lots of tours and events worth taking part in. hollywood not the nicest part of la so recommend a short stay if going. my room was small and nptot that much space for 6 people.
great hostel with an awesome atmosphere
easy place to get around hollywood area. good spot if your stay is brief. security is really good too.

nice and clean with a great area out the front to have a few drinks and meet other travellers.  right on hollywood blvd so this is very handy if you want to be in the heart of hollywood.  hostel on the whole was clean and nice to be in.

i really enjoyed my stay here. i shared a room with 5 other people who were very friendly. the bathroom was very clean and everyone who stayed at the hostel did a good job keeping the community kitchen clean. as for location, the hostel is located right in hollywood, so everything is walking distance. unfortunately, the beach shuttle was down, so going to venice beach took 1.5 hours (2 buses). the staff was very pleasant, and i particulary liked johnny who was very welcoming and professional.
one of the best hostels that i have stayed in. clean, safe and nice beds. epic limo tours and pub crawls! thanks snoopy!! will def be back at some stage!

pretty good overall. although they ought to have put up signs saying that the vending machine wouldn't accept coins. it wasn't fixed in 4 nights. can be very noisy and has quite a high turnover of guests even during the small hours.

one of the best place i've been so far. you may think it's a bit expensive, but no regret if you can afford it. everyone was relax, so it was a nice time. nice professionnal and helpful staff. many things provided, or for a cheap price. nice location, kitchen, breakfast. i really loved the beds, strong, with a plate on the side protecting you from the light. convenient lokers with plugs inside. i also appreciated the bbq. very good vibs there ...

stayed there for the weekend and will definitely come again! the location is perfect whether you wanna go shopping, clubbing or explore hollywood. staff was very friendly, good recommendations for restaurants, great party on saturday night in the common room. everything was clean, there's a lot of stuff to help yourself to for breakfast.  i've stayed at several hostels already, this one is definitely near the top of the list.

great location and a friendly staff that will help you see the most you can of the city.  clean place to stay and a decent breakfast.  the hostel can be loud at times and there are supposedly quiet hours that seemed to be anything but quiet.

staff were great - so friendly and helpful. loved the fact that you had to show your key before entering - i know this can be a pain when your there but it makes the hostel feel safe. loved the activities that the hostel provided and i urge anyone staying there to book on them because you meet loads of people that way.
great place, great city. i definitely recommend if your idea is staying in la, stay in this place!!!

overall good stay. the staff members i talked to were very helpful and friendly! breakfast was a bit boring - some days they didn't even have jelly. felt very secure. great location very close to hollywood blvd. nice outside area. clean rooms and bathrooms.
was a fantastic hotel. the staff were full of information, other travellers were great to hang out with. had a fantastic time :)

if you are in la to see hollywood this is the place to be. located in a quiet side street it takes all of 30 seconds to walk to hollywood boulevard. the staff are very friendly and the hostel is very relaxed. there is a bar upstairs but for me travelling alone it lacked any character and the chance to meet people. however i was there only for one night during the week and i did meet a few people. you can bring your own drinks into the hostel but they must be drank out the front in the garden. nice touch i t

amazing hostel! awesome vibe, great staff. very safe, i felt i could leave my belongings in my room without a care. bathrooms were cleaned everyday. the location is excellent to, right off hollywood blvd and close to a lot of eateries. would definitely recommend to any of my friends and will return on my next visit.
it's really wonderful for me to choose this hostel and stay there for 5 days. best location, best service and best the best in everything. i recommend you this very strongly.
very good hostel for the $.  free ride to beach which is 20 miles away. need more bathrooms. good kitchen but need more work space.

great staff, excellent security, great meals at the hostel, good location. i did the runyon canyon hike and the hollywood sign hike, both worth while doing for great sights of the city! personal lights and power points. big lockers which had power points in them too. would defintely stay here again and recommend to a friend.

everything about this place was top notch, just not really my kind of location. friendly and helpful staff, excellent standards of cleanliness, nice atmosphere. if they opened a branch in west hollywood as well, then they'd be set! but for anybody after the whole hollywood tourist experience, this is the place for you. go no further!

if you want to stay in the heart of hollywood stay here! right next to hollywood blvd and there is always stuff happening like organised tours, pub crawls and not to mention cheap beers in the bar!  thanks for a great stay
liked that bunks and lockers had outlets to recharge items.  also like that soap was provided free to wash clothes
wouldn't hesitate to book again and would definitely recommend
the location of the hostel is perfect. the staff are very polite and attentive. cleaning is something incredible. and the rooms are extremely beautiful and well groomed.
1. way too less bathrooms for so many people!  2. to show the key everytime you enter the hostel was annoying.
a nice place to stay.
great place to stay to meet people and have a great time. good location pretty much on hollywood blvd. had a great time!!

the security was great because you had to present a room key to the front desk to get into the main hallway of the hostel. the staff were all really awesome people and it made for a really cool environment. they have a bar upstairs that they keep open as long as there are partygoers, and with all partying that goes on at this hostel, they still manage to keep everything extremely clean. if you're young and single and planning on traveling to l.a., this is the perfect hostel for you.

the staff were extremely friendly and helpful and the hostel is just around the corner from hollywood boulevard. although the immediate area does not look very inviting, i felt very secure at the hostel as you have to show your keycard to get past the locked door in reception. there are large lockers in the rooms which were big enough to get my backpack in and there are plug sockets in the lockers so you can leave items to charge. there are plenty of activities on offer day and night.
i enjoyed a lot my staying in usa hollywood hostel. it was very well located and organized. that's a very good option! and the breakfast was delicious! choose it!
what an absolute fun place.  would recommend it to anyone.  lots to do and staff are wonderful

a lot to say for this hostel. efficient pleasant helpful staff, great location, everything works. will probably return if in hollywood. but the sign saying between 11pm and 8 am is quiet time is an absolute joke. everybody, even the staff is loud during the night. in corridors with hard surface that means loud. the music however is switched of.

awesome and well run hostel.   very clean, with housekeeping cleaning rooms every day  loads of activities to join in on.  location is great, with hollywood blwd just up the block.   and, the best thing of all, the staff. they will bend over backwards to make your stay as good as possible.
asoluly loved it, extended my stay!met a lot of fun people.the bar & entertainment is great.

great location in hollywood. right near hollywood bld/walk of fame and a short walk to the chinese theatre. the hostel is clean and run by great friendly staff and offers free breakfast and cheaps dinners. there are plenty of great activities to sign up for as well. this is the second time ive stayed at this hostel and would definitely stay here again.
absolutely amazing hostel in every way. clean, fun, secure and in an awesome location. i can't really fault this hostel at all.

fantastic hostel, right in the heart of hollywood. excellent facilities, clean. lots of activities both at the hostel and lots of tours arranged by the hostel. if i return to la this will be my first choice for accomodation.
best hostel in los angeles for sure, and one of the best hostels i stayed in!

great location. events every night - i didnt end up attending any due to other plans but they seemed fun and would have been great if i had been traveling alone. the map they give you on arrival isn't great and the directions on it to major attractions aren't great either (we ended up transferring onto the wrong bus because the direction werent specific enough). i would definitely get your own map and have a look at google transit before going anywhere.

the hostel is located in an excellent area for tourist attractions. it also has a great atmosphere and the hostel runs activities every day to keep travellers occupied and to enable you to meet new people. worth it.

good location (5-10 minutes walking from the kodak theater and well deserved by metro and bus, which is great for those who don't drive). rooms are clean for an hostel and everything is functionnal (lockers in the room, plugs everywhere, magnetic card to lock/unlock the room). the kitchen is also clean & functionnal, you will have pancake breakfest in the morning. the staff is nice and helpful, and they organize events (bbq, shows) and excursions for cheap (hiking in hollywood hills, shuttle).
another sweet stay cheer's to kat, johnny and ksenia. legend people!!

as far as hostels go, this one is up there with the best. rooms are big, beds are new, and the lounge/bar upstairs is great to hangout in. there's also a lot of activities from pub crawls to tours. i would stay here again.
friendly staff, easy walk to 2 metro stations and many bus stops.   ensuite bathrooms handy though a pain when 5 girls all wanna get ready to leave at once.
fabulous hostel, fabulous stay in hollywood !!!   i hope i can be back one day!
very secure, great location, great dorm rooms!

a great place to stay. you meet a ton of other people who are all friendly.    the staff are friendly and they take security seriously.    they also offer lots of tours that you can sign up for and meet other people. perfect for the solo traveller.    it is quite pricey though.
very fun hostel. so much going on, it's impossible to run out of things to do and also impossible to not meet people. definitely recommended.
unfortunately, we had a room at the very back of the hostel which was located directly next to a post-delivery centre. it was very noisy from about 4am on...
it was very fun time in this hostel. i will use again!

the hostel was clean, the staff were helpfull, has a bar upstairs with cheap drinks $3 a beer $4 for a corona, they offer good tours like the limo tour good price n garanteed gr8 night out, would recommend this hostel to everyone and if your thinking of going to san francisco after use usa hostels again a*
an excellent hostel, best one i've stayed in so far. fantastic location, really comfortable rooms, loads of great trips and activities. a great place to meet other travellers.
the best hostels we stayed, nice organization!
i had some awesome nights in these hostel. lot of fun in the louge with tane, goze and kevin, lots of drinking games and good music.
adam and the dude that so the canyon walk are awesome.
a very good hostel and would certainly recommend it. the staff were always helpful and friendly. the computers not working were a pain but these things happen. thanks for a great stay.

this is definately a party hostel suited to the younger crowd travelling. they offer round the clock activities so you're guareteed to meet people and have something to do. there is a real feeling that you are being looked after, there's free breakfast of pancakes and spagetti and bbq's most nights. i went on the limo ride and that was so much fun! drinks are half the price of surrounding bars in the lounge, the outside areas nice also. 2 hours bus journey from the beach is the only drawback.

some staff excellent:  young blond german girl (or similar nationality). she was friendly, helpful, enthusiastic & positive.  young little male (i think he was male but hard to tell, especially in his high heels) - he was enthusiastic, welcoming & friendly  however bit of an unfriendly gestarpo bully attitude fr lesbian - ok there's jobs to do in running an establishment & maintaining hard earned cudos & standards but they could be equally or better achieved in an attitude of cheer and positivity
a really good hostel. great staff and a lot of things going on and my bed was really comfortable.
good hostel, very well located for hollywood experiences. events every night, and good opportunity to buy a cheap dinner on the hostel. free wifi, though it's fairly slow. i'd stay here again.

this hostel is in a great location just off hollywood boulevard, very safe and clean. they have house keeping that cleans the rooms daily which is nice for a hostel. all the staff are super friendly and helpful with lots of activities daily. if your wanting to go to six flags amusement park there is a shuttle that runs on wednesday that is definitely the easiest and cheapest way to get there. the pub crawl was pretty average but all in all a great hostel, one of the best i've stayed at!
location was very close to holywood bvd, with helpful staff, decent breakfast (could have done with milk available on a morning for everyone) and well kept dorms.

i had a really good time staying here, the staff are really helpful and friendly, there is always something going on everyday of the week. room was clean and the beds comfortable. really liked the privacy screen on the beds with the shelf and the light. will definitely stay here again.
good privacy screens in dorm rooms. great fun, good social rooms and events organised. cant get better location if you want hollywood.
great place to stay, had a fantastic time, love hollywood and surrounding areas and made some great friends

usa hostel hollywood is the best hostel that you can find..excellent security, kind and helpful staff, nice people, awesome location, joyful events..if you are searching a hostel in la this hostel would definetly the best choice..
great location and entertainment. pitty about the post service making a noise every morning and having to change rooms half way through my stay even though i booked one room well in advance.

this place has a great vibe but it is pretty much a party hostel, so if you're up for a party this is where you should stay. rooms are pretty big and it's really handy having the bathroom in the room. there is a nightclub next door so it's pretty noisy on weekends if your in but besides that the hostel is a great place to meet people and have fun. locations really good because it's close but not super close to the main part of hollywood blvd so there are lots of cool bars and cafe's around.
enjoyed the fact that the hostel organised activties as i was travelling by myself.

cheap beer! met some nice people in the hostel, but generally a younger (early 20s) crowd. they loaned me a towel for free because i had missing luggage, which was nice, but they wouldn't let me look through the lost & found box which i thought odd. the guy on night shift was particularly helpful. is right next to a carpark frequented by the local undesirables who like to party with their cheap liquor in brown paper bags. the type of place that organises wet t-shirt comps on independence day.
great location with standard dorm rooms.  a bit expensive, but that's just la.  we would stay here again.

the hostel was good,i liked the area, the staff was nice. the price is absolutly fair for what you get there.  i have one bad comment - because one of my room mates (in a mixed dorm) went partying and brought a girl into his bed in our room. i felt very angry and uncomfortable about this. a mixed dorm is not the right place for this lifestyle.
great location, great staff, great activities, a real party atmosphere. i met alot of great people, and there was always something to do. i will always be staying at usa hostels when im in america.
the people are nice it's a little noisy at night and they're are clubs down the street but if your tired from a busy day it shouldn't bother you.

i was very sad to only have 1 night here. the hostel organises a number of group activities that you can sign up for near reception. the beds are great! each one is massive, comfortable and best of all has it's own little alcove area complete with charger, shelf and lamp - a blessing compared to your standard hostel! there were 2 extra chargers inside each locker. it was also in an excellent location from the hollywood strip, just a few minutes walk. i'd definitely stay there again!

the hostel has a lot of character. the outdoor terrace is a good place to meet fellow travellers. however, it was, during my stay, a party hostel.  girl in my dorm vomitted all over her stuff (missing mine by inches) and the staff thought it was almost funny. if you're looking for a good party, it's a good place to be. if you're looking for quiet, not so much. other than that, security, staff and location are all great.

great location in hollywood! hostel staff were very friendly and there are always lots of day trips and activities being organised. wish i had have been there longer to take advantage of them all. would definitely stay here again.
great hostel. what makes it better than the other hostels in la is definitely the nice and helpfull staf.
had a great time awesome place. big thanks to kevin the barmen and nadine lovely girl great tour guide

the hotel can get quite noisy at night because of the pub crawl etc. and not everyone stays up late in the hostel. would be better if they put ppl like us at the back of the hostel instead of right at the front rooms where everyone passes by.     overall it was a great place with lotsa bubbly cheerful friendly people.

the best hostel i've stayed at in 5 months of travelling. the staff were always friendly, and ready to help out and give advice, the tours from the hostel were so cheap and so much fun especially considering the price you would pay elsewhere. the entertainment at night was amazing and a lot of fun.

the hostel is a pretty good hostel. they have a good kitchen, decent breakfast and good lounge/ bar area. the sometimes didn't seem to know the answers to our questions about the area but they were friendly enough so was not really an issue. i would come back
this hostel is perfectly located in walking distance from the heart of hollywood. staff members are funny and helpful and we've enjoyed staying there. thanks for everything. libby and joseph

i had a great experience with this hostel except one thing. i was sick one evening and rushed out of my room at approx 3am to use the bathroom. i grabbed my wallet, but unfortunately my key wasnt in there. the person on night duty saw me wandering around in my pjs and i told him i was sick, however when i discovered i didnt have a key, and asked him if he could let me into my room he refused, and told me i'd have to knock and wake someone up. not good at 3am. so i had to wait outside until 7am.
seriously one of the best hostels i've ever stayed in and i've stayed in may all over the world! go there people :)

this was the best hostel i ever stayed ! the place was designed to be a hostel, with proper facilities and comfortable rooms. the staff is extremely nice and helpful, and the best part is the many activities the hostel provide for guest to get together. very well located too ! i totaly recommend !!!
it was a very good place to stay, it was clean and tidy and catered for all my needs, one of the better hostels i have stayed.
as far as hostels go this has it all - its a shame that hollywood isnt the best location
good location, security good, great patio for chilling.  whilst we were there they had a celebrity photoshoot right outside, hollywood lived up to its name!
super fun hostel, helpful staff and in a great location! would recommend to all!!

hey guys thanx for that great stay,had great fun,met wonderful people.teriffic location,awsome staff,super tours,loved it!!defenetely will stay there again.thanx to matt,&bother,kath,kevin,that lovely french girl,the tattood girl (forgot name,who made the zombie make up for me)snoopy,danny,roberto and everyone else.you all were sooo sweet.the six flag/magic mountain tour is a must.had a blast!!!sad had to leave that soon.till next time, cheers!  murat from istanbul

had a pretty average stay here actually.  the good things:  the staff are really freindly and helpful  its really clean  good location in hollywood, really close to a lot stuff    the bad  really noisy at night, i could hear people talking down the hallway all night, this is including staff  right next to a night club, the bass was so loud that at times the windows were rattling (great if you want to go there, not so much if you dont)    if i had to stay in hollywood i would stay at usa hostel

awesome place to stay. the hostel is bags of fun offering everything from tours (do the beverly hill walking tour) to live music  and bar crawls. the majority of the staff and very informative and can give you great tips on what to do and where to eat. the rooms are cleaned daily and each dorm bed has it's own night light and table (nice touches). highly recommended!
i love this place, it's the best hostel i've been so far.
i liked it. nice location, professional. it's just a good hostel, but not superextraordinary.

i really enjoyed my stay in this hostel. it's very nice and clean, there is a cool lounge and it's literally right next to the hollywood boulevard. one of the most awesome things is the weekly standup comedy show.

stayed here quite a while and really enjoyed it! great hostel, great staff! melli and jaimie really helped me out, roberto is the friendliest guy in the us and kevin can tell you some great stories!  if you're staying in la, make sure to stay at this hostel!
had a great week here! would come again...  very claen and had so much fun here!!!  would recommened to my friends!
it was a nice hostel, good location and friendly staff.
nice hostel!!!!just a little bit close to bar, so noisy during the night!
near hollywood boulevard, nice location. cook your own pancakes for breakfast.
great hostel plenty of things to do,all planned by hostel staff so easy to meet people.

staff are super friendly, rooms are cleaned daily, beds are comfy, daily activities which are very affordable. free pancakes until 10am every morning, spaghetti and bbq nights during the week. nightly events and very clean and party like lounge upstairs. had the best time in the 10days i was here, i didn't want to leave! staff do an excellent job of making this a home away from home. can't wait to travel usa again and stay at this hostel!
excellent services and location!

loved the tours especially the limo tour (this was the reason i stayed here!) so much fun, bbq night and pub crawl were also fun and a good way for a single traveller to mix with others. loved the location and the hostel overall hope to stay here again sometime!
fantastic place all around, worth the extra cost!
excellent location, friendy helpful staff, would definitely go back

the hostel's rooms are a little too small, and there is only one bathroom per room, which can get crowded sometimes. other than that, no big complaints. it is a pretty clean place (there's someone cleaning up the rooms on a daily basis), and is pretty well located too (although la itself seems to be a pretty rough ciry). i would recommend it to friends.
possibly the most fun  hostel possible.   really cool outside area, cheap dinners.   mac computers with skype.  rooms with bathrooms.   just stay at this hostel. not one complaint.

this is such a nice, clean, on a super location hostel, with such a good atmosfher and activities that i did stay more day's than what the plan was.  the hole staff is very helpfull and friendly!! i will recommend this usa-hostel to everybody because it was a great pleasure to stay here :)  only the wifi internet did not alway's work good.  thanks!!   johanna from the netherlands
liked the organised activities set out for the week, makes it so much easier meeting people and helps not having to organise things yourself. good cheap bar to helpful staff.

definitely a very good hostel, new and clean and very lively (even too much if you are just looking for some rest..). i very appreciated how they cared about all those small details that make a difference, in the common areas as well as in the bunk beds structure

this hostel is great. i kept extending my stay!  they have plenty of tours and activities, free pancakes (you'll make them yourself, you lazy...) and good security.  only negative i can come up with is the noise from the club next to the hostel. but that is really not an issue. hostel living, you know..  remember to bring your own padlock, or but it in the reception for 3 bucks.
a fantastic service mentality along with a 'value for money' ethos is fundamental to the success of this hostel. i highly recommend it.
staff are abit rubbish but you are 5 minutes from everything you need and they have trips which you can do which were ok. i would stay again but think staff need to be abit more professional
very good. nothing bad to say. i would go back.
great location, limo ride was awesome.. the staff is very helpful , karim and haley in particular made the stay a lot easier. thank you guys for everything.. will definitely stay there again.

first things first this is possibly one of the best hostels i've stayed in! there was free wifi that allowed me to call home on skype, free pancakes all day, and free (some paid for) activities every day. great for independent travellers, i met heaps of friends! locations ok, a fair way from beverly hills but easy enough to get there by bus. when you go out just be street smart! this is deff some where i'd stay again!
best hostel if you want to see hollywood!

stay here! situated in the heart of hollywood; only a short walk from the metro station, 2 blocks from the greyhound station and around the corner from hollywood blvd! on arrival you're made to feel welcomed and if your room's available early, they'll check you. this was my 3rd time here and they have upgraded all the facilities; the rooms and bathrooms are very clean, bunks have reading lamps + power points + a little shelf and large in room lockers. the staff are uber friendly and informative.
i didnt stay here cos its really expensive.  banana bungalow west hollywood is the best hostel in hollywood
stayed there 5 times in 4 years but still awesome place with lots of fun.
extremely clean, friendly staff, fun events such as walking tour and limo ride, great deals on food such as spaghetti dinner and bbq, ideal location.

i booked for 3 nights but stayed for 1 because i checked out too late i couldn't be refunded the 2nd day amount (hostel rule), but i should have been allotted the 3rd day since i gave them plenty of time for the third day.  the girl at the desk left a note for the manager but i never heard from them.  i called and sent an e-mail but they never responded.  unprofessional and greedy since they were booked full the night before. will not book again

this was a great hostel, and a pleasure to stay at.  on arrival, a member of staff gave a personal tour of the hostel showing where everything is, and mentioning hostel activities (pub-crawl the night i was there), very personable.  very impressed with extent of security, to the point of having electricity sockets within your locker - innovative.  downtown la is the dive that everyone knows it to be, but spots like hollywood really are the place to be, and this hostel is right there, literally.

great large hostel close to hollywood with loads of activities, internet and free breakfast with pancakes or muesli. the daily cheap tours on offer are a nice option to do if you don't feel up to doing stuff on your own and a great way to meet people. nice bar and large kitchen with a lot of utensils if you feel up to cooking. 8 bed dorms are spacious enough and cleaned daily.  had a great time here and was sad to leave as it was my last travel city.
