not to much to complain about. having the bar open every night may sound cool but young people who drink get very very loud. the location is great, close to walk of fame and an easy trainride to the studios. if you are a young person ther is nothing wrong with this place.
rad hostel one of the best ive stayed in everything was great from the rooms and staff to location and things going on x
loved this hostel and snoopy (one of the staff members) knew how to take the hostel out for a great night on the town!!

i had a great 3 nights in this hostel. the staff are all pretty friendly and the location is great for seeing the attractions in hollywood. the organized activities such as the walking tours and the limo ride were awesome!!! i would highly recommend staying here if you want to have a good time in hollywood!

extremely clean, loads of great activities/tours/etc held. best thing was that the lockers in the dorms had 2 power switches inside them, so you could lock away valuables and charge them without worrying they'll be stolen. each room had private shower/bathroom so didn't have to worry about communal showering =s

the female-dorm beds are really nice made up...everyone had still her privacy and own light. pancakes are yummi. during the christmasdays the organization of the tours was so bad and unreliable! cancellations just a few minutes before...so that you had to change your plans...although you had just a couple of days. stuff was not friendly. location very good.

i stayed at a 6bed female dorm. clean room, nice roommate. great lounge and convenient facilities. good option for single travellers to meet people and tour around. i don't often stay in hostels. but comparing to no brand hotel or motels in la, this hostel is much much better choice. i will stay again if i go to la next time

this is a great place to stay in la.  located right on hollywood blvd., it's a great departure point to see the rest of the city (which, to no fault of the hostel, is tedious without a car).  there are daily programs to bring the hostel guests together, and staff is very accommodating.  i'm impressed with the security here, especially considering how many weirdos are in hollywood.  i would gladly stay here again.

couldn't sleep as people were partying outside my room most nights. one night a girl in my room had her drink spiked on the limo ride so we had so many people in our room who were very inconsiderate of those trying to sleep & one guy kept coming in & out & slaming the door. did washing one night after 9 only to find out that you can't wash after 9 as it's noisy & will disturb people trying to sleep. had to leave my washing wet & smelly till the next morn as door was locked. should be open 24/7!

this is definately a great party hostel. met lots of great people here on my stay. really close to the walk of fame and hollywood sign. ended up staying longer than intended cause i was having too much fun!!!

great hostel, plenty of good company and friendly staff.  i have thoroughly enjoyed my staff at this hostel.  it is in a great central location and there are regular shuttles that run from the hostel.  would recommend to all.

pros: free breakfast, free coffee and tea all day, nice activities.  cons: at least the guys in my room had no respect for the ones sleeping in the bedroom, so they talked each other at high voice level and turned on lights. not very clean.
while i was there the washine machine; computer and printer was not working. also, it was quite loud at night. great location though.
one of the best, good fun, good location, great staff.  highly recommended
fantastic! best hostel everrrrrr!

this hostel is simply flawless. location is prime!! close to metro stations and hollywood hotspots. met a lot of funky people here. highly recommended and would definetely come back.  5 thumbs up for us hostels!

great hostel. nice staff and were very helpful. it is a party hostel so expect to socialise and not go to bed too early. but when you did get to bed it was an awesome little set up in the rooms with bedheads with reading lamps, electrical outlets and a shelf. very comfortable.

had a lovely stay - missed our bus to san fran and they were so helpfull with our next step. we stayed in a mixed dorm 8 bed and had an amazing time. so much to do, the hostel organise's nights out. the location is perfect, and the staff are fab. free pancakes in the mornings are yummy too. over all an amazing stay and i would 100% stay here again. thanks usa hostels!! x

sweet as hostel, the only downer was that i was in a room right next to the laundry, so wasn't always guarenteed hot water when showering. really nice hostel in a good location. being vegan i thought it was going to be hard to eat, but the girl kat on reception helped me out alot and i think i gained a bit of weight haha. easy to meet people with heaps of cool hang out areas within the hostel, definately recommend!!
great hostel in an awesome location just off hollywood blvd. great facilities, including the lounge and bar.
it was a gr8 location....  but the shower was perminantly running so the staff gave me ear plugs but they were free!!!  would stay again.
great hostel ideally situated between holly blvd and sunset blvd - lots of activities and ultra friendly staff. highly recommeded

don't do the runyon canyon trip with the hostel guide. ask for a map instead. also, ignore the snobbish answers of some of the staff, i think it's mandatory in la. overall good hostel, but a bit loud, making it hard do have a good night sleep. very good location.
excellent hostel, one of the best ive stayed in! great activities organised by the hostel, great location, helpful staff, would reccomend to anyone!

the people had receive me very well, always the people do something at hotel, like party, comedy, bbq.    they give a map a little helpul map, about the things near the hotel.    amazing place is near all things...

i strongly recommend for those whom wants to stay at usa hostel hollywood during your time in la. the hostel held a lot of attractions to interactive with other guests and start to the fun time. very well located, few steps from walk of fame and less than 5 min from metro station. just one staff members does not have good threatment with guests, but i consider this issue as isolated point.
almost there but not quite usa las vegas shows your hostel up on the friendliness of the staff making a real effort to interact, but a cool hostel with a good atmosphere would stay again

fun hostel! location is excellent (just off hollywood blvd) and the staff are friendly and helpful. the bar upstairs is awesome - they have comedy and open mic nights, and the drinks are super cheap (pre drink there before you go out!!!). be sure to do the limo tour - great value for money and you're guaranteed an excellent night.
the best hostel i've ever seen

the location was excellent, a five minute walk from the heart of hollywood. most of the staff were lovely and helpful. the rooms were kept very clean.  the hostel itself could use some character, more activities, a lick of paint and some more traveller-friendly details (such as a better map or a book swap shelf).  i was actually robbed at this hostel and was very unhappy with the response i have received. security appears to be strong when in actual fact it is very weak inside the front door.

this is by far the best hostel i have ever stayed in all the social activitys organised each day and night are awesome beach trips, stars homes tours, hollywood sign,etc and pub crawls and limo rides at night. this is a party hostel but the noise is kept under control so if you want to rest you can.  only 100m from hollywood blvd
a great hostel. perfect location, great atmosphere, helpful staff, poor shower, the daily and nightly activities on offer were awesome.
a well run operation. good service and facilities. but disappointing that the tours always fill up very quickly.

really nice place and very secure. you can only enter the building by showing your key card. staff do well when you need anything. lots of activities are organised, really nice lounge but didn't find it the most sociable hostel and people stuck to their groups alot. that being said i still met many people there
it's located few steps away from the main touristic places in hollywood. the room and bathrooms are very clean, and the staff is helpful and friendly. i would recomended it for my friends!
great activities, facilities, location and staff. would stay again
sweet hostel, super close to hollywood blvd. lots of activities and fun things to do. esp beer pong!

very fun hostel to stay at- loads of stuff arranged to sign up to. limo ride was amazing fun! stand up comedy and music in the bar area were good to watch. very chilled out atmosphere- great to meet and get to know people. location is very good for hollywood and sunset etc. will be staying in these hostels again when i am in a city with one in.

located just off hollywood blvd - if you're lucky you will see some movie stars just around the corner at the chinese theatre for the movie premieres.    large hostel has its own bar which is great social venue :)
loved it!!! will definately be staying in the future!!! all was great!!!

this was a great hostel to stay at i stayed for 5 nights and many of the nights i was alone they encouraged us to join in with the activities including limo rides and comedy shows. the staff were friendly and very helpful.
parties at the hostel. right in the middle of hollywood.
the staff is very helpfull and on the board there are a lot of things to do! great hostel!!
a great location. a lot of fun. breakfast was very helpful.
a great hostel, very professional with fantastic staff.  i would highly recommend staying here.
in general a very good hostel, although i'd expected more of hollywood in general. but the hostel is great with very friendly staff.

we love this place... they offer lots of things you can do in the night like the limo-tour or bbq (all you can eat for 6$) or like tonight (we're just staying there) the "open mic night": many good artists. and also the staff is really friendly. the only thing we could criticize is that it's a bit too expensive but it's definitely worth it. so we would really recommend it!
great sized rooms, great location (just watch out at night), great common room, great staff and will most definitely be staying here again!

my dorm didnt lock when i arrived but it was fixed a number of hours later. the breakfast is good but it would be nice to have a wider choice or alternatives on some days. the activities offered were good and great value for money. there is a real sense of community in the hostel. the bar upstairs is really cool.

the staff were amazing i sprained my ankle on the second night and they helped me to my room got ice and everything and then all of them proceeded to look after me for the next 4 days while i was on crutches. thankyou so much to all you made everything much easier and were overly helpful!!
i stayed here for two nights.  it is in an excellent location and the staff are super helpful!  clean and secure i would definately stay there again!

the hostel had good activities every day and night. we especially liked the free comedy show. if you hire a car be careful where you park on the street after 8pm. we were told its ok to park on the street after 8pm by guests and staff but didnt check and got towed. we pulled up after dark and the part of the sign detailing the towing was obscured by trees. it cost us 250 bucks to get the car back plus a 60 dollar fine. ouch.

good hostel. good location just off hollywood blvd. near all the action and transport links. staff are good, show you around and help out. very much a party hostel. dorms should be for sleeping though, not having parties. that's what the common areas/bars are for.
wonderful!!!
very well run hostel. shame it's full of aussies, but hey, what hostel isn't?
excelente localizacion,,
nice discount on universal studios tickets. and yummy peancake breakfast.

very close to kodak theatre, 10 min walking. very nice staff, a lovely terrace just to have a beer if you don't wanna go out. some clubs around in hollywood boulevard. computers are really slow and are not for free. breakfast was not as complete as usual.
hostel is, plenty to offer like cheap bbq, some tours, pub crawls(not recommended - 2 pubs is not a crawl) location is short walk to hollywood blvd.
had a great time, it's everything they claim to be and it's easy to see how they got to be rated as highly as they are. all positives from me!

i really liked my stay in usa hostels.its very central for hollywood boulavard however for the beaches its about an hours bus journey away ( they do run a free shuttle twice a wk ).very clean hostel with its on little bar area, wii, and dvd's etc. they always have something organised for ppl to do.i would recommend staying here.

free pancakes and wifi were nice, and being able to bring in your own alcohol or buy it there was handy. only real complaints would be the 10:00 checkout and the price, but that's relative since it is hollywood. parking sucks too ($10 for 24 hours, and it's a few blocks away), but that doesn't affect my review since it's not something the hostel has control over, and many people are probably taking buses anyway, so.... stay here!

really great hostel! very close to hollywood and also the supermarket is in walking distance. cleaned every day and lots of free offers or cheap tours. would really recommend it! staff is also very nice, depends who you talk to :-)

good clean hostel with big rooms and comfy beds. kitchen area and bar were really good and patio area outside. ensuite bathrooms were kept really clean and so was the kitchen. had good activities planned and was easy to meet new people. good international crowd.

perhaps a hostel with such great reviews leads to expecting too much but i found this place to be a little dull. the hostel is quite large and very noisy... and that's by hostel standards. the security is rigid which is a plus, but a little annoying at times. very clean, and the friendly staff make up for the somewhat vacant feel at times. facilities are good and there is always something going on.

the best hostel i have ever stayed at. pretty much on hollywood blvd, close to all the buses to get to the beaches, and really close to all the hollywood sights. the limo tour is amazing (if you don't do it you are really missing out), as is the pub crawl. the staff are awesome, and will party with you! gooood pancakes... all night haha. great for single travellors and groups of people. good place to chill with a tv and bar, great to meet people. definitely a party hostel.

nice hostel in a primespot in hollywood. also be sure to take some trips organized by the hostel, and go on the clubtours at night, loads of fun. you will meet plenty of people here at night in the tv room or at comedy nights or during the day hanging around the patio. very nice place to stay and clean!

social atmosphere - great. did the hummer limo tour & met some great people, had a ball. rooms a little cramped, but all lockers + powerpoints was good. couldnt really be bothered with the free pancakes for breakfast. bbq dinner was good.
quieter than i'd expect for hollywood... excellent security. saw a roach but otherwise clean.
very smart hostel. i was unliky on roommates, otherwise i can highly recommend it!
whoever thought of putting powerpoints inside lockable lockers is a genius! big hostel with tours going on which are great for people who arrive with no plans.
great hostel to stay, if you like party and meet other travellers this is the place!!!
hostel is located near the blvd which is a bonus if you want to do all the hollywood tours and all that. even just going walking around is good. very clean place and the staff was friendly.

i didn't stay here too long but i would highly recommend the location. minutes from all the sights. friends have stayed here and got to enjoy the nightlife more! it was  very noisy one but really and truly i think that's always going to happen in hollywood. toughen up.

awesome hostel. i hated the city, but this hostel made our stay in la quite enjoyable. wonderful staff, awesome bar/recreation mood. definite party spot though, so if you want more peace and quite you might want to abstain. limo night was a lot of fun!

hostel was close to the main area of hollywood but up the dodgy end of the main drag. had to walk quickly at night. the rooms were standard nothing to complain about and the kitchen had everything you needed. staff were nice and organised airport pick up.

very nice place, good atmosphere, good location.it is always clean, the staff is very nice, helpful. the only thing that surprises me are the prices that often go higher than in new york or paris in this kind of hostels.

this place was great and i was sad to leave. everyone is open and friendly and i met a lot of cool people. only issue i had the whole time was the heating/air was going a little crazy but other than that this place is 10/10

room was clean.  clean sheet, pillow case, blanket & towel provided at “check-in”.  tv in room, but not connected to cable or antenna.  no hangers in the closet.  free breakfast (toast or cereal) including coffee or juice, provided each day at 8 am (didn’t open sunday).  don’t sign up for the hollywood tour, it can be cancelled at any moment, without notice.

i would not recommend this hostel. it is cheap, but the atmosphere is dead.    pros:  -cheap  -nice sitdown/patio areas    cons  -lacks a good common room to meet others  -location is near hollywood, but the specific street it is on is sketchy  -dead atmosphere (i went during the winter low season, which may have played a part)  -not many hostel activities

i really enjoyed staying here. i added on one extra night, then staff and the owners are so helpful. i highly recommend the hollywood tour. it was great fun to walk around. the whole place has a good vibe and i felt safe as a solo female traveller.
they don't have enough toilets, showers, refrigerators, etc for how many people they have.  3 inch foam mattresses are unacceptable!  quiet hours not enforced.  dirty.

i had a great time at the time zone hollywood hostel. the atmosphere is awesome and location is unbeatable. the employees are very friendly and helpful with highlight to carlos bustillo and cristiano jeep. carlos is always ready to help you with whatever you may need, he also knows the best things to do and to visit at hollywood. cristiano's good mood every morning during breakfast always cheer you up even if you are down. i definitely recommend it.

this hostel was good for what you pay, although could do with some improvements. on the website it says they have an airport shuttle (not true) and check in begins at 3pm not 2pm. they weren't responsive to emails but staff were lovely once we arrived. the hostel is very clean and i liked the free toiletries available in the bathroom. it is about a 20 minute walk from hollywood boulevard.     we were awoken to someone entering our room, not sure how they got in so that was a bit of a worry.
great staff , reasonable prices, wonderful location , i would definetely  recommend this place to stay

hostel does not have 24 hour reception as advertised. i was not able to checkin when i arrived nor reach them regarding my booking  via phone or email. after contacting hostelworld.com they also were not able to put me in contact with them and i had to forfeit my deposit and seek other arrangements for my stay in la. i highly recommend calling the hostel prior to booking.

the timezone was the cheapest hostel at the time that i booked, but the price doesn't reflect on the quality of this hostel. amenities included an outdoor kitchen, a large outdoor social area, a small movie area with netflix and even massage chairs!   the atmosphere here comes and goes but it's still a decent place to lay your head.
was not the cleanest, but was cheapest one around. about a 15 minute walk from hollywood blvd.

one of the best inexpensive accommodation options at walking distance form hollywood highland/vine metro stations in la. hostel interiors are based on hollywood theme. i stayed in room "the legends". very clean, comfortable and well maintained. good free-breakfast facilities and awesome kitchen. fantastic backyard common sitting area with psychedelic lighting in the furniture and decent music system. paid laundry service. before going out, just get best directions from staff!

this is an odd building. it was clearly an office building turned into a hostel. it's very loud with plastic walls to the rooms that pop when the ac is on and a creaky staircase that sounds like it's hundreds of years old. the internet connection was dial up speed - probably because the telecom stuff is literally within a women's shower. 20 minute walk to the subway.

clean facilities, friendly staff, and walking distance from hollywood blvd! i loved how there were free towels & toiletries available, and the rooms were clean and well kept. the building is a bit echo-y, so it can get loud. i imagine that a stay over a friday or saturday night could get noisy, but my stay on a sunday night was great!
it’s perfect!
awesome hostel, planned on staying 1 night but ended up staying for 3 more! location is good, staff is amazing but no lockers and security is kind of sketchy. would stay again

great experience overall. good location that's walkable with easy access to mass transit. room was small but clean and adequately appointed (would appreciate a small desk). tv remote would not work, floor lamp would not turn on but whatever. breakfast was dissapointing, even by hostel standards. half a cup of decent coffee, white bread to toast, cream cheese, two cereals and milk (on the edge of spoiled one day). no fruit or protein like eggs or peanut butter. despite criticism, a great deal.

horrible. most rooms don't have any windows to the outside. walls are paper thin (have to bring earplugs). smoking area outside of lower corridor - constant draft from outside blows smoke into some rooms, whereas others stink unbearably. light can penetrate all room doors, as they have blurred windows in them - light-sensitive people have to bring a sleeping mask. you won't get any discounts or refunds - just transfers into other rooms with more or less the same characteristics.
no one opened the door when i rang bell. i would not go around back.

great location and staff. the night i stayed, the hostel was overboked, and by the time i came to check-in, i did not have a room that i already reserved. they gave me a refund and a smaller area to sleep in for that one night after requesting that. the person on the front desk had to make few calls, but at the end it all went well. i would prefer if the hostels do not overbook, and provide the guests with what they reserved.
don't even bother.

all the staff here are friendly and happy to help. the hostel is very clean. there's plenty of showers. not only do you get a towel,shower gel, shampoo and conditioner but there's also razors, body lotions and other handy things available.  it's in a great location, walk of fame is about a 15 minute walk. we also walked to the hollywood sign in less than an hour and a half. universal is less than 10 mins and cost around $10 in an uber. one of the best hostels i have stayed in.
excellent place. location okay. please see my short film  hollywood christmas parade 2017. short film by olddudesaja  https://youtu.be/0otlpclsnwq

it was pretty good, just a few small things that i wished were different.  there wasn't actually  a useable mirror in my room...there was a very small one, maybe 4 square inches that was too high up on the wall for me to use. in the restrooms there were no outlets near any mirrors so doing your hair in a mirror isn't really an option. there's also no place to get clean water to drink unless you use the vending machine. i wish there was a drinking fountain or something.

the location for me was the best. just off of sunset and close to hollywood boulevard and highland. you can even walk to melrose avenue for shopping and food. and griffith park isn't too far either, therefore it's very possible to walk up to franklin ave near los feliz to get into the park and hike! the hollywood sign hike is nearby, too! this hostel in the arts and media mecca of la, and you will meet very many talented and amazing people here. the staff at tz were all very helpful, too.

nicole and andrea were the best. nicole cooking was outstanding, she is a chef in disguise.  i looked forward to coming the hostel after work to eat dinner. i really felt as though i was at home, dinner was ready and being served.       now, andrea was as pleasant anyone should be. she is a great desk clerk. she is  always smiling and greeting everyone, making everyone feel special.       i can't wait to go back and stay there again. i also recommend the time zone hostel to my other traveling nurses
we only stayed overnight so didn't get to use all the facilities. the staff were very friendly and helpful. the room was acceptably clean and the location suited us for that night.

i only stayed for 1 night on private room, i liked the staff very friendly but im not sure about the room location as it was ground floor on main corridor so wasn't quiet, i could also hear the person in the dorm next to me due to how the ventilation system is in place. earplugs helped. bed was comfy and did the job. my only complaint was lack of decent continental breakfast which when i got it didn't consist of much other than a bagel with cream cheese and a coffee.

location is far away from the city centre, and there's nothing nearby, quite inconvenience to you to experience la. rooms are big and clean compared to the other messy la hostel that i've stayed before, but it was still a bit crowded with a poor sound-proofed wall, a bit noisy at night. one thing i love for sure is the outdoor common area, quite a stylish one.

overall it was fun staying at timezone.  staff if friendly and you feel secure.    i was lucky enough to be able to stay in a private room and was glad roku was available.    only complaint is that it is a bit of a distance to anywhere..

great location, only 15 minutes from the walk of fame, the metro to downtown and about 5 minutes from the busstop to santa monica. staff is very helpful and nice, breakfast was pretty good as long as youre early. beds are capsules and comfortable, though the mattrass is thin. very clean, good social areas. could use something in the bathroom to hang up your stuff. the hostel is good value for your money and a safe and good choice for los angeles.
loved the message chair and staff where supper helpfull especially hanns

amazing place, couldn't reccomend more due to the every intricate details being catered for. from the massage chairs to the food nights. but please do fix our wifi guys, for someone who had interviews and plenty of emails, this was a real downfall.     besides that everything is perfect...
super people, awesome location, extra clean
i think the place is good in general except their toilet. the toilet on the 2nd floor is so small and the shower lacks hooks or table where we can hang our clothes, and too narrow as well.
nice hostel. good facilities and staff. but the most uncomfortable mattress i have ever slept on. the mattress is a foam mattress topper not an actual mattress.
i truly had a enjoyable visit. thank you!

the hostel didn't look fully furnished, work was clearly still going on which was of putting. staff seemed unorganised. breakfast wasn't really all that. but for the price you get what you pay for especially in la.

nice hostel with good facilities and good location near hollywood boulevard, but the staff were horribly disorganised. had to sit around waiting in the lobby for 90 minutes to check in. new hostel, so i'm sure this will get better as they settle in.
very nice place to stay but the standard basic single room is not a room and basically a box with outlets with a light and fan.

great brand new hostel in great location, just a walk from dolby theater. security camera and screening at the entrance. despite is still in start up phase the staff acted greatly to solve same problems in a very efficient manner, customer oriented.  great atmosphere in commons areas during night time (im a quite solitary guy, but there, i managed to make friendships). fully air conditioned. kitchen and toilets always shining, cleaners everywhere all day long. capsules spacious and comfy.

i liked the time zone hostel overall, the staff was great and there was a really nice atmosphere and many organized activities. however, the "private" room i booked turned out to be a bunk bed with a cheap, light curtain in a giant 30-bed room, which also served as a hallway for 4 other dorm rooms. the lights couldn't be turned off. the lockers were only big enough for a small daypack and the room couldn't be locked so anyone could just walk into the hostel and steal your luggage.

can i live here?   i loved this hostel. from the moment you step inside (to a blissfully air conditioned space) you are in a well-designed, clean and safe environment.   the staff here were immediately friendly and i genuinely felt welcomed and engaged. cute bowties too. they were happy to hold my bag (in a locked room)  and when i checked in, i got a tour by one of the staff-members.     i stayed in one of the capsules and got the best sleep i've had in months. cozy af.
low key not next to all the noise but still in prime area
very clean, lovely helpful staff. good facilities.   everyone was really nice   location was really good walking distance to hollywood   great hostel for the money would defiantly go back

good hostel but things to improve on for sure. probably a bit overpriced for what you get.  i had just arrived in the country after 18 hours of flying, and another flight the next day so i went to bed early to get some sleep, only to be woken up at 1am from a staff member saying i needed to change rooms to a female dorm as i'd been put in a mixed dorm and they needed the bed. not really appropriate if you ask me. and i didn't get much of an apology either.

awesome place- i booked my stay for 6 nights and ended up staying 11  safe- there is someone at the reception desk 24/7, and there are 2 lockers for each bed in each room which you're given a key for  clean- the whole place is cleaned everyday including the rooms and the lounges  kitchen- has everything you need  location- walking distance from hollywood boulevard and good food spots  staff- a special shoutout to nicole ismael dan and saida who showed me around and became my friends!
the best hostel i've ever stayed here in the usa! i'm definitely staying here again!

clean, safe, comfy. has everything u should need. staff were all great. free washing machines/dryers is super. semi outdoor kitchen is equipt & clean.  location, a bit of a hike to anywhere. i ended up enjoying the walks tho. i know la quite well & felt the surrounding area was safe and friendly. closer to the main strips is naturally sketchy in hollywood. but the closer u get to the hostel the safer it is.  free brekky isn't much worth it but better than nothing.  great building security.

nice place, nice staff. good location, close to everything but on a quiet street. clean, but seems to be mid-construction like it's not finished. feels like they push to be a party atmosphere with very loud staff all night long. the daytime is quieter. good bang for your buck in an expensive city. don't come here if your looking for peace and quiet, only if your down to party all night!

very nice stay and location and staff are nice! the ac system is very weird and sometimes randomly heats/cools the room. they also plan events, though i didn’t go on any. it might also be beneficial to add more hooks/hanging rods to the shower area because there isn’t really anywhere to put your clothes.

best hostel i went to in l.a, from walking in your treated like royalty. place is cleaned what feels like 5 times a day. the manager is for lack of a better word, obsessed with making it a better place for people. great staff, great manager, great price.  to the manager: keep it going man don't go sour and expensive like those other hostels in l.a you got something sweet here.  only down side of it being so good is next time i go to stay it'll prob be full 😂 thanks for having me.
great value for money for such a good location and nice room. breakfast was nice and staff were all very friendly and helpful suggesting where to go nearby.
great hostel. maybe it's better to stay in santa monica.
first experience in a hostel. it was great! highly reccommend the hollywood bar hop tour!!
fantastic! full of friendly travelers :) good breakfast
excellent location, safe hostel and great staff.
it was perfect, except for the extremely noisy restaurant downstairs, which made it hard to get to sleep.

really lovely hostel. so close to absolutely everything! sarah, jordan and the other members of staff do a fantastic job. we felt very looked after throughout our whole stay. would 100% recommend to anyone thinking of travelling to la.
great hostel with very freidly and helpful staff,rooms were clean and comfortable. literally a minute walk to the beach and skate park. perfect location. would definitely stay again.  10/10
excellent value for money. was much cleaner and more comfortable than i expected from a hostel. perfect location. only problem is the wifi - slow and unreliable.

this place is wacky and crazy - but in a totally good way. it's right on venice beach and you can expect the craziness that comes with that. i had an issue and staff were lovely and helped me move rooms. the manager is lovely :)
perfect location, pretty much the only option around and it's a pretty good time. way more chill and fun than the one hi in santa monica.

i was at the hostel next door the night before.   i am so pleased with everything about this hostel  heather at the front desk was so kind and joyful.   the room was all white and really clean.   i truly enjoyed the visit.
the people here are great! i have stayed twice now and would stay again!!

i took a bed for 6 nights and i had to check out one day early. this was not a problem for them and i get also the money back. the personal is very friendly and for any questions they have an answer. due my stay there my journey took another way because of 2 beautiful girls that i've had as roommates. you can do a lot of activities there. i will definitely come back again in this hostel some day

what an awesome experience. samesun was great. the staff was awesome in helping other back packers connect and get out to do things. definitely in an amazing location for such an amazing price. only thing that kind of sucked was lack of wifi, but the bar downstairs was super accommodating if you needed to sit down there to get some stuff done. other than that, i would definitely recommend to anyone looking for an experience in venice. will most definitely be back next year. thank you so much!
great location, the price on arrival was different to what was quoted by hostelworld.
they do charge for towels $2.

location great right above boardwalk, clean and good facilities - breakfast, towel, atm inside, fast wifi. the staff were very average, our window in our room was broken, staying open all night to chill the whole room, staff were reluctant to assist or organise a fix, nothing happened, people nearest window just given extra blanket.
not such a good spot during the winter months. would be sweet in the summer though!!
inside the hostel very safe, the staff was very accommodating when we arrived early :)    lots of characters outside haha
amazing location, awesome staff, great vibes
i would  highly  recommend  it and stay there again.

i can only speak of 7 bed dorm room 206 since other reviews have been inconsistent in their expectations. the facility overall is relatively clean, most of the guests kept to themselves.  i came here because it was close to lax which i had an early flight.  the location close to venice beach is a plus.  the room was small for 7 beds, but they were well laid out. the hall bathrooms were relatively clean.  if i need an inexpensive place to stay in la, i would definitely consider it again.
everything was great ....only issue i had was the odor the mattresses had. smelled of bad b/o....even with me sleeping over the comforter it seeped through.

right on the boardwalk, a group of sketchy people right outside the hostel though and he immediate area. the bar downstairs is alright, more of restaurant feel. good location though. not the most social hostel i’ve ever been to but not terrible. small common area felt more like a waiting room.
not a bad hostel! the location, breakfast, and facilities were perfect for a hostel. however, the atmosphere wasn't that great. there wasn't a common room.  i do recommend, and i'd stay again.

stayed here two times in dec 17 and jan 18, the hostel was clean and the staff was super friendly and helpful. they even provided free towels and free printouts. the bulding is pretty nice and included a nice bar downstairs where hostel guests always getschilpt choice of drinks and food for happy hour prices.  the hostel is located at the venice beach promenade, many rooms provides beach view.  the complimentary breakfast is absoluetly okay for a hostel.

the location was amazing if you want to explore venice beach! the facilities were ok - very clean but the lockers were too small to fit any luggage really and they didn't give out locks. i had my own but it was too small to fit into that locker.     the staff wasn't particularly enthused or friendly, and the atmosphere in general was pretty unfriendly - no one really spoke to each other, it was very unlike most hostels i've stayed in. because of that i won't stay again.

overall it was a great place to come back to and have a base for exploring. there is a lot to do in the area and being 200 ft from the boardwalk is pretty nice. the staff was super helpful when i had questions and was eager for me to explore the area.
great location.
great location, beds were ok, fun bar downstairs, overall pretty happy

one of the easiest hostels i’ve been to for socliasing if you spend time in the lounge. good free pub crawls and the limo club crawl is a great value fun night where you will almost certainly meet new people. staff aren’t particularly friendly but not rude either.

i enjoyed my stay here. the location is perfect - right on venice boardwalk and beach. there's a bar downstairs and free breakfast. the facilities were pretty basic but well kept. it is noisy outside at night, so might not be a good place for a light sleeper. i got a double room and found it pricey for what i got, but it is a popular destination, so probably to be expected

hostel was clean and easy to find, the security could be a little better - was greeted with a strange man off the street running inside as soon as the door was unlocked. apart from that, really nice welcoming staff and awesome location.

the hostel recently added a bar/nightclub of sorts below the hostel, which was fine, but they kept a bedroom that's right above it.  i'm a heavy sleeper, but sleeping was impossible because the sound was equivalent to trying to fall asleep in the middle of a concert stage.  i had stayed here previously and was happy as a clam, but won't risk it again which is a shame because the people and location are otherwise great.  in short i wouldn't recommend staying here if you plan to sleep before 2-3am

great hostel. love they offer free brekky and they have different activities on each day and they even have an event guy come to the room to tell you what’s happening on the weekend. awesome. great location. constantly loud though.

staying at samesun venice was one of the best experiences of my life. the staff was so friendly! the place itself was so clean, and so beautiful. i met people from norway, chicago, and spain. i can't wait to go back again. i was very impressed by the bar/restaurant affiliated with samesun, and i just had the best time. they provide kitchen amenities, there are two refrigerators for personal use, and full kitchen access. again, the staff was amazing! friendly greetings and smiles. five stars!~
comfy bed and great having a carpet floor, great bathroom facilities. not the best with it's social side, hard to know a tourist in the bar.
so far away from the greyhound! took nearly three hours using public transport to get there! always queuing for bathrooms. breakfast is good but kitchen is tiny.
great location and the staff were incredibly helpful. i’ll return again for sure.
fantastic location. friendly staff. played very loud music in common room from as early as 6.30am. and sound carries a lot. so not great for travelers treasures sleep.

while there were clean sheets and pillowcases it was unclear when the last time the duvet was cleaned. the location is definitely a huge tourist attract but there are many homeless people in the area and i didn't feel safe walking around there alone at night.
best view ever! great location and breakfast was good too

the beds are amazing!!! best nights sleep. everything is super clean. breakfast is really relaxed and well provided. little low on bathrooms, but there is not much they can do about that. really good location and fantastic staff.

one of the best hostels i'd stayed at on my trip :) amazing hostel for anyone travelling on their own - staff are so happy to help with any requests and the atmosphere is great. location amazing right on venice beach!!
great location!  very social environment

really good facilities. location is good for venice beach, right by the beach. during the night is quite isolated and full of 'weird' people outside but they are not really dangerous so didnt feel unsafe at all. they are pretty friendly. common room is good and easy to make friends in as its always full of people up for a drink at night.  would recommend and would definitely stay again.

one of the best hostels i've stayed in. amazing value for money, with an unbeatable location on the beach. the staff were friendly, and the dorms were clean and tidy. would recommend for the best experience on venice beach

great location right on venice beach and the back of the building has a mural which is an instagram hotspot. enjoyed my stay but as a solo traveller found it difficult to mix. some activities seemed like a chore for staff and the communal area was pretty depressing - cmon guys its venice beach liven it up a bit! room i was in was always in darkness due to no natural light - made it a bit uncomfortable at times.
can't beat this location if you want to chill at the beach!
staff was great. very patient, very helpful, good to great attitudes.  room was safe and clean.

great hostel, decent rooms, and venice beach is seriously awesome, first stop on my trip and was easily one of my favourites. was lucky enough to get upgraded for free and all of the dorm mates were super chill people, i suppose la would attract a fairly interesting bunch.

direct at venice. not enough bathrooms and toilets. for one floor with dorms and double rooms are only 2 bathrooms with the toilet inside. rooms are small, bed not very comfy. for that expensive price you can get more
great spot! kept extremely clean.

i was a little bit missing really a/c in my room. however great breakfast include of price. i could storage my luggege with out any  fee. staff was friendly and helpful. the location is best especial if you like beach life!

this hostel is in such an ideal location, a stone's throw from the beach. so good. the staff were super friendly and the free breakfast is nice. pancakes, woo!  big thing though, the bar downstairs (which has nice, well priced food) is insanely loud on fri/sat nights. i'm talking beds vibrating and pounding bass that doesn't stop until 1am. i get it, hostels are often loud and it's something i've always just accepted. but this was intense noise. other nights are okay though.

can't beat the location. overall it was fine and did the job, but as others have stated, the bathroom situation is a problem. if you shower at night and get up between 5am and 7am, you won't have to wait in line.

great location. breakfast was really good.  the internet was an absolute joke. did not work most of the time.  the value for money  was not good,a dorm room for over $50 is not on.  hostels should not be allowed charge over $50 for a dorm room regardless of the location or time of year.
the staff was very pleasant and welcoming and the atmosphere in the hostel was great. you get the chance to mmet people in the eveneng in organised events like games in the bar.

fantastic location, right on the beach. the staff (shout out to jaquill) are super friendly, and the facilities are to a pretty good standard. the free breakfast is much better than i thought it would be, and the general vibe/atmosphere is amazing.
location is worth it. great little hostel literally on the beach - would stay here again!

good auto service breakfast! did not like the carpets in the rooms becaus a lot of the beach is just in front of it! they did not make up the beds but the bathroom was always clean! excelent location!!

fantastic location right by the beach! we had good views of the beach from our room too. the bathroom situation was a little frustrating though as there were only two on our level and they both had showers in them so good luck going to the toilet in amongst all the showers and other people using the bathroom too. breakfast was crappy and once they ran out of something they didn't restock e.g nutella which was the only good thing about this breakfast. location made up for this though.

the staff at the hostel is very bad and rude. i asked at the reception to clean the restroom because it was so dirty and they just ignored me. the room is to hot and uncomfortable. definitely i do not recommend.
i love the samesun more each time i go there.
enjoyed my two nights here. breakfast is good- toast, hard boiled eggs, orange juice, make your own pancakes. friendly staff and good vibes throughout. dorms are nicer than in the photos
it was so nice staying here! the location was great, very friendly staff and lots of activities going on! my roommates were also kind and funny. i would definitely go back!

the hostel is perfectly situated right on the beach front and is staffed by the friendliest people! they were spot on with recommendations for food and coffee, and how to get around and what to see. the place is quite kept clean and tidy and the beds are very comfortable - the perfect place to come back to after a long day of exploring what la has to offer! i highly recommend this hostel to anyone and everyone!

best part about the hostel is the location. whoever was working when i got in one night wasn't very nice at all. breakfast had hard boiled eggs that weren't done (so couldn't eat). the room was warm and stuffy. ceiling leaked. overpriced.
first time at a hostel. great time.

staff were so friendly, they could not have been anymore welcoming. the hostel is in a perfect setting and you get discount at the bar downstairs. only thing is i never needed my card to get into the building because the door never seemed to shut properly.
beds were filthy and the staff weren't exactly knowledgable or helpful apart from one girl who took us on a hike. rooms and the bathrooms were terrible.

killer location and really comfy beds/pillows. surprisingly quite dark and quiet rooms for being on such an active street, once the windows are closed and blinds drawn. i just stayed one night so didn't have time to try any of the organized activities, but they looked to have a good variety throughout the week! i would return if i found myself wanting some beach time in venice again.

nice hostel, right at venice beach (which is a more sketchy area than expected). the staff is very nice and the breakfast is not bad at all. rooms can be a little noisy since the building is on the street, but it is clearly fine.
great hostel with an awesome location. only drawback was that there was only one toilet and shower on each floor.

this hostel is fine but out of the 5 i've stayed in during my trip this was definitely my least favourite. the 'shared washroom' in my 4bed dorm was a sink in the corner which i think is a bit of a joke. there were 2 mixed-sex bathrooms on my floor which was not even nearly enough, every time i wanted to use the restroom/clean teeth etc i had to wait. they organised trips out but generally atmosphere was a little stale. permanent happy hour for guests at bar below hostel was a big bonus though.
great location. but a complete rip off for what you get. tiny room and poor customer service at reception. worst i've stayed in.
only stayed for one night but the location was amazing right one the beach , staff was amazing but those stairs are killer with a bag .     would recommend!

this is my first time to stay in samesun venice beach and i would say that i had a great experience. great location,  price is very reasonable, free breakfast, and the staff are very helpful and friendly especially katya in the front desk. will definitely come back..      zaldy zamora  sacramento, ca
location is unbelievable. that's by far the best part about this place. my room had no ac which made the night pretty miserable, but it was still worth it. breakfast was mediocre. would stay again.

overall very nice! clubhop on friday night was awesome! (maybe just a bit overpriced) 😉  just a couple of small improvement suggestions, i dunno how it is in the other rooms, but my room was so hot! i recommend either installing air condition or getting more and stronger fans!  also, breakfast was quite ok, but could have had more variety (e.g. cream cheese)

had a great time here! staff was really helpful, even ran down the stairs to help me with my luggage. great discounts at the restaurant/bar downstairs, which has a cool nice-but-beachy vibe (and great food/drinks--get the korean fries). currently having some construction done in the stairwell but only during the day, and the maintenance folks were really friendly (would stop whenever someone opened the door to come through, didn't make a lot of noise early in the morning).
perfect place to stay for venice beach
not enough bathrooms for amount of people  not clean at all
nice hostel, location is perfect!
great location, friendly people. awesome music playing in the mornings if you're into bands like vampire weekend and tame impala!

perfect location, right next to venice beach. hire bikes and cycle down to santa monica. rooms are clean and comfortable. friday night limo crawl was really fun. staff are helpful planning out daily activities.

if you want the venice beach experience stay at this hostel! it's practically on the beach! great facilities, free breakfast, quiet but sociable, and really friendly, helpful staff. plus the restaurant downstairs does delicious food. i would definitely stay there again :)
nowhere near enough bathrooms for how many people there are but this seems standard in us hostels. reasonable rooms and breakfast, alright staff - location right on venice boardwalk is fantastic.
great hostel. great location. i would book it again.
great spot   friendly staff   really clean for a backpackers   bar staff downstairs are awesome
if you want to go to venice beach, this is the place to be.

samesun is a great hostel right on venice beach. i stayed in a 4 bed female dorm, and the beds were clean and comfortable and the bathroom was clean and in good working order. laundry is $5 a bag and the staff have it ready for you the next day. the lockers aren't big enough to store a suitcase, but you can lock away plenty of valuables. the staff were very friendly and helpful. wifi was great. luggage storage was very cramped but that is to be expected! i'd stay here again.
well run hostel in the centre of venice beach. you couldn't ask for a better location. shame they can't make more of that roof terrace!
nice hostel, good location, good range of breakfast options. the staff were friendly as were most other guests.

cannot fault this place. was booked in until 30th july then went off to hollywood but have ended up coming back here instead! amazing location (could not get closer to the beach apart from sleeping on it!) great staff amd very welcoming. if you are coming to venice, stay here.

had a great stay at venice beach. dorms are clean and beds so comfy and good size. only issue would be our door did not shut properly so was not fully secure. breakfast was good and staff very helpful. location could not have been better for venice beach!!

the best hostel i've stayed so far! the location is one block from venice beach. you have discounts for a bar which is next to the hostel. people and staff are very friendly.  beds are very comfortable. everything is clean!  i'll defenitely be back in this hostel.     my suggestion: add a foosball table in the living room :)
perfect location by the beach. atmosphere is almost non-existant though, and you wont find much nightlife around venice beach
clean hostel with great location. not enough bathrooms for all the people who are staying there.
great hostel! awesome staff and perfect location. would stay again!

this is a great hostel with an amazing location. very clean and so close to all of venice. get a skatey, get right involved. the venice ale house does great beers. the sunset is perfect holiday material. enjoy!
great place to stay if you want a quick stroll to disneys theme parks. spa and pool are perfect to relax in. great value for money and friendly!
it was great. in a perfect location. bar and restaurant just downstairs. helpful staff. 10/10

great place to stay for a few days, right on the beach which is perfect!!   free breakfast every morning although it's mainly just toast and cut oranges. wish there was more of a selection.   security wise, i was never asked to show my room card going in but that was only because my floor was above reception to i didn't need to pass them on my way. that being said i never once felt unsafe during my stay.   overall i would recommend this hostel for anyone looking for somewhere in the la area!!
awesome place to stay! close to the beach; area not the best but the hostel itself is super cool. lots of fun activities and fun people running them. would definitely stay again!

nice place, staff are laid back and helpful. they offer free towels.   each bed has a little shelf with light and power which is excellent.   free breakfast and cheap laundry   powerful and steady temperature in the showers.  there is a music venue down stairs which goes until about 12pm. so not ideal if you're planning to do day trips where you have to get up early.  but if you want somewhere to sleep near the beach area, this is perfect for you. also close to lax airport (about $25 uber)

the wifi dropped in and out. the power points did not work. the roof leaked and the staff didn't seem to care. breakfast was ok, staff was ok. location was great. shower always seemed to be dirty/sandy.
staff was really nice and helpful.   the wifi doesn't always work though.   otherwise, everything was great, i will probably come back here if i come to venice beach!

staff at the front desk are helpful and will answer any questions you have.  clean hostel, with no issues at all, toilets were clean, shower was clean and bed sheets were clean.  good location if you are into beach activities such as surfing otherwise driving is the only option to get to other touristy places such as hollywood and beverly hills.   security was average, could be improved by asking guests to show their cards at front desk

good hostel. very helpful with luggage storage and let me have showers before and after i checked out which was great when going from the beach to the airport. excellent location for venice,hipster eateries and snta monica and just as difficult as the rest of la to get anywhere else! gets noisy at night in the front rooms, slightly cramped building and no air con in my room so got a bit warm.  nightly activities,mostly drinking related (i went on the limo club tour which was fun). helpful staff.
only stayed for one night but enjoyed it. location is really awesome, right at the beach and the hollywood limo ride was super fun! great and helpful staff. iwould definitely  recommend

venice beach is probably where you want to stay when visiting la - and this samesun was right by the boardwalk. price was okay, there's a basic breakfast included, plus they make a good effort to run an event every evening. i'd definitely go back here.

this is a party hostel so set your expectations. it gets loud at night. bathrooms aren't that clean and are barely functional. the beds smell a bit musty and if it isn't a cool night the rooms are going to be stuffy. it is right on venice beach however, near bus stops, and the people staying are friendly.

the location of this hostel is great. everything else is ok or bad. we stayed in it because it has such good reviews, but i'm really surprised it does. they did not clean the room/change sheets even once in four days/three nights we were there. it was extremely humid and there was no a/c--it's extremely unpleasant to be inside a hot and humid room. internet was unreliable and a pain in the rear. the staff was unhelpful and unreliable. i've got more to say, but no more characters left.

awesome stay. they had overbooked and put the two of us in separate rooms by accident but happily upgraded us to a private room instead of a dorm. amazingly accommodating. great facilities, awesome location on the beach and amazing food at the downstairs restaurant.
full price for staying at the hostel was not clear which led to misunderstanding.  great location and good standard of cleanliness.

samesun is at an excellent location, in venice beach just steps from the actual ocean. the staff was very knowledgeable, they offered a filing breakfast, the room was clean. the only complaint is that we got a room with no outside window, so our room got really warm since we were on the third floor.
the location is amazing. i could see the beach from the room window, it's that close to it. my stay was great. the staff was friendly and i really appreciated the luggage room.

perfect location right on venice beach, staff are awesome and make you feel welcome.   for once a decent mattress on the beds, activities on most nights - if not there is plenty to do around the area!
awesome spot  staff super friendly and happy to help  private rooms are awesome for the price
a little on the pricey side, but you get what you pay for! the location was unbeatable. you are literally on the venice boardwalk and the room i stayed in had a great view!
nice and clean, helpful staff, wifi speed could be a lot better

i was pretty nervous because i never have stayed in a hostel. i was made welcome and i was pleasantly surprised by the accommodations. clean and comfortable. i felt very safe. just so cool that it was right at the heart of venice! i'm very pleased. ~michelle from albuquerque nm
great place to stay...they do pub crawls which are super fun.
great location right on venice beach, not really the sociable hostel however the bar is apparently under construction, so it'll be a lot better when that's up and running!

i loved my stay here.   the location was perfect and easy to bike around and up to santa monica pier. you can hire a bike from jays cheaply right next door.   the facilities were fantastic. and the area whilst right in the centre of venice board walk was not at all too noisy. would definitely stay here again.

only 2 bathrooms (1 toilet and 1 shower each) on each floor of the hostel (only 2 floors too), this was very inconvenient since there are 4+ people staying in each room and tons of rooms on each floor. very close to the venice beach boardwalk (very very crowded boardwalk). the hostel was doing some renovations to their stairwell so there was a lot of paint chips on the ground and dust. breakfast was what you would expect at a hostel.
staff was amazing! location was perfect to walk along venice beach!!!

excellent location, 3 minute walk to the beach. staff would help with any problems you had but wouldn't be overly excited to do so. only 1 common room which is fairly small so quite easy to meet people. would recommend!
it was okay and location was good

mediocre hostel in an excellent location with great staff. breakfast is nice but a cramped common room and kitchen is annoying. facilities aren't great. location is excellent, which is the only reason to stay here.

right on venice beach, a few km stroll from santa monica pier and right near plenty of places to grab a drink!  wish there were more group activities on thursday nights because we were hoping to meet people and party with a crew (but all you can eat tacos is a cute idea anyway!)  staff were pretty good, lots of cleaning going on all the time which was good for making it feel clean, but tricky because the number of bathrooms was limited!  breakfast was fantastic!! such a good wake up idea!

good location. rooms were clean, however i was in a seven bed and therefore had a single bed. none of the plugs around me worked and everyone had extension leads attached to their bunk beds but i did not. when i asked why the plugs didn't work at the front desk, the workers response was "i'm not an electrician" therefore thought the staff were abit unhelpful   apart from this the hostel is nice and cheaper than other hostels in la

great place to stay and experience the best of venice beach. amazing views over the boardwalk and ocean, clean rooms with good wifi and free breakfast in the morning to start your day (pancakes included). really friendly and helpful staff and will definitely be back to visit when i'm in l.a again.
really cool hostel right on venice beach. breakfast was great and all the facilities you could need :)

great location i must say. right by the beach (literally) and quite a few places to eat outside. major downside is that its a communal bathroom (which i don't mind) but there's only 2 bathrooms for the entire floor meaning tons of waiting in the morning when you just gotta take a leak. and i don't understand the passport policy. i am american and good thing i have a passport (most don't). you really think people will try and stay longer w/o paying? they require to show next travel destination.
samesun venice is always amazing! i'd live there if i could.
clean, great breakfast included and location hard to beat. front door doesn't lock, ever, so security could be better.
the location of the hostel is good as it is just in front of the beach.

the best hostel i stayed in during my west coast trip! amazing location (my room had a ocean view!) and the rooms were super nice. very spacious, one of the best hostel beds i've ever encountered and the ensuite bathroom was great as well. there were plenty of activities organized by the hostel where you could make friends very easily, and the staff was very helpful. the kitchen and common room are a little bit cramped, but during the activity nights this only helped in meeting people!

a short stay to get over jet lag. did exactly what it was meant to. a place for me to lay low for a couple of nights, go wandering along the beach, hit some cool bars around venice + santa monica. great location, great vibe along the board walk. the staff were very accommodating. if i was staying longer i would have liked somewhere with a larger common space to get to know my fellow travellers, i found most were quite closed off and in their zone but only a minor bump in an otherwise great stay.

when i got to the hostel we were told to pay for the days we would be staying. we were charged usd 18 extra. we asked for a refund which was accepted by the staff at samesun however, i have still not received the money. this blows!

liked it so much i extended from two to five nights. took the four bed mixed dorm and was so happy with it, window view onto venice beach, our own bathroom and a nice and clean room. was a little more pricey than the eight bed dorms but totally worth it! had cleaners come every day, breakfast was included(toast, butter and jam, pancakes, eggs) and there were activities every night, the best was mario cart with beers. met cool people and venice beach was a one min walk away. close to la transit.

small hostel with limited communal areas, nice vibe and clean....location cant be better for venice beach. be prepared for lots of homeless outside especially at night bit sketchey late ...beautiful beach location short walk to santa monica....lots of stalls for t shirts and souvenirs

stayed for over night in a 4-bed en-suite room. was clean and well organised. the kitchen and communal areas are a bit small, especially around breakfast time, and the toaster conveyor wasn't working. other than this a great night's stay.
amazing location, great staff, and clean, quiet rooms.
great location,
guest were very nice but the night staff were rude. one dude especially. i didn't understand the valuables room on the check-in floor. it totally not secure.

i loved staying here!! usually i don't believe reviews that say it was in a sketchy area but this hostel was in a bit of a sketchy area. homeless people would sit right outside the hostel and fights were broken up by he police right outside the hostel. this being said, just use common sense! don't walk alone at night and that sort of thing. the atmosphere is amazing in this hostel!!! met so many amazing people from all over the world.

location is perfect, literally couldn't be closer to venice beach, the views are stunning.   rooms are really nice and the facilities are good. showers are enormous.  there's a nice lounge area and met some really cool people.   bars are a little bit far away.

was a really nice hostel. clean and comfortable beds. a good group of travellers staying. only downside is there is very little night life around the hostel after about 8pm and if you want to visit a lot of the main attractions it is a fair drive. but overall a great place to enjoy the beach.

location is perfect for venice / small walk from santa monica. i was placed in a room with a view out to the sea front and that was my highlight! it was unbelievable! staff were really helpful. lounge area could be improved but other than that i was really happy with my stay!
great hostel. area can be a bit sketchy at night. they also had someone take over my bed after i got home first night and threw away some items (socks) i had on the bed. but yea decent place overall.

i stayed in a 4 bedroom dorm with 3 strangers. it was a great experience meeting new people.    the breakfast in the morning was good & free - it was make your own pancakes and had orange juice as well as toast. the lounge area was tidy and had a tv playing sports in hd. the view outside the lounge was looking over the beach, too.    the room was good size with good beds, as well as lockers (you bring your own lock). bathroom was clean, too. showers hot/cold worked well.
great place overall! only downside is there are only 5 bathrooms to cover two floors.. meant waiting a little while to get into a bathroom if you chose to shower at the wrong time!
nicely located hostel with nice social atmosphere

average backpacker accommodation, felt a bit run down but was clean enough and had the basics. breakfast was really good, but for the high price you're paying you kind of hoped it would be decent! great location on venice beach, but also very expensive for what it is. though that may just be the la norm.
good location close to beach but grotty hostel and staff customer service is pretty poor.

i think samesun was absolutely extortionate for what it was. we payed approx  $600 usd for 4 nights in a single room. the single room consisted of a double bed, and that was all. the window faced on to a brick wall. the bed was so uncomfortable, after a long flight from sydney this was so disappointing.   the staff at the front desk were miserable and offered no help. we arrived at 8am (after a 22 hour flight) and they refused to give us a towel for a shower until our check in time of 3pm
great location, but the staff was not to friendly.     there were only three bathrooms for a whole storage.
really friendly and welcoming place, guests and staff all lovely. room was a little but cramped, but not uncomfortably so. great location- so close to the beach. loved the whole stay.

short stop over trip before flying else, so can't comment too much on the hostel but clean, good facilities and easy to get to in can/shuttle from airport(40min in traffic, 15-20min early morning). great location for venice beach. would stay again for a short stop over.

the location is perfect! i could see the sea from my window   the stuffs were very nice and helpful   the breakfast was ok, you could get coffee, orange juice, bread and so on  it is a good idea to stay there if you wanna enjoy the beach and sun!
great location! so close to the beach
great stay, met a lot of cool people, great facilities and just the atmosphere you'd expect from a hostel. had a blast
great location, close to the boardwalk.   be advice, the boardwalk gets really sketchy at night.

great place! was only here for two nights, but i got upgraded from a seven bed to a four which was nice. beautiful ocean front view, loved it! also liked that they came around to the rooms to tell us about the activities that happened.  power went out for about six hours though one day which was weird and slightly annoying.  lastly, construction is going on underneath the hostel so if you're on the second floor it's very noisy!  overall great hostel though

i always stay at this hostel when in la. location is amazing on venice beach (best chinese restaurant only a block away - mao's kitchen). easy access to public transport to get around the rest of la. super comfy beds and the staff are brilliant. activities run by the hostel everyday and it's an easy spot to meet fellow travellers. highly recommend.
rooms were cramped compared to other hostels and residents loud.  breakfast was good.

it's a pretty old hostel, but has a lot of character. we stayed in a 4 bed dorm which was pretty small but it had a sink in the room. the free breakfast is hard boiled eggs, toast, oats or pancakes good variety. the bathrooms were always clean. the hostel feels a little pokey just due to the way it's built. plenty of unisex bathrooms to use. common area is small but ok. the best thing was the location! right on venice beach :)
amazing, venice beach is beautiful. the staff there are really helpful and fun.

in the past couple years i have stayed at all the hostels in los angeles area and found samesun hostel one of the best. the location is terrific and many of the room have ocean view. the room are good size with comphy beds and also includes locker (bring your own lock). fri and sat night activities are super fun too. special thanks to the amazing, friendly staff for making my stay hostel experience best ever: sara (manager), sam (front desk) and ryder (activity host)! -shaft

only stayed one night as a passover before my flight, but seemed like a nice place. area outside the hostel got a little sketchy when it got dark but u don't get much closer to venice beach. too expensive for me for a shared dorm room
brilliant location, super clean and chilled atmosphere. would stay again.

the most comfortable beds i've ever slept on in a hostel! strong wifi connection and clean facilities and amenities. staff were helpful and the location is 10/10 - right in front of of the beach and muscle beach, walking distance to santa monica.

awesome place to stay   although it was getting renovated at the time the common room had a great vibe   hostel had organised trips / games night and pub crawls   directly across from the beach my room had a great view :)   fantastic place ! ☺️

communal areas aren't big enough particularly at breakfast times, also there were a lot of flies inside. room was very clean though and security very good. had an amazing view of the beach from my room too.
not very clean. really small room. really noisy from water dripping. left in the middle of the night to move to another location. pretty expensive for a hostel.

awesome location!!! easy access to transit (buses), but right on the beach. literally. staff is super helpful, the atmosphere is inviting, and free breakfast is always a plus!! the activities are wicked so take advantage!!

bed is comfy and location is ideal. great breakfast includes pancakes, boiled eggs, different types of breads, and fruits. shower would be problem because they have limited number of booths. that should be updated.
had an awesome stay and the best roommates

stayed here for 4 nights with my mate jeremy. everything was freaking awesome and we met some really cool people in our room, the only bad thing was this guy from texas would hangout in the common room and get belligerently drunk and would yell at everyone and was just downright annoying. pretty much had to stay away from the common room just to avoid him.      but yeah other than that the hostel was freaking amazing.

such a great atmosphere! i stayed here for 2 nights and made new friends instantly :) the hostel has daily activities which is great for solo travellers. you must be cool with a flight or 2 of stairs to stay here (no lift). the common room is small but comfortable so good if you like chatting to others!
staff great and location fantastic
perfect location, delicious breakfast, comfy beds, really clean and the staff were all lovely and helpful. cant recommend highly enough. its well worth paying a bit extra
great stay and location!
loved it. roomies were cool. great location.

my friend and i stayed at this hostel.   positive things: - towels for free, even beach towels - 24h reception  - discount on skate/bike rentals around the corner  - sink in the rooms, unfortunately no soap or (paper)towels - very close to the beach  negative aspects: - only 3 bathrooms on each floor. our room had 8 people, idk how much we're in the other rooms but even if it's only 4, that's not enough. 1 bathroom= 1 toilet stall + shower - probably not the safest spot in town

very delighted with my experience. i am not the usual millennial backpacker but a middle-aged person with a suitcase. nonetheless, the staff were gracious and helpful. it was blissfully quiet at night  (sunday) despite the buzz of activity and music out on the street all afternoon. i bought ear plugs but didn't need them. there is a long staircase to negotiate coming in but the staff helped me get my heavy bag down when i checked out. i would definitely stay there again!
great location,  1 minute walk to the beach. rooms are overall good. more expensive the other hostels but good price for a beach view.
excellent location and super-friendly staff! i will definitely stay here again.

what a fantastic location.  across the street from venice beach boardwalk and ocean on the one side and on the other great bars (rooftop too!) and food. comfy bed and bedding, quiet, safe and overall a great choice.  didn't have the breakfast so i can't comment on that.
beautiful and friendly people!
super chill and affordable hostel right on benice beach ! rent a bike and cruise ! it's a close bike ride to santa monica . on wed the have a farmers market so take advantage of that !

if you want to explore venice beach, this is the place to be - you're right at the entrance, you can see the sea from your dorm window. it's a little more expensive than the nearby hostels so you decide if it's worth it. they have activities often enough - check their calendar.
awesome awesome, very clean and the staff is really cool. keep up the good work.
place is great... but overpriced.
right at the busy area of venice beach. recently renovated, so rooms are pretty neat. there are several nice places to hangout in the vicinity. if you want to explore venice beach, this is the place.
great place right on the beach and lively at night i loved it here everything you need is right here

great location just right at venice beach. many bars & restaurants to hang out at night, great sand & ocean to see in the morning / afternoon.  the facilities were nice & clean. good to have toilet & bathrooms inside the room.  breakfast was good, just what's needed for a good start of the day!
amazing location- 2 mins walk from the beach! shout out for the reception desk staff arthur- very helpful, friendly and cool person!
only spent one night everything looked fine.back again in 2 weeks for a few days.
very good

perfect location - centrally located in the middle of the venice beach broad walk. i stayed in a 4 bedded room right next to the lounge area - got very noisy and was hard to sleep. one lady at check in seems to just not want to be there and is quite blunt. other than that all of the other staff are lovely and the facilities are well kept. room and kitchen were clean. bar crawl was not organised properly by the hostel and people were left waiting around wondering what was going on.

i found this hostel a little disappointing as i had heard great things about samesun. it's a little small and the layout is a little strange for generating any kind of community environment. however, the facilities and cleanliness was pretty good and the staff were friendly and helpful.
very nice hostel, staff is amazing, best location to visit and to enjoy venice beach ! great facilities and very good breakfast !
awesome hostel. friendly helpful staff. great location right in the thick of it. would stay there again in a heartbeat.

loved my experience at samesun! they had a great staff working while i was there and had some really awesome events- like a karaoke night! i made some awesome friends. the location is great and they have some deals with the local shops, too!
nice hostel, great hostel, would book again
amazing location right on the boardwalk
location is very good. staff is great and atmosphere too.
great place. would definitely recommend it.

we had a private room. it was clean and nice but the overall place was cramped and kind of dingy. bathrooms were kind of gross too by the end of the day. it was crowded in the morning for breakfast. location is good though. staff were pretty nice and inclusive.

the location on venice beach is amazing, especially for daytime activities! at night, the area seems slightly shady and not so lively despite a couple of bars nearby but i still felt safe. we had a private room and it was expensive for what we got. there was a small window overlooking dark courtyard so not much natural light in the room. the water going through the pipe was super noisy. besides, the number of bathrooms is limited and the kitchen is small. it does not seem to be a social hostel.
samesun was amazing, on the best spot if you want to know both venice and santa monica.  it's not really safe on the streets at night so going out was kind of hard but it was a cool experience
enjoyed my stay, but it was expensive for what it was.
