highly recommend this hostel. the staff were amazing so so friendly.  you and your belongings are incredible protected at all times. amazing night outs with their tours and events. and everything was super clean 10/10

while some of the staff was very helpful...others were outright awful. got back to my room one evening to find they'd opened my locker and removed my stuff stating "it wasn't my room" which was total rubbish....the employee who had checked me in the night before had  moved to a new room because the room i was supposed to have was an absolute disaster. you couldn't walk in the room it was so bad. the breakfast is nice. the common areas are ok. the are is fun. i will never stay here again though.
a girl in my 6 bed dorm managed to sneak her friend into the room. the staff did not do anything about it. the ensuite toilet was quite dirty. the room walls are paper thin.
the best place to stay in venice!

the samesun venice beach was so much fun. the people there were friendly, the staff so good to talk to a get things to do for the day. anything negative i have to say about it absolutely means nothing in comparison to the good things i have to say. the locations great and there is plenty to do on the beach even if it's just walk around. definitely a great place to stay.

well, samesun disproves all my previous experiences that hostels must be dirty and uncomfortable...it was not!  very clean and well taken care of, pleasant staff, very nice breakfast, very comfortable beds, very clean and frequently serviced bathrooms....plus a great location with very good security.  don't mind the couple flights of stairs to get to reception...it's all a breeze from there.  i just stayed for a quick overnight, but i'm sure samesun would be nice for longer stays too. good job!
i was in room near the common area. extremely noisy.

it was a short but nice stay, very clean and organized. breakfast was the best part of it. very lively atmosphere, awesome staff.  perfect location for enjoying the beach or going out at night.  the only downside was that it has only 4 toilets for like 50 people, so it's easy to end up waiting in line in order to use one.
la is gross but this hostel is nice, right by the beach
everything you need in location, location, location!!!!!! very helpful nice staff and really nice comfortable rooms.!
top location, bathroom in the room and free breakfast! will stay here again.
i thoroughly enjoyed my stay here!!  it wasn't necessarily the hostel itself, but the people staying there made it for one of the best times i've had traveling!!
great location but the staff was extremely rude and unhelpful. beds where very comfortable.
friendly, helpful staff!

nice room, nice and fun staff, secure entrance, ample paid and free parking options, great at offering night-life activities for meeting people. amazing location for the beach, juice, vegan and raw options. lots of noise at night from night life - but i expected that. mornings and daylight were my favorite here as my traditional night life desires have become more about relaxation and solitude, and now i'm much more into health and feeling good instead of partying, but still had fun at night!

had an issue with the hostel overcharging me (they did not admit that the deposit paid through hw was part of the rate) and the staff who handled it (onsite as well as via email) was clueless. i had to go through hw to get the refund, and even then the transaction failed somewhere so i had to complain to the card issuer. it's an ok hostel, a bit cramped, lots of stairs but no elevator, but not the best i've been to.
the best hostel i visited in the us. so good i decided to go back!
very clean rooms! perfect location very nice staff wonderful stay.
awesome location and the staff are really helpful. cheers

hands down the best hostel in which i've ever stayed. the staff is consistently warm and nice. the facilities are clean and feel extremely safe. i've met some fascinating people here from all across the globe, who came here to have a great time, and be awesome people. with the organized bar crawls, the karoake, and taco tuesday, i've had nothing but the greatest experience so far. i even extended my stay for a week. yeah. it was that fun.
the atmosphere was great, and the breakfast even better. i was only here for two days but i felt super comfortable here.
perfect location right on the beach, friendly staff, good breakfast, comfy beds. would definitely come back!
amazing place to stay.

i didn't particularly enjoy my 3 night stay at venice beach. as a solo female traveller, i didn't feel safe in the area itself so that put a downer on my stay. staff weren't as friendly or helpful as one would expect. wifi barely worked when i was there. each floor only had 2 toilets and showers, which were in the same room so couldn't be used if occupied. breakfast was good though.
good people, good spot if venice beach is your thing.

it doesn't get much better than samesun venice beach.  the location is idyllic, literally a few steps away from the tumbling waves of the pacific ocean, and other noteworthy los angeles points of interest.  the dorm rooms are large, each bunk equipped with plush mattresses and fresh sheets daily.  each room is air conditioned, and some contain private bathrooms.  i was particularly impressed by the variant free breakfast, from eggs and pancakes to fruit, juice, tea and coffee.  i loved it.

the location is great but they should have a travelers/backpackers only requirement.  i had two random guys come in the middle of the night and sleep off their drunkenness and get up early and leave --- they were beyond disgusting and making the worst noises i have ever heard anyone make while sleeping.  not a good experience at all.

i had a very brief stay at this hostel on a trip through la and was very happy. i arrived late at night and was greeted by a friendly face at reception and given good advice about parking, restaurants, and other bits and pieces.  the room was nice, spacious, clean and even had a view over venice beach. the bed was incredibly comfortable.  breakfast was enough to get you going in the morning, which is all you want.  i definitely recommend this hostel to anyone looking for a place in venice beach.

this is my favorite hostel that i have stayed in. it is right on the main section of the boardwalk, it is an easy walk or bike ride to the santa monica pier, there are great places to get food (especially coffee and ice cream) right near by, and you get to make pancakes and toast for breakfast which is a nice change form the pre packaged breakfasts you typically get elsewhere. this hostel has the best sense of community i have experienced while traveling in the states. everyone is very friendly.
the location is this amazing and makes everything. its just next to venice beach. overall its a bit chaotic but its worth its money.
good location, clean and safe.  venice beach is nice during day time.

i have stayed at three other hostels in southern california area and found samesun hostel the best. great location, fun activities, great hostel mates from all over the world, love the laundry service and breakfast! but the best part about this hostel is the people who work there. special shout out to sarah, sam, and ryder for their awesomeness!!!

this is honestly the best hostel i've ever stayed at. the atmosphere was so laid back and conducive to meeting new people. the pub crawl dom led on monday night was one of the best nights i've ever had out. if i ever find myself in la again, i wouldn't think twice before booking this hostel again.

good location directly at venice beach. small lockers, basic breakfast, great views on the beach, might get loud in the morning (music from venice beach), everything clean and fine! good pub crawl as well :)
great staff, great food. its in venice beach, so great location. but not easy to reach from the airport. but since it is cost to the airport, can take a cab
great hostel right on venice beach. dominic was a legend
good location right on venice beach. vibe wasn't that social, and not the cleanest hostel, but still pretty good.
had a blast. the people really made it! we had heaps of fun and created a good atmosphere. not many organised activities over new years and it could have been a little 'nicer'/cleaner. thanks 🙏🏻
excellent location, not so great for solo travellers.
great location easy to walk out to venice beach and bars and restaurants. good breakfast included in the morning.  dorm rooms are spacious. staff could be a little friendlier

very good location. beside venice beach (not that close to santa monica pier, though). close to lax.   nice staff.    breakfast included, but we didn't know it would end at 10 am.  we barely made it for breakfast.  kitchen staff was helpful.  the whole hostel was clean, incl. the en-suite bathroom.  but if your room doesn't have a bathroom, you may need to fight for a shared one outside. it seemed there were only 2 shared bathrooms on each level. entrance stairs had strange odor, but not elsewhere.
i spent my xmas here in 2016 with a bunch of strangers from different countries & backgrounds. i had so much fun here!

this place was fantastic! we stayed in a private room for two nights over christmas. the hostel organised lots of activities over the festive period, and everyone was so friendly. the location was fantastic and really gave us a taste of venice. the shared bathrooms were very clean and the property was very safe. we didn't want to leave!
good location

this hostel is in the absolute prime location. the rooms are clean and the free breakfast in the morning is good! the staff are especially accomodating, especially marvin who helped us when our flight had been cancelled! definitely recommend this hostel to anyone traveling to los angeles
great location cannot be beaten. atmosphere is so/so due to small common area.
value for money, good location
i enjoyed staying here, although for the price i believe guests should have the privilege of outside guests, especially if you have reserved a private room.
good location but expensive just like everything in la basically

this hostel may look rough in the outside but on the inside it is amazing. great value for money and the staff are really nice.  there are many nice cafes and bars nearby and all within walking distance.     venice beach may not be the cleanest and have many homeless, but it is still a nice place to visit.

perfect location for an early morning run along the beach. lockers are small. free breakfast gets the job done and only $15 uber from lax. can also get there via bus but it takes about an hour and feels a little unsafe travelling alone especially when it gets dark. limited food options around but a really chill place and right on the beach.

really enjoyed my stay. i'm on a coastal camping trip by myself and this was my first stay in a hostel for the trip. the people were great, the staff was accommodating, and the location is perfect for exploring west la. must stay location.
amazing staff and clean, nice rooms. you also can't beat the location! highly reccommend!

perfect location (minus the fact that venice basically shuts down after dark) with just a short walk to the beach. facilities were great; free breakfast and wifi were awesome; and they even let us keep our bags in storage after we checked out since we had a super late flight!

accomodation was really great, so close to venice beach. staff really lovely and had great suggestions. the deal with the laundry is a bonus too.  only thing is there's a lot of homeless people around so you feel a little unsafe at night, particularly when they are right on the doorstep of the hostel.
one of the best hostels.
decent spot on venice beach, not too far from lax. overall fine - trips organised most nights and the wifi is good.
hostel was in such a great location, staff couldn't have been more helpful.     overall a fantastic place to stay in the la. would stay there again in a heartbeat.
i only stayed one night here but it was great. very clean, great atmosphere and awesome staff. right on the beach and there were some pretty cool bars right across the street.
amazing spot, great staff, activities were awesome thanks to dom, would go back for sure.

great place right in front of the beach - it's literally right there if you look out the dorm window. i was there only one night but they had a nice little outing to a nearby bar and then we all went to the club in front of the hostel.
it was a clean and safe hostel, however my room was a bit small for 4 people, there was no window.
a friendly place, and helpful staff
staff were great, good wifi and kitchen facilities but the number of bathrooms was a big problem for me - far too few, although i know this is not an easy fix.
comfy bed, great vibe, plenty of lockers, nice hot breaky and plenty of activities suggested. only downfall was the lack of bathroom/ shower facilities and i was there during a quiet time :s

rooms were clean, shower was clean, common room was cool and kitchen spacy. only thing that bothered me was the nasty smell in the sleeping dorm. it smelled like sweat and dirtiness.     good place for a solo traveler!!
great hostel to stay at. right on venice beach. rooms are generous and very clean! would definitely recommend!
nice place near venice beach.
friendly staff, clean, perfect location.

hostel was pretty good, however the neighbourhood wasn't so safe. someone got stabbed to death at the end of the street, random teenage youths always out the front of the hostel begging for smokes and cash. maybe that's how it is in venice/l.a. would stay again if they had security at the front door.
officious morning staff is very rude in their instructions to guests.

this was one of our favourite hostels of the entire trip. great wifi which is always appreciated. the rooms were clean and spacious. the shelves next to the bed with charging port/lamp was also really handy. staff were always friendly and helpful. we liked it so much we left our other hostel early and came back to venice for another 2 nights!
the beds and rooms are comfortable.  the bathrooms are clean and wide. the breakfast was difficult, but not a real problem. i enjoyed my stay in venice beach, the hostel is well located.
nice place, i enjoyed the company!

perfect location to spend time at the beach. i arrived 5 hours before check in expecting to put my stuff in storage but they had my room ready. i also had to cancel one night of my stay & sam was great in sorting that out & giving me a refund. thanks dude! free breakfast was nice. plugs & lamp by the bed- such a plus. no complaints. i'll be going back for sure.

awesome hostel. amazing location just 2 second walk from the broad walk and a 10 minute walk to abbot kinney blvd. i stayed in a 4 bed female dorm and it was really comfortable, bathroom was clean and they had lockers. the breakfast in the morning was good, eggs, pancakes, coffee, i bought a few more bits to add to it. met lots of lovely people and th staff are so friendly too. i would 100% stay here again
מקום סימפטי, צוות נחמד ומאיר פנים, אווירה נעימה  wifi   חינם גם בחדרים.  יש ארוחה בוקר צנועה וכל אחר צריך לשטוף את הצלחת שלו.  יש מקלחות בחדרים.  נקי ומסדר.  נמצא ממש על החוף.  מומלץ.
loved this hostel. the private room with seaview was wonderful and excellent value for money. sara and her team were professional and welcoming.
good location, very centrical. the breakfast was what would bring me back here any time of the week...
really great place to stay. the location is what brought me there but in the end everything about the hostel including the staff was great. also very accessible from lax.

great location and good value for money.   the hostel only has 3 shared bathrooms for the whole facility (as in one toilet and a shower in each bathroom) which was a little frustrating in the morning.
hostel is right on venice beach

nice place to stay near venice beach. easy to reach and close to everything close to venice. the surrounding area was only active during the weekend. the facilities are a "no thrills" place. it is ok. if you need a clean, secure place to crash, this is your place. good price/value. don't forget to bring your own padlock, to close your stuff in the metal lockers (in the room). otherwise you can buy one in reception (7 bucks at the time of this writing). overall: recommended!

stayed here for an extended stay and it was a great experience. free breakfast is on point, hard boiled eggs/make your own pancakes, coffee/tea. facilities were very clean, beds are comfortable. staff was super accommodating during my long stay. sam went above and beyond for me multiple times, if management is reading this give this guy a raise. staff comes around and knocks on the room doors every so often to make sure everyone is included in the events. super secure entry.
best hostel i ve ever stayed!!
if you want the venice beach exsperiance stay here

not a bad hostel. it was so difficult to bring my suitcases up the big staircases to reception after a long flight as a solo traveller. the 4 bed room with an ensuite that i stayed in was clean and tidy. great location & hostel staff were nice.

samesun venice beach has to be the best hostel i have stayed in. i woke up and looked out my window to the beautiful palm trees of venice beach. perfect location, absolutely top notch amenities, friendly staff.     100% would and will stay again!    thanks samesun venice beach
the best hostel i've been to so far!
great location, great facilities, great atmosphere, great staff. the best place i stayed in the usa. special thanks to dominic and ryder who are the "directors of fun".

the location was amazing! right on venice beach. the rooms were nice and clean and the kitchen and lounge area were nice. only 2 bathrooms per floor which is a lot of people sharing, they were kept clean, just had to jump in quick:-) other than that i would stay here again.
great breakfast. can't beat the location. met amazing people.
great location right on the beach.  hostel has events on each night of the week which helps with meeting other travellers.
excelent location, good vibes, great staff!

good spot to stay location wise, close enough to walk to santa monica pier and see the sights of venice beach.   wouldn't say it was the safest neighbourhood for after dark though.   public transport close by made it easy to get to and from everything else, including the airport. rooms and bathrooms were all kept nice.
quite expensive, but probably normal for this area. right on venice beach is nice, but probably not the ultimate location overall. otherwise great stay, & good opportunities for socializing.
plans changed and unfortunately had to cancel my stay so it's a bit hard to give a proper review, the staff were really friendly over the phone but :)
i was lucky to find the best place for me to stay!

for being a first time solo female traveler, and never having stayed in a hostle before, this was amazing. you had to get buzzed into the building, security cameras everwhere, and a 24 hour front desk. the quiet hours are at 11pm, which is so appreciated for those of us who have to get up early. the group activity was awesome. i will for sure stay here again if i'm in lax.
such a great place.
the staff were fantastic! really helpful and friendly they made my stay heaps easier! breakfast is spot on! my only negative really is the price but i guess its venice beach!! overall great stay!
one of the best hostels i've stayed. definitely for the young and hip!beachlovers paradise! great location to the beaches.

right next to the beach (boulevard was a little deserted at night though, maybe due to low season). nice discounts on several bike rentals nearby, good showers and staff is friendly and helpful (especially sam).

the location is unbeatable! had a great stay in their double room with private bathroom, it was perfect. you're right on the beach, the view is great and the staff are friendly and helpful. if you want to experience venice beach, this is the place to stay, wopuld definitely both come back and recommend!! :d
one of the best hostels i've stayed in.  a true business vs other hostels that are merely somebody with an extra building who wants to make some extra money. highly recommend
right on venice beach, hostel arrange loads of evening activities and can help you arrange things to do in the day. great communal area :-)
nice place, you're paying for the location, hostel doesn't have much on offer other than that. facilities are all very nice though

awesome location, not the party hostel i was expecting though. we stayed on a friday and there was the limo party to los angeles however this was around $55 and had limited people signed upto it, there didn't seem to be much else going on at the hostel. for a friday night i expected more communal drinking and maybe a local bar crawl.  venice beach however had great atmosphere and this hostel is perfectly located for that.
amazing hostel, located right in front of venice beach. amazing atmosphere and awesome staff. would definitely stay again.
awesome hostel! perfectly placed in venice beach, staff / security / cleanliness are great    one small bad thing: only 2 bathrooms per entire floor , so in the morning there is a line

easy and fuss free stay at the samesun.   location can not be beat - right on the happening of area of venice beach.   staff were always friendly and the place always clean.   cool and welcoming vibe.   i would happily stay again.
awesome hostel in the perfect location!

super friendly staff - gave me a snack after a long haul flight from australia and free breakfast was great! fantastic location and extremely clean. second time i&#39;ve stayed here and will be back for sure.

nicely located hostel, right by venice beach. positives include being right beside the boardwalk and beach, events were nicely organized and enjoyable, and some of the staff were incredibly helpful and friendly.  negatives include the lack of functional ac in our room (it was sweltering our first day), the small locker size (not big enough for a well packed backpack) and some of the staff were absolutely awful. no reason to hassle us when we carried 1 of 2 sets of keys and were in the same room!
first time in a hostel. great experience. staff was awesome, location was great. safe, and clean. free breakfast! many travellers from overseas, which is awesome!

lovely hostel, right on the start of venice beach. great location, little bit cramped inside but overall the facilities were good. the staff and people staying there were super friendly, and the breakfast was great! there was pancake mix ready and waiting for you when you woke up. the rooms were clean and some even had a sink in, so you didn't need to go to the bathroom to brush your teeth/wash face etc. overall a great hostel :)
by far the best hostel i&#39;ve been too. the staff very warm and welcoming, the breakfast very good, location primetime, i can go on and on. can&#39;t wait to return.

i would definitely tell others that want to visit la about this hostel. the staff are very helpful and understanding. if you were going to stay at samesum definitely take advantage of the night activities especially happy hour with the ledge dom ( i think he said he&#39;s name was)
great location, atmosphere is ok, kind of pricey
amazing hostel and great location on venice beach

ideal rooms in an ideal location. stayed there as it was 30 seconds max from venice beach and around a 10 minute walk from gold&#39;s gym, the reason from my stay. staff were friendly and helpful and i&#39;m sure the extra facilities were fine such as the free breakfast but i didn&#39;t actually use any of them. i fully intend to stay here again when i return to la in may 2017.

its a great hostel, right in venice with some epic staff and great daily activities. its always clean and you have your own charging station on each bed (thats always a plus). the breakfast is one the best ones ive had in us hostels so i def like it there. the only downside is the bathroom issue. i know some of the rooms had an ensuite but many didnt and two bathrooms per floor with that many people...you always end up standing in line or do what i did: get up super early instead.

absolutely chuffed with this place. they provided activities, strong wifi 📶, friendly, let me put my bag in storage. right on door step to skate park. bathroom, room spotless. cannot fault one bit, hands down the best hostel i have been in.

the location was great - just a few steps from the beach. the room was nice, well equipped with plugs, shelf & individual reading lights. the bathroom was also good with a decent shower. the free breakfast was fairly decent as well. the hostel wasn't very social though as there was nothing to do in the common room & not even the tv was usable. the taco tuesday night out could have been made more exciting too- the group got a bit bored and wanted to change to a bar. reception staff were helpful.
good location
highly recommended. great location, friendly staff, safe place + yummy breakfast included.

great hostel! rooms were good size, clean and very comfortable. location couldn&#39;t have been better any closer and you would be on the beach. staff and facilities were great - great pancakes for breakfast. only negative, common room is quite small gets busy in the morning for breakfast.
super friendly and helpful staff, best location in venice beach, right at the beach and skate park. activities every night and very friendly atmosphere all around.
the wifi signal needs improvement. breakfast was ok, it had all the basics. the staff were friendly and helpfull. great location.
i had a fun time at this hostel. its super close to the beach and the staff was really friendly. also free beer and drinks its a little expensive but you will have a lot of fun there

hostel is in a great location if you want to be in venice. it is located as close to the main entrance to venice as possible. but venice at night can get sketchy. just be forewarned. once you pass through the door, you are fine. but be open to meeting and seeing sketchy folk outside at night. tho being very central, there is almost always a cop car on the street there.
location was amazing, staff was nice, there was an event planned each night so it was easy to meet the other guests and hang out, cleanliness was pretty standard for a hostel.

it is in the beach! clean, freindly and helpful staff. ok free breakfast. almost no atmosphere though for solo travellers due to a tiny common area.   but if i am going back the the beach, this hostel is the one!

nice hostel in a cool location in venice. was clean although the rooms weren&#39;t too well ventilated so it smelled a bit stuffy but i was only there for a night. staff were very friendly and helpful and the place felt safe and secure. there&#39;s a common room to hang out and meet other people and the beach is literally a few steps away.
very nice facilities, clean and friendly. there just wasn&#39;t much table space for breakfast and it could be quite noisy at night but other than that great hostel, lots going on!
it is very near venice beach. you can see the veach in room. samesun is very cool.

great hostel in a great spot, right in the heart of venice. staff were great, refunded me a couple nights as i changed plans. clean and free breakfast in the morning. little bit pricey but it is the us after all!
best location! will be staying here again next time 100%

the location of this hostel is great, right on the heart of venice beach, you literally walk out and you're on the boardwalk - so helpful!   the rooms are good, a little cramped, not ideal for large suitcases but great for travellers backpacks. the beds are very comfortable, which is always a bonus!  the free breakfast is great, choose from oats, toast, pancakes & fresh fruit - if you're travelling on a budget, this helps a lot, be sure to load up..   overall this hostel is very good!

staff is friendly and very helpful. overall the place was kept clean everyday, free breakfast was decent. the locations is a bit sketchy after dark, but they do have security watching the facilities at night. only complaint is that venice beach can get loud and crazy, but that doesn&#39;t really have to do with the hostel. great location for partiers and beach bums.

after staying at a samesun in kelowna and having a good experience, i thought i&#39;d give their venice location a try.  my wife and i rented a private room for four nights.  we had a few hiccups: the smoke-detector kept beeping and we were initially over-charged (deposit wasn&#39;t factored in).  but as soon as we pointed out the problems, they were fixed.  the staff is very friendly and helpful, and you can&#39;t beat the location.  i&#39;d stay again and would recommend to others.
it was a great experience i wish to repeated again 🙃👍🏻

this was quite honestly one of the best hostels i&#39;ve ever stayed in! the location was amazing, right on venice boardwalk and close to cafes, shops etc. my room (a private double), was really cosy, comfortable and clean, and i had the best night&#39;s sleep of my trip there! the shared bathrooms were also spacious, and acceptably clean, which was a nice change from previous hostels. the breakfast was also a win - a diy affair inclusive of a pancake and egg station! wifi worked well.

the staff were very friendly and accommodating, the rooms were basic but clean with adequate locker space. the kitchen facilities were clean and well maintained. the lounge area was small but comfortable and had a lovely view.    there aren&#39;t many convenience stores local to the hostel, but a short walk and you can fond what you need.  the overall vibe of the hostel was chilled and inviting, they offer something to do every day and really give you the full backpacker experience!
great location but extremely noisy. bathroom far from being clean and tiny rooms for the price.

i only stayed one night but it was a great hostel! i showed up way earlier than check in after a 13 hour flight from sydney and the handsome guy at the reception that morning let me know where to eat, shower, and store my luggage. he also had the room ready for me as quick as he could and i realllyyyyy appreciated that after a long flight. even upgraded me! clean place right on venice beach, easy to meet people too. the whole 24 hours was so great.
had a great stay at samesun. especially liked the cleanliness of the showers, the organization of daily activities (most were free) and the breakfast. location is great,  right at the beach.
i can&#39;t recommend this hostel enough! it was in the perfect location and the staff are really good
great location and fun hostel

probably the best hostel i have stayed in, was super spotless, the beds were comfy, location was great, free breakfast and security was good. i stayed in a 7 bed dorm and my bed had its own light, outlet to charge my phone at night and it was comfy!! the location is great and you are right on the artsy venice beach, the only downside is if you want to visit places like the walk of fame etc you&#39;re not close to it. la is expensive to travel around so i got a bus ticket for the hop on hop off bus
great place! will stay again.

this hostel, has it all - perfect location, great atmosphere, facilities and most of all excellent staff, always willing to help and great chat. we had the best stay here. there is always activities on offer and staff are good at recommending where to go. overall the best hostel we have stayed at. would most definitely recommend to stay here.

i had a fantastic stay at the samesun venice beach, the staff were friendly, atmosphere was excellent, which was complemented by the exceptional location. but most of all the rooms were clean and well looked after.    harley cameron
loved the samesun team here at venice beach! super friendly and helpful. prime location, awesome atmosphere. would return anytime !

wir hatten ein dunkler zimmer, welches nicht unbedingt sehr toll eingerichtet war.   die mitarbeiter an der rezeption waren sehr freundlich, aber es war schon etwas dreckig und das frühstück eher etwas mager.   location - es ist sehr nah am beach ... aber achtung ! - auch etwas in "ghetto"

i enjoyed my stay here.     the main thing going for the hostel is its location being right off the boardwalk. this does mean that it can be quite noisy at all times, but that&#39;s something you have to deal with if you want to be right there in it. despite the noise i had no trouble sleeping.    another big positive is the free breakfast which includes bread, toast, fruit and pancakes with coffee, tea and orange juice.     i enjoyed my stay and would recommend it to other travellers.
had such an epic time. massive thanks to dominic for creating a great atmosphere and getting everyone together. also thanks to sebastian for looking out for everyone. would definitely come back here

great location, just off the venice boardwalk. staff are friendly and there are planned events every night - the twilight concert series was particularly enjoyable. breakfast includes pancakes, toast, jam and marmalade, orange slices and eggs, with coffee, tea and orange juice. the wifi was pretty fast in the dorm room. great experience, would stay again!

i love this hostel!! i&#39;ve been backpacking the last 2 months and they have the most comfy mattresses! dorm was great, good size with individual shelves and power points. breakfast was great, lots of options. they had a lot of activities on every night too. plus its in the best location. taxi from lax was $25 and is only 20 minutes away. i highly recommend
nice hostel, but unfortunatley me and my friend were put in two seperate rooms, tough we&#39;ve booked long before

brilliant hostel. the location alone makes this the hostel to stay at, you really couldn&#39;t get any closer to the beach! the staff were friendly and helpful and most nights the hostel has something going on. we went to the karaoke night and had a wicked time. the room was clean, secure and had its own bathroom which was a bonus. would definitely recommend this hostel to anyone and i&#39;m already looking at going back!
great spot, cool staff and always have things organised to do. would stay again.
premium location. very secure.  helpful staff. would definitely stay again.  pretty expensive for a hostel but that&#39;s probably due to their location so it&#39;s worth it.
a fantastic place to stay with great friendly staff and an awesome location. i will definitely be back.   ali
crowded, not much space, neither in rooms nor in common area.
excellent location. right by the side of the beach. overall a nice stay.

didn't have the best atmosphere while i was there. location is amazing, facilities like wifi, access to powerpoints etc were really good. bathroom was okay, there was no aircon in the room just fans and it got pretty stuffy and didn't smell too great at times. free breakfast was also pretty good.

great location, friendly people.  there are only a few bathrooms for all of the shared dorms (at least on the second floor) so pretty hard to get a shower in or even just use the bathroom.  other than that, really great facilities.

i really enjoyed staying at samesun.  roommates were lovely. place was clean. shower facilities were good too.  staff were very helpful and friendly.   on thursday night (7/7/2016), the organizer for the night activity, dominic was awesome!  he went above and beyond his job. he took us out in the group to santa monica pier, where we watched the twilight series and had some bevies. he was heaps chilled and cool. definitely sad to leave venice from this experience.
good spot.  simple.  worth the money given the location.  breakfast was good as well.  they do a good job of logging ins and outs at nighttime which keeps the sketchies at bay.

when i came to the hostel i had just escaped a different one in l.a that was not very nice and i was really happy to finely meet friendly people, be in a kind atmosphere and finely being able to sleep - i was so greatful about that! generally great beds :), very comfortable. and as i said, very nice and friendly atmosphere, both created by staff and other travelers. great view from the dining/hang out room, nice breakfast, felt more like being a guest at a friends place. enjoyed it very much!

the hostel is amazing. it&#39;s location is very central right next to the beach and you get a great view. everyone is super friendly and they have a great way to make people connect! i&#39;m definitely coming back.

this is a mediocre hostel. it lacks simple things that make all the difference—a place to hang your towel in the shared bathroom; a shelf in the shower to rest your soap. some staff was friendly and helpful; others less so. breakfast is ok. common area is ok, too. put simply: if you love great hostels, you may not love it here. the redeeming quality is easy beach access.

can&#39;t recommend this place enough.    brilliant in every area the staff, location, clean, evening activities and the type of person this place attracts are what makes samesun venice beach backpackers wicked.

really awesome staff, welcoming and friendly. great location as well with venice beach just outside the door. place was really secured. always locked front door with id checking every time you enter. do recommend highly if you&#39;re looking to stay in this area.
good place overall.

great stay! the staff are all amazing! very pleasant, helpful, knowledgeable about area and activities, easy going, yet professional. i felt very comfortable and safe here. during this stay my partner and myself stayed in a private room overlooking venice beach. comfortable bed, clean room and bathroom and equipped with fridge, tv, and free wifi.  if you are looking to experience venice beach, this is the place to stay! great for solo travellers, couples, etc. did i mention complimentary breaky

the desk staff were extremely helpful and pleasant. the other guests were good hostel mates. the place was clean and staff were always on hand to keep the place in order. the breakfast was good as well. the bathroom could use some hooks or shelves for putting things when showering. the back of the toilet is the only  surface and this is problematic with no toilet seat to catch anything that might fall. the location is close to the beach though also right in the heart of the funky street life.
nice staffs :) and awesome location!!   definitely stay again! thanks a lot❤️
great location, clean, friendly staff. daily events organized including a wonderful game night.
first hostel experience!! was not intentional but staff was cool and helpful.

the entire place was fantastic. can&#39;t speak highly enough of e staff. especially abby and sebastien. great people and really went above and beyond to help us whilst we were there. we will be back i can promise you that!!! #veniceisthebest

great location!!  breakfast was super good (toast,pancakes,eggs fruit,oatmeal and much more)  all staff were super helpful and going out of the way to make sure you were enjoying your stay, i would highly recommend this hostel. thank you abby and sara for a great stay!!
only stayed a night, had a good breakfast and wifi was good, great location on the beach if your looking for a party area this is great a little loud at night but expected !

fantastic location and great faculties, cannot rave about the staff enough! the lovely sam was helpful on the phone before i arrived and helped me check in. kevin was super friendly and helpful (although he's not as good at mario kart as he will claim to be!) ryder was lots of fun taking us on a bike ride and most importantly to happy hour. and finally dom ran thirsty thursday's which was an awesome way to meet other backpackers! my free upgrade to an ocean view ensuite 7 bed room was a bonus!
great location, great staff, great view, everything is just great about samesun.

i would say the hostel is pretty much allright for youth and backpackers travelling alone for a couple of days, and it is quite nicely located. the noise of the fans might be too much for some people at night and the views are not romantic but its a clean, safe, on-the-limits-of-decency hostel worth the price for l.a.

the  location for this hostel is perfect, literally next to the board walk of venice beach. takes 2 mins to walk skate park and an extra minute to the sea. staff were all really friendly and helpful, they let me keep my stuff at the hostel all day after i checked out and let me use the facilities. it&#39;s pricey but you&#39;re on venice beach. definitely recommend

excellent staff ... adrian and sam were very informative and friendly..  giving a warm welcoming atmosphere from the moment of check-in until my departure.  samesun  venice beach is a 5 star hostel in my opinion, offering a clean, comfortable stay at a great location ...and at an affordable price.  i booked a private room and couldn&#39;t have been happier with my stay.  i look forward to going back next time i am in town!!  thank you samesun staff!
perfect location right on the beach!

great location good wifi and helpful staff. especially the guy who runs the activities dom, showed us a great night out knows all the good things to do in venice. legend. showers are good to here and they didn't charge us on a night we had to cancel

nice hostel literally 10 steps away from venice beach. a lot of partying, which is great if you fancy the "college/spring break" vibe, you'll find a lot of americans in their early 20's.  we enjoyed the generous breakfast and  a great kitchen, combined with an excellent location in l.a. staff was helpful and always talkative.
everything was perfect. the hostel is really close to the beach.
amazing location, staff was very friendly, breakfast was very good! we had a 4 bunk room with a view of the ocean  !

not a great experience - had an altercation with a staff member & she handled it appallingly. they actually started arguing amongst themselves about it too, making me feel worse.  really scruffy hostel - totally in need of renovating. coming from the hi hostel in san francisco to here was like leaving claridges & going to a trailer park.  the basic you expect in a hostel is a room with a lock & even semi-pleasant staff - neither is here.  ridiculously bad value.  poky little common room. avoid.
great place in a great location with great people. i would stay there again :).
very nice located, well equipped, maybe the kitchen is a little small.
enjoyed my stay. great location, right on the beach boardwalk. free breakfast was also nice. would definitely stay here again.

only stayed one night but it was enough to tell it is a good place in the overall.     nice and clean bathrooms. good facilities in general. good breakfast.     we went to have tacos as part of that night&#39;s event organized by the hostel. the guy in charge (dominique i think) was really nice.     the area where it&#39;s located does not feel so secure, specially at night.

great hostel amazing location and lots of fun free activities which was great to meet people. book the seven person room - beach and ocean views. bit on the pricey side but wouldn&#39;t stay anywhere else. parking in venice is a nightmare though

staff and facilities were good. well placed location is cheap to get an uber anywhere around la, short walk to santa monica. plenty of food around the area.  only complaint was that there was some funky smells coming through the air vents

nice common areas. we didn&#39;t expect to have a private bathroom, so that was nice. clean facilities. staff is very nice. cool atmosphere.   if you&#39;re only going to visit venice beach and santa monica it is a very nice location. the street is full of homeless people so it gets really sketchy specially at night.
great staff, nice location and the best event maneger (you are awesome dom).

i booked ahead of time. i called before i checked in and talked to the front desk. great guy. awesome service. however before you book bring your passport!!!!! they only take passports!!!! guy was helpful and understanding about my situation. i got lucky. not everyone is lucky.

excellent location as venice beach is one of the nicer spots of la.  nice common area, en breakfast is alright (pancakes, toast with jam, orange slices and coffee, milk, orange juice, tea)  improvements:   - very few toilets and showers on each floor which makes you wait a lot of times.  - in our room there was a small window leading to an inside corridor, hence impossible to get fresh air inside the room, and very hot at night!  some other rooms, however, have a nice view on the beach!

amazing location and room was pretty good. comfortable bed. like the fact that they already do the sheets for you.   staff was pretty rude / didn&#39;t feel very welcome. guy at the night shift seemed pretty stoned, too. not what i expected.     however overall i would recommend the place because of the good location to venice and good rooms for a hostel.
perfect loaction for the best venice beach experience! great staff! nightly activities are lots of fun. cant wait to go back

hands down the cleanest hostel ive ever stayed in 10 years!! the common shower stall has a glass door instead of curtain, rather modern for a hostel. stayed in a room of 4 and paid pretty much the same as the 8-occupant counterpart in the hi in santa monica.     only complaint is that the luggage storage is completely open to all. it does gives easy access to retrieve your stuff during the day before/after check out. but dont keep anything valuable in there!     not an extremely social hostel.

staff were great.  affordable and private room was pretty good.  when we first arrived there was someone&#39;s fake nail on the floor (bit gross) and one pillow case had two stains on both sides (also really gross). staff changed for us happily though.   no elevator made the trip up the stairs with heavy bags very difficult and almost unbearable. surprising there was no elevator!  overall if the cleanliness was a bit better, it would&#39;ve been the perfect pitstop in venice.
adrian, kevin, and dom were very welcoming and friendly. it&#39;s in a great location and you really can&#39;t beat it for the money.

really cool hostel right in venice - prob the best location in la. can&#39;t honestly think why anyone would want to stay in west hollywood or similar. this place is super funky, very chill, with some excellent people, good social vibe and great staff. easy to meet people and close to a lot of very cool bars and restaurants. and venice itself is one of the most incredible patchworks of weirdness you will ever visit. definitely recommended.
great team - super welcoming and really good fun. adrienne was full of suggestions on things to do and where to find things, would definitely stay here again.

was only here for the night, however the staff were great and the atmosphere was cool. easy to get along and talk with people. there&#39;s also a nice organic mexican place around the corner, this really made a difference after eating all the processed american food.

on the whole not a terrible hostel however there were not nearly enough bathrooms for the amount of people, rooms were hot and sticky and fans did not work and staff were indifferent.     perfect location by venice beach, really the only selling point.

what a scam. i booked a spot, and tried to check in after midnight. tired and exhausted after a long day. the staff tell me that i cannot check in with ca id, need passport. the first time i have ever found a place in the united states that did not accept state id card as a valid document for checking in. my booking fee of $5 was stolen from me. i spent 2 hours looking for another place to stay, and ended up paying $200 more for a room and another $50 on uber. in middle of the night....

rooms are not cleaned often enough. i checked in on friday and my room was trashed with clothes and towels not belonging to anyone in the room and the trash was overflowing. i chose not to stay the night in the room but left my stuff in the locker provided in the room for security. was only offered a refund for last night. property needs some upgrades and more sympathetic staff.

place is centrally located to venice. only two bathrooms/shower on each floor, which meant at times you were waiting in the hallway to use it. staff were great, i arrived at 7am was able to have brekkie and store luggage. however the luggage room wasn't very secure as they was no room, anyone could go in/out. music played from the place below the whole night  and even when i woke up in the morning so wasn't exactly peaceful nights sleep. place could do with a little tlc.

the girl was extremely rude when we first arrived. i also paid to have laundry done and they gave the bag back to me the next day and the clothes had not been washed. i didn&#39;t realise until i left the hostel so i emailed them twice about it and they still haven&#39;t gotten back to me.
great hostel ! right on venice beach! staff very friendly and helpful! can&#39;t reccomend more :))

i&#39;m easy to please but everything was still super great. the wifi was good enough to stream a live nhl hockey game from my bed. breakfast was really great. i thought i would feel a little more sketchy coming back late at night because of some reviews but it was completely fine. the staff were super tolerant, relaxed, informative and helpful. it was $100 uber to the staples center and 10 steps from the beach. bike rentals next door for 6/hr. beer,groceries,toiletries,fruits,veg all a block or two
the staff was not the friendliest... and though the location was great.. the cleanliness was not the best... though its 1k times better than the others in the area.
its all good when looking for basic needs. really well located by the beach. worth staying, i could be back there, good breakfast. no more than the basic needs.
absolutely loved it. so affordable & in the best spot. i highly recommend it. if we ever go back to venice beach la we will defiantly stay @samesun again... 🌴😀

clean, great breakfast with eggs pancakes toast juice coffee and oranges, very very helpful staff (thank you guys so much), foster a very inclusive environment, daily group activities, right by the beach in the coolest area with an amazing sunset
everyone was super sweet and caring.  very,  very clean!
definitley reccomend. stayed in a private room. free breakfast, clean, value for money, great staff, great location, fun group activities.
had a radical time!

i had an amazing time here. the place was clean and really secure, they only let you in if you have a reservation. i could go on about the building and amenities, but here&#39;s the short and sweet: the staff are amazing. they are very eager to help you with what they can and it is apparent that they love working here. they have planned events every night that change week to week. this is easily one of the best hostels i&#39;ve been to in the us. next time i&#39;m in la i&#39;m stopping by just to see the s
was a hostel in a great location. staff could have been more welcoming/host like?

great place to stay. right by the beach, lots of local restaurants and bars to hang around.   the place is clean, comfortable, the ppl that work there really friendly.   no bad comments for this place, i&#39;ll for sure stay there in the future.
very nice and right on the beach with an excellent view from the common room window :)

venice beach is awesome by day, scary by night. a lot of homeless and addicts roaming the streets. however, the hostel is centrally located and it is so nice to be so close to the beach. i&#39;d reccomend santa monica over venice any day. staff was friendly besides the rude security guard. free breakfast included coffee, orange juice, toast, pancakes, fruit, etc. the rooms were clean and nice enough but very crammed with six beds in a room made for 2-3.
amazing atmosphere and the location is incredible!

perfect location, right on the beach. the staff are wonderful and incredibly accommodating. i originally booked one night but stayed for three and they were very helpful in changing my room so i could stay with some friends who arrived the next day. they make a real effort to bring everyone together with nightly activities and you can see the beach through the common room window and even some of the dorm rooms. wouldn't hesitate in staying here again. thanks team!

this hostel was so cool, in a great location next to the beach, the staff are helpful and friendly. it&#39;s a small hostel and you meet some awesome people, the breakfast is good. i would come back here

the hostel is really nice and in a perfect location. the room was big enough and clean. they have an excellent housekeeping team. the australian guy at the front desk and the new boy at the desk were really nice and helpful. abby and dominic were awesome. i can&#39;t wait to come back again! thanks samesun team!
good location for just a few days, decent breakfast, friendly staff.

the room seemed vaguely clean but smelt dirty as did the bedding, my pillow smelt so much i ended up using my clothes instead the first night. the staff were friendly but all of the staff i met were male and to be honest i felt a little leched upon.     there was maintenance work going on constantly which meant bathrooms would be constantly out of order and the was noise and mess.    the area is ok if you are looking for overpriced tourist stall and weed but if not i would not recommend it.

great experience!! the breakfast is great, and you can&#39;t beat the location. also, we did the limo party on friday night (signed up at front desk) and it was so much fun! the only negative is the neighborhood is a little sketchy after sunset but nothing to scary. would absolutely recommend!!
great place to stay if u like ocean and surfing. but far away to other tourist attractions.   pleasant atmosphere, different activities organised by the hostel every day, friendly staff.
great location but kind of lacking in facilities (very small common area and kitchen) and the beds were uncomfortable.    breakfast was good and the staff were friendly and helpful.
there&#39;s only two bathroom for each floor(2 floors) and 1 of them were not working, and the a/c was not good as well,  so i put 3 in facilities. otherwise it was perfect!

the staff at this hostel are wonderful. i miss them! the beds are very comfy. the only thing that bothered me was that there is no barrier on the top bunk to stop me rolling off in the night so i didn&#39;t sleep to well for fear of falling!

this place is great, truly. it&#39;s everything a hostel is meant to be. the common rooms are always packed with people with the vibe to socialize and hang. the staff are pretty cool and as helpful as you need them to be. facilities are clean, lots of storage room, free wifi & breakfast. you wake up on venice beach. plenty of street parking near by. it&#39;s a great hostel!
it is right in front of beach but it doea not seem safe around the building.

awesome location right on venice beach. some of the staff were really helpful and fun. had some issues with the key not opening the room door and also they didn't have any laundry facilities but otherwise really good facilities. the most comfortable beds i've had in a hostel.

great location and the rooms were okay but nothing amazing. bunk beds and basic sheets. right next to the boardwalk which is great for going out, but it's also an area where a lot of homeless people constantly wonder about. make sure to bring your passport (even if you're american which surprised me,) or they may not let you in. the staff was friendly enough but nothing memorable.

no hidden fees. top location obviously. good breakfast, good staff. not the cleanest i&#39;ve seen but it&#39;s alright. for the price, can&#39;t ask better. my mattress was shot though... good hostel overall!
great location right on venice beach with views out over the skate park.
great hostel in great location! waking up right in the middle of everything really helps while traveling!

while most of the staff were wonderful and helpful, a few appeared rather rude and inconvenienced by me. over all a good hostel, the rooms were clean and relatively spacious - they are under going renovations which means cramped spaces available to relax and noise at different hours of the day. i would recommend it for the location but perhaps leave it for a few months until the renovations are over.

everyone was so great and nice and helpful at samesun!! nick and bethany and this one guy, cant remember his name, but you all were great. location was the best, right at the beach, and there is so much to do with people from the hostel. you wont be alone here.

perfect location right off the boardwalk.  basic but good free breakfast (better than some i had in american hotels...)  mindful staff regarding cleanliness and breakfast supply. ;-)  renovation is going on - not a problem during my stay.  wifi was down.  i enjoyed my stay. thank you all!

- wifi was announced to be down just for that day, obviously it has been down for quite a while w/o any effort from the staff to change that situation.  - free breakfast - but no coffee. heeee? excuse "the coffee machine broke down, but there is a shop to
it was a decent hostel however the wifi was down and there was maintenance going on.

this was a great hostel right in the heart of venice beach. you're literally steps away from the boardwalk- perfect location. the common areas are sort of lacking but they do put on a lot of events for guests. definitely recommend!

the position is perfect, right on the beach.. the room was ok, unfortunately was extremely cold during the night. i also had my first shower during the morning and the water wasn't hot at all, while seems having in the evening it comes hot..
average hostel especially at the price, only redeeming feature is the proximity to the beach

i was rather disappointed. the first problem they really need to fix is their wi-fi sucks really bad, worse than most places i stayed in south america recently. i stayed here 4 days and it was almost useless the whole time, could barely even check messages or facebook, etc. so they really need to fix that and upgrade. the other problem was the hot water. i took three showers and every time i had lukewarm water. also the mattress i had was pretty lumpy. great location though, & good breakfast.

the hostel was very good. right next to venice beach, literally a 2 minute walk to the ocean. i wish it was a little more lively but then again i was there on a tuesday night so that could explain it.

i had a wonderful time! it was great waking up to the sunrise with the surfers bobbing in the shore waiting for the waves (which averaged six feet high and sometimes tubed). the best part of my stay was the staff here; they are helpful knowledgeable, friendly, and really cared about my stay. they seem to be a mixture of venice locals and foreign nationals. clean room, great facilities, great vibe overall. i look forward to coming back soon. highly highly recommended.

good hostel. the showers only had cool water, so i wouldn't recommend a long stay during the cold months for that reason. although sufficed for my 2 night stay. nice staff and really good breakfast! bedding was also really comfortable.

i had a great stay at samesun venice beach, again. it was my first time staying at this hostel and that's for a good reason. first of all the location is perfect! right on the boardwalk , the famous venice skate park is only 1 minute walking and the neighbourhood is lively and entertaining!   what i love most about staying at samesun is the amazing staff! everyone has been so friendly and helpful. me and my friends went on a few activities with dom and nick and had a great time.

after staying in their vancouver location, i had expectations for this place - it did not live up. the staff were okay, nothing to rave about. there was no laundry. most annoying of all was the lock on one of the bathrooms didn't work and i got walked in on twice while i the shower and i saw it happen to others. also would've been nice if there was some surface to pit your stuff on in there. location is good if you wanna get to the airport or venice boardwalk, but everything else is super far.
great for people travelling with the intent of meeting people.
very friendly staff and visitors
great location, can't beat it. staff was able to upgrade my room with no issues. room was clean.
good location, but watch your parking.    when i was there the lounge area was being worked and while there is lots of great stuff outside, there were few facilities inside.

my fiance and i had a private room and were very impressed with the facilities. the bathrooms were clean and newish and we had a basin, tv and fan in our room, all extras i did not expect to have in a hostel. great experience in a fantastic location. staff were helpful, welcoming and friendly. thanks!
if you like beach side this is good place !!  but the atmosphere was not as expected !!
breakfast is awesome, location is awesome, staff are awesome, can't wait to come back!
the location can't be better, the breakfast is just good.
they were great :)

the staff were great! friendly, approachable! right in the heart of venice beach and a bike ride away from santa monica, if that's what you want to do. two buses from the airport and a short walk to the hostel.

great hostel, within walking distance to the beach. the hostel itself might feel a little cramped, especially when everyone is trying to use the kitchen all at once. the area this hostel is located on is not the best, especially at night. but very friendly staff, and good atmosphere.

had a great stay at this hostel, in the absolute center of venice beach. the wi-fi is not good at all, but maybe that's a good thing? you have to actually talk to people face to face! the staff is helpful, and the check-in went pretty fast. clean and nice room - definitely a place i would recommend to other people.

personally, my stay here was fantastic. the staff were friendly and kind, the hostel was really clean, the people i met there were lovely, and the free breakfast was phenomenal. what a spread! fresh fruit, pancakes, eggs, cinnamon raisin toast.. and most importantly heaps of free coffee and juice to jump-start your day. 10/10.. if i'm ever in need of a hostel in socal again, i'll definitely be back.
amazing location, right next to the beach. very helpful staff - special thanks to dominic.   free breakfast with pancakes, tost, oranges and eggs and juice. we really enjoyed staying at this hostel.

overpriced & dirty, one of the worst hostels i've been too. no idea how it has such a high rating. stains on the carpet, white splotches on the headboard of the bed, strange smell, brown stains on the ceiling fan, short & uncomfortable bed, dusty...not a comfortable place to stay. too make it worse, many of the rooms, including ours, had no window too the outside, only to a tiny indoor roofed courtyard (a few m2 in diameter). few pros: location, decent breakfast, nice manager. go somewhere else.

just thought the pink purple hair chick was a bit rude but other than that (& the awful bed i was sleeping on) the hostel is unreal. dominic is awesome, breakfast is pretty sweet, location is absolute mint - right on the beach. jays surf shop next door pretty much made me fall in love with a cali boy, dopest guy ever & super cheap rentals. i'll be back for sure!
dominic was awesome!!!
perfect location, clean rooms and easy to meet people.  really enjoyed my stay in venice
rooms' temperature  was very cold; they had no extra blankets; showers were hot only from 6 to 6.30am; no tables where to eat in the lounge room.
a great hostel and as well very cheap, just not enough bathrooms.

i had a great stay, wish it could be longer! i definitelly recommend this hostel over the samesun in hollywood - better breakfast, better facilities. venice beach is beautiful and the hostel is almost right next to the broadwalk. i stayed in mixed dorm with private batroom and it was good and clean.

enjoyed my stay at samesun venice, had a private double room. fridge and tv in the room with our own sink was a bonus. all the staff were helpful and friendly, only disappointing part was during peak times the showers tended to be cold. besides that would definitely recommend this hostel as it has a friendly vibe and great location!

great location, right on the beach, near a few bars. facilities are good and kept clean, however it is a mile or so from the nearest laundry with no washing machines on site. staff are friendly and answer questions when asked. veinice hasn't got loads to do. so either rent a bike or find out about bus routes to see things.
seriously loved the pancake breakfast!!

the staff were always so helpful and all the other guests were lovely. the kitchen is always clean as were the bathrooms. the bedding was very clean and i genuinely felt very safe in the hotel. it's a great location if you want to be close to the beach and santa monica, it's a bit of a bus ride to hollywood but doable. it is however quite a distance from disney. asides from that i loved it.
absolutely fantastic location at a great price. would definitely stay again. note that even if you are a us citizen you need to have a passport with you at check-in.
it was good hostel i thought when i was in there
stayed 3 nights, good location if staying during beach season, other than that no real dramas, they could do with some better events, even if it is just drinking.
great stay... awesome for a party...
greet location and awesome group activities. great value for the money
everything you could wish for in a hostel. stayed there a few different times and always had a good experience. also want to give an extra thanks to abby in the reception, you made our stay!

loved this hostel! so close to the beach, you can see it from the common room. staff were really helpful, there's activities each day and suggestions on what to do around venice/la. really easy to meet people. would recommend booking room with ensuite, otherwise there's only a couple of bathrooms on each floor. would definitely stay here again!

the wifi is very poor. rooms could do with better cleaning, someone had stuck gum on the shelf beside the lamp in the top bunk that i was occupying , it had not been removed by the cleaning staff . windows were also filthy.
very clean, awesome location, awesome energetic and friendly staff! great hostel  recommend for sure
this place is all about the location because it's fantastic. the hostel is right in the beach! facilities are good and the staff are very friendly, would most deff come back if i'm ever in la again.
perfect location right on the beach!! private room was nice and quiet. friendly staff and guests. would certainly stay here again.
better hot water and pressure in the showers would have been good.  could never get a hot one no matter what time of day or night i took one.

second stay here. in september the heat was insane and the lack of air con was a kick in the nuts. however, en-suite shower was alright, room was clean... it's a great place to stay. perfect location. everything you could  want  is in the area. good hostel!

staff we helpful and friendly. stayed in a 4 bed dorm and was quite comfortable. had our own bathroom. lockers in dorm also and storage for bags if you check in early. literally on venice beach boardwalk so you walk straight out onto the strip. about 40 mins to hollywood via taxi or uber but not much you can do. kitchen was not too bad and breakfast provided was pretty decent: eggs, fruit, coffee and pancakes pretty good. most certainly worth staying if you in town for a few days. peace from aus
it was good choice for me

samesun venice has an excellent location right in the center of venice beach. security is good, facilities are nice. the private room i stayed in was clean and cozy. they had a limo night event which seemed pretty cool. they had some other events as well.
one night stay here - great location, good atmosphere. solid hostel.
laura at the front desk made the process go well,  laura rocks !

this place is legit ! i've had such good time staying there. prime location, right in the middle of everything venice has to offer. its a small hostel but very cozy. rooms are compact yet nice and clean.   always cool people chilling at the common area. stuff was simply awesome, very chill and laidback people who may give you nice company, would play guitar with you and organize some cool activities.   i will have nice memories about this spot.  cheers. oleg
had a lot of fun. they make nigjtly activities so everyone gets to meet eachother.they also have a partner that makes a fun bus through some clubs in the hollywood area on the weekends.

this hostel was amazing! it couldn't have a best location, the staff is awesome, they will have fun events every night, place is safe and entertaining, the place is clean, the beds are comfy...i even got an upgrade just because! they helped me book a bus to san francisco, everything. they really care, and the will help you with everything you need, and they will be very honest with the information they give you. 100% recommend,,,,
only stayed one night but met some good people went out for tacos and obviously the location is top notch. good fun.
great location. friendly staff. nice room. kitchen was a bit small.
best roomies
great hostel in a great location.
a fun and very well located hostel. the staff were very friendly & helpful. they checked us in 4hrs early knowing we needed some sleep after a massive flight. would stay here again no doubt.
well located hostel. nice staff. nice breakfast. rooms are alright. on the 2nd floor it might be a little noisy due to a bar that is located below. very recomandable hostel!

best location ever, right in front  of the main beach in venice. clean facilities. great atmosphere with the right activities for the place (tuesday tacos and live music bar). for a quick trip to la this hostel is the best.

the staff was cool and fun , they would try and bring you out nightly and would provide you with transportation. the hostle was pretty secure and had a 24 hour watch . also maintained pretty well , and they would give you a reall breakfast . this hostel was really good 👍🏻
courtney was great with helping us sort everything out!

stayed for 3 nights soon as i walked in smelt like someone had urinated in the halls but kitchen was always clean staff handy they have an event each night you have to pay a little towards.... the location well it's on the main beach .. the wifi worked fine and there's big fans in each room  for £20 a night it's what you expect

all staff members were extremely helpful right from check-in and leading activities to hanging around and checking out. they all made effort to make sure everyone was enjoying themselves.   showers were nice and hot, breakfast has plenty of options (ie. eggs, fruit, pancakes, toast, coffee, tea), security was the best i've seen at a hostel by far!    the only con i would say is the shelves above each bed could definitely use a sweep. aside from that, the place is pretty clean.
had an amazing time at this hostel. great people and staff, specially "los ninjas" (i hope i got it right). i definitely recommend you to stay there :)

stayed almost 2 weeks in this hostel and while i loved some aspects, i've also had a hard time in room 308. noise levels coming from the window that shakes all night for some odd reason just made my nights miserable. my bed was also shaking a lot for some unknown reason and the wifi speed and endless times i had to refresh my login added up to the bad aspects. these two were the most problematic experiences i had.

one of the best hostel experience i've ever had. apart from given location and facilities, the atmosphere that staff created was amazing. special thanks to bethany for looking after us and denise for organizing a halloween party of the century!
nice place, great location, good common area
kitchen is tiny, fans no air con! nothing to do just a room to drink/eat in! however located next to venice beach, like the best. location ever.. 2 night stay is ample!!
great hostel right in the heart of venice beach. facilities were fine and the staff were great!
the hostel was so much fun and made my trip to california so memorable!! the staff was super friendly and gave me great recommendations. i'll definitely be returning to samesun venice, thank you!
location was perfect and the free pancake breakfast was a huge bonus.

this hostel is in a really bad area. i didn't feel safe walking outside the hostel. there idea of a "fully equip kitchen" had a kettle that was full of rust,. one quest fridge which was always full due to the lack of storage it provided. the hostels "free breakfast" consisted of rotten eggs, stale bread. hostel smelt bad, reception were lazy and unfriendly, hostel was also dirty and hot. shower head full of rust.

there's no air conditioning in the rooms, so even in the end of october it was burning hot at the daytime and in the nights it was even hard to breathe because of the hotness. also there's only two showers for the entire floor so get up early! by the end of the day the shower/bathroom floor is all wet and sandy and nasty. the whole place has a very unpleasant smell. however, breakfast is good, staff is friendly and the location is perfect if you want to hang out at the beach.
i have been here for 3 days   staffs are really great and kind
clean. great location. friendly staff.

great location, breakfast is yummy, staff are really nice and helpful, and everything was clean. luckily had nice roomies too. everything was good except one thing. no one could sleep as the rooms were too hot. they provided two fans (one on your bed and one for the room), however these were not enough for la in october. hostel really needs air conditioning or more fans.
great atmosphere, awsome people, amazing location, but ridiculously hot!
can't beat the location, right on the beach front, but hottest place on earth. the fans in the room didn't touch it. difficult to sleep whilst slowly cooking.

the staff members are nice, friendly and helpful. all in all it is a good place for young people to stay close to the beach. the bad thing was that our room was very hot and muggy. it was sure very difficult to sleep in it. also our bathroom was very dirty. we found different hair from all the other people who lived in this room before.

great hostel with a great location and social atmosphere. everything was clean and the beds comfortable.  i was there during a heat wave and the room was suffocatingly hot so you have been warned in hot conditions be prepared to sweat!

great location and good staff! the rooms were clean, but no air conditioning in a place like los angeles is brutal. the rooms were unbearable. it was cooler sitting in the sun than in the room. also 4 toilets/showers for the whole hostel is a joke. especially when only 1 of them works properly. also no laundry facilities, nearest laundromat is a 30 minute walk. i'm not usually one to pick on facilities because i expect basic from hostels, but previous samesun hostels were so much better. sort it

the hostel was awesome! the location made it even better. we were able to check in early and courtney was able to give us a upgrade on our room. the staff there are awesome and really helpful. the next time i go to los angeles i will deffiently be staying there again!

ideal location, just by the beach and easy access to food, drinks + public transportation. rooms are nice and quiet. beds are comfortable. many fans in the room but still way too hot!  2 bathrooms on each floor, which is actually enough. never had to queue up. however, probably missing some hooks or something to hang clothes/towels while in the shower. breakfast is very basic: pancakes, toast and some fruit.  common area is a great place to meet people! overall good experience, would return !
hi there! my stay in this hostel was really good! i like stuff there & atmosphere.

great location except there are a lot of homeless people living around the hostel but is expected in la.  the wifi didn't work the whole time i was staying here which was a huge problem - we wanted to order an uber and no wifi in surrounding area. finally had to beg the guy at the desk to use his uber app as we were late for a concert. it's the 21st century - you need to have working wifi, especially for foreign travellers.  also no air conditioning - stuffy room. good atmosphere though
great hostel in a amazing location! wifi was down for a while during my stay but was resolved. staff were great!
air conditioning in the rooms instead of fans and on sight laundry although the cleaners on main did an amazing job.

dom is a very fun, energetic guy. we enjoyed when he ran social events. never had a dull moment when he was around. the wifi was very unreliable during our stay. all other facilities were clean and working. staff were great.

stayed for 3 nights. location is absolutely perfect, pretty much on venice beach and 2 minutes from muscle beach. great area with beaches, surfing and bars nearby. free street parking a few blocks away and a decent breakfast free every morning. kitchen gets cramped but decent facilities. decent sized rooms but no ac so had to keep the windows open (and venice beach is still vibrant at night). overall clean hostel and chilled atmosphere.

this hostel is very nice! and it is very well located close to main streets and easy accesses.  staff are friendly and willing to help any time!  what i missed a little was to have more atmosphere, but maybe as i was busy i didn&#39;t really get the time to talk to anyone.  awesome value for money! i would definitely come back!
i had such a great experience here. the staff was very welcoming, and friendly. they were also very professional. and the atmosphere was awesome.

worst hostel in the us so far. read the reviews earlier and didnt expect it to be that bad. it was smokin hot in the rooms and the van didnt change that. too many people for such a small room. the bathrooms were really dirty and the idea of showing you key to a camera to get in is just bad.  the staff wasnt friendly at all. i dont expect too much since ive been travelling for years now but this hostel was worst than all the other

staff was inconsistent in their words and actions. you ask one person they say one thing and in 5 minutes you ask another person at the desk and they tell you different thing. no bike storage is a minus. also the building gets very hot during the day, i personally couldn't sleep at night.

very clean and tidy hostel. staff were very friendly and happy to answer all my questions. nightly activities were a great way to meet people - was nice that a staff member came around to the rooms to see if you wanted to join. great location down by the beach. very good!
absolutely killer, best location, friendly staff, great breaky, super clean. highly recommend
best location in venice beach! the staff are great and always willing to help. clean. close to everything you need.
staff and location were both great. i can't fault the place. the best bars and shops are off to the left down the board walk passed the new beach.
