sophie at the desk was top notch service!!! but could have done with ac in the warmer rooms!

excellent location, just steps away from the beach. the hostel and staff are good, the beds are ok. they serve pancakes, toast, fruit and cereal as breakfast which i tought was really good. the only downside of the place must be the heat inside the rooms. i had the luck of staying at a room with a window to the beach so it wasnt very hot and i slept ok, but in summer it must be unbearable. if you want to stay as close to the beach as possible its a great option!
my partner and i stayed here for a week. really loved the location of the hostel. the front desk staff were really friendly and the daily activities are great. loved the pancake brekkie!!
it was great to stay there. close to the beach and dominic the entertainment guy always has something in his mind to gather everybody
very hot!
good hostel! i was only here for a night passing through on my way to chicago. the location was great as pretty much right on the beach.
clean. comfortable. great location. highly recommend.
could do with air conditioning
in my one night stay i was very impressed. great location, great staff, very helpful and good vibes. i would've liked to have been around longer to be part of the atmosphere.

great location.  there was only 2 toilets per floor and a lot if rooms.  no lift so we struggled with luggage.   no aircon and this place was rediculously hot, we could not sleep well and we was just sweating after we showered - this really ruined our stay in a nice friendly hostel
amazing access to venice beach!

absolutely enjoyed my stay in this hostel - location is perfect! if you want to stay by the beach in la - this location is perfect, however, bear in mind that is far away from all other attractions. venice is beach is very nice and if i come back, this is the place i will choose again! breakfast was really good - enjoyed the pancakes. staff was great too - very helpful and rooms were nice - each of us had separate light and plugs by beds.

our two night stay at samesun could not have been better - the hostel was clean,welcoming and friendly and abby d was the most accommodating. she was always on hand to greet you with a smile and give you advice on what to do. i will definitely stay again if im back this way - so great!

the building is old, which in turn has old infrastructure. the ducted air conditioning was stuck on a setting way to hot. myself and three room mates were sweating each night for 3 consecutive nights. there is a roof fan that does not blow downwards. there are no pedestal fans available.   the general safety after dark is concerning. we were a group of 6ft 4+ males who can handle themselves, yet we felt unsafe. the amount of drunks, vagrants and general gangbangers loitering is concerning.
great place but so hot in the rooms with only one small window that doesnt even lead to an actual outside area! more fans!!!
brilliant hostel, lost of fun, great staff and perfect location !

the hostel was clean and spacious, and the beds were comfortable for dorm beds! the staff were super friendly and helpful, and if they didn't know something they would ask around until they were able to help you. the only issue we had was that it was suffocatingly hot in our room, and the whole hostel was very hot. we would walk around steamy 28*c la and then come back to the hostel and it would be warmer inside. we slept very poorly, dripping with sweat, despite the (very loud) fan in the room.

the staff seemed to be a little rude upon our arrival. they were busy as they were checking in multiple people at the same time, but we were scolded for not bringing our passports which we were unaware we had to have to stay at the hostel. thankfully they "bent the rules" for us.

amazing location, good people and no real issues.  ac will be cheaper and better than 3 fans per room. seriously, central air con. i'll fit it for you. the motors in the fans produce  more heat, the fan doesn't cool you and it's hotter than the sun's core in them rooms.  you know that scene in titanic where they run through  the engine room and guys are shoveling coal into the fires? that's the dorms.  you know when you open the oven door and suffer the heat blast? that's permanent.

probably one of the cheapest stays in the la beach area, and with great staff and clean rooms. it was a little too "rustic" for my personal tastes, and there's no ac in the building, only fans, so the heat can be pretty heavy. the rooms are ok, even though there are only dorms,  and felt pretty fresh (except for the heat). i didn't have any problems with my room-mates though, and the atmosphere overall in the hostel was very friendly. even though i messed around with my booking, i got a refund.
amazing location, staff are super friendly, rooms are clean with comfy beds. bathrooms are all clean with good showers! 100% recommend.

best location to stay at venice beach!  10% off at the surf and bike rental store next door!  pancakes, oranges, juice, coffee, toast, etc. for breakfast.  great atmosphere with lots of cool people!  30min walk away from santa monica pier and 5min walk to the muscle beach!  great place would absolutely recommend it!
this is the best hostel i have evever stayed at. the location and staff make it worth th stay, especially jordan. he is an absolute legend! ask him about all the cool spots!
there was no air and the room was like 30c when it was only 20c outside everyone was up so early because it was sooo hot
had a great stay at samesun. would definitely stay again :)
epic location. helpful staff. free brekky. solid!

second time staying here. right on the beach, so good location. friendly and helpful staff. good atmosphere. the room got quite hot. bit annoying there's no lift and a lot of stairs if you're carrying a heavy suitcase but if that's the biggest complaint can't be bad. would recommend this place

staff were friendly helpful. facilties were clean and accomodating. no weird odors. left my passport and my pants there by mistake. i just called and the staff secured my belongings for me to pick up later! great folks. would recommend.
great location and an amazing staff!!
awesome and friendly staff! i had fun here
rooms need air conditioning
awesome place! loved everything about it
really nice hostel in a good location . keen to get everyone involved in activities

staff at the hostel were always great fun! were always looking for an event to conduct and get people mixed together. the location on the boardwalk of venice beach was amazing and convenient. all the facilities were good and in working order except for the rooms had a mixed quality of air conditioning. one room had three wide open windows whilst the rooms in the middle of the building were awful, with a small window facing a wall and even the 3 fans couldn't keep it cool thus a sleepless night.
very nice location
great hostel, although the showers are a little iffy! superstar staff and most awesome location... miss it already!!
great hostel, clean rooms & bathrooms, friendly & helpful staff. the location on venice beach front is perfect for a chilled out atmosphere. good pancakes for breakfast too!
just to expensive

awesome hostel, perfect location, great beach views. staff are really friendly, special thanks to jordan for looking after me and shout out to bae for being her brilliant self. also, high five to kyle - hardest working man in america.

the hostel has a rubbish lay out, tiny common room as well considering how many people actually stay there. breakfast was barely edible and the hostel staff don't really make eye contact with you and aren't really friendly. the rooms are quite claustrophobic and the heat in there to sleep is unbearable why they can't just invest in air con or some decent fans to make the overall experience a bit more comfortable! location was great but i couldn't wait to leave to be honest.
location is great! the place is immaculate. love the  security here it's   awesome!
i had a great stay. the only problem was that the room was so hot. the ac unit was tiny and barely did anything

i've never traveled before and knowing that there could be places like this reassures me that all comforts are not the same as home. the staff was great, intellegent and caring. very respectful and so down to earth had one of the greatest times in venice and definitely won't forget it any time soon or in the future. dominic is a great guide and knows his stuff i suggest the pub crawl they offer just stay with the group and you'll be okay. you'll meet great people from different paths of life.

stayed here for 4 nights. really really good experience and wished i could have stayed longer. the staff were fantastic - dom and nic organised the social events when i was there and they were both such good fun and made the experience so much better! very cool vibe and the hostel is right on the beach front. great place to meet new people. breakfast was perfect and the hostel was super clean. good system for security and overall an amazing experience. thank you so much!

you can't beat the location, right on venice beach! the cleanliness of the hostel was pretty similar to others i've stayed in, although the bathrooms were kinda gross... overall though, it was a fun experience, the staff was friendly, and the location is excellent. i would stay there again! i also really appreciate the free breakfast, as most hostels don't even offer breakfast.
staff was really great and helpful, nick, abby and jordan are great guys. the atmosphere was superb, couldn't ask for more. really great place to stay.
the dorms were very hot, and there was a slight shortage of bathrooms. the location in venice beach is great, and the staff were very helpful!

samesun was a great hostel to stay at, the location was the best thing about it. they also had activities on every night, super friendly staff, nice common area, big kitchen and good wifi. the offer company's to do tours/day trips to different places in la and it was just a generally welcoming place. i'll defiantly be staying there again when i'm in la next.
i had a great time at the samesun  venice beach hostel. everyone was very nice and sociable. the free breakfast was definitely a plus. i will be back... ;)

hostel location is near the beach but far away from other things although that cannot be helped due to the size of los angeles. the rooms were a bit cramped and the kitchen was so small it is impractical to try and cook. the free breakfast was really nice though.

the overall experience was nice. i just thought that the rooms and the lockers were a bit too small. also, it gets quite noisy in the rooms because of the proximity to the promenade. however, they do have a lot of activities going on at the hostel. i would check out more options before booking this one.
staff is so friendly and the atmosphere is great. if you are traveling to meet people and have a great time this is the place to go.
thank you for making our first night in venice beach one to remember!
smelly room without aircon and shared bathroom for 130$. bathroom was always busy. nice location but that's about it.

loved this hostel!!! staff are amazing, organise lots of events for you and it is in the best location! great for meeting people. rooms are quite hot as there is no air con but you don't really spend much time in there anyway. would definitely recommend this hostel!

if you're staying in venice you'll want to be here- palm tree views, pancake breakfasts, and an awesome crew who bring out the best in everyone. big thanks to laura, abby, dan and nick for making our stay so memorable. peace ✌️
great atmosphere and friendly staff. travelled alone but met a lot of cool people and had a great couple of days!
room was incrediblyincredibly warm and poorly ventilated, besides that thumbs up for everything.
nice position right on the beach. only problem: you&#39;ll have to climb up the stairs to get to the rooms, it could be a bit difficult you are traveling with big pieces of luggage.

loved the staff! great stay there :) would definitely come back  the staff were so much fun and made you feel really at home. especially on the group outing i went on, dom made sure that everyone was all together and having fun and no one was left behind.
best location, right on the beach. staff were beyond lovely.

there were so many small details that made me feel unwelcome. too few utensils, places to eat, showers, toilets and outlets for the amount of guests. small lockers, no clean water for drinking, worthless shower, dirty dishes and a lack of activities. the kitchen is tiny and poorly equipped. the cleaning personnel stole my towel and the atm charges twice the fee of the ones on the street outside. nothing was a deal breaker and the location is brilliant, but i will be looking elsewhere next time.
very good location and breakfast.common area is too small.
very nice stay
samesun venice beach was a great place to stay, typical dorm rooms but cleaned thoroughly everyday. staff were very accommodating and friendly. the other hostel patrons were great
one of the best hostels i've stayed in. great vibe, great locations and awesome staff (thanks nic)
perfect location and great atmosphere!

i always go back to the samesun, it's the only place i'll stay when i'm in venice! the staff are friendly and helpful, the rooms are clean and comfortable, and the neighbourhood is lively, vibrant, and very safe. it feels like a true community of people, and i feel right at home when i'm there. can't wait to go back!

i was unlucky to get a room without a window and it was unbearably hot in there. we could not sleep at night:-( despite the fan in the room. even if the night was cooler, the temperature in the room did not change. excellent location. very helpful staff.
great set up but major problem with heat in the room and no air con.

hostel was good but smelled slowly of wee in the hallways . we were also charged $20 dollars each for a shuttle to the airport but found out after our deposit we could get an uber for $10 and the guy on reception told us that it would be more expensive for a taxi , which was a lie . hostel could do with air conditioning as is too hot at night an kitchen is too small , apart from that it was clean and we had a great time at venice beach !
the only drawback was that the wifi was down for my hole stay...
this hostel was great!!! awesome staff (shout out to abby) great atmosphere and great location. can't wait to stay here again!!
the rooms were clean, the staff were friendly and i was literally steps away from the beach. plus, we got pancakes for breakfast. what more do i need?

was booked into room 314- dont know what the other rooms are like, but due to the only window opening up onto a closed-in light well, and the room fan being so ineffective it was impossible to sleep because it was so hot.
great location to explore venice & santa monica.  there's a lot going on during the day. at night there are some strange guys at the boardwalk.  still a great hostel!
i only stayed two night wasn't enough! it's a great location, free wifi, free breakfast, friendly and helpful staff. i really liked staying here!

the hostel staff were great, and the vibe at the hostel was really nice with everybody at least saying hello as they passed or striking up a conversation in the common room. the location is awesome; just steps from venice beach, and our room even had a view of the beach. would definitely stay there again.

it is near-impossible to encapsulate the experience of staying at samesun venice. there's just something about that place that makes for the most amazing times with friends new and old. dominic, the activities coordinator ensures that everyone feels both welcome and constantly entertained - something that can be said of most/all if the staff. and the location, granted, does not get any better. i would recommend this place to anyone whether they are looking to be entertained or mere relaxation.

samesun sits at the heart of the venice community, located a stones throw from the beach.   upon arrival expect a warm welcome from the engaging and it has to be said entertaining staff. the rooms are what you would expect from a hostel, functional and when all is said its a place to put your head down.   great breakfasts to start the day are complimented enormously by the way the director of fun dominic brings the guests together during the rest. expect fun...laughs and a lot of new friends.
really didn't rate this hostel, common area was tiny so hard to meet people. venice beach sucks in my opinion. hostel is very clean tland safe that's all i can give them.
location is perfect! i met some awesome people, staff are sweet. breakfast was a good perk as well. will stay here again.
excellent knowledge from staff on desk and very efficient
needs a chair and table  in ensuite room. tea and coffee would be nice if available in kitchen,.

awesome location.  very satisfied with the cleanliness and room layout.      i thought the nightlife activity could have been coordinated a little better, as we got to the bar and it kind of felt like a "you're on your own." but the guy taking us on the tour asked me to buy him a beer which i thought a bit unprofessional (it's one thing for me to want to buy you a drink).     that's really the only thing i can pick out of this place and at the end of the day it's not that big a deal. good stay.

we had a fantastic stay at samesun. all the staff were great. they were friendly and very helpful. the location of samesun is just the best! i would recommend it to anyone. only small issue was that because of some renovations being underway the noise from the office travelled up to our room through the window but i'm sure that will be sorted soon enough. a unique experience for me as i've never stayed in a hostel before. thanks heaps jan brown

my sister and i have both stayed in many hostels all over europe & america, & this is by far the best! the location is the best & the atmosphere during the day is like no other!rooms are cleaned daily & you feel safe and comfortable in them! the staff are the friendliest hostel staff i've ever met! especially jordan &the silver haired girl :d. i've stayed at the another hostel in venice and also a hostel in sm, but this is by far the best!! in fact we left our hostel in hollywood just to come bk

friendly and professional staff created a great environment and encouraged meeting other travelers. great hostel security too with staffed reception 24hrs which only opens the door for guests with a roomkey. facilities are out-dated however, showers are pretty bad but that is my only issue.   would definitely reccomend :)
great location

i enjoyed my stay at this hostel and it had a good atmosphere. the location is awesome and the staff people are nice. especially jordan is quite a character and the real living legend. i would recommend to stay at this place.

very great location, learn to surf for 70$ right next door, guarantee to stand. staff friendly n safe facility, may be frightening for some ppl if not used to ppl around all night. our sink was clogged but it was fixed the next day but we had a bathroom n shower in our 4 bed dorm all female. overall wonderful hostel
lovely staff!  and good location!
excellent hub for exploring the area. decent showers and secure entry system to the building. most staff are quite nice. this isn't a very social hostel,, alright if you are with friends though.

the hostel is in a really good location, we just found our room to be extremely stuffy with no fresh air and the common room is tiny which makes it difficult to hang out in to meet other people staying at the hostel. and with no wifi in the rooms the common room was often crowded with no where to sit.
the atmosphere was great in the common room however no hot water at all and the bathrooms were not the cleanest. still good to be right on the beach though
okay hostel. a bit smelly and loud, but friendly staff and awesome location.

awesome location, had a perfect view of the beach from my room. staff were hit and miss with regards to activities, the rooms were cleaned daily and to a good standard.  overall a good a good place to stay as long as you have done washing before hand as the hostel doesn't have laundry facilities.
rad location, met some awesome people. staff were helpful. i'll be back here for sure.
despite the location it's not worth the money. next time in la i'll book another place.
great time!

overall a really good hostel, great location, some friendly people and can always find people to talk to and do stuff with. bedrooms were good, there arw lockers but i left stuff on my bed and all fine. breakfast was pretty basic, bread, orange slices and pancake mix but was fine. nice friendly staff too. rated banana bungalow slightly higher overall but this has the better location for sure!

i had a great time at the samesun venice beach hostel & i recommend it to everyone! the staff was very helpfull & friendly !!   the location was excellent ! everything you need was at a walking distance.   it was easy to get around the city by public transportation !   i will definitely come back !! ;)
nice staff, nice location, nice atmosphere, great break fast as well!
great location, clean rooms and toilets would stay again! but a minus for the uncomfy beds could feel the steal springs through the mattress
i had an amazing stay at samesun! the staff and visitors alike were fantastic. i loved all the planned events each night.

this hostel is in an awesome location and the staff are super friendly. the showers and wifi here are the worst though (no hot water at any time of day, the wifi works in 1 specific corner of a hallway - which sucks if you're trying to book more travel etc, as its hard to know if something is confirmed when the wifi drops out mid-transaction). however, the place is clean, the breakfast is decent and everything in venice beach is at your doorstep
i thought the staff was ok but they never answered my questions or request right away. i always had to insist. i really enjoyed my private room with tv, fridge and an amazing view of venice beach.
great hostel, nice rooms, best location in venice!
good to stay in the beach and make friends.  not so clean but rooms have its own bathroom and it has an easy access to town if you have a car.  great free parking spots through the night
please bring wifi to all rooms!

i arrived in the hostel right after having landed in la after a long trip from london, and i could not be better welcomed! greg explained me everything there was to know about the place and the activities organized by the hostel. immediately after i got to my dorm, i was invited to go out for drinks and playing pool and met very cool people! i even got a free surf lesson during my stay by a british guy. just if you have a car, this is not the easiest place to get free parking.

given bad directions to the hostel as instructed on this site. waited at the bus stop for 45 minutes before asking a bus driver if the bus was still running. took a taxi (30 dollars) as the bus had stopped and received an apathetic apology. other staff were very helpful.
staff really helpful!!!!

amazing location right on venice beach in the thick of it! be warned there are a massive flight of stairs to get up to the hostel, great for security, not so good for weary arms!overall nice place, common area to sit and meet people, they do events every night which would mean making friends is easy!they have a quiet time between 11 and 7 but i had some idiots in my room come in at 4am talking loudly but prob just bad luck! i didn't get female only though i'd booked that so make sure you check

great staff and great vibe. best location i've ever seen for a hostel and the staff always have something for you to do. there's a great common room that everyone hangs out in and socialises and dominic (the local californian guy) is unreal at showing people around and making sure everyone enjoys themselves.

great location and great vibe! so glad we stayed here. the guy who checked us in was great, told us to mention him by name if we were happy with our service. we were 100% satisfied, but i forget his name! he was maybe australian, long hair and very helpful and enthusiastic!

a friend recommended me this place last minute. very friendly and helpful staff, nic and the rest of the team.  prompt answer about check in time over email. quite safe and easy accesible from lax and santa monica. decent common areas where one can meet bunch of cool people. only small issue was cranky internet connection...

classic hostel experience with great friendly staff and while i was there one of them took us on an outing like cycling up the sea-front.  living room has a great view of the beach and is conducive to conversation - met lots of fun travellers!

if i do go back i will defiantly stay there. everything was amazing. the only thing i didn't really like was that they ran out of coffee 2 days around 9am and bread on the 3rd day. i feel that if they say breakfast is 730 until 930 they shouldn't run out 3/4 of the way thru but other then that it was perfect.
in need of a lot more bathrooms.
this is definetly a fun hostel with the most friendliest staff (nic from 'stralia) i've met during my cali trip. keep going guys

this was my 2nd  time staying at samesun and it was even better than i remember! the staff are so friendly and helpful, big shout out to abby and sara who made my trip so great! the hostel is in a fantastic location steps away from the beach, the rooms are spacious and everything was super clean. security at night made me feel really safe, you had to show your key before being buzzed up. the hostel activities were awesome and a great place to meet people.amazing hostel! definitely reccommend!!
great hostel, 20 seconds away from venice beach. the beds and showers were fine, the only disappointment being the limited breakfast. would still recommend...
great location!

the staff at this hostel is amazing. they made me feel so welcome right from the start. everyone was super friendly and helpful when i had questions about the area. speaking of, the location is amazing. it´s right at the boardwalk and skatepark. lots of bars and restaurants in the area as well.   the hostel itself was very clean, the shared bathrooms were always clean, so was the kitchen area and the common room. i had a great time in venice and a wonderful stay at the samesun hostel.
great hostel, great staff, awesome breaky in morning, my room was sweet looking out onto the beach, great value for the money and nick is a legend good guy to had around , top bloke.

i had a good weekend in venice beach. i enjoyed the stay at the samesun hostel a lot. i joined a few of their daily activities. it´s a great way to explore the area and meet new people. it was a great vibe in the hostel. the staff was super chill and nice. possibly the best staff i met when staying at hostels!! super clean rooms and so close to the  beach! can´t wait to check out more of the samesun hostels on my trip to canada.
my passport was stolen from my room but the staff helped me out in a calm and useful way.
its close proximity to venice beach is its major selling point, so if that's what you want then there's nothing wrong with staying here. most of the staff where either from australia or nz.
pretty expensive for what you get but definitely can't complain about the staff or location. nick in particular was a bit of a legend.
great staff, good relaxed atmosphere, the best location in venice!

this hostel is hands down the best hostel i've stayed at! where to start?!... the location is unbeatable with the beach a 20second walk away and great bars and restaurants surrounding (danny's, larrys and townhouse to name a few)  the rooms are bright and spacious and the beds are so comfy! the staff are great! really fun and happy to give advice on things to do and see. the samesun have definitely put their stamp on this hostel and there is no question, this is the hostel to stay at in venice!!

i really enjoyed staying at samesun. the staff made my friend and i feel very welcome and helped us in any way we needed. the location was ideal, and the facilities were more than great. shout outs to the boys who work at the venice beach location in l.a, you were wonderful, made me feel so welcome and showed me a good time all around! i miss this place and will definitely be returning with friends in the next month or two! thanks!

my trip previous to this one was in 2008, when the place was the "venice beach (c)otel". love this hostel so much. great times and memories. happy to see that the place is only getting better, with vibe strong and logistics pretty effective. bravo to the staff and management. if you want a great, happy place to stay in venice beach, this is the one.
i loved my stay here! such a great location and the staff were very friendly. there are also lots of awesome places to eat and drink within a few steps. highly recommended.

compared to a lot of other hostels it was very clean and modern. you feel safe as the staff makes sure nobody that is not a hostel guest gets in. the stairs are a minus because with a lot of luggage its pretty painful. staff was friendly, didn't show me around though. all in all, i enjoyed my stay even if i still think that 48$ a night is quite a lot. breakfast was okay - very simple. location is top - right at the beach.

i had a wonderful time at samesun venice. the staff there is amazing. everyone was so friendly and helpful , very good vibe. the rooms and common areas are very clean. the best thing about this hostel is the location! directly at the boardwalk, skatepark and the beach. they have great daily activities which is amazing, so much fun hiking and biking with new people everyday. dominic- director of fun : you rock! thanks samesun venice for an amazing time.

hostel is located right in the heart of venice beach. the staff are very accommodating, and the atmosphere is very welcoming. free pancakes and toast in the morning is also a plus. however, if you choose not to go with an ensuite, the bathrooms are few and far between. also, the showers barely work. you'll get a drizzle at best. it's also quite a distance from other parts of la, and finding parking is brutal. all in all, it was not a bad place to rest after a long day.

the most disappointing thing about this hostel was the public bathrooms. the showers were pathetic. out of the 4 showers, 2 had absolutely no water pressure in that only drops were coming out of the shower head making it impossible to shower. the other 2 showers were only marginally better. there was enough water coming out of the shower head in order to get clean but they weren't respectable in any sense of the word.

extremely rude and unoccomodating customer service:  the blonde receptionist actually asked me if i was "capable of speaking" when she asked me a question and i did not immediately answer (i did not hear her right away and had already done what she was requesting me to do) she then sneered at us for the remainder of or stay. it made us uncomfortable just to walk past the front desk.

my stay at the samesun venice beach was amazing! the hostel location simply couldn't get any better. with ocean views from the room i was in i felt totally relaxed.  the hostel staff are by far the best i have met anywhere on my travels; they are professional and courteous, and they make sure you feel at home. i travel to l.a. plenty and will be sure to stay here again, and again !
staff were excellent great location very secure and bathrooms/ensuites were pristine. cant complain at all!
location is really good, and the common area is a great spot to socialize and meet people. staff was good as well. it's a little on the pricey side but you pay for location.

the location is absolutely perfect if you are looking to stay at venice beach. honestly, the location is about all this hostel has going for it. the facilities were not clean. our room smelt as we were situated near a bathroom. also, the internet doesn't work outside of communal areas.
the staff at this hostel really make the place! they all go above and beyond to create a fun and sociable atmosphere. perfect place to stay if travelling by yourself!
very good place to stay! close to the beach and there are good restaurants and options to drink a beer and eat some food. i recommend!

i´ve rated this hostel lower, because after reading some very good reviews i had higher expectations. it´s not a good value for the money. after i moved from there, i rented something through airbnb , which was much cheaper,  nicer and cleaner and the host was willing to help me more with info and everything.
very friendly staff. perfect located and everythink so nearby!  was great thanks a lot!!!
staff are great, fantastic atmosphere for those traveling, and really easy to meet people at this hostel. its in a great location, was a fantastic stay.
absolutely amazing hostel right on venice beach. the staff were awesome. nic and issiah were so cool. i wish i were them. great atmosphere with friendly hostel mates.

the bread and butter of this hostel is really the location. it's excellent for a beach bum like me who just wants to lay out on the sand or go rollerblading all day. i  was placed in a room with 3 staff members, all boys, but the bathroom was super clean and that's all i really need in life! it got a little noisy at night, but i guess that's the price you pay for the location. i look forward to coming back to this hostel any time i go back to venice.

the location is lovely right on the beach but with location comes some security challenges at the front door as it is remote to the desk and is controlled via a camera which people can avoid by sneaking in behind guests.  the bed was the hardest i've ever slept on.  staff was great.

very good location, just in front of venice beach. a bit expensive for what you get, but i guess it's the location.    breakfast was disappointing, fruits and spreads other than butter would have been nice.

great location, great staf and easy to meet other guests on the hostel. space could be better and sometimes noice from the commen area late night. this is the place to stay if you are going to venice!

brilliant stay at samesun. the location was perfect for my relaxing stay at the coast. the room was clean and spacious with a gorgeous ocean view and the rest of the hostel was of a high standard with good security.
a nice hostel! i found it not particularly welcoming, but a great location at venice beach!

i only stayed 24hrs and only slept there, as i was out and about. great location, awesome! couldn't be closer to everything. but i waited over an hour to check it which wasn't a great start for me. ok if it takes that long, but i was told to sit and wait when i could have used that time out at the beach. i had a private room which made it expensive for what i gor, but that's understandable in the area. needs more bathrooms for sure, waited for ages for a shower in the morning. staff were ok.
excelent place! perfect location, would totally recommend it and i'm definitely staying here next time.

it's a really good hostel with a great atmosphere. especially if you're travelling alone you'll have a lot of people to connect with as there is a big common area where people gather. the free breakfast (pancakes, toasts, oranges, & coffee) has the very basics, but you wouldn't need more. the kitchen is well supplied and so you can also cook for yourself if you want to avoid the expensive but good venice beach fast food. you won't find a better deal when it comes to location+price.

if you are looking for the full venice experience this is the place to go. with great staff and atmosphere there is no question you will feel welcome at this place! get ready make friends, party until the break of dawn and see the most beautiful sunset of your life. location is as central as it could come and you will be safely locket away in the hostel for it's security and 24 hour reception is always on guard. if you ask me this is the la experience!
seriously the best place! great for anyone on their first time in la! everyone is really friendly and it's accessible to so much, and the free brekkie is the goods.
was a friendly place, facilities were kept clean and great location. staff werr great recommending and helping set up uber of cheap cabs and helped answer any other questions.

arrived from a long international flight at 7:30 am and check in wasn't untill 3pm, but the manager was amazing and got us in early, even upgraded us to a private room.. great location, helpful staff (except for the morning guy who pumps kanye at 6:30am- that cray!!) clean, safe rooms. perfect for what we were after
the only place you can get wifi is in the hallway next to the atm. is it that hard to get a few routers and place them near the rooms?
stayed one night. the staff was friendly and the location is nice to explore venice beach. overall a nice stay.
internet never works
decent hostel, but it could do with a bit of a makeover... what annoyed me the most is the cold showers! by 10am, not hot water whatsoever.

although this was an ok hostel i would not advise people because their wifi is so bad you can not call it wifi, they have a router but that's it you can not use it for anything. therefor i think it is bad value for money because it is a ripoff if they not invest in a good internet connection for the traveler who has to plan a schedule everything online. it is 100 bucks per month to get good internet if they are not willing to do that it is bad customer service.
we had a great time at samesun. courtney at the desk was super helpful. we recommend this one to everybody who wants to chill out at venice beach.
great hostel! the hostel is clean and tidy. the staff are helpful and fun! i would recommend this hostel for someone looking for a good location in venice beach.
such a fun place in a great location! staff were amazing! certainly a place i'd return to. they organise cheap dinners & events.

will not find accommodation in venice beach cheaper than this. stayed in a 4 bed dorm twice and both times had an amazing view of the beach and boardwalk. also if you skateboard the skate park is literally 100 metres away... highly recommended!!
just go to santa monica! trust me!

pros: great location, friendly staff, felt safe cons: the bedroom was cold (apparently a problem with heating), there were no city maps available when i asked and there seemed to be no way to produce more.

my stay here was really awesome!  dominic, the director of fun, lead us on some memorable trips around the area including bike rides to temescal canyon for a hike and the next day, hermosa beach for lunch.  highly recommend samesun venice beach!

loved the free breakfast, especially pancakes! activities during day seemed like great idea and taking out groups in the evening for food/open mic nights really lovely - would have taken advantage of this more had we been here longer but took a while to get over the jet lag! showers temp was a bit dodgy.  wifi was great and staff were all really helpful. would recomend and stay again.

most of the staff was friendly, but the manager(they reluctantly gave our her name abby) was extremely rude and when we went back to pick up our luggage verbally attacked my son and said he had not stayed the prior night because he didn't have a key. the other workers informed her she was wrong and that we had both stayed in the hostel the night before, but instead of apologizing she told us to leave. hostelworld is great, but should not be associated with samesun  venice until abby is fired.

this hostel was pretty good! if you like venice beach, it's in a prime location. having stayed at hostels in both venice beach and hollywood, i would actually say i'd prefer hollywood for its accessibility. venice is pretty dead at night, and it's extremely time consuming to travel anywhere via public transportation. that said, no complaints about the hostel. it was comfortable, quiet enough to sleep, and had a decent common area. the staff wasn't overly friendly but they were accommodating.

the hostel is ideally located if you're keen on spending time around venice beach, marina del rey and santa monica, which are really cool areas. the facilities are clean and generally pretty cool and the beds are comfortable. the vibe at the hostel is also pretty great (the staff are all fun). my only criticism is that it is very expensive for what it is.

hostel is nice enough, would recommend an end suite as fighting for bathrooms is a nightmare. personally wouldn't stay here again, didn't feel there was much socially to bring people together. location is amazing though and staff are helpful and friendly.

sink was blocked, kitchen is over crowded and the drying plates are really not clean. cleaners were really friendly. lots of people seemed to hang around outside our room and the reception area and were very noisy. venice beach is a little sketchy at night!

the people/atmosphere and its location is really what makes this hostel. it is exactly on venice beach making the view from some windows very very beautiful. only negative is that one of our showers didn't have a proper shower head and it wasn't super clean and one of our rooms wasn't insulated enough and got quite cold at night. it is deffinitaly your place to be if you're an easy going person :)

we paid an excessive amount for a private room. in which we had a tv where we got to watch a great blue screen. a mini bar fridge bed side table that didn't work, and a door that took at least 5 minutes to unlock due to the faulty lock. bathrooms were very unclean and the showers had minimal pressure. when trying to leave one of the desk staff was more interested in talking up one of the guests and taking up the whole stairwell rather than moving to one side.
loved this place! best hostel we stayed at in america by far!

the location on venice beach is brilliant. i had a room at the back so it was quiet but dark, which was good as i needed sleep. so much gping on in venice beach, you may as well spend time out there. staff very friendly.

i only stayed one night, but it was a pretty good hostel overall.  the room and bathroom were clean and the staff were friendly.  there wasn't as much going on the night i was there, but the people were certainly chill enough.  you can't beat the location though with beautiful beach views.
bit pricey for a hostel (maybe that's just la). we stayed in a private room with a shared bathroom. bed really comfy compared to other hostels. shower not very hot. free pancakes
best place, best people working there, good vibes!
amazing location, free parking all around the area very easy to find.  very friendly staff, 100%
had a great time here, great place to meet people if you are solo, staff are also great, will stay there again if back in venice

this place was home, and staff was my family during my stay here! the views are incredible, friendly guests and the most warm and welcoming staff ever!! keep up the great work and thank you to everyone who made my stay unforgettable! special thanks to sara for always going the extra mile! will miss this place!
awesome location right on venice beach. clean bathrooms. friendly, useful staff. i would stay again in an instant! thanks
great staff, great beach front location. highly recommend.
great reception and info from the people working there. very helpful friendly people. with great background music haha
perfect location if you want to go to the beach! and the beach is the best part of la. ensuite bathroom is pretty handy! great staff! nick, thank you! you're awesome!
great spot, pretty expensive as far as hostels go had to book room three times to stay with friend  staff friendly
i'd suggest the banana hostel. it's in a much more centric location, much better priced, and much cleaner. this hostel was unclean, didn't have lockers, and had sub-par desk service.
an alright place to stay - good location on venice beach, friendly staff and variable atmosphere. my only complaints are of no hot water showers.
you're one of my best experiences in a hostel. best location ever, best staff ever, and friendliest environment. you guys rock.

the location of the hostel directly at the beach is nice. however, there are a lot of homeless people there and the entire area doesn´t look very safe. the hostel itself is average. the rooms are okay. in the bathrooms there often was no warm water, which can get really frustrating after some time.breakfast was included in the price, but wasn´t good at all. especially because of the location of the hostel in such a sketchy area, i wouldn´t stay there aga

the hostel is really near to the beach so if you are coming to la to enjoy the sea this is the perfect place. it is also possible to go to santa monica walking. the beds are good and the place is ok, i really liked it and enjoyed the location. the only problem is for going to downtown without a car, it is very very very far and for every place(like beverly hills, hollywood, museums, etc) that i went i had to take around 2 hours in buses to go and more 2 hours to return to the hostel.
jordan at samesun venice deserves special mention. he was very friendly and was my favourite staff member.
terrific staff, i had a great time talking with everyone and they were informed regarding the locale.
i had not really good experience when i was there, because the roommate brought a guy back in our female room. it made me  really uncomfortable.
great location right next to the venice beach boardwalk. staff was cool. would stay again.
in love with the staff and locals. i'll be back soon!

everything about samesun was perfect. however they don't have a very good communal area to meet people. i was only there for 3 days though so i didn't really get to experience any of the proper group activities.

great hostel. best location and heaps to do in the area. the staff are freaking awesome and keep the vibe going around the place - especially thanks to jordan for the sick skating lessons on the boardwalk. already planning to come back here asap.

i only stayed for a few hours but it was good.  there was always a taxi cab nearby if needed.  right next to be beach and other facilities.  a few "interesting" characters out and about but that didnt bother me at all.  good place to stay

fairly basic hostel with a great location (20m away from the beach). staff were very friendly and helpful, rooms were comfortable - the common area is comfortable but if you're looking to socialise the bars outside are really the best place.
lovely happy staff, always ready to advise and support. the location is one of the best.

i can't recommend this place highly enough! great vibe and really easy to meet people. you can't beat the location and the staff were super friendly and helpful. if you're in la, this is the place to stay!
someone stole my skateboard :(..
chris at the samesun made the stay great. good times and the location.
all the good mood you can find in a hostel. friendly people and very clean. location is perfect if you're going to la for something near the beach.
my first time at a hostel and it's exceeded my expectations! this place is awesome!
great location! great atmosphere and very clean! the place to be when visiting venice beach or santa monica!
stayed in a 4 bed with an ensuite and it was amazingly clean! great location!
great location by the beach! would definitely come back!
great locatio, excellent staff

this was my first time staying at a hostel and i will never rent a hotel again!! the staff was warm and friendly just like the weather and my roommates ( i stayed at an all female room) were super dope. this place is right on the boardwalk just steps from the beach and the place is an excellent deal for the money
awesome hostel.  great facilities and helpful staff.  could not have asked for a better location.
great hostel in excellent location. very helpful staff. wifi reception was a little average. bathroom facilities were great.
very good one. remember a little bit some hostels from europe.  very good location
we extended stay for more 2 nights. all is here awsome. but i would expect in comfirmation email by you an important information that this hostel strictly requires passport!!!!

really nice staff, they help create an awesome atmosphere. the hostel has a really chilled and fun vibe, great for those travelling alone with the organised activities and use of the common room. right on the beach.

the staff are very helpful and cool.  location is awesome right on the beach.  but in general it's very expensive for a hostel but i guess that's la.  venice beach area seems to be more expensive than other parts of la surprisingly even more so than hollywood blv.
its all good. my travel was part business and part leisure the hostel fitted my needs nicely. ,
best location to stay in la. venice is awesome.  hostel is good. nothing special, but we had no problem there. staff is nice, bathrooms are clean, and bedroom as well.
perfect location for venice beach, right on boardwalk. unfortunately no atmosphere at all, way too small common room, bathrooms very unclean, no one participating in activities. shame!

i can highly recommend the hostel. the people were great the staff helped us with everything and  booked additionaly they booked a van for us. really cool hostel next to the beach in the center of venice beach.

i liked the hostel. i had the 4 bed dorm with a private bathroom. beds were ok at bed but the place was cleaned daily. bring you own pillow if you are fussy but apart from that this is a good hostel in a great location for the beach. they did clean the hostel everyday. the staff were friendly and helped whenever possible.

hostel is great. i booked three more nights after my first three because it is so close to the beach and i hears hollywood and down town la weren't really worth going. wifi is not the best, couldn't connect to it in my own room. but i really liked my stay and people were awesome! i would really recommend the place
it was ok, nothing fancy.
i had a perfectly awesome stay! thank you so much.

great staff and location opposite venice beach and close to buses for transport to downtown la. venice the area itself seems a little rough/scary but so are most parts of la. our private room with ensuite was good and clean :) free toast and oatmeal for breaky was perfect for busy days. thanks to the awesome staff :)
loved this hostel!

i thought this hostel was fantastic. i thought the value for money was second to none, especially given the prime location of the hostel. iso impressed with the staff - one in particular who was incredibly helpful (i'm struggling to remember his name!!) but was working the shift at 10.30 pm on thursday 2 october.     i was so impressed with this hostel, i will recomment to all friends travelling through venice.

i absolutely loved my time at samesun!   the staff are super friendly and i felt right at home.   the location could not be better, you're literally 20 steps from the beach. my first night was an ocean view room and the room was super clean. my only qualms were the wifi and the stairs, there are 2 flights up to the front desk, but overall a great hostel with great vibes!

very well located hostel in venice. 2 minutes from the beach. if you can, choose the 4 beds dorm en suite. they are bright and clean with a nice bathroom. the 8 beds dorm are way too hot, no a/c, just a fan.
unbeatable location, helpful staff, reasonable price. what else could you possibly want?
the staff were all awesome and super friendly and you cannot beat the location!

had difficulty checking in. i am a ca resident and did not think i needed to bring a passport. the man at check in made the process very difficult. i explained that i was not made aware of this policy when checking in online. i felt unwelcome as he said the hostel was for travelers only. i brought two australian travelers with me to stay as well, bringing extra business. if you don't want american travelers, say so.

amazing location, right in the heart of venice. couldn't have asked for friendlier staff, everyone was tremendously helpful and welcoming. definitely recommend staying at samesun, it was a highlight of our trip!!!!

best hostel in west la by far!  social atmosphere with a great range of activities offered, rooms are clean and secure, awesome staff, right next to venice beach. close to a bunch of great bars, shops, and restaurants. looking forward to my next visit with samesun!
cool vibe, great location. value for money!!
best hostel i've ever stayed at!!!

stayed here at the start of my first trip to california, and it was definitely a good start. it had a party atmosphere, but still felt secure in a very lively area. cleaned professionally every day. lots of activities courtesy of dominic, director of fun!
awesome place!make sure you go out with dominic!he is sound!

really enjoyed staying here. great location right on venice beach, walking distance to the beach, skate park and basketball courts. staff really friendly and helpful, very good free breakfast of oats, toast, coffee etc. room i had was 212 and really hot and uncomfortable but otherwise ok. showers not the best, at least on first floor, better upstairs. cool common area to hang out in, i enjoyed the free comedy on saturday night. some rooms even have ocean views. great times in venice beach!!
really glad i booked here.  amazing location, fun staff and great roommates!

i had a great time at samesun!  the staff were super friendly and helpful.  i was only there for one night, so i didn't participate in the activities but they offered one every day and they seemed awesome.  the location was the absolute best, literally right on the beach.
the location is so good for anyone travelling about wanting some sun and sea, and only a short walk to santa monica! staff were friendly and helpful

stayed in a 4 shared room with baathroom, didn't have wifi acces in our room so had to go to the common room. breakfast was plain (bread and jam and cornflakes). it was a bit dusty in our room and the sheets had a few stains. the staff was nice and the view from the common room was great! could see the beach. so if you're willing to trade cleanliness and wifi with great location it's your place to stay.

the location is very good, and it is just in the beach side where you can see the beach from the window of the room i stayed.  i can walk to the beach in 1 minute too.  however, there is no air-conditioner in the hostel.      the breakfast is ok where you can make toasts.

lovely new sheets and mattresses. friendly staff. i mentioned i didn't sleep well because of the heart wave and they juggled some things to put me in a cooler room. went out on some of their activities and had a great time. went for tacos with staff and backpackers, all very friendly. even the cleaners were friendly and did a great job everyday. thank you very much for a lovely stay. another great samesun hostel.

had to give this a full rating! amazing view from my window and common area window. awesome atmosphere in such a buzzing location there's always something to do. would definitely stay again! rooms were warm but it's california, can't really complain about amazing sunny weather at the beach!
very pricy for a hostel. very basic interior but good atmosphere and location. would recommend for young people/groups.
a better breakfast selection including even cereals would enhance this hostel experience for many

what a hostel!! right in the heart of venice beach. super friendly staff that were happy to help with anything i asked! lots of fun activities  to get involved with around the city, or if you are feeling lazy the common room was a great place to meet new people and have a few drinks.     clean facilities and comfy beds, cannot wait to head back there!
i loved my staying here. it is very close to the beach and the peope were very friendly there, they helped me so much. i would come back here again.
excellent location, just in front of the beach, good staff and good rooms. good experience!
very friendly staff made for a very enjoyable stay

really didn't like this hostel. it was really unclean and dated. we stayed in a usa hostel before this and it was luxury compared to this one.  the sheets were clean, that was about it. towels were frayed and had holes in, the room had dust all around the corners. the bathrooms had mould in them and were not clean.  no air conditioning and couldn't shut the window (there was a headache causing noise like when you keep one window open in the car).  also noisy. not a pleasant stay at all!
nice place, close to the beach and all the random stuff that goes on around here. very pleasant place to chill
really nice location on venice beach. great social atmosphere and really helpful staff.

the location is definitely the selling point for this hostel. i've stayed in lots of hostels & this has room for improvement. dorm was like an oven, could hardly sleep it was so hot. only two bathrooms (and no separate toilets) per floor so always waiting. small kitchen and living area.  no laundry facilities though i believe there are plans to put these in.  dorm was an ok size.  no secure room for leaving luggage - the room where you leave bags is open for anyone in hostel to access.

had a great stay! location was amazing, right on the beach. facilities and security are good, keeping up the standard i saw in most good hostels i've been too. standard price, it was an august weekend right on venice beach so i really can't complain :)  staff was great! got the chance to meet a bunch of really nice fun people, still in touch with jose, one of the guys that works there! he's been and they've been all really nice and helpful to someone who just moved to the city. recommended!
very close to beach, good price, a lot homeless people in the night around
not very good value for price. run down facility. no air conditioning.  dirty bathrooms. disappointing breakfast. staff had no idea how to make coffee. very disappointed.

although the room with bath was ok but to small for four person.  also not nice the vending machine was in the stairwell and the heat of the refrigerator   was released to the stairwell what caused the stairwell to be hot.
all very personable. any needs were worked out right away

this place is great. if you can afford to stay here you must. stay in vegas after to balance out the cost per night! right on the boardwalk and by food places. neat kitchen in hostel. my room had a great view of the sea, maybe you can request this! 2 hour bus journey (or 30 min uber) from downtown la, but worth it - la  is a dump. be careful around the greyhound, get a bus or taxi to the main street in downtown. this walk was the only place to scare a 22 year old guy in 7 weeks of travel.

this was my first time staying in a hostel, and it was far better than i expected. it was very clean. the kitchen had everything i needed to prepare food. however, the lounge is fairly small for how many people they have staying there. but it's a small, older building, and i'm sure they did the best they could with the space they have.

a brilliant location next to the venice boardwalk and the beach. beautiful weather and great staff that helped me finding everything i need withing a 30 minute travel. they even arranged movie tickets at the amc dine-in theater which is a must see when you are around.
it is an expensive place for a hostel, but the location is excellent and the staf very friendly!!
nice memory
great location steps away from the beach. the bathrooms were super clean and it was easy to get in and out during the day. a little loud outside during the day, but plenty quiet at night.

we booked a mixed 4 bedroom shared bathroom for one night during july. there was one small window which opened to the center of the entire building, with no airflow. air conditioning was not included throughout the entire establishment.

had a very enjoyable night stay at samesun. staff are friendly, facilities are good and a nice backpacker atmosphere. this place is 100x better than venice beach hostel so if you are trying to make a decision between the 2.. choose samesun!
the room was really clean and spacious. .breakfast was really good. .it is the best on venice beach
wonderful hostel - have stayed there twice now and would stay there again! definitely better off booking the earlier the cheaper. only downfall is the closest laundry is a 20 minute walk away.

i stayed at this hostel for just 1 night, and would have loved to stay another night. its in the best location and the staff are great. the rooms are very clean and spacious, but it is quite expensive for a hostel.

room was super hot, and the door had to be left open all day for it to be bearable! only two poorly kept, dirty showers/toilets for an entire floor of dorms. not very clean, shabby, small place. we didn't use the kitchen or common room much, but both were also very small. only good things were location - basically right on venice beach - and staff, who were super helpful.
good value for money. really nice staf and really close to the beach! rooms are good and clean!
great place close to the beach. very clean, great wifi, helpful staff. only problem was there were only two bathrooms on each floor causing a lot of waiting to use them.
great place in venice. the staff is very friendly and the atmosphere in the hostal  is great.
i stayed just one night. but i had a wonderful day there. the facility was so clean and bed or blanket was so nice. if i happen to visit la again i will stay here too!
great location and staff. people keep quiet at nights. comfty. downside: loud ventilator in my shared room.

decent hostel. atmosphere is average. there is no parking for hostel guest though, so if you have a car, i would not recommend staying here. you will have to find street parking, which sucks at venice.

loved my time here. perfect location right in the centre of the venice boardwalk. nice walk to santa monica. could've been a few extra showers, but that that's no big deal. perfect place to end a 2 month trip away.

samesun is a great hostel. literally right on venice beach. high secuirty. we had a 4 bed shared dorm with bathroom and we wouldn't have gotten anything else around this area for this great price. very clean and helpful staff.
there should be more plugs in the rooms so we can charge our phones etc. and shelfs by the beds are nescessary. otherwise greeeeeat hostel!

the place really really needs some atmosphere, its just boring. the communal area is a joke...why not utilise all that space on the roof and create a rooftop terrace bar??? this would put you guys on the global hostel map!! disappointing overall.
the staff are really helpful all the time. the location is amazing! the view from the lounge window is great. limited bathrooms but worth it for the great stay.
i stay here always the first nights when i arrive from overseas. it is now the 4th time i've been here and certainly will come back.

upper floor rooms were very hot, like a owen. altough there were  fans.  they say that breakfast is included. in realty they could'nt have called it breakfast. the word 'poor' remain ' rich'  for it. to my opion, they could rise  a litle bit  (2-3  dollars) daily rate and  offer a more reasonable  breakfast.   i suppose that  such kind of breakfast   are not   served  even in  poorest country of  africa. please, a little more  respect to  human being.
can't beat the location and the staff was awesome.
this was my first time staying in a hostel and the experience was great! i defintely will be staying in a hostel in the future!
great hostel, perfect location. staff were very helpful! can't really complain.

samesun venice beach is in prime location for coastal life. my partner and i loved this hostel. we've stayed in many and this is at the top. plus there was a tv in the room so we could watch the world cup if too tired to hit one of many cool bars in venice.
beautiful people and beautiful views!

amazing location right on venice beach. i was only there for 2 nights so didn't participate in any of the hostel activities but the staff seemed very helpful. my only complaint is there are a few basic maintenance issues that need attending too. for example, the light in our bathroom was blown for my entire stay, which made it difficult to go the bathroom at night.

stayed here for less than 24 hours, so i can't say much, but the location is perfect! as a girl traveling alone, i was reluctant to walk around at night, so it's a good thing danny's is right downstairs for food/drinks. i had an early flight to catch, so i went to check out the lounge instead of sleeping - i wasn't that impressed. just a couple of dudes on couches staring at their phones. i talked to one guy for a bit, but overall it was a bit boring compared to other hostels. off night maybe?

had a great stay here for our time in la. brilliant staff, always welcoming and helpful. wish i knew the names of specific people to give credit where due. great location right by the beach with appropriate security measures. breakfast is included but is simple and goes quickly so would recommend going down early. would recommend!

staff were excellent. very friendly, helpful and always welcoming. facilities were good. electric bobs you could use to cook if you wanted to save your money. free breakfast of toast and porridge however milk was not provided. the lounge area would have been great if it was bigger and more for relaxing rather than drinking in the evening.   rooms were very hot and stuffy however clean. air con would have been great in the room or an external window to allow a breeze into the room.

good hostel, an excellent location right on venice beach, bike/skate/surf hire right next to the hostel at a good price, good atmosphere. only gripes are: not enough toilets and i was put in a dorm room with no ventilation and a fan that just pushed around the hot smelly air. overall though i would definitely recommend!

one staff member was fab, helpful and friendly. another staff member was exact opposite hence average score on staff.  i booked samesun venice beach as stayed at vancouver which is fab.  this place nothing in comparison.  the breakfast was dire.
perfect location and clean.
the best location you can get being right on the beach.  just your average hostel not to dirty and just a overall good place to stay
very helpful staff, very clean and safe. great location.
beautiful location, friendly staff . lots of sun and fun.
sweet place right next to beach and good tours  and met loads of cool people there

fantastic location and the staff were all really friendly! good atmosphere as well. but for what it was, i thought it was really expensive. definitely would recommend if you have a flight from lax and want to stay reasonably close by.

great location and a fair price for the area. common room is too small and hard to meet people. rooms are clean and tidy but power sockets should be available at each bed, not just the bottom bunks. rooms get far too hot and there is no cooling system installed; each room should have its own fan at a minimum; we shouldn't have to bother reception with this minimal request. key system is very outdated; nothing worse than bringing keys out to a pub/club or beach. key-cards fit easy in the wallet!!
expensive but worth it for a couple of days .... location is the best in the area hands down ..... friendly and extremely helpful staff  everything you need is close  clean
they defintely need more showers. or just a basic toilette so if the showers are taken i can atleast go to the toilette
best hostel ever. on the beach. nice stuff

hostel really close to the venice beach, which is a famous place. but i prefer beaches like santa monica. for those who like venice beach is great place, small but tidy rooms, shared bathrooms clean most of the time, only 2 per floor, but i always found one free when i needed! very attentive staff.

staff was really unfriendly and didn't want to help us!  we got a damn 100$-ticket for parking in the red zone. we don't know anything about a "red zone" in europe so the staff should have told us about it when they gave us the instructions where we should park!!

amazing location, you can't get any closer to venice beach than samsun. great staff as well, super friendly and helpful. security is incredible as you have to ring the door bell and show your key to enter. as for the hostel itself basic basic accommodation. showers were horrendous, didn't have a hot shower once and were never cleaned. room stunk of weed for obvious reasons, fine with that, but no circulation apart from a small window.

fantastic location! right in the middle of everything and across from beach.  bathrooms could use an update and and also better ventilation in the dorms as it gets quite hot and stuffy.  lots of different group activities each night but i stayed there to tour venice not go into hollywood in a limo, so a simple pub crawl through venice would have been good.
overall did not have a pleasant stay. the rooms  in bedding were unpleasant as well as some of the staff.

i was only here for 1 night but i had a good experience. room was good and the hostel is right on venice beach, so if you want to be in this area it's a good choice. there's a bar/restaurant next door that had a good atmosphere, but there wasn't much atmosphere in the common areas of the hostel when i was there.
if have more restroom is better~
really good location, directly at the beach. really clean. the restaurant/bar underneath the hostel makes meeting people easy
great location directly on the beach, unfortunately they don't have a common area (e.g, a roof garden) where you could enjoy this marveleous place.

the beds aren't very comfy but it is a hostel, the main problem tho is that the water pressure is so weak it's hard to shower and also the hot water wasn't hot it was barely warm so if that could be fixed if would be much better..
nice hostel, however when we talk about breakfast... i'm so sorry but there isn't
not enough toilets...and the room smelled awful.
found the staff to be very helpfull. i would recommend samsun venice beach

great hostel, with great people. every night they have an event, so you get to know a lot of people in the hostel. it is about an hour walk towards santa monica pier, but it is a nice walk. there also busses nearby. at night they say it is not that safe, so you shouldn't be walking by yourself. they have a wonderfull security system and don't let anyone in they don't trust. good kitchen, but also nice restaurants nearby. breakfast was allright. one day they ran out of bread...

pretty good hostel overall. easy to get to, fun activities at night and pretty good atmosphere. mindful that 1.5 hours by bus from hollywood. staff are all pretty cool and laid back except one american chick at reception who was a bit rude (abby i think). otherwise great stay, highly recommended.

have been traveling around america for a while now and this is by far the best hostel we stayed at. staff were excellent especially kate who was always willing to help and organize social events.  if you're traveling to la do yourself a favor and stay here! highly recommend! marco polo
fantastic place to stay, pretty much right at the beach. highly recommend.

nice hostel right in venice, some of the rooms even have ocean view. staff is very helpful and nice. there is breakfast included, but it's nothing special. overall a very nice and clean hostel, would recommend it.
however, got a parkn tx in five min load zone when i ran upstairs for a few minutes only la traffic cop to get bag from storage closet at 4 pm on my check out day:(
i had a nice time at the samsung hostel. it is very easy to meet people, and it is soclose to the beach.
staff are helpful.... awful vibe can't really drink inside the hostel
we stay in a room of 8 people, and there was bevy bad smell, the room has no ventilation, beside that everything was ok, good place to meet new people at the common area. the personal was grate also
chill atmosphere, location is prime, and the staff are unreal - shout out to abbey! i had loads of fun here the week i stayed, and definitely heading back at the end of my trip.

awesome hostel. super friendly staff and a great location. met some really cool people there and had a blast. even though the common room is small it is a great place too meet people and go out and get on it!!! definitely recommend.

looooooveeee this hostel to bits. amazing location right on venice beach. close to everything you need - coffee shops, bars, shops and markets. super friendly and awesome staff who were really helpful on providing all the info you need. we moved to west hollywood for a couple nights but ended up coming back to samesun because of its great atmosphere. will definitely be coming back soon!!

this was like a paradise right on the beach, the views were amazing! they offer awesome nightly activities to check out the city with other cool backpackers. abby was so nice and helpful! i've had such a good experience with the samesun hostels and this one kept up the reputation. clean rooms, fun atmosphere and friendly staff right across the board. thanks samesun!!!
the shower water is cold.  good location and friendly people.
hostel was in an ideal location and the staff/atmosphere were really good

awesome place with perfect location right next to all you need, very clean and quiet in the night.  the good atmosphere was stunning, never experienced that in any other hostel than one of the samesun's yet :)  way better service than what other hostels provide for this amount of money -> value for money: excellent  i would definately recommend it to my friends.
i'd loved it! great location and an intimint atmosphere. i really wanna go back!

you can't beat this place! literally steps away from the boardwalk and the beach:) the hostel was great, the staff were very helpful and you're just steps from the entertainment of the venice beach boardwalk. next time i'm in cali, i'm staying here for sure!

i stayed in a 4 bed room and thought it was good. nice kitchen and good staff. just needed more atmosphere as there's only a small living space. however the huge upside is the location, right in the middle of all the action on venice beach, lots of things to check out. i highly recommend hiring a skateboard or a bike and cruising down ocean ave to santa monica to check out the the pier, or watching local skaters tearing it up at the skate park. i would go back again :)

i didnt have a very good experience in general.  me and my other 3 friends were having our own room. basically the shower was horrible, really cold, we rented towels (paid 2usd each) and they were sooo stinky, also the sheets were smelling really bad.  there was this turkish guy in charge of organizing the limo party, and he was sooooo rude all the time. he left my friends at the first club and they had to go walking to the next one. he was also never really friendly at us.

there needs to be another bathroom or 2, or even just a few extra toilets separate from the showers. the main downfall is that it is quite some distance from downtown la or beverly hills, however there are buses which are $1.50 to get into town. they organise activities and take you out if you want to go.
great spot. staff hooked me up when i really needed. kinda sketchy wifi and cold showers and really thin blanket provided though. other guests a bit lame but not really hostels fault.
pretty good hostel, the area is a little dodgy at night but great by day. only thing missing i would say would've been a computer in the common area.
great location..100 feet from venice beach. my room shower was a little weak but the hall one was fine. nice and clean. would recommend.

a great hostel to meet people, with a good range of organised activities, pub crawls, etc. rooms were clean although we believe one of our party fell victim to bed bugs… however would still go back (with caution) as it's an awesome social hostel and in a great location right on venice boardwalk.
good hostel, but it takes over an hour by bus to get to hollywood boulevard. great location if you want to be close to the beach.

this is a nice chilled out hostel. i stayed here twice. mainly to see the chicks rollerskating in bikinis on the boardwalk.   probably best to come in the spring/summer as the beach will be busier and the hostel rooms can get a bit cold.  but lots to see on the beach and boardwalk or walk along the beach to santa monica.  there is breakfast if you get up before 9am! or you can buy some cherios from a local shop like i did.  area is a bit ghettoy at night but mostly harmless.
great, friendly and supportive staff!

it is a very amazing place.. the staff is more than great, always ready to help:-) i arrive 5 hours before chech in and i didn t need to wait because they give me the room.. i just didn t like the people that were in my room:-(
a bit of a hotel/hostel setup - common areas arent great so the atmosphere is a little lacking. great staff though
really enjoyed my stay! great location on the beach. staff were friendly and helpful, plus we got upgraded for free! good atmosphere and free breakfast is always a plus!
this is a great place to stay while in vience beach :) grab a bike from the rental dude out the front and go riding up and down the bike path , had a blast there :)

such an amazing hostel! i have stayed in all the samesun hostels and they are all fantastic. the location of this one is unbeatable. the staff are super friendly and helpful, sara and abby were awesome! there is great security, the bathrooms are spacious and always clean, rooms are big with great views and the free breakfast is always a plus! i would definitely stay here again!

my girlfriend and i stayed at this hostel and it was absolutely awesome.  first off the hostel is located in a prime location (2 mins to the beach). someone was on the desk 24 hrs which made us feel safe.   the staff themselves were very helpful with all of our questions.  abby i think was the one girl on the desks name (she wore a beanie) told us of a great bar to watch football.  sara who i meet in the bar downstairs (had no clue she worked at the hostel)  was a riot to drink with.

i stayed here for two nights, it was an okay hostel that has the potential to be really great. it is really clean, but overpriced for what it is, for $30 a night it should at least include a free towel and breakfast could be really improved. i know these things sound stupid but details like that are what makes a good hostel great. the best part of the hostel was the comedy night they arranged for us to go to! the staff were really helpful and booked my airport shuttle which was really nice :)

the position of this hostel is great and you can't really fault anything about the place itself. the directions (using coast shuttle) really should be updated as no one at the airport had heard of it an i ended having to pay more for another company. also, the staff were friendly, but not the most helpful. when asked how to get to hollywood, they basically just said it was really far away.. i had to step in and give the guy some actual info. don't let that put you off though!
