the hostel is very well oriented, just in the hottest place of venice. it ok, but not shocking. they've got no parking, but you can easily find a spot nearby (especially during night). i would got there again!
best location, best staff and so much fun. one of the best hostel i've ever stay. i'll never ever stay in another hostel in la!
a bit expensive but worth it. the atmosphere is good and the activities are good.  the rooms are a bit hot.  the location in venice is just perfect.
good wifi, smack up on the beach sidewalk. location is really perfect. good connections into la and helpful staff.
location was great! we had dorm room for 4 people and it was clean and nice!

all seemed good here; it's a perfect place if you're looking to spend time on the beach.  the area seems ok and safe enough, though worth keeping your eyes open when wandering around at night.  the hostel seems a bit of a party place, and sound comes through from the adjoining music venue on occasion - though not for very long, thankfully.  the hostel was a bit hot inside and had a slight odd smell, but it wasn't that big a worry.  overall i was pretty happy with my stay.
the hostel has great views to the beach and great location. events in hostel are also great and perfect for youths.

staff not very knowledgeable and not as friendly as expected in a hostel. common area is quite poor and not very easy to meet people. if it wasn't for the excellent location i would not recommend this hostel at all!

great location for venice beach, my fiancé was very keen to visit muscle beach so ideal location as less than 2 minutes walk away.  we did have an issue with the hot water the first night we stayed there, so cold showers for everybody, but think this was a one off rather a regular problem.

good hostel, good location - only issue for us was the shared bathrooms. we were in a room of 8, there were other rooms on a floor...but only two communal bathrooms. not ideal if someone is showering & you need the toilet, particularly if you are in a rush in the morning.

a great location and really good value for money. the only downside was the limited toilet/showers. 2 single bathrooms on a floor meant that i had 3 days with cold showers...after the room being really cold and staff having no extra blankets it wasn't the best start to a day. other than that no other complaints- comfy beds, friendly staff, well facilitated kitchen and fridge space and very secure. for the price it was gat value- thank you!
the location is amazing, i've never stayed in a hostel with a view of the beach before. the staff were really helpful, and the clubbing tour through hollywood was a lot of fun.
very good hostel. but don't go to the beach front after sunset!

good location for access to the beach, friendly staff.  one frightening incident that ruined the hostel reputation occurred when 2 local teenagers managed to slip past the security cameras and knocked on our dorm door, there is a high crime rate along the venice boardwalk with many tourist being held at gunpoint so be aware. in light o the situation, security measures where implemented immediately and the staff apologised.
everything was great and the entire staff was wonderful.  looking forward to my next stay!

when i arrived, i was nearly not allowed to check in because i did not have my passport.  i've stayed at hostels all over the us for two decades and never once was asked for a passport.  i understand that samesun might have a different policy, but the manager was completely rude and aggressive toward me.  i seriously thought that i would be sleeping on the beach that night.  luckily, there was a shift change and the next person let me check in with my government id.
right on venice beach. only stayed for a stop over but would have been most happy to be there long term. my bedroom window had a view of the ocean.
fantastic location, right on the venice beach, clean, every day activities. i can just recommend:)
had a ball here, great location, great staff, found abbey at the front desk to be very helpful about where to go and what to do etc. p.s go to venice beach ale house!
air con would be ideal however the cost is probably more than its worth so even a $3 standing fan from walmart would be perfect, just for airflow and to keep you a little cooler.

i reserved my 2 rooms 6 mons. prior to my stay,not only did your staff get the reservations wrong,they charged me the price for 4 persons when i reserved for 3 for the 1 room.when i informed the staff of the mistake i was offered a 2 person room ( we were 3) or i could look for a new hotel.i will never set a foot in your hotel again.but i doubt that this interest's you very much.
would not stay here again. was awesome location right at the beach, and staff were helpful but the hostel is a bit dodgy and not very clean.

room was actually hotter than the sun! one fan but didn't do enough to cool the whole space. lockers provided. good common room and kitchen, tv, vending machines, fridges and dedicated beer fridge. right on the beach though our room had a view of the neighbouring bruck wall. staff were full of info-even google and printed bus timetables for us.
loved the place!  awesome vibe with fantastic staff.  fun activities on every night.  great location - can't get any closer to the beach.

good hostel in great spot on venice beach. cheap food and drinks nearby. hostel was basic and common room was big enough for a dozen or so people. was odd i had to pay for a towel ($2) which was tiny and basic... instead of renting... and then at the end of my stay i handed it back for no refund ...?! only 4 shared showers also - which included the toilet ... so had to wait. otherwise great hostel ... perfect for my one night stopover. venice beach amazing..

hostel was in an awesome location above danny's. reception staff let me leave my bags and check in later on, all staff i spoke to were lovely and very helpful. i stayed in a 7 bed en suite room, enough space, good lockers, big wardrobe to keep bags out of the way, lovely big bathroom and windows overlooking venice beach.  all very clean and tidy.
i really enjoyed being here. this is the best place to go, i reccomend this one to everyone who is looking for sg cheap but still awesome place!

the location couldn't have been better. you walk out the front door and you have everything. we even managed to go and see all the touristy things the city offers by booking a tour from the hostel. staff couldn't have been nicer, from the moment we got there we felt welcome. kitchen facilities were poor, only two camping stoves we could use but if you used them at the same time the fuse would blow. plenty cheap restaurants nearby though.
i've spent only one night in this hostel but i can say that it's is located in na good beach. ar night, take care wen you go out out sit because there is a lot of homeless.

stayed here for 5 nights. the location is great. 100 yards to the beach but there are a lots of tourists around with tacky shops. great bars though. very close to santa monica and venice canals. met loads of cool people. no breakfast included though and for the price you are paying you would exspect that.
great location next to beach, in cool area. helpful staff, good facilities. i recommend it
loud, but nice
great place.  abby and staff deserve a raise.u.s. citizens  should need only a picture/photo driver license in place of  a passport  when already in the country to begin with.

great location, just by the beach. had a room with great view over venice beach and the ocean. nice, clean rooms, same with bathroom, hot water. spacious lockers, nice staff. met people from all over the world - can recommend if staying at venice beach!
kitchen far too small, not much kitchen equipment...
some staff were great and on the ball. others seemed stoned!     great place for solo travellers to meet others in the common room
- only two showers and toilets on our floor (toilet in the bathroom so you can't go to the toilet if someone is showering)  - loud music during night at the reception
needs to update on the available parking area. the place the hostel recommended to park overnight says that it will tow away cars for parking beyond midnight.
fun hostel and was easy to meet other travellers. great location right by the beach and in the middle of shops, etc. too expensive for what you get though as i was paying $47 a night in a dorm.

staff is super great! all very nice, warm and friendly... however the other travelers we encountered weren't quite as nice. small rooms with limited to no air movement made nights crazy hot. it's right beside the beach so we put up with it, would probably stay there again and pray that there's some personable travelers staying there.

been a pleasure staying there - staff very helpful getting you from venice to everything you want see.    evening activities offered and at local or near by venues (st. monica, etc)  - you get taken to local free events as well you would not know about otherwise.  day activities offered aswell but who needs them you are in venice

this place was incredible--really glad i stayed here. this area is truly unique and 1 of the most laid back places i've ever visited. all the people i met at the hostel were cool except some friends said 1 girl at the front desk seemed absolutely miserable 90 per cent of the time. i can't imagine they'd make that up, so i didn't think that was cool. aside from that, everything was awesome! everything was so fresh so clean. all samesun locations seem to be excellent facilities. great experience.

great light filled dorm of 4 bunk beds was refreshing to find good solid beds too.  staff were great helpful and friendly the perfect place to arrive too straight from lax to get rid of your jet lag and take on the california vibe !  will recommend this hostel to friends for sure
we had a great time staying at samessun, great spot to bass your to la..
the location was quite good. but the locker in the room was complicated. key part was so tiny i could'nt use.

this hostel is perfect to meet and get to know young people.it is 30 seconds away from the beach and you will love it there for sure! they have events on every night, it is very clean, the stuff is very friendly and open. best hostel at venice!!!
i loved this place. the staff is very friendly and helpful, the location is great and i had an awesome time. i can't wait until the next time i'm back in vb.
not bad..

excellent hostel right on the beach. easy access from the airport and could find free street parking pretty easily. the staff was helpful and courteous. would definitely recommend to anyone and hope to stay again :)

the front desk girl let me in, but she was very indifferent. not a good first impression. checked in and went to my room and was really looking forward to a a shower.no towel on the bed! went down to the girl at the front desk and she said i had to buy one! she could have told me that from the beginning.  the room was ok.the beds were hard. no breakfast. the place was clean though, and location good. i ended up checking out earlier and went to hi santa monica, way better! go there instead!

i really loved the location of the hostel and the bedrooms and bathrooms were very clean. also, sara working the reception was really helpful in recommending me cheap places to eat and have a few beers. all in all i had a great time at your hostel
clean. great staff.  great location

we only stayed for a night, so i can't give the most comprehensive review, since we didn't even use the kitchen or common room. but, everything we did use was definitely up to our standards. we were in a four man dorm, it was nice, clean and spacious, and it had its own bathroom. the area wasn't too loud at night, so we got a good night's sleep. one lady in particular at the front desk was extremely nice, but all the staff we met were friendly. if we go back to venice beach, i'd stay there again

the location of the hostel is perfect if you want to stay on venice. staff was pretty helpful and nice to us. the room was fine. if you are going with a car, there are lots of spots to park (not free though). i will definitely stay here again if i come back to venice beach.

the price is clearly overrated! we were a couple staying in a private room and we had to pay for each head. total $140 per night for a very small, hot and loud room with minimal amenities. it is even more than most motels.

everything was perfect- the staff were super friendly, location is great for people watching/bars/restaurants, met lots of cool people, room was clean and well maintained...it was the best hostel i've ever stayed in. definitely would come back if i ever visit venice beach again.
good vibes, great location bit noisy but your staying on venice beach so that's part of the charm

great hostel! right on the doorstep of venice beach. the staff were friendly, nights out were provided and venice beach is really colorful and busy. i enjoyed my stay and had no complaints about the hostel.

we, mother and daughter, booked the chosen room/beds in 4-bed female dorm more than month before. and was total shock at arrival to the samesun when the receptionist told us that the booked beds were not available. he offered us one bed in 2nd and one bed in 3rd floor...! obvisously an irresponsible person made mistake at our costs. in addition, for solution we were suggested that we convince people to move somewhere else... completely unproffessional, we do not recommend this hostel!

the hostel is located right on the venice boardwalk, which is perfect if you want to experience everything that venice has to offer. close to the beach and to lots of good, cheap eats (try cairo cowboy right across the street!). the staff (especially the night staff) is very friendly and helpful, and they arrange plenty of stuff for their guests to do. this hostel is definitely worth the money, and you're guaranteed to have a great time!

great hostel - brilliant location right on venice beach with a good bar just downstairs under the hostel. great party vibe (there was when i was there on 4th july anyway!) the staff are very good and helpful and there are a few activities like bar crawls organised if you want to join in. very relaxed vibe though - no hard sell and most activities are free.  there are individual bathrooms which are generally clean. good communal area with a great view of the beach. would definitely recommend!

very very basic room for what we paid. 24hr desk service which was good as we checked in really late n checked out really early. good location very close to beach but lots of homeless people around - didn't feel very safe at times. lots of young people around n the staff do pub crawls etc - would be good for singles
it's a nice place to stay! great area and close to the beach
helpful staff and trendy location with nice shops and restaurants around. a bit overpriced though
we had a great stay, the location was great and all the staff w ere really cool.
great hostel, great location! staff really friendly
right on venice beach and clean. nice overall. the ambiance was average. the staff didn't really do much to get people to interact.
only one bathroom with no lock. not fun when you have to take a shower and someone comes in...
great place! only the one night but had an awesome time! great people, heaps to do!! super friendly staff.... highly recommend locking this place in

great location. friendly staff who will help you with any sorts of problem. common-area is cozy with some couches, but should be bigger to fit all guests. events and shuttles to all over california directly from the hostel. i would recommend this place and am definitely coming back.
great place to rest and shower not the place to bask in the lap of luxury. location stellar.

i on,y stayed one night but will definitely return if i go back to venice. the location is perfect, the 4 bed female dorm i stayed in was very clean, comfy beds, great wireless and a great common area that looks out over the beach.

the location is great! right at the beach (i could see the beach from my room). the guy at the reception was super nice and funny. he helps you with everything. the hostel makes it very easy to meet other people, you make new friends very quickly.

hostel is right on the beach so you shall want for nothing as all main bars and restaurants are within walking distance. we were in a 4 person dorm which was standard double beds with lockers in and there are multiple showers dotted throughout the corridors so that was never ran issue. staff were really helpful when needed and there were good people to talk to, if thou are staying in venice beach then this is all the hostel you'll need.
right on the beach so location spot on, only stayed a night but was nice what l saw

generally good. our first room was an 8 bed which was cramped, dark and stuffy, subsequent 7 and 4 bed dorms were much nicer though. the lack of onsite laundry facilities is a pretty big omission, we had to go to a laundrette about a mile away.

we stayed in a private double room with shared bathroom - it had a good tv and a bar fridge and was on the same floor as the kitchen and common room. we were very impressed with the staff, cooking facilities and consideration shown by other guests. the 733 rapid bus to downtown is only two blocks away. a very cheap way to get to the greyhound bus station ($1.50).

the booking for my second night was not seen at samesun hostel so when i came back from disney world at 11pm i had no where to sleep.  thankfully the assistant at samesun hostel sorted it out and upgraded my ro
great great place to stay. reasonably priced, right in the heart of the venice beach boardwalk. it's not too big, so it's easy to mingle with other travellers too and make new friends.
se had a todo stay. location was perfect. we had a prívate room and it was very good. the bed could had been better but it was fine.

cramped dorm and disappointing communal area. staff were obliging but not especially friendly. good security for a mixed area - near the beach but not much else (although thats standard for la) not much to write home about but does the job.
great staff -  great location - cool people. venice's best location

awesome staff and super friendly service. only improvement they could make is having a laundry facility on site but there are some about 15-20 minute walk away. the group pub outings should cater more towards budget minded travellers...it is a hostel after all.

we stayed on the top floor in a private room at this hostel. it was all clean and tidy, staff where nice. id say it was a clean nice basic hostel, no bar or anything like that, although there is a bar right next door. the only bad thing i would say is on the top floor while i was there the wifi would drop in and out all of the time. but overall a nice place to stay.

great hostel. we had a room of 4 with a very nice view on the beach :)  the bathroom was clean, the kitchen is big and convenient, the common room is nice.  it's a great location if you wanna go to the beach. i definitly recomand this hostel.

right next to venice beach (and all the homeless people that sleep there), above a reasonably good bar/restaurant, but very far from the centre of la. expect a 1.5 - 2 hour multiple bus journey to get to hollywood boulevard. 24 hour, friendly staff and a good size kitchen.
amazing experience got to meet some great people

i just came back from my vacation, it was awsome! i spend 11 days at samesun hostel in venice beach, i ve met a really nice roommates there and i hope that we will keep in touch. this hostel is may be the only one which is so close to the beach, facing the ocean.   if you go surfing just grab your surfboard and go its 3 min, surf, bicycle and skateboard rent is at the next door with 10% discount for those who stay in samesun.   also there is a nice bar with good sandwiches and live music downstair

very good location, big, clean rooms and very friendly and helpful stuff (especially ricky!). the hostel is located in venice beach so it's easy to go around. you can also take the bus. there's no breakfast and the kitchen is kind of small, but they also have big common room, where you can hang out with others. i suggest this hostel to everyone!
good stay here, the place is clean, you can't have a better location an aby (or amy) and chris are awesome! thank you guys for your cheerfulness ;-) it's a pity there is no breakfast and no lockers.

i've been going to this hostel for years now, back in the days when it was called venice beach cotel , but i have to say   since then it only got better now, it's even more cleaner then before , service is awesome as usual and they have free wifi which they didn't have before .  so , if you wanna stay in los angeles , go to samesun venice beach
location was great but they didn't have any lockers and only has 4 toilets/shower
nice clean hostel, location is great. showers were often out of hot water. the hostel really needs a bigger social area. people tended to sit in their rooms too much.

the place is really tacky but its very well located. it's kinda old too. don't expect a real hostel experience because the atmosphere for interaction with other people just doesn't happend there. it's a good price for a perfect location and a clean room. nothing more than that. i would advise couples to go some place else.
excellent location and staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. a must stay if in la
the room we booked was not the room we were given, not impressed!
creepy, noisy! dirty, 1 shower for the entire floor....... don't go. i've been in hundreds of hostels around the world and this is one of the worst by far
available team  friendly atmosphere  clean room  perfect place  just some problems to book room

very uncomplicated stay and staff were friendly most of the time. good that outside guests are not allowed in the hostel given the location. full sized lockers for bags in the rooms would be a useful addition especially in dorms.
staff there were kind to me. i want to stay here again!
always a good option when in la
staff were super helpful and you cannot beat the location, 30 seconds walk to the beach. common areas were quite small apart from that this place is great! highly recommended.
the hostel doesn't have laundry, if you need one you need to take a bus or walk almost 25 minutes.
brilliant stay, perfect location, helpful staff. clean room, good facilities and again the location is absolutely perfect. lockers in rooms and a very secure front entrance, brilliant overall!
hostel is ok just if you have to sleep and anything else

we arrived late and checked-out very soon next day. so we didn't see a lot of the hostels. double room was very small and old. staff seemed not to be very motivated. but the location is just great to hang out at the beach.
no 2 bad!!

the only thing great about samesun is it's location as you are literally on the boardwalk all hotels in the area are expensive and even some of the hostels are more that what you'd pay on average. but i believe that's how this hostel gets you; they take advantage of kids traveling on a budget and therefore assume you don't expect much. i've stayed in hostels all over the world and i am actually surprised at how high the rating is at this one. also- americans: don't forget your passport!
great location and friendly staff
room smelled badly, not really clean, dark (just small window), bathroom not clean
the hostel isn't finished yet. will be good once they set it up.
i loved it!

it was in a good location, right on venice beach. area seemed a little dodgy at night but day time was good. staff were friendly and helpful. the limo experience was fun and well worth $40. the beds were pretty comfy but the blankets were thin and one that i was given was so old it felt like an old towel, so was quite cold most nights. other than that great hostel :)
i met lots of cool people here. it was secure and comfortable.

fantastic location right in the heart of venice beach. staff were fantastic. there were friendly and knowledgeable about what to do and where to go in la. will be definitely staying again next time i am in venice beach.
staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. great clean hostel in a perfect location.

there was a mixup with my booking so i was upgraded to a better room. staff were really friendly and helpful.   security was very good, i felt very safe there. really enjoyed my stay and would definitely recommend and stay again.
the holstel could have restrooms inside the bedroom.

we realy enjoyed our stay at the samesun in venice. i have stayed in many samesuns and there always great  (vancouver, banff, revalstoke) the staff are always helpful and there is always fun to be had if your looking for it. the bathrooms were private witch was nice and they were kept very clean, they could get a little busy in the morning as there was only two on each floor. they have the best location right in the centre of venice beach.
samesun delivers again, awesome hostel. awesome location right in the heart of venice beach. security is great but it does also mean you cant have guests in the hostel which sucks a bit.
great stay here! very friendly, and informative staff.
great value for money!  but the lockers were missing..
had a lot of fun at this hostel and met some great people.  loved the location being so close to the beach.  awesome staff who helped me plan my days to the max.  will be back for sure!
this place is awesome!  great location, a stones throw away from the beach.  great, friendly staff that are very helpful.  could not have asked for a better place to stay.  will definitely be back.

the location is really awesome - near the beach and close to restaurants and bars. the staff was very cool and friendly. could have used a private bathroom, but everything was nice and clean! will definitely stay there again of i'm ever in la again + recommend it to others

the experience was fantastic. you are right at the beach, and within walking distance (200 meters) of many charming little restaurant s and bars. the staff glowed with positive, helpful energy, and took a personal interest in every person who came to the front desk. the beds were comfortable, and everything was clean. the guests were kind and not scary.   i can't  adequately express how pleased i am with my experience of samesun venice beach. keep up the great work!

so international! i met guys from america, italy, german, new zealand, australia, canada, hungary, switzerland, britain, and finland. i am sure you will have a special experience. if i have a chance again, i will definitely stay at the hostel.

my boyfriend and i stayed for 3 nights in the 3 bedroom dorm! it was a good size and had a tv! the main problem was it smelt like sewerage. i didn't complain at the time as i didn't want to whinge but just warning others not to book that room! also two out of the three beds were terrible they sounded like they were going to fall apart everytime someone moved and the springs were all poking out! luckily i got the comfy bed but my poor boyfriend had a hard time! all round it's an ok hostel!

samesun is a funny little hostel, it's quirky and weird. i stayed in a 7bed dorm with en-suite. the bed was okay and had clean sheets. the bathroom was clean but the shower only seemed to have a fixed temp of 'cool'. the hostel could of definatley been better organised as they could handle many check-in's, but they did say they had just got a new system. it's in a prime location next to the broadwalk but also next to all the prime weirdo's from venice, but they have a good security door.

great location, and although we could understand why some people felt uncomfortable due to the homeless people, the area actually felt pretty safe to us. room was great, maids are always around so you know it's clean! although we didn't take part as i was under 21,a lot of the activities such as a club night in hollywood seemed like a good idea :) free wifi was a big bonus. tip if you want to rent a bike go to the one right next to the hostel and tell them you're staying there for a discount!
great place to stay when in venice beach. short walk/bike ride to santa monica. staff friendly & very helpful. definitely will be back!!

a large hostel but very clean.  if you like venice this is the perfect location.  many people will not like the area venice.  no breakfast :(    this location is right on the beach, you can't get closer.  also be sure to ask for a basketball and shoot some hoops at venice beach.

second time i have stayed here and i loved it just as much. it is right on the beach and a short bus trip to santa monica. venice beach is an extremely vibrant area, but it is an 40 minute or so bus trip into hollywood blvd. the buses a fairly regular and cost very little. the hostel itself wasn't rowdy at all and provided a great place to sleep.
hard beds, hot water runs out to quick, 4 people in a room can't take a hot shower after each other since hot water runs out.  good location though, and safe..
i was bitten by bed bugs and in my four days there, was lucky enough to get only one hot shower. all other showers were either cold or luke warm.
i like the atmosphere in the hostel, people are so nice here, and we can have our valuables deposited. however, the light in the room is a little bit too dim, at least for the room that i stayed in.

this hostel is wonderful. i enjoyed my time there very much. the manager mrs. sara is a wonderful person, and she make all time the right decissions. her team is very friendly. it is super clean everywhere in the house.  i like to come back and recommend this place to stay !!!!
pros : it's close to a beautiful beach  it's cheap    cons: smell in the room  no lockers  no bike parking  no breakfast  very few showers
top location, friendly staff, great atmosphere. can't wait to go back!
great location, friendly staff and weekend pub crawls were awesome.
the location was sickkkkkkk. also close to the beach and heaps of vegan restaurants

the hostel was excellent, the staff were nice, the facilities were very good. the only problem was the location. venice beach at night is terrible, there is nothing to do, too many homeless people and you don't feel safe walking around there at night. moreover, public transport to other places takes too long.
cool place, good location, good staff.
great location and friendly, helpful staff
this was a terrible hostel on many levels, recommend anywhere but here

brillant stay at venice cotel so well located!ambiance is brillant, should have staid longer...pub crawling is cool too and staff very friendly as well. only problem is no laundries but appart from that everyhing is perfect!    loved the aussies there, holy if you read me mizou@outlook.com
good value hostel. everything you need and literally steps from the sand. there wasn't much of an atmosphere in the hostel but they do nights out and group activities

the staff were not friendly at all, except for one girl when i arrived she helped me find my credit card. management of a small situation was dealt with poorly, a staff member came storming into the room at 1030pm demanding a lady get out of the bottom bunk as it had supposedly been reserved. just was very rude.
great place to stay on the beach, chilled vibe, couldn't really ask for more .. maybe less aussies ! haha

this hostel is the best i've ever been its clean and nice and the stuff is awesome. don't forget this amazing place!! i defiantly coming back and i just can recommend it to everyone who love the beach and awesome people.

this hostel is great the staff are super friendly and helpful. the hostel is located right on the venice boardwalk right near the venice sign. i didn't feel safe walking around at night in this area but if your into surfing and the whole beach lifestyle its perfect. the only issues with the hostel is that there is no elevator so i had to drag two huge suitcases up 3 flights of stairs, but other than that a great place to stay. venice is far from everything i would suggest hiring a car.
the hostel was clean and well located and most of the staff were friendly and very helpful, apart from one blonde woman who was incredibly unfriendly and unhelpful.

i stayed in the cotel for three nights and really liked it. the staff was friendly and helpful, the room was clean and the view on the beach is priceless! the hostel is in a great location if you like to stay at the beach. venice beach is awesome!  i would definitely come back. :-)
had a lovely stay at venice beach cotel!! the staff was great, it was clean and not too expensive. i absolutely loved every minute of my stay here, will be back for sure!!!
it was awesome as usual and i didn't want to leave.. hope i'll be back there again next year :)

this place is incredible!   we lobbed in from oz after a 18-hour flight & were so happy we found this place!  its right on the beach, just 100m from muscle beach. you can walk along the beach down to santa monica   the staff wer all great, especially nikki!!  they even organised some of the other people to have a little get together, we watched lakers game on the tv & had a few drinks & then they took us out to a local bar.   we will be going back!  its a $13pp shuttle or 2 busses from lax

staff was great even new staff but some look bored so dnt smile and you feel they re rude when they re not rooms are huge n clean so its cool n the location is the best one in venise i think luggage room was open all time just should be locker but in average its the spot

i booked a spot but was not allowed to check in because i was not carrying my passport. i was on vacation with no intention of leaving the country, i had my drivers license, my plane ticket stubs, and other information to prove i was a valid traveler, but they unapologetically turned me down at 10:30 p.m. then got impatient when i asked about hotels near by. i asked if i could use their internet to book somewhere else. "no." i was turned out onto the street, late, and charged a booking fee.
dont put "free parking" on the website unless you actually have parking.  finding parking on the street was really hard and a real detriment from me staying longer.
just stayed one night (thursday), clean, good staff, they take you to the closest bar in the proximity with the other traveller of the hostel, good way to meet people and have good time.
amazing location within steps of the beach, great weather which made the stay even better and there bunk beds were pretty good to.

well.. im not the one that normally complain easily.. im usually satisfied as long as people are happy and nice..the staff seriously needs to be changed, never seen so grumpy mood!! dont ask twice, if u dont hear them!!  the location is great , right at the beach! really nice suring the day!.. but..! as soon as it gets dark..do not go alone anywhere!!! specially girls alone!! 3 episodes with guys while i was there! sooo many crazy people there!!  kitchen closes at 12pm, and not open before 8am.
definitely needs more bathrooms, or at least detached toilets. two per floor is insufficient!

i only stayed one night but they had a very smooth and well operated hostel going here. the room was 4 bed dorm and was the cleanest i've ever stayed in. so was the bathroom. there was a shared kitchen with all facilities needed to cook and store your stuff. this hostel i would recommend for sure. as the location is fit on venice beach and security is very good.
great hostel, very clean, nice rooms with nice bunks. best location!!
very nice place and great staff. quick to check in and check out, and very close to bus stop that'll get you all around la. simple and hassle-free place to stay :)
best hostel experience i have ever had!
had a very nice time at the venice beach cotel. the staffs were very nice and i felt safe. one bad point is that they just open the community room at 8 pm and close it at 11 pm.
this hostel is really good, the location is amazing!!  but the kitchen is ridiculous, you have just two hotplates and you need 30 minutes  to boil your water... it's hotplate for camping!
great location, good security at the front door but no lockers if that worries you. 24 reception.

great location but that's it! one of the worst hostels i've ever stayed in. no air conditioning in the room, was like a sauna! expensive for a hostel considering kitchen was so basic, no proper cooker! there's no free parking, they are reffering to residents parking on the road 10 minute walk away which you have to compete for during street cleaning days. all our fresh food got thrown away in the fridge even tho it was labelled, staff were rude didn't even apoligise. find somewhere else.
perfect location and very friemdly staff!  my favourite place i've stayed in calafornia.

it was a nice clean hostel. they were changing sheets and towels everyday, but there were no lockers in the rooms, and no breakfast included. the location was really good, just next to the beach, but the price is still bigger then what you get.
no aircondition and no windows, i felt like in prison or even worse.
check out the front desk for the social events.
i loved the fact that i was there alone but felt tike i wasn't. the group activities at night that's a perfect option to meet people and have  fun!
was not happy with that place

i had booked a bed in a women's room when i arrived there i received a key for a mixed room. the girl that works in the front desk was worried about our insatisfaction, so, she gaved us a upgrad (free) to stay in a room only with women. it was very good for us. another point is that you need to climb 2 flights of stairs, which complicates because we had 2 pieces of luggage, each person. it was good because i stayed only during 1 night. next time i'll prefer book a hostel in santa monica.
this is the best location you can find in venice beach!!! we could see the ocean from our room. what more can you ask for? also the staff was so nice. thanks abby!!! you made my night!
very hot inside, hear all the noise outside, lots of parking nearby which is good and free parking close by.
the location is great if you want to enjoy the beach, but if you're looking for nightclubs and pubs, during the week the region is calm by the night. this is not a party hostel.

very helpful, great staff and location.  free street parking.  let down by poor character & atmosphere at hostel.  no locker in my room either, but at least staff have to buzz in guests manually each time.  no a/c as well, room was very warm.  lounge is teeny tiny and cramped.  hostel is super simple, with so many rooms and just two bathrooms per floor.  i won't stay again.  no fun at all.  no place to chill out except in computer room & kitchen.  not very welcoming vibe.  bland and sterile.
no breakfast, to expensive, dirty bathrooms, but located directly on the beach
great place to stay with an amazing location.. the staff were fantastic. can i suggest lockers in the rooms please??
great location but regarding the too hot room with window to a funnel a somehow absurd value for the money

two of the three staff i encountered we're great; made me feel welcomed and safe, but the one person seems kind of grumpy and spoiled it for the rest of the staff, in terms i my rating. but i had a good stay and the gal who was cleaning really seemed to keep the place looking clean -in spite of the condition of what she was working with.
very nice hostel with a good location.  however, only 2 showers by floor is far from being enough ! and the common room is a bit too small to rally people there.
having a lounge that is accessible at any hour (even after people have left to go waste their money at the bar) would be appreciated.
clean. excellent location right on beach boardwalk, close to shops skate park and surf. friendly staff.
the hostel was great, on the beach, the staff were really nice and always helpful
great hostel, brilliant location, helpful staff . besides the limited bathrooms and no accon in dorms. it is an awesome hostel.

great place to party and to meet new friends. also surprisingly quiet at night. best of both worlds. staff is awesome. they even paid for my taxi to the airport when the shuttle company lost my reservation! would definitely go back. remind me to bring chokotoffs!
fun place to stay right in the middle of venice beach. nice and clean, and the staff were great.

awesom stay, loved every minute of it ! great location, great staff, great people to make the best atmosphere ever! thanks! best part : evening activities permitting everyone to meat! place to recommend!!!!!

the hostel was really good, nice rooms, nice bathroom and clean kitchen. the staff organized a pizza night and then we all went aout to a bar a few blocks away.   the only issue was the price (almost 50 bucks). i've been in many hostels for the half of the money and much better facilities, location & breakfast. anyway, still recommend it.   btw, is the one in the corner of venice with the beach, there is another venice hostel one block before that is horrible.
best location for seeing the freaks on venice beach good hostel over all. they have a bar that serves you your own beer! a nice touch
i had a great time there but there are limited toilets and showers which is annoying

i was pleseantly surprised. this is a fantastic hostel, although i had some doubts about the location, it was a lot quieter than i thought (though i wasnt there over a weekend. it is a long way from most of the major la attractions though, be warned it takes at least an hour to get downtown or to hollywood form venice. if that doesn't bother you, then this hostel is great value for money!

the hostel was amazing,. all the staff were very helpful, had a great party vibe. the room was very clean and the bathrooms were in great condition. i would go and stay there again. was the best hostel i have stayed at in the states. met alot of nice travellers there and hang out with them. :)
everything was perfect!
really good athmosphere. perfect for young poeple

where to start... the hostel is in a decent spot of you want to stay at venice beach, but don't its really more of a day trip thing it's dirty, unsafe, but touristy. the hostel itself is dirty and very tired, the place is falling apart and desperately needs a/c, you can get by with the window open but you have to close it at night since its so loud outside with the club next to it. also this hostel has no culture, in short it's boring... since its boring and falling apart it really has nothing!
great location, the staff were nice, and the dorm was fine.
i don't really have anything to complain about, except maybe that it's a bit far from central la, but that's sort of implied if you choose to stay in venice beach...
great stay. kerry and abbey were spot on hosts. place was kept clean and the hostel activities were fun and enjoyable.
staff is so friendly and helped to everything. there is no elevator so it was a problem and facilities are old. but its really good hostel. you have to choose that one !

the venice beach cotel is in almost every category a very good hostel. they have events every evening, the stuff is very good and it's easy to meet people. only a few more bathrooms and a cheaper rate or included breakfast wouldn't hurt. but besides that i can really recommend it and the location is just insanely good.
i really enjoyed my stay here. great location and friendly staff. the dorms are pretty basic but clean and decent facilities.
i liked the room. it was nice and clean. the bathroom was new.
very good staff, great location and pretty clean
i freakin loved venice beach and the hostel was so close. the hostel is also pretty nice but a bit expensive ;)
the location of this hostel is fantastic! clean room, friendly staff and a good atmosphere. a few more shared bathrooms wouldnt go a miss, but other than that was great.
best place to stay in venice!!!!!   * amazing staff and good location : )    thanks guys    duda

the kitchen was very small and very basic along with common area. the bathrooms were nice and bedrooms however more bathrooms needed. reception staff at times on the verge of being rude to their paying customers however some were helpfully. free library very nice touch. location makes up for everything.
nick and i had the best time at venice beach cotel.   the staff were amazing, so helpful and abby was an absolute star! such a good experience and we will be back to stay there in the near future!
they need a reform in the bedrooms infrastructure… bad mattresses and lockers and windows… the rest of it is very ok!

only stayed one night on my way back to the uk from nz -- loacted dead near to the beach, you really couldn't ask for a better location. was rather quiet when i was there, so no problems with noise. seemed a good place to meet other travellers. staff were friendly, facilities were clean, etc.    worth staying at!
fun and friendly
great fun! a real party hostel!
great hostel, in the best location ever, right on the beach. our dorm window looked right onto the beach and all the happenings on the street. super cool.
great location right on the front walk, well organized and clean. not exactly cheap but worth the money
great hostel. great location. great staff. clean towels every day. guest night outs every night. could not recommend more highly.

excellent location & super fun staff. two friends & i stayed here in a three person private room - which was a double bed & the third one of us was on a pretty dingy stretcher bed.  together with a whole lot of other guests & a lovely girl from the hostel named dora, had a crazy fun night out on the town. the place has top security too and almost right on the beach.

it was very tatty but clean, the double bed was very small- all that was bearable but the noise coming from the hostel's heating/air conditioning machine was unbearable- it went on all night, droning far too loud to be healthy- we should have made some more fuss and got a refund.

the public transport is very convient in the area. we could catch a bus to santa monia which was a beautiful town, or a bus to beverly hills and hollywood easily. the public bus to the airport is only 15 mins away and you can catch a local blue or green bus to that very cheaply. the location was really the only reason we stayed here and other than that we didn't see a whole lot to do in the area. the best thing was the great pub and resturant downstairs. it had cheap food and live music.

helpful staff, clean bathroom, excellent location. room smelt a little strange and the bed was a little uncomfortable but for the price it was fine. it would have been nice if the kitchen opened earlier, the day we left we couldn't eat breakfast because the 'kitchen was closed' and from what we could tell that meant the door stayed closed 'just because', a little annoying.

venice beach cotel is a charming hostel-cum-hotel. we stayed in a private room and were very comfortable. price is very high, but unfortunately this is normal for the venice beach area, and the distinguishing factor for us was access to a kitchen, which is clean and well-kept (although the electric hobs did not work amazingly well). venice beach itself is definitely one of the nicer and more interesting places to stay in the la area, so also recommend the cotel for that too.

stayed in a private room with two friends. room was clean and so was shared bathroom. excellent location! couldn't have asked for a better spot, especially for that price!!! staff was helpful and friendly!
very good, near the beach

a big thank you to the lovely venice beach cotel for showing us such a good time!!  had a dorm room with a view of the ocean and a restroom that was always clean.  unbeatable location on the beach, so many things to see and do.  the staff were so accommodating and friendly, we had a great night out with abby and some of the other guests.  we will be back!

its right next to a really beautiful beach. after hearing some of the reviews i was really worried that this place was going to be horrible. even my taxi driver was trying to talk me out of going here. i have no idea why. the room was clean and i only had to share a bathroom with two other people. it was also near a good selection of food and cafes.
awesome staff and awesome spot. i would like to see more recycling there though. the communal shopping baskets are a great idea, but eco bags are probably more convenient. cheers

we stayed for 2 nights in february 2012. we arrived at about 8am and were told we could check in which was great. we were also given a free upgrade to a room with a view. the room was basic but ok, the bed however was very sqeaky and there was a constant dripping noise in the room. the staff were all friendly and we had a a great night around a few local bars with joe. for the price we would stay again as the area is pretty cool.

extremely happy with my stay. a lot of character in a great location..the hostel had a very cali feel about it. the staff were very friendly and the rooms were more then comfortable. highly recommend this for anyone looking for a good time and to meet new people
all the staff was amazing! we had a great time because of them!
rally cool hostel with friendly staff, great location and a check-out @ 12pm which is awesome.   all in all an awesome place.
it smelled like pee in our room - it might be a strange cleaning product !?
i didn't feel safe to to go out of the hostel at night. during the day, location is perfect. even to use wi-fi internet you have to pay- first hostel i stay  that charges for this. good overall
staff was very helpfull at all times requested. location is cool, in front of the beach! but, depending on the day, there are not too much stuff to do around.
excellent place to stay, nice and helpfull guys on staff, excellent location, just some steps from beach

staff were not very helpful, nor were they happy or nice. our room was dirty, bathroom was dirty and even though the webpage said that the hostel had blow driers, there weren't any the first night. our room was freezing cold because of the airconditioning, which was impossible to turn off. we had only sheets and a thin, brown blanket so we all got sick after the first night. there was also a very annoying sound coming from the window. not going back, ever.
room smelt like babies nappies

i cannot speak highly enough of the cotel. right on the beach, ocean view, in a beautiful building with murals on both sides. the staff was friendly, helpful, and really made me as a first time hostel visitor feel totally comfortable. facilities were great, atmosphere invited meeting other guests and hanging out. totally changed my mind about what a hostel could be. have to mention the staff one more time, young, hip, and helpful. you must try this place!

i was only there for one night, but it was great. the staff helped me arrange shuttles to the airport. the location was perfect to walk along the beach and along the boardwalk. i felt safe, the bathrooms were clean, and i was lucky enough to get great roommates in my room. i will definitely stay there next time i'm in venice. :)
if you want to stay in venice beach this is the place to go.

i only stayed at the venice beach cotel for one night but i was not at all impressed. i have no comments on the activities etc as i wasn't there for long enough to take part. my issue came from the room itself. i spent a month travelling through the us and the bed in venice beach was the most uncomfortable of my trip. i could feel the springs all night long. the dorm also seemed to have no source of heat and when i woke up at 1am freezing, the thin blanket provided was just no sufficient.
the best hostel i've been so far.
awesome hostel in the best location ever!!!!!!!!!!!!
pricey due to location, but a good hostel nonetheless. clean, secure and places to sit and relax.

this hostel looks like a lot of fun but it's actually a little bit bland, not bad really but then there doesn't seem to be much to choose from in la! the rooms are a good size, not quite enough bathrooms, staff are nice and good to chat to! venice beach is hilarious but not the safest if you're travelling alone, as a girl on my own didn't feel safe to do so after dark. met a really nice homeless guy called mike though!
we had a great time there and have been well supported by excellent, friendly staff!
friendly and helpful staff, security conscious.
had a great time at the cotel - staff on the front desk were awesome. venice beach is such a great place, would definitely stay in the cotel in an instant. thanks.

if your heading to la then venice beach cotel is the place to be. the location is a good spot to base yourself with hollywood and beverly hills not to far away(everything is far away from each other in la). you can rent yourself a bike or longboard for the day and cruise the beach path all the way to santa monica, which is another amazing part of la. all the staff were unreal, going above and beyond to make their guests feel at home. i'd go straight back next time i'm there.
staff were welcoming and threw a party for the festive season.  good location and staff  helpful in assisting you to get around.
really good place, only downside is there is no free wifi/internet.
enjoyed my stay overall.  the staff was good and fun and the location right on the boardwalk was great. the only complaint i had was having to pay for internet.
clean bathrooms and great security. what more can you ask for. thanks : )
great stay. ideal location right by venice beach. good atmosphere in the evenings with kerry and the staff drinking with you in the lounge. would stay here again for sure. rich, england
great staff, would go back in a heartbeat!

a nice place to stay if you like to live on the beach, also close to santa monica and the airport. just be aware that going to the city is either very expensive with taxi, or takes a long time with bus (at least one hour with a transfer). clean toilet/shower and common area. one big drawback is the expensive wifi access, and a bit far to closest supermarket.
only negative was that there were no individual lockers in the rooms.
geat viiew of the beach from our triple room window. soclose to venice beach.

overall the venice beach cotel was a fun environment. it is only steps away from the beach and boardwalk. the bus line to take you to downtown la or santa monica is only a few blocks walk from the hostel. there is a great restaurant bar below called danny's with live bands in the evening. the employees are friendly and welcoming as well as knowledgeable of the area. security is great as well, although there are not individual lockers to put your things in. i was impressed by the cleanliness.
good hostel. expensive (but that is more a la thing). staff were very friendly and helpful which is most important.

the transportation information about bus is not correct, no free internet computer. the stuff is not clear how to transfter from venice to san fransico,  unlike s,f hostell   can order shuttle for us very passion. but i think they are still nice   if they could provide breakfast, that will be welcomed

the hostel is in a very good location right on the beach and by venice board walk, the hostel in itself is very average nothing fancy, could do with a good make over, view from my room was a wall, the bed was okay and good space in the room, the blanket felt a bit dirty. location was great, the rest was average. staff was friendly and helpful with transportation info. i could stay here again.
the stuffs are really friendly and helpful. as i only stayed one night, i can't give other comments.

this hostel was amazing! i read reviews to say it was great and it truly was. i traveled  my own and i felt so comfortable. i had problems with my shuttle from the airport so i called the  hostel and they were straight onto it, they helped me with every question. it was a great location i had a beautiful view of the beach. you get clean sheets everyday. security is great as they only let peope who are staying at the hostel in so you never get randoms, was a great place. x
great hostel. lovely staff. great location!
great hostel! staff were exceptional. my advise if your going in the winter months go over a weekend. you won't regret it

great party hostel. everyone there, looking to have a good time. being in venice means you are out the hussle ad bussle and down near the beach. means buses into hollywood and stuff take over an hour but it's much better being able to escape to the beach
the owner was soo friendly! she invited us to party with her, and let us pay separately. the hostel was in a great location with awesome ocean views. 5 stars.
great location in an historic building directly on the beach. the manager is fabulous, fun and friendly, great atmosphere. highly recommend! thanks!  christian
staff were fantastic.  very helpful bunch and lots of fun. would definitely recommend!
good location, easily accessble by public bus (30min) which is cheaper than offered shuttle service ($2.50). rooms are ok and clean, some offer "free" wifi from the below pub.

the staff was extremely nice and personable, but sadly that didn't quite make up for the lack of cleanliness or the overwhelming feeling that something bad had happened in our room years before we got there.  it's a great location, but i don't think i would stay here again.

the location is really priceless, the staff at the reception were really nice and helpful. they were very accommodating as i arrived too early for my check-in and asked to store luggage, get a towel and call a shuttle for a friend who was not staying in the hostel. if you are looking for a guided tour of l.a., i would not recommend the one that they offer you in the hostel (at least not the one l.a. by night). it is not the hostel's fault though! the company offering the tourjust wasn't too good
the whole place could have done with a fresh coat of paint, but it was clean, cheap and friendly. plus the women's dorm i was staying in had a beautiful sea view!
fantastic staff / great location - perfect a+++

the staff were very friendly and keen to help. the area seems intimidating when you first get there, but is actually quite safe and wonderful to watch. the atmosphere on the beac was just amazing. there is also cheap transportation. dry close by, although it does take almost 40 minutes to get into hollywood.

the location here was excellent, right on the beach. it was clean and the staff were really helpful.    the wifi is paid and not great but there are starbucks and other wifi places within walking distance that have good free wifi. the kitchen is not amazing (stove consists of two portable electric burners), but if you are not doing anything to complex or just doing breakfast and microwave stuff it is good.    i definitely recommend staying here for the location and cleanliness alone.

well i just stayed in venice beach cotel for three nights! and i really enjoyed it!   very friendly and helpfull stuff! no matter what question i had they helped me to find an answer!  very clean for a hostel that hosts so many people! (2 bathrooms for one floor is not many, but okay).  directly located at the beach and free parinking in the direct neighbourhood (staff is very helpfull there)!  security could be improoved (no lockers in my room, had to / could leave my stuff at the reception...).

for me this was the best hostel i have staying in in a long time!  it is functional and super clean, the location is great, though venice is a little sketchy at night so the good security on the hostel door was very reassuring. the staff are lovely, i felt safe and happy there, i would defo go back.
frigin insane time t the venice beach cotel. staff were great and helpfull. met some great guys and girls. deffo good time. would be nice to have a big locker but no worries!
awesome crew of people, really secure, great location, heaps of fun.
only downside was that you had to pay for wireless internet. in this day and age wireless really should be free at a hostel

the staff taks a very good care of their guests and try to make everyone  feel like home - or somethink like that ;-) what i liked most was  that everybody can hang out at the bar in the evenings und that people that seemed strange were not allowed as guests.  especially for backpacker it is a great place to stay.

unfortunate they didnt have free wifi, but you could use the restaurant downstairs, so more of an inconvenience.  staff were really helpful and had great personalities and were super helpful with any navigational questions. generally good time.  laundry mat is quite far away
good hostel, great position, enjoyed the beach and all of the characters wandering around and living in the area.

i enjoyed my stay at the cotel, the area is slightly dodgy and i didn't go out after dark but everywhere in venice beach is the same, you just need to have your wits about you. the hostel itself was pleasant and i recommend the tour of hollywood if you've got limited time too.
perfect every-thing a+++
very good hostel, clean and safe, directly located at venice beach. staff was very helpful. only minus: they charge $7 per day for wi-fi.
fun, friendly hostel with staff that go out of their way to please. situated right on the beach. very clean, they even changed my sheets with crisp new ones every day of my stay. highly recommended.
great atmosphere and staff, great location to venice beach and a nice hostel to stay in.

the staff were wonderful & everyone was encouraged to meet in the lounge in the evenings to have a few drinks & get to know all the other people staying there & after we would go out as a group to the surrounding entertainment venues which is great esp if you're travelling alone.its right on the beach & the markets & food stands are right there. the rooms & bathrooms were clean & rooms had lockers(you just had to provide the lock & key) i made alot of new friends & would def return.

have to buy for 2 person to have a single room and impossible to have guest....  room done but not fully. really noisy. not on the best place(as soon as you go out, you're in front of homeless people and their putbull...). i don't think i'll come back one day...

pretty good hostel... great location right on venice beach, good vibe and common room. rooms were hit and miss though - some were large and airy though the one we stayed in (3 bed mixed dorm) was tiny, stuffy and smelly... air didn't circulate at all. bathrooms were okay and quite clean. staff super bubbly and helpful. would be great if the internet was free... you even have to pay for wifi which is a huge pain.  would probably stay again.

there was no free wifi, however you you can buy for a reasonable price.  the rooms were large (4 bed female dorm) with own sink which was good  there was a lack of shared showers, which was disappointing but actually didnt prove to be a problem  overall the inside of the hostel is better than looking at it from the outside  free off street parking a short walk away as well which was a bonus.

this is one of the best hostels i've stayed in. the staff is super friendly, the location is awesome and you meet great  people. just walking down venice beach is a relaxing experience, one see so much people from different backgrounds that enriches your own. so bad i had to left earlier than expected !!!    kerry, keep it up. much love for you and your people  !!!    hector
staff were awesome and in the best location!!! great place to either get legless and party or chillax :)
it is perfect if you want enjoy venice life!
very cool hostel. big rooms, clean, very friendly staff!!! go there!!!
really nice hostel but very the room was very hot and stuffy, could do with some air conditioning!!
awesome hostel, well-located, easy to meet people, clean... the staff was really friendly and helpful. on the down side, it's a little expensive.

i had the greatest time at the venice beach cotel. the location doesn't get any better. the staff were always helpful and the atmosphere was very loving and personal. i will definately recommend the cotel. thanks again for a super fun stay.

epic location, don't bother with the rest of hell a  venice beach has more characters and colours and fun then the rest of the city combined. hostel is right on the beach, has a bar which serves your drinks you buy from a general store (cheap). cool staff, cool people, rad area.
the internet is not free, very expensive! also wifi for laptops.
good hostel very fun

have just come back from a trip round the world including russia, china, japan, korea and lots of america.  this place was the worst i stayed in.  the whole area was very dangerous and very depressing.  the hostel was ok.  and i have stayed in a lot.  but not one that had noisy parties most nights til well gone midnight like this one.  definitely not the place for a brit of my age.
thank you for everything, it is the best hostel ive ever stayed in= ))
perfect place for exploring venice beach!
great location. nice, friendly staff.
free bar inside the hostel, best location a hostel could be. very nice stuff and a great place to meet people.
a great place to stay!

the hostel has an excellent location, just on the beach. in fact, i could see the beach and the sea from the room. it was quite clean and the staff was very friendly. there is a bar with a good atmosphere where every night people can meet and socialise. no wifi, no internet - that´s a pitty. good place to stay!
the best location ever! right at venice beach and near to santa monica. (the best area in l.a. anyway!) met very cool people there. it's clean and the rooms are nice.
an elevator would have been a huge plus.
this hostel overcharged me 72$ without any explanation. sent them 3 emails to ask but no feedback!

one of the worst hostels i've ever been. however it was very clean. the front desk is located in the 2nd floor so the first impression is how i'm gonna get upstairs with this luggage? don't have free wifi, free breakfast, or activities everyday so is not a good place to meet other people. just one block from the beach but its located in the middle of a really nasty place in venice, you have to be careful if u go out at night, there are lots of homeless people around. definitelly not recommended
it's a youth hostel, but i appreciated that, despite i'am a mature adult, i was treated as the youngs.

this hostel got the perfect location, it's literally  on the beach, and right next to muscle beach, venice beach streetbasketballcourt and you can easy go out surfing. like 0 min away from santa monica with bus.
great! but i think the staff should be paid more so that they have more incentive to work!
thanks to the staff for being so helpful, especially the guy on the front desk who lent us his phone when we were having trouble booking flights!

very good hostel with friendly staff and guests.  unfortunately the area where the hostel is located at is somewhat unsafe at night and would recommend going out in groups at night.  very interesting place during the day though!

really good hostel. friendly staff and right on venice beach in the best spot. close to the busses into laand to santa monica. they have something to do every night  which is good. some rooms dont have lockerswhich is annoying but they can put them behind the front desk for you in a safe. if i came back to venice which i will i'd stay here again w/o a doubt.

best location for venice. staff are excellent and there is a great social vibe. best be back around the hostel by sundown because it is a little shady at night. this is okay because the restaurant underneath the hostel is great for dinner and during the day venice is a blast; there is so much to see on the strip without having to spend a dollar. its worth renting a bike for the day and riding to santa monica and back.   free wifi from restaurant on north side of hostel.

the only negative point was having to pay extra fees in order  to use the  internet. i  had never had to pay extra, and surely didn't think i would have to for 40dls a night..  free towel service is great.  the rooms are hot though

the hostel is very well located near airport and venice beach. they don´t offer breakfast, neither lockers. internet connection is charged. i took some tours with them (night club tour and observatory tour) and the cost-benefit is not good.  the people and ambient is very nice, but there are many things to improve.
good! no negative comments really. a bit expensive, but worth the price.  it's clean, secure, and right next to venice beach.  good hostel in gerenal

the staff were so helpful and answered any questions we had. check in isn't until 2 though. the location is right on the beach and its fairly easy to get the bus to hollywood and downtown la. the room was a bit boring though but it was cheap so its all good :)
great location just off the beach, really helpful staff, good facilities and a friendly atmosphere.
great location, the room was the best of my trip so far, the staff are hot and helpful, next time i'll have to visit the bar as it was a short stay

becks and toni, i love you guys xoxo    excellent location as soon as you step out your on venice boardwalk. they have a bar which makes it good to meet ppl. full kitchen for making a nice home cooked meal

the cotel is great!! the location is the best right on the boardwalk . takes a second to walk to the beach. the staff is great friendly and helpful! kayla is such a great helpful person! there is not one night that you will stay with out having some laughs and meeting new people great place to stay and work!! love from miami!

ideal for younger crowd, location great right next to venice beach and possible beach views...and 10 mins from santa monica.     kitchen wasn't great...too small and while they offer free tea and coffee there were no mugs to drink it in.
everything was good except that it was ice cold at night and we just had really thin blankets.

had lovely stay at the venice beach cotel.  being an avid hosteler having travelled all over the world, i wouldn't call the venice beach cotel an it spot to stay. however, what it may lack in a state of the art facility is made up by the service provided. had an initial issue with our rooming situation, not at the fault of the hostel themselves,  kerry, the manager, took care of it with a very professional manner. just goes to show, doesn't matter the cost, costumer service comes first. thanks!

the hostel location was awesome, and the reduced rate car parking was a lifesaver in this car unfriendly city!  helpful and friendly staff, also, the $5 evening meals were very good - more than worth the money and saved a lot of hassle.  very friendly - i met some great people to subsequently travel with. i have recomended this hostel to othera already and would defintetly stay here again.

i had a great time the 1st time i went to the cotel  in october ! i had so much fun i went back for another week!  it is a great safe and friendly place , you meet new people from all over the world and it is just a all around great time!the staff  they are great, lovely cleaning ladies sweet as can be, the girls that work at the desk friendly and very helpful ! i can't wait to go back to stay again!!! thank you for making my stay so great at the cotel!!!!
what a fantastic hostel with fantastic staff and guests! we celebrated nye in venice beach and couldn't have found a better place! epic!
very nice place to stay
great hostel, very friendly and helpful, have no complaints. good security with a warm welcome.
the hostel is very close to the beach, staff is friendly and it was good to relax there. annother good thing  is that they make your bed. i recommend to stay there when you are at venice beach!

if you want to live on venice beach this place is best location.  when i arrive there is a smell in the air, rooms are dirty, but bedding seems clean.  bathrooms are very clean but no ensuite available.  staff were good, as the sink in my twin room was broken and a plumber came to fix it immediately.  security is bad, as i had no lockers and i had to stick my valuables in the safe at the main reception. lounge was cramped and full of guys in the evening, and fairly dirty.

don't let the dirty stair-well put you off, the rooms are kept super clean and the beds are sooo comfy.   the staff were all very freindly.  my one complaint would be that smoking is allowed inside the upstairs lounge area, and it does make the whole place smell, i really think this lets the palce down :(
it was just awesome! met great people in there!
great location for a quick stop in venice.  friendly and very helpful staff!  good size rooms and pretty good value for money.  we had a great time in venice!

i love venice beach cotel, will def stay here again if i came to venice beach. the location is perfect and you meet so many new and friendly people, it's a really good place to stay when travelling alone. def a must stay if coming to venice beach.

really great stay and super close to the beach nice as guy who runs the airport shuttles that we booked a ride with cudnt take us in the end so gave us cash for a taxi.nice clean little double room with shared bathroom
great location overlooking venice beach and walking distance to many pubs and restuarants

an excellent location right on the beach. on arrival, parking is very difficult to simply be able to unload, i had a parking ticket although parked in a 5 minute waiting zone while checking in. the parking enforcers seem to simply sit and wait! i was also charged for a night that i had cancelled and i was told that i had to e mail the manager rather than the staff sorting it out for me. however the matter was resolved quickly the next day with a different reception staff.

perfect for those wanting the slummin' it backpackers style, are if you are one of those you will love the area, very nice and alternative just be weary at night!   it's a simple hostel, fine for one night but you really can't relax there, not really my scene, ashamed as i am to admit it i've come to expect hostels to be like hotels only with more bed in each room, really  wish they could have fitted us in the h.i santa monica for another couple of nights.

stayed 9 nights, thanks to the ladies who cleaned our room it was great, although the bathrooms and kitchen were dirty. 1 helpful member of staff all the rest extremely unhelpful. on arrival, having called in advance to make sure our room was ready, we were made to wait a good few hours before it actually was. people smoking everywhere despite clear no smoking signs. great location, although we feel we paid far too much.

front door security very good, as reception was 24 hours and you had to buzz in at all times.  but we were a bit concerned by the fact that the window in our private room could not be locked.    many of the staff weren't overly helpful; seemed like they were travellers themselves who lacked knowledge of the hostel/area.
good: stone's throw from beach, cheap places to eat nearby, byob but still having a pseudo-bar is a cool idea.    bad: closest parking was pretty damn far. wi-fi isn't free.

very close to the beach and the boardwalk, a clean hostel.  the room was good, a double bed and single bed with en suite.  the are is not very safe after dark, so taxis are recommended if it's late.  there didn't seem like a lot to do in the hostel either.

great location if you want to spend time at the beach. the rooms are okay, ours was a little bit dark since we just had a windowview over a wall. the staff was nice and the kitchen was good for cooking.

venice beach cotel is a lovely friendly hostel, right on the edge of venice beach. the rooms are comfortable and clean. you have to climb up a flight of 32 stairs to get to the hostel. all the staff are really friendly and helpful. i stayed  here at the beginning of my four week road trip round california and liked it so much that i came back for four more days at the end of my trip. its the best place to stay in la, and venice beach has a magical atmosphere. below is a fab bar called danny's!
get yourself a free coffee and meet lots of nice and crazy travellers, any time of the day. perfect location in the more interesting part of la.
the hostel is very well located as it is in venice beach.  the rooms and toilets are clean and fine.    if you are lucky (or not), you can meet the governator by accident when riding a bike.
ok place but the staff was a big rude.

perfect for the price! kitchen, bathroom and tv in each shared room!!! however they should insist on the fact that the place is very noisy by its situation on hollywood blvd and because they put loud music till midnight and organise activities each night. so that's very cool for clubber and people who like that! i recommend this place anyway. just don't go there if you need calm ;)
great atmosphere! the vibe at this place is chill and i loved my time there really didn’t want to leave.
awesome place love coming here when i fly to los angeles!!

location was about 20 min walk into main area of hollywood boulevard/ tourist attractions. did not feel safe outside of hostel and alone at night. was in a share room with ensuite and kitchen. clean though could be better. common room was dark and had unpleasant lingering odour. ground level becomes a car park at night and therefore outdoor activities become limited. staff super friendly. breakfast free with affordable extras options. heaps of activities put on by the hostel which was great!

dust, dirt, smelly and mess everywhere, however i will also contribute this to the fact that you are staying with other housemates. the rooms are tiny, hardly any space to move around let alone allow 6 people to put there luggage and move in the room... the staff have attitude and can be quite rude. i guess you get what you pay for... i learnt my lesson.. late night parties... very noisy.. its like living in crowded noisy student halls. parties, free alcohol and weed most nights.
good place, not the best atmosphere but still it’s location is the best u can ask of a hostel

worse hostel experience of my life. terrible staff. extremely unprofessional and not safe. the guy at the office showed someone the copy of my id which happened to be my passport. this is not safe. the lady who checked me out was impossible to talk to. this is the worst hostel i have ever stayed in.
aye i loved this place! i felt like i was back in college again! loved all the fun each night and the free breakfast made my long nights of drinking so much better!

a central hostel with a party atmosphere. alright facilities, but a bit dated, and dirty. the hostel is a party hostel with lots on but don't expect to sleep to well with noise travelling to the rooms from the main outdoor area.

the dorm bathroom has a bath! had a long hot soak for the first time in months and it was amazing.  strong social atmosphere   breakfast was pretty basic  staff were helpful. there was an offensive person in our dorm so we told staff they had her kicked out.   no complaints
it was fine
