as a solo traveller, i was very pleased with my stay here. booked a private room which was spotless when i arrived. i had housekeeping come change my bathroom towels most mornings. housekeeping staff were lovely, friendly and very helpful (whislt doing my laundry) these guys deserve a pay rise! :)    the atmosphere was relaxed and there was always lots of activities planned everyday. reception staff were great and very helpful. i will be returing upon my next visit to la. thanks guys!
great location, friendly informative staff, cool environment. would stay again and certainly recommend.
great hostel! right on hollywood boulevard with parking! lots of cool night events at the hostel (some that include free food&drink) and tons of cool people to meet! will be back!

we shared a room the first night and had a private room for the remainder of our trip and boy was there a difference! overall our stay was pretty decent but it was quite irritating that every time we would put the "maid service" door handle notice the only thing that was dealt with was our towels. also, when we booked the room we had selected a four person room only to find out "four person" really meant eight people...

i arrived about 8:30 in the evening, worn out.  i was greeted with cheerful helpful staff.  it was sunday and they prepared a special meal for the meager price of $5.00.  we got a giant plate of great food.  there is no elevator, but my stuff was taken upstairs for me.  my room had a small kitchen, sparely stocked, there is large kitchen,  really hot water, air conditioning.  the bunk beds had great mattresses, with protective covers.  bed linen and a towel are provided.
just needed a place to crash after universals halloween haunt, this place was perfect great location great price. i would stay again if i needed a place in that location.
best hostel i'ce ever been to! amazingly friendly staff, and so much offers
it was  short and a good stay.

fantastic hostel, on hollywood blvd, plenty of decent places along in the area, 1 block from metro. free parking (seems to be plenty)   secure, looks fantastic (though the rooms could do with an updated paint job) even a kitchen in your own dorm room.   plenty of atmosphere if you want it, or a tiki lounge out back which is more chilled out.
nice location, and have parking, wonderful bathrooms :), free breakfast

rooms were cleaned regularly, $5 dinners every other night which were delicious, guest were quiet. every other night there was generally loud music playing that could be heard from the rooms but usually finished by about 11/12pm anyway. area felt safe enough. a single young women travelling by herself there was plenty of lighting on the outside street and feels a lot safer than proper hollywood. still would be cautious but generally pretty good.

good location, an easy walk to the walk of fame & a not so difficult trekking to the griffith observatory, breakfast a bit late starting at 8am & quite basic, top bunk bed not easy to access, bunk bed quite shaky & creaky, in-suite kitchen/dining area a bit inconvenient as some people were cooking after 9pm while the others in bed already

good value for money hostel at a good location.  parking is a really nice feature  room (we had a private) was a bit dated but had everything and was clean    breakfast can be better. next to toast with jam/peanut butter and oatmeal it would be nice to offer a bit more (e.g. eggs/tostadas with cheese, yoghurt) there is one personen doing the breakfast shift. he/she could easily do a bit more.

says it has parking, the reality is that they have few places to the number of people who get and you always have to leave the car outside.  cleaning leaves much to be desired.   the shower water goes or cold or very hot and varies alone.   the tub lid continuamemte.  breakfast is very poor and very few options.  the staff always attends with bad vibes.  you do not have plug next to the bed.  no place to store your suitcase.  we went to many hostel around the world and never one as bad as this

atmosphere was good and you could make friends easy. the rooms were a bit of a weird set up, having to cook, shower and sleep together all in very close quaters. would have been good if there was a communal kitchen as that provides a social space. no aircon so it got pretty damn hot in the room as it was 36 celsius out. the breakfast wasn't great, firstly all cups and plates and cutlery were disposable which is bad for the environment. nothing was covered or refrigerated=bad food safety

the banana bungalow was excellent for my visit to hollywood.  great atmosphere and friendly staff.  decent continental breakfast and good people about.  was in the perfect location for my jaunts to the hollywood sign, the hollywood bowl, and the sunset strip.  thank you b.b.!

they took my things out of the room while my stay and end it up loosen my necessarie! only found when i was already on my way to another city. i'm very unhappy with this  whole thing because i had to spend money buying things like toothbrush and lotions that i cannot stay without. they don't have parking for everybody. the room is very noisy. not very clean. there's no plugs for everyone. also the breakfast is very simple. it's not worthy.
stable wifi, helpful staff.
great facilities and excellent location!! staff were really friendly and helped me book tours and organised free shuttles for me. only negative was i was the only girl in a 6 bed mixed dorm.

it's located on noisy hollywood blvd but in a quiet zone of it, so you will be able to sleep if you're sensitive. the hostel is an old motel and looks realy cool.  there was one thing i didn't like. i've checked in there twice during a week, and both times different receptionists after giving me the key didn't give me bed linen and a towel which are included in the price. i had to come back and personally ask about it. other people i stayed with  had to do the same.
v good location and security and relatively cheap .

i love this hostel! i've stayed here 2 times. the location is perfect, they have parking, fairly good breakfast, clean rooms, activities etc...  they also have great staff! me and my friend lost our phones when we got drunk (haha) and two of the men working there helped us to find our stuff. if i'm not rich the next time i come to l.a, i will stay here again :)
crazy party hostel stayed there on a wednesday night and the had a free open bar and karaoke followed by a bar crawl.  rooms where clean and spacious, staff were friendly and helpful.
really cool place to stay! staff or awesome and the place has a really cool vibe, always stuff going on there!
smelt like weed the entire stay there which was not enjoyable. good location very safe. lots of parking.

one of the best hostel i have ever seen in my last 5 years of tour. awesome staffs, breakfast was ok but still value of money. every day there is something special plan. gym was an additional value apart from t.t. great facilities. kitchen, fridge, dinning, oven. i would recommend this for 100% sure if u are looking for value for money. i am going to stay again.

greatest hostel i&#39;ve stayed at in my life. great party atmosphere and events, location is great, staff is friendly and helpful and overal quality of hostel is very good. they often have events and parties, offer free shuttles to places of interest and even offer free food and drinks on mondays. got my money worth and more

this place is perfectly located on hollywood blvd, like a 2 minute walk from the walk of fame. there's a different theme for every night of the week, movie nights etc. i stayed here for four nights but i wished i could have stayed more as i met a lot of like minded people from all corners of the globe! staff are very friendly and helpful and also the hostel is very clean. my particular room was more like a little apartment with a neat kitchen and fridge! i wish more hostels were like this! :)
there is some people that live there and aren&#39;t travelers, so it is a little uncomfortable.

fun hostel, great downstairs outside common area with pool table, bar and ping pong table where everyone congregates. they organise nights out and pre drinks, and there's a room where you can continue the party afterwards without disturbing those sleeping. on hollywood boulevard but at the other end, bit of a walk to the main part but it wasn't too bad. nowhere near the beach but its only a $10 uber ride and we stayed around there a few days later so was good to get a different perspective of la
amazing hostel, really good location and the staff is really helpful and kind! :)) i would recommend to everyone!
nice hostel
good atmosphere, very good location.

the best hostel i've ever stayed in! it had everything, a good vibe, laid back helpful staff, free breakfast, fun and sociable people who mixed well together and the staff were happy to help us party haha. space for parking, very safe, such a great place for seeing hollywood but la is hard to get around if you do not have a car. i really loved my stay here and the motel into hostel vibe really worked for the place. i am coming back to this hostel next time i'm in la. also plenty of trips to do.
this was my first experience in a hostel and in the hollywood area. the staff was super helpful and the others staying in the hostel were wonderful people. highly recommended.
the wifi is not good.

good hostel, rooms are big and clean, beds are comfortable and showers are good. location is not close to the beach (not a fault, just a heads up) but hostel offered a bus on the weekend to take you there (make your own way back). just be warned as by public transport, beach is aboit 1 and a half hours away!   they offered cheap and good sized dinners on some nights and breakfast in morning is good and sufficient.  nice way to end or start a trip!
great hostel. good location and staff were really friendly and helpful. i would stay there again.

not a bad hostel at all, rooms were nice if a little warm, and quite a walk from public transport links as well as being in quite a rough area, but overall if wanted a cheap bed in hollywood id stay again!

this place was awesome. i&#39;ve stayed in a lot of hostels and this might be one of the best. i was station in an 8 bed dorm and the dorm had two separate rooms so it was more like staying in a four bed. not only that but there was a kitchen and bathroom in the dorm. i&#39;ve never seen that before and it was amazing. they also has a great breakfast in the morning and lots of fun events to attend. not to mention, you can&#39;t beat free parking. it was also a block away from the stars so perfect location.

good hostel to meet and chill with people if you were a solo traveler like me or with friends. events at night could have been better advertised; i didn&#39;t know anything was going on until i asked explicitly. good facilities and things to do (basketball, foosball, ping pong, etc.) otherwise, it was clean, safe, and in a pretty good location (i could easily uber to anywhere from there).
close to the hollywood strip and universal studios

great place to stay in hollywood, close to the hollywood walk of fame as well as a great walk up to the hollywood sign.  staff were pleasant and helpful, rooms were well sized and amenities were clean.  has a number of good areas to be social and the basic set up of the hostel facilitates guests bumping into each other if you are looking to make some new friends.
loved staying at the banana bungalow, fantastic reps that really make you feel welcome! they were happy to help and the facilities were good too!

fun hostel with a great party atmosphere. they do dinner specials and arrange parties on the weekend. very sociable. we stayed in dorm room and private room. they were both large and dorms even have their own kitchenette. breakfast was average. close to thai food area. only a short uber/taxi down to chinese theatre area where all the action is. has laundry facilities. can bring own alcohol in which is a bonus. will stay here again and recommend.

i enjoyed my stay there  but there was only one drawback as i forgot my shoe in my room and when i called to ask about it they didn&#39;t seem to care much or call me back saying if they found out or not.

everything was good however the only downside is the parking, its first come first serve,  if u don&#39;t make back before they fill up u have to find a place to park on the street and the parking in hollywood is horrible!!!!, the second day we left the car parked at the hostel and took the metro. overall i can say i was satisfied.
it has the best stuff ever and the atmosphere is awesome! you can meet wonderful people there and enjoy your trip. the location is good and safe.
no complaints.
very nice hostel, would definitively recommend it.  maybe some more effort in room cleanliness would be nice.

banana bungalow is a great place to go for young travellers. it has a fantastic atmosphere and everyone chats to you and the staff are friendly. there are great facilities and the breakfast provided is very good. they provide activities and nights out which is excellent and overall i had a great stay.

a member of staff  with black hair and a pony tail messed up a booking for the celebrity house bus tour.the next day when ready to go we were told there was no tour.we had to walk 4k to another office to sort another tour.that member of staff had a really bad attitude.the rest of the staff were quite helpful and friendly.

we had the best time every at your hostel, we would highly recommend to anyone travelling to la to stay here! the staff couldn&#39;t have been nicer, the atmosphere couldn&#39;t be friendlier and the location was great! the whole vibe of the place was exilerating! we didn&#39;t want to leave! anna, katie and joan.
awesome hostel. super duper friendly staff. free taco night is fun and the club they take you out to after was actually super fun!
extremely good value for money, pool table, computer lounge, free printing for guests, room was very clean, staff were helpful, free breakfast, good security, 5/5 stars.
i enjoyed staying here it felt like home.  the breakfast you had a good choice .  in the evening they did $5.00 meals i had lasagne that was very tasty .  i would go back there .
i like this place. cool place to stay... i would stay here in future.

this hostel is well located and has parking available. staff was nice and it had a nice atmosphere. breakfast was good but they ran out of a lot of things if you didn&#39;t arrive early. overall it was good.
great great time

whilst i wasn't blown away by this hostel i certainly wouldn't mind staying again. my 6 bed mixed dorm could have done with an extra fan or 2. it was nice to have a kitchen in the room even though i didn't use it myself. for some reason there was air conditioning in the kitchen- i was tempted to move my mattress! there was a cool vibe to the place, great for a session! the ensuite was a plus but could do with a facelift. shutout to the van driver though!   all in all i would recommend to others.

my review really is a 10/10 but i had to knock security. while the gates to parking and the front pin pad are secure i feel like anybody could let anyone in at any time. but that didn&#39;t really phase me because that&#39;s true of any hotel. when checking out, they said they&#39;d hold our bags. which was great! but they didn&#39;t tag the bags or anything so i feel like anyone could&#39;ve gone in my bags and taken whatever without anyone knowing who or when. that was the only downside to this place!
i loved the activities that the hostel organised! this hostel is great if you want to meet people and explore la.
great location. really nice staff, cool activities

great location for where i needed to go.having a kitchen as well as a bathroom in the dorm was a welcome plus.the crowded conditions were to be expected;it only got on my nerves when my bunk mate started snoring.

funky hostel. parking is free, but usually fills up before 8 pm. has ac, though still warm in the rooms. nice relaxing common area. fairly clean. kitchen in each room. area somewhat dodgy, but close to the main attractions.
good location. good vibe. comfy beds. would stay again
fantastic stay and the staff were really helpful. had no dramas when i accidentally booked for the wrong hostel. so helpful
lovely hostel, really sociable and in a great location for hollywood. the room and bathroom was very clean and the beds were comfy, i had the best nights sleep that i've ever had in a hostel!

very chill environment. especially in the courtyard in the evening. met some really cool people.  it felt like a little village. the  roorm was cool, set up like a mini apartment. full kitchen and bathroom.  the only issue that was irratating was the water. while taking a shower the temperature would change, throughout.  and the sink&#39;s knob were missed labeled. the cold was really the hot. overall my stay was good. i&#39;d do it again.

had a great time here, really good vibe, i had a friend but it would be perfect for solo travelers, lovely helpful staff and good to have bathrooms connected to bedrooms. not the biggest fan of the area though.. not much there but i think that&#39;s just hollywood for you

the value for money is unbelievable, all rooms seem to be equipped with their own bathrooms which is nice. they did just a great job remodeling the old motel, the place is filled with loads of outdoor areas to hangout, you feel like your in a tropical oasis, not on hollywood blvd. the staff are friendly and fun and do a great job of always scheduling nightly activities whether is comedy shows or taco night and karaoke.
this is definitely party hostel. if you are trying to sleep early you won&#39;t be able to do there as parties continue till 3 am.
first hostel i have stayed in but really enjoyed it. it's a party/friendly atmosphere and the location is good if you want to explore hollywood
it's very well located and quite big the hostel.. i missed a kind of common area to meet people but i would stay again there.

great hostel overall but be careful if you&#39;re planning on parking here. they have a strange policy where even though give out more parking permits than parking spots so if you don&#39;t he in/back early enough you won&#39;t have a spot and will be forced to park in the street or pay for parking.

great place near all the crazy hollywood stuff. i don&#39;t much care for the party atmosphere of the hostel, but for those who do like that sort of thing it&#39;s a great place. the walls seem pretty thin as you can hear every game of beer pong in great detail. but super place!
i had a great time there, close to the hollywood walk of fame!
excellent location. staff is friendly.   rooms are clean. lots of activities to do.  had an amazing time.
great place to stay if your looking to stay in hollywood! fun events going on, i always felt safe and enjoyed the amenities.
great little spot, kitchens in every room for budget, close to all the sights in hollywood and next to a subway station. cant go wrong.
cool place, great location in hollywood. breakfast could be more exciting. would definitely come again.

best hostel in la!!     the vibe and staff here are absolutely fantastic. they offer free breakfast, trips to the beach, great parties... basically everything you could ask for including free washing powder and ice haha! (but seriously, that is underrated.
pretty decent hostel with good vibes!
awesome location, met some awesome people who i still speak with today would recommend to anyone!

well the wifi is dreadful. prepare yourself for constant reconnecting and needing 4 hours to watch a 25 minute tv show.  but it&#39;s been the best hostel i&#39;ve stayed at this summer. free shuttles around town, free shuttles to nightclubs, live bands, free drinks, free breakfast, ping pong, karaoke, satelite tv and with hollywood literally on your doorstep, you don&#39;t even need wifi. so make friends and have a blast. i did. they look after you so well here.
great hostel! the common areas are so great and it was one of the best places i&#39;ve been to make friends! too bad it was for just a little time.

easy access to hollywood walk of fame, disney studios and universal studios. good security and friendly staff. parking spots are not available later in the day as they are first come first serve. but overall a good setup.

the staff is super friendly, as well as very helpful and easy to locate should you need something. can&#39;t beat the location - it&#39;s walking distance to most of the major attractions, metro stops, and grocery stores.     the facilities are great and they host events multiple times a week with discounted/free meals and fun parties.
stayed at better hostels, but tiki garden was the highlight. would i stay here again?  nup !

convenient location close to the highway as well as the metro. rooms were clean and had bathroom, kitchen and refrigerator. a couple times a week the hostel offers cheap dinner (usually some pasta) in the evening which was awesome. parking is limited, and it is a bit annoying that you have to hand the car keys to the staff (although you can get them 24/7 if you need to leave/access your car).

look no further. this hotel, turned hostel has everything you need. it&#39;s centrally located to attractions and public transport. when i arrived i was greeted and checked in my a friendly staff. the room was spotless and had everything i needed. i would 100% stay here again.

i was really lucky with my roommates! they were awesome and we had a great time. the staff were really friendly and offered me an early breakfast, because i had to leave before breakfast. even tho it's not that clean its location is very central and great to access. all in all i had an amazing stay!
it may be the best hostel of the city for young people.
very nice hostel, the breakfast was great and it seems like they encourage activities and socializing which is good but sadly i was only there for one night, but i would definitely stay again!

this hostel is a converted motel and includes parking that felt safe, we had a private room which included a private bath and kitchen, which was nice even included dishes and pots. location was nice we spent a day and walked down hollywood blvd. worst thing about this hostel was that they had chairs and ashtrays by all the doors so we had groups of other people outside our beds smoking at night making it unpleasant for us nonsmokers they should move them away from our bed

conveniently located a few blocks away from hollywood/vine metro station, and centrally located with easy access via public transit to most tourist attractions and sightseeing. very lively and loads of events, perfect for a more social traveller or solo travellers looking to meet others with whom to hang out/explore.
the location and place are pretty nice. and the staff there are very friendly. i met some good friends there.

hostel was overall a good experience. lots of activities to take part in. all staff were really accommodating. location was pretty good just don't head east on hollywood boulevard bit of a sketchy area. beds were a little hard but apart from that we had a great stay :)

our experience at this hostel was influenced more on the dorm mates we shared the room with. though not all were, there were individuals who were inconsiderate. one person kept going in and out of the room until early morning (the hostel is in hollywood, so understandable if they went partying), but the other individual made so much noise, walking around the room at all hours of the night doing who knows what, farting, and using tv/radio, opening/closing doors/cabinets. couldn&#39;t sleep at all.

awesome!! just awesome hostel.. the atmosphere is great, the guys at the reception are very cool and friendly.. rooms are fantastic, with their own kitchen with fridge, microwave.. location is great too.. i would definitely stay again there

staying in this hostel was a really good experience, especially considering location and its relation to the price. bathrooms assigned for each room were something exceptionally positive; prices in the vending mashines were also quite low. i only regret that it was not so full during my stay, hence the atmosphere wasn&#39;t that great.
wonderful hostel from the moment i entered the gates to the moment i reluctantly left!

activities were great and the bus driver (can't remember his name) was so great, just a really funny guy. free breakfast was a nice inclusion. bit of a strange hostel vibe as it is also part hotel, and there seem to be lots of people 'living' there looking for work etc. overall great location, area wasn't shady at all, close to everything you need including public transport. staff were always friendly, only main downside was the lack of power outlets, but you can get by

this place was awesome. if you&#39;re looking for 5-star dining and room service, this might not be the place for you. but that takes nothing away from this adorable abode. the staff is super friendly and welcoming, and the inclusive environment allows you to get to know all the other guests that are staying there as well. whenever i visit la i plan on staying here every time! xo

the hostel is just ok. old rooms, but 15 blocks away from the action on hollywood blvd. they offer free parking, which is great, but is also limited, we had to park on the street in one of our 2 nights. good breakfast.

had an amazing week at banana bungalow, really good social areas to meet a lot of people from around the world.   the only real negative was security as one or two people got in the hostel and stayed for a couple of nights without payment. but other then that i would highly recommend staying here. its right on hollywood boulevard so you are already right in the mix of the la lifestyle. its perfectly situated and the staff do a great job of bringing everyone together. great week! thank you!

i had a very bad time at this hostel. only mixed dorms when i booked, very disrespectful guys, i had to ask to change rooms every night. bathroom where groos, the water wouldn&#39;t keep the heat..  same as carpet. the food was good but that&#39;s it. i&#39;ll never recommend this place to a friend.

great place. awesome location and value for money, unfortunately there were this strange guy in our room, very unpolite and impatient like he was the owner of the room. except that, we had a perfect time during our stay in this hostel, and in the following night, there was this awesome karaoke night. i would certainly stay in this hostel again if i come back to la.
awesome hostel.  a lot of party and amazing people. great property and very clean rooms and the location is very nice too.

free breakfasts, taco dinner and free drinks for a night while we were there made it really great! especially on a backpackers budget. a short walk from the walk of fame and the metro station. really helpful staff 👍

if we were visiting hollywood again - this would be the place to stay. everything about it was wonderful. really liked the cheap but wholesome meals put on for guests every few days - that was appreciated.  walking distance from all main hollywood blvd  attractions, and transport.

i had read online that it was a party hostel but i did not expect such loud music after 11.30pm, i was on the opposite side to the bar and it was still crazy loud. this happened every night i was there apart from the saturday but instead people played basketball till really late.  it&#39;s in a decent area if all you want to do is hollywood tourist stuff but bear in mind that even a 2 mile bus journey can take up to an hour!   they did have name brand stuff for breakfast though.
outstanding hostel - one of the best i have stayed in. very minor issues with cleanliness be t otherwise fine

this is an excellent hostel! everyone is super friendly and the atmosphere is great. free breakfast every day and $5 dinners 3 times a week were good- nothing super fancy but did the job and were also a great way to meet more people.  there&#39;s a pin code to get into the hostel from the street and each dorm requires a swipe card. the only security downside was that there were only 2 full-size lockers in my dorm of 6 beds (the other 4 were just big enough for the essentials) but i always felt safe.

when i stay in hostels i want to meet fun travellers.  banana bungalow was the perfect place for doing just that.  they organise events most nights (including a free shuttle to their sister hostel in west hollywood for a free burger and beer night).  the dorm room and bathroom were nothing special, but for me that didn&#39;t matter as i was too busy having fun with exploring la by day and going out to amazing nightclubs of an evening.  amazing clubs: dirty laundry & no vacancy (just up the road).
great hostel! friendly staff, walking distance to tcl chinese theater, connections at the front desk to other activities and sights. it was awesome!

i definitely loved this place. the staff was super friendly and helpful. the middle common area is the best i was always there hanging out with people and drinking beer...meeting new people and having  a great time. i highly recommend it :)
fantastic location, staff, security, fun, i really enjoyed my time here and i will be back :)

great hostel with a lively atmosphere. only 6 to a room, each with private bathroom and kitchen was a big bonus. free breakfast in the morning was also decent. not located in the nicest neighbourhood but security was good and always felt safe. also a great hostel for meeting new people with events organised by the hostel and always stuff going on in the quad, however probably not the best place to stay if you&#39;re looking for an early quiet night&#39;s sleep.

if you&#39;re looking for a hostel with a &#39;partying&#39; vibe, then this is the place to stay. it was fun a couple of times, but parties/gatherings happened every night in the courtyard, until late, and it did get a bit annoying and hard to sleep.   but, there&#39;s free breakfast, shuttle rides to landmarks and points of interest and surprisingly cheap vending machines ($2 for vitamin water!). location-wise, this hostel is a 10-minute walk away from hollywood boulevard and you can see the &#39;hollywoo

i enjoyed my time at this location and i am looking forward to receiving free accommodation/vouchers from the venues in la.  they have freebie nights etc. which they can also filter through this platform.  please inform them i would be interested in the freebie accommodation also at all la venues.  this can include all hostels in the la area and venice beach/santa monica areas. please call/text at 505-459-0485.   thank you

this is an awesome place to stay if you want to meet awesome people and party. the events the hostel puts on including $5 dinner nights are the best. we would stay here again but i will mention that it can be quite loud until 2 or 3 am. the bunks are a bit unstable and our shower/bath did run both taps at once and on our last night bubbled up with dirt, when we told the desk they responded quickly but were unable to get maintenance out to fix it until morning. staff were super friendly + helpful

had a good experience there. it&#39;s clean, have good breakfast and they drive you for free to universal studios and disney (they have a schedule). if you like parties, they have good ones, if you don&#39;t usually is over by midnight, so i don&#39;t see a problem... there was a tv in my room and a kitchen. quite comfortable!
great private room with kitchen and toilet. lovely garden outside, and nice location in hollywood boulevard.
banging hostel, really love this place definitely reccomend.
nice hostel in a good location. bizarre to have a kitchen in room as it can make the room smell. other than that though a good experience

fun vibe here, my friend and i stayed in a 6 bed mixed dorm with 4 guys. it worked out fine! there is an ac in the room and convenient outlets around the room. they played a movie late one night and it was nice to sit outside and watch! breakfast was basic and everything needed. no issues at all :) we will definitely return!

i had a good time in this hostel. simple breakfast, but with infinity nutella. nice atmosphere: there was free tacos, free beers and karaoke when i was there. good location: near hollywood hall of fame. the rooms were good and clean: for improvement, i would suggest that there were sockets near all beds. at any rate, i recommend that you stay there.

awesome hostel! staff were really friendly, rooms were clean and heaps of activities and things to do organised by the hostel. 10 minute walk to the hollywood walk of fame. i definitely recommend this hostel.

amazing, the only word needed to describe this hostel. what a great way to end my 5 weeks in the states. everything you need is at the hostel and it is in a great location. the night activities put on are great to interact with the other guests. only bad thing i&#39;d say would be the shower had a mind of its own, going from hot to freezing quickly. but hey a cold shower wakes you up. i&#39;ll happily book banana bungalow if i visit la again. thanks guys .

we stayed in the private room with ensuite. it was one of the loudest rooms i have ever stayed in. the ceiling seemed to be paper thin and any movement in the room above seemed to be extreme! although i&#39;m pretty sure there was a dance party going above our room. all good though, it stopped at 1am, so we were able to get some sleep..... until 5am when the party started again.    not worth the money, wouldn&#39;t stay again.
people seemed to look creepy at times. overall a very good place to stay, hangout and make friends.

i stayed with my younger sister in a 6 bed f dorm  the location is a little out of the way from the main attractions, but public transport is available close by (both train and bus) which will get you to where you need to go.  the upside to this is that it is a relatively quiet, with minimal street noise, just the occasional helicopter (i mean, it is la)  the breakfast is basic but filling: toast with spreads, porridge, coffee, and fruit.  staff are a+, as are the shuttles offered.  would stay again!
meet some great people here and would definitely recommend it to people in the future
definitely a little expensive as far as hostels go, but i suppose that&#39;s hollywood for you! close to the metro line and walk of fame and great chilling area by the bar.

this hostel houses some down and out people, weed smokers, tattoo&#39;s, smokers, drinkers... like one guy with full body tattoos and face inked in like nothing you have never seen before. with that said, the place is worth every $.  free breakfast, cool events during the week and staff that are awesome. it&#39;s edgy, and if you like edgy and want a place that is close to hollywood. all in all, great value for money, free car park!  i would stay again.
great location. great staff and facilities. the rooms are big, clean and have their own kitchen and fridge. the daily activities are so much fun.

i really enjoyed my 3 nights. the fact that the common room is an interior but opened to the outdoor parking lot, makes people just go outside and hangout together. at the other hostels i've bee to, everyone was going out to hang out but banana bungalow is pretty chill to hang out until whenever you want! i loved the activities that were organized and there were at leadt three per day! all the facilities that i would have expected. had a blast and made good friends.

spacious room with full amenities (kitchen, shower, toilet, tv). though the shower/tub seemed clogged, couldnt keep up with the water flow. clean rooms, helpful staff, though sometimes seems to be in their own world. location is a fair walk to anything if your there for a while. not value for money, but seems to be the norm for la hostel pricing.

this place was absolutely adorable. the hostel was so pretty and the little tiki backyard is very nice. the people are very helpful and lovely! the rooms were clean and also had it&#39;s own private kitchen fully-equipped with fridge, microwave and stove and a dining area! would definitely recommend.

having gone to the wrong hostel initially (there are two banana bungalows in la) where we were given directions to the correct one by a helpful member of staff.  when we arrived at the correct address we were assisted by a member of staff in finding a parking space and checked in quickly which was good as it was 2am!    the room was fine and bedding was comfortable.  the free breakfast until 11am was great!  the member of staff who checked us out was really friendly too.

you get what you pay for! it&#39;s an okay location but sometimes seemed pretty far away from everything, and the streets surrounding the hostel are a bit dangerous. lots of my uber drivers warned me to be careful in the area as i was a female travelling alone. the water also smelt weird from the pipes... otherwise i enjoyed my few days here and it did the trick.

fantastic place to stay!all the staff were lovely and helpful. it&#39;s perfect location for exploring hollywood-only 5 minute walk away from the famous walk of fame!we booked and stayed in a double private room and had our own kitchenette and bathroom.  if you do book a double room it comes with an extra single bed at no extra cost(don&#39;t worry they won&#39;t put someone extra in your room :) )  the only bad points of this hostel is the internet from your room is bad and the shower pressure is very low.
first time at a hostel but it was amazing! so many activities and everything was super secure and great!
amazing people, amazing surrounding, awesome trsportation and value for money! would recommend to anyone!

i had a wonderful stay at banana bungalow hollywood at the beginning of april.   i stayed in a co-ed 8 bunk room and shared a bathroom with the other hostellers.  i had a lot planned around la and the staff at the front desk helped with bus schedules and recommended routes to my destinations.   the bathroom was fine but could get &#34;worn&#34; considering 8 people were using it. one morning the tub was not draining- i found a wad of hair blocking the drain. once this was resolved- the water was great!
cool place, great atmosphere. security at front door seemed suspect later in the night (during one night i had to walk through multiple thug-types who were smoking inside the entry from the doorway).
excellent hostel, staff are really friendly, great atmosphere, free breakfast is good and they have activities for guests to do every day. would definitely stay again next time we are in la.
fun, boisterous hostel near the hollywood action - tremendous value for the money.
awesome hostel. there is plenty to do and they provide you with all the information to see all of la.

banana hostel is one of the best hostels i&#39;ve stayed in. the staff is really helpful, the atmosphere is amazing (karaoke wednesday was the best!), bedrooms/ bathrooms clean, super friendly people... i loved everything! will comeback for sure 😊😊
we really enjoyed our private room at banana bungalow. stayed a few nights on airbnb and wished we would have stayed here instead. definitely recommend!

i enjoyed my time at this hostel. friday night was amazing as they planned a dinner and night out for the guests. cheap night out including a meal and vip entrance to a pretty good club. most of the staff were friendly and helpful with directions and recommendations. the rooms were pretty clean, but small, especially with 6 people. the lockers were also very small as you could not put much in there except a small backpack. i liked the bathroom and kitchen in the room, as that was a plus.

the staff was super great. but my friends and i stayed in differents rooms, what i didn&#39;t like. the sheets were dark what i didnt like so much either. but the breakfast was aewsome! and we had parking.

it&#39;s weird how i haven&#39;t seen the &#34;hostel atmosphere&#34; in the hostels i have visited in los angeles (santa monica, venice beach, hollywood). people don&#39;t seem eager to talk to each other and share experiences as they do in other cities/countries.  i really missed that. the most strange part is that the hostels i have visited in l.a. do have all the facilities and the ambiance right to make this exchange of stories and thoughts happen... it seems like it&#39;s just the people who don&#39;t
like this place so much that we will be back!
i am very satisfied with the staff, the hotel itself and the price. it was a really nice place, very friendly people and we&#39;ll i would come back and recommend. i&#39;ll give a 10 of rating.

the vibe here is pretty laid back. but overall, interesting and chill.    the first night i got back, my couch was replaced by a chair and table. the second night i came back, my chair and table was replaced by another couch. i didn&#39;t mind, i just though that it was humorous.    i&#39;ll probably be staying again.
we stayed 3 nights in a comfortableprivate room with kitchen. staff was very friendly and  helpful. very good value for money. i will choose it again.

i needed to visit  l.a. for 3 nights, online i found banana bungalow hollywood and with a small deposit booked my  stay. found the place easy to get to, the staff great! and i will stay there again. much thanks.

nice spot if you&#39;re looking to be near hollywood and meet other travelers. the drain in my room&#39;s bathtub was continually plugged and hence mostly grimy while there. they do clean the units everyday, though. friendly staff and guests.
awesome hostel. stay here if you&#39;re going to hollywood.
good value for money hostel. great location within hollywood.

so they messed up my reservation! for the first day only. so had to share a room when i wanted a private room with me and my brother.     they accommodated us well so that missed hap was ok.     overall the stay was good. it was nice hostel with good activities.     might stay there again in the future.

best hostel so have ever stayed at and atmosphere was amazing with really good travelers and staff. the hostel was located in walking distance of pretty much everything in hollywood. i slept in a mixed dorm and everyone is really nice and respectful. none of the staff or other travelers messed with your belongings. the hostel had many events to attend each day and night which was really awesome. i actually traveled alone and had the best time of my life. i actually extended my stay 3 more days:)

originally booked for 4 nights but ended up taking a spontaneous trip to vegas on the first night. staff were kind enough to take the first night&#39;s fee out of my booking and let me store my luggage overnight. room was spacious with a built in bathroom and kitchen! convenient location, just a short walk from the metro station, local shopping malls and food outlets. the atmosphere is very laid-back but can get a bit loud at night. great affordable accommodation, will definitely stay again!

was awesome. people were so nice. good spot. free breaky. awesome set up with open courtyard. definitely recommend. we had a party at the bar area drink supplied by hostel, perfect for young people travelling.

stayed at the hostel for four days, had a good time there. the room was clean and the staff was friendly. we had a lamp outside our window that made a terrible noice the entire night, and though it was not on the hostel property it did have a negative effect on our stay. the breakfast was average, at the level of our expectations, though it would have been nice with something a bit healthier (maybe some fruit). parking was only free if you came home early (very limited amount of spaces).
nice place. lots of fun to hang around with everybody.  great environment and atmosphere, will definately stay here again.
its perhaps the best hostel i have stayed in. great evening atmosphere and events

great hostel! a bit of a walk to the sights of hollywood but great bus links. really helpful and friendly staff and guests. always something going off and free activities to participate in! loved the free party night with free bar!! amazing food on offer for just 5 dollars too :) thanks guys!
great place! walking distance to the subway and hollywood walk of fame!

good hostel, walking distance from the main attractions. they provide shuttles to a couple places and organize activities, which is nice. bathrooms could be cleaner but oh well, it&#39;s a hostel. bathrooms are shared in each room so less people in the same bathroom. nice little tiki spot with a bar.

very nice hostel, reasonably clean, with lots of amenities. met some cool people from all around the world and shared good laughs. wednesday nights are the most fun, with free food, drinks and a karaoke. the dolby theater's in walking distance, which is nice because we were able to go check out the oscars.

great location, about 10-15 minute walk to good clubs and bars as well as to the main part of hollywood. a few minutes walk to the metro line if you need to take that. also, the style of the hostel is really cool, there is an open area with a basketball hoop. there are also chairs and foosball table that you can hang out and meet people. the hostel room was pretty old and not the nicest, but the rates are good. staff was also really nice and they give free breakfast.
great experience
great spot and great atmosphere if you&#39;re looking for a place to party.

extremely friendly and lively hostel. organised parties and shuttles into hollywood and la attractions. staff went out of their way for a good comfortable stay and location in on hollywood blvd. walk down to where the action is in 5 minutes”

staff were friendly and all the activities were cool. the free/$5 meals were awesome. wifi was veery average and there&#39;s often the smell of smoke. also they don&#39;t provide blankets, only sheets so prepare to be a bit chilly.

it&#39;s a great place for young people because they have a lot of activities at night and also during the day. it&#39;s safe and near to the principal activities in hollywood. they have a big truck that takes you through the city and observatories for free. the place is clean and the staff is very friendly. i will recommend it a hundred percent.
close to hollywood vine and lax flyaway - good activities in evenings and v friendly helpful staff - basket ball late at night annoying!!  but handy location and great view marathon!
great, 5 stars. only a washing machine in daylight time is missing for full satisfication. but still great
had a great time - awesome atmosphere as well!

great little hostel, it is on the edge of the hollywood boulevarde, so if you do not have a private form of transport it can be a little inconvenient, but there are plenty of buses around. if you are arriving with a personal vehicle, this hostel is superb, it has parking within the hostel and everything is enclosed within the building of the hostel. super safe. literally within a few minutes to hollywood sign and universal studios. great place to rest!
bathroom was dirty. about20mins awayfrom the main area of hollywood. staff good.

i had a great time in this hostel. it was my first time staying in a hostel and it was just awesome, people were great, breakfast was great . totally good value for price. i would recommend it to a friend for sure.

hostel is pretty good. locatated at hollywood blvd., just a few blocks to douby theatre. every day they have different events, like parties, dinners. there´s a parking, sports area, good and free wifi, lockers in rooms, kitchens inside the rooms. people from all countries go there. so, it was amazing experience. i would totally recommend the banana bungalow.
i met cool people from all over the world.   the tiki area was fun.    the parties were cool too.

great location, decent breakfast, helpful staff, thin pillows - only stayed for one night but would definitely go back. could have had a bit more space in rooms (6 beds to one small last room) but had its own toilet and bathroom.
nice breakfast and well located in hollywood. rooms were cool and had a private kitchen/toilet.
the hostel was quite good. staff awesome, great breakfast also.
different nightly activities. good free breakfast. great layout easy to meet people

very cool and humble people work here and the vibes were great!! it's walking distance to all the awesome hollywood spots, we really enjoyed our stay at banana bungalow! we are so glad and grateful we chose this place.

staffs are really kind to help, and there are many activities to participate, though if you want to sleep early, it might be kinda noisy. others of this hostel really good! (if there are different foods in breakfast, would be better)
was really good. offered so many activities and social nights which are fantastic for a solo traveller. questioned the cleanliness at times.
this hostel was very well run, a lot of good extras like free breakfast as well as free taco night/free beer. the 5$ spaghetti and lasagna were very good. close to everything!

i really enjoyed my stay here. the hostel is really chill, staff is very friendly and there are always activities going on. my room and bathroom were clean, as was the common kitchen. i didn't have the chance to have dinner there, but the breakfast is very good.  subway is two blocks away and it is pretty easy to get there.
a fun place to stay! big rooms, friendly staff and great events!
loved the atmosphere and availability of facilities. the staff were friendly and approachable

go here to have a good time this place is great!     really close to the hollywood stuff i wasn&#39;t there to visit, close to jumbo&#39;s clown room and a great thai restaurant (not the one on the same side of the street, the other side.)
it's was what i needed for the shirt period of time i spent, however ,i wish the beds were single and not bunk beds..
my bed is too high and it's not easy for me to climb
the bathroom did not appear to have been cleaned in a while and i had to unclog the drain on my first day there in order to use the shower.
some of the guys that work there were hitting on the girls in our group and this made them feel very uncomfortable and harassed.

location isn't bad but need to take bus or uber to hollywood avenue. do not have many restaurants near by. some free activities during the night, ex: free bbq, free shuttle bus to universal studio. however, the locker in the room is useless.
we really much enjoyed our stay! great location, friendly staff, nice rooms and good price, and with included breakfast!

one of the better hostels i've stayed in. they have great free facilities and the rooms are big and clean. there is a kitchen and bathroom in the room which is awesome! the location is all right, even though you're staying on the hollywood blvrd it's still a half an hour walk to downtown hollywood.
this hostel is in hollywood and its not far from the walk of fame. it is not far from bus stops or the metro.  there are also events scheduled everyday which helps keep you busy if you have no plans.

a really good hostel located near the main section of the hollywood boulevard. obviously an old hotel that has been turned into a hostel which is great cause each room has a kitchen and bathroom. facilities were good and atmosphere was good for the younger crowd i suppose. can be noisy at night but they crank the music off before midnight, so all sweet.

best hostel ever!!! made our stay in la unforgettable. nights out are so much fun and location is perfect. lots of activities and free shuttle around the city. good breakfast with nice varieties! will always come back there when i got to la!

great ambient and common areas, i stayed at some other hostels during my trip but for some reason people in this one seem to be more friendly and party people. great location for the most touristic attractions in  los angeles. the breakfast was one of the most complete i get during my trip also.
nothing to complain about. i even decided to stay an extra day.
karaoke night isn't fun for the rest of the guests not participating.   unipersonal staff in reception, but nice at breakfast
one of the best hostels in usa i ever stayed.

the place had great atmosphere with parties twice a week including bbq.  i liked the idea they brought you to the other hostel they have for the party and vice versa.  one thing i did not like is it wasn't clean with cockroaches climbing the walls beside where you sleep so i wouldn't be staying there again.  prefer to pay little extra for a cleaner place.
great hostel, very cool vibe and great nightlife activities, good location. coming into the cooler months i think you need to provide more than just sheets on the beds, it gets cold at night!

a fantastic hostel right in the heart of hollywood, la. every night they organized social events which even sometimes included free food, alcohol and comedy! definitely one of the friendliest group of staff members i've found. only issue was some of my friends were in a really grungy room where they fit 14 people across two connected rooms which reeked constantly.
very loud, even in your room with doors/windows closed. recommend to bring ear plugs. if you are not a partier, this is probably not a good hostel for you. it was a bad fit for me.

we enjoyed our stay in the hostel. it is located in east hollywood close to all the main attractions. hollywood/vine metro station is also just 3 blocks away. the rooms were nice and each one has its own bathroom and kitchen. the overall atmosphere in the social area is also great and we met quite a few great people!
first time in a hostel and it was one of the best experiences i've ever had. endless activities, amazing people, and great staff. will be staying here again asap

party hostel if you're looking to sleep at least 6 hours per night, do not stay here! but if you're looking for having a great time, socializing, meeting great people and partying around, this is definitely the place. all of the staff are mega friendly and fun, they do a great job. the beds are noisy and there's plenty of noise even late at night. very fun hostel. they provide 3 mac computers for us to use, they also offer some free open bar nights which are amazing and have different activities
excellent hostel in every single way!
excellent hostel with a great vibe, always something going on.

it really is a party hostel with lots of activities and stuff, but the music is very very loud and it plays very late, so it's hard to go to sleep before the party is over. breakfast is just cereal and toast and coffee, and since the vending machine was broken there wasn't any bottled water in the whole place. lockers are super small and the beds are shaky. everything is ok clean and ok condition, but nothing is too special.
great hostel to stay at. wonderful staff,facilities and atmosphere. they even let us to stay in the common room till late drinking and talking. definitely a must.

great place! on the saturday night you can pay $15 and get dropped off at another hostel for a party with free drinks (spirits and mixers!) and appetisers. i can say that i was smashed when leaving so the drinks and value for money. also gets you into a cool club downtown for free. very sociable place, very easy to meet people as there is a lot of common space. the guy with the beard at the front desk is amazing - our booking was wrong and he sorted it all out and went above and beyond for us :)

rooms have kitchen/dining areas and good size bathrooms but there is no aircon and the beds are very wobbly squeaky metal bunks wit uncomfortable mattresses.  common area does free food some nights and free drinks all night some nights as well which is incredible.  i left early because i was sleeping terribly in the heat and had a top bunk which meant everytime i moved even slightly i would make heaps of noise.
if you come to hollywood to party, this is the place to be!. else you can better find a different overnight stay.

great location if you want to be in the middle of hollywood, was a bit hot when we stayed which made it hard to sleep as the sun sets on most the rooms. was clean and the comedy night was mint but would stay at west hollywood banana bungalow if your looking for more vibe and atmosphere.
the stay was nice, such an all the people around.  the room wasn&#39;t ba, you habe your own bath and kitchen, wich was very nice.
great hostel and a lot of fun, only negative thing for me was that the staff thought my bed was empty and gave it away to another guest and through out my towel and shorts in the process.

perfect hostel. very large rooms with their own kitchen and bathroom. lots of common area, people are very friendly, a lot of meetups, programs and free tours. perfect location. the place to be in l.a. without any hesitation!

great hostel with a cool atmosphere! the location is ideal!  was just a little put off by the lady at reception who seemed bothered every time i asked her a question! however, how definitely stay here again and would definitely recommend to others.

if you plan on partying until wee hours in the morning, fine. if you want peace and quite this is not the place. parties went until 2 am,  constant roommate changes (more often then normal), over price excursions. didn't bother me as i was on vacay and had a car to do my own thing (which i strongly recommend doing). the breakfast was a joke, so don't get your hopes up. 3 types of bland cereal or bread with jelly, coffee or tea and banana or orange. -_-  no juice, so don't ask.  overall its okay.

upon our departure there was one guest / employee (he had a broom in his hands) who was really obtrusive. you asked us couple of times if we can take him with us for 40 bucks and also walked infront of our car. i already saw him once i checked out in the entrance room, but the employee behind the desk just laughed at him...

it was a convenient place to stay for a night. easy to find and everything you needed was in your room. it was interesting though to be put in a mixed dorm full with males and being the only female - surely they would have considered it before putting me in there. but it worked out okay.

me and my friend had done hostels in vancouver, seattle, portland, san francisco and santa barbara at this point and this was by far the worst. if your younger and just want to party and don't care about cockroaches in your room then this might be an ok place for you. we checked in at 10 and checked out a 1030 because it was so horrible. they said they would give me my money back for the inconvenience but ended up double charging me. still trying to get my money back from september...

nice hostel at the end of hollywood boulevard. location wise at night you can meet various types of people, looks safe but wouldn't wonder far from the main street. atmosphere at the hostel was awesome, however cooling in the room was just a warm breeze in the room. rooms large and had kitchen and bathrooms. very pleased with the stay

i stayed at banana bangalow west in a private room for 4. overall the hostel offers a fair value for the money and staff is really attentious; however my biggest complaint is regarding the cleanliness of the room. i had trouble with some bed bugs (3 out of 4 girls in my room had it) what caused me a big injury and marks all over my body. back to my home town i had to go to the hospital and today (1 week after my return) it is still very bad. hostel staff should give more attention to it.
awesome hostel with a cool party vibe! ideal location, good breakfast, good wifi, spacious room and really friendly staff.  i'll definitely stay here again when i come back to la
definitely avoid unless you want a party hostel.
breakfast was not so good ! staff was a little unattentive, but the ambience is awesome ! great place to mwet people and party!

hostel was disgusting! we found roaches in the closet and in the bathroom and the guys were complaining about bed bugs!! seriously the dirtiest hostel i've ever stayed at and i usually don't complaint about anything.    also, the kitchen inside the rooms made for a horrible smell in the room. they advertise that as a positive thing but its not!!people were boiling chicken and the whole room smelled horrible.    def will never stay there again. be ware!
so nice i extended my stay for the rest of the week! then again, it also really depends on the company.

i stay with this hostel at least 3 nights everytime i come to hollywood. if you are a first time traveler, book with this hostel. the staff is so friendly and welcoming and they put together all kinds of fun nights out. if you dont meet at least 3 people who will be potential friends, you must be hiding in your room and not trying to have fun. good vibe only here! :)
the long hair guy who works there is so nice and friendly! i highly recommend this hostel.
best hostel ever! :)
really enjoyed our very first stay in a hostel!!
very good atmosphere. lots of young people looking to party, which was exactly what we wanted. good size room with private bathroom and kitchen.
excellent hostel, great facilities and party room. would go back there!

i didn't exactly have the most pleasant stay - the staff were having their own conversations with others in reception while i was checking in, the breakfast was minimal, i wasn't really told about the facilities available and i came back to my room at 1am to find someone in my bed and a note on the door saying 'angela, please come to reception asap'. i had been moved rooms without notice so had to collect my stuff (which was all across the room), remake my bed etc. which was very inconvenient.

the staff worked together to provide great service! each individual was helpful, minus the guy checking us in. breakfast was fantastic, and the atmosphere was great! i appreciated that we did not need to worry about what time we came in at night.     parking was rough. we usually had to park right next to the facility as the lot was full at night. still, definitely a secure area and worth your money.     i recommend this hostel, and i look forward to future visits.

very cool place has its own parking inside. hostel room had kitchen and bathroom. nice towels fluffy unlike most places. laundry on site and breakfast. it's near the hollywood sign. the guy who checked me in i think oscar was his name explained everything well and was cool about everything.  this is a great value one of the best i've been to.
very well run hostel. good events! the beds were awful though....

the property itself is not bad the rooms are decent and well furnished although the blinds are destroyed in most of the rooms and privacy is not present. they have a good shuttle service and decent food. however, the staff are terrible: unhelpful, rude and only interested in hitting on female guests. although there was too large a number of staff on the property (there were actually too many compared to the guests) present in the property they were not doing their job properly.
really great place to stay! lovely staff and lovely people, great for a solo traveller. had good security and comfy enough beds with hot showers. can't complain at all!
easily the best hostel i've stayed at . staff were great , breakfast and dinner good and great location . will come back for sure .

hostel clean and tidy. as the rooms all have individual kitchens it's not as social as some of the other hostels i have stayed in. good amount of activities going on, and hostel organises free shuttle rides to various places too which is really good. on hollywood boulevard but will take about 30 minutes to walk to the main theatres etc. much better location than the west hollywood banana bungalows.

i love the banana bungalows!. this was my 2nd time here & there is always a great vibe!. rooms are awesome with your own kitchen & bathroom in a 6 person dorm. close walking distance to certain sites and easy to drive anywhere from here. breakfast included is a bonus and the day / nightly activities are great!. one of my fav hostels!.
that&#39;s a good party hostel! cool trips, nice staff.
if you really need o try downtown, being on tour all day, this might be okay. else there basically atmosphere

great atmosphere and reall good fun. staff were really helpful and they work hard to keep everyone happy and really enjoyed the different nights of entertainment they put on. and the rooms were clean and fresh. would defiantly stay there again and highly recommend any one else to
the hostel was nice with good location on the end of walk of fame. the breakfast was a bit late and one day they have forgotten to order breakfast so there were nothing to eat except cereal.
great fun and good choice of nightlife activities, highly recommend for your la stay.
awesome atmosphere here.  met a lot of people here that ended up extending because it was so good.  will always stay here while in la.
the hostel should change the password for the front door more often, because you get homeless and weirdos in there.

the most important thing you have to keep in mind before booking this hostel is that it is a party hostel. there a lot of activities involving a high volume of booze. i personally liked it because it's one of the reasons why i booked it. it's a bit pricy though but hostels in la are generally expensive.
pretty good location, easy walking distance to public transport, which i used to get around as i didn't have a car. activities every night which were great for meeting new people!
great hostel but a little out of the way. would prefer a little closer to the action of hollywood. but the hostel itself is awesome with loads of things to do. and great people to meet.
very nice place to stay, would definetly come back!
didn't mind it here. i think the west hollywood is the more party one if you're looking for that.  location is just a few blocks away from the main stuff on hollywood blvd which is handy

there is no security in this hostel. apparently anyone comes and goes from there. the breakfast is very weak, they only give right to two slices of bread per person, there is no type of cheese. partying until midnight making it impossible to sleep early, however tired that a customer has. there is only one common bathroom. i divided the room with seven others people and was an inconvenience to use the bathroom of the room since there was no bathroom available outside the room.

well to kick off, on arrival this place was like a top night club, busy n bustling with life; you felt like this is the place i was looking for; a hostel with life and friendly people. this must be the best hostel i've experienced a party atmosphere in, made some good connections and friends for life; the day tour is fab and well worth the $35 for humor alone, big shout to armani the driver n all the team taking us on bar crawls. 5 star hostel n service... close to restaurants n transport
great hostel great staff nothing to fault. will definitely be back

it's a good place to stay when you visit la with the following provisions:  you can tolerate a party hostel- with courtyard noise every night,   you can tolerate a large range of housemates. cleaning up after roomates who threw up after drinking is a regular occasion, though they were good enough people.  the rooms actually have kitchens and refrigerators in the suites, and they are kept clean enough.  they have cable tv in the suites.  the wifi works well.  filling breakfast of carbs.

all over it was good but i think security could have been a little better. i know that one of my roommates had friends come and stay in the empty bunks without paying. it made me and a fellow roommate feel a bit anxious because they weren't accounted for or on the hostels records if they did anything. we probe should have reported it but we didn't want to get into anyone's bad books, still it's still an issue to consider!

great hostel with friendly vibe and something going on each night so be prepared for a bit of noise. having a kitchen in each room is handy and the location is great for getting around hollywood. close to the metro too if you're looking to go to downtown la.  had a broken shower head in my room but after notifying staff was fixed the following day.  no complaints

it is an awesome hostel, but since it is right in hollywood and a bit far from west hollywood or downtown you may spend sometime riding a bus, metro or even with your car.   the staff is always busy but helpful and the atmosphere inside is awesome.

love that there are individual kitchens and bathrooms per room. excellent activities and great location just 5 mins from the walk of fame, easy access to hiking to the hollywood sign and staff were very helpful and friendly.
best hostel i have ever stayed! great atmosphere!
great place to stay. the atmosphere is great and the staff very friendly. location is also great, within walking distance from the dolby theatre and the famous hollywood sign.
this is my favorite hostel by far. very cool vibes as well as kitchen inside dorm rooms. great location and entertainment during the week. i highly recommend staying here!

it's an old motel converted into a hostel. there is a kitchen and bathroom in each hostel room which made the space very crammed, too many bunks in a tiny room! also, the kitchen wasn't best equipped, however, they offer daily free breakfast and cheap dinners on many of the nights so you don't necessarily need to cook. they organise lots of day tours and nights out, great party hostel for young people (they stop loud music at midnight so not too bad if you are interested in sleeping either)!

the hostel itself is clean and secure. we had the bad luck to be in a room with the dirtiest girl i have seen. the bathroom was disgusting. we went to the office to change room, but the hostel was full. plus, there was no more bedsheet available this night.   it is a party hostel, so if you don't want any noise, choose another place. it's located 10 minutes away from the subway station, in the middle of hollywood boulevard.

all but one member of the staff ( i would name him if i knew what it was) were so much more interested in their own problems/ stuff  didn't seem to want to help when required  the fact that the main communal area was also the carpark and the only place you could smoke made it difficult to enjoy the stuff the hostel had to offer. the large rooms were good but the beds were still jammed together  the only good thing i can see about this hostel was the fact it was so close to the walk of fame etc.
had a nice time. good breakfast, nice rooms and cool common area.
great place! good party!!

staff are friendly and the hostel is located within short walking distance to most of the sites in hollywood. my only complaint for this hostel is the noise level. although i was staying in la on a friday night, the party went on in the center courtyard until the early hours of the morning with music blaring and bass pumping. great pick depending on your reasons for passing through la; for me it didnt entirely match up.
a good hostel that becomes a sort of night club on weekends so a great party hostel if you're into that. free booze on weekends too!
good location and friendly staff. also they gave us lots of things for traveler! this hostel is kind of pricey. but they have nice breakfast and good sociality area!

i loved my stay at this hostel! the room and the bathroom was really cleaned. the breakfast was okay, not a lot of options, but it's a hostel... it was maybe a little bit far from the main attractions on hollywood boulevard, but after you figured out how the transportation works in l.a., you should be fine!    just one thing : a staff member told us that the greyhound station in downtown l.a. was really closed to the subway exite, but it was at least 15 blocks away. we almost missed our bus...
nice place in an amazing location (2 min walk to walk of fame), lots of free food (nutella for breakfast :) !), spacious rooms and helpful staff. would go there again!
the best hostel i have ever been too !  there was nothing negative and i just loved it !!   the activities are great there !   if you are in la, go there !!
good location and nice staff.

the hostel is very close to the walk of fame, but also sufficiently away from all the actions, so not too noisy. the staff are helpful and kind. i didn't stay for too long, but i noticed there were washing facilities, and a kitchen in the room. the only problem is that the room smelled a little bit funny (but that's what happens when you are sharing the room with a bunch of people i guess...), and there were an army of cockroaches to greet you in the bathroom and the kitchen.
it was a great hostel! they had so much to offer like bbq's, tour's and much more. it was a very relaxed atmosphere and i felt like i had gotten to know everyone so well!

was a fine place to stay. it is a fair walk down the boulevard to get to west hollywood but that is to be expected. don't get confused between the hollywood and west hollywood bungalows. both are fine, but west hollywood had better parties.
good friendly hostel something on every night staff are great would deffo stay again
the staff was super awesome!
very convenient location. close to highway for travel to universal and beaches, prime spot for the hollywood walk of fame.  there was night activities at the hostel every night.
great hostel with lots of ongoing activities! great if you want to meet other travellers - the staff makes for a very open and friendly atmosphere!
great staff, great location!
not much to say, overall it was ok. no lockers though and pretty low security on who can enter and leave the property.
this place is really well located, clean and with a good atmosphere. it has wi-fi and common areas so it is really nice to be around. can't wait to come back.
good hostel. recommended. people are nice and friendly. they are happy to give suggestions and helps
great location, friendly staff and chill vibe, if i come back to la, this would be the spot.
great choice of hostel, really close to the boulevard. clean, secure and lots of stuff to do at the hostel. no complaints!
banana bungalow is great! people are nice and the rooms clean with kitchen and bathroom. my favourite hostel by far, recommend it!
is a place more likely for youth. awesome atmosphere

had a great time at the banana bungalow, there was heaps of opportunities to make friends and they had a wide range of activities to sign up for at a great price. lots of free dinners and beer, would recommend especially to a single traveller or if you don't have a car as they do lots of trips to popular spots on the cheap
i really enjoyed my stay at banana bungalow. very chill and relaxing environment and the staff was super nice and friendly! would come back here again!
staff were excellent in encouraging group activities for the night which is great when you're travelling solo. good location.
very friendly and always helping staff, the dinners are amazing and so are the social events at night!
great place to stay - clean, comfortable rooms with lots of included activities

i booked a 4-bed room but realized that there are in fact 2 rooms linked together to share one bathroom and a kitchen. it's nice to have a tv in the room but sometimes it can be noisy if people in another room are chatting and watching tv. it is convenient to go to nearby metro station and only 2 metro stations away from universal studios.
great location in hollywood, next to metro station and all iconic things of hollywood are within walking distance on the same street. facilities are clean, staffs are friendly. nice hostel

could not recommend this hostel more, i had the best time here, everything is amazing, except could do with a swimming pool and duvets in winter! big shout out to armani (apologies if i have spelt that wrong!), best driver ever! stay here and get involved!

the best thing about this hostel for me was the social atmosphere, as i came to la for the first time as a solo traveller for only a few nights. something was going on almost every night, so i got the chance to meet lots of other people. in particular the wine tasting evening and free taco/karaoke night was surprisingly fun (beforehand i could only picture it being somewhat cringe-worthy), helped along by free drinks! i found the staff to be friendly and helpful, and a good laugh to boot!

this hostel is full of mold. me and my friend got really sick (really sore throats, hard to breathe) after the first night and were sick the whole time (5 days). the symptoms were familiar and we got better soon after we left the hostel. also our room mates got sick and they didn't have the flu either.  the free breakfast was allright: toast, jam, peanut butter, nutella, fruits, oatmeel, tea, coffee, juice. the parties were ok and it's also a good thing that there's food every night (not free).

great hostel. rooms have own bathroom and kitchen which is so useful. shower was good. wifi didnt reach our room on second floor very well and was slow at peak times but good in common areas. breakfast was great, as were free tacos for dinner. lively and loud hostel great location for hollywood and easy access to bus services/station.
super mellow helpful staff. amazing common areas and great activities offered

i only stayed here one night coming straight from the airport (intercontinental flight) so i mainly used it for sleeping. but the rooms were awesome with ensuite bathroom and kitchen, never seen that before in a hostel. the bed was squeeky but comfortable. they seemed to offer a lot of activities but i didn't look into them very well. would come back here

brilliant hostel. one of the best ive stayed in!   lively atmosphere, free food, kitchens in the rooms, what more can you want?!     wouldn't do some of their tours / shuttles, can get to all of the places offered cheaper on public transport (just may take a little longer)

first time in hollywood, i already went in west hollywood and i loved it. i love it in hollywood too, clean, nice staff, if i'm going in la again, i will go there! fiew blocks from hollywood boulevard where the names of famous people are. really good breakfast, i mean for me the toast and tea and coffe were enough, but you have cereal and milk too.

it was not a bad hostel. it is closer to the walk of fame and the chinese theatre.  however, music was loud and all the rooms windows go to the patio, where all people are listening to music or talking until long hours, so it may be hard to sleep with the noise. the parking is free but you need to leave the keys with them. breakfast was decent.

very nice hostel if you want to party and have fun, a bit loud if you want to have a good rest during the night. lots of activities organized like parties, dinners, etc. good location to visit hollywood boulevard, runyon canyon park and griffith park. neighborhood quiet during the day and, let's say "lively" during the night, but still safe. very nice and helpful staff with a lot of facilities (like printers, towels, breakfast, etc). no big lockers available though !
