one of the best hostels i stayed so far regarding to facilities, location and value for money. the hotel is a 5 min walk away from the metro and the hollywood walk of fame. prices are low for the us and the dorm i was in has its own bathroom (roomy and clean) and its own kitchen! the hostel proposes many activities every day, however not a lot of people sign in. the inner court is nice even though music is a bit loud in the evening.

not the best location.. yes it's on hollywood boulevard but its a good 25/30 minutes walk to get to the main section.. but otherwise, i liked this place. the rooms were nice and homy, with a kitchen and a good bathroom. some staff friendly, some not so much. good vibes though, party atmosphere but not obnoxious, and very secure. breakfast very basic.

very nice hostel: clean, nice staff, and tasty breakfast. good value for money in the area of hollywood. it's in the opposite part of the walk of fame, far from the crowded areas of hollywood boulevard, which made me feel slightly insecure at night. but, in general it was good.    ah, another thing is that there are parties held in the outdoor common areas in the hostel, so it's a bit noisy at night. i used earplugs!

awesome place to stay! staff were very helpful, rooms were awesome i was expecting alot worse! the location is close to hollywood but hollywood isnt what its cracked upto be but thats not their fault!
this was my second home! amazing people, perfect location, free breakfast, loved the place! great for solo backpackers!
banana bungalow was fabulous for me, as a solo traveller. every night there was something to get involved with! i met amazing people from all over the world who i could spend my days exploring with.
amzing place! love oscar :))
walking distance to hollywood
very noisy in the evenings. dorms arent cleaned til late afternoon.
everything you could ask for in a hostel! all the staff were really friendly and tried to get everyone involved with hostel activities. room was really clean and shower was amazing!
came to la for business. this was great location close to train. beds were comfortable. nice bathroom with hot shower.  comp breakfast was added bonus. $5.00 sunday dinner was great.

hostel was conveniently located about 4 blocks from train. great value for the money. was able to get everywhere by public transportation. fair breakfeast and $5.00 sunday night dinner was great!  would have preferred for them to have quiet in courtyard with no music after 10pm. beds were comfortable and good bathroom facilities.
we enjoyed our stay and the staff was pretty on top of things. seemed like there were lots of group activities, but nothing for under 21
the shuttle from lax cost $14, it was 3:30am, i got service like it was 11am. it was absolutely perfect, i have zero complaints and will definitely book there again!!

amazing value for money! central location. awesome facilities-basketball, foosball and pooltable. kitchen and bathroom in the rooms. free light breakfast and cheap nightly bar crawls and activities.  beds a little squeaky but apart from that, one of the best hostels i stayed in while in the states.

this was the second time i have stayed here. the rooms are big and clean, it is an easy place to meet people if you are travelling solo, the breakfast and the free taco nights are great and the live band / karaoke night is a lot of fun.
only stayed for one night, but it was friday and i joined for the night out in hollywood. had a blast and would definitely recommend as a party hostel.
had a good experience at the banana
had an amazing time here! great if you're looking for good nights life. it can be noisy when they have karaoke

we stayed here for one night on a lay over and a very quick day trip of la. the beds were quite squeaky, decent kitchen and ensuite though. the staff were lovely and so helpful and friendly. the highlight for us was the breakfast, after spending 5 months without decent cereal etc we were so excited when we saw cereal, yummy porridge, toast, nutella and peanut butter, heaven! 😄
i really liked this hostel. cozy place, nice staff!
i loved my stay here at the banana bungalow. the location is great. the staff were fun. the activities were cool too. breakfast was good. i would stay here again.

2nd time at this hostel, 1st time was ok but things seemed to have improved this time as hostel seemed cleaner & more organised. great location on hollywood boulevard, good free breakfast, & a comfy clean bed. happy with everything & will return next time in la. thanks
loved this hostel! helpful staff booked day tours, transfers etc. great breakfast. organised night activities were great for socialising! free alcohol and karaoke is always a win. would recommend
staff sometimes was too preoccupate on having fun than hellping  one of the cleanest hostels ive ever been
the staff here is amazing! people are so chill here, i was able to make so many new friends that sadly i have to say bye to,  i would definetly recommend this hostel to anyone who is traveling to la

location was great, right near everything. events were decent. the reception staff apon arrival and departure were just plain rude. tip the bloke at the convenient store across the rd. hes a legend. he deals with all type of riff raff and still puts on a happy face.
absolutely loved my stay, the staff were so friendly, the facilities were great and it was so easy to meet new people there. location was perfect with lots of things easily walkable or by buses
great hostel with friendly staff! the room was clean everyday what is good and the breakfast was little but enough.

great hostel to stay and party! they organise events all week long and have great deals on dinner, drinks and entry into clubs. the pre drinking here was better than actually going out. rooms have own bathrooms & kitchens too.

fun hostel located in hollywood! would not recommend to anyone looking for peace and quiet, definitely high energy and party orientated. they have awesome events on most days and nights, perfect for anyone not wishing to stay in downtown la and who doesn't mind parties in the inner driveway/courtyard until late most nights.
it was a great stay and if you don't know anyone just participate of any activity they are cheap and you will meet lots of cool people.
really good rooms. i had a kitchen and bathroom in my six bed mixed dorm. everyone is really friendly. i got there early and was able to leave my bag there until my room was available.

this is one of the most fun hostels i've stayed in - always a great, social vibe with events on every night and plenty of free/chesp drinks and food. the rooms were small but comfortable and it was good to have your own bathroom and kitchenette in each dorm.

the hostel has great location, communicative staff and very helpful. all the staff are solicitous to serve you and make your ride the best. the perfect price. they give towel and clean and smelling bedding.  but the accommodation ...  it happened that in my room, there were many cheap (insects) i killed 3:01 friend killed another. it made me sick. i did not warn anyone, for she was leaving.  kind regards.

location is good but i felt a bit unsafe walking back to the hostel by myself in the dark. the rooms are okay, the fact they include their own bathroom and kitchen is a bonus. they're not the cleanest but its bearable. beds were decent, but make sure you ask for a blanket when you check in as they only give you sheets by default. there are lots of hostel activities that are often really cheap which was great. i went to disneyland on a tour organised for me by the hostel and it was fantastic.

i booked for 6 beds and when i checked in they put me in 8 beds when i asked them why they say it is the same prices and we want to keep you with your friend. it was ridiculuos because tge prices are different and when i booked there are rooms for 2 persons on the 6 beds. the hostel is noisey till late night tgere are parties and people do lots if noisey things.

good place to meet people. many things going on. i was there for new years - they had done a lot to make a nice party. arrived there at 1 am and was so tired i didn't see the receptionist decided to keep my driver's licence. i discovered it in a drawer by chance when i two days later asked another receptionist for directions. the receptionist also only gave me a thin sheet for my bed and i was so cold the first night - the next day i found out they have blankets. out heater broke three times.

location is good but some manager was, i think, have a racist mind other manager was so kind but one manager was like racist and wifi is so bad, and heater always have a problem, and so many insect in the room

very disorganized. they don't know how many people are in each room, so we had to look for beds in some rooms.  go there only if you want something very crazy and don't care about organization and cleanliness.
it was just a few days but it was amazing! i recommended for everybody!

couldn't ask for a better location in hollywood and very easy to get to downtown la. probably the best party hostel i've stayed at in the last three months so it's very easy to meet people, plus they do free food and drinks some nights

well. the staff were great   so too the security and they acted on  disturbing behaviour by tossing people out of the hostel.   unfortunately they had some jerks staying there who went way to far   .ie slotting blue movies on dvds that all the women could see....not the fault of the staff as they weren't aware.   some. bloke and a sheila decided to get it on in our dorm room kitchen which i thought was pretty average but the staff acted on that.   they try very hard to control people's actions

very useful computer rooms, nice staff, the hostel provides lots of activities to do like beer nights, however, i would avoid staying in the hollywood area in general because it is disgusting, boring, and lame. not like the movies, but a great hostel!!! would recommend.
one of the beste hostels i have been staying in so far.

in a great location - 10minute walk to the main part of hollywood blvd, trains and buses.  great atmosphere with plenty of common areas to chill or to socialize. bear in mind that if you're a light sleeper you may want earplugs to sleep with as the music can go late. nice free breakfast and plenty of daily activities offered. some staff were really friendly and helpful and some weren't.  the dorm had both a bathroom and a kitchen which was handy! i would recommend this place to a friend.
banana staff was amazing, especially mark, very friendly, fun and welcoming.

the banana bungalow hostel is the best hostel i've ever been to so far. the staff is very nice and willing to help you with everything. the atmosphere is fantastic and there are always some free or low-cost activities you could join in. the dorms are simple and unfortunately not that clean, but i would consider it as average for a hostel.
great place to stay, friendly staff , close to everything.  do not take the night bus to pubs, was a waste of money for nothing

this place was fantastic. everything i could want as a seasoned round the world traveller. cheap washing with free powder. good breakfast, free dinner and drinks on wednesday! seriously amazing. and the karaoke wasn't half bad as well :) clean big room with internal kitchen, although i didn't have to use it as i got so much included food from the hostel. great social areas and activities and good information on what is happening around hollywood. have already sent people this way.
breakfast could have been improved!

our room felt like it needed a good clean. i don't think it was cleaned once in the whole 6 nights we stayed, so the carpet was filthy and there was rubbish all around the room. the bathroom floor kept flooding and there were just towels thrown down to clear up the mess so it was constantly damp. the only mirror in the whole 8 bed dorm was in the bathroom which meant it was constantly busy, would be nice to have a few facilities in the rooms. lots of night time activities to choose from though.

i enojoyed my stay very much. i had a great time at la. hostel is well located. if you don't mind walking in 15min you're at the chinese theatre. it's a good choice if you don't mind the party atmosphere.
rooms are clean and i like the kitchen attached to rooms
great hostel, good value, good vibes
location was perfect and having a garage helped us a lot. at night room became chilly, that would have been better if they had turned on heater.

a very cool, laid-back atmosphere which is always full of friendly people- putting any solo traveller at ease.   the staff are very helpful and the organised trips on offer are great as there is always something to do.   the rooms are quite dirty, but iv seen worse.  the only thing i would recommend, is opening the tiki garden and bar every night, as there are the only places to socialise with other guests, however i went in winter, so maybe there's more stuff going on at night in the summer?
the hostel staff are very friendly, close to downtown and shops area. it really worth what i paid for !!

the hostel was generally okay, except for the staff that was quite unhelpful and rude. they didn't inform or help with any other business than hostel activities. but the long-haired breakfast guy was great! other than that, the rooms were nice and well equipped. also the beverages we're very low-prized!
second visit. excellent. please read my review.
definately worth a stay at this place :)

this hostel is in a good location - close to the red line, great hike to the observatory and on hollywood bvd. the rooms were okay, but had very small lockers. there are lots of activities, so if you're traveling alone this is a great place to meet people. the staff are friendly and helpful as well.
super happy i chose this place! everyone from the staff to other guests were fun and always helpful. loved the kitchen and tv being all in your room. will definitely be back next time i'm in la.
staff are very rude! dorms are dirty and it was a very unpleasant stay !!

i booked and paid for my night here in advance and when i turned up for check in, they had no record of my booking (even though i was physically in the office the evening before to book), so they had taken my money but had no room for me. furthermore, i found them to be incredibly unhelpful and unapologetic for their mistake, and no one bothered to follow up with me even after promising and me trying to follow up. will never ever book banana bungalow again
awesome hostel !!!  i just loved this hostel - probably one of the best hotels i have been at.

everything is run down a bit, works and is clean but not as awesome as other hostels. we had an old guy who snored loud and burned stuff in the kitchen at six every day, pretty sure he was living there. car parking is nice, but you have to leave your keys at the desk and they will give them out to whoever (various staff i hadn't seen let me go back and pick my keys out). my car is bad so i didn't care. bring your own blankets, they just give you sheets.
need soap and paper towels in rooms but otherwise all very good

amazing. everybody was very hospitable and helpful and the vibe of the place was awesome. it was literally a party every night and everybody was socialising and hanging out until all hours of the morning. would definitely come here again. definitely recommended!
i had a great time at the banana bungalow. plenty of fun activities including an open bar karaoke night and free tacos! found cockroaches in my room though but still worth the stay.

location and price was good. however this is not a good place to stay if you plan on sleeping. for 3 nights i had to sleep with earplugs due to people partying out in the courtyard. thought the bathroom was absolutely disgusting- definitially not cleaned very often. not to mention the blocked sink and blocked shower

awesome hostel. staff are friendly and are informative. location is great - on hollywood blvd but down the end..didn't feel so safe going back by myself at night, but that's more me than the hostel itself. the tipsy tour and shuttles to theme parks are worth every penny and i will defiantly stay there again
well located for access to key tourist attractions but a somewhat rundown area of town. lacking common space for guests who want to relax instead of party. very noisy at night.
walking distance from all the hollywood blvd excitement. great value for the money. would stay again!

i had a good 3 nights at banana bungalow. bed was reasonably comfy, however i spent the first couple of nights freezing as only sheets were provided. i loved that the room had it's own kitchen/dining area and ensuite, however the lockers in the room were tiny and power points accessible from the top bunks would have been nice. the staff at meals and evening events were incredible plus there was a great social environment.
an activity every night. one of the best hostel i stayed at. a place to meet people, chill out or party.

i rarely right reviews but i loved banana bungalow hollywood. the staff was so friendly, they even knew me by name and constantly were making recommendations. the place has free parking wifi and breakfast, its in the heart of hollywood, they constantly have stuff going on, the travelers that stay there are chill, it's pretty secure, and very clean. if you're looking for something long term you can even stay there for free if you work 20 hours a week. honestly, i enjoyed staying in too much!

we had booked to stay here 6 nights, we stayed 2. on the 2nd day we established that even with a padlock on them you can still open the lockers. that night my boyfriend got bitten all over by bed bugs!! the next day we told the staff member available we were leaving. we told him why. we had to return twice to get a refund. and their solution to the locker issue was us a bigger lock.
very good hostel. the breakfast and the wi-fi network could be better.
love it here, people are super nice and friendly.  a lot of free stuffs gave away.  not too expensive and get more than toucan ask for.  two thums up.
a great place to stay.  highly recmended.  staff is incredibly helpful and friendly.  location is good.
it was a fun stay!

well situated blocks from hollywood action, banana bungalow is excellent value for dollar at a prime location in los angeles. the bed was comfortable, the kitchen was a nice touch, and the place has a pleasantly laid back atmosphere.

very good hostel with lots of events planned, for every day of the week. not in the best of locations if you do not have a car though. it is possible to get everywhere in la on public transport, it just takes ages.

we enjoyed our stay here. the location is great if you want to be near hollywood. free breakfast which is toast & cereal. coffee tank needs to be disposed of though as is old & disgusting! overall place could do with a clean up, we had ants in the room too as they have a kitchen in each room, which i think is a bad idea as people just leave food out & rooms are not cleaned very well regulary. but it is still an ok place to stay & we enjoyed the atmosphere.

awesome place to stay with lots of activities organised by the staff, who were all super friendly and helpful! only drama is the poor/non existent air conditioners. other than that a great place to stay in la.
coolest place in la
great social atmosphere loved staying here
good hostel, location is great and awesome party atmosphere! also steyed in the weho one.

hollywood is a dump but this is still a reasonably central location to be in. pretty much as good as a hostel gets: tvs and kitchen in every room, events every day, shuttles to the beach, friendly staff etc. they should probably treat their driver better though, sounds like he has to work really long hours

do not stay if single traveller! had a staff member ask me and several friends if we "wanted some black d**k in us" at night, repulsive.. also one of the staff allowed underage drinking and drug taking.. saw several fights happen here many people who didn't stay at the hostel lurk around late at night.. did not feel safe here at all and the rooms where filthy.. much better options in hollywood avoid at all costs
nice place to stay in l.a. ;-)
the hostel is nice, they try to keep you busy with activities day and evening. the facilities are mostly clean, but on my last day i saw a few cockroaches in the kitchen and ants in the bathroom.

so much fun. i made so many friends at this hostel and i really think its down to the amazing staff going out of their way to get everyone involved, i have stayed in hostels since and the atmosphere just has not been the same. the tipsy tour is a great idea and a good way of getting people involved. ara and the thai or philipino guy that did breakfast some days were very informative of all the events going on its nice that the staff remember everyones names. free tacos was a good idea.

the stay was ok but there were a few small cockroaches in the kitchen. i believe this is due to the people we were staying with as there were dirty dishes in the sink. there was also a lot of noise from the occupants of the other rooms who were coming back from nightclubs. fortunately we were so exhausted that we were not too bothered by the noise. finally, the personnel did not help much to rent a car or to pay anything locally with local credit cards.

our room was super dirty and gross, we had an infestation of ants, all over the cutlery and inside the drawers in the kitchen.  the staff came to try and sort it out but there were still small ants crawling everywhere, so needless to say we didn't cook in the kitchen as they were fully booked and unable to move us to another room.  the staff weren't super helpful but they were ok.  there was very loud music playing late at night right next to all the rooms, ( till between 11 and midnight).
we're very very satisfied.

the location was good and the staff was okay. but, in our room there were ants crawling around (probably because of the kitchen and the poor cleaning from the hostel/guests), the shower was always dripping, poor breakfast (just some white bread and cereal) and awful parking space. we booked the hostel for its free parking, but one night it was full and we had to find a parkingspot without help from the staff and then pay and park a few blocks from the hostel. we won't stay here next time in la.

unfortunately, we had to stay there two times. first time we got a dirtiest room ever with not enough free beds, so i had to sleep with my husband in the same bed although we paid for two beds :( we also got a 8 bed instead of a 6 bed room. and the people there were weird. the second time it was much better, only there were bugs in bathroom and in the kitchen :( did not like it.
very nice hostel! i enjoyed very much.

the stay was going great until the third day when we found a cockroach in the room. there were also ants all over the beds. maybe if the hostel didn't have kitchens in the rooms this wouldn't be a problem.     the staff were friendly about it but seemed nonchalant. they refunded us for the next night which we were due to stay and we left a day early.

stayed there for the 2nd time and it's been great! the location is perfect and the staff is really cool! always had much fun during taco and karaoke night!!! they offer day trips and lots of fun times, they're really helpful and if i ever go back to la, i'll definitely stay ther again. they also offer breakfast and a parking space... the location on hollywood blvd is perfect! thanks!
great hostel for the price, some good options for day trips. great $5 dinners and great facilities. second time staying here. would totally recommend.
best time every, will be back

i loved this hostel!!!! first the atmosphere is so nice - over all at night. the hostel has a big yard with palm trees and at night there are loads of blue lights hanging from the trees which looks so nice. also you can see the hollywood sign from the hostel. the staff is very friendly and helpful (ask them for shuttles to sightseeing attractions)! they clean the bathroom in the dorms every day, which was very nice as we stayed in a 8 bed dorm, although we booked a 6 bed dorm, but was no problem
really good place to meet people if you're travelling on your own with lots of organised tours. cleanliness wasn't great though, there were ants in the bathroom.
room was quite dirty, crisps all over the floor and mattress. young crowd, noisy

great hostel with a lot going on! particularly likes the yard area where guests could get to know one another! good hostel for party animals as there are plenty of events! sometimes it was a little uncomfortable to sleep at night due to the heat and the shower head leaked but otherwise would recommend this place!
hostel location and facilities are great. the staff were not helpful and rude at times. not the best.
lovely stay at banana bungalow. great location! would recommend :)
nice stay and staff, good location for hollywood

it was a great hostel. they had stuff plan every night.  it was only like a 10 to 15 min walk to see everything. but the real reason to stay here if you want to meet people from all over the world and you want to party this is the place.

great location with happy young crowd in courtyard, enjoying table tennis, basketball and freedom to hang out. tiki garden on back, where the breakfast is served, is a nice quiet place to chill or use your tablet, as it has lots of electrical outlets. breakfast is simple, but given the comparably cheap rates, a bonus. dorms w own fridge and kitchen, only drawback is that mine had beds divided between entrance area and other bedroom, so people going to the later disturb others passing through.
great place to stay, great parties, super close to everything in hollywood.
really good hostel, great location for pubs and clubs. the staff were good and helpful and different themed nights every night good to get to know people
best hostel i've stayed in. great atmosphere, lots of friendly people, really clean and spacious rooms, activities organised every night and jp was awesome. made la a better experience. thanks a lot!
great hostel good atmosphere easy to chill and party as well! would stay again
stayed 6 nights. front desk staff exceptionally friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful! other staff friendly and efficient. comfortable, easy stay. i would stay there again.

overall the hostel was ok, there was a small issue when we first arrived and our party had been split into different areas. after complaining this was quickly rectified and we were also given complementary dinner, free drinks and entry to one of the top hollywood nightclubs! no complaints there...the hostel itself is actually pretty cool. its laid out in the style of a classic american "motel" the only thing that sucks is the location, its a loooong walk to the main hollywood attractions.
great facilities and worth the money, staff are helpfull and the travelers that stay there are fun and friendly, deffinately worth the stay!

we stayed for two nights in a dorm and were really satisfied with our stay. there was a lot of young people socializing at the evenings wich was great. the hostel also has a free parking lot for those with a car. it is first come first serve but we got a space all the time!

nice stay in hollywood. around 10 min walk from metro station, 1 min walk from bus station. great for me to explore my dreamland. but one tip for other travelers: do not stay in room 104. wifi sucks; noisy (radio from 8am to 11pm); people talking by your window at any time even at late night cause the room is by the common area.
pretty good for a few nights stay. lots of drinking games and fun for the family
an awesome, clean, friendly and sociable hostel.
ok place to stay considering there aren't many better options in los angeles. spacious dorms and helpful staff. la city tour was not worth the money, don't bother.
would definitely recommend this hostel, will most likely be staying there again in the future.
a hostel with a good atmosphere. in hollywood so good if u like the walk of fame and chinese theater. la is a large city with bad public transport so not a great location if that is not your thing.

fun hostel with good activities each night. make sure you get involved and enjoy. bit of a walk from hollywood/vine but needed to walk off the alcohol/food every night. had such a good time with everyone there.
the atmosphere and location was really great. the rooms were a little cramped. we also experienced a problem with room placement; however the staff was very apologetic and accommodating.

first time traveling alone and i couldn't have chosen a better hostel to stay at. lots of cool people from all around the world, friendly staff and nice dorms, combined with the perfect location right in hollywood and lots of activities: the perfect vacation for a budget traveler. even if money is not an issue, i can recommend the hostel for making friends and having a great time!

stayed here more than to times.  room with kitchen in dorm room, only share with six people witch is great if your planning on making food.  one oven/stowe didn't work in one room, one bathroom didn't have a working shower, i guess that's maybe too expensive to fix the bathrooms.  young crowd with party instinct, an activity every evening/night like free taco dinner and free beers with karaoke later.  one of most rememberable stay i had over the hostels in la
very clean and nice. super friendly and helpful staff. breakfast was a bit scarce but as soon as pb looked empty, the staff replaced it immediately.
definitely a party hostel. so if u want a quiet stay in hollywood i wouldn't go here. good party atmosphere here.

atmosphere good because the other visitor were fun. however, the staff is not qualified to solve any problems. not only did one of our smartphones get stolen, moreover the staff didn't show any concern and wouldn't even help us to get it back. the person taking care of the reception at that time asked us what we could do to solve the problem, my friend had to explain to him how to do his job and how to find out phone numbers of other residents. the tours are overpriced, they take advantage.

this place was in a great location and the staff were really helpful. lots of info on buses and how to get to places which was great! the bunks were incredibly squeaky and some of the pillows were little more than a ball of fluff but the mattresses were comfy. the shower in our room was a little cold and the wifi was patchy and weak at best - but overall the place had a great atmosphere and lots of activities and dinners if you wanted to participate. definitely good value!
awesome place with very friendly staff and organised hostel activities every day. really nice place to stay.

cheap, but otherwise very mixed feelings.  decent and clean bathroom, absolutely filthy bedrooms.  rusted lockers and very old rooms, including power sockets with cable coming out of the walls. however the private kitchen and fridge is useful.  somewhat of a shifty neighbourhood but the price is good.

really enjoyed my stay here, very easy to meet other travelers and the staff were very friendly and helpful. the only thing i would maybe recommend is that you stay in the west hollywood hostel which is nearer the beaches and the actual walk of fame is a bit cheesy.

i loved that they serve free nutella for breakfast, i have never found a hostel that does that and i was also really impressed with the quality of people working in this hostel.  elena (i think she is italian) is super helpful  i suggest you reach out to her if you need anything.   i think i made a new friend!  i'm definitely coming back and recommend this place!

our stay was okay, the location wasn't the best, it's close to the walk of fame and about 15 min walk to the chinese theatre etc, but to get to santa monica on public transport it took about 90 mins. the wifi only worked outside of the rooms and was pretty slow. you're only given a sheet, no quilt, so we were freezing a few of the nights. we got told off when we were airing our room out by having the door open during the day, but at 3am people were allowed to play basketball and shout.

would not stay here again as i was overcharged by $5.24 (apparently they don't charge cents and just round - that was $0.24 cents of it - a rip off). they have a $5 card fee. she said that it was on this website and their website, i said that i didn't see it on either website. i would not stay here again, as i'm not happy about their rounding policy and not being advised until that i got to check in, that they have a $5 fee for paying on card !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
this place is absolutely amazing for a backpacker, i met some great people and partied until 4.30am. the staff were really friendly as well and made sure that everyone got involved
location is perfect, atmosphere is great, but some staff just don't have clear picture of their job and wifi there is absolutely horrible.
loved my stay there perfect location great people n cheap for what was included
location is perfect, atmosphere is great, but some staff just don't have clear picture of their job and wifi there is absolutely horrible.

both the regular staff and the travelling staff made this one of my favourite hostels of all time, and i've stayed at quite a few.  guiseppe and sam especially were diamond geezers with their approach to guest relations, massive thanks to all at bb.  ps. the tiki gardens are looking fab.
top hostel. amazing social activities and stellar staff!!
love everything about this place. a cool place for party poppers !
clean rooms, separate bathroom and kitchen, friendly environment. really liked it.

thanks banana bungalow for an amazing start to our us adventures! fantastic, friendly hostel with plenty of people around to hang out with and party. giuseppe is a fantastic addition to the staff, always ensuring we were participating in the nightly events! wifi was a bit hit and miss for us. white rabbit & cheeky x

the hostel has a great cost effective, but needs to improve its security. my towel disappeared from my room and no one was keen to help me look. luckily it was an object of low value, but i wonder that the same policy should apply to objects of great financial value.
only bad thing was there was limited kitchen utensils, had to borrow from staff. so the kitchen was pretty useless

the hostel is nice with plenty of activities, friendly atmosphere and nicely layed out. staff can sometimes be useless when asking for help - got given, you just google it and it'll tell you when asking them a few questions. there was an instance when people not actually staying in the hostel were just loitering around and there was one day where someone off the street pretended they were staying in the hostel and tried to access a room. they do have parking inside the hostel which is a bonus.

whether you'll enjoy your stay depends on what you're looking for.  this is very much a party hostel and since my room happened to be above their after hours party room, it was very hard to get much sleep.  to be fair when i brought this up at 4am the staff did have them turn the music down.  the dinner and club event was fun and the location is great if you want to see hollywood.

really good. the dorms had both an ensuite and small kitchen. free breakfast and internet. daily housekeeping, so it's always clean. good location right on hollywood blvd. laundry is very cheap, and hostel activities most days. only complaint would be the hostel activities are pretty unorganised, especially the trip to the other hostel. you're much better off going out for the night doing your own thing.

this is probably the best hostel i have stayed at. my stay was really good, stayed for 6 days and there was something going on every day/night. and it was either free or really cheap. the room may not have been the cleanest and the shower was really slow but we had a kitchen and it was good. i stayed in a 6 mix dorm. it was really close to the main part of hollywood boulevard. the staff was really great, friendly and fun trying to engage you in their activities.     5/5 toasts for sure

the set up of the hostel was good i especially liked the tiki bar where you eat breakfast. our room setup was good except that it smelt terribly for the 3 nights that we were there. wifi was good everywhere except the bedroom. the guys that were organising parties and drinkin etc. were very good at trying to get you involved and meeting new people. location is good if you want to spent time in hollywood and is a short walk to los angeles metro train. overall good stay!

we'd booked 2 beds in a 8 bed dorm. when we go into the dorm it was so messy we weren't even sure which beds were free or taken. we went back to reception and they upgraded us to a private double so we were very pleased. stayed 3 nights in total. breakfast is included which is great. they always have something going on in the evenings which you can join in on. one night they did free beer and tacos :) the location is good but we spent most of our time seeing the surrounding areas of l.a

i've stayed in a lot of hostels, and this is by far the best one ever!!!!! from the staff to the location, this hostel more than deserves the perfect score i gave it. i would definitely stay here again, and i highly recommend banana bungalow to anyone staying in la.
besides the crazy girl who kept talking to herself and waking everyone up, it was a nice and clean hostel.

security and location is pretty so so. it takes about 5~10 minutes from hollywood vine station to the hostel.  staff.. it depends on the staffs.  atmosphere is pretty good. there were many people hanging out each other on the yard everyday.  cleanliness is poor. it seems they arrange just blankets. nothing is cleaned.  and what i was really disappointed is they required 5$ for paying with card. it didn't mention before. it sucks. there is no hostel like this. the bed was too noisy.

great place and value for money. rooms are ok and hostel structure is good! great breakfast and location is nice close to metro. the "hawaian/indonesian guy" loves to sell tours! you have to eat on the thai restaurant just beside the palms!

hostel was overall a good place to stay, had a lot of room and the staff really made an effort to include everyone in group activities to get everyone to mingle. they also made it very affodable for backpackers on a tight budget.

the hostel is really good. i stayed in a bedroom for six people. the bedroom was cleaned every day and there was a kitchen and a bathroom in it. the only thing bad is the wifi, the intermt is slow and sometimes it was possible to use it only outside de bedroom.
cockroach in the fridge as well as a pot full of mold. please check up on the fridges when cleaning.
really nice!

the rooms/facilities here are great! they have nice bathrooms and kitchens which is very handy,and the internet is good with a lot of free computers available for use. overall i thought it was a nice place and i'd stay again.
very helpful staff ... even tell u what's good to do in the city :)  happily stay here again !! chilled vibe ...

loved my stay here, they have heaps of stuff going on - karaoke, dinners, nights out etc so it's really easy to meet people. the staff were awesome and the cheap dinners were pretty good. was also nice to have a bathroom and kitchen in the room (not that i used that much!). good location right near the walk of fame. great hostel if you want to party :-)
it is just 2 blocks from the walk of fame, and it is just on the hollywood boulevard! the price is good and excellent location

a great party hostel, you meet people, they have always something going on, you get free beer, coffee, breakfast (which was not just bread but also cereals, fruits, ...)  and on some days every week, they even have a free tacodinner. also the staff is really funny and friendly and the terace looks great and is nice to relaxe. it's really close to everything in hollywood.
a great place to meet nice ppl!

i thought this was a very nice hostel. the staff was really nice :) they made this a wonderful experience. the hostel is located on hollywood boulevard, but a bit on the outside. the hostel provides wonderful information and print out tickets for free. they recommended me a nice hostel in sf as well, which turned out the be great.

i was a solo female traveler, so i needed a really convenient place to stay and i am really glad i picked this hostel. it has a 4-5 minutes of walking distance from hollywood/vine metro station and my return at late night was not a problem.    they offer free breakfast, free wifi, computers and 2 pages of free printing. lockers are available in rooms but you need to have your own lock.    there is also a very good and unexpectedly cheap thai restaurant next to the place.
the hostel was nice.

we enjoyed a bit noisy in courtyard late at night  breakfast excellent got my airport shuttle refunded  staff very helpful   was close to metro and hollywood strip a walked down  if you enjoy walking  a good walk to  hollywood hills and planetarium. value for money
very clean, the.stuff nice and helpful,  excellent breakfast
really good hostel, nice free activities (sometimes with free food and free beer)!! rooms with kitchen and bathroom in
very nice hostel with great people
the staff were friendly and always helpful. the location wasn't great- our bed was right next to a main road but it's good if you want to be close to hollywood strip.

had a wonderful time, especially as a solo traveller. the pool table and table tennis table made for some great entertainment and friend making! i would advise that lone females like myself don't venture out to far at night, as the area is a little sketchy.

it was really great to have stayed at banana bungalow hollywood! great location: close to walk of fame, hollywood sign, metro station, a lot of restaurants, liquor store, supermarket, etc. la is a very spaced out city, so it is impossible to be really close to everything, but this hostel offers sightseeing for a not so cheap price and party bus to clubs. it is a very party atmosphere. i made great friends and i went alone. i recommend this hostel.

great help from the reception girls, bathrooms were always cleaned well by the cleaning crew.    there is always something happening at the hostel every night plus they are great value for everything!
it was one of the best experiences ever. i'm definitely coming back.
the place is ideal; the location, the atmosphere and the events created by the tireless staff made it a very relaxed and enjoyable stay.

i thought i could have been treated with more respect.  in a private room the first night, i was subjected to the ills of bed bug bites and cockroaches.  $6 was knocked off my bill for the inconvenience.  six dollars!  i stayed 3 more nights in a dorm situation and contended with drunk and disorderly (and messy!) australians and other strange travelers.    i was so unhappy there i flew back to toronto where people are a lot nicer.

worst hostel i've ever stayed at, but also the cheapest.  would be better if they spent their money on new beds and better locks than lcd tvs and kitting out party buses.  the first staff member i met was a rude and uncompromising front desk lady, second was a tour bus driver who i thought was great until i learned he was essentially a drug dealer (and insinuated that i would be taking the blame for the coke if we were stopped.).  beds are truly awful.  only stay here if all you want is a party.
always a pleasure. best hostel in la!!!!!
so much fun! nothing more to say other than you will have so much fun!!! and the staff are phenomenal!!!

nice hostel, good location and friendly staff. breakfast its outside and can get a bit chilly still its a nice breakfast. it gets a bit loud at night. u might want to reconsider if u need to rest but you ll like it if u want to party.
staff really helpful and nice, location for that small money is excellent! and atmosphere is really friendly. you can meet a lot of interesting people from all over the world.

to be fair , staff are relatively helpful to help me in directions by printing out navigations etc. the hostel promised to received my parcels but one of them were refused & sent back, i left without my parcel, tours were great, place v retro, old style hollywood, but relatively clean, beds creaking though, location is 10mins frm train station, no activity nearby during night, wifi signal v weak in room, but room is like a studio with a fully equiped kitchen, good for short stay in los angeles
staff were a great help in great location. only problem were language barriers between the people in the room we shared with. jim on reception was brilliant and beyond helpful.

this is a fun and active hostel.  everytime i go to la, this is the hostel i would stay.  it's fun, active, awesome staffs, great location, and cost.  location is just 15 mins walk to main hollywood attractions.  they have daily activities at the hostels, where you can easily meet other travelers from all over the world.  one of my fav is the ping pong table :)

i met lots of nice people here. both in my room, at breakfast in the garden and at the karaoke night. the hollywood nightclub trip on the other hand was "meh".  can be a bit noisy in the courtyard at night but most nights seemed to be ok.  a guy there sold us some basketball tickets which a good experience.  bit of a walk to the stars but not too bad.  i recommend jogging up runyon canyon hills!  there are a few crazy people in hollywood talking to themselves in the street.
defiantly would stay at banana bungalow again! thought it was great that staff went out of there way for evening social events. also thanks for the complimentary breakfast :) !
a lot of party and nice evening events!

this is a great hostel to stay in. this was my second time staying in this hostel. its in a great location on hollywood blvd. they run  a variety of tours from the hostel and its easy to walk to public transit to get around. the staff are friendly and helpful. there is a free continental breakfast. lockers in the rooms. they clean the rooms everyday and they have excellent security as well as parking spaces.
it has a good location, the free parking is a really good value. staff were friendly and helpful.
the guy call jim e the another girl (sorry i do not remember the name) are great persons. this place is very cool, and party every day.
helpful staff :)

bathrooms are clean. my shower drain was clogged a few times, once management cleared it, the other time i cleared it myself. most people who worked for the hostel office were very kind and accommodating. having respectful roommates is the luck of the draw. i shared a room with many travelers, a german guy, & australian being the most respectful. french people were good too. an italian guy, & slovakians being the rudest, making uncalled for comments on my weight. i wish there was more parking.

great place to stay, fun and friendly and has events to keep you busy and partying. location is ok, walk to the stars on the boulevard in 20 mins. room has kitchen and bathroom, perfect. it's clean and has great breakfast. it's not a 5 star hotel but suits the area and weather and is designed to meet people and party. super staff always helping you and offering advice and joining you on free drinks and free comedy shows. great value for money only the beds are a bit small and stiff, no biggie

staff was very friendly and helpful. big plus that the rooms were cleaned everyday, especially the bathrooms get dirty really fast with 6 people in a room. location is very good, within walking distance of a lot of stuff. everything was really relaxed and well organised.

cons: sheets were a bit dirty, fitted sheet didn't have draw string so kept coming off the bed, blinds were broken so light came in, breakfast = extremely basic    pros: ping pong table, good location, cheap vending machine

very good! maybe a little noisy by the evening but it's a friendly place!  posto davvero carino, soddisfa pienamente le aspettative, personale cordiale e bella gente, atmosfera allegra. posizione abbastanza centrale. portarsi adattatori.
very good. right on main hollywood bvd. walking distance.  staff really good. friendly, helped me with printing and any questions.
i will stay there again.
the hostel is very right;y placed in hollywood right after walk of fame and access to all the food joints nearby.

banana bungalow is one of the top social hostels i have been to. the staff are very helpful in creating a fun and entertaining atmosphere. its really as good as it gets for meeting new people from around the world. i had an unforgettable time there. there is always something going on.

really great staff - plus the rooms are fabulous. they will assist you with anything you need. location is a bit out of the way however walking distance from a good outlook on the hollywood sign and the boulevard.  definitely a party hostel,  so i wouldn't suggest it if you want a particularly quiet one. but as a solo traveller it made it easier to meet people plus there is always something going on.
the hostel is very nice and people amazing. if i come back to hollywood i would stay over again :).

as a girl i got put in a room with 4 very dodgy large men and felt very unsafe. it was extremely loud at all hours of the night and they would not give me a refund when i was not happy with my stay and left four nights early

place is okay, but only if you like to party a lot. loud music until midnight, but quiet afterwards. i liked the fact that our dorm had its own kitchen, but the beds bunk beds were quite old and instable and when the other guy in my bunk bed moved during the night, i he would wake me up and vice versa. also the door of our dorm would could be opened from outside without a key unless locked. with 6 people sleeping in our dorm, it was virtually never locked.

don't miss the 'celebrity tour' they offer. okay, you hate celebrity worshipping, (so what are you doin in la!?) but, anyways, take it. mikel, the german/italian driver-guide is the funniest. besides they has a different activity every night. usually i don't like big hostels, but their activities allways help to group people.   não perca a 'celebrity tour'. ok, você odeia celebriades (então não vá pra la), mesmo assim pegue o tour. mikel o motorista-guia é o melhor.
really happy with this hostel that i am returning for another stay when i go back to la

have to say it like this.. if you want to go in bed early and early in op this is not the hostel to choose.. but if you want a awesome time and some awesome hollywood partys and nice staff this is the place

would not recommend this hostel. there was an awful smell inside and it did not feel clean at all.   the location was ok, walking distance to the beach but a taxi journey to shops, bars and restaurants.   would not stay here again.
a great hostel, friendly staff and guests
most comfy hostel i have ever been..

great hostel for party people. every day there is something going on and it's really well done. they have a nice big patio where you can hang out at a daytime or have a party on the evening. the stuff very nice and easy going. the only small bugs were the poor breakfast and sometimes dirty bathroom ( i've seen some cockroaches there) but despite this it's very fun, very relaxing place to stay, so i can definitely recommend.

most of the staff were very friendly and helpful. the rooms were great! ours had a big bathroom and a full kitchen and it was a 6 bed dorm. beds were good. but the best is the atmosphere! tons of stuff to do and the hostel had cheap or free activities every night of the week. i had a fantastic time. highly recommended!
i liked the stay at this hostel. our room had an own kitchen where we could cook. we even could park our car outside for free. very nice!
had a great stay - no complaints. it was very nice that they organised the comedy night with free food and beers. has everything you need, staff were helpful and atmosphere was great.

great layout, payed to be in a 6 bed dorm, we where put in an 8 but the room was far better than expected. great people and the hostel does their best to get everyone interacting and having fun together. do not take the celeb homes tour, we couldn't see anything from the bus and everything we where told by our driver was very out of date! go with a different company for these sorts of tours! however the nights out the staff arrange are fab! great way of meeting people.
this is the best hostel i have ever stayed in and the staff are awesome! they give you free food and drinks all the time it's so good!

overall amazing stay!  nice staff (odile, the french lady, is a gem), great location, everyone is so chilled out and welcoming, i was amazed!  you feel very safe as well, i'd leave for the day and lleave my laptop on the bed without a problem 'cause i knew it'd be here when i come back, that's how safe it was! i'll definitely stay there again!   it's a bit noisy but i didn't care. i just loved it, best hostel i've ever stayed at yet!

location was good! but the rest was horrible.. the dorms were so dirty and there was much stuff and garbage lying on the floor and in the shelves! same with the bathroom, you would definitely not goin there without shoes! breakfast was okay.. they play music all night long and it's always very loud and they start again playing music at seven in the morning! so if you want at least some sleep, choose another hostel!

my score would be higher if i hadnt had a bad experience with the guy who was in reception when i arrived, late at night (around 1am). he first said the hostel was fully booked even though i said i had a reservation, and invited me to turn around. after insisting, he finally checked my name and let me in. he asked for the keys of my car and photocopied my credit card. i asked why was that necessary, and he said: "hostel rules, if you dont like them, there are other hostels." rest of staff:great.
spacious hostel. lots of european travellers to hang out with. close to the main sites. good place to stay  in hollywood!

the hostel is nice, especially because there was kitchen and bathroom in every room. breakfast is really poor and you need to pay if you want to eat yogurt. it's okay, nothing really special. the location is good, but if you're not 21 you can find cheapest hostel, because here is everything about the party. they organize party every night, but if you're not old enough you can't join.

staff was very friendly and helpful. location was good just a couple of blocks away from the main stuff. and right on hollywood blvd.  rooms were in a bad condition and the bathrooms were very dirty. beds are very old and squeeze u can sleep very good. breakfast was ok nothing special. nust cerials and toast.  it was very noisy snd loud all night long. would't go there again

the mattress was terrible. it was very dirty and the linen provided was average. definitely time to upgrade them... or clean the mould off. other than that, it was well organized, with a nice outdoor area and good free tours. the $10 limo ride with unlimited drinks was good..but be careful. they say entry to the club at the end is free, but when u get there the guy at the door claims its now $20 and probably takes a cut!

i had a really good time! something is going on every night and i met many great people. the walk of fame starts only a few blocks away and public transportation is close, too (you need a car in la...). i would definitely stay there again!

best of the hostels in hollywood. what makes hostel a good hostel is staff and the nice gathering place when people from all over the world can meet each other and travel together. it has the best value of money compare to the other hostels. lot of activities, great partying, bbq atc. great place to stay on hollywood blvd.  only dislike is that little tiny window cost a $40!  do not try to brake it.

i only stayed at banana bungalow for one night, but i was very happy with the hostel. the location was great for hollywood sightseeing and the staff were very helpful. it was nice to have a kitchen and bathroom in each dorm too. there was a beach party going on the night i arrived, so it was quite noisy, but the activities offered did seem pretty good. the free breakfast was quite basic, but overall the hostel was very good value for money. i would definitely recommend banana bungalow.
people kept bringing friends in and out of the rooms and leaving all there mess in the kitchen area. people also ate out food in the fridge.

travelled around america for 4 weeks using hostels and this was by far the best hostel we stayed on. great location on hollywood boulevard and great atmosphere in hostel. staff always looking to help you and the range of events that hostel organises makes it a great place to stay whilst your in la!
banana bungalow hollywood is amazing. you got everything around you that you can do by walk, 24/7 food court, also the staff is awesome.

we really enjoyed our stay in banana bungalow. the staff is really nice and there are activities planned everyday which made our stay lot more fun. clean, safe and real close from the stars on hollywood boulevard.

i f@$!# ing loved this place. this was my very first hostel. and this aussie travelling alone was looking to meet new people and have a blast. banana bungalow did just that. i met so many great people. everyone is friendly. and the staff are very helpful. i'm now at my 3rd hostel and trust me ever since i've been to the bungalow it's been down hill from there. i have definitely peaked early when it comes to awesome hostels.

we enjoyed it soo much!! the staff was really nice and we had a great time!! there was something going on every night and we met a lot of interesting people.   the rooms were nice and in good condition and each had an own bathroom and kitchen.

perfect hostel ever!! we had an amazing time!! the staff was very welcoming and everybody was nice to us! they know how to create an ''l.a.'' atmosphere!! we were supposed to stay only 2 nights and we decided to change our plans when we saw how fun it was to be at this hostel. so we stayed one more night and a lot of people did the same thing when we were there!

tour of la was great. good service,  great location. i was surprised at how large the room was (4 bed dorm); had it's own kitchen + huge fridge. room was in perfect shape! would definitely stay here again!
bunk beds and pillows need up grading, the rock and squeek.   usa hostels have great one  (with power points and reading lights and nice and sterdy.
i like the room with the kitchen it's pratically and the breakfeast place is originally i will become

great hostel to be social in, travelling alone you wont have any problems meeting people here with especially the friday and saturday night parties!!     the hostel is good and a good location, short 10 min walk to the chinese theatre region.   definately the place to stay i in la!!
great hostel, good atmosphere with a strong social side.
great in-house entertainment and community atmosphere. included breakfast is always good.

this is a very cool place! the staff is very friendly and helpful. they provide breakfast each morning, which saves a hungry traveler money. the rooms, as well as the rest of the property are kept very clean. i would definitely recommend this place for young people who want to stay in a clean, safe place with a party vibe.
had a good stay, staff was helpful, free food and drinks almost everyday of the week. can't stay i have any complaints.
had a pleasant stay st the banana bungalow. mark's celebrity tour was very funny. the thai restaurant next store is very nice and reasonably priced.
nice hostel in nice area, clean, well organized activities. it's kind of in the expensive side, but remember, it is on hollywood boulevard, and also, free parking!

the banana bungalow was a great place to stay for 1 night or two but probably not more than that.  the staff were accommodating and very lovely but it was disappointing that they cancelled the sightseeing tour on the morning of.
a really good three days! only positive thingsto say from our stay
great hostel and great staff!
great staff. good atmosphere. very fun place to stay. good location if you want to see hollywood.

stayed here for 3 nights and this is a vibrant hostel that always has things going on! probably not for quiet travellers as there was music and drinking going on most evenings but if, like me, that is your thing then this place is perfect. they arrange trips in the evenings and have activities going on mostly all the time. also a good mix of nationalities seem to choose this place and it is ring on hollywood boulavard and the hollywood sign is in walking distance.
its a nice place to stay, basically in the heart of hollywood. just a few minutes to the walk of fame and one of the best thai restaurants right next door!

this was a pretty awesome hotel if you want to stay in hollywood. the staff are great. the atmosphere was great. there is always something arranged by the hostel to do at night which is great when travelling alone. the room was pretty clean and a pretty good size

except for the fact that the first impact was terrible (wrong and not yet cleaned room given to us, two unwilling girls at the reception), everything was fine. very good mood at this hostel, ideal to get to know to other people. small bar/club inside, basket for playing basketball, awesome the bar where breakfast is served, biliard table, parking lots inside the yard, atm, ...! you feel at home. located just 10-15 minutes from the walk of fame.

best hostel i have stayed at - perfect for young people who want to meet people and have fun. definitely recommend! great location, walking distance from main hollywood strip. free, very decent breakfast. awesome nighttime activities including karaoke, free bbq and the night cruise limo. took us out to awesome clubs and got us in for free. winner.
very nice place, great location, value for money , and friendly staff , thanks alots guys
i had a great time
i think it is for people who like to party! if you don´t belong to that group go to another hostel.
great location staff awesome. every stay is always fun!
the staff were friendly. the location was very good. how to use the washing machine and laundry was quite confusing first, though. i put $2.00 to buy a $1.50 drink and i didn't get any change.
the hostel is nice. breakfast is good. the location is good too. they have garage parking for free. greats parties, they organize party every night. awesome!

the facilities in the dorm is great, complete with kitchenette, sitting area, place to hang wet towel and good water pressure, except the bed seem shaky and mattress was too soft to give back pain. located in hollywood boulevard street and near to subway station. staffs were friendly and helpful. i have bad experience with the disneyland trip that booked with them, tour center did not believe i have paid transport charged as hostel forgot paid to them, so remember to get receipt whenever paid.

solo traveller, stayed in 6 bed dorm. i loved everything about this hostel! the name is what caught my eye when making my booking.  the people i met, the organised social events, the kitchen/bathrooms in the rooms even a tv in the room. the rooms are cleaned everyday. staff are friendly. great thanks, i will be coming back and recommending :)

pretty good hostel, lots of activities etc, the room had a small kitchen in it, breakfast was good.  my only complaint is that the bunk bed i had was super shaky and whenever the person in the bed below moved the whole thing swung like crazy.  they should consider securing the beds or replacing them with sturdier framed beds.  the location was good (la is a big sprawl though obviously), but there are a lot of strange people in the area!
this is one of the best hostel i've ever stayed in! this is litterally perfect, the staff was very helpfull and all the tours and activities were great ! i totally recommend it

great location!  location and secure parking were really the best part of this hostel for me.  the staff were also very nice/helpful and i appreciated the passcode security access to the hostel.  dorms were simple, but included a kitchenette and bathroom.  dorm bed was comfy enough, breakfast was available (cereal, bread/spreads, and coffee/tea), and the tiki lounge area was cute.  it's not my favorite hostel, but i would absolutely stay again if in the hollywood area.
nice hostel in an excellent location. been there for only two nights and i was a really awesome part of my trip!

the place is great, something on every night ad easy to get to places from there. had issues with a creepy guy making the girls in the room uncomfortable but the staff were fantastic in resolving the situation and removing him.

this hostel is super rad! one of the best ones ive stayed at. it has the perfect southern california vibe, and is in a great location. subway only couple blocks away. trader joes also super close. the rooms are very spacious, equipped with kitchen space. i really liked the tiki lounge as well. the place has everything you need and more. will definitely stay there again when i go back to los angeles.

i really enjoyed my time in banana bungalow. the hostel is nice. they clean the rooms everyday and try to organize different events. especially tuesday nights are great, lots of free food and drinks. some nights are really fun but some nights can be very quiet too. the only problem is the location. hollywood is really not a nice area to stay. it might be a better idea to spend some days close to the beach.

genuinely really liked this hostel, really glad i stayed. the staff were lovely, there is a massive courtyard area with ping pong, pool, tv and computers, and there are daily events on at the hostel like karaoke, party buses. its a good place to meet people. i would go back.
i would recommend banana bungalow to my friends. all said!

great hostel, good location.  the room had a lot of space, though it could use cleaning, particularly beneath the fridge and sofas.  the staff was very friendly and the trips were very well organized and worth it.
great hostel! awesome parties, everybody on the staff was very receptive, i had a great time!

im from argentina, i spend 3 days there itss a grat hostel i would go back.  itsa great place to know people becaouse every night the hostel organize some bbq o pizza or somethink where you dinner with all the people of the hostel.  i didnt like very much the location of the hostel because if you walk to one side was the hollywood blvd an its nice walk, but if you go to the other side was more poor.  i never had some problem and arrived every night late at door.  very safty inside   regards!

the only criticism i would have is that the sheets provided for the beds are not warm enough. we were provided with a thin sheet to sleep under and as a result were freezing every night. something more substantial is required.

hostel could be amazing, but staff are indifferent and they don't market trips/evenings out etc well enough.  location is excellent though, right on hollywood blvd.  rooms averagely clean, with limited kitchen items (e.g. 1 mug for a room for 8 people, no glasses or cutlery, so not really a kitchen!!).
women staff could really work ib friendluess and customer service.
excellent location, and very pleasant staff.  the hostel offers travelers who like to be in a place where there are "lots of things to do" and a party atmosphere.

good to have a place to park the car, but sometimes it was blocked by another car. the room i stayed had a kitchen with microwave and refrigerator, but the carpet was really dirty. the lockers are really small, only for documents and a small purse. the breakfast is ok, but on saturday i arrived 30 minutes before it was over,  and there wasn't any bread or cereal. the karaoke night is fun, but it is really loud in the rooms. i recommend it if you have a car, but you can't be much picky.

the hostel itself was decent.    my buddy "lost" his phone there, but someone in the hostel "found" it later. they offered to return it, but it's been almost two weeks and he still hasn't received it. don't trust the staff to get your stuff back to you, at least in a timely manner, if you forget anything there.    room was nice, and the general atmosphere was good. parking availability was a definite plus.
it was perfect, we met a lot of people and the hostel had a lof of activities.
meet some awesome people there!

all round good hostel if you are on a budget. i left one night early and checked into a hotel. my room was just freezing and really dirty. a few bad things like holes in towels and the bath was always full of water. no proper blankets and full of holes. if they invested in some new linen i would stay again. great access to hollywood blvd. a little scary at night but  good location for your first time in la. wifi in the room a bonus and lots of shops and restaurants nearby.

this hostel is amazing stayed here twice and i will be back next time im in la always friendly people working and fun people staying here, music playing pool table and ping pong where i was taught to play beer pong bloody brilliant! the place has recently changed hands but is still vibrant and fun, the new owner seems to be much more organized and is doing alot of work on the place, he is lots of fun and a great source for hollywood tips. so close to all the best shopping, aswell as good clubs

great place! i was only there for two nights and was really tired after long flights so didn't party with the rest of the place, but it sounded fun. great vibe around the place. was close to all the sights and was just a funky little place to be!! would highly recommend!!

this hostel was cleaner than some pricey hotels ive stayed in. the housekeeping was friendly and those ladys did an awsome job.  most of the staff was very nice, fun and helpful.  they offer a lot of activites for day and nighttime. and even when it is a slow time,they try to arrange fun activities.  some nights i wished the staff would care about sleeping guests. 4am wasted guys screaming, knocking at every door, i hope somone would have told them to shut up. i tried but they would not listen.
great value for the money! nothing to complain! id stay there again!!! ;) the other bungalow is more party!!!

the hostel is great. there is kitchen and bathroom inside the dorm, so it's pretty practical. the only thing that i didn't like was the size of the lockers, because they are too small. they have lots of activities, it's pretty fun to stay there.
pros:  middle of the action. if you don't have a car, this is the hostel for you.    cons:  they charge 5 dollars for using credit cards!! that's weird.
excellent hostel

the staff were somewhat cold. this really is a "party" hostel, as in, it feels like the first day of college with all the people you met....first day of college. so, if that floats your boat, then rock on! but really, a place can be a "party" without feeling like a frat house which is definitely not what i was looking for on my trip
good spot and friendly staff. they really make an effort to get people involved and having a good time

good location and nice staff.  nice room and the bed is ok  good entertainment facilities  the only thing bad is the music loud at night until 10:30 or 11:00, so unless u like to party at night it would be difficult to rest before the music stops.
great hostel. good atmosphere and lots of partying to be done with something on every night of the week. not great if you were looking for something super quiet but great location!!
parties every day, so it's a place for the people who don't mind loud music
awesome building, has everything you need and more! great staff, great location and a great limo tipsy tour!

there is really nothing negative to say.  it's extremely clean, parking is available, basic breakfast is free and in room kitchens are a plus.  kudos to the cleaning staff.  they take pride in their work!  walking distance to the walk of fame, jimmy kimmel live and griffith park.  the only thing i'd suggest is make sure you've got your earplugs if you want to go to sleep early.  the thai restaurant next door is excellent.

it was definately worth the money staying here, although i would not recommend it to families with chilren as it's a partyplace. they've got free wifi, parking and breakfast which is always nice, and most of the staff is really helpful. great location!

i did enjoy the way this hostel was set out so different,y to all the other hostels i have stayed in, and it had a really cool vibe and offered a lot of different activities for people to get involved in. i met some very cool people during my stay here and everything was generally very good however they only offer 1 sheet to sleep with and it was freezing at night although i did ask for extra sheets later in my stay which were given to me with no problems at all.
the room was not so clean. the bed were really bad, too old furniture. it's ok to sleep for one night, no more then two.
didn't stay here for long but the staff were really friendly and helpful. the rooms had a nice bathroom and good kitchen area. would stay here again.
pros - very clean.  comfie bed.  parking.  some staff helpful.  cons - loud music until midnight on friday.  some staff not terrible but definitely not friendly.  wifi not great.
great atmosphere an the staff were friendly

a couple of the female staffs are kinda impatient when you ask them more than one question. seems very reluctant to help you. didn't feel very welcome during check in. customer service is below average.
the location is great but the atmosphere is not that good and the staff is not really friendly.
friendly staff, great party place
i had an absolute blast. lots of planned activities and met some wonderful people from around the globe.
that is a very good experience to stay in your hostel!:)

i visited banana bungalow in september, excellent time of the year - but there are alot of ants in the bathroom. meet some nice people, ejoyd the karaokenight and the comedy and bbq together with the sister hostel in west hollywood. some of the people that work there are really nice!
events every night were incredible

i generally liked this hostel. there was a problem with my reservation though, and i ended up sleeping with the staff in the staff room, which is pretty crowded (10 people). in the end i didn't care that much, because they were lovely people! i didn't like the girl in the reception room because she was not helpful at all, and she just limited to checking you in but didn't help you on getting around and the other services the hostel had. however, other staff members did, so thank god for them!
very nice staff and atmosphere.

this hostel is terrible!!!!!!!! the atmosphere is just really weird, i didn't feel safe or comfortable there. when i first got into the room, that was supposed to be clean, the bath was filled with a dirty water, i don't know for how long....the staff is not the nicest one. when i decided to leave, they didn't give my money back.   if you're looking for a nice hostel to relax after sightseeing all day, don't stay here.

helpful staff, huge room, excellent facilities, free breakast, loads of organised stuff including bike hire and bar outings, plus the layout of the place lent itself to meeting new people (rooms surround a courtyard with table football, etc.) v positive experience!  shower could do with unblocking tho!

free internet is very slow and breakfast is basic. used to be a motel which detracts a little from the backpacker vibe and makes it a bit harder to get to know people. near transport links but best to rent a car because public transport in la is terrible!

good atmosphere, friendly staff. the trips organised by the hostel are good. the room was really clean however, it was awfully hot at times- there was just one rotating fan so at night time on the top bunk it was pretty toasty. also, the location of the hostel isn't great, especially if you don't have a car.

good location.  secure car parks available was a plus. staff nice. tours and activities available. shared bathroom in dorms suited well. was in a 4 bed dorm, but really sharing the bathroom with another 4 bed dorm also,, so 8 all up for 1 shower and toilet together. breakfast was prompt and friendly, however not too much in the way of healthy options if that matters. overall would stay again.

this hostel is pathetic. the staff are unhelpful and vague, the security is non-existant (my girlfriend and i came back to the dorm at 10pm only to find the door wide open & that our bags had been tampered with by the random ppl that were still in the room drinking although they werent staying there). i had to sleep in the same bed as my girlfriend as someone had stolen my bedding (and bed). the shower didnt work, there was no air-con or fan & there were insects everywhere. do not stay here!!

the hostel, if travelling by metro, is a bit of a trek away from the station with a large suitcase. otherwise, it is in a good position for hollywood blvd and all it has to offer! i really enjoyed my stay here and met some great people.
very central location...close to everything!great atmosphere and nights out planned

stayed here with y family 6 people ages from 10 up was great we all had a great. time n would stay here again. highly recommend for families on a budget. not much variety for breakfast but the friendly staff compensated this with there friendly welcoming attitude thank you  banana a bungalow.

had a good stay overall. some staff members were an exceptional help others were not willing to help which was disappointing. the atmosphere was friendly though and the activities were a good touch. the breakfast was good every morning. my bed felt like it was going to fall apart everytime i rolled over or the girl in the bunk above me did. but i was happy with our kitchen and bathroom area of the room. thai place next door was a great bonus cheap and great meals that are big!
amazing hostel! best i've ever stayed in! clean bedrooms and bathrooms, helpful staff and lots of fun activities. highly recommended!
nice place to stay :) location is good, beds are very clean, there is enough room to hang out with other guests, sunny place on the roof terrace.

drinking allowed made it easy to mingle. the big courtyard at the bottom was full of people. the location was a little bit out of the way so if your not fond of walking bad luck. i personally didn't mind.  but a very good choice overall.
great hostel, the west hollywood one was a bit nicer though
noisy party at the inner courtyard, but everything else was just perfect. also having your own kitchen in your own dorm was perfect!
i had an amazing stay!  everything was perfect! the only problem, i was very cold at night without any blanket
very loud; try to get the dorm in the back if you need to sleep early. otherwise, it's awesome. lots going on, many connections to la sites and many fun things at the hostel itself.
