nothing to complain about. free breakfast, activities every day, met a lot of interesting people. don't plan on spending all that much time on the beach, because you will need well over an hour to get there.

great hostel!!!!! one of the best i've been in, and i've been in a lot... great location on hollywood blvd, big clean rooms with private kitchen and bathroom, free internet, free phone, free breakfast (real breakfast not just a coffee and a ridiculous muffin...), free parking inside the hostel, great parties every night.... i had a blast there and if i come back to la, that's the place i'll stay at!!!!!

we absolutely adord this hostel. los angeles is a tough place for a first timer, as everything is spaced out and it's tough to knwo what's good. the staff were super helpful and the promoters gave us something fun to do every single night. the atmosphere was awesome and within five days we had made life long friends purley because the hostel and promoters were on their game and ensured it was the most social place to be even on a boring week night. free drinks, free tacos and pizza & a free limo

noise (from outdoor ping/beer pong, karaoke, drinkers) extends on until very late at night, on all nights.  so my only warning to travellers is that this is not the place for you if you intend on sleeping and waking early.  otherwise, brilliant value for money, great local and very clean.
the room is very dirty, especially the kitchen and the restroom. when we moved in, we saw a lot of unwashed bowls and dishes in the sink. also the kitchen smelled funny.
awesome hostel... nice stay and staff!!!
we had so much fun with the theme nights every nice. a really nice place to meet people!

we had a shared bathroom in a 8 bed dorm which really was poor! there was stuff nobody knew who it belongs to! the drain was almost blocked and we couldnt use the toilette for 2 days!  good that we were drunk most of the time so we didnt care a lot :-)    besides that the stay was great!

booked in a 6 bed room., got put in an 8 bed. other roomies were in & out, drunk, arguing.while partying is expected in hostels, this was ridiculous. extremely inconsiderate, especially if you've just travelled for almost 18 hrs & want some sleep. shower head didnt work & sprayed all through the bathroom. heater did not work & nights were very cold. no blankets provided. kind of in the ghetto part of hollywood, bit of a hike to the walk of fame
an awesome hostel~!

i stayed 3 months in la and been there in most of the hostels out there. this hostel is by far the second best hostel in all of la. only to be topped by the bananabungalow in west hollywood.     thomas
excellent location  but some people were very noisy until very late ( 1am-2am) in weekdays  also i liked the free internet, breakfast and pizza they offered.
nice place, friendly and helpful staff!!

this was the best trip ever! the location is perfect to walk/get a bus/subway/ taxi to everything la has to offer. not like that matters though because whatever you want to do or haven't yet thought about doing the staff will make it possible for you. they offer hostel organises transport to most activities, all the stress gone. the staff were amazing and couldn't do enough to help!

great location right on the strip near all hollywood attractions, great staff encoraging welcoming knowledgable available, activities everday and night.  the hollywood tour was great intro to all things hollywood and a great way to get around.  great open set up.
great place to meet people. love the bedrooms with common areas. this is definitely a party central!
it was the best hostel i stayed at during my travels. rooms had actual keys, the beds were comfortable, and the rooms that had the bathroom/tv/kitchen were very convenient.

pro: nice location (2min from the metro station and 10min from the kodak theater), frendly staff, nice public computers (imac), private bathroom and kitchen with tv in every room, free breakfast (bread with butter and jam or cereal) free pizza on sunday!  cons: loud music till late time, even weekdays.     great location in la, perfect to have fun!
the hostel has very good character. i found it very interesting.

very very loud music at night...never once slept a whole night through.even asking the dj to turn it down because the beds were vibrating! not even ear plugs blocked it out. otherwise a great hostel if u dont plan on sleeping.

this hostel has a great vibe and is very easy to meet people. i really liked that each room had its own kitchen and bathroom, so even though you are sharing with people, you feel like you have your own space. i would recommend this place, especially to lone travelers.

a good hostel if you're looking to meet people and party. something on and organised each night for travellers e.g. karaoke, comedy night, taco night, pub crawl.   so probably not for you if you want to have a quiet night!  breakfast is average - 2 pieces of bread and cereal, but keeps you full i guess.  room was okay with kitchen, bathroom and tv.   location was good for hollywood, not too far to walk to kodak theatre and mann's chinese theatre.  great cheap thai restaurant next door!!
staying at banana bungalow hollywood was very nice ! :) staffs were also kind. thank you so much.

i stayed in a 6 bed mixed dorm, it was ensuite and it's own kitchen and cable tv. the breakfast was basic but good and the facilities and helpfulness of staff were excellent. my only issue was the noise at night, there were people in the communal area down in the courtyard playing table-tennis and screeching and laughing until gone 1am. maybe the owners should put a cut off time for outdoor activities.
was the best hostel i have ever stayed in, activities everynight which made it easy to meet people as i was trevelling on my own
had a fantastic time, met loads of good people, would def recomend and def use again thanks for helping to make my stay a fantastic one
great hostel located very close to walk of fame. got ping pong, kicker and pool table :)  breakfast is ok but its free. good atmosphere invites to hang out and have fun
all the staff were lovely besides a receptionist called bree. had a good stay at the hostel!
don't go to la. you will regret it.
awesome.  excellence.  multicultural/multilingual.  outstanding staff.  kind.   courteous.   helpful.   ideal location.  amazing hollywood experience!!  thank you "world class" vibe people!!!
the best hostel ive stayed in so far in my 7 weeks in america. will definitely stay there again next time im in la

the room and the bed was clean and the staff were very helpful. the neighborhood of the hostel is nice daytime, but not very safe in the night. i had just one problem, about the computers... they stopped responding many times and it was impossible to restart or logout of the used sites. this way somebody entered to my facebook account and made an inapproppriate entry on my wall under my name! i think it is unecceptable. i suggest to repair the computers, else the guests will go to another hostel

very good hostel , free breakfast everyday , clean , nice partyyy , limo tour ; free diner 2 times a week , staff very helpful, good location : hollywood boulevard; very good hostel !!!!!! i really enjoyed stayin there !!!!
the check in was kind of a mess but the staff was so lovely that i forgot it immediatly. very friendly hostel, i recommend it for every one !

the hostel was well set up with a nice outdoor area and courtyard.  could have had better bedding (the blankets werent good) and it was a bit of a walk from the kodak theatre part of hollywood bvd and most the staff weren{t too interested in helping too much
good prestations, good breakfast

female staff who checked us in was very pleasant & helpful. another female staff during our stay was very rude & was not approachable or helpful. i would not recommend this place to anyone. i feel the only benefit of staying at banana bungalow was the location.

it´s a nice hostel in los angeles - hollywood according to this price. i would highly recommend to stay in this hostel. nearly central, with an metro+bus connection within 400 meters away from the hostel. only 3 computers with free internet access, but free wifi. there are free lockers in the rooms and a free continental breakfast, beware of your shuttle bus receipt (the drivers will only give you a receipt if you hustle them), otherwise you get no money for this transfer back !!!
great place to stay; the rooms are very clean and the extra (free) services provided by the hostel are fantastic!!! will definitely stay again if i return to la.

it´s a nice los angeles - hollywood according to this price. i would highly recommend to stay in this hostel. nearly central, with an metro+bus connection within 400 meters away from the hostel. only 3 computers with free internet access, but free wifi. there are free lockers in the rooms and a free continental breakfast, beware of your shuttle bus receipt (the drivers will only give you a receipt if you hustle them), otherwise you get no money for this transfer back !!!

the hostel is great! definatelly a place to have fun! i've met a lot o great people and never felt bored because we always had things to do that the hostel itself programmed. some of the staff is very rude and make u feel like they doing a favor! but  is great, specially if you're traveling alone!

location and character are ok, but the parties organized by the hostel staff are really loud and up to very late in the night. the rooms are not sound-proof so if you want to have a good night rest, don't go to this hostel. also, the parties occur on the hostel's parking lot, so you have to find your own parking space (in the streets) on party nights.

an excellent place to stay in la. has a very good vibe, perfect location and there is always something going on. the only thing to degrade my impressions was the reception manager. this blond big lady was extremely unfriendly and rude at some stages. so my advice is to keep all your quireies and requests for when godzila is out of the office!   i will definitely stay there again!

its a motel/hostel but it has a tv room, chillout room and a good area in the court yard to meet people.  the staff were a little quiet but not rude except the people who work on the tours who were really nice & loved to chat. each rooms door locked and they had lockers inside. the room were clean but the kitchen needed more cups and equipment.  i had a great time there and meet people to go out to do stuff together, the location is good though its hard to move around la using public transport
nice location and clean enough. could use new lock on the door so you don't have to use the key to lock it tough because of that my dorm ended up open  all the time.
hostel with free parking near the walk of fame and shops. but staff not really friendly. during my trip i did three hostel , and that staff is the worse one. not even a smile

terrible hostel. directions are incorrect (not walking distance from coach station at all, its in a totally different location). dutch girl behind reception is completely rude and unhelpful. the rooms were ok but with old mattresses and cleaning staff are not thorough at all.  still, the main problem here is the loud events (such as karaoke) on wed & fri when it's impossible to sleep (even with earplugs). was so loud the police were called & still no action from staff. do not stay!
good location, very nice fun, things to do every night, good bed, room, place! i really like it...

a great hostel for partying but if you want a quiet nights sleep i would advise against it. the location was excellent and the nights out are very good as well. but there were some signs of bed bugs in one of my rooms beds. all in all, good but loud
bedrooms dirty (smeling feet !), bathroom disgusting, and staff not really smiling.
the hostel is ok. breakfast was good. our room was not so clean (especially bathroom and kitchen), and in the kitchen there was not enough spoons and forks.

great hostel for this price and for young people. they have enough places to spend time, to meet new people and to stay with other guests even after midnight.    location is right on the end of the wof. hollywood in walking distance. organized trips and stuff are great.    hygienic are okay and the banana bungalow has a nice charme.
amazing hostel, had a great time!! nothing to complain about, just perfect.
it is a funny, cool and a clean place for young people. they offer many activities like tours, partys and barbecues and the staff is very helpful.
i tried to call them my whole sunday to cancel my reservation and kept getting the message: the machine is off.  if i can contact them, i don´t think they are worth of a review...
we really enjoyed our time there, met a lot of people and they were awesome !!! we'll come back for sure !

owned by the same crew as orbit hostel and with largely the same vibe. great social events and helpful staff with plenty of organised sightseeing activities on offer. could be cleaner and the location was decent-close to bus stops and a short drive from anywhere you might want to go.
fun atmosphere. the hostel always provides activites each night if you want to be involved. decent bathroom and kitchen facility, if only other roommates keep it clean!

the location is not great.  the website says that there is a shuttle to take you to venice and santa monica beach but this is actually not true.  when i asked about the shuttle the staff said there is no shuttle and told me that to get to venice or santa monica i would have to take two different public buses and it would take well over an hour.  if i had known this i would not have stayed here, perhaps they should update their internet site and not pretend to offer services that dont exist.

the room had an ensuite and a little kitchenette and tv so i was impressed. it could have been a little closer to the bit of hollywood boulevard that we wanted to see but i did not feel unsafe in the area and it was within walking distance.
brilliant hostel and a brilliant location. hostel provides lots of activities and tours, including the city tour which was fantastic!
we booked two nights but didn't even stay one night due to drugs and strangers being brought into our room. we left immediately.

the parties with other hostel is a great way to meet other travellers, loved the hollywood tour but its way over priced compared to other ones offered down the road, seems to jujst be taking advantage of the fact your not sure where's best to go. the who did the tour was great though with great insider knowledge of l.a
music is very loud and runs late into the night. staff can be very rude, esp the night time guard who told me i should be in bed when i returned one evening

the usage of the internet, the tv room, the ping pong table was all good but the loud band right outside everyone's rooms till 1am was terrible. there is an area at the back of the hostel...do it there or not at all!
brilliant hostel for the price!

really fun place, staff are really helpful and frinedly, great location on hollywood blvd-right next to subway station and walkable (bout 15 mins) distance to chinese/kodak theatres. free breakfast, internet and often free dinner and beer too! would definitely stay there again!

a good hostel in a great location. just a short walk to all the happenings on hollywood blvd. the hostel was clean and had lots to keep you entertained (table football, pool, movie nights, free internet) the free bbq on a sunday wasnt up to much, food was cold when served and not a great choice but suppose it was free!
this place has a real american feel about it and is in a fantastic location. nice rooms with ensuite and kitchen in all ot them. staff are friendly and helpful and there are lots of events orgainsed.
location was a bit out of the way if you want to walk to hollywood sites.  dorms came equipped with kitchenette which could have been handy if needed.  reasonable for a 1 night stop over in la.
very clean & right on hollywood bvld. staff were really friendly & helpful, our room was nice & clean. they had alot of activites going on, its just a shame we couldn't do any of them.
good location and friendly staff, bit run down though.

over all our stay was good. lots of party and social nights with free beer which was really good but very noisy at night if you are trying to sleep. the rooms were cool with their own kitchen and bathroom that is cleaned everyday. my sister ended up with bed bug bites which was a massive downer. the staff there didn't seem happy to be working there at all, constantly hungover and just rude i thought, but one german girl who was very friendly. the la tour was really good. an ok place to stay.
good location, free internet.  that about sums it up.
very good hostel, there are alot of activities, usually involving free beer! clean and good few things to do!
i absolutely loveeeeeeee this hostel, i stayed in this one and the west hollywood and they are both amazing, i stayed way longer than i had planned too but it was just so much fun i couldn't leave!

a fun hostel with lots of stuff to do. there's a basketball hoop and a ping pong table, tv, internet, tiki garden... everything one can think of, basically. staff was ok but not as genuinely kind as at some other places. location is very convenient for exploring hollywood. rooms are kind of oldish but good enough. free parking is very cool and a big plus!
nice hostel in a good location! much better than the banana bungalow in west hollywood!

this place is quite a find actually. very well priced for what you get. yes a tiny bit out of the way but very well served by the red line and the buses. clean as well. plenty of things to do. i would say stay here for sure, though noise doesnt get down until midnight so bring earplugs if you want to sleep before then.

i really enjoyed my stay at this hostel! the staff were great and really friendly, the rooms were spacious and clean, and there were activities day and night. i would definitely recommend, and definitely stay again!

if you want to sleep, don't go there! the location is perfect though, 5 minutes walking time from the walk of fame, bus stop at the corner, parking inside....  it's not super clean & some of the staff are means, but some of them are amazingly nice.... i would stay there again which means it was not so bad!

definitely one of the craziest hostels i've stayed in but all in a good way.  wednesday night = free beer & hot dogs = great way to meet/talk to people at the hostel = fun night!!  if you're a light sleeper though, the mayhem may disturb your sleep but the en suite rooms make up for that.
this hostel was alot of fun
the bathtub was blocked so you were literally bathing in other peoples filth! the rooms were in a terrible mess and the bed was so itchy.

i liked this hostel for the people that i met more than anything. everything was pretty average really. the location was ok, but not the best. the beds weren't particularly comfortable, and the sheets/blankets that i was given had holes in them. the facilities were fair, there were a lot of computers, and the tv room is set out like a mini cinema, which is pretty cool. lots of tours and outings done throughout the week. nights out weren't as many as expected but the one's i did go on were good.
fun hostel if you're young or travelling solo. lots of activties organinsed by the staff. close to facilites etc. i reccommend this hostel
amazing place! free drinks, free food, cheap nights out and club entry, excellent location, great tours.... would stay here again!

good: very clean, safe, great location, good staff.  bad: no social atmosphere at all, no one talks to each other; the handle to my bedroom was broken, so other residents were banging on the door at 3, 4, and 5 am to get in. alcohol is not allowed in the premises.
everything is good but the number of bathrooms. i wanna use here when i come to santa monica again. you should try here.
amazing location with great facilities and friendly staff. thanks!

chose this hostel as a place to stay during a 14 hour layover. i had no issues, the staff was so friendly. location was perfect near the pier and there is a bus around the corner that took me right back to the airport for only $1.25!

overall a great stay and a nice hostel!   everything is clean and super modern!   showers are super nice ..    but the breakfast is not good.. they call it „zero waste“ but they serve toast packed separately in a plastic thing... orange juice, only cornflakes, milk, butter, peanut butter and blueberry jam that’s it.. fresh fruits are bananas nothing more.. a bit disappointing     still the location is great, 1min to the beach, 5 to the pier so just petfect!

this hostel is the best i have stayed at in los angeles and i’ve stayed at a few in the past two weeks. clean rooms, sturdy beds, power points at every bed, locker. lots of places to sit and relax, lots of activities. it’s a great place. will only be staying with hi going forward across the us.
absolutely as advertised, great environment and facilities, awesome location in santa monica, would stay again!
easily one of the best hostels i’ve ever stayed at!!! clean, friendly, safe and so close to santa monica pier!

only stayed here for a night, but it was a great experience. super clean, spacious, convenient and the staff was really nice. not many breakfast options for someone who is gluten free/dairy free, but pretty much everywhere in la is good for that, so i survived. would definitely stay again!
i was more than impressed with this hostel, a great facility! made my stay so wonderful! amazing location, security was top notch, very modern and updated facilities, and extremely clean!

this hostel treated us pretty well. the location is top notch - you are only one block away from the beach and surrounded by restaurants and shopping. security was great. free breakfast included. parking was quite expensive in the garage across the street, i’d recommend looking for alternatives. met a few cool other travelers here, wish i could’ve stayed another night or two. my only complaint is the bathrooms were a bit far around the corner from my dorm room.

great location and activities on offer here. everything was clean and function, the only slight negative was the price (fairly high for a shared dorm), however it was in line with the rest of available accomodation in la. overall, definitely recommend this place to a traveller looking for a fun hostel in a cool area.

absolutely great location! only one shower was actually fantastic, the rest kinda meh.. met great people, thanks to the pubcrawl and the good breakfast. i would totally recommend it if travelling alone and looking to meet other travelers.

you can't really beat the location here as it's perhaps a couple of blocks from the pier, metro, and not much further to the big blue bus to/from the airport.  it's not a place with a party atmosphere, but it's clean, quiet, provides a basic breakfast and has excellent kitchen facilities for storing and cooking you own food.  only slight issues are that the beds creak too much.  every time you move, they seem to shake and creak and can be quite noisy.  the privacy curtain could be full length.
10/10  super close to the beach, 3rd street promenade, santa monica pier.  clean bathrooms, comfortable cots, large lockers, free breakfast (cereal + toast + jam + pb + coffee/oj/tea/milk).

quiet hours were not respected. there were people outside our room swearing and fighting around 2:00 am, which made it impossible to sleep. it was a great location but i hated sleeping here and would not go back.
really great location in the heart of santa monica, clean and modern facilities as well as comfortable beds. would recommend staying in a private room.

fantastic hostel. comfy common area, great staff always at the front desk & happy to help with anything. the location is a block from the beach and right near heaps of shops & restaurants. the rooms were clean with large lockers. love the individual lights & chargers for each bed. breakfast was fine, good way to save some money. internet worked really well. met lots of travellers.

one of the best hostels i have stayed in!  great staff, very clean, well designed and a fantastic location near everything the area has to offer.  the only downside is the new beds are very noisy when people toss and turn (ear plugs help with that!).  even with that i would still give this hostel a 10/10 and will definitely be back!

this was the perfect location for sightseeing when we had downtime from our business meetings.  the facilities and amenities were an added bonus to our trip.  would absolutely recommend and hope to stay here again!
this was the best hostel stay i have ever had. the location is amazing and the hostel itself was renovated and really nice and clean.
great place, great location, clean and comfortable beds, good staff and nice people
i stayed 8 female’s room, it was really clean and comfortable. if i visit to here once again, i will definitely choose this hostel without any consider.
excellent ! great hostel in a brilliant location.
very convenient and reasonable
rooms were super hot/air conditioner wasn't working so very uncomfortable to sleep especially on top bunk. other than that everything else was great!
clean, friendly staff, awesome location.  there didn't seem to be much mingling in the downstairs area though.
great location and a comfy stay! only thing is maybe a better breakfast. besides that all good.
very good location! stuff was helpfull and friendly. i liked the hostel and the free breakfast
amazing hostel, very clean and newly renovated! i would highly recommend this place! the location is great too
great location, so close and central to santa monica pier and shops. rooms clean. only two showers to share on the floor with lots of people. staff were friendly.

my reservation was confirmed by expedia and by the hostel, but when i turned up at the hostel the male staff prevented my entry   and cancelled my reservation without prior warning, because i had criticised the conditions in the hostel during my previus stay as the ongoing construction wark, the dust and the extreme cold caused by the disfunctional cooling machine in the room gave me a terrible cough and i had to go to the hospital as a result.
nice hostel but a bit boring if you’re looking to meet people.

stayed at hi santa monica for two nights in an all female dorm. aside from the renovations taking place from early morning, this was a great hostel located in prime spot. one street away from ocean ave and short walk to santa monica pier. opposite direction you have the promenade of shops. but stop close by as well. beds were decent, bathroom was clean and they have great daily activities going on. pretty happy with my stay and would come back again.

location of the hostel is great, shopping nearby with decent places to eat. santa monica pier about 5-10 minute walk away. breakfast basic with cereal, bananas, bread and coffee. one point i'd make though would be to switch to just regular loaves of bread. each slice was wrapped in its own plastic. what a waste! rooms, bathrooms all new and clean, big plus! however place lacks atmosphere. good if you want to get out and explore, but probably not the best for meeting people.

i previously stayed at hi santa monica back in 2014 and i vowed to return if i came back.  i liked staying there previously,and i liked my stay this time as well as it was close to everything on santa monica.  i look forward to seeing the place after the renovations have been completed when i return to los angeles again someday.

execellent location. two blocks from the santa monica beach and a block from the 3rd street promenade. public transit is also a short walk away. the rooms were clean, but the walls are thin and i can hear construction workers talking in the next room that’s under renovation at 7am in the morning. the social atmosphere was nonexistent as the hostel is somewhat big and not as intimate as smaller hostels. the free breakfast wasn’t much to speak of, just toast and cereal.

i only stayed for a couple of nights; aside from assistance in finding weekend parking, i was not impressed. it wasn't bad, though the breakfast selection was literally thin slices of bread in hard plastic. the kitchen was large, but nothing inviting to draw people in (colors/labels directly next to fridge/"bottom barrel" coffee). and the wifi was often inconsistent (when it even decides to function at all) guests should have access for a free drop off shuttle service.     ok hostel. not great.

great location! right near the beach and restaurants. there were daily activities to take part in too which was great. good transit service to the area which can get you anywhere in los angeles. the bathroom was always crowded and usually a line up for the shower.

i've been familiar with santa monica for a long time but no longer live in the area. this was my first time at this facility and although one floor was closed for construction it looks like they made some upgrades on the floor where i stayed. common areas  are nice, lockers in rooms(bring a padlock to save a $5.00 rental fee)  good temperature control,  staff were friendly and helpful. walking distance to lots of places of interest, shopping if that's your thing, beach very close. i'll be back.
great stay, with excellent location. simply love staying here every time i'm in la. second best hi hostel (after boston) that i've been to!

the staff were rude during my stay and not helpful at all, just gave me my room key and made me sign the paper without even telling me where things within the hostel were located. hostel is on a very noisy street and the walls in the room arent very good as you can hear the next rooms conversations and everything going on. my room wasnt that clean either, very disappointed in my stay.
wi-fi at level 3 sucks. toilets are dirty.

this has an amazing location 5 min from the beach. i arrived here at 2 in the morning please people just uber eats cause there are homeless people roaming around. facilities are great i think they need more group activities because everyone is to themselves. over all amazing experience i’d love to recommend people stoping over to come here santa monica is gorgeous
since the hostel has been remodeled, i love it. the restrooms are amazing! thank you so much for the upgrade.

my experience at hi santa monica hostel was great! the location is very good, you can go to the pier by walking, it's also next to the third street promenade where you can find the best stores, a lot of restaurants, street artists and more! the train station and the bus stop are close too! it's definitely the best place to stay next to l.a! the staff are good, the room and the cleaning are also good and i felt safe during my stay! i would definitely stay there again when i come back to l.a!
great hostel

a really nice hostel, no complains!  location is great, super close to the beach, nice area in general. only negative aspect was the breakfast, there was not a big range of food. if you’re late, they don’t have any bananas anymore, so be up early!
excelent place
muy buen hostel recomendable sólo q fui a una habitación de 10 personas me pareció caro el precio para tantas camas todo el resto excelente
nice location

this hostel is well located in santa monica. it's not central in la, but nearly nothing is central in la... but it's easy to get from/to the airport from there by bus. the hostel is in renovation at the moment. so a lot of parts are really new. they have a big kitchen and a couple of commun areas. breakfast is toast, cornflakes, banana, coffee tea. they also have laundry facilities. i would recommend it.

amazing hostel ! after coming from an aweful hostel in fishermans wharf i was so relieved this hostel was so nice ! lovely rooms, loads of space ! the staff were delightful, the location was insane ! the bathrooms were spotless ! perfect , i would certainly reccomened this hostel

i enjoyed my stay two years ago.this time the hostel is undergoing a floor by floor renovation.unfortunately, my floor (2nd) hasn't been renovated yet. the dorm was extremely hot and uncomfortable (the fan didn't help).the bathroom ventilation system must have been turned off due to the renovations on the third floor. when i stepped out of the shower, i was sweating due to the high humidity. after two days of experiencing this, i went to the fourth floor to shower. it will be very nice in 2018!!

i rent a bedroom with one bathroom but this the bathroom was under renovation and i had to use the collective, but i paid for one bedroom with one bathroom inside and private. and when i complained nobody did anything... i'm very sad
10/10. only thing is parking cost 17.50 a day to park
needs air conditioning desperately! other than that, really good
great location, always a wait for showers though -not enough for the floor. overall great place
a little pricey but i enjoyed my stay and the location can't be beat. the staff are great.

i really enjoyed my time here at this hostel, so much so i didn't want to leave! it's right near the beach, pier, and tonnes of good bars and food restaurants around. the hostel was clean and had a great area for eating, lounging and a pool table... activities for everyday. would recommend staying here, it's definitely refreshing after spending sometime in la city centre!

been to a lot of hostels, and this is my first review. staff were super friendly and accommodating, remembered my name and were helpful with getting me a locker and storing my luggage when i had to run to work at an event. they pointed me in the direction of everything i needed, area was close to everything though i didn't explore much because i was only there for one night. everything was clean, facilities are open and airy, good wifi. i'd stay again for sure.

this hostel is awesome. rooms are pretty basic but with a charging port and light by every bed, who can complain? the place was under renovations when i stayed but i was not bothered by this at all. free breakfast every morning which was awesome. fab location, literally 2 minutes from the beach and the boardwalk. felt completely safe walking back at night too.

great location, but it took over 30 minutes to check in, then we had to continually change rooms and beds.  then we were overcharged.  having stayed in 100's of hostels around the world, this was probably the most complicated hostel experience ever.    also, what is it with all the plastic that you guys use?  plastic around every slice of bread?  really?  and this beside a sign saying that you are a 'green' hostel?  come on guys, it is 2017.  no more #greenwashing for pr.

fantastic location, so close to shops, restaurants and beach. staff friendly on arrival. the rooms are very clean and the bathroom especially was so clean and newly fitted. they organise lots of trips/bar crawls etc, so there's always something going on. my only criticism was the breakfast was terrible compared to other hi hostels i've stayed in. brown bananas, cornflakes or bread (each slice in an individual plastic wrapper... thought you were an eco friendly hostel!) apart from that- fab!
good atmosphere overall, nice place to meet people and excellent location.    cleanness wasn't too good and the breakfast was below average.
have to pay to use the pc! even for a little search, nothing remarkable on the atmosphere, quiet and not much plans, restrooms a bit messy but not a big deal.
loved it although rooms are so hot at night

hard to find any fault with this hostel. great location in santa monica, close to metro station to downtown la (downtown is about 45 minutes by metro). lots of great common areas to relax. the top level already has bathrooms renovated, and the noise only occurred from 9am, by which time we were heading out anyway. breakfast is great!
great location as it's literally right behind the 3rd street promenade and a 2 minute walk to santa monica pier, friendly and helpful staff, clean rooms! could not have asked for any more
a good, polished, high quality service. however, it was lacking in the warmth of other hi hostels
a very clean, well located hostel, the staff were very helpful, especially tori. second time staying and i'll be back again next time i'm in la.

good location, good staff, free breakfast. comfy rooms and lots of places to hang out inside and outside. my room was at the 2nd flr, got wifi and a bathroom. my friend who stayed at the 4thbflr didn't have both according to what she told me.
don't normally complain about hostels. but i was there for one night and hated it. dirty. rude staff. over priced.

there are only 2 showers for the whole floor which was problematic and you had to pay to use the onsite computers. there wasn't much of a social atmosphere here, we weren't really told about anything going on at the hostel by the staff and you couldn't drink on the premises so there wasn't any party/fun atmosphere at all like at other hostels.   the room was unbearably hot, there was a fan provided but this was incredibly noisy. the location is excellent for restaurants/bars/beach.

my friend and i chose this hostel solely for its location and were not disappointed, walking distance to everything worth seeing in santa monica. they were renovating when we were there and unfortunately the ac didn't work in our room at the time but it wasn't really that big of a deal. i really have no complaints, this is by far the best hostel i've ever stayed at.
even though it was under construction it was a great place to stay! very convenient location!

one of the best hotels iv stayed at. new and clean. very accommodating, friendly staff and awesome location to shops and beach. went above and beyond to help me. was able to store my luggage for the whole day after checking out and was even able to have a shower when i returned to collect my bags before my long flight home.

overpriced for what you get! the only positive is the location. you could stay somewhere much nicer for the same price/only a few dollars more. construction is much more distracting than made out to be, 3 communal showers shared between mutiple girls dorms is no where near enough! the showers are cold and the bedrooms get very hot. very dissapointed for the ammount of money i paid.
some of the girls that were in my room came in in the middle of the night and were very loud and turning the light on and left it on while they went to go shower. it was difficult to get any sleep.

this is a fantastic hostel. very big and the new bathrooms are of a hotel standard. the staff are really friendly and the breakfast is very substantial. there's lots of space to chill out, and the neighbourhood is safe to walk around at night.

a good hostel to see santa monica. near the metro rail and an airport bus stop. free breakfast is ok though i don't get why everything is individually wrapped - even slices of bread! a bit far from los angeles' attractions but very near the beach.

great hostel 5 minutes from the beach. rooms were clean but a little dated and top bunks can be a little tricky to get up and down. good breakfast selection, the staff were brilliant and very helpful. 100% would recommend.

i stayed in one of the newly renovated rooms and it was really good. clean, good shared bathroom, comfortable bed and a light and charging point for each bed  amazing location, right near the beach and third street promenade  lift wasn't working as part of renos but no big issue
clean tidy and modern. quite big so not a great atmosphere. good location though. five minutes walk from the beach.
absolute best place i've stayed in my travels! great facilities and location but the people i met  have become friends i've travelled with across america! beyond happy with service  cheers guys!
overall, pretty good (nice location, nice staff). with taxes, i ended up paying 66$ a night for a 10 bedroom ensuite dormitory which i find crazily expensive for what it is though.

i was visiting from florida.  my flight got in early and hadn't slept for in 28 hours.   my hotel didn't have rooms available. i booked my reservation 10 minutes before i walked though the door so could sleep for a few hours.  i was told the room wasn't ready and because of the policy i couldn't get my money back. i could understand if i booked this weeks ahead of time.  i was ten minutes before. this is robbery.
can't believe it's right next to the pier! love this hostel.

i emailed the hostel to cancel with more than 24 hour s in advance. they told me to contact hostel world to let them know. hostel world then told me to contact the hostel directly. i have now been charged these cancellation fees.    very disappointed

the hostel is very well located in santa monica (could actually not be better) and is easy to reach. thanks to the comments from the readers i got the tip of parking in the civic center lot, which is way cheaper than the rest of the lots. for this reason i had to walk a little bit from there but it was totally worth it.   the place is fine and should be better after the remodelling (but now its a bit noisy and bathrooms were not too clean). breakfast was fine and i enjoyed my overall stay here

showers were cold and terrible flow. soap dispensers empty in the rooms. beds were terribly uncomfortable. windows had to be open because it was hot and no a/c - cars and motorcycles very loud on the street. would never stay here again (nor would i visit la again, as the people are not friendly anywhere in la area).
really good, although i feel i'm old enough and mature enough to be given a choice of temperature for my shower other than cold.
nice stay in the best location in santa monica.

appreciated having a private room but was disappointed at the room size/ layout and facilities.  for the price, we could have found a budget hotel with entirely private facilities so on that score this wasn't the best value for money. i understand that the dorm rooms are much cheaper and that for multiple travellers this is good value of course. appreciated the breakfast and use of kitchen facilities. would have liked yoghurt at breakfast and perhaps more choice of fruit but otherwise satisfied.

really enjoyed staying here! such an amazing location for everything around santa monica, easy walking distance to everything. staff were all super friendly and helpful.   only issue was the shower and it not being very hot, or clean. but i did see cleaners in the bathroom daily, so people just didn't keep it clean. rooms and other facilities were great, just a lack of power points for charging things. overall great place and highly recommend staying here.
feels more like a hotel than a hostel. no atmosphere whatsoever but very clean and well managed.
the best hostel!!!  every thing was so perfect for me  i loved it !!! amazing staff sooo clean and beautiful !so impressed about the location too close to everything! ❤️😎😉

everything is great with the exception of the pool table. if they are going to have a pool table the least they can do is have chalk and a rack that is not taped together. the staff and the location are amazing.
generally very good, but due to the size rather hotel atmosphere
exelent hostel ,  i always come back!
hostel was clean and tidy, good location and staff were all friendly. 3rd floor girls showers were only either scolding hot or freezing which wasn't ideal, but otherwise hostel was good.

we enjoyed our stay! the hostel has great lounge areas and security too! location was amazing, 5 min walk to the water. the staff were helpful and friendly as well. i noticed the bathrooms were in need of better ventilation- giving them a smell. otherwise everything was clean and the kitchen was the best i'd seen in a hostel. the hostel wasn't very ecofriendly.. as every single item at break fast was individually wrapped, even a single piece of toast and no composting available. which bothered m
quietest hostel i have been in, not much atmosphere but great location
great location. decent value for the area but still expensive. not much atmosphere without a bar for the travellers to meet

i stayed at this hostel for one night and it was great value for money and in a good location for me, the 2 things that i didn't enjoy, the girl in my room, literally glared at me after i said hello, not the hostels fault but i didn't get a good vibe. the guy who checked me in was angry as 'we had all turned up at once' there was 3 or 4 separate bookings that turned up, but he was the only one who seemed angry there was a cue! apart from that, it was clean, safe and great for what i needed!
very nice hostel, with lots of facilities, very clean. location is great, only 5 min from the santa monica beach. highly recommend!
no meaning to pay more for having the toilet in the room, the sink, shower and toilet are all separate and the sink has no door. i was using the shared showers/toilets, much better
great location, one of the cleanest hostels i ve ever stay in. goof vibe. definetly a place to stay in santa monica

great hostel right in the middle of santa monica the better part of la.  don't stay in venice beach, santa monica is far cleaner, nicer and there's way more to do.  i've stayed at upwards of 100 hostels and this is one of the best.  clean, comfortable, safe and not noisey.
great place at the heart of st monica. recommended
i know it's la, but a bit expensive for dorms. a very nice and modern building with a good location though. seemed to have some cool people staying there.
the staff was very courteous.  the rooms were clean as well as the bathrooms.
i had a wonderful stay in the santa monica hostel. the facilities are exceptionally clean.  my few favorites were having proper wifi, a comfortable common space, and having the beach close by.

great kitchen, one street up from santa monica pier, or one street the other way for third street promenade and santa monica place (awesome shopping and dining). friendly staff, nice lounge areas. very happy would highly recommend.

this is the second time i have stayed here. there is a great choice of food and drink for breakfast. 1 block away from santa monica pier. very friendly staff. i will be back next time i'm over in california.
very nice location

great hostel and great location. most people staying here were a little standoffish doing their own thing. i did meet a couple friends so it is possible. the events were great hosted by the hostel. i did have one issue where an associate told me the hike was canceled because of rain earlier in the week. when i woke up the next morning the hike was still on. so this left me a little frustrated because i started to make plans for that day. however, i did go on the hike and it was great!
great location and communal spaces. breakfast is limited but fine. main issue was with noise as the room doors make quite a ruckus!

staff were very friendly and helpful, had an incident with another traveller in our dorm room which staff dealt with outstandingly. location was good, right next to the beach and a 5 minute walk to the buses into the city. beds were fine but not the comfiest, also the sheets were strangely very loud and rustled. would have been good to have doors in the shower rather than just curtains. wifi was very good. security was reasonable. would recommend.

save your money! if there is another place to stay, stay there. this hostel has the weirdest vibe. the staff have been poorly trained in routine things such as giving a refund and proper customer service.    the bunk beds need every single screw tightened. i could feel the girl below me every time she moved. the rooms are dirty and stink and the carpets are old! there's no security lock on the bathroom. i would never stay here again and checked out early!!
good hostel, great location in santa monica. santa monica while far nicer is quite far from hollywood though so bare that in mind when booking.
the location is really good and you have 3rd st with all the shops and 5 minutes to the beach.
quality facilities. i loved the fireplace. the kitchen was big and good. location--super close to beach and santa monica pier.

great hostel, right on santa monica, near all the shops/bars/restaurants and pier. bathrooms were clean, breakfast was good. really huge building, sometimes felt more like a hotel. i've booked a twin room but was given a double bedroom, front desk told me there weren`t any other twin rooms available. the double bedroom was clean, small but functional. very nice stay overall.
excellent location, helpful staff, good wifi/kitchen/breakfast. absolutely terrible showers though!
great hostel to spend some time in santa monica.

what a great hostel. the free breakfast is really good. staff really nice.he location is just perfect on 2e street in santa monica.  save area, main street with  a lot of shop/ restaurant re just a min walk,a lot of good an nice restaurant and bars around the hostel. everything is in walking distance.  just 5 min walk to santa monica pier and beach. metro 5 a 10 min walk. take to blue bus to the lax airport from santa monica for 1,25 dollar ( 45 min busride)

definitely recommended! everything great - outstanding location, beautiful designed common rooms, healthy and plenty breakfast, friendly, funny and helpful staff. beds and cupboards could be modernized, nevertheless comfortable, clean, secure. restrooms, as in almost every hostel i have seen, need to be cleaned up more frequently and interior could be adapted to a travelers needs, e.g. broader shelves. besides that, it is great to have free hairdryers and fresh towels. great value for money!

apologies for the late review! (a year later)  upon arrival, i was upgraded to a better room which was perfect and just what i needed (think there was an issue with my booking). great location, everything within walking distance. secure. definitely recommend this hostel and i'll be staying here again next time i am in santa monica :)

mattresses were ridiculously uncomfortable, had the worst night of sleep in my entire life on them. also, when i attempted to go to bed at a reasonable time there was excessive noise throughout the hostel, and when i requested for it to be reduced i was shut down. i also noticed a large amount of alcohol being consumed although it is an alcohol-free hostel.
luggage store should be for free

i always stay here when i come to la. it's clean, has the perfect location, and everyone is friendly. it's not the best hostel for meeting other people, but maybe that's because i've been here at the off travel season. i'll be back for sure though!
there was a difference in the treat with us.

arrived january 1st. entire place smelled.   no atmosphere.   people and staff were rude.   rooms got extremely hot overnight   power outlet by bed did not work   bathrooms were disgusting and unsanitary

great stay(s), attentive (and patient) desk staff-have catered to my many annoying requests gracefully, and are very helpful if given the opportunity (except for that one guy...).    ps-i wish i would've known about the coed dorms sooner.
best hostel i've stayed in. plenty of open space, awesome people.

nice area,  clean rooms. the only thing i didn't like were the bathrooms. they didn't smell nice and the hooks for your clothes was outside of the shower, which meant anyone could take your things while in the shower.

it was a really great hostel overall, most essentials, nicely furnished, safe. loved how large and equipped the kitchen was. breakfast could be improved. bathrooms overall did the trick. the hairdryers were not strong enough. the rooms were overall pretty good. the window wouldn't close in my room and it was really cold. they did offer extra blankets. it was kind of loud a few nights after 10 pm and i smelled weed in the hallway and really wish they'd strongly enforce the no-smoke/drugs rule.

i've stay here twice, and my latest stay was amazing. i arrived at 12am and the guy on the front desk was so lovely, happy and kind (given the hour). he was so accommodating, changing my room so that i could have a bottom bunk for my last night before flying home. this was probably only possible given the time of year being so close to christmas. brekky is good, cleanliness of facilities is really good as well. great value for money. perfect location & really easy to meet people. will stay again

decent hostel in a good location in santa monica. pretty far from downtown but really nice proximity to the beach. very little atmosphere when i was there. struggled with the laundry facilities, not enough machines.
wonderful place for it's value, just a few minutes of walking from santa monica beach
the breakfast is pretty basic. i would appreciate a little more variety there.
great place, walking distance to everything!!
staff were great! showers were not so good but apart from that it was awesome

stayed for 1 night. the bed i was allocated was taken however i was upgraded once staff were notified. the staff are very friendly and helpful. recommended restaurants and printed my boarding pass. nice clean hostel in good location.
overall great, no bar though which is a great way to meet people
maybe a larger variety for breakfast but other than that 10/10.

best hostel ever i have visited! fabulous place to live and it's close to the muscle beach and santa monice pier!!!!  - great breakfast  - clean  - friendly stuff  - comfortable rooms  - great location  - high speed wifi  - great price    just a few factors which made me truly happy!  i'll come again!

this place is clearly trying to maximize the number of people through the door. it's jammed with travelers, but there are so few places to hang out that people can't be comfortable enough to speak to once another. just two couches! also the common areas are cavernous and loud. kitchen was stressful. beds were uncomfortable. it seems like the only folks having fun were the ones going clubbing till 2 am. not my kind of place.

great location, nice and helpful staff. as a solo traveler i just wish they had more organized events or tours to make it easier to meet people. otherwise it was a good hostel with huge lockers and super safe!

hostel is very high quality in terms of staff, cleanliness, facilities and location.  only drawback i could think of was the atmosphere was like a library! very quiet hostel which wasn't for me. overall great stay if you looking for something quiet, safe, and clean.

i only spent a single night here so i cant really judge the hostel on its atmosphere as i think you need to be somewhere a few days to do so. facility wise it was good and had everything you'd expect. the dorm rooms were fine, bathrooms a good size so there was never a wait for a shower and staff were helpful and friendly. location was good the beach, bars and food options were never far way. personally i wouldn't stay here again but it's my preference rather than a fault with the hostel.

the absolute best location in santa monica - near everything especially the beach ! the hostel is comfortable but not luxury. the beds are cozy with nice pillows. my roommates were quiet and respectful. friendly staff. great group trips. showers are lukewarm which is a bummer. the other huge downside: the breakfast is truly miserable with weird plastic wrapped bread slices and cornflakes as the only option- no fresh fruit. fortunately there is plenty of great food in santa monica !
hi santa monica was a fine hostel, the beds were not very comfortable though.

loved this hostel. the location is perfect and is only a 40 minute train trip to downtown la. the staff were lovely and helpful, the rooms and bathrooms clean and the communal spaces big and welcoming. would stay here again and recommend this hostel in a heartbeat.
the place is great, very well located!

matrasses are terrible and worn down and they keep running out of toilet paper and don t fill up on time. staff are friendly but not outgoing and don t really feel that when you ask them to do something, they do it. for a hi hostel i m quire disappointed. the bedroom i was in was really run down while the downstairs looks great. and there is poor ventilation in room. the first few days the weather was warmer and the room was unbearable even with a fan!

this hostel was really fantastic. it had everything you'd need, chargers/lights by the bed, large lockers, great free breakfast  (although individually packaged slices of bread still bemuse me), lots of nice common areas. really couldn't fault it. one of the best hostels i've stayed at on my travels. it is quite large so bare that in mind, depending on the atmosphere you're after. location in santa mónica also great! would definitely stay at other hi hostels.
great hostel located in the best area of santa monica, parking is expensive right i front of the hostel.  close from the bus station. great atmosphere. i loved the hostel i will totally come back!

i've stayed here before. i made sure to stay here this time. i will stay here next time i'm here. excellent all around. only warning is that la is really, really spread out. it takes about an hour on the bus to get to hollywood-ish from santa monica. hour and half to downtown. if your trip is centered on locales other than sm & the beach towns and you didn't rent a car, you may want to stay somewhere closer to your destinations.

only stayed one night. location, cleanliness and security were great! but the rooms are hot! very glad i was there on a reasonably mild day, would hate to stay there in summer! and the beds are not comfortable. good breaki from what i saw and but the biggest plus is location, just a block from santa monica pier and beach

nice place to stay when visiting santa monica. right by the beach.   great facilities, place is huge and has lots of common areas. friendly staff.   was only there one night so didn't get to check out the walking tours or social events.   convenient outlets by beds. quiet at night in the rooms.  breakfast is toast, cereal, and fruit.
this hostel is the best one i have ever stayed! clean, good location, helpful staff, affordable price. you won't find like this hostel in santa monica.  thank you all staffs.
overpriced . don't go
the bed was made and very nice breakfast!! just what a lazy girl needs :)    five stars!
really nice hostel! great big lockers in the dorm too! good, standard breakfast too.

loved everything about this hostel !  im getting older and wasnt to sure about going back to a hostel but this one didnt disappoint.  great location, , clean, beautiful courtyard, lots of place to hang out, and pretty quiet overall.
2nd level shower drains blocked, caused flooding in showers.   mattresses were uncomfortable.  good 4 bed lockers and good security.   good location.

lack of air con means the rooms can be really, really stifling. also pretty big, so difficult to establish a great atmosphere. on the plus side, staff are great, location is fab and i've not been to a more secure hostel.
best service and best company in my room  had alot of fun and met very interesting people   the best experience   thanks  will be back
this hostel was an amazing place to stay. many more amenities than usually get in a hostel that price, and in a phenomenal location.

this is a beautiful hostel. i liked everything about this place: nice chill open atmosphere and hangout area, nice enough dorm, above average breakfast. there was a staff member who was kind of rude and seemed very annoyed to have to talk to me. other than that the limo bar night was bananas. the location right next to the santa monica boardwalk is perfect but i should note it is quite far from downtown los angeles and public transit in la is laughably bad.

i stayed two nights and i totally recommend it, i made a great deal! the only thing i didn't like was the attitude of one of its team members.  on thursday 13th i went to get the breakfast to the kitchen/cafeteria area around 8am. and the person on charge that day was so rude. he's like 50 years old, hispanic.     after that,  the location is great, price, i'll be back soon!! the front people are very helpful    eduardo g

a big hostel that feels more like a hotel. reminded me of places we stayed during schooltrips. in fact a big group from denmark checked in the same day. in generall check in took a long time, but was relatively easy.   watch out for sunday's!!! on sundays there is a free pub-crawl and half my roommates came in super late, drunk as hell, falling all over the place and looked themselves out multiple times. in addition to that they puked all over the room and beds... smelled terrible! no good sleep

great location right in the heart of santa monica. the free breakfast was enough to fill you up with toast, cereal and juice. only problem would be cleanliness of the shared bathroom, by the evening it was very messy/dirty also in our room only one of 4 power plugs worked. otherwise everything was great! i would definitely stay here again.
great hostel! one of those you could easily spend many days at, and feel comfortable. great rooms, with big lockers. nice breakfast. perfectly located in santa monica.

excellent hostel. was disappointed because we were only staying in la for one day! fantastic location, right next to the pier and santa monica beach, as well as the promenade with amazing shops and places to eat. only a short walk away from bus stop to airport. great bedrooms and common areas to relax or meet people. would stay again!!
a great hostel and a great place to stay right in the middle of santa monica.

overall all fine for a hostel in a central location. great pub crawl, communal areas modern, breakfast good hostel standard. only area which could do with some attention was bathrooms which were a bit dated and a couple of showers not working. overall would recommend.
amazing hostel, amazing staff, wonderful location. highly recommended!

cool, good looking hostel in great area, close to the beach, close to shopping area, nice, friendly staff, laundry is cheap… all cool. but here is no a/c in the rooms, just fan, so is still warm and a bit noisy, what's not the best for sleeping. anyway good place to stay and i will like to stay again.

amazing location! quite far away from touristy stuff in actual la but if you just want the beach/santa monica pier/venice beach then it's fantastic!! big rooms, decent bathrooms. loads of shops and very close to all public transport. absolutely zero atmosphere though - do not expect any socialisation at all which is a real shame... doesn't really feel like a hostel, more like a hotel in terms of atmosphere.

overall a good and cheap place to stay in the heart of everything. location not the best if you have a car expensive parking. most facilities are great but it was hot and to sleep in a hot like oven dorm with 7 other guys and no ac that was terrible.
no restroom in the room
everything was great .would reccomend to staying  there 4sure ;)

good hostel, incredible location, friendly staff, tidy. the only negative thing i could say is that they do not have the airport shuttle as advertised, they do however have a deal with a taxi compnay that is a 25 dollar flat rate to lax plus the $5 airport fee .
great hostel. awesome breakfast. massive lockers. dazzling tv room. great staff. although beds could be a little bigger...other then that i would recommend this hostel to any sort of traveler.

great hostel.  friendly staff, great facilities.  a short walk from santa monica pier and a 20min bike ride from venice beach.  very clean and nice rooms.  only downfall is there is no air conditioning.

check in was fast and efficient. staff were extremely accommodating and polite. excellent location right next to the beach and pier.  bed frames were made of wood and really noisy if you shifted while using them. mattresses were a bit on the thin side.  i stayed in a co-ed room one night which was lovely and a males only room the second time i went - males room was somewhat messy and the light in the ensuite shower was dim, making it hard to see.  overall decent experience.
good location, good facilities. room was really noisy, loudest hostel room i have stayed in so far.

pros: location is just perfect, crawling distance from the beach and pier. a walk along the beach to venice is wonderful. lots of places to eat around and very close to public transport from lax. plenty of activities to do with fellow travelers, like pub crawls or movie nights. big lockers are provided, easily fits a big backpack. building is really nice, lots of places to chill. dorm had its own bathroom.  cons: the dorms were a bit of a let down quality-wise, very squeaky and narrow beds.

great location and the common facilities were nice, however, the dorm itself was quite unpleasant. it was noisy throughout the night, very stuffy and the only fan was incredibly loud and difficult to sleep through. not the best hostel for meeting people either but the location is a real bonus.

really good hostel! i came to ask if i could store my backpack and the guy was able to check me in early. plenty of showers and toilets, enough space in the rooms and all bunks have a plug socket and lamp which is a really nice feature.a stones throw from santa monica pier and walking distance to venice beach which is amazing. also me and 2 other girls got dropped back from our tour 2 hours early at 4.30am and there was a nice lady on reception who let us sit in the lobby for as long as we liked

i stayed in the middle of sept for a week and overall it was a good stay. there are lockers in every room and entry to the hostel is keycard only. location is great - 2 mins from the beach, and santa monica is all walkable - but if you want to explore the rest of la the buses take about an hour to get to downtown/hollywood. there are plenty of social spaces and activities almost every day. but it is expensive and if you want to use the luggage storage after checkout you have to pay $5 after 1pm.
very nice place. however quite large place which make it more difficult to meet people. i was staying on 4th floor and the wifi connection was really bad!
the hostel is in a graet location, he is big and very clean. the breakfast is nice and the atmosphere is cool
highly recommend. staff awesome.

first of all. they charge more that it says on the hostel world website. i bought a $43 dormitory and payed $5 in advance on the website. but when i got there the desk girl sayd i need to add additional $3 for &#34;you don&#39;t have a membership in hotel international&#34; (wtf) + $5 for &#34;hostel tax fee&#34;. when i buy a $43 bed i don&#39;t expect to pay additional $8. its just steeling my money.   on top of that , they don&#39;t allow to be in the shared area after 22:00 and the lockers has no locks.

the overall experience was good, great location, security was high with key only access and lockers (take your own lock).  however, the shower wasn&#39;t very clean and the breakfast was very. toast, one type of cereal and orange juice no variety.
the staff were super polite and mega helpful. really close to the beach and shopping district and shuttle to lax also real close. the facilities in the hostel were nice although i felt it was pricey

good hostel! large rooms if you&#39;re staying in a room of 4. need better cooling units though. the room got very hot and a single fan isn&#39;t going to cool anything! having said that, organised events and decent breakfast included. great location only a 3 minute walk to the beach!

hostel was great. it is right in the heart of the shopping precinct and super close to the pier. someone handed flyers for a free comedy show on the second night i stayed. power points were next to every bed in my room! breakfast was basic but free, i went to the juice shop about 3 doors down. i'd definitely stay again.
very good breakfast, great atmosphere, perfect location. very clean, but not enough showers.
nice clean hostel! great location! rooms themselves are simple- just bunk beds and a couple mirrors. all you need! right by the pier, so many shopping and food options.

the entrance looks a bit shady and disappointed me at the very beginning. but they really have everything! there is even a free pool table to play! kitchen is very big surely you can cook whatever you want. i love the countyard!   room is good. shared toilets are not bad, only that hair dryers work not very well. nothing to complain.  i don&#39;t think you can find a better place to stay within this budget!

the hostel is one of the nicest i&#39;ve come across. it doesn&#39;t offer the best choice from breakfast when compared to the hi hostel in chicago but still, it&#39;s nice. the rooms are clean and if you ask you can get a towel to use. the lockers are secure and on checking out you can leave your bags in a secure room until 2pm. laundry facilities are great with both washing machines and dryers. there is a lovely lounge and courtyard area. on the 2nd floor there is use of computers and a printer.
the staff is great! there is a lady staff on midnight shift always being helpful when she heard im sick! nice breakfast! everything is nice! definitely coming back!

by far one if the nicest hostels i&#39;ve stayed in ! clean rooms and bathrooms, a nice outdoor common area, and helpful, friendly staff. a bit expensive but that&#39;s what you&#39;re going to get for santa monica. awesome location though! maybe not the best hostel for solo traveling and meeting new people, but all in all i would definitely stay here again next time i come to la.
great modern hostel. rooms cleaned daily and a well equipped kitchen if you feel like cooking. breakfast provided and plenty of space to hang out after a long day exploring.
someone still from me something and the rexeption stuff didnt help much

i stayed for three nights, travelling on my own. was happy overall with my stay, the location is great!! i stayed in an 8 bed dorm and everything was clean and tidy. the shared bathroom was fine, and the lockers are really generous. the breakfast included was decent with toast cereal juice and fruit, the staff were also super friendly and helpful. i would stay here again if i was going back to santa monica.

amazing location! however thats probably the only thing i liked about the hostel. our 8 bed female dorm didn&#39;t have any air conditioning and being on the 4th floor it was unbearably hot at night, when we spoke to reception to try and find a solution to the problem they said &#39;what do you exect from an economy room.&#39; even though we were paying $55 a night; the most expensive our of the hostels i have stayed in. the communial facilities and breakfast was nice but the rooms were poor value for money

wouldn&#39;t stay here again. whilst it is a perfect location, very close to shops and entertainment, the rooms themselves are very poor for what you pay. no air con in economy rooms, instead extremely noisy fans which don&#39;t cool the room, had the worst sleep ever as too warm and noisy. staff very rude and unwilling to help situation, staff ruined the experience.

staff were absolutely amazing! unfortunately the wifi was quite slow and would sometimes time out and become unusable.    good decent sized rooms that were very spacious.    the bathrooms were a little awkward with only a shower curtain to separate yourself from everyone else walking past.    overall it&#39;s a pretty decent hostel, location is amazing!
all the staff were friendly and went out of their way to help. happy to stay there again.cheers

the parking situation is great! the building straight across the road does overnight at 17.50us. only thing would be the lack of air con or if there was aircon in the main areas it definitely wasn&#39;t set to cold. would have been perfect if it had been winter!
great hostel, great staff, awesome facilities. loved every moment and the breakfast set up was fantastic.

great location; the security is quite tight i.e. before check-in/after check-out there was no way to access dining area whereas reception area is spartan with no comfy waiting area; room and bath facilities are average (one of the shower stall was not working, fan in room was not working); staff are helpful except they are also always busy so waiting times can get long.
best hostel ever!
plugs in the room don&#39;t work

really great place. looked good and stayed clean. only cons were the outlets above the beds all really sucked and mine didnt even work and there was no alcohol allowed on the premises which took away from the atmosphere.

fantastic hostel as most hi are! great location only a 2 min walk from the pier and 3rd street promenade! rooms were clean, bathrooms were clean. breakfast in the morning was great. lots of activities provided by the hostel. only thing i would say is the beds weren&#39;t the comfiest i&#39;ve ever stayed in but also not the worst. i would stay here again and recommend to friends

hostel itsel is very nice, the rooms are nice too. just the bahrooms are dirty and not really enjoyable. otherwise the hostel was fine and the location is amazing, it&#39;s one block form the beach!!!

nice place... occasionally went to toliet and wasn&#39;t very clean from last person... this could be improved!! showers should get a clean a little more often than once a day due to the amount of people using them.. overall lovely place good size nice breakfast 😃
great hostel in a superb location extremely close to the beach and surrounded by santa monica&#39;s shops, restaurants and bars. bevin&#39;s tour of venice was really fun as well!
great location but atmosphere seemed to be lacking.

first hostel i stayed in la and absolutely loved it. got the recommendation of staying in santa monica from friends, so this is the perfect location. so close to the beach, and easy bike ride down to the venice or train to downtown. facilities are basic, but decent sized wardrobe for a locker which was great. rooms are a little hot but fan is pretty good. pub crawl was great... had so much fun! brekky basic cereal and toast but good anyway. wifi is excellent!! would definitely stay here again.

great great location in santa monica. quite amazing in such expensive place. the big issue is the room. aweful and noisy fan! i could not sleep until one guy finally stopped it! but of course it was hot like hell after that... a pity because the location and the patio could have made this place fantastic

this location is amazing! it is two blocks from the beach, super nice mall, the pier, and healthy restaurants. the lockers here are also amazing, biggest ones i have ever seen. they are basically as big as my closest at home. my friend way overpacked and brought a hugeeee suitcase but the whole thing fit in one side of the locker. it was awesome! also, there is tons of parking structures (one right across the street). only downside: beware of homeless they are everywhere.
amazing location for santa monica! staff were helpfull and the dorm rooms were very spacious

amazing locations and staff are very helpful. but sadly it&#39;s let down by the restrooms. 3 toilets and only one door closes. and showers no where to put ur clothes but out on be common area. not very practical.
well located and appointed hostel. great location in central santa monica most importantly. good breakfast included. friendly atmosphere.

the location is excellent. the dorms are a little small and basic but there&#39;s enough room to put your stuff and a plug socket above each bed. good showers. my dorm was very hot (there was a heatwave and just one fan that didn&#39;t move). breakfast wasn&#39;t great - individually wrapped slices of bread?? so i just grabbed a coffee and went elsewhere to eat. the organised bar crawl was fun and a good way to meet other travellers and locals. i would definitely stay here again and recommend to others!
great location! good vibes. would definitely stay here again
close to beach was convenient if you plan to swim in the ocean like i do.
this place is a great hostel to meet people, with a pretty good pub crawl. unfortunately the breakfast isn&#39;t very good and the hostel overall is very expensive for what it offers.

myself and some other guests had trouble with a really aggressive guest in our room who we, and hostel staff suspected was on drugs. i thought being an alcohol/ drug free hostel she would be removed, however she wasn&#39;t and after abusing me she was able to not only stay, but in the same room. this really upset me. a bad end to an otherwise lovely hostel.

towels had yellow spots and black hair on them (not my hair), same on the blanket (black hair) had a crazy woman in 8person room with weed i guess (strong smell in the room for a while) we (friend&i) told the staff but nobody did anything. the woman cursed us out that we were too loud & i was moving & talking while i was asleep in the night (as if i could change it) so she got very upset & yelled at us. the staff said they would send people to check on woman & stuff! nothing happened. thumbs up

hostel itself was average, but location was excellent and the hostel had a nice outdoors area. the breakfast layout included slices of bread that were individually wrapped in plastic - one slice of bread per plastic wrapping - obviously not very environmentally responsible. overall, an enjoyable stay.
very nice, a little expensive but guess are paying for location
this place was absolutely fantastic!..so well done and i will definately be back!..the location is flawless as well!..one happy traveller..thankyou

i visit la every other month, but i usually stay in west hollywood with a friend... i decided to change things up and stay in a hostel! i've stayed abroad in hostels and have always had a great time... this was no exception! connected with people right away and made some friends for life. security is good and location is great... rooms can be hot in the summer but it's cali so just wear less. i missed morning meal usually bc i slept in... but when i did make it down, i got my fill. stay here!

hostel was in a great location. only bad thing was the amount of waste the hostel produced. at breakfast they gave out individually wrapped slices of bread, plastic butter and jelly containers, plastic containers of corn flakes portions, plastic bottles of orange juice and mini cartons of milk. would expect a hostel to be more environmentally aware.
nice and clean but old, the bunk bends could be categorized as antique. no ac.

the location of the hostel is great, however that is the only good thing about it. staff were unfriendly and unhelpful. there were little to no facilities per floor. one night the power was shut off, very little notice was given. fan in room broken and was unbearably hot. very disappointed with the hostel, not value for money. slept very poorly during my stay due to the unbearable heat in the room. would not recommend !!
great place and great location. lots of friendly staff and guests.
the facility is clean and provides a wonderful atmosphere with lots of space to relax. it is close to the shops and beach. also a very secure space with affordable pricing. thanks.

exceptional! no complaints. amazing hostel: very clean, modern, spacious, helpful staff and next to the beach as well as the third street promenade. they also give bike rental special deals that save you some money.
