right across the road from public transportation! needs a little better signage, everything is was great!
really good, bit expensive but its la!
the breakfest is so nice! the staff is friendly and the localization is perfect.

this is hostel is for young kids who are looking to party. hostel was ok facility wise but the music was so loud all night it was hard to sleep. parking is $25 added cost of you drove. all around i just did not feel safe there and would never stay again.

location is great! staff is friendly and helpful with anything!  it's just a pitty i had to walk up stairs for the girls bathroom everyday just for showers and toilets. the common area is not lively at all and they turn the lights out at 12 so there is no where to hang out.
clean and comfortable, lovely staff, but sooooooo noisy. even with the windows closed it was ridiculously loud. otherwise i enjoyed my stay!

hotel was in a perfect location if you want to be right in the centre of things, a little noisy perhaps if you aren't that way inclined! staff were helpful and friendly and the bathrooms etc were clean and tidy.

i really enjoyed my stay beds super comfy and great location will definitely stay again when i come back and staff could not have been more helpful. definitely recommending this hostel to anyone going to la.

great location, a bit noisy though at least the street facing rooms. super clean. great staff and very helpful. basic dorms did not have a/c. the kitchen is not very equipped but there are plenty of affordable options in the area.

staff & cleaners do a great job. rooms on hollywood blvd side susceptible to street noise, vendors, performers, loud music into the night. ear plugs a must as widow needs to be open for air, in 6 bed rooms. rooms have fans to cope with heat of weather. one night seeking a cool spot, experienced no relief from both loud street music and that played in common room. easy to get to from lax. opposite hollywood & highland station. public transport convenient to attractions around la. yes!
nice hostel, could do with more bathrooms!

this place is in a great location! clean, wifi worked, plenty of bathroom and shower space. they had the old school keys which was a pain to carry around. the biggest complaint i have about this place is the facilities. no labeling of food, so refrigerators were packed, there were no plugs up top for people, no lights at the beds either, and only a few seats for breakfast. tons of stairs beware. good a/c, most of the hostel basics, outings, and friendly staff.

great place and location. just be aware that certain rooms (not all rooms) come without a/c. so if you prefer a room with a/c make sure it says deluxe in the room choice. i chose the 6 bed mixed dorm without a/c because i didn't plan on being in the room much. they did provide portable fans and the room came with a ceiling fan as well. also, if you're in to meeting people hang out in the common room and participate in the weekly events. i met a lot of great people that way! definitely recommend!

if you're looking to stay in hollywood and tourist central, the hostel could not be more convienently located. the rooms are clean but the hostel has only one restroom for women, so it can get crowded. the atmosphere was somehow lacking, with not many activities in place. it offers decent hostel style breakfast and the staff is friendly and helpful. there is no ac and the fans are of not much help during summer season.
need to improve on the fan and night staff nature as some of them were very rude.

loved staying here! great location with the metro literally outside the door. the only drawback was at night the room got really hot because the aircon only came on at certain times! on the whole though i loved it!

i booked here because of the fantastic reviews. it's not that great. location and price are great of course. staff is ok, not great not terrible. the breakfast is bagels, fruit and juice, but it is free so... my problems are: there are no plugs next to the beds only a power strip that really any one could take your phone while you are sleeping; there is only 1 men's and 1 women's restroom and they are on 2 separate floors, there also seems to be no air conditioning in the room.

couldn't be any closer to hollywood if you tried. we were at the back of the hostel and didn't find it to noisy at all. the hostel puts on greay trips each day that don't cost much and the rooms and bathrooms were mostly very clean.

there are multiple reasons as to why i wouldn't recommend this hostel, but most importantly is the simple lack of a/c in the standard dorm rooms. this is unacceptable for almost any hostel in america, but especially for one operating in la at the peak of summer time with temperatures over 30oc. i would accept this at a hostel that charged low fee's, but this institution was really rather expensive, and for the money, represented extremely low value given the other options within the city.

it was a great stay at the walk of fame hostel. it is really close to many attractions and the metro is right across the street.   the hostel also offers many activities to explore the city together. that's great when your re traveling alone and want to meet new people.  all in all i would definitely recommend the hostel.
great location and staff, clean rooms. no air conditioning in rooms, very hot.
the rooms were really hot but location cant be beaten (right on the boulevard).
the place is set in a great location, the staff is always cleaning which is great , my only complaint is that my room has no a/c and was very hot
nice hostel, modern and clean. good facilities nice staff. room was extremely hot though and noisy, but hey it's in the middle of hollywood.
no ac smelt terrible never using hostel world again!
hostel has a great location, right at the walk of  fame  we had a room at the side of the streeft, very hot and a lot of noice from the street. bring earplugs!

it has a good vibe, very clean with cleaning ladies around 24/7, awesome people. i'm not a fan of the hollywood area but most of the people here made me want to stay longer. the facilities are generally very good but the stuffiness of the room despite the three fans was intolerable. i was on the bottom bunk and none of the fans reached me, which i was baffled by. the laundry room made laundry easy and convenient, props to that. the breakfast is basic but very fresh.
great location. walkable to any landmarks in hollywood blvd. very clean and friendly staff.
my room was so sticky and hot, and the shared bathroom is meh.. social atmosphere isnt that great. not my fave, especially for the price.
great location. rooms very simple.

location is definitely in the prime tourist area and literally right across the metro station so that's a positive. however the downside to this is all the noise. street performers perform right outside the window. with movie premieres happening there is a ton of noise and music. this makes it difficult to sleep.     the other downside was the fact that there were no acs in the room. in a room full of 6 people it was very hot in there and all they had was a fan which only circulated hot air.

for the duration of my stay there was construction & refrigerated trucks outside the window from 3am daily. i didn't get much sleep. no air con, so leaving the window open was necessary. facilities were great, everything was clean. breakfast consisted of all bread products and one type of fruit, so if you're gluten intolerant like me, you're forced to find alternate brekkie. i was severely over charged for the room compared to what hostel world advised. i'll be following up with hw on this.

first time in a hostel and i couldn't have been happier. the staff were all friendly, doors always locked, clean every day, nice breakfast in the morning to get you started, a pool table to kill some time, organized outings, and the location was awesome. look out the rec room window and you see street performers on hollywood blvd...very cool.
#NAME?

it was nice to have an a/c'd lounge to hang out in after a hot day outdoors, there were outlets (adding a few more would be nice) and water right on hand. had a top bunk which was a bit unsteady to get to, but the room and bathrooms were kept clean, and i always appreciate hostels where the beds have their own little shelf and outlet for charging. can get a bit warm in the room despite a ceiling fan, but for the lower bunks there's an electric stand fan on the floor.
good location and always saw cleaning staff maintaining the place.

stunning location only stops from union station and patsaouras commuter station with metro, sensational concept incorporating the necessities;  featuring exceptional artwork that sizzles.  reminds of the london sohostel so much in mindbending clarity of purpose, design and execution with extra space.  forget the old tinseltown when options were few.  thrilling concept and with very few complaints.  a movingly fitting climax to my bucket trip.   thx!  some like it hot my dear.  no regrets here.
awesome location. super friendly staff  air conditioned rooms. had a great stay.
very clean and staff were very friendly and helpful.
brilliant stay..great way to meet new people, awesome group activities held daily to explore the city and in the heart of hollywood. couldn't ask for a better stay

not great. a guy in my room stole my laptop and camera; as well as other possessions from other people in the room. i can't blame the hostel for him stealing stuff but the guy was incredibly sketchy and shouldn't have been let in. the lockers were too small for bags to fit in properly. totally ruined my experience but then again, hollywood isn't a very nice place anyway

location within hollywood couldn't be better, rooms good but extremely noisy because of the street noise...cleaners do an amazing job cleaning hostel constantly. rooms have no air con which meant it was pretty stuffy.
it was an enjoyable stay. the staff were helpful and friendly and the people in my dorm were also friendly.
good hostel in a fantastic location on hollywood blvd. great breakfast too!

would highly recommend this hostel, it is very clean as they have cleaners there everyday working all day. the staff are so friendly and go out of their way to help. the only thing i could complain about is the noise from outside, it was only on the weekend though ( let be honest most people are going out then) so it wasn't that big of an issue. there's a great area to socialise and meet new people. i've been to a lot of hostels and this one is definitely one of the best.

pay the little extra money and stay at usa hostel down the block. i wore flip flops and contracted a fugal foot rash. the rooms have no air conditioner and only 2 fans, the room is very hot and leaving the window opens lets in the constant noise from the street. the entrance is a huge staircase, there is no elevator and it smells like urine from the homeless people. there is 2 power points and you hope no one unplugs your phone to make room for there's. you also have to pay $2 for a towel.

the rooms are very cramped and lack any ventilation making it very hot and stuffy especially at night. the security (whilst you buzz in) is not great and we ended up in a 7 people in a 6 bed room for several days as someone brought a friend back. the entrance smells of urine and isnt well maintained. the location is very convenient and really the only positive thing.
this hostel is awesome. worth paying a little extra. really clean, best hostel breakfast i've had. good location. rooms are big

great location. even the back alley is jimmy kimmel's studio. adjacent to all the classic theaters and tourist attractions. plenty of clothing stores and shops hollywood is know for. the bar and restaurant scene stretches to west hollywood and sunset. hollywood all comes together with a local vibe from side street neighborhoods criss crossing the blvds. you can hear the pulse at night if you are planning an early day.this hostel catered to all ages of adults. sunday don't miss the farmers market

extrodinary about this hostel was how friendly the staff was! they kindly helped us with all our questions. the location was good too, just across from a metro station which turned out to be really handy!   watch out with going out at night though, even in the heart of hollywood you've got annoying men following you arround. the neighbourhood is good during the day time though.

i really enjoyed staying there ... it was really amazing clean place, cooperative stuff, good location near the metro station but i noticed that they added to the value mentioned at hostel world 14% taxes without any pervious notification

right on hollywood blv, which has both its benefits and disadvantages. the dorms facing the boulevard are very noisy with street noise and traffic, and it can be loud all night - pack earplugs. hostel has good facilities, comfy beds and is clean.   the staff were helpful in helping me with travel arrangements and getting to points of interest.   there are activities organised by the hostel - tours to hollywood sign etc - so you can meet other travellers.

excellent location and atmosphere. close to all the main attractions and easy to get around on the metro which is right across the road. only one minor thing is that two people checked into my dorm after 11pm. i think if someone checks in late they should get a private room, but not be charged much more. that way more people can choose private rooms if need be, without breaking the bank. other than that i loved my stay here and all staff were very friendly and helpful.

amazing place to be if you know the people you with, as it had good facilities and location, but it was a horrible experience on my own! as much as i wanted to connect with people, no other travellers were at all respectful of each other.  staff, aside from one or two, were very unhelpful, and very unclear in their directions, to the extent of being rude. would recommend as a well-functioning hostel, but would be afraid to stay there again alone.
room was hot, smelly. great location right on hollywood blvd. staff was friendly. i wouldn't stay here again though

the only complaint i would have is that my room was unbearably hot most nights, so hot that you'd be dripping sweat. the room also had a strange odour that was seperate from how the rest of the hostel smelt. also, since we had a window that looked out into hollywood blvd, you could perfectly hear all of what was going on outside even if the windows were closed. besides my complaints with the room, i'm impressed with the location, the staff and the facilities. i would come back!
wonderful location, nice staff, cleanliness. but the bathrooms are limit, you may wait quite a long time to take a show.

i liked staying at this hostel. it has a good location. metro station  is just infront of hostel. you can get a metro pass(depends how many days you are staying) and go any where via metro you want. staff was so nice, i reached there early,  they offered me to wait in the lobby area (air conditioned), stored my luggage. tea was available all time. they also guide you about places you want to visit in la.
very nice hostel, right on hollywood boulevard and close to the hollywood sign. friendly and helpful staff, high security and awesome people. met cool guys there i'm still in contact with now!
great hostel and location watched a movie premiere from our room and the common area. pool table was a bonus also!!

overall a really decent hostel. great location and facilities. really good outings organised by staff, and all the staff were really friendly and helpful. very clean and organised. i don't know what licensing laws are but felt the common area could be awesome if there was alcohol served. the staff were great and would be an awesome excuse to get them out and socialising with guests. expensive part of town, but a great first stop, thanks guys!
great location, great cleanliness, cool staff

so over expensive, check in staff were unfriendly and rude and most staff was unfriendly except for one guy, room was dirty and smelt bad, breakfast was only ok.   the location was good but other than that certainly nothing special

this place was wicked. easy to get to via metro. huge rooms and living areas and was right amongst it all. only down fall would be the noise from the street but the location is definitely a bonus so not a huge biggy.

bathrooms, kitchen area and common areas were always clean! i stayed here 4 years ago and it was much better then, with nightly activities happening, if they happen now we didn't know about it as we got no run down on the area and things to do, the guy just checked us in and on our way we were. we didn't get any hints or tips on la/ hollywood, luckily i had been here previously and new the area, however the people i was with didn't. very disappointing.

we had a great stay at walk of fame. central location, really clean, good rooms/ bathroom/ games area and free breakfast!   only downside was the inflated price for a hostel. it's the most i've ever paid and i've stayed in hostel all over europe, south america and the us

avoid the rooms on the side of the street .they are super noisy through out the day. there is always some idiot playing drums at midnight.  otherwise it's a really good place...very friendly staff , free guided tours and generous breakfast
great location, nice friendly staff, but the common room close at midnight and the bathroom is not the best

the location for this hostel is great!!!! it's right in the middle of hollywood boulevard! the kodak theater and shopping center is right across from the hostel!! it's a perfect central location! however, parking is a pain. nearby lots are $30 for overnight parking and most (if not all) parking garages don't allow overnight parking. the free street parking is a few blocks from the hostel and i don't feel comfortable walking by myself at night in hollywood.

the cleanest hostel i have ever seen. there is always someone who cleans, even in the middle of the night!  the location is just perfect. right in the middle of the walk of fame, next to the tcl chinese theatre, the dolby theatre and next to the red metro line. people are quite respectuous as at midnight the lights of the lounge are switched off. cameras are everywhere . the breakfast is filled up regularly as there is always something to eat. the staff is available and very helpful.

it is a quite expensive hostel to stay at however the location is super nice.   there's shared bathrooms and toilets, and there can be a line. the toilets weren't the cleanest one.   the commom area and the kitchen is good.
had a great time!

i only stayed here for one night but was really happy with my time there.  i arrived at 9:00am but check in time wasn't until 2/3:00 pm, however it was not a problem for me to us all of their facilities while i waited including showers (well needed after 25hrs in transit) as a solo female traveller i felt very safe here, and the staff were were warm and welcoming. the dorms and bathrooms were very clean. overall the vibe was great and the other travellers were all super friendly.
amazing location, great breakfast and good beds. wish shower rooms were longer.

this is a great hostel. the room was large and had plenty of space for everyone's bags and the bed was comfortable. there were enough bathroom facilities and everything was very clean. the location is perfect - right in the middle of hollywood and subway and buses right outside.

it was a cool place right on hollywood boulevard had the things you needed. the only downside i found at least in the room i stayed in, is there is no ac. need some ventilation. they do provide fans  and if you drove. expect to be paying $25 a night for parking right by the hostel. but it's nice to walk right out to the famous street!
great location if you want to be in the hustle and bustle. after staying in many youth hostels and backpackers, i really didn't enjoy the atmosphere in this property.
good hostel, there's cheaper ones nearby but if you want a nicer one this is the one to choose! great location, good activites and met some nice people there!

decent place. pretty chill. literally everyday at the same time there was a lady cleaning the bathroom when all the guys are trying too use it (like 9am) and i found that a bit strange, a guy cleaning the bathroom while every women is showering would never get away with that... the staff serving breakfast seemed a bit grumpy too.
the hostel is good average rating, staff could be nicer.

the shared restroom/shower facilities were always kept clean...and it was reassuring to see the cleaning staff very often. the hostel was busy...just like the street it's on. great location for everything hollywood. you are right in the heart of things. it would have been nice to have a mirror in the bedroom.
fun lol  very noisy.
not a bad hostel, centrally located in the middle of hollywood so that's a huge plus, but other than that a pretty mediocre hostel, atmosphere is pretty dead at times.

i spent two nights. i really enjoyed my stay. the staff is very knowledgeable and approachable. i stayed in a for bed dorm there was lots of space. the hostel has a lot of space in general. the common area has a pool table and lots of seating. overal the hostel is very clean and the location is perfect. most of the travelers were friendly also. i would highly recommend this hostel. thank you for everything!

amazing hostel in a great location. i never felt unsafe in the area which is good for a 19 year old girl travelling by herself. all the staff were so friendly and helpful and even printed me out directions to get to places. i would definitely stay here again!
this hostel is awsome! best location, super clean (you can smell detergent at all time) great environment! i would totaly come back!

my first time staying in a hostel so i didn't know what to expect.      location:  location is fantastic.  opposite the hollywood highland metro stop so very easy to get to from lax.  rooms:  the rooms were fine and were cleaned every day by housekeeping.  they were very warm but then, what else can you expect when you travel to la?  staff:  staff were friendly and accommodating (even when i was coming in drunk at 3am).  people:  sometimes this can't be helped but they were a great bunch for me.

hi guys,     i'm from australia, coming here was the best decision for me. the staff and the cleaners have been so welcoming here. they are all so very helpful, friendly and welcoming, it has made my stay here a lot more comfortable. i recommend this to anyone wanting to travel and in wanting to experience staying in a hostel........last of all safe travels my friends.....😊

great position, fantastic spot on the boulevard right across from some major attractions.    clean enough, breakfast was great but staff a little abrupt. didn't offer much information about hostel itself or what's around.    in saying that, as a solo female traveller it was safe, there were clean beds, with lockers to store belongings. bring a padlock 👌    all in all a good stay.

you watch the oscar from the room or the common area. however note that if you're staying here on the day of the oscar, the street is closed off i.e. you cannot go in or out of the hostel between 12noon to 8pm unless you are checking in or out (which is not mentioned at the time of booking) but it's still very close to all the actions in hollywood.
nice hostel, although nothing special. staff was helpful and pool table and tablesoccer are fun. the breakfast is amazing.   a little smelly, but not too bad.

great location, i only needed a place to sleep and shower for a couple of days since i was taking care of my own stuff during day, so i can't say much about the atmosphere and hostel in general, but for what i needed it was perfect and i always found the facilities clean. breakfast was nice

i spent 2 days at the walk of fame hostel in la. the location is excellent. breakfast is great. i absolutely recommend this place because they help you with tours and advices. great place to saty in la. i hope to see them some time in the future.
they should offer power outlets inside the rooms. having to go to the bathroom or another comum areas to charge the phone was annoying.
first of many stays here! hope to be back soon!

this was my first time staying in a hostel but i absolutely loved it. the location is great, right on hollywood blvd and close to just about anything. i was able to meet people from all over the world and had a blast. i would definitely recommend this hostel!

great spot, great location. awesome that they offer a light breakfast! staff were helpful at answering questions. could have done without the loud, club music blaring through the halls during all non-quiet hours. doesn't really make for a nice relaxing spot to sit and relax between touring around la.
will definitely stay again if in la on a budget. clean and easy to find. stuck-smuck in the middle of hollywood.

i loved my stay here! i met people from all over the world and made some incredible friends!  this hostel isn't the fanciest or the quietest-so if that's what you're looking for you should stay somewhere else.  i'm a very social person, so it was good that i stayed there.
rooms are dirty, different from picture. when i arrived i felt very embrassed. so i went to another accomodation, i already paid one night though.

staff were super accommodating and went above and beyond to make sure that we were well taken care of. the bathrooms were awesome; warm water showers that were separate to toilets and had a separate changing room too. great location to shops, food, and public transport.

quite hours(after 11) were not respected; there were people talking and laughing well into the night. it was finally quite after 3am. room was so cold, and had a strange smell. breakfast was so-so. for the price, it's better to stay in a cheap motel in a quieter part of the city.
reliable wifi, clean facilities, free bagels etc; for breakfast. common areas are sufficient, and rooms are clean. price is high, but so is everything in los angeles. i would stay again.

friendly staff, clean hostel and awesome free breakfast. i stayed in the female dorm, all girls in there were super friendly and i felt safe all the time, didn't need to lock away my belongings. the female bathrooms were clean all the time. would definitely stay there again! thank you :) x
the staffs are very nice! the hostel is located in the great area.
good location to access attractions
great place for a short trip ...
great hostel, highly recommended!

great hostel if you enjoy being right in the middle of hollywood boulevard (hence the 10 for location). but sadly everything else about the place was a disappointment. no atmosphere, the noise on the boulevard gets a little overbearing and the staff weren't very helpful (or knowledgeable) when approached and provided no helpful suggestions for activities or things to do.
the staff is very friendly and helpful. i would definitely stay again in this hostel
mice place, good staff and facilities. located is perfect.

the location is awesome, but the rest is average... the room smelled very bad, no air conditioning, no place to put your luggage. the cleanliness in the bathroom was fine. the atmosphere was, unlike other hostels, not very connective. i think there were hookers that used the bathroom a couple times, which i thought was pretty weird, since apparently anyone could get in. the hostel is fine if you are in the city all day long, but otherwise i didn't like it a lot.
stay here mates
location is perfect, inn & out is two blocks aways, great bars are a couple minutes away walking. good value for your money, not the prettiest but decent

this is a travelers favor, excellent location right outside is the walk of fame, you will literally see a michael jackson impersonater right across the street! man the beds ar extremely comfortable with many plug outlets right next to the bed! breakfast is dope! alll of the employees are phenomenal guest area is quit comfortable 😎

maybe i was just there on a bad day, but this was the most unfriendly hostel i stayed in. the staff were fine but just average in terms of friendliness and willingness to help.  the hostel itself did little to encourage socialising and everyone pretty much stuck to themselves. its fine to land in la but i wouldn't stay here for any length of time and hope that you'll meet other people. its not conducive to this type of experience.

i highly recommend! the location of this hostel is better than most hotels, at half the price. people of all ages were staying here so it was not like a fraternity house. the room i stayed in was clean so was the women's room. also the metro railway is located across the street making travel to the airport and other tourist destinations very easy. mainly i have no complaints but beware the rooms do not have a/c.
my 1st hostel experience and it was amazing!

been staying here for the last 7 years! anytime i come to la its my go-to spot. when i started sleeping in hostels, it was about $25. with the several changes in management, its skyrocketed. no hostel should be more than $30. you're sharing a room with strangers for god's sake! lol. overall great location and super safe.

stayed at hostel as was running a 10k on hollywood so was exactly where i needed to be! amazing location. staff were helpful and friendly . the place was clean and had good washrooms.   only complaint was that the rooms were really warm at night, but i only stayed in the hostel literally for 7 hours so may have been a reason. i would certainly stay again! thanks!
had an absolutely amazing time.
its location is perfect! the rooms and bathrooms are very clean. i highly recommend it!

love this place! absolutely amazing location, right in hollywood blvd! close to food, shopping, tours and attractions. awesome events planned by the hostel and always been a good atmosphere when i've been there. the staff are super friendly and helpful, some of the best i've dealt with. clean bathrooms, warm showers and even a separate room to do make up etc. rooms are big with comfortable beds. highly recommend
nice location for first time vistors!
bad staff, they cheating us on the price so i will denunce them to recover 30$ that we shoud not pay.

the location is the best you cold ask for.the room could have used better furnishings;the light above was dim and not good for reading,there was nowhere to sit because the lower bunks were taken so all of the tenants' possessions were cluttered on the floor,and there was a huge fan on the floor just taking up space.  still the common area was nicely arranged.the music didn't need to blast so loudly;some people might want to do some work in quiet.
wonderful, i would stay here again

the location is great if you want to take advantage of hollywood, universal, warner, and the many things to do around. if you want beach/hippie style hostel you should better stay near santa monica or venice beach. staff is nice and also great activities to do. the room was really smelly even it was clean, it was the only bad thing but the rest was great!

the hostel is in good location, but that is all.  it is very noisy after the sunset.  on friday and saturday nights, the noise may last until 3 or 4 am - can you sleep in a loud music in a room without  ac? sunday night became better, but the noise still lasted after the midnight.  staff are friendly. but shower rooms are somehow blocked with hair and some other  stuff. i lost at least $40 cash in my room, but on the other side, she did not take all of my cash - take care of your belongs.

shocking place ... apart from the location which was really good , the showers were far to small , the room was the hottest place i've ever stopped with one small fan  and for the price surely there should be air con .... really really disappointed ... staff were to busy it seemed to give a damn about the place , wouldn't recommend and certainly wouldn't go back

awesome location and central to most of the major tourist attractions plus the train is across the road and so many buses on the street. any shuttle from airport will take you to hostel for $20. we went on the hike to the hollywood sign was good but the group to the clubs wasnt very big. you need to bring your own towel or rent one for $2.
one of the best hotels ever! beds are  really comfortable and it's really clean. location is also a hudge plus. i have no complaint.
amazing location, very clean and nice staffs.  love to stay there again if i have a chance to visit la again.

great location, very nice and helpful staff, fun activities including a hike to hollywood sign and a beach. the only thing i wasn't happy about is that the kitchen wasn't really equipped for cooking. only a hotplate with two burners and the room itself was small and didn't have a sink. you have to go to another room to get water or wash something up.

it was my first stay in a hostel and i really enjoyed myself. my stay put away all of my premonitions of what staying in a hostel would be like. i plan to stay here again when i travel to los angeles.

i'm so surprised at what a good rating this hostel gets.     as others have mentioned, the rooms are unbearably hot - even though the air was quite cool outside at night, opening the windows or using the fan did nothing.     it's ridiculous that there's not toilets for everyone on every floor. the showers are also very small.    the location is good if you like noisy, trashy, dirty hollywood but i'd recommend doing your research first. i wouldn't return here unless it was half the price.

location is perfection, the rooms are amazing, the staff were 'real life' friendly (not just because its there job). 1 minus was the hanging out areas close way too early. i understand it may be for noise purposes but it would be nice if they just included a sign or something, because they were plenty of times i wanted to get to know new people and everyone would have to leave at a certain time and it became awkward. other than that and price, this place literally is amazing.
best location, but hostel could be more social

hostel's location is its selling point. pros: location, breakfast, daily hostel activities you can sign on to.  cons:  rooms are hot! no a/c, they provide a fan but its of no help as the air is hot. so if your not used to sleeping inside a sauna, then goodluck on your good night sleep.  also the street noise if you're a light sleeper. it doesnt normally bother me but compound it with the sauna heat in the room, i was in for a tiring night.

i found the staff rather unfriendly - they weren't rude at all, just not the usual friendly helpful staff i expect at hostels. the atmosphere was lacking also. i felt pretty uncomfortable during my stay there to be honest. the hostels i stayed at in the weeks previous to this, in the uk, were far better. the bathrooms (showers) were filthy and uncomfortable. the toilets were regularly in a disgusting state.
great location. good breakfast. beds should've been a bit bigger and nicer. i would definitely recommend it.

honestly the staff make you the priority. there were no complaints really..there was day i missed breakfast times and il take the blame but it would have been nice to get approval to grab even a muffin before my hike.    i love the daily activities that give you options during your stay , i met lovely people that added to my experience and grant the event director is such an awesome lad! very helpful and thoughtful.
i enjoyed my time at this hostel. it has good location. its also cheap and clean. everbody is nice. i liked this hostel. but wifi wasn't working well in my room. except wifi, everything was so nice.

there is nothing good about this hostel except location. no air cond in the room even the weather is about 28c in la, kitchen is not kitchen, just a super small room for u to warm ur food, just two small stove if someone cooking there i don't think u can cook it. breakfast? if u went like 8:30am u can't see even one bread, they don't refill n i see some one packing their lunch box with bagel n fruit they provided in hostel. so we went like 8:30am n we eat nothing. ended up eat outside
private rooms very comfortable.

really expensive but maybe those are just the average prices in l.a. no air conditioning in the room which was awful cus there was barely air to breath.. breakfast is fine. toilets/baths didnt work great and there are lots of girls so it was a bit inconvenient.. not to bad though. location is fine. just across a train station if you dont have car
pretty good value for money. located in a super-busy location so take it into consideration. otherwise, was great.

nice hostel - organise lots of trips and good to have breakfast included. we had a few issues though - twice they messed up the bookings so we ended up with 7 people in a 6 bed dorm. the second time was the worst as this was only realised when one guy came in at 1 in the morning to find someone else in his bed. it took nearly an hour to resolve the issue and disturbed everyone. the fact that twice they didn't notice that 7 keys had been handed out for the same room is also worrying for security.

in great location. easy excess to metro red line , hollywood blvd and main attractions. it has several floors . no elevators. if you don&#39;t like stairs this place is not for you. bring your own towel. it cost me $2.00

this was my 1st experience staying in a hostel & i&#39;m from no. ca and just came down to the l.a. area to see my son perform in a college production. i needed to save money so i stayed but didn&#39;t quite know what to expect. i was pleasantly surprised at the comfort, cleanliness and the hospitality overall. i definitely recommend the walk of fame hostel in hollywood to anyone who&#39;s traveling there and i will definitely consider staying there agsin in the future when i go to see my son again.

hostel was great, has everything you want. people were nice. they have free events to attend each day. really liked the vibe and the location could not be better. bathroom cleanliness could be improved. but you know its a hostel
good hostel. grant and jordan were both amazing, taking us out to venice beach/santa monica and adults only, great times. appreciate it guys
it was good to stay there. liked that there were toilets but not to sure about the showers.  bed were comforty.
tyler was the only helpfull employee. got some issue with my booking because i didn&#39;t mention the second guess was a male. they apologized about the mistake and gave us a private room.
the staff was amazing

i like ensuit bathrooms, there was a communal bathroom/shower but i guess that kept the noise down in the room. pool table was great, met lots of really cool, friendly people while we all gathered around the pool table listening to music. organized events were well advertised and the hollywood sign walk was definitely a highlight.

very clean, which is what you want as a traveller, great location, but  didnt like that the bathroom door wasn&#39;t a full door considering you have to walk past it with just a towel on to get redressed, also didn&#39;t have any air-conditioning so the room was always hot, the hostel also gave my name out to my room mates who i didn&#39;t talk to basically at all, which i feel like that&#39;s an invasion of privacy and not happy about it at all as they didn&#39;t contact me before giving it to them.
it&#39;s good hostel, with a great location. i would recommend it for sure!

nothing special, but american hostels are never great. it had everything you needed - showers were ok and there was free breakfast - but it was very average overall. as american hostels go it was good, but if you compare this to a good hostel in south east asia there is no comparison in the atmosphere or facilities.
they offer towels and soap for fee. friendly staff and there is parking in the back lot for $20 i believe if you have a car

great location if you&#39;re wanting to be in the middle of hollywood. place was nice and clean, however had a bit of trouble sleeping because of street noise and the rooms were very hot at night. not that many showers for the number of people who stay there so sometimes had to wait but facilities were good. staff weren&#39;t the most friendly or welcoming...

the walk of fame hostel is located slap bang in the middle of it all....hollywood boulevard. very easy location and access from the metro station hollywood highland which is directly opposite to the station.    the hostel is regularly cleaned and did not have any trouble at regarding the cleanliness and security of the hostel.     staff are very friendly and atmosphere was great. a big bonus was the activities organised by the hostel such as the hollywood hike and beach day to santa monica .

great location nice big roomy hostel. bagels and muffins for breakfast with good variety of bagels and cream cheese and lovely fresh orange juice. helpful eager staff. friendly hostel. comfortable bed and lovely hot showers.
thanks a lot guys ! had a great time !

i slept so badly in this hostel from the noise of other guests both in the room but also the noise travelling up the stairs from a large group which got up at something like 6am for breakfast every morning. the 6-bed room was tiny with little space to put bags. there was also few plugs which were located only by bottom bunks. free breakfast was bad. free pool table was cool though and great location. bathroom was a cool lay out with plenty of mirrors for ladies to do make up. only 3 showers tho

location is very good, opposite the metro and right by a lot of tourist attractions. the rooms are very hot and we were only in a four man room so i can imagine the rooms with more beds are worse. breakfast is very good with bagels and spread and the communal area is fab. wifi was awful so it was hard to book other things. would recommend this hostel.

location is fantastic. when you step out of the hostel you already step on one of the stars on the walk of fame. subway is just across the street. hostel is clean, breakfast is good and atmosphere was great. stuff is very friendly. the only bad thing was line up for showers, there are just 4 showers for all the girls in hostel. over all it was very good and i would definitely come back.

the location is the heart of the l.a, next to subway, but if you like nature,quiet life it shouldn&#39;t be your choice because walking around the hostel is always loud and glamorous lights ecc, kinda gets boring when you stay long,   the staff is really good,helps a lot when you have a question,there is no elevator but they carried my suitcase, there is no computer at the hostel but they made me use their own ecc,  the breakfast; don&#39;t expect too much if you are a vegan, they give fruits atleast
very good location. the shopping centre and metro are just across the street. very nice staff and everything looks good and new. i stayed in private room and it would be better with air conditioner.

i was hesitant about spending time in la at first because i&#39;m not a big city person. but staying at the walk of fame hostel made my stay very easy and so fun. i made great friends with the staff, specifically the wonderful tahj and the crazy jordan !   everything was always clean, the bagels for breakfast are deliciousssss   most importantly i know i&#39;ll visit again because of the friendships i made! love you guys ☮💟☪
great location and great facilities. staff were ok. the rooms do need ac though, the fan wasn't really enough.

stayed august 2016 and had a great stay. we had a private double which was really big and lots of space for luggage. the bathrooms were always being cleaned as we&#39;re the corridors and  communal spaces. the location is great for access to the metro (directly across the street) and for tourist traps e.g madame toussards and cinemas.
the location is superb. transportation is everything you would ask for. even its a bit crowded but you have chance to meet lot of people. the daily activity was fun with helpful staffs.

security is decent, but could be updated (small lockers).  staff is nice,but not all that chatty. grant, the hiking guide,is very protective and chatty as well as informative.   amazing cheap and local walking tours!  food is mediocre: bagels, jam, orange juice, butter.  rooms nice&clean,my corner unit was bright. lots of outlets, but inconveniently placed around room. yes it&#39;s noisy because you&#39;re in the city, but common in cities. altogether pretty decent and can&#39;t beat the location.

this place at first glance seemed a bit expensive but when i got there i realised that i was in the centre of everything that i wanted to be.   with a metro station just opposite the hostel it&#39;s well connected with the rest of the city.   the activities that they had scheduled were also great and anyone could tell how much it&#39;s worth doing the hikes just for the beautiful views of the whole city.   if i came to the city again i would definitely stay here again!
i never usually write reviews but this was genuinely really good. so so clean and tidy- literally cleaning staff there all the time and the front desk staff super helpful. stellar location.
breakfast was very limited and rooms were very hot despite the fan but overall great location and friendly staff and good range of facilities

generally pretty good, the rooms and bathrooms could be a bit cleaner and it doesn&#39;t really have much of a kitchen. it&#39;s right in the middle of the tourist part of hollywood so it&#39;s a bit full on outside all the time but it&#39;s right next to a main public transport stop so you can get around pretty easily from there.    the crowd tended to be pretty social and they had daily activities so it was a pretty good option to meet people if you&#39;re travelling on your own.

eine super location, sauberes hostel und bequeme betten. man kann wirklich nichts sagen - ist top.  würde ich jederzeit wieder nehmen wenn ich in la downtown übernachten möchte.  - ein kleines manko gibt es allerdings. das frühstück war wirklich nicht besonders gut. die auswahl war zu gering. (:

i forgot to take the key out of the door....when asked for anothwr key they charged 10dollars and the staff was really really rude....we asked them to see the cctv if someone took the key out just to make sure  if our luggage is safe when we are out...they were least bothered didnt help us in anyway!!!

had an amazing stay at this hostel, the location is perfect, couldn&#39;t ask to be closer!   the staff are friendly and helpful and it&#39;s definitely worth the money!  great hostel overall and a great stay

this location is outstanding! the staff were very friendly and great at helping you figure out where to go, what to see and the best way to get there! the beds were very comfy! the only thing i would say is the facilities; there is no lift so you have to walk up a flight of stairs with your case, also you have to ask at front desk when you want to use the hairdryer etc..and you have to rent your towel! i would still stay here again though and recommend to others
hostel had everything you need. yummy breakfast. perfect location for hollywood and then train lines.
decent location but hollywood isn't all that, it got really got in the rooms no air-conditioning only fans that werent to adequate, great vibe hostel has awesome group actives which is cool
great hostel and perfect location.   dennis and creg helped me on arrival and departure with my bags.   jordan took us out to some really cool places, if in la again i would stay here.

great hostel, excellent location, fun atmosphere, clean facilities. only thing is the rooms have poor ventilation and are hot and stuffy - you will sweat a little (there is no a/c). we had the windows open, which face the street, so it was noisy in the rooms. bring ear plugs. overall, great experience and a lot of fun.

the hostel is located right in the heart of hollywood with all the tourist attractions. the bathrooms are roomy. the biggest gripe is that it is very hot. the common area has ac, but the dorm rooms don&#39;t. it was among the most uncomfortable sleep i&#39;ve ever had. you have to keep the windows open to get any sort of relief, but then the noise outdoors seem to go on all night. the staff is not very informative and had to figure a lot of things out myself. parking behind the hostel is $25-30 a night.

great location. right next to subway. one stop from universal. all nightlife in around the boulevard. tyler at front desk was awesome. decent atmosphere with a pool table and foosball in common area. only drawback is that the area closes at midnight so you have no place to sit and chill after a night out

comfy matress and lockers in rooms. great location on hollywood blv by the chinese theatre. for the price i would expect aircon as it was very hot even with floor and ceiling fan on. the ladies  bathroom was always really busy and therefore the floor was always wet and dirty, no fault of the cleaners just too many people. the staff were helpful but some could be a little unwelcoming. breakfast was ok but limited - bagels and mini muffins and oj. more of a party hostel so could be noisy at night.

the place was great. awesome location. the hostel had a good vibe and the staff was helpful and friendly. the only thing i had trouble with was that it was ridiculously hot in there. but overall i had a great stay!
i really did enjoy my stay here and it was very central to the walk of fame. it could use a better entrance, since it was difficult to spot.
great hostel

such an awesome location. i would stay there again just for the location. the dorm had no lockers and only one power point.  the ladies bathroom was on the top level so it was a bit of a pain having to walk upstairs to go to the toilet. 2 of the showers were not working when i was there but there were 2 others. they were clean, which is the main thing! overall it wasn't too bad and i would stay there again.

great location! room was hot and noisy due to being so close to the kodiac theatre but that was expected. hostel breakfast was average, staff were awesome and bathrooms were very nice.    if you want to be in the middle of the action, this is the place to be!
best location by far. very very friendly staff and cool people

only stayed there 2 nights but had everything i needed and a good breakfast available, not really a party hostel from what i seen but more chilled out which isn't necessarily a bad thing, great location beside train station and write on hollywood boulevard

the staff are great, location perfect, hostel is pretty cool however the downside is that there is just no atmosphere there. unless you go on a bar crawl or do a day activity then its pretty bad by hostel standards. people tend to keep to themselves which can be a pain if your shy or don't drink. that might just be the people staying at the hostel i'm not sure but if they improve that atmosphere then they are good to go as there in a prime spot

it was really great !  the locations is just awesome !  the stuff is really nice and the rooms are big and clean.  the bathrooms could be cleaned more often but it was fine :)  all in all a really good trip

this was a perfect stop on our road trip through the west coast! amazing location and convenient amenities. overnight parking is available for $12 in a garage -- but you can easily park in the nearby neighborhoods. showers and bathrooms were clean, lockers are convenient, and giving laundry baskets by washing machines was convenient. despite the hot temperature outside, a fan and an open window was more than enough for the night. overall a great quality hostel experience by any standard.

not much of an atmosphere, but hostel was in a great location, 5-10 min walk to lots of attractions and a metro station across the road. bathrooms are clean but like a gym locker room which is fine but i found it a bit awkward. room was stuffy and hot, no ac but did have fans. could have more in room amenities, like a chair and more outlets spread throughout the room, not in the one place. storage cages would be better rather than lockers, which where big enough for a back pack but not much else
great hostel, but staff was kind of indifferent and the rooms were really hot!

this was one of the worst hostel i&#39;ve ever been in. the staff was horrible there was a staff member who kept looking for a fight with me and other people. the showers are horrible, super expensive like 51 for a night... dont go there for more than one night... never gonna return to this place.

great venue if you&#39;re looking to meet people and have fun, good budget accomodation.  i was told it was the &#39;safest&#39; place to be.. but when i&#39;m charger and adaptor were stolen, they refused to help me find the person even though it was all on camera. so with 10 dollars left to my name before leaving i had to choose buying  a new adaptor from them, over food for the day. not very compassionate for travellers in bad situations.

been traveling around the world.    by far worst hostel i've stayed at.  room stunk.  staff unfriendly.  showers aren't warm or they flicker between cold and hot. i love a good drink or 5 but when people partying till 1 or 2am on monday tuesday especially when the sign says quiet time from 10 or 11 it's quite frustrating.   however fantastic location.   would not stay again.
the location was great. the hostel was very clean and the room was big and comfortable.
it was a pleasant experience. staff were very helpful and polite. overall, it was a decent hostel and place to crash for a couple of days.

the location is excellent, just steps from the hollywood walk of fame. it's also easy to get there, as the subway stop is just near by. the staff was very accommodating. i didn't really like the bathrooms though ... (not very clean, there are only shower curtains, instead of doors)
excellent place excellent location, people, mates, cleanliness. the laundry helps to stay more time and the mates are easy going. thanks.

great location, and could be a good hostel, however it is a lot of money for what you get. the main problems are that there is only one set of toilets, so if you&#39;re on the second floor, it&#39;s fairly far away. also, the wifi was pretty much non-existent.

the best thing about this hostel is the perfect location- literally on the walk of fame, so easy to  anywhere with lots of food places & shops literally right outside! we stayed during a movie premiere too, so it was pretty cool to see that going on right outside the window.  the staff were all lovely, free breakfast was basic but nice & the common area was nice & pretty social. would definitely recommend.

we loved staying here! visiting hollywood for the first time and being able to wake up and see hollywood boulevard from our dorm window was something special! exceptional facilities, service and general atmosphere. if we get the chance we will most definitely be back! thank you for having us and starting our first two nights in the usa   a-ok!
watch the showers, run hot and cold at same time , floor very slippery ,needs to offer coffee at all times not just breakfast

basic but clean rooms. good shower temp & pressure at all times.  noise level from outside was quite acceptable with location. free breakfast a bonus. friendly & helpful staff. would happily stay again. no secure smoking area but street front seems quite safe at all hours.

great location for hollywood sightseeing. international travelers only. bathrooms too small and were always busy. must bring your own locks for lockers. expect to pay highly for parking. loud area. overall decent.
very nice hostel, conveniently located at the hollywood blvd. parking is quite expensive though.
10 out of 10. staff are friendly and my room is big and clean. my first time in hostel and i am so impressive.   lockers are provide in room and you need to bring your own key.
good location, the people gathering around the door was a little much though.
showers and bathroom space were fairly large for hostel standards. i would stay here again mainly for the location.
great hostel, terrible wifi though!
it was an ok hostel, but its la.
really good location. good facilities. friendly staff.

overall, a really good hostel. as always a few bug-bears but that&#39;s hostels for you. (staff member shouting in to his phone at 11:30pm outside my door = asked him to quieten down. snoring room-mate = i needed to put ear plugs in at 4am).  other than the fact that the &#34;free wifi&#34; doesn&#39;t actually work - as in i can&#39;t load a single web page with it - there&#39;s nothing i could expect them to easily improve. (apart from a plug socket at each bed?)  facilities good and clean. easy, tasty br

great location for seeing all the tourist attractions of hollywood. right on the walk of fame, train station right across the road. the facility was clean, staff were friendly and helpful and the free breakfast in the morning was pretty good.     the only down side is the room i stayed in you could here everything happening outside. if you can&#39;t sleep through the noise it is probably not the best place to stay.
i had a great time! breakfast wasn&#39;t really good but location was perfect!

walk of fame is one of the best hostels i've stayed in! the staff are so helpful. cant thank the event coordinator jordan and also james for some of the best nights of my life! management was amazing, so helpful in every way. thank you!!!
really easy to find from the airport & in a central location in the hollywood area. felt secure & met some nice people. would recommend :)
the only good thing about this hostel is the location. the room was smelly and super hot and bathrooms weren't that clean.

a fantastic location, you step right out onto the walk of fame. unfortunately the staff weren&#39;t very helpful and didn&#39;t even have a map to give us. the curtains in the room were thin as paper and the sun streamed into our room very early.  breakfast was very yummy!!

compared all the hostels i stayed this one is terrible, definitly go and stay down in santa monica area, wifi is terrible, not clean at all, not cosy, impossbile to meet anyone, very expensive compared the facilites they offer! for the same price you can fins smth much better! this was the 7th hostel i stayed in in 10 days because of my trip! do not recomend to anyone. the location is also dodgy for going out at night!

overall, i enjoyed my stay at the hostel. the location was excellent and right in the middle of the action. they offer day trips and a few night activities for the guests. the showers were not the greatest as it was hit or miss (choosing the right shower with hot water). the other thing was the wifi. this kept going in and out and there were many times it would not work for periods of time. the beds, washrooms and the facility were very clean and the staff was friendly. i will definitely go back

the hostel is centrally located in hollywood, across the street from a subway station and at walking distance from the hollywood bowl. the staff is terrific: they are very friendly and eager to help. my only complaint, which i expressed to them, was related to noise caused by some guests at night. the staff promised they would work on enforcing their internal quiet hours policy.
everything was great and the staff was friendly and helpful. great spot!

my experience was awesome. it was my first time in california and the staff was so friendly and knowledgable. i was also travelling alone and felt really comfortable and the common area was really social. the hostel is also in the most perfect location on the strip and very easy to get to via public transport. i would definitely recommend to anyone

best location, right on the main intersection of highland and hollywood, all the main attractions are right there. staff is super friendly and helpful and especially caesar at front desk. the activities organized by hostel are great. i did 3 tours with hostel, and grant did a great job. very easy to meet new people and make new friends. breakfast is also decent. i would highly recommend staying here.
amazing location ,little expensive   helpful staff   good common area

perfect location and great atmosphere. staff offers a lot of different activities. rooms are big and have a lot of space. cleanliness could be better thou especially in the shower room. stayed there for 6 nights and really enjoyed it.
everything was perfect.. perfect staff and perfect room

the showers were hot but don&#39;t expect much privacy- the women&#39;s restroom had curtains that were supposed to suction to the wall- but none of them worked. so, any woman walking by can basically see in the sides of the shower. obviously i can&#39;t speak for the men&#39;s room. the beds were fine. also, this isn&#39;t a &#34;youth&#34; hostel. there were a lot of older people staying here. i personally didn&#39;t like the location because hollywood boulevard is sketchy.

best spot for tourist.  men&#39;s shower is kind of a joke , only 3 showers for all the men and it&#39;s cold water !!! headoffice people kinda rude .. wifi is a piece of ***. i didn&#39;t be able to check in my flight..   for a hostel that big you need at least great showers and wifi come on..  def not going again

location is key, literally in the heart of hollywood which is what i wanted! i actually work in a hostel so know how cleaning a hostel goes and i felt it lacked just a little but due to the size i can kind of understand this. but us women can be messy regardless!
had a great stay here, fab location as it sits on the walk of fame. everything was pretty good, the breakfast was a bit bland but the place was kept very clean and well organised. would recommend!
had a pleasant stay. really helpful staff (24/7)

it's right on hollywood bvd, loud but funny. hollywood is a good base for exploring la, though it's a pain to get to venice or sm. the hostel is basic but the mattresses were amazing! safe and secure. bathrooms old but clean, lots of hot water. kitchen very basic, common room atmosphere a bit limp when i was there. worst thing was wifi was terrible. so slow. i had to stand outside starbucks just to organise my travel plans :p
great hostel, would recommend!
hostel is very clean and the location is the best!!! also the breakfast in the morning is good and we met a lot of new people there, i would recommend this location. :-)
it's very glad that i spent my stay here in the us. i made a lot of friends here! it's a very special experience for me. next time i visit los angeles, i'll pay my visit here again!!
great location, friendly and helpful staff, rooms were spacious and clean and the showers were great! would definitely stay again if i&#39;m back in hollywood!
really loved this hostel. great vibe and in such an incredible location. good facilities and breakfast was decent.

awesome hostel, we arrived on oscar day, and had the best view of the red carpet. the best view anywhere it her than being invited to the event. i saw leonardo dicaprio which made my stay!    other than the great view, the staff were so great and friendly and the daily activities were good. we did the trip to the hollywood sign, i&#39;d recommend     kitchen is small, but breakfast us good.   thumbs up from me!

i have nothing bad to say about this hostel.  i have stayed here on two seperate trips and each time was pleasant.  the staff is nice and the hostel has a good atmosphere.  also you cannot ask for a better location.  highly recommended!
i stayed in a private room 1 night, and a shared room 1 night. the location was perfect. i felt safe. the staff was very friendly and helpful. fantastic value for the money.
good location
pretty good hostel. we had a private room with ensuite which was nice and spacious. the bathroom could use a renovation. great free breakfast included. staff were friendly.
make sure that you bring your international passport to check-in.
great location right on hollywood boulevard.  stayed in a private room which had a comfy bed and a fridge.  shower could have done with an update but did the job
you should add hot water, we're freaking cold when showered.
everything good,.. a part from 2 days with cold shower..

great location right on the hollywood strip. the building was clean and the staff was friendly and accommodating. the breakfast is below average, just beagles and muffins. but it was included with the price so i am grateful for that. the building is 2 stories with a mens restroom on the 1 floor and female on the 2nd. a little annoying but manageable.
great hostel, friendly staff and a good free breakfast. would recommend the hollywood sign walk. would stay again quite happily.

perfectly situated in front of redline-station, bus stops, main attractions and life of hollywood. everyone at the hostel is helpful and very friendly bringing a good mood! look out and enjoy hostel activities or hiking.  i'll definetly come back!

i stayed three times because of its location! telling you exactly what i’ve seen! good location, just by the metro station, free walking city tour/hollywood sign with amazing tour guide. some of the staffs are so rude and no respect at all. shower is already a disaster (lukewarm or cold, no water pressure in shower). no storage room! old windows that street noise is very loud day and night! so you can’t have a nice asleep at all. the price for the quality described is so high!! not recommended

hollywood is such a weird place, during the day the location was great, but at night it felt a little sketchy. bring an eye mask to sleep because the curtains are very thin and the street lights outside are very bright.
hostel, awesome  people and awesome activities !
this is an awesome hostel. i was very enjoy staying here. the location also great. love it  i promise that i gonna stay herd someday.
everything is great, thank you
best hostel experience for a while. nice free tours and the location is perfect 👌🏼 the breakfast was pretty good, something fresh would've been nice tough.
good location

the location is really great - it's right at the heart of the hollywood walk of fame. but that's just what leads to the hostel's biggest problem: there is very much noise coming from the street all day (and night) long and also some guests didn't care about the rest times so there was also noise coming from inside. but with ear plugs it was ok. the breakfast also was ok but could have been better (very limited choice). there are guided tours or events every day, which is great.
i was happy to stay in here. you are so kind to me. and i like programs. hike to hollywood sign and paly game at night.
i was a great first experience going to the holly hostel. enjoyed myself and my time there.

dorms should have a better security system, other people in my dorm insisted in leaving the door unlocked so anyone could get inside.  also breakfast hours ends too early, people who wants to get a little more sleep were in risk to only have a bagel and neat coffee because there is no reposition of the items through out the breakfast hours.
very convenient and easy. great location and nice accommodations.

i had a great time. great vibe and atmosphere, i met so many people from all over the world. the location is so great, right across the street from the train station for the metro red line, as well as the bus to go to interesting parts of town. there's group activities that the hostel facilitates to help meet new people. the place was also really clean. i never felt unsafe, and there's a sense of community it seems like. i'd definitely recommend, and come back if in ever in the area again.

the best location you could ask for. right opposite a metro station so you can easily get anywhere. down points are that the bathrooms and cooking area are not big enough for the amount of people staying at the hostel. note, a lot of long term stayers here. not just travellers. but hostel staff are amazing and make you feel welcome :)
atmosphere could have been better. maybe because there are too many people in the hostel. but nice hostel in total!

the hostel lies on the main street of hollywood right opposite the subway. the location is good however pretty noisy. the room, the bed, the matress and the lockers in the room were absolutelly ok. the bathrooms were however busy and not always clean. the free breakfast was just bagals/toast and butter, chees or jam. disappointing was that the hostel didn't provide any towels.
not enough hot water to supply at least a warm shower.  otherwise great place with nice breakfast!

nice hostel located right on hollywood blvd! the rooms were spacious enough, felt safe, lockers in the room (provide own lock), and the showers most of the time were lukewarm or cold. overall we enjoyed our stay and would come again!

its a good location. overall, its been pleasant.  however, if the hostels can improve in 2 areas, it will be better. have hot water and cleaniness of the place. the staff clean the restroom and mop the floor everyday!! good. but what makes the place dirty is the people who stay there. tissues are thrown everywhere. may be, the hostel needs to set some rules.

i liked that it's just at the walk of fame, really close to everything. the best part about my stay were daily activities organized by the hostel - like hike to the hollywood sign and many others. but: there is only four showers in only one female bathroom for the whole building - wake up very early if you don't want to wait in line. also, no hot water already at 7:30-8am, so i don't know how early you have to wake up to have a nice shower during which you don't shiver.

the location is great (with access to metro subway n bus, food, and bars!) they hold some free hiking tour that we can get to see the nice view of la and meet new friends! clean inside the room but a little bit messy in the common area. a little bit few shower rooms and toilets.
very good vibe, there was beer pong and we went out for drinks later. location is unbeatable, right at the center of the hollywood boulevard. everyone was friendly ad helpful.
i never got hot water when taking  shower.

the tours offered were well ran. the atmosphere was great. security was a little sketchy, but i was fine. the woman's bathroom ran out of toilet paper. but the experience was amazing and i met some great people!
door was left unlocked and open during our entire stay.  showers were cold at all hours
awesome. it was super easy to connect to awesome folks. thanks samesum, i will come again.
four mens showers for two floors of dormitories was far less than sufficient. and i did't have a hot shower for the entirety of my stay.
cesaer was an incredibly helpful and wonderful part of your staff. truly made the my experience fun and unique. thanks for a great time!
common bathroom. breakfast is okay. security is rather poor. everyone can get in. they have luggage storage after check out but its actually just an open area where anyone have access.

i basically just used this hostel to recover from a 25 hour flight and see the boulevard before leaving la. bed was comfy, other guests in the dorm knew the rules and were quiet when coming in and the street noises weren't too bad. i didn't really want to meet people as it was a quick stay and people were friendly enough to approach but also would give you space.
great location and lovely staff!

the rooms smell old and a little funky. considering the hostel's right in the heart of hollywood, you can't beat it! i enjoyed it and would recommend it to others. they really could work a little harder of the free continental breakfast?
great place. very clean and welcoming! showers are great too! but very far from where our room was (the girls) which was a nightmare!! other than that was great!

best hostel ever! so helpful staff, clean hostel with great breakfast in the heart of hollywood.  would advice to anyone who wants to stay in the center of hollywood for reasonable price and have great holiday. thank you guys...
location is awesome.friendly staff.recommended

the location is perfect! staff there are extremely helpful and patient! the everyday free activities are excellent! i enjoyed the hiking a lot. if there's anything which can make improvement is the breakfast, can be a little better with the room price. all in all it was a very nice staying, recommended!

loved my stay at samesun hostel! they provided some tours for free and i enjoyed all of them. the common room has a good atmosphere to meet new people or work/study. the bedroom was wide and felt safe. the bathroom was always clean and not as crowded as i thought it would be. the only thing to complain about was the safety. anyone can get in. in my last night there, i was being followed by a homeless and i thought i would be safe in there but she got in with me and kept following me inside.

the location was perfect. very easy to get to from the airport, and right on the hollywood walk of fame. the staff was friendly and helpful. the people staying in my room were kind. free breakfast, hot showers, no complaints. a bit expensive, but that's just la. i would stay there again.
very dirty kitchen. no possibilities to make food confortable (no knives, no tools). coffee is awfull.  most of the thibgs are broken or in bad health (dryer, boiling water etc...)
stayed here for just a couple of nights, close to everything, great activities, good common area, nice bagel breakky.
great activities

i really enjoyed my stay at the hostel. it was in an excellent location, in the center of hollywood, it was very inexpensive, it was not too crowded at least in october when i was there, it was very clean, cleaning people were wiping sinks and washing floor at least daily, it was getting a new paint job, there were optional free activities organized i.e. hike to hollywood sign, or a night out to a bar, free wi fi, free breakfast and awesome people. what more can you ask?
i had the most amazing time! the most fun i have had on my trip, really fun and welcoming staff and so so much to do in hollywood! felt 100% safe and comfortable! great experience!
i had a very pleasant stay here. the staff were awesome and the location is unbeatable. it&#39;s literally a stone&#39;s throw away from the kodak theater.
bathrooms need new plumbing.
was an amazing experience! the location is great, the stuff was great!

it was a great hostel in a great city , very nice people stay in the hostel, made a lot of friends even though i stayed for 2 nights only . very nice and helpful staff , thanks eeb , angela  for being very patient and helpful.
great hostel!! the activities were awesome. staff was very friendly, with clean facilities
free breakfast!!, clean rooms and facilities. awesome stay!!

the location is excellent and the breakfast (bagels and muffins) is commendable, at best. but the atmosphere is very clique-ish. hosteling in the us is generally worlds away from the inclusive environments you will find in europe or in asia.
thanks for moving me to another room quickly and easy
an excellent hostel to stay in! highly recommended!
the location is unbeatabel,right in the middle of hollywood blv.  the guys at reception were kind and helpful. i wouldn´t care to crash there if i come back to hollywood
staff were awesome with fun activities and hikes. clean facilities and big common room. i would return.
the location was great. it is right on the hollywood blvd.   but the rooms don't have ac and by 40°c it's terrible hot without ac...  the staff was nice and the people are cool, though.

staff very friendly and helpful! they made our stay in los angeles way more easier! the atmosphere was great too!  the facilities could have been cleaner and when we come in it smells musty      ac would be a necessity; 6 in a room when its hot its unbearable!!  breakfast was great!    overall i liked my experience staying there!

staff here are brilliant and were willing to go above and beyond no only to ensure you had a pleasant stay with them but that your experience in hollywood was enjoyable. unfortunately there was no aircon and with numerous 40*c/104*f days during my stay it was rather warm in the rooms making sleeping rather difficult. their cold filtered water refilling stations were also empty 95% of the time which when it is that hot made many of us grumpy. however it is in a fantastic location!

the hostel was very clean and comfortable, but the guests were very noisy even at 2:30 am and the clerk was not interested in enforcing quiet hours. there is also no air conditioning which made it difficult to sleep.
as a hotel in 21st century, i surprisingly found out the room has no air-conditioning.    parking downstairs: $25 per night. parking under dolby theatre (almost one block away): $15 per night.

great location! rooms were pretty big compared to others i've stayed in, bathroom was clean and had a separate changing area which came in handy.  only downside was the small kitchen but it was usable  overall a good hostel

great location, friendly staff especially the blonde guy from chicago at reception (sorry forgot the name) who helped me a number of times with routes around the area.  washrooms aren't in good condition though and the bedrooms are so stuffy and smelly but acceptable i guess for the price you're paying. would be useful to have phones in the room to call reception as 2 drunken guys entered our room at 5am one night! location is good and close to the hollywood sights.
excellent trips!
good hostel right on hollywood blvd, can be loud at night with street performers but that didn't bother us too much!

the bed is not very clean and there is something bad smell ！the workers are not very friendly and no air conditioner there so that very very hot those days！but the location   is well because it is hollywood star street，i bought a lot clothes there . if  some people like the location you can choose it but i will not come back this hostel……sorry
great hostel ! i love everything!

it is a average hostel facilities etc the staff are real good the place is clean and friendly. they have lockers but you have to buy a padlock which i can find annoying as i paid already so i shouldn't have to pay more for some security. i would over all say though you paying for the location as i don't think there are many so central in hollywood with this price.
it was a nice place. great atmosphere but the showers are a bit dirty.
i enjoyed my stay there. staff is very friendly location excellent and free breakfast was nice. i recommned this place

well, the good new here is that the staff was very friendly and acommodating but if we had wanted to stay in a "sweat lodge" this would not have been it!  l.a,. temperature was in the 80's and 90's most of the time of our visit and this hostel does not have air conditioning!  we requested another fan but never received it and for some reason, they took out the only chair we had in the room.  will never stay there again!
need to work better on cleanliness
its a very good hostel for bagpackers, free wifi, free good breakfast... the people working there are very gently and help you in everything.
great location, good size lockers, great bathroom area, a bit noisy due to good location, very hot no air con and could have more effort on events
