the one thing to point out is the location. although the hostel is located at one of the bigger streets with a bus stop just a few yards/meters ahead the bus connection to downtown la / airport / famous beaches takes a while more than with the metro. however the hostel feels very secure, is clean, had acceptable beds and launch some activities (with free food and drinks) almost every day. the breakfast is however with just tosts and cerials rather disappointing althought standard in the usa.

a decent hostel with good facilities and atmosphere. they organize a few good social events such as open mic on mondays. however, seems to be located a fair way from public transport but i think la is not very well set up for public transport. walking distance to sunset strip and hollywood boulevard but.
great hostel. one of the best i've stayed in. except the cleaner comes in in the morning and dobs you in for banging all the girls!
is a good place to pass the night but the location is kinda far from everywhere
good location and fun activities.
i really appreciated the atmosphere..offering shuttle buses and bbq nights. right on!
low season meant not a lot of people there but events are every night so good way to meet people. good breakfast. city maps could be better.

i've stayed in a lot of hostels. the staff were friendly and willing to help. they provided toast and cereals for breakfast and every night had an activity to join in on. the hostel was clean and tidy. highly recommend.
nothing special about this place. breakfast is 90% carbs and sugar. liked the coffee and fruits though.  rude cleaning man didn't let me sit in a common room after midnight, ridiculous!

had an amazing time here, the events that the hostel arranged were soo good! really good kitchen and common room. only issue i had was that some of my clothes were pinched out of the storage room, and a friend had there jacket stolen from the basement. otherwise good hostel.

overall a great hostel and a lot of fun. location is a bit further out and a bit quieter than the other banana hostel but the staff here are really great organise loads of fun stuff and get everyone involved. room was clean, facilities were decent, breakfast was ok.    secure parking under the hostel was also a big bonus.    would definitely recommend.
will be back!
good points: location, breakfast, free parking,   negative points: bit old, shower wasn't good, kitchen wasn't clean enough
great hostel excellent location!! would recommend
staff were super friendly and helpful! great location and i was happy with my stay.

this is a really great hostel, the staff are really friendly and helpful, the location is really good. the atmosphere is really sociable and i met some great people here, was very sad to leave. there are activities every night and really good evenings involving free or very cheap alcohol and food. with a free minibus over to the other hostels for these nights you meet so many people and get the benefit of a central hollywood location. i would definitely come back, it made la for me!
i thought it was really great, esp the parking even though it gets full sometimes. location was amazing, staff were great! i cant wait to stay there again!

great place to stay. dorms have their own bathrooms, free breakfast included, they organise plenty things to do. i'd recommend the comedy and karaoke nights, they are awesome (even if you're not really into it)!

this hostel has potential to be amazing and is set up well but completely misses the mark with atmosphere. gina works hard rallying up people to do things and is full of info and is super friendly, the hostel could do with more workers like her (and a bar that is open daily!)
super helpful staff and something going on every night  a bit expensive but it's the states hey  very close to the canyon for great hikings above la
great friendly atmosphere for young travelers, a different event each night and very social. shower didn't work very well and.didn't get very hot
clean, good facilities, big so not a homely feel

great stay at this hostel, everything you need. dorm rooms and bathrooms are always clean, free wifi and breakfast is a bonus, fun activities every day and night, friendly and very helpful staff. highly recommend this hostel.

i have never reviewed a hostel before but in felt like i needed to this time. i came to america for the first time and by myself. this hostel made me feel welcome from the day i arrived and that made things alot easier for me. the staff there were brilliant and i met some great people whilst staying here. they put on some great entertainment and was located close to transport. i would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting for the first time or just wants somewhere fun and safe.

this hostel is very nice! and it is very well located close to main streets and easy accesses. staff are friendly and willing to help any time! what i missed a little was to have more atmosphere, but maybe as i was busy i didn&#39;t really get the time to talk to anyone. awesome value for money! i would definitely come back!
not only did i sleep well and the customer service was first rate. but the facilities were soon good and the atmosphere was awesome. everyone was really friendly.

kitchen was clean but bathrooms and dorm rooms were filthy. the blankets that are left in the beds are in bad condition.   hostel is in a very cool, safe area. walkable at night.   staff was friendly and helpful.

i am impressed by the size of the hostel - it is huge! there is plenty of space inside, but also outside (ground floor and upstairs) - the kitchen is big too! breakfast was impressive so the activities at night - highly recommend attending those, especially free bbq and stand-up comedy! location is great too and what i also loved was the airport transfer that you can organise especially if you have no car in la... overall good, but i felt like it was harder to meet people in such a big place.
nice hostel, bit party scene and staff constantly organising activities to get everyone involved. breakfast choice a bit limited.
very spacious, clean and confortable!
great hostel in a fabulous location
good hostel, good breakfast. 1h by walk to hollywood bvl. true free parkaing with limited place.
completely lacking in atmosphere. seemed to be a lot of long-stay tenants - first two people i spoke to had been there 20-30 days. friendly staff, good location but won't be back.

banana bungalow west has an atmosphere very similar to a friendly college dorm, that faculty were very kind, the building was secure, and the off street parking was a big plus. it was a great place to stay.
very good location!
great place to stay

the people that work at this hostel are fantastic! i took their advice and went on a great hike. the breakfast is fantastic 8am-11am. so you have plenty of time to sleep in, have breakfast ad check out by 11am. they will let you store your stuff securely if you have already checkout and want to explore more of la before you fly out.  great location. you can walk around and discover places. highly recommend staying. only thing i can say is bake sure you get a comfy pillow on arrival.
great location, great people. if i ever come back to la this is my place to stay!

i have nothing bad to say about this hostel - i wasn't in la to party, so i was happy that even though they arranged different parties and outings, the hostel itself was very calm. the staff was nice, hostel was clean, wifi worked really well and i was very happy that they had lockers in the rooms that you can use with a normal padlock. i would definitely recommend this hostel, i felt safe there and that's not always granted with hostels. i'm very happy with my stay :)

best hostel in almost 4 years travelling - lots of fun - lots of party nights - lots of free booze - lots of hot chicks - expensive but that's la - and location pretty outta the way but free shuttle most nights to the clubs

i would recommend the banana bungalow. the staff were friendly and helpful. the kitchen is enormous, and the hostel feels safe. good location for walking also. i would not recommend taking the airport shuttle, however. i called up with the time i needed to be at the airport and arrived 45 minutes late despite little traffic that day.  the shuttle driver grabbed coffees, socialized at hotel stops, and even dropped his wife off to work on the way after i had told him i was going to miss my flight.
not so closed to hollywood boulevard so that a car or hostel shuttle is needed.  activities and clubs are awesome.
staff were lovely and there was something organised for every evening, a wonderful place to stay!
bobby was incredibly helpful! he helped us sort our car parking and couldn't do enough to make our stay a good one. other members of staff were great too.
good location, lots of activities and free stuff! clean well equipped rooms, friendly helpful staff. great first experience for a hostel!

amazing!! little bit more expensive but this is the place to be, especially for first time travellers!  staff are excellent and activities are fun and convenient. best hostel i've ever stayed at across the world.

banana bungalow is a very nice and social hostel. the courtyard, lounge area and cellar provide a lot of space to relax or meet up with people. there's a big kitchen, plenty of bathrooms and breakfast provided. the hostel organizes an activity every night, going from free bbq to party bus to karaoke. staff was friendly, rooms were clean. to be honest, i was sad to leave.
great hostel with a really good terrace and a amazing tv lounge room with pool table for free  cool atmosphere

when i first arrvide the staff welcomed me with a smiale. they gave me my key right away and told me where to go. then i asked were the closet store was told me right away. great staff amazing  people rooms re so clean and nice. i loved it and would love to go back. it inspired me to find a job in  working in  hostlhostle. so i give this hostile 5 stars.

absolutely loved staying at this hostel! right in the heart of west hollywood, just a stones throw away from the farmer's market and a short uber ride away from the strip. great vibes and the staff (niall!) were very kind and accommodating. a lot of hostels i've stayed in are very business orientated and were mainly concerned with giving us a bed for a couple of nights. this hostel, however, made sure that everyone felt right at home and made sure that we were all having a good time!

was a really fun hostel the staff was really cool and they had tons of cool activities for people to do. they were a bit expensive because they were a bit far from places to see. but i had a good time.
awesome hostel
really good atmosphere! always something to do or get in involved with at this hostel. young vibrant staff. very pleasant stay! would deff come back!

very nice hostel overall. staff is friendly and james is a legend. there is a lot of activities. however, there was an error with management and there was a traveller who was sent to the wrong room, this resulted in myself being rudely awoken at 5 am by two drunk guests claiming that i was in one of their beds - as the numbers didn't add up. management took no responsibility for this and refused to compensate me for the error, which is pretty weak considering how expensive it is to stay here.

great hostel to stay at, lots of good events and some cool people to meet too. price is par for hollywood, hostel was lovely and clean with helpful staff and great kitchen facilities, loads of fridge space and cookers etc. breakfast was good, cereal, fruit, bread etc. can walk to places but lots of buses nearby. enjoyed stay so much that i decided to come rebook for the last few days of my usa travelling.
front desk workers were so helpful and nice! the location is great and everything was clean, it was great!

the hostel was good, but my co-travelers and i especially appreciated the hostel activities. if you want to see the city and its fancy neighborhoods, we absolutely recommend the tour with armani aka jesus. thanks to armani aka jesus, we even had the chance to meet justin bieber. and if you want to party in hollywood, the hostel has some great stuff to offer, too.   jesus, if you read this: contact angie. codeword "i believe i can fly" ;)  we would stay at this hostel again anytime.  thegermangirls
great tikki bar

had the best time during my travels mostly thanks to elena the italian receptionist, she is the most helpful, charming, sweetest person i ever met! she made me feel like home, always smile and have amazing positive energy!
amazing!! the staff are brilliant and want to get you involved and show you a good time. great tours put on and there's a friendly happy atmosphere going round
dark girl behind the desk and guy with long hair were absolute legends
great hostel with really friendly staff and good events every night. good location with public transport not far. met alot of awesome people here
we had to wait 24 hours to get our towels. at breakfast, they did not replace the food that was over.
super good
nice place to stay for couple of days. good atmosphere and nice staff.
nice, clean and funny. a good stay if you spend a couple of days in los angeles.
one of the best hostels i've ever stayed in! such a fun atmosphere, great staff and convenient location. highly recommended!
great place for activities every night. had a great time there and outside of the hostel. they took us to go bar hopping in hollywood.
great hostel clean with many spaces in common and excellent staff especially a italian girl she is very friendly and helpful.
very friendly environment with nice people, both staff and guests. i checked in alone and checked out with new friends! very recommended
very good commom areas. nice events every night!
great and safe location. easy walking to local sights. favourite part is how close it is to a 24 hour diner.
lively atmosphere and good times. the only downside of this hostel is the location. i'd reccomend the hollywood banana bungalow instead of west hollywood

i heard there are worse places, i say there are better..! it's far from clean and everything is very run down. the people are cool but the security is close to non existent.. shame, the location is great so with a bit more effort it could make a lovely place..
not for all age groups, perfect atmosphere for pre party drinks before partying in l.a
i liked it!

i thought the place smelled kind of weird but they did a lot of night activities and even do some free food which is pretty sweet. staff weren't overly accommodating, more into each other. lockers in the forms could be much sturdier - two guys could definitely pick it up and leave.

very clean and great facilities including on site laundry, big kitchen and kitchen storage, tvs, computers and lounges, outdoor areas etc so nice environment. helpful staff. basic rooms. location is good but everything in la is so spread out and public transport isn't the best so getting to/from anywhere not in walking distance is annoying (that's la though, not the hostel). lots of activities organised day and night to join if you want. good experience, would recommend.

the ceiling in our dorm was leaking when i arrived. the girl at reception was happy to give me another dorm though. out of the multiple staff only two were helpful and friendly, the others were dismissive. free tea and coffee all day and a decent free breakfast, plus free luggage storage and free lockers for when you check out.
flexible and helpful staff, great place to stay, i can't wait to book here my next trip out!

only spent one night here due to change of plans, but the staff were very nice and accommodating. the room faced a busy street and with the windows open, it got a little loud at night, but nothing a tired traveler can't sleep through. i will stay here again if i come back to la :)

if you're a first-time visitor to los angeles, this is a great place to stay. the location is super central to all kinds of hotspots - esp. weho nightlife - and the restaurants, coffee shops and bars down fairfax (just a few blocks from the hostel) can't be beat. definitely a place for travelers who like to party and socialize with others in the hostel. if that's not your thing, totally fine. but it's a fun stay that's cozy and quiet enough to get a good night's rest.
nice staff, very cool atmosphere to get in touch... ;)
great stay, great atmosphere, friendly staff, easy checking in process will definitely recommend to others travelling to la

had a great time there, the energy of the hostel was excellent. i went to the party they organize with their sister hostel and had a really great time. breakfast could be a little better but nothing too different from other hostels. all around great place!

this is a fantastic party hostel ... great place to meet people ... tons of activities phenomenal atmosphere and people... hreat touristic plans too... and all with good value. they make a strong attempt to get its travellers to network and socialise. great atmosphere and infrastructure also.. highly recommended. there is tons of free stuff in the hostel price .breakfast and some drinks and food in the night tooo...
i have stayed in hostels all over the world and my expectations for hostels are always low, lol. however, this one was the most clean and organized i have ever stayed.
pretty good hostel overall, good value for the money, can improve on cleanliness

this place is awesome. when we stayed they put on a free bbq, beers and a comedy show!! ive been traveling the last two years and i have never experienced a great deal like this. it brought everyone together and ended being a funny boozy night meeting people. the staff are super friendly they were unbelievably helpful. thanks guys you guys rock. sorry for over indulging in the free candy at reception hahaha
great hostel cleaned daily with bathroom in all rooms. helpful staff and great facilities. would definitely stay again.

great hostel, great staff, great atmosphere. our hot water didn't work in out shower but we just used another dorms shower down the hallway! great bar outside and good they even have nutella for breakfast!

good stay in good location; staff were helpful when giving directions, tours and ideas of where to eat etc.  free breakfast was great too.  dorm checks would have been good as people in our room were quite inconsiderate.
the common areas are so big that makes difficult connect with other guests. play some background music during breakfast
great place to stay. it's a huge building with lots of different common areas. was kinda quiet when i stayed there but i guess it's normal for november.

please be aware that there will be a $ 5 credit card surcharge. the hostel claims that the price presented on hostelworld is the cash price, but that is not beeing mentioned anywhere. the hostel has good facilities, but still has a slight school atmosphere. there will also be a credit card inprint at check in, in case you damage any property, like they do in real hotels. there are 2 bus lines outside the hostel, though you have to change to get to most places, execpt hollywood boulevard.
only one night but no major complaints. first come first serve parking is a hassle for holidays though.
the staff was great and everyone was so nice.  loved the underground parking and the location
staff was less than helpful and security was just rude.  no one enjoys their job and it shows

my stay was great. no complaints, they made everything easy. some nights i stayed out til 4-5am and there was usually someone at the door keeping watch.  wherever i just hung out at the hostel all day there was always plenty to do if nothing else shooting pool. great location, plenty of things to do or see within a 10 min walk. a few sketchy characters about at night, but nothing you haven't seen before i'm sure.

i had a fun time here. the staff were helpful but depending who you got you felt like you were annoying them by asking what bus to catch... the place was very clean and very easy to settle in. i would stay here again for sure.
a very nice stay again, thank you to all the front desk staff, kitchen staff, maintenance and cleaning staff. i look forward to my next stay at banana.
not in a great location at all... near nothing! and not particularly keen either! don't confuse it with their downtown hostel.. same name and a totally different location!!

it is a good hostel, but not excellent. have a good staff, location and atmosphere. moreover, offers some great activities to do. the rooms are in good size. some issues bother, like you cant stay in common areas after midnight (even if u are just using the wifi) ou the breakfast, that is too bad. i always needed to find a decent breakfast in a close place.

this place was great. it's in west hollywood so you're close to hollywood boulevard and griffith park/observatory. the parking is quite limited but is under the property and quite secure, you just have to get in there before 5pm to guarantee a space. there's lots of places within walk distance and some good places to eat. staff are great and attentive but it is a lively hostel and can get quite noisy at night, especially if you're near the main road as traffic never stops! great for groups.

we only stayed for two nights but this place seemed a good hostel. clean rooms. friendly and helpful staff. 10 min bus ride to the walk of fame and chinese theatre. quite expensive but all hostels in la seem to be! good kitchen. lots of organised nights and trips available but we didn't have time to participate (but probably would have done if we had stayed longer. overall a pretty good hostel!

i booked and paid for 2 nights and ran away after the 1st night with 50 bed bug bites, 4 bites even on my face. the girls, staying in the room before, seemed to be ok, so the bugs seemed to be brought there by a homeless guy arriving on the same day as me. the hostel has no refund policy, so i did not get my money back for the second night. otherwise, internet does not work in the rooms and they throw you out of the common rooms at midnight, so if you need internet at night, bad luck.
i was told west hollywood was a little sketchy but i felt fine walking around the neighbourhood and found some great nearby bars and cafes. hostel is clean and friendly. i would recommend.
the atmosphere in this hostel is amazing, a lot of social activities and a great crew! made a lot of new friends at this place!

i only stayed one night in the hostel so it is hard to give it a proper review. however, for that one night i had no major complaints. the rooms were small and it was a bit of an obstacle course coming in in the dark with bags and suitcases everywhere. the weren't many plugs for around the beds for charging which wasnt ideal. other than that, it ticked all the boxes!
great location in west hollywood. this is a fun "party hostel" so loosen up and have a good time.   don't expect a super clean, state of the art facility.
yeah this place is good
it really smells in the hostel.. but we had free parking !!

the staff are really nice and helpful! while the colour of our room was not the best (bright green wall and curtains are not fun) but was a good size for everyone to fit. the mini fridge, microwave and tv were a nice surprise. a lot of lovely little touches that made the stay really enjoyable. loved the events that the hostel puts on every night, we went on the friday one and it was so much fun! would definitely recommend staying here to anyone looking for fun and new friends.
not very comfy atmosphere, at the reception the staff was not amazingly friendly. can't stay in the main area after midnight and no wifi in the room. the beds were not amazing too. shaky.
it was my first time staying at a hostel and everything went smooth! the staff was great and i loved how clean it was! i will stay there again!
the staff was excellent, and i liked the atmosphere, but a room for 6 people whitout a window to open, was not good for me. it was to hot and there were to much noice from the traffic.
awesome place, great atmosphere and plenty of big nights out!

positives: great hostel, good social activities, good place to meet people for a lone traveller, very clean,  good breakfeast toast jam, cereal, ect ect, good wifi, not too big not too small,     negatives: just a little bit of a walk to get to most places, not really close to any supermarkets ect
a great place to stay, west hollywood is awesome! especially during pride week!
nothing much too see in walking distance. and great place to stay. free bbq when i was there.  micro and fridge in rooms.
very friendly and helpful staff… nice common area where everybody gets together.. good atmosphere    the lovely ladies keep it very clean every day.    highly recommended!!
great atmosphere, staff are super friendly and the activities put on by the hostel allow you to meet other travellers. great place!
great spot in west hollywood. close enough to get around with public transport. good facilities and activities to get folks mingling.
second time staying here and was just as good as the first time, close to everything plus the hostel takes u places on certain days :)
awesome! would definitely stay again! close to santa monica blvd in the heart of weho! two thumbs up 😃😃👍👍
staff told me i was not alowed to stay there anymore because i was talking in my sleep. oh i'm so sorry to the guest that can just get up and tell me hey or just throw something at me . f.... wits
one of the best hostels iv stayed in on my trip highly recommended!
definitely one of the cleanest i have stayed on. the staff was great and very helpful. in door parking was a plus, and the breakfast was better than other hostels.
too noisy
great place, a lot o things to do! and if you are travelling alone, you will defenetly find someone nice to talk!
the atmosphere was nice and laid back, good value for money. nice free breakfast. easy to get to know other travellers here. would stay again.

pros  free parking  free breakfast included cereal (non-diary options available), bread, nutella, pb&j, and oatmeal  lockers in the rooms were awesome (bring your own lock!)  closet area in the room  small shelves for top bunk (big enough to put your phone and keys)    cons  if you couldn't find parking in the small garage, parking was a pain to find on the street  i slept in a room by a window that faced the street and the street noise was very loud.  beds are wobbly.

great hostel, with young people, very dinamic, the staff is always very friendly and willing to help.  the dorms are cleaned daily, free breakfast, great computers available, always have events at night.  love it, i would definitely go back again.
very nice hostel! the people are very friendly, the rooms are good and the breakfast is okay. cleanliness is okay. i would definetly stay there again!

this hostel is very very relax. too relax that you can do mostly anything. a lot of areas that you can hangout by yourself, a group or a party. internet dies from time to time but when it is up it has a fast connectivity. street noise can be heard in your room. every night there is always something going on inside or outside the hostel. this place is great for the young hearts.
awesome place.. really good atmosphere
great hostel with good facilities, big kitchen lots of computers.a wall with the events on every night which is great and tours they offer. would recommend!

had a lovely stay. the dorms are clean (daily room service), quiet and even have an ensuite bathroom. on top there were hostel organized activities with food and beer every night, for little money or even for free. would definitely stay there again!

great stay here. i even booked an additional 5 nights, so i stayed here for 2 weeks. it's clean, plenty of things on the evening to stay entertained, the staff are friendly and the location is great too.
the atmosphere was good and the staffs were really nice and helpful. the upper bed was a llttle trembly when climbing and locker seems to be useless.
i like it!!!!! good location! between beverly and hollywood! free parking!!! nice patio and good mix dorm rooms with bathroom!

the staff were great, the people were great, the parties were great. there was also great areas to chill out. they really take care of you here, free dinners, free drinks, free parties and busses, free breakfast every morning. can't complain!

they truly deserve a 100% ranking. had 3 brand new macs in the lobby with free internet. all worked really fast. they had clearly thought of all the little details that any traveller would want in a hostel. had a few problems with the shower and was fixed strait away. staff were helpful and friendly. they had small safes in the bedrooms for valuables and if your padlock wouldn't fit thy had a vending machine in the common area that sold locks for 2.50$ . best hostel i have stayed in.
i only stayed here for one night in the end

some of the staff were a bit rude, not all of them though. rooms a decent size with comfy mattresses. lots of activities put on by hostel. location was a little bit out of the way of everything but a nice 2.6km walk up to hollywood boulevard. i recommend it!

we were recommended by a friend to stay here and we were extremely pleased with our experience. we upgraded to a private room and it was great - bed was comfy, fridge, tv, small balcony and a clean bathroom. there were parties on every night/something to do - we already had stuff planned and booked so we didn't join in but we wish we did! the staff were fantastic - helped us with anything we needed!     really pleased.
nice hostel. i recommended.

i had a great time staying at the banana bungalow. i liked the layout of the hostel, it was very spacious and conducive to partying :). the staff was friendly, the rooms were nice, the free breakfast was good. i would stay here again.
definitely recommend, staff helpful, large facility's... free computers and fast wifi..all in all everything you'd want and need from a hostel

the hostel itself was okay, location was pretty good.the rooms were small but they seemed to be in a good shape. breakfast was average, the facilities seemed to be nice but you had to pay for the pool table, the computers hardly worked and there was no wifi in the rooms, laundry could only be done after 5pm. the stuff was helpful but they wanted you to spent money at there activities which were totally overpriced.  all in all a okay stay, but a little overpriced.

stayed from halloween to thanksgiving, brilliant place on fairfax right near local shops and about 15 minute walk to the stars. transportation not too reliable near by however the weather is decent u dont mind. the hostel itself is great for its money with free breakfasts, constant activities and normally drinks and dinner for 10$ on most nights. i had amazing time here and already willing to come back next time im in l.a.
great hostel, was really happy that it had it's own undergroud carpark!

viktoria is very helpful.  she personally grabbed extra pillows etc for me.  95% of the guests are under 22, but i knew that  before i signed up.  loved the 5 computers they have.  the kitchen has refrigerators which is great.  the room was warm, but they turned up the ac for me.  the only thing i would change is a non street room because i'm not used to traffic noise.  outstanding for 27 dollars.
cleanliness is very poor, we had bed bugs in our beds and  we were victims of them
love the 24 hour free coffee in the garden!
third or fourth time staying here. great hostel regarding location and money value. go here to meet and hang out with a lot of different people from all over the world.

the showers here are bad. in comparison to all of the hostels i have stayed at, this hostel is less than average, the only thing i liked about this place was the people i met. hollywood is a total dive though so it depends what you're after. one good thing i could say is the hang out area in the basement is a great idea.
cellphone and charger were stolen from my room half hour before i woke up.  don't take peoples good nature for granted.  even if it is your room.
no wifi in the rooms. breakfast is good.

i was not overwelmed by banana bungalow. it is quite loud with all the traffic passing and gets very hot in the rooms, with 6 people. i would advise not taking any valuables as there are only a few very small lockers to secure them in. i would give it a 5/10, and i probably wouldn't book in there again. the price was reasonable, but you definitely get what you pay for. we checked out a day early.
the staff couldn't have been more helpful and friendly and the basement after hours is party town! could do with more power points in the rooms though
excellent everything
stayed here for 6 night, enjoyed the hostel, comfy clean and relaxed, but the atmosphere was fairly dull, not much going on during the week.
really good hostel with a nice bar area and good facilities such as a table tennis table.  also regular nights combined with their sister hostel, with limo transportation between the hostels.
sweet place !
great hostel! everyone is super friendly and welcoming. as a female travelling alone i felt safe in this hostel and in the area

bit out of the way of anything and a fair walk to hollywood but there are bus stops near by. sheets has seen better days, but generally the place was clean, the wifi was good and the free breakfast was good! small lockers so was unable to put bag into them. free shuttles to lax only go at 12:00 daily.
great staff and facilities, safe location, awesome events organised, great place.

good overall. looks a bit tired and drab in places but it was clean enough. a bit out of the way too but wasn't too dificult to find some transport into the bits of l.a you will want to go to (i suggest buying a tap card). a large, young crowd which made it very good socially.

travelled throughout america and this was the best hostel we stayed at.  the staff were really friendly and it didn't see like too much effort for them when helping us.  they arrange tours to universal studios including shuttle as well as many others.  rooms were cleaned every day and felt safe.  general atmosphere was brilliant, they offered nights out but werent too pushy.  big lounge and basement to socialise in.  overall, great hostel!!!
awesome weekend in la and this hostel, i'll come back. staff very nice, good parties, lot of fun !!
fun hostel in a good location within walking distance or a cheap cab ride to plenty of stuff to do.
had a fantastic time here! room full of fantastic people, plenty of activities. no complaints. stay here!!

there were no lights or plugs available for each bed but we had to share 2 plugs (6 people). there was a funny smell in our room, the window cannot be described as a window, since it was frosted glass. i stayed in many other hostels which were much cleaner!!! the sheets had a lot of holes and beds felt like there's an earthquake when the other one on the bunk was moving slightly.  staff friendly

a great hostel for meeting fellow travellers! if you are looking for a base to explore hollywood/beverly hills area it's great! the tours are excellent and the staff were so friendly! the night time activities were such good value for money! would have stayed longer if we could!
loved everything about it! the staff we super accommodating and there was always something to do!
very good hostel. a good place to spend some days in l.a. the barbecue is awesome.

awesome place to stay if you have a few days in la and want somewhere to stay and leave on your adventures there. has a cool shopping mall close by and staff were really friendly! if you are wanting to be in the heart of hollywood or la then this isnt the place but we had 3 days here and we arranged all our tours, transport, trips to themeparks here and it was great not having to worry about doing it ourselves.   clean rooms big communal spaces! great value for money
amazing staff. super friendly and always keen to help. only thing what i miss was air conditioner in my room. good kitchen and nice set up on the backyard.
safe location, bus ride away from the strip. friendly staff who make sure your having a good time, plenty of activities. i am under 21 and had a great time meeting plenty of other young travelers.
i really enjoyed staying at the hostel, the staff were very friendly and accommodating and the atmosphere was great! i would definitely stay there again.
it was great. cannot think of anything bad. la is bad for public transport though. takes ages to go anywhere.

it's a very nice hostel to stay in and they have a lot of things you can do there like tours around hollywood or a trip to universal studios and even trips to good clubs in hollywood. the only thing that bothered me was the cleanliness of the rooms and the kitchen.

great locations to central hollywood and beverly hills. hostel try's to promote tours alot which cost too much for budget travelers, because of this they offer little help on other options. room tidy and clean, wifi excellent, evening entertainment fantastic, public transport on doorstep, use metro planner to organize route. beds comfy, staff and guests friendly

good hostel. massive room for drinking down staris when the clubs shut so noise and disturbance isnt and issue for people who don't want to party, but those who do can do so all night withough annoying others.

me and a friend stayed here for 6 nights in 2013 and enjoyed our stay. there was plenty happening for those who wanted to take tours and location was great. bus could easily be taken to santa monica or hollywood blvd etc. it was fairly easy to meet other people and we ended up going out with them.

i absolutely loved banana bungalow! they had events every night, free bbq's from time to time and the staff are great. the place also allows travelers to socialize and interact easily! highly recommended!
noisy beds but everything great, a lot of organized activities, a lot of free food every day... great the celebrity tour amazing guide!
nice hostel... amazing people... and excelent activities all days of the week.
loved the staff, everybody was very friendly and welcoming, very easy to make friends, great nights out, overall brilliant!
awesome chill out area with a basement for after hours. enjoyed my stay here

nice tidy building with great smoking areas. had a dorm with an ensuite which was brilliant, however the shower pressure and temperature was super annoying as it chopped and changed all the time. other than that, a really nice hostel.
evening entertainment and freebies were good. self service breakfast would be nicer, rather than having your cereals rationed.
the staff people were helpful and there are lots of activities at the nights, but the location is not so good and it would be nice if they have some free shuttle to the beach.
great place, would definitely stay there again next time i'm in la.

love this place it's got social events with sister hostel, free food and drink. i enjoyed my stay but if your a light sleeper pick a room away from road, traffic runs all night (no exaggeration 10pm-7am) and is loud. that aside love this place.

good hostel with lots of day tour organised (universal studio, disney , hollywood). receptionnists are very nice & helpful. was in room 203, 6 dorm ensuite. very clean! got reimbursed for the shuttle bus. if you have no car like me, you have to walk to have food and stuff but all buses  next door (217 & 780) goes to hollywood boulevard where you can grab a metro to go anywhete you want (universal, long beach etc....... day pass is 5$, did not use the kitchen.cheesecake factory next door.must do!
great place to stay, very friendly staff. good location.  nice place to hang around, or relax.   you can always ask questions they are happy to help.  huge lobby,and party room downstairs.
a very good atmosphere with very kind people.. one problem only : a lack of communication on the events which are on schedule and which are great fun : barbecues, beer pongs...

one the female staff member was really rude. she walked into my room looking for some girl and slammed the door behind her both times. the 6 bed is not really just 6 but 12.  4 of the girls in my leave the hostel before 7am for shoplifting and work, but breakfast doesn't start until 08am. overall, i wouldn't go back or recommend it. there are some amazing hostel not too far away though
close by and free parking!!

i was a solo traveller and stayed there just for 2 nights in a 6 beds dorm, but everything was really good, room cleaned everyday and the staff organize social events during the week. if i go back to la i'll definitely come back to banana bungalow!!

guy, who worked at the breakfast area was burping all the time. toilets were disgusting, dirty comforters, which probably never got cleaned yet. party athmosphere (if you have a room downstairs, it can happen to you that the dj is right outside infront of your window).
the cleaner stole stuff from my bed when i was out of the room for just 1 min.   (we didn't  call the cops / compliant)
very nice hostel. clean bedrooms, very secure. the only drawback is the location, a bit far from the nightlife, as transportation in la, especially at night, is terrible.
best hostel you will find in la city. good value for backpacker trip
loved this place, met some lovely people, free food for breakfast and most dinners, great tours, good prices nice beds!  free wifi!!
my favorite place in los angeles!
great helpful staff! i loved the free dinners, free printing and all of the staff were very welcoming.
awesome, no more to say. thanks for the stay!!
i loved the buffet in the evening, the breakfast could have been better, more variety, maybe some ham or cheese and a muffin or a croissant....
clean and has nice charm.  but takes a bus ride to get to the major attractions.

dont even think to walk to the metro station, probably will require 45mins-an hour good walk.  fisherman market, universal studio are attractions near by.   all others require a cab to get there.  the upside is, they sometimes offer value dinner or clubs entrance.   if you come to hollywood just for clubbing or parties, this one is the one for you.
great hostel with a perfect location. all staff were really helpful.
this is a nice hostel in a relatively good location. the staff are really friendly, however; the hostel did lack a bit of character and you really need a car to successfully get around.
this hostel is simply amazing! party everyday, people from all over the world, plus at a great location.

very good hostel. staffs were really friendly and kind, and facilities were good. also, there are many tours which are hosted by the hostel. i strongly recommend to take city tour. the host named michael is really friendly and nice person. i really had a nice time during the city tour. however, location is not that good. even though it is very close to the bus stop, it seems not that safe to walk around hostel after 9 p.m. nonetheless, very good hostel, overall. i recommend this hostel!

great hostel. the staff was friendly and knowledgeable.  the environment was great for meeting people, and secure enough to still have privacy.  onsite parking which was a definite plus.  they have computers in the lounge for use, including printing abilities!
one of the best hostel in california that i've ever been!!!!
for a young  man about to be 60 it was great ! !

the staff was friendly and they had good offers for going out.   the hostel itself was very noisy and loud and the common roum reminded me of the 80's.   the dorm was ok,but too small and the girls from the other room had to use our door that it was a 12 bed dorm in fact.  the linen wasn't clean,we found some hair and dirt on it.   location wasn't too bad even though you have to walk about 20-30 minutes to the hollywood boulevard but at least it seemed like a safe neighbourhood.
such a good place to meet people, hostel has events going on during the week.. rooms are a bit cramped but are in decent condition and the staff is friendly. definitely recommend!

this was my first stop in my trip, and it was my first trip overseas ever. the staff were very nice, they gave directions and were always ready to help.  kitchen is big, heaps of fridges and the free dinners are good. (not anything amazing, but free food is good food).  the rooms are cleaned daily and the people in this hostel were magnificent. i actually didnt like la so my best times there were in the hostel. location isn't that great so rent a car if you can.  would stay again.

pretty good experience for my first time in a hostel. unfortunately first night there was no towels available for me until next morning. but room was clean, had a locker for personal stuff. staff were very helpful on my departure on helping me track down my booked shuttle to the airport.

good place to meet other travelers. they have events planned every night, like free bbq or free drinks with party at the hostel or sister hostel and a comedy show every week which was lot if fun! good and big kitchen with everything you need. staff is friendly and helpful. would definitely stay there again.
good hostel, just take in consideration that public transport finish early (between 7and 8 pm)  and they charge you an extra $5 for visa/mastercard
fantastic again

it was easy to meet other travellers, the decor was really nice, it was clean and in a safe neighbourhood, close to shopping on melrose, the activities were good too. i didn't like that the female dorm had only one door for two rooms, so instead of 5 other people waking up early and making noise, there was 6 more from the other room always walking through. also, luckily i noticed beforehand that the curtains were see-thru but others may not know and change there. good hostel otherwise tho.
i just stayed one night. free dinner and free beers were nice. was happy about the free parking too. the mattress wasn't that comfortable. but other than that, nothing to complain about.

excellent hostel! free beer and free food in the evening. and always something to do/planned by the hostel. friendly and helpful staff. really good location, very cool and close to all the good sights! would stay again for sure

i loved this hostel! for the most part, the staff is very helpful and nice! i've met some great new friends from this experience so i'm grateful for that! peter was amazing and very nice to get to know! he went above and beyond to help the guests! i wish i remembered the other names of the staff but the lady who served breakfast was lovely, so was the canandian dude and the blonde chick up front! darker haired chick wasn't friendly whatsoever and steve was scary when he got drunk!
had a good socialising area downstairs, but staff weren't that helpful. rooms were good (tv and fridge etc).
great facilities, though cannot use wifi in the room. the common area is awesome, with pool table and tennis table.
nice staff, good to have wifi on the rooms!
good hostel. good activities. location was pretty good. and its easy to interact with others. however common area is closed down at 12 and so you have to go to your rooms then.

the hostel has good facilities, a lot of activities, a parking lot and it's clean overall (though there were used napkins left at my bed shelf by the last person who stayed). even though the hostel is in a good area, it's located on a busy street so there is a lot of traffic noise all night long. it's a party hostel, but it didn't bother me. i didn't want to party, i just wanted a place to sleep and i was fine, but i was lucky to be in a room with quiet people.
really great staff, location, rooms and atmosphere. would definitely go back

such a good hostel to stay in. good location, helpful and friendly staff and great atmosphere. banana bungalow was really good at organising tours for both sightseeing and nighttime partying. if you're looking for a hostel that has a great party atmosphere then stay at banana bungalow. they also organised basketball tickets for us when we stayed there.  if i ever went back to la i would stay at banana bungalow, for sure. highly recommended!

banana bungalow is a well run fun hostel which smartly caters to the needs of visitors to la it's in a safe and interesting part of town and is handy to public transport of you don't have a car. it's cheap to stay there but they don't skimp on the cleaning or security which is what counts anyway. it's on a cool street with a few bars, galleries and one of the coolest cinemas in la. they organize a lot of events many of which are free which helps if your on a budget. the club tours are great.
great staff, good facilities, awesome comedy night and good location in west hollywood. would stay here again if i was in the area

the hostel is in a great location, close to hollywood blvd, paramount pictures and quite a few comedy clubs. it is also well linked to the bus network and it only takes around an hour to get out to santa monica if you want to hit up the beach! the hostel itself is very clean and modern, the room (i stayed in a 6 bed dorm) was a little small but the ensuite made up for that. there are lots of cool activities planned like party nights out and stand up comedians coming in to perform. great place!
this hostel was great. cool rooms, lots to do every day/night, easy enough to get to hollywood boulevard or santa monica. good times.

excellent location, the staff were pretty helpful. i was a bit disappointed that the universal studios trip was cancelled as no one else wanted to go (and was only informed the morning of the trip).  i had some good people in my room, otherwise it would have been hard to eet people at the hostel, although they do run activities to try and encourage socialising, i found some of the people not too friendly, especially if they had been there longterm.
good hotel, but the shower was not working well... good location if you have a car.

i think the most reason to reserve a bed here is his parking a car for free and low price in la! if u would like to save  money and not be much aware of a little dirty in bed , it will be a wothy option among the  hostels.
very clean and beautiful hostel, the staff are really friendly i have lots of fun!

great hostel, very well for them to keep on organizing events for the week.    also great atmosphere with the patio.  easy to meet people this way.  although get a bit noisier by night. but i guess you can't have it both way.    good wifi and everything.

i was surprised to discover that california residents are technically not allowed to stay here without proof of travel (bus ticket, plane ticket, etc.). it's disappointing, as i'm a ca resident and would really like to stay here on a monthly or bi-monthly basis.

great hostel with nice and helpful staff.  they offer lot of attractions, like a beer pong tournament, free comedy stand up, free bbq and beer night. and many others. definitely will stay there again :
a lots of fun

the bunk bed was unstable and almost made us fall down from the upper bed, every move in the bed made the bed rattle, the sound was really annoying.  the sheet of the bed was really outdated and faded  and was wet when we make the bed. even though the weather is kind of warm in l.a, the hostel only provide one piece of thin sheet as a blanket for us. we stayed in a room which just faced the road, many cars passed by all night long, so we cannot sleep well at night.

it is in a good location. it had a free parking. if you are staying in a dorm, it all depends with who you are staying. we could not sleep, because of the loud steet noise and people who were comming back from the party.

love both the banana bungalows in hollywood! great atmosphere & the party limo was so cheap with free drinks etc, well worth it. very welcoming to tourists, lovely staff. clean, no problems, massive kitchen with everything you need, free food on some days. the location isn't ideal as it is in west hollywood but to get to all the bars and clubs it's a 10 dollar taxi ride away or a bus, you can't walk. but good supermarkets & the grove shopping really nearby. i loved it here! would come back!
location good, but other banana bungalow better, really clean, good atmosphere and free parking...can't complain!

great place to stay, really good atmosphere and full of interesting people! only bad comment would have to be the breakfast where it wasn't help yourself and you only get 1 bowl of cereal and 2 slices of bread but other than that i would definitely recommend this hostel :) the rooms were really clean, so were the bathrooms and the beds were comfortable too. the area is great as it is close to the grove and i felt safe walking out onto the streets around the hostel. would come back :)

really enjoyable stay, lot's of fun activities if you want them, no pressure if you don't. free food and free beer a big bonus, friendly and helpful staff. i met lots of really nice other travellers here, there is a relaxed and friendly atmosphere and lots of additional extras (like free printing) that makes the stay even easier. also nice outdoor areas with wifi.

a friendly and well run hostel. large place but still good for meeting fellow travellers. good balance between party/quiet atmosphere.  location ok- safe and in walking distance to some tourist attractions. the neighbourhood itself has good bars/ restaurants nearby. staff very friendly/helpful save for the one who appears to make hitting on women his sole priority.     place was kept clean, room was fine, although i understand that the ones on the ground floor are a little noisy.  would come back.
liked the free bbq and the comedy show. also had a fun time in the party limo bus. hostel itself is recommendable.

great place, friendly staff and patrons. lots of great opportunities for a solo traveler to meet people and make friends. breakfast provided in the morning is good if you like cereal and toast. i had a great stay here and would definitely stay again.
it was. good experience.
great hostel, good place to meet others and party and not too far from everything considering ow spread out la is, always has food and drink deals going! good times!
it was a great stay, the social aspects of this hostel in particular were definitely a bonus!
everything was great. friendly staff. felt safe at the hostel too. they even sold locks for $2 for the in room lockers. great outdoor sitting area
not all rooms have luggage lookers, just the small personal items ones
love the wifi. would be even better if it was in the room. good attempts at social events. greaet meals.

i've stayed here three times now, and would definitely stay again. really great location near to melrose, the grove shopping mall and farmers market, two wholefoods supermarkets, the beverley centre, and there is a cool flea market on sundays.  really social, but also chilled if that's what you prefer. hostel food could be better, and the dorm rooms can get pretty hot, but apart from that it was great and would def recommend to all travelling to or through l.a!
nice staff, standard rooms, great socialising!
i had the best time there such a friendly atmosphere made plenty friends they have the funniest tour guide
really enjoyed our stay, loved the limo ride. only downside is if you are a beach goer its takes a long time to get to the beach by bus. would stay here again though

didn't particularly enjoy my stay, however that was probably because of my room. we had a member of staff constantly using our bathroom, coming into the room turning the light on at 3am, leaving the door open, shouting on her cell phone. the room was cluttered with her things so i had no room to put my things away and she left her dirty underwear next to my bed twice. worst part was she wasn't even staying in our room. was generally clean and good location however i wouldn't return.

good place to stay if you're young and want to party in la with other travelers.  staff is helpful, location is good, cleanliness and facilities are average.  not recommended if you're a family or want a quiet time in the city.
lots of fun. thanks for having live music, and comedians. lots of cute women too.

very noisy at night due to the traffic on the road. also, no a/c was available in my room so we had to leave the windows open and couldn't get much sleep. the nice thing was having our own bathroom in the room. clean bathrooms, common areas, and rooms. there are several bus stops within walking distance of the hostel.

not really good, just ok.... lots of awesome people.... but my sheets weren't really clean, the furniture in the common areas should have been replaced already... the bathroom a little bit dirty... overall, i think it's a place that should get a little better care. it's hard to find nice hostels in us comparing to those in europe for the same price...

very cool hostel with clean rooms and beds and a great feel to it. i didnt have any problems and found it easy to meet other people staying there and have a good time. i am only 20 and was unsure about whether everyone would go out all the time but the hostle puts on good events and a lot of the time most people just stay there. free wifi and cheap beers i recommend it
great hostel in west hollywood. lots of tours which is helpful tho they are a bit pricey. cheap dinner.

we were just for one night there. because we had to stand up early it was very noisy until the middle of the night.  but if you are over in l.a. to make party and getting to know people from all over the world it's the perfect place!  thanks!
staff were friendly and helpful all the time!!
too big, which makes it less easy to talk to people & make friends, but great communal areas and imacs free to use.

it was great - i had planned to stay here for one week and move on to another location in la for the second week. i went to the other hostel and straight back to banana. great atmosphere and great people. i wasn't the only one who planned to move on somewhere else and returned, either. a great vibe. if you want a party atmosphere though, go to their sister hostel 'the vibe' in hollywood.

amazing hostel with the friendliest staff who really get to know you and befriend you (a couple of exceptions..). so much planned for everyone it's easy to meet people instantly which is a massive bonus. while some people feel hollywood is a bit of a letdown, i thought it was the perfect location. it felt safe and was near enough to hollywood to walk, but far enough away that the transport to the beaches and up to n hollywood was easy and pretty much right on the doorstep. amazing time there!!

the staff were a bit clueless. our rom ended up with 10 people in it at one stage with only room for six. no idea who had left, or switched rooms.    they may blame it on the customers, but it isn't that hard to manage a few dorms.

good, fun hostel! the staff members were really fun, they went right out of their way to help us out! there was only one staff member who would literally stand over your shoulder whilst you were cooking.. but that's ok, she cant help it!!  all in all, highly reccommend!!

i had such an amazing time staying at banana bungalow! everyone was really nice and there was such a great atmosphere. each night there is something great to do, we arrived on a saturday and that night had a $5 meal at the tiki bar downstairs (massive portion sizes) then we went to one of the best nightclubs i have ever been to! was such a good night out.   the hostel is about a 30-40 minute walk to sunset blvd and hollywood blvd which is nice a sunny day otherwise a short taxi ride!

staff rude and not helpful at all not ideal if your a solo traveller everyone sticks in there own little groups. so hard to meet people. they have free meals and drink only good thing about this hostel.. don't stay here

this hostel is very nice if you travel alone and want to find some friends. this hostel have many cool events like free bbq night, comedy night and parties. the area with the bar is really nice and excotic. the breakfast is nothing special but it is alright, the rooms have enough space for you and your luggage, and then you share the bathroom with the people in your room. i would say though that i never would go out alone at night in the neighbour hood. the staff is energitic and helpful.
i was only here for a short stay, and it was a bit crammed with people, but it's well located and has plenty of opportunity for socialising!

the hostel has a excellent location easy to get to the grove, sunset and hollywood.  offers $5 dinner and on occasion free food and beer. i ended up staying here for a month and i am returning in august and cant wait :)
had an amazing time! much better than the 4 star expensive hotels we stayed in, would definitely recommend to anyone! staff are super friendly and we had a great time :)

initial impression not good, due to one member of staff who was very unhelpful, didn't give us codes for outer doors and was rude. however rest of the staff were really good, friendly and helpful. the hostel itself was really nice, in a good location- very close to bus services. good common areas and evening activities.  en-suites in rooms was a nice change. down sides were the beds were rather old and rickety. our room connected to next door= walking through ours. favourite hostel to date!

good bathrooms. kitchen awefully big but very difficult to work ovens. staff always busy n not able to talk to u or help. they have tours the towns tour is good but really u only c gates n fences of stars homes so wouldnt recommend. the have shuttles to disney land for 50 bux b warned u can get the bus for 6 byx return its really easy just look up metro bus service.
one of the better hostels i've ever stayed at, thanks
great overall. just a little bit noisy at night if you wanna fall asleep early.

hostel is located in west hollywood, making that a good convenient location to different areas of los angeles.  it is in walking distance of shopping and some attractions, including cbs studios.  the public transportation for the area was decent as well, for what los angeles public transportation is.  they have all sorts of information available at the hostel. shuttle vans run to major attractions. only con for me would be the noise in the lounge area & it being the only place to use the wi-fi.
2nd time i've stayed there - i'll be back.    value for money - great location - free booze & burger nights...what's not to like!

i love this hostel. stayed here about 10 times. friendly staff, great partys, always something organised any day of the week so real easy to meet people. they used to do a hot breakfast for $3 which i was gutted to find out they have stopped doing. i would and will be staying here again :-d

1) misleading 'free shuttle', only one shuttle going to the airport. you have to book your own prime time shuttle for around $15+tip  2) some staff were excellent. the guy at the information desk is amazing, very friendly. others seemed jaded and tired and wouldn't give you the time of the day.  3) a bit of a mess inside rooms. toilet and sink was clogged up when i was there. the posters seemed to suggest this was a chronic problem.  4) great location though, walking distance to things

fantastic hostel, very clean (pretty strong smell of disinfectant though) really friendly and helpful staff, good breakfast, wonderful new facilities, lots of room to chill, out door area and nice couches. i was only there for one night and didn't go out but it was a great hostel to stay at :)

banana bungalow is fantastic!  they really offer so much for the traveler by way of information, planned evening options, breakfast is included, and you can by dinner for $5. perfect!  really well located in west hollywood and close to sunset, hollywood and melrose.  day trips available for a good rate, i recommend it if you only have a few days in la.  the rooms are clean, the bathrooms are very clean and stocked up, awesome party and chill out/lounge areas.  beds are comfortable too!
great place with a very relaxed atmosphere. good tour selection, free drinks and food on activity nights, free internet, clean rooms and bathrooms, good kitchen....what more can you ask?? stay here.
great hostel for a reasonable price!
very   nice reception the one  night time mainly,  recommended location is  in a nice aarea of la.

this place has fast internet, great breakfasts, delicious dinners for reasonable prices, and plenty of fun activities to help you enjoy the hollywood experience.  i had such a nice time i extended my stay...twice!  i would especially like to thank the manager and assistant manager who handled a clerical error with style and grace.  this is the place to stay in l.a.

really nice hostel, staff are really friendly and make an effort to get to know people. it gets cleaned like 3 times a day. they have mac computers to use for free plus free wifi. a range of free breakfast foods. great facilities. heaps of fun everyday, great atmosphere, good rooms. defo recommend!!
good location if you having shopping in mind, close to melrose ave, the grove, the  beverly centre and robertson bvd, quite clean, breakfast good.

a very laid back kind of hostel with some interesting activities and a nice bar area. my bed was extremely uncomfortable and my pillow was useless, new mattresses would be a great idea. staff were all nice and interesting and there was generally a pretty friendly vibe. overall probably the best you can get in la for the money which says more about la than anything else.
great hostel! friendly staff. good atmosphere. location good, for the price. highly recommend

overall great hostel. had a few planned events on each night to get people socializing which was good. awesome lounge and outdoor area. love the $5 dinners they do most nights and the free breakfast each morning. good location with a bus stop just down the street.
very nice hostel. the rooms where clean and there where lots of activities.

great hostel in the middle of west hollywood, one of the best areas to get you started in l.a. the tiki "bar" is a great place to hang out and meet fellow travellers. $5 dinners are amazing!  the staff were excellent too. they went out of their way to welcome customers around the lounges and ask about our plans and make recommendations without being pushing and gave great advice on how to do things independently. bathrooms and beds were as expected for a hostel and the free breakfast was good too
good hostel overall, very good price. it's more of a party place than somewhere to get some rest after a long day of visits (late night noise). some weird people in there as well...

awesome place, great location, have something on every night whether its a club night or $5 dinners which are amazing becasue they taste like a home cooked meal and theres no better feeling after 2 months of travelling. the rooms are very clean not a lot of space for baggage if your the last in the room but other than that awesome place to stay and they have a really great set up would definitely stay there again.

we travelled as a couple and stayed in the 6 person dorm. this was one of the best hostels i have ever stayed in! it had an amazing environment and feel, all the staff and people were extremely helpful and positive, giving us advice and assistance if we needed it!    i highly recommend this hostel to those travelling to la and would like to experience a true, authentic hostel experience.
a clean, well catered hostel with a fun and friendly atmosphere. the nightly activities were great and the rooms were secure and comfortable.
very nice place and friendly people all around!

the place is really good, clean, fun and the staff is so friendly and nice! the location is also good. this is probably the best hostel i've stayed in the usa.i enjoyed my stay in banana and if i come back to la, that's the place i would like to stay.

really enjoyed the atmosphere and the attitude of the staff.  security: no locks available for rent or sale for the lockers (i had forgot mine)  cleanliness: sheets had stains (but were clean)  privacy: for some reason curtains opening on courtyard are see-through  cost: online bookings are more expensive; i paid $35 compared to $25 for a walk-in (per nite)  overall a very positive experience

+ the staff were really good, there were always events going on everyday, whether it was beer pong in the tiki bar or free meals! offers lots of tours that you can sign up for & free airport pick up from lax. you can book onto a shuttle back to the ai
i really loved this hostel - i stayed an extra 2 nights. i would definitely recommend it to another person :)

we had a private room and has been the nicest room we have had in almost 2 months in the states. we had three beds (there were only 2 of us), a little balcony, a tv and a private bathroom. it got a bit noisy on friday night, but everything stopped at 11pm.
this hotel is not clean and as they arrange many night activities ... it gets very very noisy during the night if your room is in the lowerest level.

i think this is one of the best places to stay in la, especially if you're a young person looking 4 fun. la is quite a mess for tourists, and the hostel provides a good and affordable night lige program. i personally was not here for fun, but for a university meeting, so had few time to party; but the hostel was full with really diverse people, with high chances of social life. and, amazingly, the rooms were not noisy at all. if you are in a dorm, ask if possible to get a dorm on the back.

the hostel was great. absolute perfect location. bus right out the front of the hostel gets you everywhere.. well gets you almost everywhere but links you to absolutely everything... was awesome!   my only  gripe was the bus driver to the airport... he got me there late, had his radio up so loud i could barely hear myself think and he was rude. it says that its $15 for the pick up but because i was the only person he picked up from my hostel he demanded $20. ruined my la experience

hostel was on the whole good. location was very good for exploring hollywood, a 20 min bus ride took you where you wanted to go. the not so great rating cones from the fact that we booked this hostel partly because of the free activities etc described on the website. free breakfast was average, tea, coffee, cereal, toast. i've had better. the free night out was a no-go, there were not enough shuttles to get everyone to the viper room and so the shuttle that came back to get the rest of us ended

really nice, clean private room however didnt get any sleep due to other guests partying which is what you expect in a hostel however the noise seemed to travel through the vents so it was like we were in the same room! for this reason i wouldn't stay again.
great hostel!!!
so happy with the hostle. best hostle i've ever stayed at! can't wait to go back!!

great location and stuff organised everynight so always something to do. its a party hostel especially at the weekend so not for people that want a quiet night. most of the staff are really nice but some are miserable. stayed here 3 times now and would definatly stay there again. great free breakfast. bacon and eggs just $2!
lot, but lot of fun..very nice and clean..

great place to party. great place to meet people. many organized tours. definitely loved the limo tour on friday night, before going out at the boulevard3 bar.    considering that everything is far in l.a., it took about 1 hour to go anywhere. but, there are a lot of buses and shuttle from the hostel, so it's still ok. the location in itself is relatively safe.    the dorm were ok, a thicker matress would have been appreciated.
very funny and i ,very clean and good location
great hostel
made some of my fondest memories of my trip here!

they would not allow me to stay because i am american!!!  they said i had to get my fee back from hostel world.  i wrote to hostel world within a half hour of booking banana bungalow west hollywood to tell them this.  i have not received an answer!!!  please check into it.    thank you,   nancy cuevas guzman....  ......sorry, i had to "rate" and since they would not allow me to come (i called them as soon as i booked it), i give them a negative rating.

i really didn't like this place, when i arrived the guy was quite rude and they don't take credit card, which i found extremely strange.    then i wasn't told anything about the place or shown around which i also didn't think was that great.    i stayed for 3 nights and each night they had a massive party in the garden which was far too loud and went on all night.

the hostel is great for meeting/hanging out with people but we stayed 4nights and our bathroom and bedroom weren't cleaned once - there was drink stained on the floor and sand all over the bathroom the entire time we were here - not great considering this is the most expensive hostel we've stayed in for the 8months we've been travelling. having said that, we met some great people and the hostel has good facilities for hanging out.

really enjoyed staying there! free barbeques, liked the free breakfast and they provided lots of activities and trips at reasonable prises. at first there was a strong smell which was probably the washing powder but we got used to it. good neighborhood, close to the farmer's market and the grove. we were really pleased, would definitely recommend this hostel!
i was really happily surprised by the cleanliness and happy atmosphere of this place! i've been to a lot of hostels, but this one is one of my favorite!!

the location isn't brilliant, however busses leave from right out the front so it's not really a problem. the free breakfasts & evening activities were great, but if you have a room looking out onto the patio you will be kept awake if you're a light sleeper. it's a great place to meet people, but it's definitely what you make it, because the staff seem bored to death & if do more to bring the atmosphere of the place down than make it seem fun.

arrived at banana bungalow but they moved me to 'orbit' just around the corner.(they own both). i was annoyed at being checked in to a hostel i didn't book!  this review is for orbit but it's their fault if it is bad for banana bungalow  place is pretty dirty - dirty carpets, bathrooms, communal area.    phone card i bought didn't work.  breakfast is basic cereal, white toast and jam or peanut butter.  tea coffee.  all kitchen crockery and cutlery is disposable - not eco friendly! need real plates!
there were a lot of school kids there when i was there so had to make our own fun with not to many people to socialize with. otherwise fantastic hostel.

good hostel, very good internet, good area downstairs to make alot of noise if you're into that, the breakfast/bar area outside is cool too. just a bit of a bad location unless all you're interested in is seeing hollywood. we were lucky because we had a car to get to all the beachs...
very friendly staff and good parties. i defenitly love the limousine for going in a bar!!!
just loved it all! so much fun stuff going on and the staff was friendly and helpful :)

party, party and more party. it's really noise. we were there on friday-saturday and party finish at 1am. we booked two people together and they put us in diferent bedrooms. if you wanna go to sleep early, don't choose this hostel!! the location and the 5$ dinner are the best thing. they have also problems with wifi

it was fine stay, but  it was bit strange they do not take credit card because  the machine do not work and some time they only take credit card for $40 key deposit and when i return the key they kept a copy of my credit card detail.

i have stayed at both this banana bungalow and the one in hollywood and they are both great. i really like the atmosphere, parking is free, breakfast is great. the staff is helpful and it is a lot of fun things going on.  the rooms are clean and you get towels for free!  i always stay at banana bungalow when i revisit los angeles.

the location isn't the best but there is a bus-stop nearby, and the hostel has trips to disney land, universal studios and a sightseeing you can pay to join and it's a good experience and a good way to see it all :)  it is a good hostel :)

i've stayed here twice. typical hostel. except the location is amazing! lots of shops near by and not too expensive for a cab ride to get into hollywood (if that's your thing). it's sister hostels a very close as well.
we stayed in the orbit as the bungalow was overbooked, really nice safe hostel, with lots going on good free breakfast in the morning and things in the evening. showers were semi decent aswell.
wikidsickandfun.    def stay here again    loved life so hard.    was wick.
lots of friendly people, staff always happy to help and lots of parties/events organised by the hostel.
was a great hostel, the employees were always helpful. a $10 taxi to anywhere. but had a great time. very clean and very easy to meet people
enjoyed my stay!
this was the best hostel we have stayed at. the staff were very helpful, and there was always something fun happening. the facilities were always clean. we would stay there again

love this place but did get major bed bug bites on this stay. i love it but be careful of the bugs. stay out of room 204 i guess if you can, or wear clothing all over so they can't bite you all over aaaagh i'm in pain !!!
have stayed here before and will stay here again. had a lot better room this time so enjoyed it that much more. staff are great and a lotta fun and love the $5 dinners!
go here...the perfect place and the staff are so nice and helpful..but the wifi is not that good..

this hostel has some pretty good amenities however staff are very unfriendly, rooms aren't the cleanest and there's not such a great vibe to the place. defiantly a party hostel and in a pretty good location. my stay here was pretty average and don't think that i would return.
great hostel for partying and having fun  one thing is missing : curtain  nice common room

this was a pretty good place to say, fairly good location it was all really easy to get everywhere by public transport. the only nuisance was it was next to impossible to try and get to reception and actually have someone there which could be really frustrating. met some awesome people and a lotta fun though!

room was run down but clean, the bathroom was scrubbed down everyday which was great. the staff were helpful when you asked for information but definitely weren't friendly or particularly happy - when you work in a hostel you think you'd try to lighten up and welcome people but not here. internet was very slow and rarely worked. the la tour they do is worth it if you don't have much time but expensive for $60us. party room looks like a crack den! will probably try somewhere else next time.
the hostel is dirty, unsafe and just generally has a really bad vibe, even the staff seem unhappy. i wouldn't stay here again...
a good hostel to stay in. great location, free breakfast, free internet, but the staff are unfriendly and it can be a little hard to meet people.
