amazing location!!!  other than that, nothing special, and actually quite gross.  bathrooms are "clean" but they feel so dirty and old and neglected.  i don't mind old if it's well maintained.  the bathrooms are just so gross.  i never went barefoot here, not even in the shower.  beds are fine.  kitchen fine.  bike rental is a rip off from here, you can get it cheaper (and more expensive) at other places.  umbrellas available :)
i loved the friendly staff!  the breakfast was delicious!  i loved the hot coffee in the morning!  my bed was comfy!    i didn't like the band playing music until 2am on a tuesday night!
stayed at this hostel 5 times  and i will stay again
super awesome location on hermosa beach, which makes this hostel really great. it wasn't very clean, though, and very stuffy at night.

we loved surf city hostel so much that we would do anything to go back! by far the friendliest staff i have ever met. they have surf boards and body boards and volleyballs and bikes for super cheap rental prices that make for a perfect vacation. the location was perfect. couldn't have been happier. we loved the hostel so much we wanted to cook our meals in the kitchen with the other guests instead of going out to eat. thank you!!

pleasantly surprised by the cleanliness of the hostel. very simple, but has everything you need in a place to sleep and take a shower. place just like the photos show, staff very friendly and helpful. surf city hostel is literally 200ft from the beach with great restaurants and bars just downstairs. great vibe, would stay again!
overall it was a great place to stay with a friendly staff, right off the beach! i will definitely stay here again!

just be aware that this building is very worn out and run down and uncomfortable. it is directly over a bar that gets loud at night, and there is no air conditioning, so the noise comes in the window from directly below you. or you could shut the window and sweat. the bed was the most uncomfortable thing i've tried to sleep on since i was in the army, and i've stayed in many hostels. yes, it's right on the beach, but that's the only benefit.

stayed here for one night, before catching a flight out of lax. if you're looking for a cheap hostel in a great area of la, this is probably your best option. the 232 bus can get you to lax in about 30 minutes, which is impressive for la. staff was very nice, helpful, and made sure i had everything i needed. not sure if it's the just culture in la, but the hostel was not a community presence, which is a huge drawback. i wouldn't recommend this hostel to someone looking to truly experience la.

the staff member who was checking guests in on the afternoon of july 3 was taking phone calls over checking in two different guests who had bags in hand and were waiting for a room key. i waited 20 minutes to be shown my room two doors over, because a customer on the phone without a reservation could not figure out booking.com. the wait was way too long.

great hostel, couldn't believe how close it was to the ocean! never imagined myself to sleep in la and hearing the sea breeze as the beach was directly in front of my window. only minus might be the fact that the stairs are quite steep and there is no elevator - hard for people like me who are travelling with an overzied suitcase. but i couldnt be more happy with my stay.
excellent location. unbeatable for.the price.

first thing is the location is incredible, maybe not if you want to be near la or hollywood but as i was just wanting good vibes and beach, incredible. had an amazing view of the beach and pier from my room. great vibe at the hostel and the city of hermosa. the first day i hired a bike and cruised the 25mile ride up to santa monica and back. very glad i didn't stay in venice. just be aware that the hostel is on top of a strip of bars. awesome, awesome bars. highly recommend
loved it! the location is just perfect.

we made so many friends at this hostel! the location was great right be the beach and restaurants and bars, the showers could do with some love though, the staff were great apart from one middle eastern guy in the evenings who didn't seem to enjoy people having fun. would stay here again though
everything was really great, better than expected to be honest. i would definitely recommend it to anyone and would stay here again myself.
chris and the night receptionist were excellent...and odille was amazingly helpful and friendly.    i would easily and readily stay and this hostel again.    thank you,  mark lentine

i had a great time staying here! the staff made me feel super welcome, as well as the other guests. everyone was very approachable so it was easy to meet new people. the location was awesome, right on the beach and near bars, shops, and restaurants. this was my first time stat staying at a hostel, so i was a little nervous. even though i was traveling alone, i knew i could make friends nearby.
great staff and awesome location. if you want to be in hemorsa this your spot. it is only a 20 minute ride from lax. can be a little noisy on the weekends but still worth it. would stay here again!

communication leading up to my arrival in la was not good because i had to change my arrival date and the confirmation emails from the staff were unclear as to whether they understood my request. however, upon arrival, the staff was wonderful! i had a late flight and the car rental office was so slow and i was going to miss the deadline for when the hostel office closed but the staff on duty kept it open until i arrived. very, very kind and accommodating!
super friendly staff. amazing location. it was not dirty, but not super clean either. a great place to stay.
trulia.com safe neighborhood  good reviews  great bar street  right on pier
great hostel, right by the pier. fun party atmosphere especially when it's fiesta hermosa! it can get quite noisy so if you don't like parties or loud music then it's not really for you.

this place is very friendly! however, i did not realize it was on top of a very noisy bar/restaurant. my bunk bed vibrated til 2am each night from the music and people in the bar. if you can sleep through anything, this place is perfect for you! i did love that we were a few steps from the ocean and that the staff were so friendly!
the hostel had a great position, i could see the ocean from my window. the stuff was very kind and helpful! the room was not super clean but overall i had a great experience. highly recommended!

very nice staff, best location.  the 3 south la beach towns are great and you don't need to have a car.  bus or uber is fine.  pier av. is a hotbed of activity, lots of restaurants, cafes, shops, etc.  staff is super-nice.
really good hostel right beside the beach and shops. excellent location and excellent breakfast. staff very helpful.  bikes are really good value at $15 for 24 hours.
awesome location right on the pier esplanade !  very clean and friendly , good vibes !!

location is what makes this hostel amazing. it's not on the beach, but it's maybe 50 feet away. i was in the large dorm style room on the second floor. the room had its own bathroom/ shower and a closet- which was really nice. they also have a few bathroom/ shower combos in the hall in case the one in your room is taken. i can't comment much about the free breakfast/ common areas, because i stayed out late and came back early as i spent most of the time with a friend that lives in hermosa beach.

really nice and friendly hostel right by the beach (50 meters). the only inconvenience is to get there and to go to other places in la. you always have to take a long public transport journey if you don't have a car.

staff was friendly. nice breakfast available. $15 bike rental which is a good deal. bring ear plugs because the area is noisy, right next to a bunch of bars. the bedrooms need to be cleaned better. don't forget to vacuum under the beds, there were a bunch of old papers and trash under mine. the windowsills were super dusty and the bathrooms were not that clean.
nice place to stay for one night, great location and friendly staff. 20 minute drive from the airport - lots of cafes and shops around!

the people who run this place are nice, but after traveling and using hostels in europe, asia, and north america, this is probably the dirtiest, loudest hostel i have been to. i arrived at 11:30pm, the hostel entrance was difficult to find - a very drunk gentleman who was staying at the hostel let me in. the parking area was a mile away from the hostel, which didn't help since we had to walk through the pouring rain to get back. thank god we were there for the night, left at 7am the next day.

extremely load and unruly. outside doors were kept unlocked. location next to a music bar---load. will never stay at this hostel again.   i would suggest no alcohol allowed and quite policy after 10:00pm.
this hostel is amazing, it is an incredible price for such a great location right on the beach. the owner is extremely welcoming and helpful. would recommend to anyone looking to stay in la!

super great hostel! i stayed here alone for only one night, and could directly connect with other ppl. my room had even an own bathroom, with sea view what was pretty amazing. the only negative thing is that there was not real common area. well, yes there was a very small  room with a table and a bench and also next to the kitchen was a small "common area", but it was more like everyone does what he has to do. not like, chilling together and going out together.

dirty, rude employees, weird setup and security, no common areas. didn't have a good hostel vibe. been all over, and to dozens of hostels and this is in the top 3 worst i've been in, outside of the awesome location on the pier.

great location, great athmosphere! so many different people to hang out with, and with the beach so close, there is always something to do.. it's the basic hostel where to hang out with other travelers, and get to know new people. slept through every night with ease.
really great vibe, terrific location, next to the ocean. really enjoyed myself!!

surf city is your basic hostel. the breakfast was fantastic--such a plus. the location in hermosa beach was great, but a little inconvenient for all of la. getting around was really hard and expensive. an uber to downtown la was around $40 one way, and just to venice beach it was $20. though hermosa beach was fun to explore, if you want to see more of la i would suggest staying somewhere else. the hostel itself was fairly clean but pretty noisy. definitely a party hostel but easy to meet people.
i suggest you visit a quality hostel or two and go to school on how they do things. i would never recommend yours as it is now.
great hostel, great people, great location - right next to pier in hermosa!

the location was perfect. lots of shops, restaurants, and bars within walking distance. the pier to the beach is literally right outside the front door. bike rentals shop one block away.  i made amazing friends here, many of whom were in their late 20s-early 30s. the owner was friendly and worked to make sure everyone was enjoying their visit throughout my time there. breakfast and coffee every day, beautiful communal living room with view of the ocean and lots of books to read.
clean, well kept, hospitable, accommodating, great location! a+!

this hostel, whilst being in a top location is quite dated. wifi barely works in the rooms. the place just feels dirty. on top of this the management is questionable at best. i paid for a "private" room yet on return one night i found 2 people sleeping in my room with my stuff thrown into a pile on the floor. i complained and was practically brushed. unacceptable behaviour. i wouldn't stay here again

this is by far the worst hostel i have ever stayed at. the hostel sits conveniently above a bar, which likes to play thumping club music until 1am. so if you're looking for a place to sleep, you might want to look elsewhere. oh, and when i say thumping, i mean it. not only can you clearly hear the music (not quiet), but the bass is turned up so much that you feel it. i was told that this only happens on fridays and saturdays, so on weekdays you might be safe. still, an unacceptable surprise.

i really enjoyed staying at the surf city hostel . there were always somebody to talk to and when there was another woman accidentally  sleeping in my bed at 1 am in the morning . the quickly figured out a new solution . i would definitely come back !

i stayed there couple of days n a week after i came back for more few days.   i needed 3 days however my flight back home was during the night so i woudn't sleep there in my last day. they aloud me to pay half price  wich was very nice.  good stuff:  - good free breakfast;    - plenty bars n good fun around;    - close to the beach;    - bathrooms are fine;    - good shower;    - fine internet.    - friendly staff    not so good things:  - weak wifi signal inside the bedrooms;

this was my second stay at the surf city, i enjoyed my first stay and there were no complaints on the second either, the cleanliness was lacking this time, the toilet and bath could have been cleaner, the place needs a new coat of paint and a little "loving". every thing else was just fine.
great location, right at the beach, with lots of bars and restaurants around the corner.
pretty doozy joint ah, right on the beach and plenty of little bars and stuff around. venice and manhatten beach aren't too far either
great location!

hostel was very good. not a real lot of atmosphere there in the winter being mainly a summer beach place but that is to be expected i suppose. facilities seemed clean, staff were helpful and free breakfast was good.

the clientele is great. mostly 20 somethings who were surprisingly welcoming. international. run by a french lady who keeps an eye on things. 4 to a room. no problems there. band plays right downstairs and can be heard outside the window. had no problems but good to take a suitcase lock. sound canceling headphones or earplugs.  winter? pjs long underwear/jacket/sock/ personal throw the rooms can get chilly.  bedding and towels provided. the location is very convenient.

the hostel is in a great location- right on the beach with plenty of bars nearby.  very relaxed atmosphere in hermosa as it is very affluent- a no-smoking law is enforced in the entire area so great to get away from smokey terraces.  i met a lovely girl at a bar down the strip and tried to bring her back to the hostel room but got massively c*ck blocked by one of the staff members who essentially kicked the girl out.  i'll let you judge for yourself whether this is a good or bad thing.

tiny, dingy, disgusting. i was there 5 minutes and couldn't believe my eyes. the female dorm was absolutely appalling, falling apart, ceiling coming down, broken blinds, stuff and garbage everywhere, looked like sloppy people lived there year round3 inch half a cheap mattress. i couldn't even bring myself to put my stuff down. i asked to just leave and get my money back. 6 ft tiny kitchen fridge with door open.. ouldn't refund even though it was sold out, but gave me a depressing, cold private.

this place has got erything i'd look for in a hostel- safety, great friendship, staff, facilities, beautiful location. the staff is willing to take the extra mile for the hostel residents. i would not think twice before staying here again. i can assure a safe, secure and happy stay to anyone reading this.

what an amazing destination! hard to get closer to the beach! great location for bars, food and shopping. post office and grocery near by. the staff is wonderful and welcoming! lots of activities, beach toys, bike rides, group dinners and nights out just to name a few. the whole place was very clean and linens were provided. the main doors in are left open most of the time. didn't seem to be a problem but i would recommend having a pad lock, they provide you with a locker for storage.
great location, decent staff. could be cleaner.

location, location, location!  my first time in a hostel, it was a wonderful experience.  people were friendly and interesting.  i could not have made up a more convenient location:  restaurants, surfing, volleyball, the pier, the beach and shopping.  lots of things to do and see, all within walking distance.  very relaxing.  perfect.  i felt safe with my roommates, in the building and all around.  building is worn, but clean.  i was only there a few days, but felt like i had a week's vacation.
wonderful weekend get away. will definitely be back soon.
incredibly loud, impossible to sleep.
great location! nice accommodations. simple breakfast
i'm in that area of los angeles once a year and i stay there every time.  the staff are friendly and, surprisingly, they remember me each time i check in.  that's pretty cool :)

i loved this hostel & its location! i stayed in a clean & tidy women's 6-person dorm in a corner room with a view of the sunset & beach. the best room! the only cons were the street noise that faded around midnight & the flight of stairs one must climb to enter the hostel (not normally an issue unless you are traveling with a touring bike, 4 panniers and 50 lbs of weight).  my bike was welcomed & stored in the hall next to my room (locked to itself). i felt safe. everyone was friendly.
great location right next to hermosa beach pier and amongst the local bars. easily walk or ride to manhattan or redondo beach and surrounding areas. comfortable and clean.

really good location right at the beach. nice staff and good atmosphere! unfortunately the wifi was bad and the beds not so comfortable. the showers and toilets are used by quite a lot of people so not always really clean.
amazing location right on the beach. place is a little run down but adds to its overall charm. literally 30 seconds from the ocean. awesome way to start the day. oh and it has free breakfast

the hostel was good. the only really bad thing for me was my matress (i could feel the springs on my back) and there was a chimney of a restaurant that pointed straight to our room window so it smelled like grilled beef the whole day. otherwise ww were hot dead.
all in all it's a great hostel! nice stuff, nice breakfast, 1 min walk from the beach, nice locations with many restaurants, bars and some shops. public transport very close.
proper backpackers vibe. excellent location. highly recommend

the location can't be beat. you can hire surfboards and bicycles. bike ride from hostel to santa monica pier was my highlight..see the sunset from hermosa pier amazing..the staff were very nice and extremely helpful.met a couple of really nice people there  hate the plastic sheet on mattress in hostels makes bead uncomfortable and hot..breakfast was great would stay again for sure
lack of ac and poor wi-fi. dodgy/loose electrical wiring and only one socket per room for four people. i would expect better for the price.

bit difficult for me to review as i spent literally 8 or 9 hours there but the staff were really friendly and helpful and make the effort to show you around even when you arrive at midnight. rooms are a bit cramped but seemed pretty clean and there seemed to be a pretty good vibe overall. hostel is right by the beach and wish i could've stayed longer
space under bunks need cleaned. when 6 women share a restroom, it would be a good idea to have extra roll of tissue in restroom.
staff is great and super friendly!!
good place to stay
awesome hostel, location is great, the staff is really helpfull, we would like to stay there again

great place to stay if you&#39;re on a budget and just want to enjoy the beach. really basic, and my room and bathroom weren&#39;t very clean, but does the trick for a couple days. no huge complaints, was happy to be there and knew what i was getting myself into.

the staff were by far the best part of the whole experience! very friendly and talkative and always willing to help! big shout out to them all!! the location was amazing and the facilities met hostel standards. overall a very happy stay! :) apart from coming back to find someone else was in my bed on the second night- being moved to a different room that wasn&#39;t with my friend i am travelling with because of a booking error. i was able to move back in the end however so no biggy

everything was quite great though as a person from europe and who always stays in hostels, this was the most expensive hostel i&#39;ve ever stayed. i never payed more than 15$ for a dorm room for way bigger and better hostels in europe. i understand that it&#39;s a business that is not as established and common as in europe in the united states but still i feel hostels can attract more people in the states if they keep their prices a little lower.

this place is perfect. i was traveling with 4 of my buddies and the location is amazing. the hostel is super close to the beach and amazing bars. the beds were decent and the staff were great. i would definitely recommend this hostel to anyone traveling and hopping around california.

had an amazing time at this hostel. it can be loud but if you are looking for party at night then chill at the beach all day this is the best place to be. plenty of opportunity to surf, paddle board, body board, go on a bike ride and/or tan.   staff are all super friendly and accommodating. i&#39;ll definitely be returning.   (i don&#39;t recommend this hostel if you are under 21)
surf city is a super cool hostel, really good vibes. perfect location

had a really great stay here. the location is great. hermosa beach is fantastic. it can get a bit loud at night with all bars close by but mainly on the weekend. you can rent bikes and surfboards for a very reasonable price. i would definitely stay here again.

surf city hostel boasts a certain price then charges a lot more, they nickel and dimed me til i was broke and refused to give me back my security deposit claiming that it was spread out among my party when they paid for their rooms

i absolutely loved staying here! i was only in town for three days for a personal vacation and this was a great place to stay! the staff were extremely friendly, the facilities were well managed and clean, and the atmosphere was very chill! i really enjoyed the friendly environment and it was in a great location just off the venice beach boardwalk! if you are planning a trip to the area, i would highly recommend staying here!
super friendly staff in the reception. great location by the beach. simple, clean and a welcoming atmosphere. i&#39;ll be back! 10/10
great location, is very good if you wanted to stay on a beach all day or go running which i did.
as always, excellent.

was my first time in a hostel and i couldn&#39;t be happier. better than expected, perfect location. right above the party spot on the beach, gets a little loud with the bass from the bars but as long as you aren&#39;t there to sleep all night it&#39;s perfect! oh and there&#39;s beach volleyball everywhere, not to mention 2 minutes walk to the ocean.

great party hostel on the beach. very relaxed and social atmosphere. the &#34;strip&#34; outside is very casual. if you want to drink and party then it&#39;s fantastic. not for someone wanting quiet time. for being so close to lax it takes a long time on public transport. next time i will just cab/uber.
swell experience!
had a fantastic experience:)
great location!

amazing place. you get yo meet lots of new ppl and i looove thr staff so kind hearted and welcoming. only disadvantage was its nit the cleanest place and we found both live and dead cockroaches in the room 😐

it&#39;s a very basic hostel with a very basic and squeaky bunk bed, security is not great, because there is one locker where you can fit a laptop sized backpack (not those for backpackers!) electricity plugs are scarce and far, but they exist :)  price: definitely not cheap, if you think that a motel costs just a tad more with way higher comfort.    the plus is the awesome breakfast, the location -- literally next to the beach and to a handful of restaurants, bars and pubs --, and the hostel-life!

awesome place, right on the beach, nice pubs under the hostel, love the place and the vibe will stay hear again for sure ! nice reception, good facilitiys, have all you need. the parking is couple street up but its look like a safe nighberhood.

incredible location offset by a poor management of the hostel.  there is a lack of security (3 lockers for 4 beds for example, entrance door open until late with no one filtering the access during the day...).  worst breakfast ever. just do not provide this kind of breakfast, what is the point?  the hostel would need to be freshened up. at least painting and carpets. probably 10 years without works done.   noisy people when i was there and no one from the staff to ask them to be quiet.
surf city hostel has a vibe of cool people and this was one of the best hostel stays i&#39;ve had.

no late check-in.  i tried to check in at 11pm (23h00). someone buzzed me into the hostel (weak security) and yet no one could help me check in. i talked to plenty of people.   all of them were very friendly people but none of them worked there. i could not find an employee of this hostel.  no one was at the office. i ended up sleeping in my car.   to be clear, the people and location are great.   however, the existence of nessie, big foot and surf city hostel staff members are dubious at best.

we loved this hostel! staff were very helpful and friendly, location is really good, the free breakfast is great! couple of things worth noting, our room was really hot until they could find us a fan and after one of us got locked out of our room we found out that other people&#39;s keys could unlock our door..but we never felt nervous about leaving our things there :) overall really good stay in hermosa!
nice location close to the beach!  nice staff and very clean.  bar underneath very loud during the night.

amazing location on the beach and by all the bars - you really don&#39;t have far to walk for anything. however, any member of public could easily walk in and do whatever. certainly less touristy compared to venice/santa monica and hollywood where i also stayed.  was put in a room with two who were on a work/stay vacation, they took over the entire room. couldn&#39;t use a locker as only 3 for a 4 bed room and one was being used to store their drinks! beds aren&#39;t great. need more planned activities

it was so good. it was welcoming and had a really great atmosphere. the only thing i has an issue with was there was only 3 lockers but 4 beds and as i was last in the room i had no place to store my valuables and ended up sleeping with them instead but really great location! i will be back.   stored my luggage as check out was before i was leaving and even let me rent a bike to pass the time. 100% will stay again.

surf city in a very fine hostel. excellent. right off the beach, not too noisy at night. staff helpful: found me a free parking place for my car, although there is a pay parking place right behind, gave me extra comforter when i said i was cold, offered cheap bike rental and concerned all was well. hostelrrs are friendly and considerate. no one kept me up at night, and hermosa beach is great! i had a fabulous stay!
the receptionist in the morning was not helpful. rooms should have been cleaner.

it is okay to charge more because you are located better than trump could afford it, but i guess even he would not try to build a hostel over a nightclub.  or if, at least he would take some money, because the prices are high enough, and get the place modernised, organised. a kitchen where at least a third of the guests would fit and a table for the dining room. take away the alcohol and the &#39;medicine&#39; from the workers and install some fans that work propperly!  not recommended.

this was a great hostel to stay at! i had originally booked 10 days but only needed to stay 5. the staff was great about allowing me to pay per night and although i lost my deposit i didn&#39;t get charged for the days i had previously booked!   it&#39;s rather small so easy to meet people. the locations is amazing which made our visit to la easy and enjoyable! the only thing i would make note of is that the hostel is right above a bunch of bars! so if you want quiet this might not be the place for you.
good hostel you couldn't get any closer to the beach awesome

loved this hostel. the people were friendly and the atmosphere was great. the beds were nothing to write home about, but have you ever slept in a comfortable hostel bed? nope. i would definitely stay here again.

great place. awesome location. helpful staff. great atmosphere. only improvements would be aircon, it gets a bit warm in the rooms with only a fan and wifi doesn't work in the rooms. would definitely stay there again.

the hostel and location were fantastic! located right on the beach in a quirky pedestrian neighbourhood, there was a right balance of chilling out and always having things to do. surf boards, body boards, bicycles, roller skates were available for rental, and there always were other travellers eager to join in. the atmosphere is great too, as the hostel is pretty small, so it felt like being part of a family of other travellers. it&#39;s a bit far from the downtown, but you can get there with uber.

great location! old building. staff was very kind but forgetful. they did not give us sheets or towels when we checked in. we had to return to the office multiple times to get these basic necessities. there was an in room bathroom which was excellent but the sink would not drain properly. we told the front desk days before our stay ended but the problem was not fixed. all in all, would stay again. exellent location makes up for sub-par service.

one of the best hostels i&#39;ve stayed at. the manager is so nice and helpful. the staff is also very helpful and friendly. its located in front of the beach. nice free breakfast. the rooms are pretty clean. the common areas are very good for socializing. there&#39;s a lot going on on pier ave during the day and at night, so ii&#39;s definitely a good place to go out.
nice hostel to stay at the beach.  for days you want to rest, go on a walk ore swim in the ocean.   a good place for playing beach volleyball.
first hostel stay ever..was very impressed, excellent location close to everything.  hermosa beach is awesome !
this place suited me beautifully  i&#39;ll be back

great hostel perfect for a few lazy days on the beach. the staff were fantastic and it was the friendliest hostel i&#39;ve stayed in. about 45-60minutes away from the hustle and bustle of hollywood we ubered it. the room was cozy, 6 females in an ensuite which was so dirty i preferred showering in the communal showers down the corridor which are clean and fine. the hostel is cleaned daily but perhaps could do with a bit of tlc. as a traveler i&#39;d go back.

a great place to stay, with bars and restaurants right next to it, and right next to the beach. i rented a bike from them easily, and joined in their bar crawl as soon as i arrived. very friendly. difficult to find but secure front door and rooms doors. the lockers need a small padlock, rather than a large one that i had. definitely recommend
i was traveling by my own and this hostel was an awesome place to meet nice people and spend a great time.

this is the first hostel i've ever stayed at. it was good for the cheap price. you get a bed, shower facilities, which is pretty much all you need. the shower wasn't great. it was dirty, however, that's just from previous people's use. the lock on the dorm rooms were secure. i only spent 1 night, so did not get involved socially much. hermosa beach is 45 min from santa monica pier, so it's not very central for me.
i very enjoyed my stay at the surf city hostel.the best.  jozsef from slovakia.
i loved my stay! perfect position, and everybody is so kind and helpful :)   can&#39;t wait to return in a few weeks!

this place is awesome! the location couldn&#39;t be better - located right on hermosa beach pier with many restaurants, banks and bars. i felt very safe in the area and at the hostel! the restrooms are very clean and feel like you are staying in someone&#39;s home (in a good way. would recommend this to anyone coming to la and wants to stay closer to the airport, near the beach or see a little more than the super touristy hollywood area.
friendly staff and awesome atmosphere   clean   great value for money  good location, right on the beach above a strip of bars

it is a very cute little hostel right at the pier. although the entrance was a little hard to find at the beginning, the rooms were standard and the location was just perfect, right on the beach, very convenient! if i will ever be in this part of la, i will definitely go there again!

i was very happy to have chosen this hostel. it&#39;s right on the beach, and a busy, cheerful, bar street down from hermosa beach pier.    perhaps a bit far south if you mainly want to visit hollywood, but ideal for a beach holiday.    also great was the management. the owner treats her guests as her family, warm and cheerful. great breakfasts: apples, bananas, cereals, toast, spreads, coffee, and more on occasion.    common space is a little divided, but ample really. recommended.

one of the best locations you&#39;ll find for a hostel in la. steps to the beach, great food and bars literally right beside the hostel. staff is awesome, the hostel is run very well. i&#39;d definitely come back next time i&#39;m in la!
really fun atmosphere. the staff were incredibly helpful and fun.   can&#39;t beat the location and the night life! would definitely recommend.

yes, it&#39;s loud outside but you know it&#39;s going to be that way because it&#39;s located near shops, bars and restaurants. but the walk to the pier is short and the facilities are great. i encountered a problem with a guest in the room i was assigned, i think she didn&#39;t want to share a room with a certain ethnicity (mine). she was rude and somewhat hostile towards me and the staff. the staff handled it well and assured me that everything was going to be alright. she left, i stayed. all good.
descent hostel, nice location. far away from club scene. free parking three blocks away

the location was lovely with the beach and  restaurants, but the  instructions to get to the hostel on the website are not easy to follow after 4hours of trying to get to the hostel i had to get an uber. the wifi didn&#39;t work in most rooms, and the showers were at time dirty or cold.   the blankets were never changed from guest to guest. no organised day trips or activitys. the kitchen was really small and not clean, only 1 computer. over all this hostel needs work!

this place is in the best location you can get. the room i was in had on ocean view and the hostel is located right next to all of the popular restaurants and shops in hermosa beach. the free parking is limited but i didn&#39;t have any trouble finding a spot. friendly staff, great location, and overall would highly recommend.
#NAME?
loved this place!!! everyone one was so nice and inviting. can&#39;t wait to go back!
the location is perfect! staff is very friendly and helpful. i would stay again at surf city hostel.

overall a nice hostel, very close to the beach. it's very far from all the other places in la though.... (you would need to take a cab or rent a car, if you want to go anywhere, it takes ages, if you take the bus).

location is amazing--it&#39;s about as close to the actual beach as you can possibly get. i arrived during a holiday weekend festival, so finding parking was the only issue i encountered. hostel staff were great, the room and bath were very clean, and as a lone female traveler i felt very safe. highly recommend.
overall a very nice place to stay, just be mindful of the noise. thanks to the staff for being so helpful!

had such a fantastic time here! the staff were really friendly and laid back and the hostel was full of fun and interesting people of all ages. the bathroom was small but clean and was only accessible by the people in my all-female dorm. there were no silly rules like some hostels have and i will definitely be returning when i come back to la!
staff were amazing, location perfect! thanks for the stay guys!

location was great an people were friendly - you would not want to be a light sleeper though as the room was very noisy from the nightlife downstairs. hermosa beach is a really cool area to hang out - would definitely recommend it.

ssh is in an unbeatable location! the facilities are slowly being upgraded, but there are currently few bathrooms, and they could use a facelift. they just finished installing one very nice bathroom with several stalls for toilets and showers when i&#39;d gotten there. the price is unbeatable, the staff was awesome, and the other guests were super cool too.

overall pretty good value for money. pluses: good location, nice staff always willing to help, friendly atmosphere, free wi-fi, breakfast, kitchen to cook. minuses: no parking, lack of privacy (understandably though, it&#39;s a hostel!), may be noisy at night because of the nearby pubs and restaurants. on the whole, better than i expected. thank you!
fantastic host who goes the extra mile to make you happy. really good location away from scummy hollywood. right near the beach.
i enjoyed the location and people the most. i must say the staff were friendly and accomodating. thank you! i&#39;ll be back to stay next time.
very nice hostel located right on the beach. the staff was very nice and there were so many cool travelers from all over. very nice and i would stay there again.
the reason i gave security a middle face is because i don&#39;t believe propping the outer doors open is safe.  i believe the gathering areas could be reconfigured for more comfort.
would absolutely recommend this place.. the staff alone makes it worth it to stay here. it was one of the most welcoming hostels i&#39;ve been to, and the location is amazing.

was a great place to stay - hard to find initially, but was a block away from the beach.  great location, very friendly and helpful staff.  there was free parking about a half mile away, short cab ride from downtown.  overall, great value!
amazing staff. really friendly. right next to the beach. great beach views from the windows. good kitchen to cook in after a decent, substantial free breakfast

best location ever!!! especially for that price. rooms were very clean and it was nice to leave the window open and hear the ocean. everyone i met was super friendly, including the staff. don&#39;t forget to bring your passport! enjoy!
the manager is a very sweet french woman who treats all of her guests like family.  she made the place very nice!
great location especially since it is right on the pier. everyone was friendly.
love this place. prime location. i'm a returning customer!
i had a great time staying here. everything was clean, people were friendly, great experience overall. i would recommend it to anyone.

stayed one night with my mum. super friendly and welcoming staff, also very helpful. great location, absolutely beautiful, such a cute little beachside area away from the busy city, but not too far away from it at the same time. hostel is right on the beach and next to shops and restaurants. good facilities, room was clean, beds comfy, bathroom small but functional. free breakfast simple (toast and cereal, coffee, tea) but good. would definitely stay here again, hopefully for longer next time!

pros: great location right next to beach in calm but fun town of hermosa beach, excellent staff, clean, cheap bikes for rent    cons: the front door is always wide open and the main desk is in the back of the hostel so there is not really any "security" (although everyone is given a personal room key), far from downtown and hollywood--have to take multiple buses and it takes at least an hour, the kitchen and living room are both very small, majority of hostel guests seem to be older
excellent location.

hostel staff were friendly and helpfu! clean sheets and towels were provided, free breakfast was also a plus! right next to the beach and not too touristy. only bad thingt would be that there was a huge  cockcroach in our room on the 2nd day of our stay. not sure if it came from the hostel or outside of the hostel. overall, a pleasant and fuss free stay.
excellent location, staff is friendly, really good deal. will certainly come back if i decide to stay in beach cities ever again in la.
great place xd
would of liked a warning that the band was going to be playing in the bar 1 floor below our room until 1 am.

the location of the hostel is amazing, just one block from the beach an you can see the ocean from your room. the staff was superfriendly and helped us with all our questions. the wifi connection is not that good in the rooms up in the 2nd floor. but there is a lot of common space downstairs where it works properly. moreover they serve really good breakfast! we definitly would stay there again.

the hostel is really small so i generally like the atmosphere better than in big hostels. however, from my point of view there were too many people in one room - i never felt so claustrophobic before in a hostel (i stored most of my stuff in my car during the time we stayed there). moreover, i think there are too less showers and bathrooms for that amount of people.

it was a very good experience. i leave not so far away from it but i booked a room for me and a friend and the staff was wonderful. the other customers are very nice and friendly. the location is more than excellent. you are surrounded by bars, restaurant and have the hermosa beach pier in front of you. the beach is 50m away.   it is the place to be.
it was a fantastic stay, staff were great, facilities were good too. however on our last day we were invaded by a huge cockroach...
what we love the most from surf city hostel was breakfast. the staff is very friendly and helpful, also. cleanliness was not very good, despite so many people working there.

litrally loved this place! best location for all your needs! the staff were all amazing! super helpfull,very informative,fun and couldnt do more for you. good prices. great breakfast. hot showers. all round best service and experience. right on the best beach too! near great shops,bars,restaurants. didnt want to leave. recommend here to all 110%!

the staff was unfriendly and it didn't seem that he wanted to do his job. during check-in i have asked him two times where i may park but he didn't tell me as i asked again he said i shall bring my luggage to the room and come back again afterwards. as i returned he wasn't in the office anymore. another guest asked if she can help me somehow and she explained me the way to the parking.

right on the beach front was tricky to find the little door to begin with, but the staff was amazing help such a calm atmosphere the dorms are basic, but the common room and kitchen could do with updating, you get what you pay for ...all in all a great 4 nights

overall it was an enjoyable stay with a quirky bunch of backpackers. this hostel however is definitely not for most people, with security and administration being very relaxed. no proper social events were organized while i was here, but the small social room helped with the atmosphere.
absolutely amazing hostel. only stayed for four nights and made so many friends. a place to both relax and party and the most amazing location!
friendly staff, nice location!
it is not safe to live there cuz their office close in the evening . i

we enjoyed our stay at the hostel - the staff was friendly and the location excellent.  one important thing to consider is where your room is located within the building.  there is a bar beneath the hostel and while we were there, live music was being played.  additionally, there is quite a bit of noise coming from the walkway as it's a popular location.  all in all, we enjoyed the stay.  just be mindful of your room location and i would suggest, bring ear plugs.

my second stay at this hostel. great experience both trips. awesome place to stay when you have a flight the next day. close enough to the airport that you don't need to leave 3 hours early. location is unreal. i have stayed previously between conferences and this has to be one of the best locations i have seen for a hostel. been to many in south america and europe and the value for this hostel is up there with the best of them. only thing that would make it better is a/c.
we had an amazing time at surf city - thank you very much!!! x

the perfect place to be in l.a. and one of the best hostel have stayed.  people are really friendly, the view on the beach is amazing. the district, hermosa beach is safe and there is many pub and cafés around to get a good evening /night moment. i've really enjoyed my stay in this place. and i will come back for sure.
not bad but the location is the best reason to go there. the atmosphere, the breakfast, the cleaning are ont excellent
only used the hostel as a base, but can't complain about anything
i booked and paid for two nights but only stayed for one. i lived in africa for 8 years but never felt as unsafe as at surf city. no security despite dodgy area. rude and aggressive french manager.
wonderful experience and wonderful people! clean, safe and a great location.
odile is lovely, friendly and very helpful.

unbeatable location. staff from lots of different nationalities. do not go there if you intend to have good sleep, this is a party place. there's several bars and clubs around and the liquor store 30 secs away closes at 2:00 am. overall this is a pleasant place to be.
it took them two days to fix the bathroom light and some of our belongings went missing, overall a pretty good hostel though! basic but in a great location.

wonderful place to start off my us adventure! hostel is perfectly fine and staff friendly and always ready to assist. it's located right on the beach! i was lucky enough to arrive just before labor day and the festivities over the weekend were absolutely fantastic!! it can be rather loud at night because of its location and busy atmosphere but if your looking to have a good time i'd highly recommend this place. but if your looking for a quiet place to relax then maybe surf city isn't for you.

the lockers on site were only big enough for a pairs of shoes. a/c in the sleeping quarters would be greatly appreciated as it was hot at night. ambient noise from the restaurants & bars below was loud also. couldn't be closer to the beach if you tried, scenery was beautiful and picturesque.
had an amazing time here. the atmosphere was great and staff helped accommodate me when there was no room available. i would come back in a heartbeat. thank you for the best 4 nights of my trip!!
i loved it. nice staff. very well located in an amazing place.
fell in love with this place. thank you room 108;)
can't get any closer to the beach! amazing
i had a great stay here, the staff were always very friendly and helpful. the hostel is in an amazing location just seconds from the beach. i would defiantly come back again.
the girls were so respectful and wonderful!
i really enjoyed my stay here, a lovely place to finish my holiday. helpful and friendly staff.

lots of teenagers, yelling in the corridor until 2am both nights that we stayed there, sitting at our bedroom door even if there was actually plenty common places to be used instead. quite disrespectful...the hostel workers should not allow that. maybe the fact that they were teens as well did not help. the "free parking" was actually a normal street 10min by walk from the hostel, where anyone could park.
brilliant staff, the manager does a great job of looking after her guests!

the hostel was less popular 1 y ago, less expensive, i enjoyed stay here, almost all the people i met have been great! this year was different, some people were nice but those in my dorm not at all, really confused about having fun.having fun doesn't mean be racist, try to steal money from my purse, open my luggage in my absence, left dirty underware on it, open the curtains when i am still naked dressing myself, talk rabbish on people's back,making noise from 5 am and stay always in the room!!
close to the beach which was nice however the hostel and area was very noisy at night.

this place became home for us very quickly. i would of liked more advice as to what we should see while in la. some people use it as a place to stay but we are travelling and want to see every thing and we couldn't even get accurate advice on how to use the bus service

so i didn't put excellent on everything for this hostel because i was being fairly harsh and comparing it to what it could be, but considering that what i did describe as excellent was very well deserved. the location and value for what you pay could not be better. i wish i could upload a picture from my phone i took out of my window. it was absolutely gorgeous and don't bother with the whole band being too loud thing.
it&#39;s a located in a very nice area, facilities are average.  a little on the expensive side.

the location is absolutely ideal - just a few steps away from a lively, beautiful beach and in the center of dozens and dozens of restaurants and bars. people are very friendly and there is always something to do.

the hostel is located at the beach directly under a pub. it's a good location to make party. lots of bars and restaurants are near the hostel. with this advantage, it could be loud until after 12:00 am. staffs are very friendly. the hostel is ideal for people who do surfing or swimming.
awesome location, guaranteed to meet lots of nice people

the spot si amazing, very nice staff, a lot of places to eat and have a drink around. mostly young people from all around the world are staying there which makes it a really cool place to stay! i recommend it!!

everything was pretty good. great breakfast, unbeatable location (it was an amazing area to stay after visiting the city during the day; i also loved the beach there and it's not as crowded as other beaches in la) and very nice personnel. some things would be good to renew (like mattresses; mine was pretty uncomfortable to sleep on), but overall the hostel was pretty decent and i had an amazing experience. i would totally recommend it!
awesome location and great atmosphere

right on the beach you couldn't get a better location!  still close enough to day trip into la if you wish but there is more than enough to do here in terms of beaches, food, drinks and coastal touring to keep you busy.  a very friendly and social hostel with fantastic staff.  there's always a bit of a party going and it's very easy to meet people and have a good time.
hi there,    thank you for hosting me - i had a really good start for my trip and received very helpfull recommendation from francis.    best regards  tanja

i have never stayed in a hostel this overpriced. it should be a maximum a 15$/night. there is no ac, the shades in our room were falling apart. at one point, there was a cockroach in the hallway so we chased it down to kill it so it wouldn't get into our room. the man at the reception came by to see what we were doing and just said "leave it alone". i don't mind cheap hostels, but they have to be inexpensive to be worth the adventure. this hostel had nothing going for it.

location could not be any better for a good time - right next to a strip of bars/restaurants. front/back door was sometimes left open, so security could be a little better. rooms were extremely hot, as no aircon, showers got a bit sandy so could have done with a quick wash every now and then, but other than that, i couldn't recommend this hostel any more! place to be!
excellent staff, beautiful views.

loved this hostel! we booked for 4 nights and ended up staying for 9! located right by the beach, we could see the beach from our bedroom window. as the hostel isn't huge everyone gets to know one another. met some great people, everyone really friendly. will 100% come back and stay here again next time i am in la. could not fault this hostel, great value for money.

good hostel right on hermosa beach. breakfast basic but quality. internet available throughout. can be at bars/beach/restaurants/bike and board rental places in seconds!! couldn't get my key deposit back unfortunately because they closed reception early the night before i was leaving :( price seemed best in the city; don't expect european/south american hostel prices in la!! will stay here again if i'm in the area!

stairs lead to the hostel, difficult if you have suitcase to carry it alone upstairs, and then lob it through a hallway at the end to the reception. no security, doors left wide open, anybody can access the hostel.  dirty, filthy rooms, overcrowded and small with 3 bunkbeds in room 107, no air con and the room gets really hot, and the street noise is unbelievably loud from the pub downstairs which plays loud music and revellers walking the streets, couldn't sleep at all.  dirty bed covers

i love staying at surf city hostel whenever i come to town. it's so close to the beach you can see the ocean from every window. the staff is friendly and the place is clean and easygoing. it's a very warm and inviting place. there are so many restaurants and shops nearby that it really is the best place to stay in the area. it's not to far to walk to redondo beach. i love surf city hostel.

first time traveller that's 19 years old. this place is nothing more than a place to chill your feet at night. staff needs to be more serious about their job and clean the damn place. still would probably go back due to being so close to the beach and have a nice view. make it more traveller friendly and then this place would be golden!

i had an excellent time at the surf city hostel; it was my first time visiting hermosa beach. the staff were very helpful and friendly.  great location; my room had a view of the beach. i would definitely stay here again! it can be loud at night from the surrounding bars but ear plugs did the trick. the price you pay to stay right in the heart of hermosa!

the manager seriously needs to change his bad attitude. the other staff was sweet, welcoming and funny. we were many who thought he was arrogant and uncomfortable. otherwise it was a good hostel. too bad the managers energy was so negative...

great hostel! location fantastic! located on a plaza with great shops and right on the beach. i had so much fun meeting people that i didn't want to leave! there was some items stolen during my stay (not mine), and some concerns about homeless wandering in, but i never personally felt insecure as the area was super safe, it's a reminder that with all places, you should be keeping your gear under lock and key. thanks!
i would highly recommend surf city hostel. location was great and staff were also great. great hostel vibe
the hostel was well located and the staff was kind. we felt well welcomed, and we did not have any issues in finding a parking location close nearby.
cockroaches in the kitchen and bathroom! it's a shame as it's a great little place to stay and you are right on hermosa beach. need some tlc!
great hostel! clean and secure, lots of amenities. the sound of waves in the morning worth the few screams coming from bars around.  definitly would recommend this hostel.
a good hostel, but a little expensive
cockroaches in the kitchen
loved staying here!! staff are so helpful and accommodating, although can be loud at night as it is on the strip it is fantastic location and would highly recommend staying here :)
great location at a great price everyone was friendly and accommodating.

the staff are very friendly especially odre(the french woman) and iraqi (mohamad)  the location is great. hermosa beach is the best. they have bolikes to rent which was awesome. it's great choice to meet people around the world.
it's the perfect hostel for backpakers
i enjoyed my stay, it met my needs. the owner was very nice.

hermosa beach has a special, easy-going atmosphere and surf city hostel is just like that. the location right by the beach and next to pubs is excellent. easy to rent a surf board and start practicing, or play beach volley with new friends... the breakfast is great with so many sorts of food. definitely would recommend.

awesome staff and friendly people. plus it's really close to the beach! the neighbourhood it's probably the best of la, better than venice beach and manattan beach too. can't decide if it's better that santa monica but it's defined a place that i would recommend to everyone.
great people, great staff, great location, great breakfast. i had so much fun at this hostel. will definitely come back somewhen
* location is great - close to many restaurants, bars etc  * bus connection to downtown la is slow (1,5 h)  * some people i met had to pay 10$ per bike and some 15$ thats a bit annoying

no wifi in the dormitories, only in the common rooms. hair all over the bathroom. soggy towel left on bathroom floor for days. garbage never changed. room very very humid and smell of mold, which penetrated all my clothes.

fun and clean hostel. lots of bars to go to in the evening and great tacos next door. plenty of bikes to rent! recommend riding to venice. not a party hostel but can be loud with club below. room pics don't really match pics on the site otherwise rooms are clean and staff is great!!

i stayed a few days in surf city hostel at the very end of a long trip. it s a very nice, relaxing (but lots of party also if you want to) place. 30 secondes to the beach (hermosa beach is very clean and huge), staff is always helpful, free breakfast very big. it's not a huge hostel, which allows to meet people easily in the common area. a perfect stay, thanks.

literally had the best time here, everyone was so nice and the location is amazing if you want some time on the beach and chilled out vibe with some great bars at night. it's too far out if you wish to go to hollywood etc but great people there will mean you never want to leave!

was in la on business and decided to stay at the beach for the weekend prior. a great little spot with fantastic views and right in the heart of a great night out. can't recommend this place highly enough and i will definitely stay again next time i'm in la.

perhaps the best location in la, right on the beach, atmosphere is great, staffs are very friendly and helpful, decent rooms and clean toilets, all the pubs and night life are just right at the door, good breakfast. the only problem is the noises from outside pubs in the evening, that's understandable because of the location but they should not allow the guests to make noisy parties in the common areas during late nights! still it's a great place and with some nice people.

i stayed at surf city hostel during an overnight layover on my way home from overseas. upon arriving to the hostel after  30-some hour flight, the hostel staff greeted me with a smile and a friendly chat as i checked in. she was kind enough to help me arrange my transportation to lax for the following morning so i wouldn't have to be stressed about it at 4am when i had to be at the airport! at first i was bummed to have an overnight layover but now i can't wait to go back! for longer this time!

a clear 100% if not for the club underneath. shakes the whole place up but only until midnight. amazing free breakfast and i got all the help for my special needs at the time. no reason for me to stay anywhere else.

we had the best time at surf city hostel. super cheap bike/surf hire. next to all the local bars. i would recommend going to the spot a vegetarian restaurant - amazing food!!! yes it's loud until 2 am but don't be boring go and get drunk then you won't even notice!
good free bagel and bread breakfast. directly at the beach. good busconnection from the airport
perfekt located!!!
this hostel is ideal. it's literally on the beach, the staff are helpful and interested in your happiness, and it's clean.
its kinda far from a lot of things... but overall was good. had the chance to leave from the hostel and in 1 min i was able to see the sun fall from the beach!
nice located!   wide beds

located right by the beach, perfect for surfing. no communal area, there is a tv room but too small to socialise, hence no atmosphere, you are either in your room or on the beach. not recommended for solo travellers. if you thinking of traveling to downtown or hollywood from there it takes about 2-3 hours to get there. clean rooms, free breakfast, friendly staff

nice little hostel right on the beach. price is a bit high for the facilities, but i guess the beach pays for itself. kind of old building. loud during night and early morning. bring earplugs if you're a light sleeper. staff were rad!
excellent staff, very clean facilities. met some great people during my stay. the location cant get any better. i could see the beach and the ocean from my bunk bed. will return!
this was my first hostel experience and it couldn't have been better.  the staff was super friendly and i couldn't have hoped for a better view of the beach.

great hostel right on hermosa beach. only a 30 minute bus ride from lax airport. rented a bike and cycled 20km along a safe bike trail along the coast to venice beach and santa monica. very far from downtown hollywood and other tourist attractions. staff were helpful and friendly. easy to meet other travellers.

thank you beautiful people of surf city hostel - for a very pleasent stay!   what makes a good stay at a hostel is mainly the people you get to know and a clean surrounding - this is what we had. it can get a little loud in this area though - so just be prepared for a little party here´n there :)  danke francis für die hundert fragen die du steht´s bereit warst zu beantworten! :)  we apreciated this a lot!!!  ♥⚓♥
location....location!!! right in the middle of all the action in hermosa beach. can't go wrong for the location or price. nice staff too, very accomodating and welcoming!!!
great location, right by the beach.  lots of bars and restaurants close by but it wasn't too loud at night.
i would visit hermosa beach just to stay at this hostel again!!!

this was by far the best experience at a hostel i've had. truly outstanding. it is the staff that really made the trip. nick, in particular, was absolutely dedicated to keeping everything together while also promoting a good time with all. through his efforts, this was much more communal and social than i've seen lately.     of course the beautiful landscape and weather helped. 10/10. fantastic.
nice staff. only stayed for a night though so not much more to add
hostel is in a cool neighbourhood, pretty safe area, right on the beach, easy access to public transport! staffs are friendly and helpful too!
the staff was really helpful in all aspects of our visit, and it's location was perfect for our needs! would recommend this place for anyone looking for a relatively inexpensive vacation.
nice people made everything lovely :)  it is definitely a place i will go for next time i visit l.a.!!!
so helpful, so friendly. had a great time. thankyou

go and stay there! i will definitely recommend the hostel to my friends! although it's above a bar, the location is amazing - right on hermosa beach, which is super nice! if you want to experience la's beach life, it's the perfect hostel. even if you want to do the tourist attractions (hollywood, beverly hills and so on) you will be more than happy to come back to the relaxing hostel after a busy and loud day in downtown la.

this hostel is one of the best i have been to. the owner is superfriendly and involved with the life in the hostel. the people are open, interested and enthusiastic. the location is amazing: just next to the beach. i really recommend to stay here, but be warned: you will probably extend your stay:)
it was so noisy for the music stage by the side.

we stayed at this hostel before our departure to australia.  while we were there we stayed in a 6rm dorm but we booked for a 4rm.  not sure what the difference in cost was because we forgot to go ask/tell the staff.  the room was decent.  it was the first hostel i had ever stayed in so i didn't know what to expect.  basically it was outdated but relatively clean.  the staff was very helpful with things to do in the area and it was close to shops/restaurants.

perfect location. right by the beach, nestled in between bars and restaurants. the staff were helpful and friendly. the crowd of guests tended to get rowdy (especially the aussies). overall good experience, despite not getting much sleep. make sure to check out the happy hours at nearby establishments.

a very nice hostel! i had a good time there. the only thing is, if you wanna spend time in the city center or hollywood and you don't have a car, it's too fare away. but if you're looking for a hostel on the beach, that is the place to be!

my stay there was so comfortable! i didn't wanna leave i was right by the beach and restaurants i liked my visit. i would recommend this hostel for anyone who's looking to save some money! welcome to california :-)
very chill place, loved it! and the owner, a lovely french lady made us the most delicious thanksgiving meal ever. really nothing to complain about, thank you !
great place so close to the beach.  the french owner is nice and helpful.  the shared spaces are too small but still a good place.  computer free to use, good breakfast.
the staff were very lovely and the hostel drew a nice chilled crowd. right next to the beach. cool strip- bars, live music etc.

i have nothing but love for this hostel, was a last minute decision to stay at hermosa beach, not only was it so clean, the staff were/ are so incredibly friendly. i felt welcomed straight away. lockers in the room and the bathrooms were always clean. breakfast was awesome and the wi fi connection was great. literally on the beach so it was nice to run every morning. will stay there again on my way home. thanks guys! big love!
great location!!

very very noisy. it's over a bar, in a very busy area. while friday/saturday nights are obviously the worst for noise, even other weeknights are incredibly loud. the hostel is also not very clean... i wouldn't say it's "dirty", but it's definitely in need of a good dusting.
great location. friendly staff. i definitely recommend surf city hostel. thank you for a great stay
friendly hostel in a great location right on hermosa beach. loads of great shops/restaurants/bars right out the front door. overall a great option in the most laid back part of los angeles.
the hostel has an amazing location right on hermosa beach and above cafes and bars. the staff were cruisy and helpful. will definitely stay there again!
it's  not a bad place to stay, but very  noisy in the night bcos of the bar downstairs.
the location is very good very close to beach. the magager is so nice.

excellent location this hostel has potential but its way to loud above all the bars at night unless you want to go out every single night mon to sun. not the cleanest. i accidently locked myself out of a private room the morning i had to get to the airport only 1of 3 staff seemed to give a care about helping me. need an emergency number for when office is closed. almost missed my flight as had to wait until 8am for spare key from owner
parking spot quite far (but that' because of the location)  mattress very thin, not comfortable
best place ever.  definitely going back.
beautiful location, literally ten seconds walk to the beach. very cute and cozy neighborhood of hermosa, felt just at home.
thank, my stay was very good. i will recommed surf city hostel.
you cannot beat the beach location for the price!

right next to hermosa beach and a load of bars! close to some cool shops! the place is clean and tidy! works for me! i hired a bike from the hostel for $25 or so and went to santa monica, that's a good trip! rocking!

well i really not expected this. i can not said that i'm not satisfied but also i really was surprised. i have been in a thousand other hostels around us and the feeling was more in a hotel than hostel but this was small, not very clean they put u in a room with people who live and work in the hostel. i mean i'm guest put me with the other guests not with people who are smoke and live there and their stuff. in general average goes to poor.

this hostel was awesome!! i was traveling by myself and thought i would get bored during my stay at hermosa beach. no!  the beach is a one minute walk away from the hostel the people there are super friendly and helpful.   the price to stay there is absolutely fair!  there are a lot of places around where you can find food and breakfast at ther hostel was also okay :)   next time i go there i definitly will stay at surf city ;)

i loved this hostel, it was the first stop of a long trip and i was really tired when i arrived. but the atmosphere and the people were so great that i went out and ended up having a blast. it's right on the beach, location could not be better! and the breakfast was amazing, never had such a rich and good breakfast at a hostel before.
so much fun :)

amazing location but very noisy both inside and outside the hostel.  it is almost on a gorgeous beach with bars and restaurants literally on the door step.  if you want to laze on the beach in the day and party all night this is the place but if you want a decent nights sleep try somewhere else! the wifi was only in certain areas but then worked well.  the kitchen and communal areas were fine but small.
don't expect much in the way of creature comforts here, but the prime location more than makes up for it.

i booked two beds there, but after we arrived there we found it's located in between bars and it's very noisy and full of people in the passage way when we arrived there at 11 pm.  the guy at the counter said it's fine to just not stay but i need to pay for the deposit, i thought it's fine because i can get the most part of the money back. and we leaved and found another place to stay.  after few days, i found i was charged full price and i called their manager, she said i have to pay in full!

this hostel is really well located, right in the middle of the hustle on pier avenue. for that reason though it is hard to sleep before 3 am, especially if your bedroom faces the bars. if you are on the first floor, forget about it since there is a bar downstairs with music going on until 2 am. the atmosphere is great though, very friendly people and staff, right in front of the beach. good place to party if you are alone. if you are traveling with more people, you can get a hotel for the same $
the hostel was located really good. took an hour bike ride to venice beach

we are biking the pacific coast highway/ highway 1, and this was the first stop for us from landing in lax. just a short shuttle from lax, and with surf city being 'right on the beach' meant we could stick our toes in the second we arrived, as late as it was! staff was super nice, knowledgeable, flexible, and they have a locked security closet where we could keep our larger valuables. though, bring earplugs-- it is still a hostel over a bar and right on the pier lined with delicious food shops!

we had a great time at surf city! we could hear and see the beach from our window- this is probably the best located hostel in terms of proximity to the beach.  the guests were from all over and we really enjoyed meeting some new international friends. the accommodations are basic but clean and the staff were very friendly.  we also rented bikes from the hostel for $5 each! such a deal!

right place for those who wants to spend days and nights at the open air (more or les...) and just need a place to stay and sleep.  rooms are slmple but clean and sure  15 minutes from lax, perfect stop for travellers..
this hostel is amazing! the location is perfect and everybody is really friendly
easy to meet nice people :)
the hostel is located right on the beach and next to bars and shops. this is that second time i have stayed at the hostel and i would definitely go back again. the staff are helpful and friendly.
a great hostel in a good location in the context of its surroundings. it's a long journey to get to the city by public transport though.
nice hostel unfortune the noise from the bars downstairs, couldn't sleep till 3am :(
staying for a few weeks.  been 4 days and it's super awesome.
stay here every year for an annual event and the staff always look after us. perfect location (unless you want to sleep!!)
an awesome location!!! a bit of a frat atmosphere. but the location to the beach and bike path cannot be beat. i would stay here again. jerry frye indiana

the location of this hostel makes up for everything else. it is literally right on the beach. we had booked a 6 bed female room and ended up in a 4 bed mixed dorm. not only that, we awoke on our second morning to find a 5th person asleep on our (very tiny) room floor as the staff had nowhere else to put them. the wifi didn't work in the room and the power outlets hardly worked. the staff were friendly and helpful however and the atmosphere in the communal areas was fun.

it's right on the beach!!  one of the cheapest places to stay in the south bay.  hermosa beach is very safe at night.  of course, it can be a bit noisy on the weekends.  you'll also really need a car if you're staying here and want to see la.  if you just want to surf and enjoy the sun, then maybe you wouldn't need one.  i definitely reccomend this hostel.  i can easily imagine staying here again.

hostel was in a great location (right by the beach), it was a little hard to find it at first though because the entrance is kind of hidden. the general security is low - anyone can walk up the stairs. there was sand on my mattress, but it's a beach town so i guess that's expected. other than that it's a great hostel and i'd probably stay there again.
very nice hostel. i felt at home here. very easy to meet friendly people :)

location couldn't be better, for beach or night time party.okay to stay, if don't own any thing of value. what ever expensive name brand clothes or accessories. 3 lockers pr room which there are six guests, luggage room open  some times (people could grab what ever they want).  front door open. and no self locking door to your room, so the rooms are open usually, when other guest don't lock.  book the hole room if some one want to stay here.
great location and clean was a great stay and includes breakfast!
great position. the atmosphere is kind of weird.
great place, great price, great location. no complaints!!

the only hostel downside was the inaccurate parking information at the website. the hostel doesn't have any parking area available. you have to park your car at public parking areas which are far away and have day and time restrictions.   this information must be updated at the website so no future guest can be disapointed.
awesome place to stay when in la. great atmosphere. right off the beach. cheap bike rental. definitely will be back.
great hostel! good atmosphere and nice location in front of hermosa beach. the only problem is that hollywood is too far away if you are using public transportation...

i liked the location and the staff was akso very nice. i liked it that you could rent a bike for only 10 dollars. when i was there the atmosphere was soso. maybe it had to due with that i was there on a monday and tuesday.

lovely hostel in the lovely hermosa beach. everyone's very chilled and friendly and there's art all over the walls. our room had an ensuite but it wasn't cleaned very often but it was still ok. the free breakfast and cheap bike hire were definately bonus's cycled to venice beach and santa monica but is 15miles each way so would recommend getting up early so as to be back before sunset. takes about 2hours on public transport to hollywood.

i traveled with a friend of mine for a weekend get away. we loved the location right in the middle of everything and our room overlooked the beach! the staff was very friendly. the area is a little noisy on the weekend but the price you pay for being walking distance to everything. we shared a room with 4 other travelers from germany and russia and loved getting to know all the many different worldly travelers that were passing through. this hostel and the people we met definitely made our trip!

i couldn't imagine a "better" place to experience the california beach life and positive vibes than at the surf city hostel in hermosa beach. perfect location and staff! odile the manager and fab her assistant are very caring and hard-working people who are there to assist travelers in every way they can! the hostel could use some updating and a few of the rooms can be noisy, but beyond that this is a top-notch place in a top-notch location with cool guests and a staff that cares! cheers! joe
really good breakfast and a vibe atmosphere that needed to be lived!

there are many long term resident there which made it feel more like a homeless shelter more than a hostel.   it's in a great spot if you are in cali for the beach.  breakfast was cool and wifi was also pretty good.  definately not a party hostel and not that great if you are looking to meet people. it's also very far from the clubs.  more long termers than actual travellers = bad/ depressing vibe, so keep that in mind...
nice hostel, great location. can be very noisy on friday/saturday nights from the bar below - remember ear plugs

this is well located if you like having time on the beach or like surfing. but consider about one hour and half or more of public transport to get to downtown and hollywood. warning : there is a bar just downstair blasting the music with a huge amount of bass, the walls, windows and bed bunks were shaking. if you are looking for a quiet place near the beach dont go there, or ask for a room at the third floor(their second).

playing the pro beach tennis tourney, it was a perfect location for me to get ready for the tourney on hermosa beach.  coming from kauai, its a very similar feel with a bit more affluence.  i highly recommend it.    mark keil  poipu beach, hi

i had very limited funds and needed somewhere to stay for a few days.  this was a great place.  super friendly people and right on the beach.  the common rooms are small, but kept tidy and the kitchen seemed well stocked with pots and pans and such. (i didn't use the kitchen because there are so many awesome restaurants just out the door.)  the rooms were clean enough and i loved that the room i was in had a bathroom attached.  staff was friendly and helpful. great deal for the money!

there were only two little issues with this hostel. there is nowhere to lock up your luggage-only small things like laptops and cell phones. also, the internet only works well in the computer room. other than that, this hostel was great! i'll definitely return next time i come to l.a.
great place! thank you guys!
free breakfast
was sick bahhh check it out wooo spergn beck
